title: Inkuru y’urukundo rwa Iyakare na Nyirandayishimiye bahujwe no gucuranga igisope mu kabari
content: Iri tsinda abarizi bakunze kubonamo umugabo w’ibigango ufite igikara gisa neza n’umusatsi mwinshi uzi gucuranga ibikoresho hafi ya byose bya muzika akagerekaho no kuririmba. Uyu mugabo aririmbana n’umugore we ufite ijwi ryihariye akanagira ubuhanga mu gucuranga gitari. Uwo mugabo yitwa Iyakare Wenceslas [Rickson] akaba umuyobozi wanashinze iri tsinda, ribarizwamo n’umugore we Consolée Nyirandashimye. Bamaze imyaka ibiri babana nk’umugore n’umugabo ndetse banamaze kwibaruka imfura z’impanga. Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Iyakare yavuze ko ahura bwa mbere n’umugore we byari mu 2018 ubwo yamusangaga ari gucuranga mu kabari. Ati “Nari nsanzwe muzi kuri Youtube acuranga inanga, umunsi umwe ari ku wa Gatanu sinari nakoze, nanjye nsohoka nk’abandi basore, icyo gihe aho nari nasohokeye nahasanze umwana w’umukobwa ucuranga neza ngira igitekerezo cyo kumuzana mu itsinda nari mfite.” Nyuma yo kuzana Nyirandayishimiye mu itsinda rye, hagati ye na Iyakare urukundo rwatangiye kuziramo, birangira biyemeje kubana. Ati “Hashize nk’amezi atandatu byaje guhinduka bizamo urukundo duhita twiyemeza kubana.” Nyirandayishimiye avuga ko na we ubwo yageraga mu itsinda rya Iyakare yari yaramaze gufatwa n’ubwiza bw’uwo musore ndetse n’imico ye byatumye birangira bakundanye. Yaba umugabo cyangwa umugore bemeza ko kuba bakorana bibafasha mu kazi kabo, bakajya inama y’uko bakanoza biboroheye. Nyirandayishimiye yize umuziki mu ishuri rya muzika rya Nyundo akaba umwe mu mfura zaryo mu gihe Iyakare na we yawize ahantu hatandukanye harimo Kigali Music School no mu mujyi wa Kampala muri Uganda. Kugeza ubu batunzwe no gukora umuziki ndetse bavuga ko ubuzima bwabo mirongo inani ku ijana babufashwamo n’ibyo bakura mu muziki. His voice band mu minsi ishize yitabiriye irushanwa ry’amatsinda y’abacuranzi ryateguwe na Marriott Hotel bitwara neza kuko nubwo bategukanye igihembo ariko bari mu bageze mu byiciro bya nyuma. Ikiganiro n’abagize umuryango utunzwe no gucuranga icyo benshi bita "Igisope"

title: Uganda: Abapolisikazi bakuriweho gusaba uburenganzira bwo gushyingiranwa n’umusivile
content: Muri aya mavugurura kandi abapolisikazi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru ntibazongera gusuhuzwa hakoreshejwe ijambo ‘Sir’. Mu bindi byemejwe ni uko impuzankano za Polisi ya Uganda zigiye gusubirwamo nyuma y’aho bigaragariye ko abagore bambaraga amapantalo adoze nk’ay’abagabo. Kuba umupolisikazi wo muri Uganda washakaga gushyingiranwa n’umusivile yabanzaga gusaba uruhushya, biteganywa n’amabwiriza yo 1984. Umuyobozi Wungirije wa Polisi ya Uganda, Asan Kasingye, yabwiye Daily Monitor ko barangije kuvugurura aya mategeko wasanganga ahanini atsikamira abagore. Ati “Mu mategeko ariho agenga polisi aheruka kuvugururwa mu 1984, umupolisikazi yagombaga gusaba uruhushya umuyobozi mukuru wa polisi kugira ngo ashyingiranwe n’umusivile, umupolisikazi yafatwaga nka ‘Sir’, izi ngingo zose zivangura zakuwe mu mategeko avuguruye azashyirwa ku mugaragaro mu kwezi gutaha.” Izi mpinduka kandi zizaha abapolisikazi amahirwe yo kujya mu myanya yo hejuru, kuko n’ubwo ijanisha ryabo muri polisi ringana na 20%, abenshi ni abapolisi bato. Batandatu bonyine nibo bafite ipeti rya komiseri gusubiza hejuru.

title: U Bufaransa: Abanyarwanda bararimbanyije mu myiteguro ya Rwanda Day 2019
content: Abanyarwanda batuye mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi bararimbanyije mu myiteguro yo kwerekeza ahazabera Rwanda Day 2019. Abo mu Bufaransa bakomeje gushishikarizwa kuzitabira uwo munsi ufite amateka afatika mu buzima bw’Abanyarwanda n’igihugu cyabibarutse. Mu butumwa bwe, Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, Kabale Jacques, yakanguriye Abanyarwanda kwiyandikisha hakiri kare kuko bizafasha mu myiteguro yo kubakira. Itangazo yashyizeho umukono ryo ku wa 7 Kanama 2019, rigira riti “Ambasade y’u Rwanda iramenyesha Abanyarwanda baba mu Bufaransa, u Butaliyani, Espagne, Portugal na Monaco ko Rwanda Day izabera mu Mujyi wa Bonn mu Budage ku wa 24 Kanama 2019.’’ Rikomeza rivuga ko “Ambasade iboneyeho gutumira abanyamuryango bayo baba mu Bufaransa kwitabira icyo gikorwa cy’ingenzi no kwiyandikisha.’’ Rwanda Day ni umwanya mwiza wo kungurana ibitekerezo, abayitabira bahabwa igihe cyo kubaza ibibazo Umukuru w’Igihugu, gutanga ibitekerezo n’ibyifuzo bitandukanye. Abanyarwanda baba mu Bufaransa bakiriye Rwanda Day yabereye i Paris mu 2011. Icyo gihe yitabiriwe n’abantu 3700 barimo Abanyarwanda n’inshuti zabo. Insanganyamatsiko yagiraga iti “Urungano rufite agaciro. Icyerekezo cy’Iterambere.” Muri iyi Rwanda Day, mu butumwa Perezida Kagame yahaye abayitabiriye yibanze ku Rwanda rubereye Abanyarwanda. Yagize ati “U Rwanda rwa none n’urw’ahazaza ni uruha bose amahirwe angana, atuma abatishoboye badasigara inyuma ahubwo bagira uruhare mu iterambere ryacu.” Rwanda Day igiye kuba ku nshuro ya 10 yitezwemo abantu baturutse mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi by’umwihariko abo ku Mugabane w’u Burayi, bazaba baturutse imihanda yose itandukanye. Abanyarwanda banashyiriweho uburyo bwo kwiyandikisha, aho ushobora kunyura hano. Abashaka ibindi bisobanuro basura urubuga rwa Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Bufaransa cyangwa bakifashisha nimero 0171199272/0171199193 cyangwa bakandika ubutumwa kuri email, [email protected]

title: Ibyo utari uzi kuri Nyakwigendera  Mowzey Radio[REBA AMAFOTO]
content:
Nubwo yabaye icyamamare muri muzika, ngo burya cyera ku ishuri yari umuntu wiberagaho  mu buzima  acecetse ariko ari umuhanga  by’intangarugero,gusa ngo yishimirwaga n’abantu aho yabaga kwa Nyirarume mu gace ka Bukaya muri Jinja.nkuko Stephen Wakaza  na  Michael  Kaaya  babanye mu buzima bw’ishuri babisobanura.
 
Inshuti  ye ya cyera biganaga kwishuri  ubu akaba ari umwarimu mu ishuri ryisumbuye,ngo yibuka ukuntu  indirimbo  nka tukikore nera, Byagana, Gutamiza, Bread and butter,arizo  yahereyeho  yandika  kandi  ngo uwatumye  akunda  muzika ni umwarimu wa mwigishije mu ishuri  ry’incucye. Stephen Wakaza Yagize ati“Ndabyibuka yarambwiye  ngo  umwarimu we wo mu ishuri ry’incucye yamuhinduriye ubuzima.Umwarimu  yaramubwiye ngo azaba umunyamuzika  mwiza". Wakaza yakomeje agira ati" Uwo twiganye  turi  n’inshuti  agiye  akiri  muto! Kwishuri  ku  munsi  w’ababyeyi,yashoboraga  kuririmba  abari  aho  bose  bakanyeganyega"  Kuri  Wakaza, ngo Radio yize mu ishuri  ry’isumbuye  rya   Holy Cross Lake  View  Senior  Secondary  School   iri mu karere ka Jinja, guturuka mu wa mbere kugeza mu wa kane. Ngo ni kur’iri shuri  bicaye  ku ntebe  imwe.Ngo yahise ajya  gukomereza  icyiciro  cya  kabiri cy’amashuri yisumbuye  muri  Kiira College Butiki. Ati"Yahoraga  aza  mu  myanya  itanu  yambere  mu  ishuri.yari  umuhanga  mu ubuvanganzo,icyongereza  n’amuzika. Niwe  wenyine  yumvaga  amasomo  ya muzika,aho kuri  twe  gukoresha  amanota  yo  muri  muzika  byadukomereraga. Nku  muntu  twicaranaga yanyigishije  uburyo  nabasha  kumenya  kwandika  inkuru  ziryoshye .Ibyo  byari  bikomeye kurijye.Nanjye  ariko  namufashaga  tugeze  mu  isomo  ry’Imibare".  
 Nubwo  muzika yamugize  icyamamare,kwishuri yabagaho mu buzima acecetse. gusa ngo yishimirwaga  n’abantu  aho  yabaga  kwa  Nyirarume  mu gace  ka Bukaya  muri  Jinja. Wakaza  ati“Yahoraga  aba  uwambere  mu marushanwa  ya  muzika  mu bigo  byose by’amashuri  ku  rwego  rw’akarere.Yakundaga  kuba  ari  kumwe  cyane  n’abanyeshuri b’igitsina  gore.ntiwashoboraga  kumubona  ku kibuga  cy’umupira  w’amaguru  ahubwo ntabwo  byatunguranaga  umubonye  ku  kibuga  cya  neti  boro (Net Ball)".
 Nkuko  bikomeza  bivugwa  na Wakaza, Radio niwe  yayoboraga muzika muri kiliziya Gaturika.yasobanuye  Radio nku  umuririmbyi  wa mbere  ndetse  akaba n’umuhimbyi  w’indirimbo ku  gihe  cyabo. ati "yakundaga ibijyanye  n’ubugeni  kandi  yari  umunyabugeni  mwiza ". yongeraho kandi  ko  yigeze  kwegukana  isoko  ryo  gukora  ibishushanyo  muri  Kampala. Uwobiganye  Michael  Kaaya  mu  nyandiko yakoze  yagize ati"Twabyutse  twumva  inkuru y’inca  mugongo  yo  kubura  icyamamare  cyacu  Radio.Azahora  iteka  yibukwa.Yayoboraga ihuriro  ry’urubyiruko  rw’abanyeshuri (YCS students) kandi  buri  gihe  twahoraga  twegukana  ibihembo. yari  umunyeshuri  usobanutse  kandi  ufite  ubuzima  bwuzuye. Fr Picavet, ihangane  ubuze  umwana  wawe,  Sr  Mary  umunyeshuri  wawe  yajyanye  n’impano  zose, Dutakaje  impano.umwe  mu  baririmba  by’umwimerere  muri  Uganda".  
Aba ni Abanyeshuri bo kuri Holy Cross Lake  View  aho yize icyiciro cya kabiri cy’amashuri yisumbuye
 Abinyujije  k’urukuta  rwa  Facebook  ya New Vision  Liz  Elder, Ati" Igihe  wowe  na  weasel  mwagaragaye  ku  ruhando  rwa  muzika, uruganda  rwa  muzika   ntirwari  rumeze neza. Umuziki  w’abahanzi  bacye  bari  bakunzwe  kuri  icyo  gihe  wageze  aho  ubura umwimerere,  nta  nyungu  ndetse  waravuye  ku  gihe. Mwembi  mwageze  ku  ruhando  rwa muzika  muhita  mutuma  uruganda  rwamuzika  rusubira  ibuzima  ruva  ibuzimu. Mwazanye irushanwa  ry’indirimbo  nshya  zitanga  ibyishimo." Perezida  Yoweri  Kaguta  Museveni  abinyujije  kuri  twita  yagize  ati"  Havuzwe  ibyerekeranye n’urupfu  rw’umuhanzi  Moses  Ssekibogo  uzwi  ku  izina  rya  Mowzey  Radio.Nagize ubufasha  ntanga  bwo  ku  muvuza  nizeye  ko  azakira ! yari  umwana  muto  w’impano ndetse  n’ahazaza  he  hari  imbere". Juliana  Kanyomozi  n’ikiniga  kinshi  kuri  twita ati"Ntushobora  kugenda  utyo!. Kubera  iki ?". Ibindi  wamenya  byaranze  Nyakwigendera
 1.Mu  2008 Yarangije  kaminuza  ya  Makerere  mu  ishami  rya  Busikoroji (Psychology) kuri  buruse  ya reta 2.Muri  2004 yajyanywe  kwa  Jose  Chameleone  ngo  batangire  gukorana  abifashijwemo    n’umugabo  witwa  Chagga. 3.Radio  yandikaga  indirimbo   zirenga  enye (4) mu  cyumweru,byamutwaraga   iminota  30 yo kwandika   indirimbo  ikarangira.  
Nyakwigendera ari kumwe na Weasel bari kwishuri 
 Uyu ni umugorewe ba byaranye Liliani Mbabazi bafitanye abana batatu

Abapfakazi ba Radio aribo, Lilian Mbabazi, Jennifer Robinson n’ abana babo

Lilian Mbabazi ari kumwe n’abana yabyaranye na Radio aribo  Asante na  Ayana Kazooba Sekibogo


Umupfakazi wa Radio w’umuzungukazi Jeniffer Robinson hamwe n’umwana we Sekibogo Leo Njovu


Lilian Mbabazi n’umwana we Ayana Kazooba Sekibogo arimo gusengera umubyeyi we  Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Nelly Kelba, umuhanzi mushya uhanze amaso isoko mpuzamahanga
content: Uyu musore yatangiye gukora umuziki we mu ntangiriro za 2019. Mbere yari asanzwe ari umuririmbyi wa karaoke aho yakoranaga na band no mu bindi birori bitandukanye nk’ubukwe. Ubusanzwe yitwa Dusingizimana Clebert Nelly. Yavukiye mu Karere ka Rubavu, atuye i Kigali ari naho akorera umuziki we wibanda ku njyana ya RnB, Afro-Zouk na Afropop. Aherutse icyiciro cya Kabiri muri kaminuza mu Ishami ry’Ikoranabuhanga. Yabwiye IGIHE ko intego ye mu muziki ari ugukora cyane akamenyekanisha impano ye ikagera kure ikanamubyarira umusaruro. Ati “Ikintu cya mbere numva nshyize imbere ni ugukora ibihangano bifasha benshi mu Rwanda. Nshaka gukora umuziki ku buryo nzagera ku isoko mpuzamahanga, ntabwo byoroshye ariko niyo ntumbero yanjye.” Yemeza ko n’ubwo atari yatangira gusarura mu muziki ariko yizeye ko uko iminsi izagenda yicuma ariwo azakora ukaba akazi ke ka buri munsi kamutunze we n’umuryango we. Aheruka gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya yitwa ‘Ndatuje’ irimo amagambo y’urukundo agaragaza uburyo umuntu atuza iyo yahisemo neza umukunzi bazabana kugeza gupfa. Akaba agira Inama abashaka abakunzi kubanza gushishoza kuko ibishashagirana siko byose biba Ari zahabu. Amajwi yayo yatunganyirijwe muri Touch music akorwa na Trackslyayer, mu gihe amashusho yakozwe na Fab lab. Kugeza ubu afite indirimbo enye , harimo nk’iyitwa ‘Uzaperereze’ yakoranye na Mc Tino, ‘Ijana Ku Ijana’, ‘Guaranty’ ndetse na ‘Ndatuje’ aheruka gushyira hanze.

title: Kanuma Jean Damascène yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Nkurya Munsi’
content: Imijyi myinshi muri Amerika no hanze yayo irimo imyigaragambyo ikomeye yamagana irondaruhu nyuma y’urupfu rwa Floyd wishwe mu Cyumweru gishize, bikozwe n’umupolisi wamushikamiye akoresheje ivi kugeza aheze umwuka. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu Papa Francis yavuze ko irondaruhu atari iryo kwihanganira, ariko yongeraho ko ubugizi bwa nabi nabwo ari inzira yo kwiyangiza no gusenya. Yavuze ko urupfu rwa Floyd rubabaje ndetse ko ari kumusengera n’abandi bose bapfuye bazize “icyaha cy’ivanguramoko’. Yagize ati “Nshuti zanjye ntabwo twakwihanganira cyangwa ngo twirengagize irondaruhu n’ihezwa ry’ubwoko bwose, hanyuma ngo tuvuge ko turengera igitinyiro cy’ubuzima bwa muntu.” Agaruka ku myigaragambyo yagaragayemo ubugizi bwa nabi imaze iminsi ikorwa muri Amerika, Papa yagize ati “Ni nako kandi tugomba kumenya ko ubugizi bwa nabi bumaze iminsi bwigaragaza, ari uburyo bwo kwiyangiza no kwitsinda. Nta na kimwe wageraho ukoresheje ubugizi bwa nabi ahubwo wangiza byinshi.” Papa Francis yasabye abanyamerika kwiragiza Imana ikabafasha kugarura amahoro n’ubwiyunge.

title: Ibyamamare Clever J na Rafiki CogaStyle  bazataramira muri ZAG NUT Bar and Restaurant Kimisagara kuri iki Cyumweru
content: Umuhanzi Clever J wabiciye bigacika muri Uganda ndetse no muri aka karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba abifashijwemo n’indirimbo nk’iyitwa Fanya Kazi yakunzwe cyane hano mu Rwanda n’izindi zitandukanye kuri Iki Cyumweru cyo ku wa 19 Kamena 2016 azaba ataramira Abanyarwanda mu kabyiniro kazwi nka ZAG NUT Bar and Restaurant iherereye Kimisagara mu karere ka Nyarugenge hano I Kigali. Ni mu rwego rwo gushimisha abasanzwe babyinira muri Zag Nut dore ko usibye kuba ari Bar na Restaurant basanzwe bafite n’akabyiniro ndetse na gahunda yo kuzana abahanzi kugira ngo bahure n’Abafana babo baganire banifotozanye kuri bamwe baba bashaka kwifotozanya n’Ibyamamare bakunda haba hano mu Rwanda ndetse no hanze yaho, Akaba ariyo mpamvu bahisemo kuzana uyu muhanzi Clever J benshi bifuzaga kubona.  Uwizeyimana Clement

title: ‘Gisubizo’, inguzanyo ku mushahara itagira ingwate ikomeje gufasha benshi mu bakiliya ba Cogebanque
content: Gisubizo Loan Express ni inguzanyo Cogebanque itanga ku bakiliya bayo babona umushahara wa buri kwezi. Ni inguzanyo ikubye inshuro zigera kuri 15 z’umushahara umuntu ahembwa ku kwezi, na we akagenda yishyura agera kuri 50% by’umushahara we buri kwezi. Usabye iyi nguzanyo, ayibona mu gihe kitarenze iminsi mike iyo yujuje ibisabwa. Nka banki Nyarwanda yiyemeje gufatanya n’Abanyarwanda mu rugendo rw’ubukungu, Cogebanque itangaza ko muri ‘Gisubizo Loan Express’, ufashe miliyoni eshanu nta ngwate atanga naho ufashe arenze ayo akayitanga ariko byose bigakorwa mu buryo bumworoheye. Umuyobozi ushinzwe Amashami, Pierre Seruhungo Nsengiyumva, yavuze ko ari serivisi bongeye mu zo batanga nyuma yo kubona ko ikenewe ku bakiliya bayo. Ati “Intego y’iyi gahunda ni ukwereka abakiliya bacu ko tubaha agaciro kandi tubafasha gukemura ibibazo byabo byihutirwa cyangwa bitunguranye.” Yavuze ko ari gahunda yakiriwe neza kuva abakiliya bayimenyeshwa kandi ko bari kwitabira gusaba iyo nguzanyo. Hari n’abamaze kuyibona bari kuyikoresha. Usaba iyo nguzanyo asabwa gusa kuba ari umukozi ufite amasezerano y’akazi, umushahara we awuhemberwa muri Cogebanque. Cogebanque itangaza ko iyo nguzanyo, itangwa mu gihe gito bijyanye n’impamvu yayishyizeho yo gukemura ibibazo byihutirwa cyangwa bitunguranye umuntu ashobora kugira. Iteganya ko inguzanyo nk’iyo iba ije gufasha umuntu utunguwe n’ikibazo kidasanzwe nk’urugendo rwa kure, gukenera kugura ibikoresho byo mu nzu, kwishyura amafaranga y’ishuri, gukoresha imodoka, fagitire zo kwa muganga n’ibindi. Nsengiyumva ati “Ni serivisi nziza kubera ko kuyisaba bitwara igihe gito kitarambira abakiliya iyo bigeze ku kwita ku gukemura ibibazo byabo.” Gisubizo Loan Express iri gutangwa mu buryo buvuguruye ishobora kwishyurwa mu myaka itanu mu gihe kuyibona bifata iminsi mike ku wujuje ibisabwa. Iyo umukiliya ashaka kwishyura inguzanyo mbere y’igihe, nta bundi bwishyu bw’inyongera asabwa yaba yishyura yose cyangwa igice. Umukiliya ashobora gukurikirana imiterere y’uburyo bwo kwishyura kandi akoresheje porogaramu ya CogemBank. Mu gufatanya n’Abanyarwanda mu rugendo rw’ubukungu no kubegereza serivisi zayo, Cogebanque iherutse gufungura amashami mashya mu turere twa Ngoma, Kirehe, Bugesera na Rubavu (Mahoko). Kubegereza sirivisi hose mu gihugu bijyana no gutanga inguzanyo zitandukanye mu buryo bworoheye abakiliya. Cogebanque Plc yemewe nka Banki y’Ubucuruzi na Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) mu 1999, itangira gukora ku wa 17 Nyakanga muri uwo mwaka. Ifite amashami 28 mu gihugu hose aho ifite ibyuma bya ATM 34, aba-agents barenga 600 bayifasha gutanga serivisi zo gufunguza konti, kubitsa no kubikuza zirimo n’izifashisha ikoranabuhanga binyuze muri Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, smart cash card n’amakarita ya MasterCard (Debit, Credit na Prepaid) afasha abayakoresha kwishyura no kubikuza ahantu harenga miliyoni 36 ku Isi yose.

title: Yavugishije Jay Z imbere ya Beyoncé biramurakaza, aterwa ubwoba bwo kwicwa
content:
Beyoncé na Jay Z bagaragaye ku mukino wa NBA. Mu mashusho yabo yakwirakwijwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hagaragayemo umugore utahwemye gukomeza kuvugisha Jay Z yirengagije Beyonce wari ubicaye hagati, ibitabuze kurakaza cyane uyu muririmbyikazi. Uyu mugore waje kumenyekana ko ari Madamu Nicole Curran, umugore wa nyir’ikipe ya Golden State Warriors, ntiyorohewe na gato nyuma y’uko aya mashusho ashyizwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye nka Twitter na Instagram, dore ko hari n’abatatinye kumubwira ko akwiriye kwicwa.

 Uyu mugore yatewe ubwoba bwo kwicwa kuko yasuzuguye akanababaza Beyoncé  Nubwo aya mashusho agishyirwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yabanje gusetsa abantu, ibintu byaje guhindura isura mu gihe gito. Nicole yasobanuriye Dailymai ko yatutswe cyane ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. "Narenganye… Bari abatumirwa bacu. Nk’uwabakiraga, nahaye icyo kunywa Beyoncé nyuma ngiha na Jay Z. Byabaye ngombwa ko nunama kugira ngo numve ibyo ambwira. Ni uko byagenze nta kindi cyo kongeraho." Akimara kubona ko abareba amashusho yashyize ku nkuta ze za Twitter na Instagram ari kumwe n’ibi byamamare atishimiwe na benshi yabanje guhisha ibitekerezo abantu bandikaga ariko nyuma yo kubona ko hari abatangiye kuyashyira ku mbuga zabo ndetse harimo n’abamwifuriza gupfa ahitamo kuyasiba burundu, kugeza n’ubwo yavuye burundu kuri Instagram kugira ngo abone gutuza.

 Beyoncé yageze aho yegera umugabo we, Nicole yigizwa ku ruhande  Mu mashusho biragaragara ko Beyoncé yagerageje kwitambika ngo ababuze gukomeza kuvugana!
Birebe hano

title: Uwase wahagarariye u Rwanda muri Miss Supranational 2018 yitabiriye irindi rushanwa rikomeye
content: Uyu mukobwa ahatanye na bagenzi 16 baturutse mu bindi bihugu bitandukanye bitabira iri rushanwa riri kubera muri Pologne ari naho Uwase yiga muri kaminuza ya Wyższa Szkoła Bankowa yigisha ibyerekeye ubukungu. Uwase yabwiye IGIHE ko umukobwa uzahiga abandi azahabwa amajwi hakurikijwe uko yitwaye imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka, intambuko, ubwiza n’ukuntu ashyigikiwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga z’irushanwa. Azahembwa amafaranga ataratangajwe umubare ndetse afotorwe bya kinyamwuga mu gihe cy’icyumweru ari mu butembere ku mucanga wa  Miami muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Aba bakobwa bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma bari 20, batatu barasezererwa kubera kutubahiriza igihe n’imyitozo. Uwase yavuze ko yiha amahirwe n’ubwo abona bitoroshye. Yagize ati “Birakomeye ariko amahirwe  ndayiha,  n’ubwo ntakubwira umubare njanishije kuko irushanwa aba ari irushanwa.” Umunsi ny’irizina wo gutora Miss Elite 2020, ni kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020. Hazatorwa Miss Elite n’ibisonga bye bibiri. Uwase ubusanzwe ni umunyamideli ndetse yegukanye ibihembo bitandukanye birimo icya Top Model Africa cyabereye muri Zimbabwe mu 2016 anitabira World Next Top Model 2017 ryabereye mu Mujyi wa Beirut muri Liban, aza mu bakobwa bageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma. Yitabiriye amarushanwa y’ubwiza nka Miss Supranational 2018 naho ntiyahirwa kuko atigeze aza mu myanya y’imbere.

title: CAN 2019: Uganda yatsinze Kongo, ibona intsinzi ya mbere mu myaka 41 ishize
content: Uganda yaraye ibonye intsinzi ya mbere mu mikino y’igikombe cy’Afurika cy’ibihugu (CAN) mu myaka 41 yari ishize, ubwo yatunguraga Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Kongo mu mukino wo mu itsinda A muri iki gikombe kiri gukinirwa mu Misiri. Patrick Kaddu, rutahizamu wa Uganda w’imyaka 23 y’amavuko, ni we wafunguye amazamu ku gitego cy’umutwe ku munota wa 14 w’umukino, ku mupira wari uvuye kuri koruneri. Nuko hashize iminota itatu igice cya kabiri gitangiye, rutahizamu mugenzi we Emmanuel Okwi w’imyaka 26 y’amavuko, ashyiramo icya kabiri cya Uganda n’umutwe, ku mupira wari watewe ari uw’umuterekano. Muri CAN yo mu mwaka wa 2017, Uganda yatsinzwe imikino yayo yose itatu yo mu matsinda, icyo gihe bukaba bwari bwo bwa mbere Uganda yongeye kwitabira iyi mikino kuva yarangiza ari iya kabiri muri CAN yo mu mwaka wa 1978. Mu mukino ukurikiyeho, Uganda izakina na Zimbabwe ku wa gatatu, mu gihe Kongo yo izakina na Misiri nyuma yaho kuri uwo munsi. Niyomugabo Albert Muhabura.rw

title: Amateka ya Misa ya Papa mu Rwanda, kimwe mu bizaba bigize Pariki  y’i Nyandungu
content: Muri  iyo minsi nibwo  uwari umushumba wa Kiliziya Gatolika ku Isi, Papa Yohani Pwaulo II yagendereye u Rwanda, akahatanga ubutumwa butandukanye, anasura ibikorwa bitandukanye. Nubwo ari uruzinduko rw’amateka, uretse amasuka ari ku Kamonyi, nta handi wabona byoroshye urwibutso rw’ayo mateka. Icyakora, mu minsi mike ayo mateka azaba ashobora kuboneka cyane cyane  ajyanye na Misa Papa yasomeye mu gishanga cya Nyandungu mu mujyi wa Kigali, ku cyumweru tariki ya 9 Nzeri 1990 habura amasaha make ngo asoze uruzinduko rwe. Ayo mateka azaba agaragara mu busitani bwitiriwe Papa (Pope Garden) buzaba ari kimwe mu bigize Pariki y’Ubukerarugendo  bubungabunga ibidukikije (Nyandungu Eco-Tourism Park)  iri gutunganywa mu gishanga cya Nyandungu gikora ku Karere ka Gasabo na Kicukiro. Umushinga wa miliyari 2.4 Frw wo kubaka iyo pariki  watangiye umwaka ushize, bikaba biteganyijwe ko  uzaba warangiye mu myaka ibiri. Umuyobozi w’ibikorwa mu Kigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije (REMA) , Umugwaneza Janet ubwo yasobanuraga ibijyanye n’uwo mushinga kuri uyu wa Gatanu hizihizwa Umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe ibishanga, yavuze ko amateka ajyanye n’uruzinduko rwa Papa mu Rwanda azaba agaragara muri iyo Pariki. Yagize ati “Mu mwaka  wa 1990 Papa muzi ko yaje mu Rwanda.Hari misa yasomeye hano, ayo ni amateka rero , turashaka ko ayo mateka ahaguma. Muri iyi  pariki rero hazaba harimo igice cyitiriwe ubusitani bwa Papa.” Mugwaneza yavuze ko bari kuganira n’Ubuyobozi bwa Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda kugira ngo ubwo busitani  buzabe burimo amakuru ahagije ya Misa Papa Yohani Pawulo II yasomeye muri icyo gishanga. Iki gishanga cya hegitari 134, kiri gutunganywa kugira ngo gisubirane umwimerere wacyo no kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Kizaba kirimo ibikorwa bitandukanye nk’ibiyaga bito, ibyatsi n’ibiti bihabereye, uburyo bwo gufata amazi  ava ku misozi no kuyayungurura n’ibindi. Umuyobozi Mukuru Wungirije wa REMA, Munyazikwiye Faustin yavuze ko ibikorwa byari byubatse muri icyo gishanga byatangiye kwimurwa, abatarabyimura na bo bakaba barahawe igihe ngo babe babirangije. Yavuze ko ari umushinga witezweho inyungu nyinshi haba mu kubungabunga ibidukikije ndetse no mu iterambere ry’igihugu. Yagize ati “Hazashyirwaho uburyo bw’inzira z’amazi kandi  buzaba burimo n’ibimera bisanzwe biranga igishanga nk’urukangaga, kugira ngo bibashe gukora za nshingano igishanga cyari gifite zo kudufasha gufata amazi no kuyayungurura. Uyu mushinga uzanadufasha no mu iterambere ry’igihugu kuko ntitugomba kubungabunga ibidukikije gusa ahubwo bigomba no kudufasha mu iterambere.” Ibikorwa nyaburanga bizashyirwa mu gishanga cya Nyandungu  biri mu bya mbere byo ku rwego rwisumbuye bigiye kubakwa mu gihugu habungwabungwa urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Uyu mushinga biteganyijwe ko ushobora kuzinjiza miliyari y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda y’inyungu mu myaka 12,  ni ukuvuga miliyoni zisaga 83 buri mwaka. Uri gukorwa  ku bufatanye n’Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Gasabo mu Murenge wa Ndera n’aka Kicukiro muri Nyarugunga, Umujyi wa Kigali ndetse n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, ugaterwa inkunga  n’Ikigega cy’Igihugu cy’Ibidukikije n’Imihindagurikire y’Ibihe, FONERWA.

title: Nicolas Pepe yabaye umukinnyi wa mbere uhenze Arsenal n’umunyafurika uguzwe menshi
content:
Ikipe ya Arsenal yatangaje ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa Kane ko yamaze gusinyisha Nicolas Pepe, rutahizamu wavukiye mu Bufaransa ariko w’umunye-Cote d’Ivoire wakiniraga ikipe ya Lille yo mu majyaruguru y’u Bufaransa. Nicolas Pepe w’imyaka 24 y’amavuko yari amaze imyaka ibiri akinira Lille aho yigaragaje cyane mu mwaka w’imikino ushize atangira kurambagizwa n’amakipe menshi y’ibigugu ku mugabane w’u Burayi ariko birangira iyi kipe y’i London imwegukanye nyuma yo kwemera kumugura miliyoni 80 z’amayero ariko izishyura mu byiciro.

Nicolas Pepe yasinye imyaka itanu Uyu rutahizamu ukina aca ku ruhande rw’iburyo yasinye imyaka itanu muri The Gunners. Yabaye umukinnyi wa mbere mu mateka y’iyi kipe uguzwe amafaranga menshi Ku rubuga rwa Arsenal, Nicolas Pepe yagaragaje uburyo yishimiye kwerekeza muri iyi kipe. Yagize ati "Kuba hano ni ibintu bishimishije cyane kuko bitari byoroshye kuri njye. Nirutse urugendo rurerure ndetse mpura n’inzitizi nyinshi, rero kuba umwe mu bagize umuryango w’iyi kipe y’ikigugu ni igihembo cyiza kuri njye."

Nicolas Pepe azajya yambara numero 19 Uyu rutahizamu watsindiye Lille ibitego 35 mu myaka ibiri yavuze ko iki cyemezo yagifashe nyuma y’igihe kinini cyo kubitekerezaho no kugisha inama abamukikije barimo umuryango we n’abahagarariye inyungu ze bakomezaga kuvugana mbera ya CAN, muri CAN nyirizina na nyuma yayo. Ati "Byari ingenzi gufata icyemezo cyiza kandi ndahamya ko Arsenal ari amahitamo meza." Nicolas Pepe yavuze ko yishimiye kuba agiye gukinana n’abakinnyi barimo Lacazette, Aubameyang, Özil n’abandi.
 Nicolas Pepe kandi yahise aba umunyafurika wa mbere uguzwe amafaranga menshi akaba ateye ikirenge mu cya bene wabo b’abanya-Cote d’Ivoire Kolo Touré, Emmanuel Eboué na Gervinho nabo bakiniye Arsenal aho yanahishuye ko Kolo Touré yagize uruhare runini mu kumugira inama yo kwerekeza muri iyi kipe.

title: Abafana ba Rayon Sport bararanye ibyishimo bidasanzwe naho Sunrise isuzugurirwa iwabo
content:
Abafana b’ikipe ya Rayon Sport bararanye ibyishimo bidasanzwe nyuma yo gutsinda ikipe ya Sunrise Fc bakayitsindira ku kibuga cyayo i Nyagatare aho uyu mukino wabahuje wari wabereye Uyu mukino wabaye kuri uyu wa 19 Ugushyingo 2016 ukaba wabereye mu Karere ka Nyagatare ahazwi nko ku kibuga cya Mbombo aho byagaragaraga nkaho ari Rayon Sport yakiriye kubera ubwinshi bw’abafana bari baje kuyishyigikira. Uyu mukino waranzwe no guhangana ku mpande z’abafana buri umwe yemeza undi ko ari bumutware amanota atatu, gusa ntibyatinze mu gice cya kabiri nyir’ukwegukana intsinzi arashyira aramenyekana, ku gitego cy’umutwe cya Kwizera Pierrot ahesha ikipe yambara ubururu n’umweru amanota atatu.

title: Michaël Sengazi yahawe igihembo cy’Umunyarwenya w’umwaka muri Afurika
content:
Umunyarwenya ufite inkomoko mu Burundi no mu Rwanda, Michaël Sengazi yegukanye igihembo cy’umunyarwenya w’umwaka muri Afurika gitanzwe ku nshuro ya 5 na Radiyo Mpuzamahanga y’Abafaransa (RFI). Inkuru dukesha urubuga rwa RFI ruvuga ko Sengazi azwi mu Rwanda cyane aho yanditse akanakina mu mikino ine ya ’One-man-show’ ndetse akaba yaranashyizeho amaserukiramuco abiri mu Burundi no mu Rwanda.

Ni umwe mu batangije itsinda rya Comedy Knights mu Rwanda Ku myaka 31, Michaël Sengazi amaze imyaka irenga 10 atangiye gusurutsa abantu binyuze mu mpano ye yo gusetsa, gusa muri iyi minsi ya vuba izina rye ryagiye ritumbagizwa n’ibitaramo bitandukanye yagiye yitabira mu mijyi itandukanye yo mu burengerazuba bwa Afurika mu bihugu bikoresha cyane ururimi rw’Igifaransa. Avoma he inganzo? Kuri micro ya RFI, Sengazi yagize ati "Issoko mvumamo inganzo iteka ni umuryango ariko kandi n’imiziro (tabous) kuko tugira nanone ibizira byinshi mu muryango mugari wacu. Ntawuvuga ibitsina (sexe). Nyamara dukunda kubikora, ariko ntibivugwe. Tuvuga ubuzima bwa buri munsi, bw’ishuri, amadini, imibonano mpuzabitsina na politike." Yatangiriye i Kinshasa Michaël Sengazi arakibuka neza ibihe bya mbere byatumye impano ye isakara hanze agatangira kuzamuka urubyiniro agiye gusetsa abantu. "Byari mu iserukiramuco, mu iserukiramuco rya Toseka muri Congo. Muri icyo gihe ntabwo byari umunezero hagati y’u Rwanda na Congo. Hari umwuka mubi n’ibindi, ariko twagombaga kujyayo hamwe n’umwe mu nshuti zanjye, Hervé Kimenyi undi munyarwenya w’Umunyarwanda, ufite impano ikomeye.", Sengazi. Yakomeje ati "Icyo gihe cyabaye icy’ingenzi cyane. Ni uwo munsi kandi nabashije guhura n’ibyamamare bikomeye byansunitse : Michel Gohou, Digbeu Cravate, Mamane. Nabonye ko hamwe n’urwenya nshobora guhuza abantu. Njyewe nk’umurundi uvanze n’umunyarwanda, natangiriye mu by’ukuri i Kinshasa. Twahujwe n’urwenya ndetse ku bw’urwenya tubasha gushyira ku ruhande ibidutandukanya. Aho niho nahise nanzurira ko ari byo nshaka gukora"  

Yavukiye i Gitega mu Burundi kuri se w’Umurundi na nyina wavukiye i Burundi ariko ukomoka mu Rwanda  Azahererwa ibihembo bye mu iserukiramuco rikomeye  Umunyarwenya wubatse izina muri Afurika y’abakoresha Igifaransa, Mamane usanzwe anakorera Radio Mpuzamahanga y’Abafaransa, afatanije n’iyi radiyo na Gondwana-City Productions batangije ibi bihembo bya "prix RFI Talents du rire" biherekezwa na miliyoni enye z’amayero (asaga miliyoni 4 040 518frw) bigahabwa umunyempano mushya mu rwenya aho gihemba urubyiruko rukoresha Igifaransa muri Afurika no mu nyanja y’Ubuhinde n’ibirwa bya Caraïbes. 
 Michaël Sengazi biteganijwe ko azashyikirizwa iki gihembo ku ya 07 Ukuboza 2019 ku rubyiniro rw’iserukiramuco y’urwenya izwi nka Abidjan Capitale du Rire.

Sengazi yize amashuri abanza mu Burundi n’ayisumbuye kuri Michel Archange i Bujumbura, yiga amategeko muri Kaminuza ya ULK i Kigali

title: Ifoto y’umupadiri n’umukobwa ku mucanga ku mazi ikomeje guca ibintu ku mbuga nkoranyamabaga
content: Ifoto y’umupadiri wo mu gihugu cya Malawi witwa Rev. Fr. Charles Mukhalira Chiuta Dhlovu n’umukobwa witwa Grace Mwiwa bari bibereye muburyohe ku mucanga ku mazi, ikomeje guca ibintu ku mbuga nkoranyambaga aho iri kwibazwaho n’abatari bacye. Uyu mupadiri wo muri diyoseze katolike ya Mzuzu,biravugwa ko umukobwa bari kumwe, ari umwe mubakobwa bakora kuri radiyo uyu mupadiri abereye umuyobozi yitwa Tigawane,bityo ngo nyuma yo kumuzamura mu ntera bihembye kujya kuryohereza ku mucanga ku mazi nk’uko Faceofmalawi ducyesha nkuru yabitangaje. Ngo kuryoshya bene aka kagene byahuriranye n’uko iyi radio y’idini yari yateguye ikirori cyabereye ku mucanga wa Chikale,ari naho bamwe mu bantu babonye uyu mukozi w’Imana yishimanye n’umukobwa. Ariko abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga ntabwo bihanganiye ibyo byabaye nyuma y’uko iyo foto igiriye kuri interineti,kuburyo bamwe batangiye kunenga imyitwarire n’ibikorwa by’uwo mupadiri bavuga ko ibyo bishobora gutuma atakaza igihango yahanye n’Imana cyo kuzabaho ubuzima bwe bwose ari ingaragu. Ku rundi ruhande,abandi bo baramushyigikiye bavuga ko nta kibi yakoze kuko ari ikiremwa muntu gifite ibyiyumvo kandi ikindi ngo ibikorwa bye yabikoze agihe buri mukozi yari yahawe uburenganzi bwo kwidagadura. Gusa Diyoseze katolika ya Mzuzu ntacyo yigeze ivuga kuri iyo foto yasakajwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga kandi ntibizwi niba akanama gashinzwe imyitwarire ko muri iyo diyoseze kazafatira uwo mupadiri ibihano. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Ivumburamatsiko kuri Fred Lyon wambika benshi mu byamamare nyarwanda
content: Ubusanzwe yitwa Fred Ndicunguye, amaze imyaka ibiri n’igice akora akazi ko gucuruza imyambaro itandukanye, inkweto n’ibindi. Akundwa na benshi kuko agira imyambaro igezweho. Ubaze umubare w’ibyamamare ntiwawurangiza kuko uhereye kuri Bruce Melodie, Shaddy Boo, Queen Cha, Safi Madiba, Dj Toyxxk, Marnaud n’abandi benshi. IGIHE yamwegereye imuganiriza byinshi abantu bashobora kumwibazaho ndetse n’uko yatangiye gukora ubucuruza bw’imyenda bwaje gutuma yiharira isoko mu gukorana n’ibyamamare. Avuga ko gucuruza yabitangiye kuva kera yiga muri kaminuza mu Bushinwa, akaza kubona ko ari impano ye. Ati “Ni ibintu byari bisanzwe bindimo. Nkiri muri kaminuza nabwo nari umucuruzi, hari ukuntu ushobora kuba ukora aka kazi ariko nta biro ugira, rero niko nakoraga. Nabikoze nkiri mu ishuri mbona byavamo umugati.” “Aho nasoreje kaminuza naratangiye, abantu baramenya nanjye icyo bakeneye ndakimenya. Nize mu Bushinwa, ibijyanye n’ubushabitsi mpuzamahanga. Aho nigaga nakundaga gutembera mu masoko atandukanye ugasanga ni njye uhorana ibintu bishya, bikaba ngombwa ko bagenzi banjye banyifashisha, nkagenda mbibonamo inyungu nke ndabikomeza kuko nabonaga ari impano yanjye.” Yemeza ko atatangiye gukora agamije kwambika abantu imyenda gusa ahubwo yari afite na gahunda yo gukora ikintu cyiza gituma umuntu yambara ibijyanye kandi akaberwa. Ati “Naje nje gukemura ikibazo cyo kwambika abantu ntabwo naje gukora ubushabitsi gusa ahubwo kwari ukugira ngo abantu mbambike. Iyo ushaka kwambika umuntu ntabwo umwambika imyenda ngo agende yambaye ibirenge. Umwambika inkweto, ipantalo, ishati, amadarubindi byaba ngombwa ukamwambika n’isaha.’’ Avuga ko ashaka gutangira kujya agurisha n’imyambaro ya Made in Rwanda. Kuri we ngo abashaka kurimba buri wese aza afite igitekerezo cy’uko ashaka kuberwa ariko na Fred bitewe n’uko akubona akaba yakongeraraho ibindi bitekerezo byatuma wambara mu buryo bunogeye ijisho. Muri iki gihe akorana bya hafi na Bruce Melodie, ndetse n’imyambaro yari yambaye aririmba muri East Africa’s Got Talent yari yayambitswe n’uyu musore. Ati “Urebye Bruce Melodie wa mbere y’uko mfungura iri duka n’uw’ubu baratandukanye. Asigaye yambara bigezweho kandi bimubereye. Yambara imyambaro y’abanyamujyi. Nizo mpinduka nazanye kugira ngo ibintu abahanzi mpuzamahanga babona ku Isi bibashe kugera no ku bahanzi bacu. Imyambaro ntabwo iba ihenze. Guhera ku bihumbi icumi iwanjye ushobora kwambara.” Avuga ko yambika umuntu bitewe n’igikorwa agiyemo. Muri iyi minsi iduka rye ryambika cyane cyane abagabo ariko ubu ashaka gufungura iduka ryihariye ry’abagore. Video: Muhumuza Simeon Amafoto: Muhizi Serge & Fred Lyon Instagram

title: Ange Kagame yashyize ahagaragara amafoto y’ubukwe aherutse gukora
content:
Ange Kagame umukobwa rukumbi wa Perezida Paul Kagame yasabwe tariki 28 Ukuboza 2018, umuhango wo gushyingirwa uba kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori byabereye muri Kigali Convention Center. Mu butumwa bugaragara ku rubuga rwe rwa twitter, Madame Ange Kagame yifashishije amagambo agaragara muri Bibiliya, mu gitabo cy’Indirimbo ya Salomoni igice cya 3 umurongo wa 4 agira ati “Nabonye uwo umutima wanjye ukunda”. Umunsi nyir’izina w’amateka y’isezerano ryo gushyingirwa imbere y’Imana hagati ya Ange na Bertrand wabaye ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 6 Nyakanga mu birori byitabiriwe n’abantu bo mu miryango yombi ndetse n’abandi batumirwa. Gusezerana imbere y’Imana byakorewe ku Kimihurura muri IFAK saa yine z’igitondo, bombi bahamya isezerano bijyanye n’ukwemera Gatolika kwa Gikirisitu. Nyuma y’uwo muhango, hakurikiyeho kwiyakira aho abatumirwa bose berekeje i Rusororo mu Intare Conference Arena ahagana saa munani z’igicamunsi. Ibi birori by’imbonekarimwe byarakomeje nyuma yo kuva i Rusororo habaye umugoroba w’umusangiro, wabereye muri Kigali Convention Centre, ukurikirwa n’ibirori byo kwishimira urugo rushya rw’abageni no gusabana nabyo byabereye mu cyumba cya Kigali Convention Centre. 


 MUHABURA.RW

title: Ese Koko tariki 25 UKuboza Wari Umunsi W’ibigirwamana cyangwa ni ho Yezu yavutse, yavutse ate?
content: Yezu ni umwe mu biremwa bitangaje, cyane kuko ari umwana w’Imana, ariko wigize Umuntu maze akabana natwe, maze akemera kuvuka nk’abantu kugira ngo yisanishe natwe, ndetse aza gupfira abantu twese kubera ibyaha byacu. Ivuka rye rero rikaba ritavugwaho rumwe cyane cyane amadini atandukanye, kuva na kera kugeza n’ ubu. Abakristo benshi bizihiza ivuka ry’uyu mucunguzi ku itarik ya 25 ukuboza buri mwaka.  Ese iyi tariki niyo koko yavutseho? Ese Bibiliya ibivuga ho Iki? Bibiliya ivuga ko hari abantu batatu bashobora kuba bazi neza igihe nyakuri Yezu yaba yaravukiye, mbese yaba yarageze kuri iyi Si dutuyemo.  Abo bagabo bazwi ku izina rya “Magi” aribo bitwa  abanyabwenge batatu bagiye kuramya Yezu bayobowe n’inyenyeri. Izi nyenyeri zamurikiye aba bagabo batatu ngo nizo zirekana igihe nyacyo Yezu yaba yaravukiye kuko ngo zagaragaye agahana mu kinyeshna cya 6 na 5 ku ngoma ya Herodi. Ariko na Bibiliya ntacyo itangaza kigaragara ku gihe nyakuri ku ivuka rya Yezu, ndetse ngo inavuge igihe  itariki n’umwaka bizihiriza ivuka ry’umukiza. Ariko iby’uyu munsi   washyizweho wo kuri 25 ukuboza ngo bifitanye isano n’Abaromani ba bapagani  bizihizaga uyu munsi baramya ikigirwamana cyabo “ Saturnalia” icyo kigirwamana kikaba cyari cy’umusaruro. Mbere y’ikigihe Abakristu  ntibigeraga bizihiza uyu munsi w’ivuka rya Yezu, uyu munsi rero ukaba waramenyekanye cyane cyane mu kinyeshna cya 19. Itariki ya 25 ukuboza byaje nyuma y’imyaka 320 yezu avutse. Ubwo rero mu nyuma y’imyaka 320 nibwo papa Juliua I  yashyizeho iyo tariki ngo ige iba umunsi wo kwizihiza ibirori by’ivuka rya yezu. Naho mu mwaka wa 325 Constantine the Great, umwami w’Abami w’abaromani nibwo yemeje iyo tariki kumugaragaro,maze Musenyeri w’I Roma Liberius ahita ategeka abakristo kwizihiza uwo munsi tariki 25 ukuboza. Iyi tariki rero ikaba yarashyizweho kumpamvu z’abapagani bagiraga umunsi mukuru w’ibigirwamana kuri iyi tariki ya 25 ukuboza, maze abakristu nabo bahita baboneraho kuwegurira umucunguzi ngo berekane ko umucunguzi nyakuri ari Yezu umwana w’Imana iruta izindi zose ku isi. Ariko ngo umwaka nyakuri Yezu yaziyeho ku isi ni umwaka wa 6 m kwezi kwa kane (4)  kuko nta mwaka 0 zero wabayeho. Arko abakristu bo batangiye kwizihiza uwo munsi cyane cyane mukinyeshana cya 19. Yanditswe na Ukurikiyimfura Lence/Muhabura.rw

title: Yavutse ku witeguraga kuba Umubikira: Ubuhamya butangaje bwa Ev. Tuyishimire wo muri ADEPR
content: Ubusanzwe yitwa Ev.Tuyishimire Diogène. Mu byigisho bye, icyamamaye ni icyo aba avugamo ukuntu Yesu nta kintu adasa nacyo kuko ‘Mu bana yabaye umwana w’Imana, mu bagabo akaba umugabo w’abapfakazi, mu bapapa aba se w’imfubyi, mu biti akavuga ati ninjye muzabibu w’ukuri mwe muri amashami…’ Umurebye mu maso ntiwamukekera ko yakwigisha mu buryo bukomeye ariko we ahamya ko ari imirimo yakoze kugira ngo agarure benshi mu nzira y’agakiza. Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 27, ni umuvugabutumwa mu itorero rya ADEPR. Yatangiye no gukora umuziki aho yamaze kwinjira mu njyana ya Hip hop. Akurondoreye iby’urugendo rw’ubuzima ab’imitima yoroshye amarira arashoka bitewe n’uko yakubititse akiri muto ntabashe kwiga amashuri yisumbuye kubera ubuzima bugoye n’ubushobozi buke, ariko ubu ashima Imana aho igejeje ikora! Mu buhamya bwe ntajya yibagirwa kugaragaza uko yari umusinzi unakora inzoga z’inkorano ndetse n’uburyo nyina umubyara yamusamye mu gihe yigiraga kuba umubikira. Yakuriye kwa nyina wabo kuko nyina yamutaye akajya kwishakira undi mugabo. Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE yavuye imuzi iby’ubuzima bwe. Ati “Ubundi mama wanjye yigiraga kuba umubikira, yaje guhura n’umusore amutera inda rero birangira havutse njye. Icyakora ntabwo yandeze kuko we yahise ashaka undi mugabo kandi ntabwo twari kubana. Ibi byatumye nkura nderwa na mama wacu muto ku mubyeyi wanjye.” Ahamya ko yakuriye mu muryango w’abantu bakora inzoga z’inkorano, byatumye ku myaka icyenda gusa atangira kunywa inzoga. Akurira mu buzima bwo gucuruza no gukora izo nzoga. Arangije amashuri abanza ntabwo yabonye uko akomeza ayisumbuye kuko nta bushobozi bwari buhari, ati” Nyine ishuri narivuyemo mpita ninjira mu byo gukora inzoga kuko nibyo mu rugo bakoraga.” Ubu buzima yabubayemo ariko akunda umuziki, biza kumuviramo gushaka gukora indirimbo za mbere nubwo bitamuhiriye. Ati “Numvaga naba umukinnyi wa APR FC cyangwa nkaba umuhanzi wa Hip Hop nari umufana ukomeye wa Riderman.” Yavuye iwabo ababeshye ko agiye gukora umuziki, naho agiye gucuruza inzoga z’inkorano mu Karere ka Musanze aza guhomba bikomeye. Ubwo yari amaze guhomba mu by’inzoga z’inkorano yacuruzaga, Ev. Tuyishimire yisanze asigaranye amafaranga make cyane nyamara yaramaze gutoroka kwa nyina wabo. Inzoga zari zahombye abona ubuzima bwanze afata icyemezo cyo kwiyahura ndetse aranabigerageza Imana ikinga akaboko. Ati “Narahombye bikomeye numva ubuzima burarangiye, nahisemo kwiyahura icyo gihe ngura inzoga nyinshi ngo niyahure nasinze, naguze ikinini cy’imbeba nsinda ntiyahuye birangira ndyamye, ariko nkajya numva ko ndi bwiyahure mu gitondo. Bukeye hari ikiganiro cyacaga kuri Radio Flash Fm cyakorwaga na Pasiteri Ntambara. Icyo gihe yavuze ijambo ryatumye mpindura umugambi wo kwiyahura.” Tuyishimire avuga Pasiteri Ntambara yigishije avuga ko hari umwana ugiye kwiyahura kandi naramuka abiretse azaba umuntu ukomeye w’umugabo. Umugambi we uhita upfuba binyuze kuri uyu mukozi w’Imana. Ati “Igitekerezo cyo kwiyahura cyahise kimvamo gutyo nyuma njya kureba mama wanjye wabaga mu Bugesera.” Ageze mu Bugesera yasanze umubyeyi we azi ko umwana we yabuze, icyakora kuko ubuzima butari bwiza ntabwo yahatinze ahubwo yagiye gushakisha uko yabaho. Iki gihe yakoze muri restaurant, aha ni naho yatangiye gukora ibikorwa byo kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana ahereye ku hantu basengeraga. Akora muri iyi restaurant yo mu Bugesera nibwo Ev. Tuyishimire yatangiye kujya ajya gusengana n’abantu bari baturanye akarara aho basengeraga. Abo basenganaga bakundaga uko yigisha anasoma ijambo ry’Imana umugabo umwe basenganaga aza kumusaba ko yazajya kubwiriza muri ADEPR i Huye. Kuva icyo gihe yahise atangira kuba umuvugabutumwa wo mu itorero rya ADEPR atangira gutumirwa cyane mu materaniro anyuranye. Mu 2016 umugabo basenganaga yamusabye ko yamurera akava aho basengeraga bakajya babana nk’umwana na Se. Nyuma uyu mugabo yaje kwiyemeza kumwubakira inzu birangira mu 2018 akoze ubukwe aza kurushinga n’umwe mu bakirisitu bo mu itorero rya ADEPR. Yerekeje amaso ku muziki Kuva mu bwana bwe yakundaga umuziki by’umwihariko injyana ya Hip Hop, ibi byatumye uyu mugabo kuri ubu yumva yawukora ndetse indirimbo ya mbere ye ikaba igomba kujya hanze mu minsi ya vuba. Ati “Nubwo nakora iyi yonyine ngahita ndekera aho, inzozi zanjye zaba zibaye impamo kuko mpfuye ntaririmbye nagendana agahinda kuko nabikunze kuva cyera.” Avuga ko yari kuba yarabikoze cyera ariko agira ubwoba bw’ukuntu abo basengana bazabifata ahitamo kubigendamo gake. Iyi ndirimbo ye yitegura gusohora yitwa “Mfite ubwoba” yakozwe na Trackslayer, izaba ikubiyemo ubutumwa bw’ubuzima busanzwe ariko nanone buganisha ku Mana. Ikiganiro na Ev.Tuyishimire winjiye mu njyana ya Hip hop

title: Kwibohora 22: Social Mula yashimiye Perezida Kagame
content:
Umuhanzi Social Mula yashimiye Perezida Kagame we wayoboye Ingabo za RPF zabohoye u Rwanda none kuri uyu munsi wa none Abanyarwanda bakaba bishimira imyaka 22 babohowe abandi baravanwe mu buhungiro bakaba batuye mu gihugubavukamo kandi bakunda ndetse bari mu gihugu kizira ivangura nk’uko byahoze mbere ya 1994
 Social Mula nk’Umuhanzi Nyarwanda wemeza ko nawe ubwe agomba kugira uruharemu kwiyubakira igihugu cye yemeza ko ubwo Abanyarwanda bizihiza umunsi wo kwibohora ku nshuro ya 22 ashimira cyane Umukuru w’igihugu cy’u Rwanda wayoboye urugamba two kubohora igihugu ndetse akaba anakomeje kuyobora urugamba rwo kubaka igihugu cy’Umunyarwanda umwe, Igihugu kizira amoko n’irindi vangura iryo ariryo ryose. Aha Social Mula yagize ati "Uyu munsi wo kwibohora kuri nge usobanura byinshi birenze inyito yawo kuko nibwo Abanyarwanda babohowe ingoma yaranzwe n’ivangurakarere, amoko n’ibindi bibazo by’ihezwa byari byarashegeshe igihugu cyacu ari nayo mpamvu nshimangira ko umuntu utabona impamvu dushimira Perezida Kagame cyangwa se impamvu tumusabira umugisha Uwo muntu ntago yaba azi aho ava nn’aho agana". Social Mula kandi aakomeza avuga ko iyo uyu munsi ugeze atekereza cyane ku ngabo za RPF zzabohoye u Rwanda zikanahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994 akaba yabivuze muri aya magambo ati "uyu munsi iyo ugeze mpita numva nashimira  ingabo zitanze ku rugamba mukubohoza igihugu Nkashimira bikomeye PRESIDENT wacu Paul Ksgame ndetse  namwifuriza kuramba kuko icyo gihe yari ku rugamba aharanira ibi byose dukomeje kugeraho bigaragarira buri wese mu Rwanda no mu mahanga" Social Mula ni umwe mu bahanzi Nyarwanda umuntu avuga ko nabo bahagaze neza by’umwihariko uyu munsi twizihiza imyaka 22 u Rwanda rwibohoye nawe afite ibikorwa by’iterambere kandi byigaragaza kuri buri wese haba kubakurikirana muzika Nyarwanda ndetse n’abakunzi b’ibihangano bye muri rusange.

 Umva hano indirimbo ku ndunduro y’Umuhanzi Social Mula  Yanditswe naSnappy Akayezu Jean de Dieu/Muhabura.rw

title: R.Kelly yamaze gutabwa muri yombi kubera guhohotera no gusambanya abarimo abangavu
content:
Umuhanzi w’umunyamerika, R.Kelly wari umaze igihe kirekire ashinjwa ibyaha byo gusambanya abangavu no guhohotera abagore muri rusange, yamaze kwishyikiriza ubuyobozi ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu. R.Kelly w’imyaka 52 y’amavuko akurikiranyweho ibyaha 10 by’ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina aho bitatu muri bine bikomeye ashinjwa yabikoreye abana b’abakobwa bataregeza myaka y’ubukure.


Mu modoka y’umukara, R.Kelly yagejwejwe kuri sitasiyo ya polisi saa mbili z’ijoro z’i Chicago Umwunganizi we mu mategeko yari yabanje kuvuga ko ari ibinyoma, ko abagore bari gushinja umukiliya we ari ababeshyi bagamije kubikuramo inyungu. R.Kelly yagejejwe kuri sitasiyo ya polisi i Chicago ku mugoroba wo ku wa Gatanu, bikaba biteganijwe ko mu masaha ya nyuma ya saa sita yo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu agezwa imbere y’ umushinjacyaha nkuko byatangajwe n’umuvugizi wa polisi y’ Illinois, Anthony Guglielmi abinyujije kuri tweet.

Robert Sylvester Kelly (R.Kelly) yaruciye ararumira ubwo abanyamakuru bamwuzuragaho bamubaza ibibazo bitandukanye Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru, mbere y’uko uyu muhanzi atabwa muri yombi, kimberly Foxx, porokureri wa Cook i Chicago umujyi R.Kelly yavukiyemo akaba ri naho atuye magingo aya, yavuze ko ibirego 10 shinjwa, buri kimwe gihanishwa igifungo kiri hagati y’imyaka 3 -7.

Filime mbarankuru yagiye hanze mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka ikubiyemo ubuhamya bw’abagizweho ingaruka n’ibikorwa bya R.kelly iri mu byatumye yongera guhagurukirwa Nkuko uyu muporokureri abivuga, ibyaha R.Kelly ashinjwa yabikoze hagati y’umwaka 1998 na 2010, harimo ibyo yakoze ku bangavu batarengeje imyaka 17. Umwe mu bakorera mu rukiko rwa Cook muri leta ya Illinois yabwiye AFP ko abo bana bari hagati y’imyaka 13 na 16 ubwo uyu muririmbyi yabakoreraga ayo mahano.

Yafashwe nyuma gato y’uko hari hamaze kugaragazwa andi mashusho mashya, asambana n’umwana w’imyaka 14

Umwunganizi wa R.Kelly mu mategeko, Steve Greenberg yavuze ko bibabaje kuba ubutabera buri kugendera ku gitutu cy’abatangabuhamya babeshya, ariko yizeye ko bizagaragara ko umukiliya we ari umwere

R.Kelly yaherukaga mu rukiko mu 2008 ubwo nabwo yari akurikiranyweho ibyaha nk’ibi

R.kelly ni umuhanzi w’icyamamare mu njyana ya RnB

title: Amafoto yaranze Ibirori byo gufungura CHAN 2016
content:
Irushanwa rihuza amakipe y’Ibihugu ku bakinnyi bakina imbere mu gihugu CHAN ririmo kubera mu Rwanda ryatangiye ku mugaragaro ku munsi wo kuwa gatandatu tariki ya 16 Mutarama 2016, I Remera kuri Stade Amahoro iherereye mu mujyi wa Kigali. Uyu muhango wo gufungura iri rushanwa ukaba waritabiriwe na Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika w’u Rwanda ndetse n’abandi banyacyubahiro batandukanye harimo Umuyoboziw’agateganyo w’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru ku isi, Issa Hayatou usanzwe ari umuyobozi w’Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika CAF.  Dore amafoto atandukanye yaranze umunsi wo gufungura irushanwa rya CHAN 2016 I Kigali ku wa 16 Mutarama 2016




 Perezida Kagame n’umuyobozi mukuru w’agateganyo w’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru ku Isi

title: Musanze: Bizihiwe n’umuziki w’abahanzi bakomeye mu gitaramo cya Tour du Rwanda (Amafoto)
content: Ni mu gitaramo cyabaye nyuma y’agace k’iri rushanwa rimaze kuba ubukombe mu magare ribera mu Rwanda, kabaye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020 aho Umunya-Colombia Restrepo Jhonatan yegukanye aka gace ka Gatanu ka Tour du Rwanda 2020 ka Rubavu-Musanze, akoresheje 2h 08’19”. Mujyi wa Musanze hari hashyushye bose biteguye kwirebera aba banyonzi, banabukereye kwirebera abahanzi batandukanye bakomeye bagombaga kubataramira kakahava muri stade Ubworoherane yo muri aka karere. Guhera saa kumi,abantu banyuranagamo basiganwa buri wese ashaka umwanya w’imbere ngo aze kwirebera umuhanzi yihebeye nta nkomyi. Iki gitaramo cyabaye nyuma y’ikindi cyabereye mu karere ka Rubavu mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba kuri Kivu Beach iruhande rwa Serena Hotel kuwa Gatatu tariki 27 Gashyantare 2020. Cyari cyitabiriwe n’umubare munini w’abakunzi b’umuziki biganjemo  cyane urubyiruko. Abatandukanye bakomeye mu Rwanda biganjemo ababarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Kina Music hamwe na King James, Bulldogg, Davis D na Bruce Melodie ndetse na Rob Drabkin na S-Wrap bari baturutse muri Amerika nibo basusurukije abari bitabiriye. Saa kumi n’ebyiri zishyira saa moya ku rubyiniro habanjeho Rob Drabkin washimishije benshi mu ndirimbo ze zitandukanye biba akarusho ubwo yaririmbaga indirimbo izwi cyane mu Rwanda y’abana yitwa ‘Mbe Kanyamanza keza’. Yakurikiwe n’umuraperi S-Wrap nawe washimishije benshi mu muziki wiganjemo uwo mu njyana ya Trap. Davis D ugezweho mu ndirimbo ‘Dede’ niwe wakurikiyeho yishimirwa mu ndirimbo zitandukanye. Uyu muhanzi yahereye ku yitwa ‘Biryogo’, ‘Soso’, ‘Sexy’ asoreza kuri ‘Dede’. Nel Ngabo ubarizwa muri Kina Music niwe wakurikiye uyu muhanzi ashimisha benshi mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Why’ iri mu zo yahereyeho, ‘Nzahinduka’, ‘Byakoroha asoreza kuri ‘Ya Motema’ yahuriyemo na P wahoze muri Dream Boyz. Bakiri ku rubyiniro P yahise asangwayo na Polisi y’u Rwanda, bakora ubukangurambaga iherutse gutangiza n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo bw’ibyumweru 52 bugamije kurwanya no gukumira impanuka buzwi nka  “Gerayo Amahoro”. Nyuma, Igor Mabano yahise ajya ku rubyiniro yishimirwa mu bihangano bye bitandukanye birimo indirimbo yise ‘Urakunzwe’ yahereyeho, ‘Back’, ‘Dear Mashuka’ yafashijwe ku rubyiniro na Rob Drabkin, ‘Iyo Utegereza’ asoreza kuri ‘Gake’ yahuriyemo na Nel Ngabo banaririmbanye muri iki gitaramo. Aba bahanzi bakurikiwe na Bulldogg wahise yanzika n’indirimbo ze zirimo ‘Nk’umusaza’, ‘Cinema’ na ‘Zana’ yahuriyemo na Deejay Lenzo banajyanye ku rubyiniro muri iki gitaramo. Bruce Melodie niwe wari utahiwe! Uyu muhanzi yishimiwe mu ndirimbo yinjiriyeho yitwa ‘Ndumiwe’, ‘Ikinya’, ‘Fresh’ asoreza kuri ‘Kungola’ yahuriyemo na Sunnny yahagurukije n’iyonka muri iki gitaramo. Butera Knowless yaje akorera mu ngata uyu muhanzi mu ndirimbo yise ‘Baramushaka’, ‘Nkoraho’, ‘Sweet Mutima’, ‘Urugero’, ‘Blessed’, ‘Ko nashize’ asoreza ku yo yise ‘Ujya unkumbura’. King James niwe washyize akadomo kuri iki gitaramo gusa atenguhwa n’umuriro kuko yatangiye kuririmba ahereye ku ndirimbo yise ‘Rasta’ yajya kuririmba izindi zirimo ‘Ganyobwe’ umuriro ukagenda ucika.. Muri iki gitaramo habayemo n’umwanya wo gupima ku buntu virusi itera sida n’izindi ndwara, hakanatangwa inyigisho zitandukanye zifasha abaturage kubungabunga ubuzima bwabo. Biteganyijwe igitaramo nk’iki kizabera mu Mujyi wa Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 29 Gashyantare 2020 muri Car Free Zone ku bufatanye n’Umujyi wa Kigali muri gahunda y’ibitaramo bisoza ukwezi usanzwe ukora. Amafoto: Niyonzima Moïse

title: Ibyamamare byo mu Rwanda byinjiye mu bukangurambaga bwo kwamagana iyicwa ry’abirabura muri Amerika
content: Kuri ubu Isi yose ihanze amaso Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nyuma y’umwirabura George Floyd wishwe anigishijwe ivi n’umupolisi w’umuzungu ndetse bamwe bari kwiroha mu mihanda mu rwego rwo kwamagana iyicwa rikorerwa abirabura babayo. Ni urupfu rwababaje benshi biturutse ku mashusho yasakajwe uyu mwirabura ari gutakamba avuga ko ‘ari guhera umwuka’ ariko bikirengagizwa kugeza aho yajyanywe kwa muganga agahita ahuhuka. Ndetse muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika imyigaragambyo ikomeje gufata indi ntera, ibihumbi by’abaturage bagiye mu mihanda bitwaje ibyapa bigaragaza uburakari batewe n’urupfu rw’umwirabura George Floyd. Abandi bari kwifashisha imbuga nkoranyambaga bagaragaza akababaro kabo ndetse bagasabira ubutabera uyu mugabo wishwe ahowe ubusa. Ibyamamare byo mu Rwanda nabyo byinjiye muri ubu bukangurambaga byo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bifashishije hashtag zirimo #BlackLivesMatter cyangwa #JusticeForFloyd, mu kwamagana ubwicanyi bukorerwa abirabura baba muri Amerika. Ibi byamamare birimo Akiwacu Colombe wabaye nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2014, Mutesi Jolly wambitswe iryo kamba mu 2016, Nimwiza Meghan waryambaye mu 2019, Nishimwe Naomie uherutse gutorerwa kuba Miss Rwanda 2020 na Bahati Grace wabaye nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2009. Aba bose mu butumwa bashyize ku nkuta zabo bagaragaza ko ‘ubuzima bw’abirabura baba muri Amerika bukwiye guhabwa agaciro. Nka Nimwiza Meghan yanditse ubutumwa burebure agira ati “ Kugeza igihe bazarekera kuduhiga nk’inyamanswa, kugeza igihe tuzareka gusaba kutureka tugahumeka, kugeza igihe tuzatangira kugenda twiruka mu muhanda dukora siporo nta kibazo dufite tutari kwiruka ku buzima bwacu, kugeza igihe bazabona ko dukozwe n’amaraso ameze neza […]” Arongera ati “Kugeza igihe imitima yacu izaba itumva iremerewe n’agahinda k’abacu bicwa n’abakabaye babarinda, kugeza igihe tuzatsinda urugamba; kugeza icyo gihe; ntabwo tuzigera duceceka, imitima yacu yarashenjaguritse, kandi ntabwo duteze kurekera kugeza igihe tuzumvwa hakagira igikorwa.” Abandi bagaragaje ko bifatanyije n’Isi yose mu kwamagana iyicwa rikorerwa abirabura nta mpamvu harimo umuhanzi The Ben, Princess Priscillah, Nirere Shanel, Igor Mabano, Nel Ngabo, Shaddy Boo, Jules Sentore, Buravan na Dj Toxxyk. Abandi barimo Nadja Giramata Umunyarwandakazi mu maraso ariko afite ubwenegihugu bw’u Bwongereza akaba n’Umunyamerika, ubu atuye mu Mujyi wa New York. Uyu mukobwa usanzwe ari umunyamideli yanditse kuri Instagram ati “Ku bwa George Floyd ariko na none n’abandi ba mbere ye, kandi ndizera ko nta kundi nyuma y’ibi.” Floyd w’imyaka 46 witabye Imana, yakoraga mu barinda umutekano mu nzu icuruza amafunguro, yishwe n’umupolisi wo muri leta ya Minnesota.

title: Umutoza Mukuru wa Rayon  Robertinho yashimye Mukunzi ugiye kwerekeza muri Suwede
content:
Roberto Oliveira Gonçalves do Carmo “Robertinho”, Umutoza Mukuru wa Rayon Sports aremeza ko Mukunzi Yannick ari umwe mu bakinnyi beza iyi kipe yatunze kandi ufite impano idasanzwe. Arabivuga mu gihe mu mpera tariki 19 Mutarama 2019 yakinye umukino wa nyuma wo gusezera abakunzi ba Rayon Sports mbere yo kwerekeza mu ikipe ya Sandvikens IF yo mu kiciro cya gatatu muri Suwede anatsinda igitego 1 muri 2 Rayon Sports yatsinze Marines FC.
