title: Rwagasana,Sibomana n’abandi bari bakurikiranyweho kunyereza umutungo wa ADEPR bambuwe ubupasitori
content:
Uwahoze ari umuvugizi mukuru wa ADEPR Sibomana Jean n’uwari umwungirije Tom Rwagasana kimwe n’abandi 4 bakurikiranyweho kunyereza umutungo w’iri torero bamaze kwamburwa ubupasitori. Nk’uko byagaragaye ku rukuta rwa Facebook rw’iri torero aba bantu uko ari 6 bose bambuwe burundu inshingano za gipasitori kubera impamvu z’imyitwarire mibi yabagaragayeho.
Kuri uru rukuta kandi bashyizeho n’amafoto y’amabaruwa bandikiwe kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 6 Ukwakira, 2017, babwirwa ko inama ya Biro Nyobozi ya ADEPR yafashe umwanzuro wo kubahagarika burundu kuri izi nshingano kubera imyitwarire itari myiza yabagaragayeho.

 Iyi ni yo baruwa yandikiwe, Tom Rwagasana n’izabanda zikaba ari uku zimeze uretse ko hahinduwe amazina gusa 
Ku batabasha kuyisoma neza iyi baruwa iragira iti “Mwene Data. Dushingiye ku myitwarire mibi yakugaragayeho mu micungire y’umutungo w’itorero no kutaba inyangamugayo muri byo nkuko bigaragazwa na raporo y’igenzura ku mikoreshereze y’umutungo w’itorero ryacu rya ADEPR (External Forensic Audit Report), dushingiye kandi ku mwanzuro w’inama ya Biro Nyobozi ya ADEPR yateranye kuwa 05/10/2017, tubabajwe no kukumenyesha ko wambuwe inshingano za gipasitori muri ADEPR uhereye kuri iyi tariki 06/10/2017. Tukwifurije amahoro y’Imana.”

 Bishop Tom Rwagasana, ubu ntakiri pasitori muri ADEPR  Bishop Tom Rwagasana yari Umuvugizi wungirije akaba n’ushinzwe ubuzima bw’itorero rya ADEPR. Akurikiranywe hamwe na Bishop Sibomana Jean wari Umuvugizi, Mutuyemariya Christine wari ushinzwe ubutegetsi n’imari, Sindayigaya Theophile, Sebagabo Bernard, Niyitanga Straton na Gasana Valens. Bose barashinjwa ko hagati ya 2015 na 2017 banyereje 2 530 395 614 Frw. Aya akaba akomoka ku misanzu abakirisitu batanze ngo hishyurwe umwenda wa BRD urenga miliyari eshatu watanzwe ngo hubakwe Dove Hotel ya ADEPR. Uretse Christine utari umupasitori abandi bose bandikiwe amabaruwa bahagarikwa burundu kuri izi nshingano

title: Amafaranga yahererekanyijwe hifashishijwe telefoni yiyongereyeho ku kigero cya 450% mu mezi atatu
content: Imibare yumvikanisha ko kwishyurana mu ntoki byagabanyutse ku buryo bugaragara muri iyi minsi Isi yose ihangayikishijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyandurira mu gukoranaho. Muri Werurwe nibwo Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, BNR yemeje ko mu gihe cy’amezi atatu uhereye tariki 19 Werurwe 2020 nta kiguzi kizongera gucibwa umuntu ukura amafaranga kuri konti yo muri banki ayashyira kuri Mobile Money cyangwa ayakura kuri Mobile Money ayohereza kuri banki mu rwego rwo kugabanya ibyago byo kwandura coronavirus. Ibyo bijyana n’uko nta kiguzi gicibwa abantu bahererekanya amafaranga kuri Mobile Money. Nkuko bigaragara muri raporo yakozwe n’Ikigo insight2impact ku bufatanye na RURA, mu cyumweru cya mbere cya gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo umubare w’abahererekanya amafaranga mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga wageze kuri miliyoni 1.2, uvuye ku bantu 600 000 mu cyumweru cyari cyabanjirije Guma mu Rugo. Mu cyumweru cya nyuma cya Mata 2020, abantu miliyoni 1.8 bahererekanyije amafaranga mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda. Guhera tariki 9 Werurwe kugeza tariki 15 Werurwe, hahererekanyijwe amafaranga angana na miliyari 10.7 Frw ariko mu cyumweru cyarangiye tariki 22 Werurwe amafaranga yahererekanyijwe mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga yari ageze kuri miliyari 24 Frw. Iyi raporo igaragaza ko nubwo umubare munini w’abantu bahererekanyije amafaranga hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ari abagabo, abagore nabo bariyongereye kuko mbere ya Guma mu Rugo, abagore boherezaga amafaranga bari ku kigero cya 31 % ariko mu cyumweru cya gatanu cya Guma mu rugo bari bageze kuri 36 %. Kwishyura ibicuruzwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga nabyo byariyongereye. RURA na Insight2impact bigaragaza ko uhereye hagati muri Gashyantare uyu mwaka ukageza hagati muri Mata, agaciro k’amafaranga yishyurwa ibicuruzwa mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga kiyongereyeho 700 % mu cyumweru. Raporo ivuga ko uko kwiyongera k’uburyo bwo kwishyura no kohereza amafaranga hifashishijwe ikoranabuganga bikwiriye gutanga amasomo kuri za Leta zishaka guteza imbere ubukungu bushingiye ku ikoranabuhanga. Bagira bati “Ni ngombwa ko bishyirwa ku giciro gito. Kuvanaho ikiguzi cyo koherereza amafaranga hifashishijwe telefone mu gihe cya Guma mu Rugo, byagaragaje ko ubwo buryo bushobora guhangana n’ubwo kwishyura mu ntoki.” Raporo ivuga ko nubwo abakoresha uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga mu kwishyurana biyongereye, byaba byiza gutegereza nyuma y’icyorezo cya Coronavirus ibintu byasubiye ku murongo akaba aribwo hafatwa umwanzuro niba ubwo buryo buramba. Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR) igaragaza ko kwishyurana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga byihutisha ubukungu kandi amafaranga atakara mu bucuruzi akagabanuka cyane. Imibare yo mu 2017 igaragaza ko nibura buri mwaka BNR itakaza miliyari ebyiri zo gukoresha inoti nshya n’ibiceri bisaza kubera guhererekanywa mu ntoki. U Rwanda rufite intego ko mu mwaka wa 2024, amafaranga abarirwa ku kigero cya 80 % y’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu azajya ahererekanywa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, avuye kuri 34.6% mu 2019.

title: Umubare w’abakoresha WhatsApp wageze kuri miliyari ebyiri
content: Sosiyete ya Facebook yatangaje ko umubare w’abantu bakoresha WhatsApp hirya no hino ku Isi wazamutse uva ku bantu miliyari 1.5 bayikoreshaga mu 2018 ugera kuri miliyari ebyiri. Uyu mubare kandi nabwo wari uherutse kuzamuka uva kuri miliyari 1 wariho mu 2016 ugera kuri miliyari 1.5 mu 2018. Facebook ari nayo ifite WhatsApp mu itangazo yashyize hanze yagaragaje ko nta gahunda ihari yo guhagarika uburyo butanga umutekano ku butumwa bw’abayikoresha buzwi nka ‘End-to-end encryption’ Abashyiraho amategeko na Guverinoma z’ibihugu bitandukanye zakunze kugaragaza ko ubu buryo bwa End to End encryption bubangamira iperereza ku byaha birimo iterabwoba, ikoreshwa ry’abana n’ibindi. Umuyobozi wa WhatsApp, Will Cathcart, yagize ati “Mu mateka yose y’ikiremwamuntu, abantu bagiye babasha kuvugana hagati yabo mu buryo bw’ibanga kandi ntidutekereza ko ibyo bigomba kuvaho muri sosiyete igezweho.” Cathcart yongeyeho ko WhatsApp izajya itanga amakuru yifuzwa igihe bizaba byagaragajwe ko ari ingenzi mu iperereza. Imibare yo mu 2018 igaragaza ko n’umubare w’abakoresha izindi mbuga nkoranyambaga za Sosiyete ya Facebook wazamutse nk’aho ubwayo ikoreshwa n’abagera kuri miliyari 2.5 mu gihe Instagram yo ikoreshwa na miliyari imwe.

title: Vin Diesel yaririmbye mu birori bya Billboard Music Award
content:
Byari ibirori n’ibyishimo bidasanzwe mu birori bya Billboard Music Award byabaye ku munsi w’ejo tariki 27 Mata aho byaranzwe no gutungurana ndetse no gushimisha abafana ku bahanzi baririmbye muri iki gitaramo. Abafana rero bakaba baje kurengwa n’ibyishimo babura imyifato baratwarwa yewe barabyina karahava ubwo Vin Diesel, umukinnyi wa filime yamenyekanye cyane yitwa The Fast and Furious yageraga ku rubyiniro. Mark Sinclair uzwi kandi wamenyekanye nka vin Diesel kubera nyine filime yakinnye, yagaragaje ubuhanga bwe mu kuririmba injyana ya Rap aho yaririmbanye na Nicky Jam nawe wari mu bitabirihe ibyo birori. Bikaba byagaragaye ko ubu bufatanye bw’aba bombi bwishimiwe n’abatari bake. Vin Diesel akaba yaririmbanye na Nicky Jam indirimbo yitwa ’"El Ganador" iri mu rurimi rw’iki Espagnol. Ubwo Nicky Jam yaririmbaga, yaje kunyuzamo abwira abakunzi be amagambo yabakoze ku mutima ndetse agahindura byinshi ku bitabiriye ibirori. Yababwiye ko ari gukorana filime yindi na Vin Diesel nyuma yo kugaragara muri The Return of Xander Cage. Akibivuga Vin Diesel akaba yahise azamuka ku rubyiniro maze abantu si ugukoma amashyi bimarayo batungurwa no kumubona ndetse no kumwumva arapa. Aba rero bombi bakaba barakoranye muri XXX:The Return of Xander Cage Diesel aheruka gushyira hanze mu mwaka ushize, nyuma rero bakaba barahise batangira imikoranire ya hafi kuko bagaragaraga ahantu henshi bari kumwe nko mu biruhuko n’imiryango yabo ndetse no kugaragara muri video zitandukanye bari kumwe. Nicky Jama akaba yavuze ko ari gukorana cyane bya hafi na Diesel. Yagize ati "mu cyumweru gishize twatangiye gufata amashusho y’indirimbo twakoranye. IIbintu uko biri n’uko Diesel akunda umuziki wa Espagne, ashaka gukora muzika ya Espagne. Icyumweru gishize twakoze akantu nkeka abantu bazakishimira nibakabona."
Bamwe mu babonye Vin Diesel aririmba bakaba bavuze ko ari umuhanga kandi abishoboye ibyo batari bazi. Bavuga ko aramutse yinjiye mubuhanzi, yabona abakunzi benshi kuruta abo afite ubu. Ibi birori bya Billboard Music Award bikaba byari byitabiriwe n’abahanzi ndetse n’ibyamamare bitandukanye harimo na Jennifer Lopez wagaragaje imyambarire idasanzwe, Daddy Yankee n’abandi benshi. Yanditswe na Zihirambere Pacifique/MUHABURA.rw

title: MOMBASA: Esther Mbabazi, umunyarwandakazi wa mbere watwaye indege yarushinganye n’umunyamuziki -AMAFOTO
content:
Nkuko byari biteganijwe, kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya16 Nzeri 2017 nibwo ubukwe bw’umunyarwandakazi wamamaye nk’uwa mbere watwaye indege, Esther Mbabazi hamwe na Habiyaremye Olivier uririmba mu itsinda rya Beauty For Ashes bwatashye. Ni ubukwe bw’agatangaza bwabereye mu majyepfo ya Kenya mu mujyi wa Mombasa ukora ku nyanja y’abahinde, bukaba bwabereye muri imwe mu mahotel akomeye cyane muri uyu mujyi yitwa Tropical Paradise. Kugeza ubu aba bageni ntabwo barasangiza aba bakurikirana ku mbuga nkoranyambaga amafoto y’ubukwe bwabo, cyakoze zimwe mu nshuti zabo zabutashye zagiye ziyashyira hanze zibifuriza kuzagira urugo ruhire.


 Abageni Esther na Olivier hamwe n’inshuti zabo Kavutse Olivier n’umugore we Amanda basanzwe baririmbana muri Beauty For Ashes 

 Byari ibirori byitabiriwe n’inshuti za hafi n’imiryango y’aba bombi




 Bwari ubukwe bubereye ijisho 








 Bifotoje amafoto y’urwibutso ku nkengero z’inyanja y’Abahinde(Ocean Indien)  Ku Cyumweru gishize tariki ya 10 Nzeli 2017 ni bwo Esther Mbabazi na Habiyaremye Olivier(uyu asanzwe ari umwe mu bahanzi bagize itsinda rizwi mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana rya Beauty For Ashes) bari basezeranye kubana nk’umugore n’umugabo imbere y’amategeko ya Repubulika y’u Rwanda.

 Ubwo basezeranaga mu Murenge 

 Muri ubu busitani niho ubu bukwe bwa Esther na Olivier bwabereye  KigaliPost yifurije aba bombi kuzarushinga rugakomera, bazabyare hungu na kobwa

title: Nigeria:Abafite ibishushanyo ku mubiri na drede ku mutwe bari gutabwa muri yombi ku bwinshi
content: Abasore bafite ibisage (dredlocks) na za ’tatouage’ ku mubiri bari gufungwa muri Nigeria aho polisi ibashinja ko bagaragara nk’abajura cyangwa abatekamitwe. Amakuru avuga ko abenshi mu bari gufatwa usanga ari urubyiruko rw’abasore bari mu bikorwa by’ubuhanzi. Kubera ibura ry’imirimo imenyerewe muri Nigeria, urubyiruko rwinshi ruri kujya muri muzika no gukina filimi, abenshi muri bo batereka ibisage bakanishushanyaho nk’ibibaranga mu mwuga Kuri ubu umutwe wa polisi witwa ’Police Special Anti-Robbery Squad’ uzenguruka muri Lagos hose ushakisha bene aba basore. Uwitwa Jerry Sola usanzwe ari DJ ati "Uwo munsi nari nicaye imbere y’ibiro byanjye mbona imodoka iraje, bavamo bareba cyane ’tatouage’ zanjye baravuga ngo ndi ’mu bantu bashaka’. Akomeza agira ati"Banyambuye ibyo mfite, banjugunya mu modoka, ngezemo nsanga abandi bafashe bose nabo ni abafite ’tatouage’, ibisage cyangwa byombi". Abafashwe batanga ruswa kugira ngo barekurwe mbere yo gushinjwa ubujura. Muri Nigeria ni akaga gakomeye gushinjwa ubujura. Uriya mutwe wa polisi washinjwe kenshi gukorera iyicarubozo cyangwa kwica ababukekwaho. Olofin Ifedayo usanzwe utunganya muzika avuga ko nyuma yo gufungwa muri ubu buryo akaza kurekurwa byabaye ngombwa ko avanaho ibisage bye. Ati "Sinjye gusa, mfite n’izindi nshuti zanjye ziyogoshe ibisage kubera polisi. Tuba dufite ubwoba bw’ibyo bashaka kudukorera. Ibisage ubusanzwe si icyaha ariko babihinduye icyaha kibi". Sola amaze kurekurwa nawe yahise avanaho ibisage bye. Ati "Ndababaye cyane kuko nabuze kimwe mu bindanga. Aho najyaga hose babona ibisage byanjye na ’tatouage’ bakavuga bati dore uriya ni umu-DJ". Abahanzi bamwe bamaze gusohora indirimbo zamagana iki gikorwa cya polisi cyo gufunga abafite ibisage na ’tatouage’. Bala Elkana umuvuguzi wa polisi i Lagos avuga ko hari abapolisi bamwe barimo gufata abantu batakoze ibyaha, ariko ko abapolisi babikora babahana. Ati "ntibikwiye ko hari umupolisi ubangamira umuntu ngo kuko afite ibisage cyangwa ’tatouage’, ntabwo twakwihanganira umupolisi ukora ibi". Iyo urebye neza mu Rwanda usanga abasore bafite ibishushanyo ku mu biri yabo ndetse  na drede biterwa n’impamvu navuga ko ari ebyeri  z’ingenzi ku ruhande rwanjye nk’uko n’undi yabona izindi. Iya mbere biterwa no kwigana imico itari myiza yatuzengereje y’abanyamahanga.Aha usanga urubyiruko rwinshi rubikora kubera ko rwabibonanye ibyamamare bikomeye ku isi rukabona ku byigana nabo byatuma bamamara. Iya kabiri hari ababikora bashaka kwihindura uko Imana itabaremye.Kuri iyi ngingo kubyumvikanaho na bamwe biragoye ariko ababibona barabizi kuko akenshi abasore usangana ibyo bishushanyo cyangwa izo dreadlocks n’ubwo atari bose ariko usanga ari babandi baba bakundana bahuje ibitsina bimwe Imana yanga urunuka by’isodoma n’igomora. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Icyo abanyamadini bavuze kuri Gitwaza wiyise ‘umuhanuzi uruta abandi’
content:
Guhera mu ntangiriro z’iki Cyumweru ku mbuga nkoranyamabaga mu Rwanda hari gucicikana amashusho agaragaza Umuyobozi w’Itorero Zion Temple, Apôtre Dr Gitwaza Paul, aho avuga ko nta wundi muhanuzi umuruta mu Rwanda no muri Afurika. Ni amashusho yafashwe ku mugoroba wa tariki 30 Kanama 2018 ku rusengero rwa Zion Temple Gatenga, aho yatangaga icyigisho gifite umutwe ugira uti “ibimenyetso by’ibitangaza’. Uwo munsi Gitwaza yagize ati “Sinzi niba muri iki gihugu hari umuhanuzi unduta. Ibi mbabwira si ukwirata kandi Imana ibimbababarire niba hari akantu ko kwirata kandimo. Sinzi ko muri iki gihugu, muri Afurika mufite umuhanuzi umeze nkanjye [amashyi]. Birashoboka ko azaza ariko muri iki gihe ndiho ntimuzamubona. Muzamushakishe mumumbwire.”

 Gitwaza yemeje ko nta muhanuzi umuruta mu gihugu  Gitwaza yagarukaga ku byo yari amaze kuvuga, by’uko yagiye ahura n’ibigeragezo byinshi, akitwa igisambo, umusambanyi, umupfumu n’ibindi ariko agakomeza gukora umurimo w’Imana kandi akabitsinda. Yavuze ko nubwo batakwemera ko ari we muhanuzi ukomeye ubu, ngo bazabyemera atakiriho. Ati “Ndababwiza ukuri muzabimenya naragiye. Hari ahandi bazanyemera. Kubakwa kw’iki gihugu mbifitemo uruhare runini cyane. Nahanuye nka Ezekiyeli kugira no amagufwa yongere abeho kandi intambara naciyemo nta wundi mukozi w’Imana uzazicamo cyangwa waziciyemo.” Nyuma yo gusakara kw’ayo mashusho ya Gitwaza, ntiyavuzweho rumwe haba mu binyamakuru no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Ubusanzwe amadini yose ntiyemera abahanuzi batari abagaragara muri Bibiliya. Ku babemera, umuhanuzi ni umuntu ushobora kubona ibizaba akoreshejwe n’umwuka w’Imana akabivuga, igihe cyagera bikazagaragara uko yabivuze. Ikinyamakuru Igihe cyaganiriye n’abandi banyamadini batandukanye mu Rwanda, bagaragaza uko bafashe ayo magambo ya Gitwaza. Umuvugizi wa Kiliziya Gatolika akaba n’umwepiskopi wa Diyosezi ya Butare, Philippe Rukamba yavuze ko batemera iby’ubuhanuzi. Yagize ati “Hari ibintu wenda nk’amabonekerwa ashobora kubaho, nayo tuyemera buhoro cyane. Buriya nka Kibeho kugira ngo yemerwe hari hashize imyaka 25 nibura. [Ibyo dukora] ni ibisanzwe aho ufata Bibiliya ukayisoma, ukagerageza kuyishyira mu buzima bwawe ariko ibyo kuvuga ngo isi izashira ejobundi cyangwa hagiye kuba ibi, ntabwo tubyemera.”

 Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba  Rukamba avuga ko na we ahubwo hari ubuhanuzi asigaye yumva bukamutera ubwoba. Ati “Hari ubuhanuzi bukomeye buntera n’ubwoba busigaye buriho. Barakubwira bati ‘turahanura wowe Imana iragukiza ntuzongere no kunywa imiti, ntuzongere kureba muganga, emera gusa usenge.’ Ibyo ntabwo ari byo, twe ntitubyemera, ni amafuti. Niba Imana igukijije yerekana ko wakize. Kuvuga gusa ngo emera nta kintu kibigaragaza, ushobora no kubimbwira utarakize.” Bishop Marguerite Rwandamura, Umushumba w’itorero United Christian Church, Ishami rya Gikondo, yavuze ko mu Itorero rye bemera ubuhanuzi gusa ngo nta bwo yamenya ikigenderwaho ngo umuntu avuge ko ari we wa mbere. Yagize ati “Njye simuhakanya ko ari umuhanuzi ariko kumenya urwego ariho sindi Imana cyangwa umwuka wera. Ntabwo nzi abarusha abandi, ntabwo nzi abaza ku mwanya wa mbere (…) icyo nemera nuko abahanuzi bariho kandi ubuhanuzi bw’ukuri n’ubw’ibinyoma bubaho.” Rwandamura avuga ko abakiristo basabwa guhagarara ku ijambo ry’Imana kugira ngo babashe gutahura abahanura ukuri n’ibinyoma. Ati “Iyo umuntu ahamye ku ijambo ry’Imana akaryiga akarisobanukirwa, akaryemera, abahanuzi iyo baje ntibashobora kumutesha umurongo.” Bishop Murekezi Simon Masasu uyobora Restoration Church i Rubavu, yavuze ko bemera ubuhanuzi ariko uvuga ko ari hari uruta ngo sibyo. Avuga ko mu ivugabutumwa hagomba kubaho abantu batanu bafite imihamagaro itandukanye barimo intumwa, umuhanuzi, umuvugabutumwa, umupasitori n’umwarimu kandi bose buzuzanya. Yagize ati “Uwo aribeshya kuko Bibiliya ivuga ko mu mihamagaro uko ari itanu biruzuzanya kugira ngo Imana ikore. Uwo rero afite ya kamere gusa imukoresha.Umuntu w’Imana ni umuntu uca bugufi akumva, akagirwa inama kandi akamenya ko iyo Imana imuhaye ubutumwa kugira ngo abusoze neza umwuka w’Imana niwo umukoresha.” Masasu we yavuze ko bitanashoboka ko umuntu aba umuhanuzi ngo abe n’intumwa icyarimwe. Ati “Kuki yiyita intumwa kandi akiyita n’umuhanuzi? Urumva ko agiye ukuvanga ibintu bibiri icyarimwe. Haba harimo akantu k’ubuyobe. Abahanuzi babayeho na kera, baracyariho kandi si we wenyine.” Umuyobozi w’Itorero Zeraphath Holy Church, Bishop Harerimana Jean Bosco, yavuze ko nta muhanuzi umenya ko ari we, ngo abo akorera ibitangaza nibo bamumenya. Ati “Eliya yigeze kubwira Imana ko ari we muhanuzi usigaye, Imana iramubwira iti uribeshye hari ibindi bihumbi by’abahanuzi biri inyuma. Imana yahise imusaba kurangiza umurimo we, imusaba kwimika uzamusimbura Elisa akarangiza urugendo rwe.” Yavuze ko igihe umuntu atangiye kwivuga ibigwi mu murimo w’Imana ngo aba atangiye kunanirwa. Ati “Ibyo ukora nibyo bikwamamaza, iyo utangiya kwiyamamaza uba watangiye kunanirwa.” Apôtre Paul Gitwaza yakunze kumvikana mu buhanuzi bwo mu bihe bitandukanye butavuzweho rumwe. Mu 2015 yahanuye iby’imperuka y’Isi, bica igikuba muri rubanda ariko birangira itabaye. Ibi nyuma yarabihakanye avuga ko “ ari ibinyoma. Sinavuze ko Isi izarangira ku itariki 28 Nzeli. Impamvu ntabivuga ni uko Bibiliya itatubwira umunsi, icya kabiri nanjye nzi umunsi isi izarangirira nta ngendo najyamo, sinakwigisha abantu gukora no gutekereza no kureba imbere.’’

 Gitwaza yahanuye imperuka  Si Gitwaza wenyine wakunze guhanura ibintu ntibivugweho rumwe, kuko umwaka ushize Bishop Innocent Rugagi uyobora Redeemed Gospel Church, yahanuriye umwe mu bakobwa bahataniraga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda ko azaritwara, ntibyakunda. Muri uwo mwaka kandi hari amashusho ataravuzweho rumwe yamugaragaje yaturira imigisha ku bakiristo be bifuza amafaranga, imodoka, inzu n’ibindi bitewe n’icyo umuntu yifuza, ko bagiye kubibona mu gihe gito. Inkuru ya Igihe

title: Ku nshuro ya mbere Jordan Henderson aba Captain w’ Ubwongereza, Liverpool ica agahigo
content:
Gushyirwa ku gatebe kwa Wayne Rooney byatumye captain wa Liverpool Jordan Henderson yambaye iki gitambaro ku nshuro ye ya mbere, abaye umukinnyi wa 11 wa Liverpool ubaye Captain w’abongereza, agahigo iyi kipe iciye. Ni mu mukino Ubwongereza bwanganyijemo na Slovenia 0-0 kuri uyu wa Kabiri. Akoze ibi asa nk’usubiramo ibyakozwe n’uwo yasimbuye ku kuyobora Liverpool,Steven Gerrard. Uyu Henderson ari kwambara nomero 4 mu ikipe y’igihugu ari nayo Gerrard yambaraga. Ikindi ni uko abaye captain w’Ubwongereza nyuma y’umwaka umwe abaye Captain wa Liverpool nk’uko byangenze kuri Gerrard.

Henderson ateye ikirenge mu cy’uwo yasimbuye(photo internet) Abandi bakinnyi bayoboye Ubwongereza bakinira Liverpool 1. Emlyn Hughes Emlyn Hughes yamaze imyaka 12 muri Liverpool, 1967-1979. Yahawe iki gitambaro asimbuye Bobby Moore maze ayiyobora inshuro 23. 2. Kevin Keegan Kevin Keegan yamekanye muri Liverpool mu myaka y’ 1970. Yayoboye Ubwongereza ku nshuro ye yambere mu 1976, umwaka umwe mbere yo kuva muri Liverpool agana muri Hamburg. 3. Phil Thompson Phil Thompson yabaye umwe mubagize uruhare mu mwtwarire Liverpool yagize hagati mu myaka y’ 1970 kugera 1980. Mu Gushyingo 1979 yayoboye Ubwongereza ku nshuro ye ya mbere ubwo bahuraga na Bulgria. Yayoboye iyi kipe inshuro esheshatu gusa. 4. Ray Clemence Uyu afatwa nk’umuzamu w’ibihe byose muri Liverpool, yayoboye ikipe y’Ubwongereza inshuro imwe gusa mu 1981 ubwo batsindirwaga mu rugo na Brazil 1-0, yayihamagawemo inshuro 61. 5. Phil Neal Hagati y’ 1976 n’ 1983 yahamagawe mu ike y’igihugu inshuro 50, kimwe nan a mugenzi we, uyu nawe yabaye captain inshuro imwe gusa ubwo banganyaga na Iceland 1-1 mu 1982. 6. Peter Beardsley Ni umwe mu banyempano banyuze muri Liverppool kandi bari n’indashyikirwa mu ikipe y’igihugu. Mu 1988byayoboye iyi kipe muri Israel aho banganyirije 0-0. 7. Paul Ince N’ubwo yageze muri Liverpool habura amezi make ngo yuzuze imyaka 30, ari muri iyi kipe yayoboye Ubwongereza ku nshuro ya mbere mu Butaliyane banganya 0-0 bashaka itike y’igikombe cyisi cyo mu 1998. 8. Michael Owen Uyu we bafana ba Liverpool benshi ntibamwemera, ubusanzwe yari yungirije David Beckham muri za 2000 gusa yayoboye Ubwongereza inshuro icyenda. Mu 2002 niho yabikoze bwa mbere I Anifield ubwo bahakiriraga Paraguay kuko Wembley yari iri kuvugururwa. 9. Steven Gerrard Steven Gerrard afatwa nk’umukinnyi w’ibihe byose wa Liverpool. Muri 2003 niho yasimbuye Sami Hyypia ku kuyobora Liverpool, 2004 yayobowe Ubwongereza ku bwa mbere bakina na Sweden. Yabyongeye muri 2012 ayiyobora inshuro 40 mu 114 yayigaragayemo. Beckham (59), Bryan Robson (65), Moore (90) na Billy Wright (90) nibo bari imbere ya Gerrard. 10. James Milner Uyu mugbo uherutse gusezera mu ikipe y’igihugu, mu mukino wa gicuti Ubwongereza bwaherutse n’Ubuholande Milner yari captain n’ubwo batsinzwe 2-1. 11. Jordan Henderson Uyu wa 11 Ukwakira ni amateka kuri we, ni ngombwa kuk iyi season asa nk’uwayitangiye neza. Uyu n’ubu hari abafana ba Liverpool batari bamwemera ariko arabayoboye. Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Umuhanzikazi yahaye uburenganzira abafana be ngo bamukorakore aho bashaka hose ku mubiri we [REBA AMAFOTO]
content:
Umuhanzikazi Spice Diana wo mu gihugu cya Uganda muri iki cyumweru ubwo uyu muhanzikazi yakoraga igitaramo mu kabyiniro kamwe ko muri Uganda, yasabye abafana be ko  ushirutse ubwoba yaza kurubyiniro akamufata ku mabere maze umusore umwe niko kuza yiruka amufata ku mabere abandi baratinya . Ubwo uyu musore yageraga ku rubyiniro yakojejwe isoni nuyu mukobwa gusa mu rwego rwo kugirango agenda atarakaye yamubwiye ko yakoraho akanya gato ndetse agahita subira kwicara , uyu musore nawe yakozeho mukanya gato nkako guhumbya yahise amwiyaka amusaba ko yasubira mu bandi bagakomeza kwishimana . Bamwe mu bari aho baganiriye na Ugbliz bavuze ko intandaro ya bino byose yatewe n’umusore babanje kubyinana ari nawe wamukuyemo ikote yari yambaye ryari rihishe amabere ye. Si ubwambere uyu muhanzikazi avuzweho ibikorwa nkibi kuko no mu mwaka washize uyu mukowa yavuzweho kuba yararyamanye n’umuhanzi Gravity Omutuju nawe ukora umurimo wo kuririmba hariya muri Uganda. 

 

 Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: BBC yirukanye umwe mu basesenguzi bayo wibasiye abakinnyi b’abirabura
content: Craig Ramage wakiniye Derby hagati y’imyaka ya 1980 na 90, yari mu kiganiro Sportscene cya BBC ku wa Gatatu ubwo yavugaga amagambo atarishimiwe n’abatari bake. Ramage yanenze myugariro w’imyaka 22 wa Derby, Max Lowe, na we wavuze ko “yatunguwe” n’ibyavuzwe n’uyu mugabo nyuma y’umukino ikipe ye yanganyijemo na Huddersfield igitego 1-1. Ati “Gufata abantu mu buryo budakwiye hashingiwe ku ruhu rwabo no kubagiraho imyumvire itariyo byangiza isura y’umukinnyi uba ufite ahazaza ndetse bigatandukanya abantu muri sosiyete.” Muri ubu butumwa yanditse ku rubuga nkoranya mbaga rwa Instagram, Lowe ngo wavugiraga abakinnyi b’abirabura bakinana muri Derby County, yakomeje avuga ko yababajwe cyane n’ibyavuzwe na Craig Ramage. Ati “Nababajwe kandi n’uburyo igitangazamakuru gikorera abaturage kitigeze gisaba umusesenguzi gusobanura ibyo yavugaga, cyangwa ngo cyitandukanye n’iyo mitekerereze ishaje.” Lowe yatangaje ko Ramage yavuze ko kuri we asanga ibyo abakinnyi b’abirabura bageraho batabikwiye, ahubwo boroherezwa kandi barangiza bakumva ko bagezeyo ku buryo atemeranya n’imyitwarire yabo. Umuvugizi wa BBC yemeje ko bamaze gutandukana na Ramage n’ubundi wari umusesenguzi wigenga. Yagize ati “Craid Ramage yavuze amagambo adakwiye mu kiganiro cyabaye ejo hashize ariko cyamaze gukurwa kuri interineti. Ntabwo tuzongera gukorana na Craig.” Ubwo yari umukinnyi, Ramage yakiniye amakipe yo mu Bwongereza arimo Watford na Notts County. Yakiniye kandi Derby imikino isaga 40, asezera gukina mu 2001. Abinyujije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Ramage yasabye imbabazi, avuga ko “yicuza kubera amagambo yavuze nyuma y’umukino wabaye ku wa Gatandatu kandi akaba atari abigambiriye.” Ku Cyumweru, Ubuyobozi bwa Derby bwasohoye itangazo rivuga ko bwagiranye ibihaniro na BBC bukayibwira ko budashyigikiye ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose. Derby County iri ku mwanya wa 13 muri Championship, icyiciro cya kabiri mu Bwongereza, ni mu gihe mu mwaka ushize yatsindiwe ku mukino wa Playoff washoboraga gutuma izamuka muri Premier League.

title: Rurageretse hagati y’abagore ba Diamond,noneho bigeze aho bitana indaya n’inzererezi ku karubanda
content:
Nyuma y’aho Umwana w’i Tandale Diamond Platnumz atandukaniye n’umuherwekazi Zari Hassan ,byavuzwe cyane mu bitangazamakuru hirya no hino ko Hamisa Mobetto yaba ari we wabaye intandaro y’iryo tandukana, Zari yandagaje Hamisa Mobetto amwita indaya itagira aho ibarizwa. Zari yumvise yarahemukiwe cyane n’uyu Hamisa, ku buryo kugeza n’ubu iyo abonye imbarutso yatuma agira icyo avuga kuri Hamisa amubwiza inani na rimwe ndetse akamwandagaza mu buryo bukomeye. Mu byumweru bishize ubwo Zari Hassan yizihizaga isabukuru y’imyaka 38 y’amavuko, Mobetto yihaye imbuga nkoranyambaga asakaza amakuru ko Zari yabeshye imyaka ye ku munsi w’isabukuru ye y’amavuko, ari yo ntandaro yo gutuma Zari amwita Indaya itagira aho ibarizwa. Zari ku rubuga rwa Snapchat yagize ati “Urakoze Nyagasani ku isabukuru yanjye y’amavuko. Indi ndaya itagira aho ibarizwa yashyize hanze impapuro zanjye za Leta.Wa ndaya we ni muri 1980 wabyemera utabyemera. Nafunzwe umunsi wose ku mpamvu z’ubwenegihugu. Nshimishijwe no kongera gutuma udasinziraho amajoro macye bwahaha… imyaka 43 ntisa nanjye.” 
Zari kuri ubu afitanye abana babiri na Chibu Dangote Intambara hagati ya Zari na Hamisa imaze gufa indi ntera itari nto ku mbuga nkoranyambaga imaze igihe kitari gito, ariko bisa nkaho Zari ari kuyitsinda bitewe no gushyigikirwa na Diamond Platnumz uwahoze ari umugabo we. Gusa nti wakemeza ko aba bombi bashobora kongera kubana kuko igihe kimwe usanga Zari yamaganira kure iby’uko yasubirana n’umwana w’i Tandale Chibu Dangote uzwi nka Diamond Platnumz. 
Hamisa Mabetto afitanye umwana umwe na Chibu Dangote Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

Super Power ya Power of the Cross Abenshi bari kuri uru rutonde bariyandikishije, abandi batorwa n’abanyamakuru, aba producers, abahanzi bafite ibigwi mu muziki wo guhimbaza Imana n’abandi bakurikirana umuziki wa gospel. Urutonde rwa nyuma rwemejwe n’Akanama Nkemurampaka kagizwe na Nkundimana Noël, Issa Noël Kalinijabo, Nzahoyankuye Peace Nicodem, Mupende Gideon Ndayishimiye, Mama Kenzo na Dj Spin. Ibi byiciro byiyongeraho ibindi byihariye bizatorwa gusa n’akanama nkemurampaka. Birimo icy’umuhanzi uba hanze y’u Rwanda,  Utunganya indirimbo z’amajwi, Utunganya indirimbo z’amashusho, Umunyamakuru w’umwaka, Umuntu washyigikiye cyane abahanzi n’ivugabutumwa muri rusange n’Umwanditsi mwiza w’indirimbo. Biteganyijwe ko igitaramo cya mbere cyiswe "Groove Crossover Party’’ mu bizabanziriza itangwa ry’ibihembo muri Groove Awards Rwanda 2019, kizabera muri New Life Bible Church ku Kicukiro ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019 kuva saa Moya z’umugoroba. Abazatsindira ibihembo bya Groove Awards bazatangazwa mu mugoroba w’akataraboneka uteganyijwe ku wa 19 Mutarama 2020. Akanama nkemurampaka niko kazicara kagatoranya abahize abandi.

title: Neymar Jr Santos Ntazaserukana na bagenzi be bagize MSN muri Copa America Cetenario (USA)
content:
Uyu munya Brazil unikira ikipe ya FC Barcelona Neymar, byamaze kwemezwa ka azajya guhagararira igihugu cye mu mkino Olympic izabere iwabo mu mujyi wa Rio De Janeiro mu kwezi kwa Kanama uyu mwaka, ibikandi bikaba byahise bimubuza kuzaserukana n’Abandi muri Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika. Ibi byashimishije abayobozi ba FC Barcelona kuba Perezida w’ ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru yemeye ubusabe bwa Barcelona ko Neymar akina iyi mikino gusa ntazitabire Copa America, Iyi mikino izatangira kuwa 3 igeze kuwa 21 Kanama. Ikinwa n’abkinnyi bari munsi y’imyaka 23, gusa ikipe ibishaka ikaba yemerewe gushyiramo 3 barengeje iyi myaka. Kuba Neymar yatoranyirijwe iy mikino, bivuzeko atazitabira imikino y’igikombe cya America y’amajyepfo izabera muri Lete zunze ubumwe za Amerika  kuvakuwa 3 kugeza kuwa 26 Kamena. Umutoza wa Brazil Carlos Dunga yifuzaga kuzakoresha uyu mukapiteni we mu marushanwa yombi ariko ikipe akinira ya FC Barcelona yakomeje kubirwanya mu rwego rwo gushakira umukinnyi wabo ikiruhuko gihagije mbere y’itangira rya shampiyona y’umwaka utaha.

 Neymar rutahizamu kabuhariwe w’ikipe ya Fc Barcelona  Itegeko rya FIFA riha uburenganzi club kwimana umukinnyimu ikipe y’igihugu mu gihe imikino agiye kwitabira itari kurutonde rw’iyemewe na FIFA. Ibi rero byatuma Neymar yitabira Copa America kuko yemewe. Imikono Olympic yo ntabwo iri kurutonde,. Ni muri urwo rwego habayeho ubwumvikane hagati wa Brazil na FC Barcelona. Twabibutsako uyu Neymar w’imyaka 24, yari mu ikipe yananiwe gutwara iki gikombe cya Olympic Games iheruka. Brazil yaje kucyamburw na Mexico ku mukino wa nyuma ubwo Mexico yabatsindaga 2-1, ni mikino yaberaga I London mu Bwongereza. 

 Batatu bagize MSN(Messie Suarez Neymar)  Muri batatu bagize ubutatu bwa Barca MSN (Messi, Suarez na Neymar) uyu Neymar nyine ni we wenyine utazitabira Copa America izabera muri Leata zunze ubumwe za Amerika. Lionel Messi azaba arikumwe na Argentina ye kimwe Luis Suarez uzaba urikumwe na Uruguay

Yanditswe na Rukundo Xaver/Muhabura.rw

title: Jay D wabaye Rudasumbwa wa Afurika yasezeye muri GodFather East Africa
content: Ni ku nshuro ya mbere irushanwa rya GodFather East Africa riteguwe, rikorwa mu buryo bwo kugenzura imibanire hagati y’abaryitabira biyemeza kumara amezi atatu babana mu nzu imwe yagutse, uzahiga abandi mu kwitwara neza akazahembwa amashilingi ya Kenya miliyoni 2.5. Jay D mu Rwanda yari yatambutse mu cyiciro gikurikira ari kumwe na Shiny Abdallah, Gigi Mugisha, Teta Sandra, Sissi Ngamije na Vanessa Uwase. Ubuzima bw’abazatoranywa n’abo bazahurira muri Kenya bo mu bindi bihugu butambutswa imbonankubone kuri televiziyo zitandukanye zikomeye. Jay D yabwiye IGIHE ko yamaze kwandika ibaruwa isezera muri GodFather East Africa bitewe n’impamvu bwite. Yagize ati "Ejo nandikiye abategura GodFather East Africa mbabwira ko ntazaboneka, ni ku mpamvu zanjye bwite ariko nyine hakazamo n’akazi gasanzwe umuntu aba akora, ni ibintu biba bigoye kujya hanze yako amezi angana kuriya. Habayeho guhitamo nk’umuntu. Uramutse udatsinze kandi n’akazi wari ufite keza kagutunze waragasezeye, byaba ari ibindi bindi." Jay D avuga ko afite ikigo gishakira abanyamideli akazi mu kwamamaza ariko akaba asanzwe anakora muri Park Inn Hotel. Kabagire Christelle uhagarariye itsinda rikurikirana imitegurire ya GodFather East Africa mu Rwanda yavuze ko nyuma y’aho uyu munyamideli asezeye irushanwa rizakomezanya na batanu basigaye bahagarariye u Rwanda. Yagize ati "Yabimenyesheje GodFather, nanjye yarabinganirije, yambwiye ko yazamuwe mu kazi kandi ari ingenzi cyane kuri we. Yambwiye ko wenda bishobotse yazaboneka mu mwaka utaha ariko ubu ashaka kubanza gushyira imbaraga mu kazi." Yongeyeho ati "Haragenda batanu basigaye, hazakorwa irindi jonjora rizasigamo bane, ntabwo ari ngombwa ko turi bumusimbuze. Muri Kenya hazajyayo abasigaye." Ijonjora ry’ibanze mu Rwanda ryabaye ku wa 16 Mutarama 2018; ryitabiriwe n’abanyamideli 17 babajijwe ibibazo bitandukanye. Abantu icumi barimo n’abasanzwe bazwi mu bijyanye n’imyidagaduro batambutse icyiciro cya mbere nyuma hatorwa batandatu ntakuka barimo na Jay D wasezeye. Abasigayemo bazajya muri Kenya bitabiriye irindi jonjora ku wa 3 Werurwe 2018, bahatanire kwinjira mu nzu ya GodFather. Nibagerayo hazatoranywamo bane kuri buri gihugu hanyuma abatsinze bahamare amezi atatu babana mu nzu. Irushanwa nyir’izina rizatangira ku itariki ya 1 Mata 2018.

title: Rubingisa Pudence yatorewe kuba Meya w’Umujyi wa Kigali
content: Rubingisa Pudence ni we watorewe kuyobora Umujyi wa Kigali mu matora yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu. Akaba asimbuye Marie Chantal Rwakazina uherutse kugirwa Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Busuwisi. Rubingisa  yahatanaga na Rutera Rose. Akaba ari we wagize amajwi menshi yamuhesheje kujya kuri uyu mwanya. Inteko itora y’abantu 94 igizwe n’Abajyanama b’Umujyi wa Kigali, na Biro Nyobozi y’Inama Njyanama z’Imirenge yose ni yo yatoye. Rubingisa akaba yagize amajwi 71 na ho Rutera agira 22, impfabusa iba imwe,. Uyu mugabo yakoze imirimo itandukanye, aho yakoze mu ya hoze ari ISAE Busogo, yakoze muri Minisiteri y’Imari n’Igenamigambi, ndetse akaba yaranabaye Umuyobozi wungirije wa Kaminuza y’u Rwanda ushinzwe ubutegetsi n’imari. Rubingisa kuri ubu yakoreraga ikigo cyigenga. Amatora ya Komite Nyobozi y’Umujyi wa Kigali yo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yabimburiwe n’ay’abajyanama bagomba guhagararira uturere mu Nama Njyanama y’Umujyi wa Kigali. Dr Jeannette Bayisenge yatorewe kuba Perezida w’Inama Njyanama y’Umujyi wa Kigali, Visi Perezida aba Kayihura Muganga Didas na no Baguma Rose aba Umunyamabanga wayo. Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe imiturire n’ibikorwaremezo watowe ni Dr NSABIMANA Ernest. Na ho Umutoni Gatsinzi Nadine atorewe kuba Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu n’imibereho myiza. Uyu mudamu aka yari asanzwe ari Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango. Inkuru ya RBA

title: Dore impamvu 6 zituma abakobwa bigwizaho abakunzi benshi n’uburyo babigeraho
content:
Abahungu benshi bakunze kujya bibaza akenshi uburyo abakobwa  bakunze kuba bafite abakunzi kandi benshi mu gihe bo bamara imyaka n’imyaniko barabuze umukunzi,nk’uko tubikesha urubuga rwa wikihow izi ni impamvu 6 zituma abakobwa bahorana inshuti n’uburyo babigeraho.
 1.Buri umwe wese igitsina gore kimwereka urukundo: Buriya igitsina gore n’icyo kiremwa muntu gikunda gutendeka hano ku isi,kuko kiba kizi ko isaha ni saha yatana nuwo bari kumwe,iyo umuhungu nawe amaze kumenya ibyo nicyo cyaguhe anjya gushwana n’undi muhungu mugenzi we umukobwa we yibereye aho ategereje uri butsinde urwo rugamba akaba ariwe akurikira.Umukobwa ntiyakwigera amara igihe kinini adafite uwo bakundana kuko aba yarizigamiye,kandi buri umwe aba amwitaho uko bikwiye. 2.Bakunda kugisha inama bagenzi babo: Igitsina gore ku isi hose gikunda kugisha inama k’igenzi cyacyo kubyerekeranye n’urukundo.akenshi iyo ari k’umugisha inama aba amubwira umuhungu ubu bari kubyumva kimwe ndetse anamugisha inama niba koko ari umwana mwiza bagumya gukundana nta kibazo,kandi ubwo inama mugenzi we amugiriye niyo akurikiza,mu gihe umuhungu aho kugisha inama mugenzi we ahubwo agenda amuratira ndetse mugenzi we yanjya kumubwira iby’imico yuwo mukobwa undi akamwamaganira akure ahubwo bakaba banabipfa avuga ko agira ngo amwijyanire. 3.Bakundakwirekura bakavuga ibibarimo byose: Mu gihe umukobwa yasohokanye n’inshuti ye y’umukobwa ahantu,ntatinya kuvuga ibi murimo byose abibwira iyo nshuti ye y’umukobwa,kugira ngo nawe yumve ibiyivamo kandi ibyo byose babivuga babanjije kunjya ahantu hatuje bumva koko ikiganiro cyabo ntawe uri bukirogoye.mu gihe abahungu bafata umwa bagasohokana n’inshuti zabo ari ukwishimisha gusa. 4.Bakora ibishoboka byose k’umubiri byatuma bagira igikundiro: Buriya uzarebe igitsina gore amasaha menshi kimara mu nzu kiyamara kiri kwisiga ndetse no kwireba,yisiga puderi,asokoza ingohe,asiga amavuta ku munwa,ndetse anareba ko yambaye neza yaberewe,ubwo n’imisatsi akayisokoza neza burya bazi ko ubwiza bw’abakobwa buba mu misatsi,mbese igitsina gore kiba cyumva cyahora kimeze neza hose ku buryo kugira ngo aho gica hose banjye bakebuka.mu gihe igitsina gabo ntacyo biba bikibwiye,ibyo gusokoza umusatsi,ibyo kwisiga,ibyo kwireba,mbese kibigira nk’aho ari ibyo kwibona. 5.Abakobwa ni abana beza:  Ubundi ushobora kubwira umukobwa ko umukunda akabyakira,yewe akanishima ubundi nawe ukanjya aho ngo niboneye umukunzi,nyumenye ko buriya uri nkuw’ijana yemereye,hanyuma ukazanjya wohereza ubutumwa bugufi akabubona yewe akanabusubiza akubwira amagambo aryohereye,ntabe yanakubwira ngo mite undi muntu dukundana,ubundi nawe akagushyira mu bandi. 6.Bakora uburyo bushoboka bwose ngo bambare neza: Igitsina gore aho kiva kikagera gikora uburyo bushoboka bwose ngo cyambare neza,mu gihe umuhungu we aba yibereye aho ntacyo yitayeho,apfa kuba abona icyo yambara akajya mu nzira,icyo nicyo kintu cya mbere gituma igitsina gore kibona umukunzi byihuse. Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Espagne yatsinzwe n’u Butaliyani ihita isezererwa mu mikino ya Euro
content:
Ikipe y’igihugu ya Espagne yatsinzwe n’u Butaliyani ibitego bibiri ku busa ihita isezererwa mu mikino ya Euro ikomeje kubera mu Bubufaransa.
Espagne ifite ibikombe bibiri bya Euro biheruka yasezerewe muri 1/8 nyuma yo gutsindwa ibitego bibiri ku busa.
 Igitego cya mbere cy’u Butaliyani cyabonetse ku munota wa 35 gitsinzwe na myugariro w’ikipe ya Juventus, Giorgio Chiellini.
Ikipe ya Espagne yagerageje kotsa Abataliyani igitutu ariko ba myugariro ndetse n’umunyezamu Buffon bakomeza kubabera ibamba. Amahirwe ya Espagne yaje kuyoyoka ku munota wa nyuma, ubwo Graziano Pelle ukinira ikipe ya Southampton yo mu Bwongereza yatsindaga igitego cya kabiri gishimangira intsinzi. Ikipe ya Espagne ihise isezererwa ikurikira u Busuwisi, Ireland y’Amajyaruguru, Croatia, Repubulika ya Ireland, Slovakia na Hungary, zose zamaze gusezererwa muri 1/8.
Ikipe y’igihugu y’u Butaliyani yiyongereye ku makipe nka Portugal, Wales, Pologne, u Bufaransa, u Budage n’u Bubiligi zamaze kubona itike ya ¼. Uko imikino ya ¼ iteganyijwe
Kuwa Kane, tariki 30 Kamena 2016 : Portugal vs Pologne (Marseille)
Kuwa Gatanu, tariki 1 Nyakanga 2016 : Wales vs u Bubiligi(Lille)
Kuwa Gatandatu tariki 2 Nyakanga 2016 : U Budage vs U Butaliyani (Bordeaux)
Ku cyumweru tariki 3 Nyakanga 2016 : U Bufaransa vs ikipe izava hagati y’u Bwongereza na Iceland (Saint-Denis)
) 


Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Ubukerarugendo mu isura nshya i Kigali kubera imodoka zoroshya kuyizenguruka (Amafoto)
content:
Bitewe n’imiterere n’uburyo bukoreshwa mu ngendo ariko ntibyari byoroshye gusura ibi byiza, ari nayo mpamvu hazanywe imodoka nini izajya ifasha ba mukerarugendo baturutse mu mahanga ndetse n’Abanyarwanda bifuza kumenya byinshi ku mujyi wabo. Kuri uyu wa Kane nibwo izi modoka zifite imyanya igerekeranye (Double Decker), yatangiye gukora ingendo zizenguruka umujyi wa Kigali, mu gikorwa cyatangijwe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu Gishinzwe Iterambere, RDB ku bufatanye na Sosiyete Kigali City Tour ari nayo nyiri uyu mushinga. Umuyobozi Mukuru muri RDB ushinzwe ubukerarugendo, Belise Kariza, yagaragaje ko kimwe mu bintu byaburaga mu bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda ari imodoka zitembereza abantu mu mujyi, by’umwihariko igihe hari itsinda ry’abashyitsi bari ku rwego rwo hejuru bifuza kumenya byimbitse Kigali. Ati “Izi modoka zizatanga umusanzu mu byiciro byinshi, kimwe ni uguteza imbere ubukerarugendo mu mujyi wa Kigali, ikindi ni ukwigisha by’umwihariko urubyiruko. Kubera amateka yacu, benshi muri twe ntitwavukiye mu Rwanda, iyi modoka izaha urubyiruko urubuga rwo kwiga no gutembera umujyi”. Ibi kandi yabihurijeho n’Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyarugenge, Kayisime Nzaramba, wavuze ko ubukerarugendo ari kimwe mu bintu umujyi wa Kigali ushyizemo imbaraga kandi nubwo u Rwanda rwakira ba mukerarugendo b’abanyamahanga bagera kuri miliyoni 1.6 ku mwaka, umubare ukiri muto ugereranyije n’ibindi bihugu. Yakomeje avuga ko iyi ariyo mpamvu u Rwanda rugikeneye gushyira imbaraga nyinshi mu kongera umubare w’abakora ubukerarugengo baba abanyamahanga n’Abanyarwanda, izi modoka zikaba zije kurushaho gushyira ku rundi rwego ibirebana uburyo bukoreshwa mu kubatembereza. Umuyobozi wa Kigali City Tour, Munyandamutsa Augustin, yavuze ko iyi modoka yahawe izina rya ‘Sightseeing Bus’ ifite imyanya 64, bakaba baratekereje kuzizana mu Rwanda nk’uburyo bwo kongera ibikorwa ba mukerarugendo bashobora gukora igihe basuye Kigali. Uwayo Honorine ushinzwe kuyobora ba mukerarugendo muri Kigali City Tour, yabwiye IGIHE ko izi modoka zizatuma ibikorwa byo gutembereza abantu mu mujyi byoroha, aho bazajya bajyana abantu ku nyubako, inzu ndangamurage ndetse n’ibindi byiza biwutatse. Ati “Imodoka twari dusanzwe dufite ntizari zigerekeranye. Tuzajya dutwara abantu benshi, abicaye hejuru by’umwihariko bazajya babasha kureba umujyi wa Kigali mu buryo bwagutse, no gufata amafoto igihe babyifuza”. Gutembereza abantu mu mujyi wa Kigali hakoreshejwe iyi modoka bizajya bikorwa mu byiciro bitatu, buri cyiciro kikazajya kimara amasaha atatu. Icyiciro cya mbere kizajya gitangira saa tatu za mu gitondo kugeza saa sita, abantu batemberezwe mu duce twa kera tw’umujyi nka Nyamirambo, Kimisagara, Nyabugogo n’ahandi. Guhera saa munani kugeza saa kumi n’imwe, abantu bazajya batemberezwa mu duce dushya tw’umujyi wa Kigali turimo Nyarutarama, Kibagabaga, Kacyiru n’ahandi. Kuva saa moya z’umugoroba kugeza saa tanu z’ijoro, bazajya bajyanwa mu bice bya Kicukiro na Rebero kugira ngo bitegereze neza Umujyi wa Kigali mu masaha y’ijoro.
Bazajya banatemberezwa ahantu hatandukanye hagaragaza ubuzima bw’umujyi mu masaha y’ijoro. Uretse kuba ifite imyanya igerekeranye, iyi modoka ifite ibyuma bitanga umuyaga, ahashobora gucomeka telefoni n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, televiziyo ndetse na Internet itagira umugozi. Kugenda muri izi modoka, abanyarwanda n’abaturage ba EAC bazajya bishyura 25000 Frw naho abanyamahanga bishyure $50 (hafi 45000 Frw). Amafoto: Rwanda Gov.

title: Murangwa Hadidja yatowe nk’umusenateri uhagararariye imitwe ya politiki
content: Murangwa asimbuye Uwamurera Salama wari watowe mu minsi ishize urukiko rw’ikirenga rukanga kumwemeza kubera ko ubunararibonye afite butamwemerera kujya muri uwo mwanya. Amatora yo gusimbura Uwamurera yabaye kuri uyu wa Kane ku cyicaro cy’Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki yemewe mu Rwanda giherereye ku Kacyiru. Hiyamamaje abakandida batatu, hatorwa Murangwa Hadidja wo muri PDI ku majwi 32, Athanase Nahimana wa PS Imberakuri yagize amajwi ane  naho  Masozera Icyizanye Jacky wa Democratic Green Party of Rwanda agira  amajwi 7, n’impfabusa  imwe. Perezida wa PDI Harerimana Fazil yashimiye abahagarariye imitwe ya Politiki bagiriye icyizere ishyaka ayoboye. Ashingiye ku bunararibonye bwe, yavuze ko Hadidja  azafatanya n’abandi neza muri Sena. Ati “Twakiriye neza icyizere abahagarariye amashyaka baduhaye,  turabashimira kandi tubizeza ko tuzakomeza gushaka abakandida beza igihe cyose bizaba bikenewe”. Umuyobozi w’ihuriro ry’imitwe ya Politiki, Mukabunani yavuze ko bujuje inshingano zabo, ko we azamezwa n’urukiko rw’ikirenga. Kandi avuga ko kuba barasabwe gutora undi mukandida nta kibazo ahubwo byemeza ko buri rwego ruba rwakoze inshingano zarwo. Ati “Abanyarwanda bumve ko inzego zifite uko zikora, kuba twasubiyemo amatora ntabwo ari igitangaza ni uko gusa buri rwego ruba rwakoze inshingano zarwo.” Murangwa  Ndangiza Hadija ni inzobere mu bijyanye n’imisoro akaba n’umunyamategeko mu bijyanye n’imisoro. Ni umwe mu bagize inama y’ubutegetsi muri Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu, BNR. Ni umunyamuryango w’Ikigo Mpuzamahanga cy’Ubukemurampaka cya Kigali (KIAC). Yakoze mu mishinga itandukanye yiga ku misoro n’ubucuruzi yabaga ihuriweho n’imiryango mpuzamahanga ndetse na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda. Yakoze akazi k’ubujyanama mu bigo mpuzamahanga nka International Finance Corporation (IFC ), Umushinga wo guhuza imisoro muri EAC n’ibindi. Kuri ubu yakoraga nk’impuguke ishinzwe igenamigambi n’iterambere ry’ikigo mu kigo cy’ababaruramari b’umwuga mu Rwanda,  (ICPAR). Yagiye mu nama z’ubutegetsi z’ibigo bitandukanye mu Rwanda nko muri Banki Itsura Amajyambere (BRD),  Ishami rishinzwe ubuvuzi mu gisikare (MMI) no mu Kigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RBC). Murangwa asanze Nkusi Juvenal w’ishyaka PSD, wamaze gutorerwa guhagararira Ihuriro ry’imitwe ya Politiki muri Sena.

title: Umunya-Nigeria Majek Fashek wamamaye mu njyana ya Reggae yitabye Imana
content: Uyu musaza yitabye Imana apfuye urw’ikirago nyuma yo kuryama agasinzirira ko nk’uko Omenka Uzoma wari umujyanama we yabitangarije BBC. Omenka Uzoma mu magambo yanditse kuri Instagram, yavuze ko ‘ni igihe ngo twishimire ibyo yagezeho si igihe cyo kubabara tumuherekeza, yakoreye byinshi Nigeria na Afurika muri rusange’. Majek Fashek yajyaga afatwa n’uburwayi rimwe na rimwe ariko ubu icyamwishe ntikiramenyekana neza. Uyu muhanzi afatwa nk’uwahirimbaniye umuziki muri Nigeria kuva mu myaka yo mu 1980. Yigeze kuvuga ko Bob Marley ari we wamuteye imbaraga zo gukora Reggae. Mu 1991 yakoze indirimbo yise ‘So Long Too Long’ yari irimo ubutumwa bukomeye bukangurira Abanyafurika gukunda umugabo wabo, yahamagariraga guhaguruka yaba abari mu mugabane cyangwa aba hanze yawo. Yaririmbye izindi ndirimbo nyinshi zirimo ‘Holly Spirit’, ‘Religion na Politics’, ‘African Unity’, ‘Free Africa, Free Mandela’ n’izindi nyinshi. Mu 2000 hatangiye gusakazwa inkuru z’uko Majek ubuzima bwe butameze neza gusa biza kurangira amahoro nta gikuba gicitse. Mu 2015 yajyanywe mu Kigo Ngororamuco i Abuja muri Nigeria kubera gusabikwa n’ibiyobyabwenge. Majek Fashek yakoranye n’abahanzi b’ibihangange barimo nka Jimmy Cliff, Tracy Chapman na Snoop Dogg.  	Reba imwe mu ndirimbo za Majek

title: Umutoza wa Etincelles yahamije ko ari kurambagizwa n’amakipe atanu
content:
Umutoza w’ikipe ya Etincelles, Seninga Innocent yatangaje ko kugeza ubu arambagizwa n’amakipe 5 yifuza ko yajya kuyabera umutoza, akava mu ikipe ya Etincelles afitemo amasezerano arangirana n’impera z’uyu mwaka w’imikino 2015/16.
Seninga yageze muri Etincelles mu mpera za Werurwe, aje kuyifasha mu mikino yo kwishyura, ngo ibe itamanuka mu cyiciro cya kabiri ndetse kuri ubu bari ku mwanya wa 10 n’amanota 32, nyuma yaho batsinze Bugesera FC 3-0 mu mukino w’ikirarane wabereye kuri Stade Umuganada kuri iki Cyumweru. “Kugeza kuri iyi saha ndacyari mu ikipe ya Etincelles, nsigaje umukino umwe wa shampiyona, ariko kugeza ubungubu ndacyari ahangaha nk’umutoza wa Etincelles.”
“Mfite amakipe anshakisha agera kuri 5, yatangiye ari 4 hazakwiyongeraho n’iya 5 ariko kubwa njye Etincelles nahagiriye ibhe byiza cyane, ukuntu nyikunda, ukuntu abafana bankunda bampamagara bafite agahinda kenshi cyane nanjye numva ntashaka gutandukana nabo, numva nagumana nabo, ntegereje ko hari icyo komite imbwira.Ubundi nkasinyisha abakinnyi, nkagumana na groupe mfite, nkanareba niba hari aho twakongeramo.” Seninga Innocent akaba asigaje umukino umwe mu ikipe ya Etincelles, bazahuramo na Police FC ku munsi wa nyuma wa shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere, aho kugeza ubu mu makipe amwifuza, ivugwa cyane ari Police FC yatandukanye na Cassa Mbungo. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: VIDEO: Dr Murugu yazanye ibisubizo ku ndwara y’igicuri, kutabyara, umubyibuho ukabije n’izindi zananiranye
content:
Urashaka gutakaza ibiro mu gihe gito cyangwa gukira indwara wivuje igihe kirekire ariko zikaba zaranze gukira burundu? Dr Murugu aributsa abantu ko afite igisubizo kuri ibi bibazo byombi. Dr Murugu uvura akoresheje ibimera, aho nyuma yo kubaka izina rikomeye muri Kenya akomereje akazi mu Rwanda mu ivuriro rye riri i Nyarutarama mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Uyu muganga w’inararibonye aributsa abantu ko nta mpamvu yo kwihebeshwa n’indwara zitandukanye zananiranye kuko we azivura kandi zigakira akoresheje imiti ikomoka ku bimera.

Dr Murugu akomeje kwirahirwa n’abanyarwanda amaze gufasha mu gihe gito amaze mu Rwanda Mu ndwara uyu muganga avura harimo amibe n’izindi ndwara zo mu nda, igicuri, kubura urubyaro, indwara z’umutima n’iz’imyanya y’ubuhumekero nka asima n’izindi nyinshi. Si ibi gusa kandi, kuko Dr Murugu afasha abantu babangamiwe n’umubyibuho ukabije, akabaha imiti ituma batakaza ibiro mu gihe gito cyane bakagira umubiri uteye nk’uko babyifuza. Kanda hano hasi urebe zimwe mu ndwara Dr Murugu avura

title: U Rwanda na Tanzania mu bufatanye bwihariye bugamije kwagura ubukerarugendo muri Afurika
content: Babyemeranyije kuri uyu wa Gatatu ubwo ababukoramo bo muri Tanzania basuraga bagenzi babo bo mu Rwanda, bakaganira uburyo barushaho kunoza ubufatanye. Ni ibiganiro byaranzwe no kugaragaza amahirwe buri gihugu kihariyemo mu bukerarugendo nk’ibishingiye ku muco, umutungo kamere n’ibindi. Umuyobozi wungirije w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Abatwara n’abatembereza ba mukerarugendo mu Rwanda, RTTA, Namatovu Caroline, yavuze ko ibihugu byombi bifite ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bitandukanye, bityo kwishyira hamwe ari amahirwe. Ati “Ba mukerarugendo iyo baje muri Afurika akenshi ntabwo baza gusura igihugu kimwe. Basura n’ibindi bihugu bihegereye kandi Tanzania nicyo gihugu kidafite ibintu by’ubukerarugendo bisa n’ibyo mu Rwanda. Iyo baje mu Rwanda baba bashaka gukomereza Tanzania.” Yavuze ko ubufatanye bw’abakora mu bukerarugendo mu bihugu byombi busanzwe ariko butari ku rwego rwifuzwa rushobora gufasha ibihugu byombi kubwungukiramo uko bikwiye. Namatovu yavuze ko gufasha no gushishikariza ba mukerarugendo bagannye igihugu kimwe kugera no mu kindi kugira ngo barebe ibyiza bihari, bizafasha ibihugu byombi kandi babisigire amadovize mu buryo bwagutse. Yavuze ko uburyo bwo kubahererekanya bworoshye, kuko nk’ikigo gitwara abantu n’ibintu mu ndege, RwandAir, gisanzwe gikora ingendo mu bihugu byinshi birimo na Tanzania. Umuyobozi w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Abatwara n’abatembereza ba mukerarugendo muri Tanzania, TATO, Sirili Akko, yavuze ko ubukerarugendo ari rumwe mu nzego zishobora gufasha Afurika kwikura mu bukene. Ati “Ntabwo ari muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba gusa, ubukerarugendo ni amarembo mashya yafasha umugabane wa Afurika kwikura mu bukene kuko ni kimwe mu bihanga akazi, bugira uruhare rukomeye mu kongerera agaciro ibikorwa.” Akko yavuze ko u Rwanda na Tanzania bidahuje ibikorwa bikurura ba mukerarugendo ku buryo kimwe cyakumva ko gihanganye n’ikindi ahubwo bigomba gukorana byagutse, bikajya bihererekanya ababigana. Umuyobozi  w’ishami ry’ubukerarugendo mu rugaga rw’abikorera, Kageruka Ariella, yavuze ko bikwiye ko ‘Ibihugu byo muri EAC bikangurira ba mukerarugendo babigannye kugera no mu bindi bihugu bituranyi kandi bikaborohereza mu ngendo n’ibindi bibafasha kuhagera. Abikorera bakora mu bukerarugendo muri Tanzania nibo babimburiye gusura bagenzi babo bo mu Rwanda, bakaba bemeranyije ko nabo bazabasura mu gihe cya vuba. [email protected]

title: Afurika y’Epfo: COVID-19 yatumye intare zibona ubwisanzure , ziri kugaragara ziryamye mu mihanda (amafoto)
content: Amafoto yakwirakwijwe kuri internet agaragaza intare zo muri iyo pariki ziryamye mu mutuzo, mu mihanda ya kaburimbo inyuramo imodoka zitwaye ba mukerarugendo basura iyo pariki. Ubuyobozi bwa pariki ya Kruger buherutse gushyira hanze amafoto y’izo ntare ziryamye mu mihanda , buvuga ko ubusanzwe zitajyaga zihagera kubera ko hanyuraga ba mukerarugendo benshi. Guhera tariki 25 Werurwe uyu mwaka, ibikorwa byo gusura pariki muri Afurika y’Epfo byarahagaritswe, bituma abakerarugendo bakundaga kuza muri iyo pariki babihagarika. Umuvugizi w’iyo pariki, Isaac Phaahla yabwiye CNN ati “Ubusanzwe kuzibona ziryamye mu muhanda ku manywa ntibyakundaga kubaho kuko hahoraga urujya n’uruza bigatuma zihungira mu bihuru.” Icyakora, Isaac Phaahla yavuze ko kuba abakerarugendo batakiza kureba inyamaswa, nta byinshi byahinduye ku myitwarire yazo kuko nubundi aho zari zisanzwe ziba ari ho zikiba. Perezida wa Afurika y’Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa yatangaje ko kuguma mu rugo hirindwa coronavirus bizakomeza kugeza mu mpera za Mata uyu mwaka.

title: Inshingano 5  buri Munyanyarwanda wese akwiye ku menya
content:
MU MIGANI 23:12 hagira hati “hugurira umutima wawe kwigishwa, n’amatwi yawe ku magambo yo kumenya.” Ijambo “kwigishwa”  cyangwa gutozwa kugendera ku mahame mbwirizamuco ryakoreshejwe muri uyu murongo, ryerekeza ku bintu bibiri: kwicyaha no kwemera ko abandi baducyaha.
  Ibyo bisaba ko umuntu amenya ikigomba gukosorwa hanyuma akamenya n’uburyo bwo kugikosora. Ni yo mpamvu “Amagambo yo kumenya”  akomoka ku isoko yiringirwa ari ay’ingenzi mu bijyanye no gucyaha no kwemera gucyahwa. Igitabo cya Bibiliya cy’Imigani ni isoko ihebuje y’amagambo y’ubwenge. Imigani ikubiye muri icyo gitabo “Ni iyo kumenyesha ubwenge yo ihesha ubwenge bw’imigenzereze, no gukiranuka no gutunganya no kutabera” . Ni iby’ubwenge ko tuyitegera amatwi.  gitanga ubuyobozi bwiringirwa bwadufasha kumenya uko twategeka uburakari, uko twakoresha ururimi rwacu n’uko twageza ubumenyi ku bandi. Nimucyo dusuzume imirongo imwe n’imwe yo muri icyo gice. 1.Ni iki ‘gihosha uburakari’? Umwami Salomo wa Isirayeli ya kera, yagaragaje ukuntu amagambo agira ingaruka ku burakari cyangwa ku mujinya, agira ati “Gusubizanya ineza guhosha uburakari, ariko ijambo ribabaza ribyutsa umujinya” Ijambo “uburakari” ryumvikanisha ibyiyumvo bikomeye umuntu agira cyangwa uko yitwara iyo atishimiye ikintu runaka. “Umujinya”  wo ni uburakari burenze urugero umuntu adashobora guhishira. Ni gute uyu mugani ushobora kudufasha kwitwara ku muntu warakaye cyangwa gutegeka uburakari bwacu bwite? Amagambo akarishye arababaza kandi ashobora gutuma ibintu byari bibi birushaho kuzamba. Ariko gusubizanya ineza incuro nyinshi bituma uwari urakaye acururuka. Icyakora, gusubizanya ineza umuntu warakaye si ko buri gihe biba byoroshye. Gusa, twabifashwamo no kugerageza kwiyumvisha icyatumye arakara. Bibiliya igira iti “Amakenga umuntu afite amubuza kwihutira kurakara, kandi bimuha icyubahiro kwirengagiza inabi yagiriwe”.  Ese birashoboka ko umuntu yarakara abitewe n’uko adatuje cyangwa se ashaka ko bamwitaho? Wenda impamvu nyayo yamuteye kurakara ishobora kuba ntaho ihuriye n’ibyo twavuze cyangwa twakoze. Iyo turi mu murimo wo kubwiriza duhura n’abantu badusubizanya umujinya. Ese akenshi ntibyaba biterwa n’uko nyir’inzu baba baramutubwiyeho ibintu bigamije kudusebya cyangwa se akaba abiterwa no kudasobanukirwa imyizerere yacu neza? Ese twagombye guhita twumva ko nyir’inzu atwibasiye by’umwihariko nk’aho hari icyo dupfa, maze tukamusubizanya inabi? Nubwo ahanini bitoroshye kumenya icyateye umuntu kurakara, guhita tumusubiza amagambo amubabaza byaba ari ikimenyetso kigaragaza ko tubuze umuco wo kwicyaha. Dukwiye kwirinda gusubiza abantu dutyo. Inama idusaba gusubizanya ineza ni iy’agaciro kenshi, cyane cyane mu bihereranye no gutegeka uburakari bwacu bwite. Dushobora gushyira iyo nama mu bikorwa twitoza kugaragaza ibituri ku mutima tudakomerekeje abaduteze amatwi. Mu gihe dushyikirana n’abantu tubana mu muryango, aho kuvugana n’umuntu amagambo akarishye cyangwa kumutuka tumuhamagara mu mazina y’amahimbano amusebya, dushobora kwihatira kumvikanisha ibyiyumvo byacu dutuje. Muri rusange, gushotora umuntu mu magambo bituma na we ashaka kwihimura. Kubwira umuntu witonze ibyiyumvo ufite, bitandukanye no kumusesereza kandi bishobora gutuma acururuka. 2.“Ururimi rw’abanyabwenge rugaragaza ubuhanga”
 Kumenya kwifata bigira uruhare mu byo tuvuga n’uburyo tubivugamo. Salomo yaravuze ati “Ururimi rw’abanyabwenge rugaragaza ubuhanga uko bikwiriye, ariko akanwa k’abapfapfa gasesagura ubupfu”  . Mu gihe tugaragaje ko twifuje gufasha abandi maze tukababwira ibihereranye n’umugambi w’Imana n’ibintu byiza cyane yaduteganyirije, mbese ubwo ntituba ‘dukoresha ubwenge ibyiza’? Umupfapfa we ntiyabishobora kuko nta bwenge agira. Mbere yo gutanga izindi nama zihereranye n’ukuntu umuntu yakoresha ururimi neza, Salomo yabanje kuvuga ibintu bibiri bihabanye twatekerezaho. Yaravuze ati “amaso y’Uwiteka aba hose, yitegereza ababi n’abeza. Iyo dusomye aya amagambo dushobora kwishima kubera ko atwizeza ko “Amaso y’Uwiteka ahuta kureba isi yose impande zose, kugira ngo yerekane ko ari umunyamaboko wo kurengera abafite imitima imutunganiye”. Iyo dukoze ibintu byiza Imana irabimenya. Nanone imenya abantu bakora ibibi kandi izabibabaza. Salomo agaruka ku gaciro ko kuvuga twitonze, agira ati “ururimi rukiza ni igiti cy’ubugingo, ariko urugoreka rukomeretsa umutima” . Amagambo ngo “igiti cy’ubugingo” yumvikanisha ubushobozi igiti kiba gifite bwo gukiza indwara no gutuma umuntu agarura ubuyanja. Amagambo umunyabwenge avugana ubwitonzi agwa neza abayumva, agatuma bagaragaza imico yabo myiza. Ibinyuranye n’ibyo, ururimi ruriganya cyangwa ruvuga ibigoramye rukomeretsa abarwumva. 3.Twemere gucyahwa kandi ‘twamamaze ubuhanga’ Umwami w’umunyabwenge yakomeje agira ati “umupfapfa ahinyura igihano se amuhana, ariko uwemera gucyahwa ni we ugira amakenga” . Kugira ngo umuntu ‘yemere gucyahwa’ cyangwa guhanwa ni uko aba yabanje guhabwa igihano. Uwo murongo wumvikanisha ko mu gihe bibaye ngombwa umuntu ahabwa igihano kugira ngo yikosore. Guhana ni inshingano y’ababyeyi mu muryango ikaba n’inshingano y’umugabo by’umwihariko, kandi abana na bo baba bagomba kwemera guhanwa n’ababyeyi. Ubusanzwe, hari uburyo butandukanye Imana  ikoresha ihana abagaragu be bose. Mu Baheburayo 12:6 hagira hati “kuko uwo Uwiteka akunze ari we ahana, kandi akubita ibiboko abo yemera bose ko ari abana be.” Bityo, uburyo twakira igihano duhawe bugaragaza niba turi abanyabwenge cyangwa niba turi abapfapfa. Salomo yavuze andi magambo agaragaza ibintu bibiri bihabanye agira ati “ururimi rw’umunyabwenge rwamamaza ubuhanga, ariko umutima w’umupfapfa si ko ukora”   Kugeza ubumenyi ku bandi bimeze nko kubiba imbuto. Ubusanzwe umuhinzi ntatera imbuto zose ahantu hamwe. Ahubwo agenda atera imbuto nkeya hirya no hino kugeza igihe arangirije umurima wose. Uko ni na ko kwamamaza ubuhanga bigenda. Dufate urugero. Nk’iyo duhuye n’umuntu turimo tubwiriza, ntibyaba ari iby’ubwenge guhita tumusukaho ubumenyi bwose dufite kuri Bibiliya. Ahubwo umubwiriza w’umunyabwenge arangwa no kwifata mu magambo. Mu gihe ‘yamamaza’ ubuhanga, agenda buhoro buhoro atsindagiriza ingingo runaka y’ukuri ko muri Bibiliya, akaba ari yo yubakiraho akurikije ibisubizo by’uwo baganira. Kugeza ku bandi ubwenge bisaba ko umuntu avuga amagambo afite icyo yigisha kandi y’ingirakamaro. Bisaba ko umuntu abanza gutekereza kugira ngo avuge amagambo afite icyo yumvikanisha kandi atera inkunga. Ni yo mpamvu, “umutima w’umukiranutsi utekereza icyo ari busubize.
  Ni iby’ingenzi ko amagambo tuvuga amera nk’imvura igwa neza ikanetesha ubutaka kandi ikagira umumaro. Si kimwe na ya mvura nyinshi igwa igateza isuri igakukumba ibyo isanze byose mu nzira yayo. 4.Tube “abera mu ngeso” zacu Kwamamaza ubuhanga ku bihereranye na Yehova n’umugambi we no kumutura “igitambo cy’ishimwe” ari cyo “mbuto z’iminwa” yacu, ni bwo buryo nyabwo bwo kugaragaza. Nyamara ariko, kugira ngo igitambo nk’icyo gishobore kwemerwa, ni ngombwa ko ‘tuba abera mu ngeso zacu zose’ (Mu buryo bufite imbaraga, Salomo atwumvisha uko kuri kw’ingenzi akoresheje imigani ibiri ivuga ibintu bihabanye. Yaravuze ati “igitambo cy’umunyabyaha ni ikizira ku Uwiteka, ariko gusenga k’umukiranutsi kuramunezeza. Inzira y’umunyabyaha ni ikizira ku Uwiteka, ariko akunda ukurikira gukiranuka.” Ni gute abantu bava mu nzira y’ubuzima babona ibihereranye no gucyahwa, kandi se urubanza rubategereje ni uruhe? Igitabo cy’Imigani gikomeza kigira kiti “umuntu wiyobagiza ahanishwa igihano kibabaza, kandi uwanga gucyahwa azapfa” . Aho kugira ngo bamwe mu bakora ibyaha bemere inama zo kubakosora bagirwa n’abafite inshingano mu itorero rya gikristo, bahitamo kuva mu nzira yo gukiranuka. Mbega ubupfapfa! Dukurikije Bibiliya Ntagatifu, uyu mugani ugira uti “uta inzira abishaka, azahanwa bikomeye! kandi uwanga gucyahwa azapfa.” Bite se mu gihe umuntu yaba agaragaza bya nyirarureshwa ko yemeye gucyahwa ariko mu by’ukuri atabishakaga? Ibyo na byo ni ukwibeshya kuko umwami wa Isirayeli akomeza agira ati “ no kurimbuka biri imbere y’Uwiteka, nkanswe ibiri mu mitima y’abantu” . Mu buryo bw’ikigereranyo, nta hantu hashobora kuba kure cyane y’Imana nzima nko muri shewoli aho abapfuye bari. Ariko na ho hari imbere yayo. Izi neza imico n’imiterere abantu bose bariyo bari bafite kandi ifite ubushobozi bwo kubazura .
 Mbega ukuntu kumenya ibiri mu mitima y’abantu ari ibintu byoroheye Yehova! Intumwa Pawulo yaranditse ati “nta cyaremwe kitagaragara imbere yayo, ahubwo byose bitwikuruwe nk’ibyambaye ubusa mu maso y’Izatubaza ibyo twakoze. Dushobora guhisha abantu ibiri mu mutima wacu ariko nta cyo twahisha Imana. Umuntu wanga guhanwa ntiyanga inama ahabwa gusa, ahubwo asuzugura n’abazimuha. Salomo yagize ati “Umukobanyi ntakunda gucyahwa.” Yongeyeho ikindi gitekerezo gisa n’icyo agira ati “

title: se wa Diamond yagaragaje ko yababajwe bikomeye n’urugomo rwakorewe umukazana we Mobetto
content:
Nyuma yaho bimenyekanye ko Sanura Kasim, nyina wa Diamond,yakubitiye Mobetto mu nzu ya Diamond amuhora ko yararanye n’umuhungu we, kuri ubu na se wa Diamond yagize icyo abivugaho aho yagaragaje akababaro n’amagambo agaragaza kutishimira nagato ibyakorewe umukazana we Hamissa Mabetto dore ko abafitiye n’umwuzukuru.  Tariki 13 Gicurasi 2018 nibwo Hamissa Mobetto yararanye na Diamond mu cyumba kimwe gusa mu gitondo ubwo nyina wa Diamond yajyaga gusuhuza umuhungu we, ubwo ni mugitondo cyo ku wa 14 Gicurasi 2018 agasanga Mobetto mu buriri yiturije, yahereye ko amukubita, atabarwa na Diamond. Mu byo uyu mukecuru yatangaje byatumye akubita Hamisa ngo ni uko atamushaka na gato ku muhungu we, nyamara yaranabyaranye na Diamond. Nyuma y’ibi byose byabaye, Abdul Juma, se wa Diamond yagaragaje ko yababajwe bikomeye n’urugomo rwakorewe umukazana we (Mobetto) ko bitamushimishije na gato. Abdul Juma aganira na Global TV yagaragaje ukutishimira ibyakorewe Mobetto maze atangaza amagambo arimo n’agahinda aho yavuze ko gukubita umukazana we ari ukumukora mujisho. Abdul Juma yagize ati “Nareke abana bakore ibyabo,…si byiza gukubita umuntu nta kosa afite si nabikunze na gato gukubita umwana wabyaranye n’umuhungu wanjye ni ukunkora mu jisho”. Yorongeye asaba ko Diamond agomba kugira vuba akarongora Mobetto kuko afite amatsiko y’ubukwe bwabo. Abdul Juma yagize ati”Diamond agomba kugira vuba akarongora uriya mukobwa bakabana byemewe n’amategeko”. Nyina wa Diamond, Mama Dangote yakunze kugaragaza ko ashyigikiye Zari kuva ku munsi wa mbere yamubonanye na Diamond kugeza batandukanye tariki 14 Gashyantare 2018, kugeza ubwo yanamubwiye ko natarongora Zari atazigera yitabira ubukwe bwe gusa ku rundi ruhande Zari yarinze ava mu muryango wabo adakunda nyirabukwe n’ubwo we amukunda.

Yasabye Diamond kugira vuba akarongora Mobetto kuko afite amatsiko y’ubukwe bwabo
Abdul Juma se wa Diamond yavuze ko gukubita umukazana we wababyariye umwana ari ukumukora mujisho.
yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Amavubi azacakirana na Seychelles mu ijonjora rya mbere ryo gushaka itike y’igikombe cy’isi 2022
content:
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu 28 bihagaze nabi muri ruhago muri Afurika bigomba kunyura mu ijonjora ry’ibanze hashakwa amakipe azashyirwa mu matsinda mu gushaka itike y’igikombe cy’isi cya 2022 kizabera muri Qatar. Ubu rwamaze kumenya aho ruzatangirira urugendo. Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 29 Nyakanga 2019 ni bwo habaye tombola y’uburyo aya makipe adahagaze neza (hashingiwe ku rutonde ngarukakwezi rwa FIFA ruheruka) agomba guhura yishakamo 14 azajya mu matsinda. U Rwanda rwisanze rugomba guhatana n’Ibirwa bya Seychelles aho umukino ubanza uzabera muri Seychelles naho uwo kwishyura ukabera i Kigali. Iyi mikino izaba hagati ya tariki 02 n’iya 10 Nzeli uyu mwaka.

Dore uko aya makipe yose azaca mu ijonjora rya mbere azahura Amakipe 14 azaba yabashije gutambuka azongerwa kuri 26 ahagaze neza, maze hagakorwa amatsinda 10 y’amakipe ane. Amakipe 10 azaba yabaye aya mbere muri buri tsinda, hazongera hkorwe tombola hashingiwe ku buryo aya makipe ahagaze ku rutonde ngarukakwezi rwa FIFA, maze abiri abiri ahure. Eshanu zizaba zitwaye neza mu mikino ibiri abe ari zo zibona itike y’igikombe cy’isi kizaba ari icya nyuma gikinwe n’amakipe 32.

title: Ese kuki bamwe bakundanana bakarambana, abandi bagakundana Urudashoboka?
content:
Abahanga mu by’imibanire y’abantu ndetse n’impuguke muby’ubuzima bahamya ko bitoroshye kubona igisobanuro nyacyo cy’iri jambo “Urukundo” gusa bitewe n’ahantu cyangwa igihe runaka umuntu ageze mo hagenda habaho ibisobanuro binyuranye by’Urukundo, ahanini usanga n’imico itandukanye y’ahantu bigira icyo bihindura ku gusobanura icyo Urukundo aricyo ndetse hakamenyekana n’impamvu bamwe bakundana bakarambana abandi nabo bagakundana urudashoboka cyangwa ntibarambane. Bibiliya yo Isobanura urukundo mu buryo butandukanye gusa hari igisobanuro kirimo gikomeye aho bagera bakavuga bati “Imana ni urukundo” ahandi usanga hari abemera ko mu mateko y’Imana irivuga ngo Mukundane ni ryo risumba ayandi mategeko kuko bavuga ko uramutse wakunze mugenzi wawe utatekereza ku mugirira nabi n’ibindi byinshi ugasanga rero ariho bahera bemeza ko Urukundo ari itegeko risumba ayandi imbere y’Imana. Ubusanzwe mu buzima tubano hano ku Isi umunsi ku munsi cyane twinjiye mu Isi y’Urukundo kuko nicyo Nyamukuru kuri ubu turiho usanga Abantu bakundana aha tuvuze cyane ku rukundo ruba hagati y’umukobwa n’umuhungu ruganisha kukuba babana bagakora umuryango ndetse bakabyara bakororoka nk’uko Imana yabigennye, bijya bibaho rero ko umuhungu akundana n’umukobwa bakagera no ku rwego rwo kubana gusa hari n’abakundana kubw’impamvu runaka urwabo ntirurambe gusa umugani w’abantu ndetse n’uburyo Imana yaremye isanzure burya ngo nta nkweto ijya ibura iyayo amaherezo buri wese agera aho akabona  uwo bahuza.
Kuri uyu munsi wa none ho usanga byarahindutse aho umuntu asigaye akunda mugenzi we kubera impamvu runaka, nk’amafaranga cyangwa izindi nyungu runaka aba amukurikiyeho ninayo mpamvu usigaye ubona bamwe bakundana urukundo ntirumare kabiri cyangwa ngo rurambe. Ku rundi ruhande ariko hari ikintu gikunze kubaho hano mu Rwanda by’umwihariko bitewe n’amateka yaranze igihugu cyacu aho usanga imiryango yaratatanye kuburyo hari nk’ubwo ushobora kumara imyaka myinshi warabuze umuvandimwe cyangwa abavandimwe bawe urugero nk’aba babuze mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi noneho nyuma mukazahurira nk’ahantu utazi neza ko ari n’umuvandimwe wawe nyuma ukaba wanashiduka mwakundanye kandi wenda ari n’umuvandimwe wawe
Kuri iki tuvuze haruguru bikunze kubaho ahenshi Atari no mu Rwanda usibye ko twe mu Rwanda tugira imvugo tubishyiramo ngo ni ugukunda urudashoboka iyo wakundanye n’umuntu utazi ko ari umuvandimwe wawe nyuma bikazaba ngombwa ko wisanga ari umuvandimwe wawe cyane aha bimenyekana iyo mugeze muri cya gihe cyo kubana kuko aha bisaba ko imiryango yanyu yose uko yakabaye ibasha kugaragara hanyuma rero mukanamenyana kuburyo bwimbitse. Ibyo byose rero biratuganisha ku nkuru y’ibyabayeho aho umukobwa Marine yakundanye na Jack bakagera ku munota wa nyuma umwe akamenya ko undi ari musaza w’undi n’undi ari mushiki w’undi bisanga mu rukundo rudashoboka
Ni inkuru ndende muzagezwaho mu bice bitandukanye ikazaba ikubiyemo ubutumwa bushobora kugira byinshi buhindura mu muryango Nyarwanda. Tukurarikiye kutazacikwa iyi nkuru ndende URUDASHOBOKA. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/MUHABURA.rw

title: Ecobank Rwanda yashyize imbaraga mu gutanga serivisi z’imari hifashishijwe telefoni
content: Ni gahunda izafasha abatari bake kuko imibare y’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere (RURA) yo mu Ugushyingo 2019 igaragaza ko Abanyarwanda batunze telefoni ngendanwa ari 9,527,829. Ubu buryo bufasha abakiliya kubona serivisi z’imari bifashishije telefoni zabo zigezweho [Smartphone] cyangwa izisanzwe, bufasha iyi banki imaze kwigarurira imitima y’abatari bake, kubera uburyo bibafasha kugendana n’ibigezweho, batandukana no kugendana ibifurumba by’amafaranga mu ntoki. Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye n’Umuyobozi ushinzwe serivisi z’aba-agents muri Ecobank Rwanda, Kalisa Steve, yasobanuye ko ubu buryo bwo gukoresha telefoni banki yabuhisemo mu gufasha abayigana kujyana n’ibigezweho no kuzigama igihe cyabo. Ati “Nka Ecobank, icyiza ni uko dushaka uburyo dutangamo serivisi bworoshye kandi bwihuse kuko uburyo bwo gukoresha telefoni ni bumwe mu bisubizo twabonye bituma twegera abakiliya bacu kugira ngo babone serivisi mu buryo buboroheye kandi buhendutse.” Ku bakoresha telefoni zigezweho bashobora kubona serivisi za banki babanje kumanura application isanzwe ifasha abakiliya bayo kubona serivisi z’imari bifashishije application izwi nka ‘Ecobank Mobile App’ kuri Play Store na App store, bakuzuzamo ibisabwa, bagahita batangira kuryoherwa n’ibibyiza bya Ecobank. Ubu buryo busaba kuba bafite internet. Uretse ubu buryo, hari n’ubudasaba kuba bafite internet bunifashishwa no muri telefoni zigezweho aho umuntu akanda *883#, agakurikiza amabwiriza. Ubu buryo bwombi bufasha abakiliya n’abifuza kuba ab’iki kigo cy’imari kimaze kwamamara mu bihugu bisaga 3o, kubona serivisi z’imari zisanzwe zitangirwa ku mashami zirimo kwifungurira konti, guhererekanya amafaranga, kwishyura ibicuruzwa na serivisi. Ati “Serivisi zikunda kuzana abakiliya muri banki ni zo duheraho kugira ngo tugabanye wa mwanya bamara bibasaba kujya kuzishaka kuri banki kandi ari ibintu bakabaye bikorera birimo kwishyura no kwishyurwa [amazi, amashanyarazi, ifatabuguzi rya TV, RRA, guhaha mu maduka no mu maguriro.” Hari kandi kureba ibyakorewe kuri konti, kwishyura abafite konti muri Ecobank, mu zindi banki cyangwa n’udafite konti muri Ecobank. Urugero ni nk’aho umuntu ashobora koherereza undi link kuri email, yayikandaho agahita abona uburyo ahitamo konti yayoherezaho nubwo yaba itari muri Ecobank. Ati “Nk’abantu bishyura ubukode, bashobora guhitamo uburyo twateganyije ukwezi kwashira amafaranga agahita agenda utabanje kujya kuri banki. Twongeyemo n’uburyo bwo guhererekanya amafaranga n’abari hanze y’igihugu hakoreshejwe uburyo bwa Swift.” Iki kigo cy’imari kinagira uburyo bwa Ecobank Africa bufasha abantu bari mu bihugu ikoreramo guhererekanya amafaranga ako kanya haba kuri konti yitwa Express, kuri Mobile Money n’ahandi ku kiguzi giciriritse. Harimo n’uburyo umuntu ashobora gusaba amafaranga mugenzi we, yabwemeza, agahita agera kuri konti ye. Ecobank Rwanda yanashyizeho uburyo bwifashisha amakarita atandukanye, buha umukiliya wese utunze Visa Card na MasterCard yahawe na banki iyo ariyo yose kubona serivisi zitangirwa kuri Ecobank mobile App. Telefoni kandi ishobora kwifashishwa n’abakiliya igihe bifuza kumenya ahaherereye ibyuma bya ATM cyangwa aba-agents, guhagarika cyangwa gufungura ikarita yawe no kumenyesha banki igihe ufite ingendo ikaba yahagarikwa by’igihe gito. [email protected]

title: APR FC yegukanye igikombe cy’Amahoro na miliyoni 10 Frw itsinze Espoir FC
content:
APR FC yegukanye igikombe cy’Amahoro cya 2017 itsinze Espoir FC ku mukino wa nyuma , itsinze igitego kimwe ku busa, biyihesha itike yo kuzasohokera u Rwanda mu mikino ya CAF Confederation Cup umwaka utaha.
Espoir FC yakoze amateka yo kugera ku mukino wa nyuma w’igikombe cy’Amahoro isezereye Rayon Sports muri ½ ariko ntibyayihiriye ko icyura igikombe i Rusizi. Mulisa n’abahungu be bageze ku mukino wa nyuma banyagiye Amagaju FC ibitego 6-1, baje kuri uyu wa Kabiri babizi neza ko kwegukana iki gikombe ariyo mahirwe yonyine bafite yo kubona itike yo kuzasohokera u Rwanda umwaka utaha kuko itabashije kwegukana icya shampiyona cyatwawe na Rayon Sports. Iyi kipe y’Ingabo z’igihugu yatangiye yataka cyane ku munota wa kabiri ibona coup franc ku ikosa ryari rikorewe kuri Hakizimana, gusa ayiteye umuzamu wa Espoir FC Isingizwe ahita awufata neza. APR FC yakomeje gukina neza ariko bitewe n’ubwugarizi bwa Espoir FC bumeze neza dore ko no muri shampiyona ariyo yatsinzwe ibitego bike nyuma ya Rayon Sports, bukagerageza gukiza izamu. Gusatira kwa APR FC kwatumye Espoir FC itangira gukora amakosa, ku munota wa 14 umusifuzi atanga ikarita ya mbere y’umuhondo kuri Wilondja Albert wari akoreye ikosa kuri Rusheshangoga. Espoir FC yakomeje kurushwa gusa uburyo bukomeye bwari bwamaze no guhagurutsa abafana ba APR FC bwabonywe na Imanishimwe Emmanuel wazamukanye umupira ku ruhande, acenga myugariro Mutunzi Clement agwa hasi, agera mu rubuga rw’amahina ashatse gushyira mu rushundura abakinnyi ba Espoir FC bawushyira hanze. Byarangiye iyi kipe yari yakomeje kotsa igitutu izamu rya Espoir FC ibonye igitego ku munota wa 38 cya Bizimana Djihad ku makosa ya myugariro Bakundukize Adolphe wafashe umupira mu rubuga rw’amahina nk’aho yagakijije izamu awihera Nshimiyimana Imran. APR FC ntiyarekeye aho yakomeje gushaka igitego cya kabiri cy’umutekano, Nshuti Innocent na Issa Bigirimana bagerageza uburyo bamenera mu bwugarizi bwa Espoir FC gusa bwari buhagaze neza igice cya mbere kirangira ari igitego 1-0. Mu gice cya kabiri, APR FC yabonye koluneri ebyiri zikurikirana gusa ntizagira icyo zibyara. Umutoza wa Espoir FC Ndayizeye Jimmy yabonye ko bitoroshye akora impinduka ebyiri yinjiza Habyarimana Faustin asohora Wilondja Albert anasimbuza Bakundukize Adolphe aha umwanya Bugingo Samson mu gihe APR FC nayo yasimbuzaga Issa Bigirimana igaha Sekamana Maxime umwanya. Abafana ba APR FC bari batangiye kuririmba bishimira igikombe bitewe n’uburyo ikipe yabo yihariraga umukino, isatira ubutitsa bigaragara ko ishaka icya kabiri ku bubi n’ubwiza. Umukino ugana ku musozo APR FC yakoze izindi mpinduka iha umwanya Tuyishime Eric asimbuye Imran Nshimiyimana naho Twizerimana Onesme asimbura Nshuti, gusa ntacyo byahinduye kuko Espoir FC yakomeje kubyitwaramo neza, irinda izamu ntiyongera kwinjizwa igitego kugera umusifuzi arangije umukino. APR FC yatahanye miliyoni 10 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda n’igikombe, Espoir FC yatsindiwe ku mukino wa nyuma ihabwa miliyoni eshatu mu gihe Rayon Sports yatahanye umwanya wa gatatu yabonye ebyiri, Amagaju FC ahabwa imwe. APR FC: Kimenyi Yves, Ngabo Albert, Nsabimana Aimable, Rusheshangoga Michel, Imanishimwe Emmanuel,Nshimiyimana Imran, Mukunzi Yannick, Bizimana Djihad, Bigirimana Issa, Muhadjili Hakizimana , Nshuti Innocent Espoir FC: Isingizwe Patrick, Mutunzi Clement, Wa Losambo Moninga, Mbogo Ally, Wilondja Jacques, Dushimumugenzi Jean, Nkurunziza Felcien, Bainla Bao, Renzaho Hussein, Murungura Wilondja Albert, Bakundukize Adolphe




Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Ishema ry’abongereza ku ruhando rw’I Burayi bambariye guhigika mukeba Manchester United
content:
Ku nshuro ya mbere mu mateka Liverpool na Manchester United, abake b’ibihe byose bahuriye mu mukino wa UEFA EUROPA League. Umukino ubanza Liverpool yatsindiye Anifield ibitego 2-0. Naho uwo kwishyura ni kuri uyu wa 17 Werurwe I Oldtraford.
 Liverpool iyoboye andi makipe yo mu bwongereza mu kugira ibikombe byinshi bya Championsleague, ifite 5. Ikurikirwa n’iyi Manchester United yo ifite 4. Muri shampiyona, Manchester United niyo iyoboye kukoimaze gutwara 20, gusa nayho ikurikirwa na Liverpool ifite 18. Ibi rero nibyo biha uburemere ubukeba bw’aya makipe kuko kuri uu ariwo mukino ukomeye mu gihugu cy’ubwongereza
Ibitego 2-0 Liverpool yatsindiye Anifield mu mukino ubanza byabahaye imbaraga n’icyizere byo gutegure neza umukino wo kwishyura. Ngo intego yabo ni ukubona igitego ku kibuga cya Man.Utd maze bakica imibare yayo. Baramutse babigezeho bakabona igitego kimwe, Man Utd yasigara isabwa ibitego bine kugirango isezerere Liverpool.
 Umutoza wa Liver Pool,Jurgen Klopp  Daniel Sturridge na Roberto Firmino bafashije Jurgen Klopp kwandika amateka yo gutsinda umukino wa mbere uhuje aya makipe ku mugabane w’I Burayi. Aganira na Liverpool Echo, Daniel Sturrigde yavuzeko bagomba gukina umukino wo kwishyura nkaho ari finale ati “icyizere ni cyose mu rwambariro kandi twiteguye gukora akazi neza mu buryo bwose” Agaciro ka EUROPA ntikakiri igikombe gusa, hariho ko ikipe itwaye igikombe ihabwa n’ikite yo kwitabira UEFA Championsleague. Ibi rero ngo ni imwe mu nzira Liverpool igomba gukoresha mu kugera muri Champions league Yanditswe na Rukundo Xaver/Muhabura.rw

title: MTN Rwanda yagejeje ku isoko internet yihariye ikoreshwa mu rugo
content: Igitekerezo cyo gutanga internet yo mu rugo gifite imizi mu mpera za 2019, MTN Rwanda yakigize mu gukomeza gufasha abakiliya bayo no kuborohereza gukora akazi bari mu ngo zabo nta nkomyi. Ni internet nk’isanzwe ikoreshwa mu biro ariko ishyirwa mu rugo binyuze mu gushyiraho antene [ihuzwa n’umunara uri hafi] na router ishobora gutanga internet nziramugozi [wireless] cyangwa umufatabuguzi akifashisha umugozi [cable]. Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ubucuruzi muri MTN Rwanda, Ndoli Didas, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyo internet ifite umwihariko kuko umuntu agura umuvuduko w’iyo ashaka aho kugura megabyte nkuko abakoresha telefoni babigenza. Yagize ati “Ni internet ifite umuvuduko nk’usanzwe dutanga mu biro hakoreshejwe fibre optique. Twazanye ikoranabuhanga ryoroshye abantu bashobora gukoresha bakayigeza mu rugo mu buryo bwihuse.’’ Ndoli yavuze ko iyo internet ishobora kuba igisubizo ku bana bigira mu rugo cyangwa abandi bahakorera akazi. Ati ‘‘Internet tuyitanga mu buryo bw’umuvuduko, nta mupaka uri ku byo umanura (dowload) n’ibyo ushyiraho (upload) mu kwezi kose.’’ MTN Rwanda yagennye ko umufatabuguzi ashobora guhitamo kuva kuri megabyte imwe ku isegonda [1Mbps-iyi aba ari ingano y’ibyo ashobora gukoresha iyo internet], kugera kuri 25 MB ku isegonda. Ndoli yavuze ko ‘‘Twasanze ari ngombwa ko tubasangisha internet mu rugo kuko ibihe tugezemo umuntu aba akorana n’abo badahuje amasaha ku buryo hari igihe bakenerana ariko atakiri mu kazi, ni byiza kugira internet mu rugo ku buryo woroherwa no gukora ibyo ushaka igihe cyose.’’ Kuva mu byumweru bibiri bishize, mu isuzuma ryo gutanga internet yo mu rugo, ingo zisaga 150 zarayihawe kandi abayigejejweho biganjemo ab’i Kigali banyuzwe n’imikorere yayo. Ati ‘‘Internet yo mu rugo urayikeneye, kuko nk’iya telefoni ushobora kuba uri kuyivugiraho ikagenda buhoro ariko iyo mu rugo ifite umuvuduko uri hejuru, buri wese ashobora kuyikoresho kandi mu buryo buhoraho.’’ Uwasabye ashobora guhabwa internet mu gihe kitarenze amasaha 48 ku bari mu Mujyi wa Kigali, mu gihe mu ntara bitarenza iminsi ine. Ikiguzi cyo guhabwa antene (point to point) igufasha kubona internet mu rugo rwawe, cyaramanuwe kivanwa ku 300 000 Frw ku biro gishyirwa ku bihumbi 50 Frw ku yo mu rugo. Iyo umuntu yayihawe hakurikiraho kugura ya yindi ya buri kwezi bitewe n’umuvuduko yifuza. MTN yatanze umurongo wa 3111 wo guhamagara ngo abakeneye ibisobanuro birambuye kuri internet cyangwa ubufasha bagerweho bwangu. MTN Rwanda ifite ubunararibonye bw’imyaka isaga 20 imaze itanga serivisi z’itumanaho mu Rwanda. Izwi muri serivisi zo guhamagara, internet, kwishyurana hifashishijwe uburyo bwa Mobile Money n’ibindi byagize uruhare rukomeye mu iterambere ry’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda. MTN ni wo muyoboro wa telefoni ukoreshwa na benshi mu Rwanda aho basaga miliyoni enye mu gihe internet yayo igera mu gihugu hose ku kigero cya 99%, ubariyemo ahakoreshwa 4G na 3.75G ndetse na fibre optique. Mu kwagura umuyoboro wayo, iyi sosiyete yashoye miliyari 130 Frw mu kubaka ibikorwa remezo mu myaka itanu.

title: Ese wari uzi ibanga ry’ibintu abagabo bakunda ku bagore babo?
content:
Ubusanzwe abagabo muri kamere yabo ntibakunda ibintu by’iraha, ndetse ahanini usanga banashimishwa n’utuntu duto cyane, usanga akenshi tunagoye kutumenya, ariko urubuga rwa internet yourtango.com ruvugako hari ibintu 10 byoroheje abagabo bakunda kandi bakanezezwa nabyo.
