Dore 7 muri byo ni ibi bikurikira : Kwitabwaho no kugaragarizwa urukundo Abagabo ngo bishimira kandi bagakunda abagore babitaho bakanabagaragariza urukundo harimo nko kumuha impano zitunguranye kabone n’ubwo yaba ihendutse, kumutegurira ifunguro akunda umutunguye, kumubwira ko akurutira abandi bagabo bose n’ibindi. .
Kwerekwa ko gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsina nabo ari iby’agaciro
Gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsina ni ingenzi ku bakundanye Burya ngo abagabo benshi bakunda abagore babereka ko bishimiye gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsina nabo bakabonako atari ukubihatira abagore babo ahubwo ko nabo baba babakeneye. Birabashimisha cyane kandi bakabikunda kuruta abagore basa n’aho babihatirwa cyangwa se batabyitayeho. Ukuri Burya ngo abagabo aho bava bakagera banga umuntu ubabeshya, ahubwo ubakoreye ikosa ugasaba imbabazi ubabarirwa vuba ariko ngo iyo akuvumbuye wamuhishe ukuri niho bishobora kuba bibi mu rukundo cyangwa se no murugo Umutuzo Burya ngo n’iyo baba bajya basahinda ariko bakunda abagore babaha umutuzo , kuko ngo bituma bumva baguwe neza, ntibakunda abagore babajagaraza, babatesha umutwe, ahubwo bifuza ababatwara gahoro. Gutegurirwa ifunguro rya nijoro Kuko ngo abagabo baba biriwe mu kazi burya ngo amafunguro ya saa sita ntakintu kinini amara mu kubagarira urukundo, ariko ngo iyo batashye bakitse imirimo baba bashaka ko abagore babo babitaho bakabategurira amafunguro. Aha rero ngo usanga bayafashe banezerewe kandi bikavuga byinshi mu buzima bwabo kuko ngo aricyo gihe baba babonye cyo gutekereza no kuruhuka bitonze.Ngo iyo umugabo abikorewe biramushimisha cyane Kumvwa
Bakunda gutegwa amatwi kuko ngo bibereka ko bahawe agaciro. Ubukwe

title: Uwabaye miss  w’u Rwanda 2012 yambitswe impeta y’urukundo asuka amarira(REBA AMAFOTO)
content:
Miss Mutesi Aurore yambitswe impeta y’urukundo n’umusore bakundana
 Mutesi Aurore wabaye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2012 yambitswe impeta y’urukundo na Egide Mbabazi bamaze igihe kirekire bakundana amusaba kumubera umugore bakinjira mu buzima bazabanamo akaramata. Mu mpera z’umwaka wa 2014 byatangiye kuvugwa ko Miss Mutesi Aurore ari mu rukundo na Mbabazi Egide, ntibigeze babihakana cyangwa ngo bihishire dore ko kenshi wasangaga amafoto yabo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse banabwirana amagambo meza y’urukundo. Umuvandimwe wa Miss Mutesi Aurore abinyujije kuri Instagram [@gracekamu] yahishuye ibihe by’umunezero w’ikirenga uyu Nyampinga yagize ubwo yambikwaga impeta na Mbabazi Egide bitegura ku rushinga mu mafoto n’amashusho aherekejwe n’amagambo ashimangira ko yishimiye urugendo bagiye kwinjiramo. Yagize ati "Ibyishimo ni ukubona murumuna wanjye yishimye nk’uku. Ku bw’urugendo rushya mwembi mutangiye, Imana yonyine niyo yabasha kugera ku mutima wanjye ngo imenye ibyiyumviro mbafiteho." Mbabazi Egide yambikiye impeta Miss Mutesi Aurore muri Pariki ya Grand Canyon iherereye i Las Vegas muri Leta ya Nevada muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nubwo bo ubwabo bataragira icyo batangaza kuri aya makuru. Uyu mukunzi wa Mutesi Aurore, aherutse kuza mu Rwanda mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka muri gahunda zitandukanye zirimo gusura inshuti n’imiryango ndetse yagaragaye mu gitaramo cya Kayirebwa na Kidum


Uwabaye miss  w’u Rwanda 2012 yanbitswe impeta y’urukundo asuka amarira









Chief editor

title: East Africa Got Talent yamaganye ibyatangajwe na Leta y’u Burundi ku itorero ry’abakaraza ryitwa Himbaza rivuza ingoma ...
content: Kompanyi ya Clouds Media International FZ itegura amarushanwa ya East Africa Got Talent yatangaje ko abavuza ingoma z’i Burundi muri iri rushanwa baje ku giti cyabo batoherejwe na Leta. Leta y’u Burundi kuwa kabiri yatangaje ko izakurikirana itorero - ryiganjemo Abarundi b’impunzi ziba mu Rwanda ryagaragaye rivuza ingoma muri iri rushanwa mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize. Minisitiri w’imico n’inkino mu Burundi yasohoye itangazo rivuga ko "bagaya imyifatire y’itsinda ry’abantu bashatse kwiba no kwiyitirira umurishyo w’ingoma z’Uburundi". Muri iri tangazo bavuga ko iryo tsinda ryoherejwe na Leta y’u Rwanda muri ariya marushanwa. Clouds Media International FZ yaraye itangaje ko kwinjira muri iri rushanwa byari bifunguriwe buri wese utuye muri Kenya, Rwanda, Tanzania na Uganda hatitawe ku bwenegihugu bwe. Iri tangazo rivuga ko "abarushanwa biyandikisha ku giti cyabo, nta woherezwa na guverinoma iyo ariyo yose cyangwa ngo aseruke nk’uhagarariye igihugu mu buryo bwemewe". Iyi kompanyi ivuga ko yisegura kuri buri wese wababajwe no kuba bariya bakaraza barinjiye mu irushanwa, ariko yo ishimishijwe n’urunyurane rw’impano cyane cyane izerekana imico y’aka karere. Gusa Itorero Himbaza ryagaragaye muri iri rushanwa rivuga ko ntacyo ririfuza gutangaza ku byarivuzweho kuko rikiri mu irushanwa. ’Got Talent’ ni amarushanwa aca kuri za televiziyo (reality TV show) yo kugaragaza impano nta vangura, yatangijwe mu 2006 n’umwongereza Simon Cowell. Mu 2014 igitabo cya Guinness World Records cyanditse ko ibiganiro bica kuri televiziyo by’iri rushanwa aribyo biganiro bigaragaza ibintu by’ukuri birusha ibindi byose byabayeho kwamamara. Ku nshuro ya mbere ubu byaje mu karere k’ibiyaga bigari batoranya abafite impano muri Kenya, Rwanda, Tanzania na Uganda bakarushanyiriza hamwe. Amashusho y’irushanwa ari kugaragara kuri za televiziyo yafashwe mu kwezi gushize kwa karindwi i Nairobi muri Kenya, ubu yarekanwa icya rimwe kuri televiziyo zimwe na zimwe zo muri ibi bihugu. Chief Editor/MUHABURA.RW

title: Clapton Kibonge yatangiye gusohora filime “Umuturanyi” yanditse mu bihe bya #Gumamurugo
content: Hashize amezi asaga abiri [kuva ku wa 22 Werurwe 2020] leta ishyizeho ingamba zikomeye zirimo gufunga ibikorwa hafi ya byose mu gihugu hagakora ibyangombwa gusa nk’amavuriro n’amaguriro y’ibiribwa ndetse abaturage bose bagasabwa kuguma mu ngo. Kuva ku wa Mbere tariki ya 4 Gicurasi 2020 hanzuwe ko serivisi zimwe na zimwe zirimo ibikorwa bya leta n’iby’abikorera, amasoko na hoteli zisubukura imirimo. Mu gihe cya gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo, umunyarwenya akaba n’umukinnyi wa Filime, Clapton Kibonge, yakibyaje umusaruro yandika filime ye ya mbere. Yabwiye IGIHE ko muri icyo gihe yatekereje icyo yakora bitewe n’ubuzima yarimo agahitamo kwandika filime yise “Umuturanyi”. Yagize ati ”Igihe twari mu rugo erega wasangaga nta muntu mbona hafi usibye umuturanyi wanjye, naburaye ni we washoboraga kungoboka, iyo ndwara ni we wari kuntabariza ndamutse ntewe niwe wantabara.” “Umuturanyi” ni yo filime ya mbere, Clapton yashoyemo imbaraga ze akanayikina kuko mbere wasangaga akina izo bamwishyuye ameze nkuri mu kazi. Yakomeje avuga ko "Iyi ni iya mbere yanjye kandi numva igihe cyari kigeze.” Iyi filime izagaragaramo abakinnyi banyuranye ariko biganjemo abafite impano nka Khalfan usanzwe ari umunyamuziki, Kamanzi Didier uzwi cyane muri Filime Nyarwanda n’abandi bakizamuka. Clapton avuga ko iyi filime izajya isohoka buri wa Mbere w’Icyumweru hanyuma ku wa Gatatu hasohoke ‘DayMakers Comedy’ nayo ikaba umusaruro w’ibitekerezo uyu mugabo yagize mu gihe cya Covid-19. Filime “Umuturanyi” yayobowe na Nsengumuremyi Valens. Agace ka mbere ka filime "Umuturanyi" ya Clapton Kibonge

title: Dore uko icyumweru kizakugendekera bitewe n’igihe wavukiye (Horoscope)
content:
Iyi ni inkuru ngaruka-cyumweru ikubiyemo icyo abahanga mu byo kwitegereza ahazaza (les voyants) bavuga ku bizaba ku muntu uko icyumweru gitashye, ukurikije igihe yavukiye. Dore uko icyumweru cyo ku ya 08 kugeza ku ya 14 Mutarama, 2018 kizagenda.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 21 Werurwe na 19 Mata (Belier)  Mu rukundo  Muri iki cyumweru urukundo rwanyu muzarubamo nta bikabyo. Muziyerekana uko muri ndetse muzakuraho ugushidikanya kose abo mukundana bari babafiteho. Muzakenera ariko kwagura urukundo rwanyu bityo muzagirana ibiganiro byubaka n’abo mukunda. Kuri mwe ukuri kose muzishimira kukuvuga ahubwo munoze amagambo mukoresha mukuvuga. Mu butunzi Umutungo wanyu ushobora guhura n’amahirwe awuzamura muri iki cyumweru. Muzahura n’ibigeragezo binshi bibasaba gukoresha amafaranga mwibwira ko murimo kuvugurura ubuzima bwanyu. Muzabyitondere maze mubanze mubare neza mbere yo kugira amafaranga cyangwa undi mutungo wose musohora bitari ngombwa. Mu kazi Muri iki cyumweru muzumva mushaka cyane gushimwa bityo muzakora mutikoresheje ngo mubigereho. Akazi kanyu kazaborohera kandi muzabona ubufasha buturutse hirya no hino kandi muzabwakirane ineza gusa muzabanze mushishoze kuko siko bose bazaba babifuriza ibyiza gusa.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 20 Mata na 20 Gicurasi (Taureau)  Mu rukundo Muzanyurwa cyane mu rukundo kuko muzaruhundagazwaho yaba n’abo mukunda cyangwa se n’umuryango. Muziyumvamo icyizere cyinshi cyo gukomeza ubuzima kuko muzibona nk’abantu bakunzwe cyane. Muzafata umwanya wo kwiyegurira bya nyabyo uwo mukundana kandi bizabanyura mwembi mu gihe kirekire cyane. Mu butunzi Muzatangira gukora imibare ubabashisha gutangira gusohora amafaranga make cyane. Ibyifuzo byanyu byo gutera imbere no kugera kure bizababashisha kwiyima kugira ngo mubashe kwibikira iby’ejo. Mwitegure kandi kugira ibintu bitunguranye byo guhaha mu rugo. Mu kazi Gutekereza mu buryo bwiza bizabafasha mu kazi kanyu ka buri munsi muri iki cyumweru. Murasabwa kwitegereza cyane ibijyanye n’ejo hanyu mu murimo mukora kandi ibi mukabitangira nta gutinda kuko iki cyumweru ari icy’amahirwe kuri mwe.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 21 Gicurasi na 21 Kamena (Gemaux)  Mu rukundo Umutungo wanyu ushobora guhura n’amahirwe awuzamura muri iki cyumweru. Muzahura n’ibigeragezo binshi bibasaba gukoresha amafaranga mwibwira ko murimo kuvugurura ubuzima bwanyu. Muzabyitondere maze mubanze mubare neza mbere yo kugira amafaranga cyangwa undi mutungo wose musohora bitari ngombwa. Mu butunzi Muri iki cyumweru muzumva mushaka cyane gushimwa bityo muzakora mutikoresheje ngo mubigereho. Akazi kanyu kazaborohera kandi muzabona ubufasha buturutse hirya no hino kandi muzabwakirane ineza gusa muzabanze mushishoze kuko siko bose bazaba babifuriza ibyiza gusa. Mu kazi Muri iki cyumweru muzumva mushaka cyane gushimwa bityo muzakora mutikoresheje ngo mubigereho. Akazi kanyu kazaborohera kandi muzabona ubufasha buturutse hirya no hino kandi muzabwakirane ineza gusa muzabanze mushishoze kuko siko bose bazaba babifuriza ibyiza gusa.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 22 Kamena na 22 Nyakanga (Cancer)  Mu rukundo Muzigiramo impano yo kuvugisha ababikwiriye kandi muzabigiriramo amahirwe. Niba nta mukunzi mufite muzagira amahirwe cyane yo guhura n’abantu bazima. Ibi rero bizabafashe kongera ibiganiro n’umutima mwiza ndetse muzashyire imbere ibyo muzi neza ko mwifitemo byiza kandi byakurura ababakunda, bizabahesha kugira amahirwe yo guhura n’uwo mwamarana igihe kinini. Mu butunzi  Ubutunzi bwanyu buziyongera muri iki cyumweru cyane cyane bigendanye n’ingamba mufite zo kuzigama. Muri iki cyumweru igikomeye kizabagora ni ukugendana n’impinduka mu micungire no kugena uko mukoresha umutungo wanyu mwibanda ku kwizigamira cyane. Mushobora kuzabona amafaranga ku buryo buboroheye ariko ikizabagora ni ukumenya kuyakoresha uku bikwiye. Mu kazi Akazi kanyu muri iki cyumweru kazaba kihuta cyane kandi bizabashimisha cyane niba mukora ibyo mukunda, ariko niba ibyo mukora mubikoreshwa n’amaramuko gusa iki cyumweru kizabavuna cyane bityo murasabwa kwitonda cyane hato bitazabateranya n’abakoresha banyu. Muzashyiremo agatege bityo mwirinde ingaruka zaterwa no kwiteranya n’ababahemba.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Nyakanga na 22 Kanama(Lion)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru urukundo rwanyu muzarubamo nta bikabyo. Muziyerekana uko muri ndetse muzakuraho ugushidikanya kose abo mukundana bari babafiteho. Muzakenera ariko kwagura urukundo rwanyu bityo muzagirana ibiganiro byubaka n’abo mukunda. Kuri mwe ukuri kose muzishimira kukuvuga ahubwo munoze amagambo mukoresha mukuvuga. Mu butunzi Umutungo wanyu ushobora guhura n’amahirwe awuzamura muri iki cyumweru. Muzahura n’ibigeragezo binshi bibasaba gukoresha amafaranga mwibwira ko murimo kuvugurura ubuzima bwanyu. Muzabyitondere maze mubanze mubare neza mbere yo kugira amafaranga cyangwa undi mutungo wose musohora bitari ngombwa. Mu kazi

Muri iki cyumweru muzumva mushaka cyane gushimwa bityo muzakora mutikoresheje ngo mubigereho. Akazi kanyu kazaborohera kandi muzabona ubufasha buturutse hirya no hino kandi muzabwakirane ineza gusa muzabanze mushishoze kuko siko bose bazaba babifuriza ibyiza gusa.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Kanama na 22 Nzeri (Vierge)  Mu rukundo Ni byiza ko muri iki cyumweru mwirinda kwibikamo ibyifuzo byanyu ahubwo mukabigaragaza bityo mukimwa mutiyimye. Benshi muri mwe bazagera kure batigeze bagera na rimwe mu rukundo. Niba mufite abakunzi, bazabereka cyane urukundo ndetse no ku bumva mu mabanga y’urukundo. Ukwihangana kwanyu niko kuzabahesha gutuza mu rukundo kandi n’abo mukunda bazabiha agaciro. Mu butunzi
Muri iki cyumweru muzongera musubire mu mibare, mwitegereze neza aho amafaranga yanyu ajya ndetse n’inyungu abazanira. Mushobora kuzabona amafaranga mu buryo butunguranye kandi butangaje nk’inshuti ibarangiye ikiraka, amahirwe yo kubona umukiliya ubagurira umwe mu mitungo mwifuza kugurisha kandi byose biri mu nyungu zanyu. Mu kazi Muri iki cyumweru muzagira ibiganiro bibaha icyizere cyo gukemura ibibazo byinshi by’akazi ariko muzakenera n’ibihamya birenze amagambo kandi ibi muzabibona nimuramuka mwirinze guhisha ikibarimo. Guhanga udushya kwanyu bizabagirira akamaro muri iki cyumweru, ni byiza rero ko mwinjira neza mu ntekerezo zanyu maze ibitekerezo bije mukamenya kubibyaza umusaruro uko bikwiye.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Nzeri na 22 Ukwakira (Balance)  Mu rukundo Iki cyumweru kizaba cyiza kandi gituje cyane mu bijyanye n’amarangamutima yanyu. Gusa ananone murasa n’abashaka guhangayikira cyane ejo hazaza h’urukundo rwanyu. Murasabwa kwita cyane kubyo mubona uyu munsi kuko aribyo bizabubakira ejo hakomeye. Mu butunzi 
 Muzatungurwa cyane n’uburyo iki cyumweru kizabagendekera mu bijyanye n’umutungo wanyu. Muzasobanukirwa neza n’aho ibyo mukuraho inyungu bituruka ndetse n’icyerekezo bigenda bifata. Niba mubona mwari mwarafashe icyerekezo kitari cyo ntimuzatinye kongera gutangira bundi bushya kuko ubuzima bwanyu buzubakira kuri icyo cyemezo. Mu kazi Muzagira amahirwe yo kumenya kandi muzakoresha neza ngo muzamure urwego muriho mu kazi mukora. Muzahura na bamwe bazabafasha mu gutera iyo ntambwe kandi bazabafasha kureba neza imbaraga mwifitemo. Hagati yo ku wa Kabiri no ku wa Gatanu muzakora cyane kandi muzibanda ku bizamara igihe kirekire ariko muzirikana ko umusaruro wabyo muzatangira kuwubona nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Ukwakira na 22 Ugushyingo (Scorpion)  Mu rukundo Ni byiza ko muri iki cyumweru mwirinda kwibikamo ibyifuzo byanyu ahubwo mukabigaragaza bityo mukimwa mutiyimye. Benshi muri mwe bazagera kure batigeze bagera na rimwe mu rukundo. Niba mufite abakunzi, bazabereka cyane urukundo ndetse no ku bumva mu mabanga y’urukundo. Ukwihangana kwanyu niko kuzabahesha gutuza mu rukundo kandi n’abo mukunda bazabiha agaciro. Mu butunzi Muri iki cyumweru muzongera musubire mu mibare, mwitegereze neza aho amafaranga yanyu ajya ndetse n’inyungu abazanira. Mushobora kuzabona amafaranga mu buryo butunguranye kandi butangaje nk’inshuti ibarangiye ikiraka, amahirwe yo kubona umukiliya ubagurira umwe mu mitungo mwifuza kugurisha kandi byose biri mu nyungu zanyu. Mu kazi Muri iki cyumweru muzagira ibiganiro bibaha icyizere cyo gukemura ibibazo byinshi by’akazi ariko muzakenera n’ibihamya birenze amagambo kandi ibi muzabibona nimuramuka mwirinze guhisha ikibarimo. Guhanga udushya kwanyu bizabagirira akamaro muri iki cyumweru, ni byiza rero ko mwinjira neza mu ntekerezo zanyu maze ibitekerezo bije mukamenya kubibyaza umusaruro uko bikwiye.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Ugushyingo na 21 Ukoboza (Sagittaire)  Mu rukundo
 Amarangamutima azababana menshi cyane muri iki cyumweru. Ibyo bazabakorera, ibyo bazababwira, uko bazabitaho ndetse n’impano bazabaha bizakangura cyane ibishashi by’urukundo bibarimo. Urukundo ruzaza ku mwanya wa mbere mubyo mukora niyo byaba bitameze neza cyane muzihutira gukemura ikibazo cyose mubona kibangamira uburyohe bw’urukundo rwanyu. Mu butunzi Muzashaka gutangira impinduka mu bijyanye no gukoresha amafaranga yanyu. Umuryango wanyu uzababera umujyanama mwiza kubyo mushidikanyaho bitandukanye. Nyubwo aba bazasa n’ababagira inama zibagoye ariko nizo zizabafasha kwiga neza ku igenamigambi ryanyu bityo mugire imyifatire ikwiriye mu gukoresha amafaranga. Mu kazi
Muri iki cyumweru murasabwa cyane gushyira ingufu mu mitekerereze ibafasha gufata imyanzuro yongera imbaraga mu kazi mushinzwe gutunganya. Muzarangwa n’imbaraga zidasanzwe zo gukemura ibibazo bimaze iminsi byarababereye ingutu mu kazi. Ntimuzaheze ubufasha ubwo aribwo bwosemuzahabwa kuko buzaza bwuzuza imbaraga zanyu bityo ibintu birusheho kugenda neza kurusha uko mwabyirundaho bikaba byababaho byinshi.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 22 Ukuboza na 20 Mutarama (Capricorne)  Mu rukundo
 Nubwo ibiganiro byanyu bizasa n’ibitameze neza, muzabasha kugumana cya kibatsi cy’urukundo. Muzasa n’abiyibagirwa kugira ngo munezeze abo mukunda. Ibi bishobora kugera kure bigatuma uwo mukundana abyitwaza cyane hanyuma namwe mukaba mwakwisubiraho bikabatera gutekereza ibindi. Mu butunzi Ntabwo muzatagaguza umutungo wanyu ahubwo muzashyiraho amategeko y’icungamutungo akomeye azafasha umuryango wanyu kumererwa neza no kutagira icyo ubura. Mushobora kandi kwinjiza amafaranga mu buryo bubatunguye mu mpera z’iki cyumweru. Mu kazi
 Muri iki cyumweru nta kintu na kimwe muzemera ko kibavangira mu kazi. Muzagira amahame mashya yihariye azabagenga kandi ntimuzakundira uwo ariwe wese kubabuza kuyakurikiza, ibi bikazabafasha guhindura byinshi ku buzima bwanyu bwa buri munsi bw’akazi.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 21 Mutarama na 18 Gashyantare (Verseau)  Mu rukundo
 Muri iki cyumweru muzahura n’abantu mudahuje imico ariko nibo bazabaviramo inshuti nziza. Muzaryoherwa n’ubuzima bwo kugira uwo mukundana. Muziyumvamo umutima wo koroherana maze murusheho kuryoherwa n’ubuzima bw’urukundo ruzira intonganya. Muzatekereza byinshi binezeza abo mukunda. Mu butunzi Iki cyumweru muziyumvamo inyota ikomeye yo gutera imbere maze muhereye ku kugabanya ibyo muhaha bitari ngombwa cyane, mutangire gutekereza kuzigama umutungo wanyu. Muzagira amahirwe yo kunoza ubuzima bwanyu bwo guhaha no gusohora umutungo. Mu kazi Iki cyumweru kizabahira cyane ku murimo. Kubo bishobokera ni byiza ko mwasubira mu ishuri mukongera ubumenyi cyane cyane mu byo mukunda. Mushobora kwiyumvamo integer nke mu mubiri ariko akazi kanyu niba mugakunda kazabibagiza ibyo bibazo murusheho gukora neza.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 19 Gashyantare na 20 Werurwe (Poissons)
  Mu rukundo Ni byiza ko muri iki cyumweru mwirinda kwibikamo ibyifuzo byanyu ahubwo mukabigaragaza bityo mukimwa mutiyimye. Benshi muri mwe bazagera kure batigeze bagera na rimwe mu rukundo. Niba mufite abakunzi, bazabereka cyane urukundo ndetse no ku bumva mu mabanga y’urukundo. Ukwihangana kwanyu niko kuzabahesha gutuza mu rukundo kandi n’abo mukunda bazabiha agaciro. Mu butunzi Muri iki cyumweru muzongera musubire mu mibare, mwitegereze neza aho amafaranga yanyu ajya ndetse n’inyungu abazanira. Mushobora kuzabona amafaranga mu buryo butunguranye kandi butangaje nk’inshuti ibarangiye ikiraka, amahirwe yo kubona umukiliya ubagurira umwe mu mitungo mwifuza kugurisha kandi byose biri mu nyungu zanyu. Mu kazi  Muri iki cyumweru muzagira ibiganiro bibaha icyizere cyo gukemura ibibazo byinshi by’akazi ariko muzakenera n’ibihamya birenze amagambo kandi ibi muzabibona nimuramuka mwirinze guhisha ikibarimo. Guhanga udushya kwanyu bizabagirira akamaro muri iki cyumweru, ni byiza rero ko mwinjira neza mu ntekerezo zanyu maze ibitekerezo bije mukamenya kubibyaza umusaruro uko bikwiye. Ni aha mpiniye, ahasigaye mugire icyumweru gihire! Ni aho mu cyumweru gitaha.

title: Zimwe mu ntandaro z’ubusambanyi hagati y’abagabo  n’abakozi bo mu rugo
content:
Hakunze kumvikana cyane abagabo baryamana n’abakozi babo bo murugo rimwe na rimwe bakabatera inda,yewe kuri ubu kimaze gufata intera mu bibazo bituma ingo nyinshi muri iki gihe zitagira umutekano kuburyo usanga abashakanye bashwana bya hato na hato bikagera n’aho ingo zisenyuka burundu.
Biragoye  ko uwo wabibaza  atahita yumva neza  ibyo umubajije  bitewe  n’uko  ataba  ashaka kukumenera ibanga,gusa bamwe  bavuga ko igituma abagore bagirira abahungu  babakorera mu rugo urugwiro ari uko  abagabo nabo atari shyashya  aho batagikora inshingano zabo  mu rugo. 
  Aha hari ubuhamya butandukanye bwatanzwe n’impande zitungwa agatoki ndetse n’impuguki mu by’imibanire yo mungo.
  Kampire Devota(si izina rye)  ni umukobwa umaze imyaka itanu akora akazi ko mu rugo mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Uyu avuga ko  ahantu hose yagakoze  mu ngo  ni abagabo babiri gusa bamusabye ko baryamana . Aha  yagize ati “Mu ngo enye maze gukoramo, nahuye n’abagabo babiri bansaba ko twaryamana . Uwa mbere nabonaga abiterwa nuko nta kazi yagiraga tukirirwana mu rugo kandi umugore aza atinze ari njye ubazwa byose ariko sinamwemereye.”
 Uwa kabiri we ngo yamusabye kumubwira impamvu imutera kumwifuza kandi afite umugore mwiza n’ubwo yazaga gake kuko yakoreraga kure, ngo amubwira ko nta mpamvu yo guhora urya indyo imwe kandi inzu yuzuye ibyo kurya, uyu ngo yaje no kugera ku mugambi we ariko abonye umugore we azabimenya amuha amafaranga aramwirukana. Undi  mukobwa  Avuga ko yatewe inda na shebuja kuko nyirabuja yari yaragiye kwiga atahaba. Avuga ko yamaranye umwaka n’igice na shebuja nyuma shebuja aza kumubwira ko ubuzima butakomeza gutyo nyirabuja aje, ko azajya amufashiriza iwabo. Ati “Mabuja yari yaragiye kwiga, bari bafite umwana umwe w’imyaka itatu, aramunsigira ambwira ko nta kibazo nzakomeza kubana neza na ‘boss’ kuko umwana wabo yarankundaga kandi babona nzi kumwitaho, ubwo nakomeje kubana na ‘boss’ mu nzu, hashize amezi atatu mabuja agiye nibwo yaje kunsaba ko turyamana. Nahise nemera kuko naramutinyaga kandi yambwiraga ko nta kibazo tuzajya dukoresha agakingirizo ariko byaje kurangira bibaye akamenyero tuba nk’umugore n’umugabo dore ko ari nanjye wamwitagaho muri byose.”
 Akomeza agira “Hashize umwaka n’igice yaje kumbwira ko mabuja agiye kuza kandi tutakomeza kubana gutyo ahari, ansaba ko nsubira iwacu hanyuma akajya amfasha kurera umwana ndetse yanankenera akanyoherereza amafaranga tugahura. Yarabyubahirije kuko nyuma yajyaga ampamagara ndetse akananyoherereza amafaranga ariko rimwe narwaje umwana ndamuhamagara ngira ngo mumenyeshe ndamubura hashira nk’ukwezi. Naje kugaruka aho bari batuye bambwira ko bagiye hanze mubura gutyo, naje kubona ubuzima butazoroha umwana musigira iwacu ngaruka mu kazi ngo njye mubonera icyo yambara.”
  Ubuhamya bwa Clarisse we butandukanye n’ubw’agenzi be
 Clarisse  mu buhamya  bwe  yagize  ati “Ubu nacitse  ku gukorera  ingo zirimo  abagabo, natangiye  gukora akazi  ko  mu rugo mu mwaka  wa 2014, aho nabanje  mbere  yo  kujya  aho  nkora  ubu nabanaga n’umugabo  n’umugore  ariko  nkahora  mbona  batajya  bishimana. Ubwanjye  nari ntarabona  umugore na  rimwe  asekera  umugabo  we  cyangwa  ngo  umugabo  yereke  umugore  ko  amukunze,ni  njye  watekaga, nkamesera  umugabo, nkatera  ipasi, yewe  n’icyumba  umugore  yajyaga  kugenda  akansigira  urufunguzo  ngo  ngitunganye  kugera  ku  makariso  yabo  ni  njye  wayamesaga… Umwana  muto  wabo  yari  afite  imyaka ine ariko ntibajyaga  bisanzura  ku mubyeyi  n’umwe  kuko  wasangaga  banyishimiye  kurusha  nyina". 
 Yungamo ati"Rimwe umugore yari yatinze gutaha, umugabo yaje kunyegera  ambwira  ko  umugore  we  ngo nta kigenda ngo ntabwo amushimisha mu buriri, ngo ntamubona iyo amukeneye, ngo  amuhoza ku nkeke…ngo namumara ako gahinda kuko n’ubundi abona ari njye umumenya. Narabyanze  ndetse mbibwira mabuja, ariko icyambabaje ni uko ari njye wahindutse umunyamafuti maze  mabuja  ambwira
ko nshaka kumurarurira umugabo, yarankubise ndetse banyirukana batanampembye amezi atatu bari bandimo.”  Icyo abagabo bavuga kuri iki kibazo
  Kamali Claude atuye mu Gatenga avuga ko ahanini usanga abakozi bo mu rugo barahindutse nk’abagore kuko baharirwa inshingano ubusanzwe zireba umugore mu rugo. Uyu avuga ko iyo umukozi amaze kubona ari we wita ku rugo rero kandi abona mumeranye neza nawe arabyifuza akifuza gukundwakazwa nk’uko ubikorera umugore wawe. Aha rero iyo hagize akantu gato kabaho k’agatotsi hagati yanyu bishobora kuba imbarutso umugabo akaba yakwigira ku mukozi kuko amuri hafi, nk’uko Kamari akomeza abivuga. Kamali ati “Burya umugore wese iyo yifuje umugabo akora byose ngo amugereho kandi akenshi biramuhira. Umukozi ushaka shebuja biramworohera kuko aba ari (rivale de proximité) uwo muhanganye ukuri hafi, kuko aba areba uko nyirabuja yiyitaho, nawe mu bushobozi bwe aragerageza kandi aba azi uko umugabo babana ameze n’ibyo yishimira. Akenshi kuri iki gihe usanga hari n’abakozi baba baraje gukora mu ngo ariko bafite intego yo gutwara abagabo b’abandi.”
 Yakomeje agira ati “Iyo urimo gukina n’ikipe uzi aho yoroshye kuyitsinda biroroha. Umukozi aba azi shebuja cyane azi na nyirabuja akamenya ibyo nyirabuja adakora ubundi we agashyira ingufu muri ibyo. Nyirabuja aba nyirabayazana noneho n’umukozi akabigiramo uruhare. Ikindi ni mu gihe aba ashaka kwihorera ku mugore wenda yamwimye kugira ngo amwumvishe.”
 Muneza Marcel wo mu Gatenga nawe asanga ibi biterwa n’uko n’uko  akenshi umukoze ari uko ariwe ugaragara cyane mu mirimo yo murugo aho anakora no mucyumba nk’umugore we  ikindi kandi ngo abagabo bagira umutima woroshye. Yagize ati “Ni gute umukozi azagukoropera icyumba uraramo, akagusasirira, akamenyera umugabo amakariso, amasogisi…ngo wagiye kwiga, ngo wagiye muri bya bindi byateye ubu ngo za ‘bridal shower’… wenda tureke imirimo yo kumesa guteka n’ibindi bisaba umwanya munini kandi nabyo mu gihe wabonye umwanya wabikora ariko niba umugabo atashye agasanga umukozi ahennye mu cyumba arakoropa, arasasa uburiri azabona ko n’ibindi yabishobora nyine abimubaze kuko abagabo tugira umutima woroshye.”
 Akomeza agira ati“Abagabo baryamana n’abakozi babo ahanini babiterwa n’uruhare rw’umugore iyo atamufata neza, ugasanga ahanini ariyo mpamvu abagabo bakunda indaya kuko nta soni zigira, burya biba byiza iyo umugore abaye indaya imbere y’umugabo we! Abagabo ni nk’abana bashimishwa n’utuntu duto, indaya iba ikurusha iki se? Si akarimi keza gusa? Kera umugore yatekeraga umugabo, akamumenyera uruhisho ariko ab’ubu ntubibabaze.”
 Gusa ariko nanone ngo ntihakirengagizwa uruhare rw’umugabo n’ubwo ngo atari runini kuko ngo uwaba asanzwe adafite ingeso ntago byamworohera gusuzuguza umugore yashatse amukunda imbere y’umukozi. Aha ngo usanga hari abagabo bahora bumva bakeneye kumenya abagore batandukanye bigatuma bahitamo abakozi kuko boroshye kubageraho kandi kenshi baba banabatinya. Twahirwa Maurice yagize ati “Abana b’abakozi bamwe baba ari batoya mu myaka no mu gihagararo ku buryo itandukaniro naryo ryagira uruhare mu bijyanye n’amabanga yo mu myanya ndangagitsina (umugore w’abana 16 igitsina cye nkeka ko gitandukanye n’icy’uw’abana 5) hari n’abagabo rero bahorana amatsiko yo kumva uko ahandi bimeze noneho ugasanga ku mukozi kumugeraho byoroshye cyane kandi bitamusaba byinshi kumubona.”  Icyo abagore babivugaho  Ibi kandi bishimangirwa na bamwe mu bagore twaganiriye bavuga ko bamwe muri bagenzi babo batakimenya inshingano zabo, gusa na none ngo ntabwo icya mbere ari ukujya guta ishema imbere y’umukozi. Clemence ni umukozi w’Ikigo cyigenga, yagize ati “Abadamu muri iyi minsi twaretse inshingano zacu, uti gute? Inkweto zimenywa n’umukozi, amasogisi, ipasi…ugasanga arategurira umugabo buri kimwe cyose ugasanga umukozi arabikora yiryamiye. Umugabo umwitayeho nawe amwitaho, niba umukozi ari we utegura icyayi n’ibindi azamugirira urukundo abone wa mugore ntacyo amaze.”
 Nirere we yagize ati “Iri terambere riradukoraho, gusa na none umugabo ujya kuryamana n’umukozi sinumva ko akwiye kwitwa umugabo! Ariko na none natwe abagore dusigaye twarateshutse ku byo dushinzwe kuko umugabo agushaka n’ubusanzwe uwo mukozi yari amufite, ugomba gukora byose nk’umufasha! Ariko numva mu gihe bitabaye ugomba kwegera umugore wawe ukamukebura byanze kandi urukundo rurihangana!”
 Clementine ni umubyeyi ufite abana babiri, nawe avuga ko uretse kuba ari ingeso ubundi abagore usanga bitwaza umunaniro n’akazi kenshi ntibakorere ingo zabo. “Biragoye ariko wabikora, ariko usanga umuntu agera mu rugo akiyicarira hariya ibintu byose bigakorwa n’umukozi, umunaniro ukuye mu kazi cyangwa izindi mvune ntabwo zikuraho ko ugomba gukora ibyo usabwa nk’umugore imbere y’umugabo wawe.”


Icyo impuguke mu mibanire abivugaho

title: Wa mupadiri uherutse gusezera kuri uyu murimo agiye gukora ubukwe n’umukobwa bakuranye
content: Padiri Nambajimana Donatien, wakoreraga ubutumwa muri Paruwasi ya Nyamasheke muri Diyosezi ya Cyangugu, uherutse gusezera uyu murimo w’ubusasurodoti akiyemeza inzira y’umukirisitu usanzwe ku mpamvu yise ize bwite agiye gukora ubukwe n’umukobwa bakuranye. Mu ntangiriro z’Ukuboza 2018 nibwo hasakaye iyo nkuru ariko gusezera uwo murimo w’abihayimana ntibyagarukiye aho, ahubwo Nambajimana yahise ava muri Kiliziya Gatolika ayoboka Itorero Angilikani, ubu asengera muri Paruwasi ya Remera. Gusa icyatumye asengera mu rindi torero nk’uko bamwe babivuga ni uko Kiliziya Gatolika itari gupfa guha umugisha isezerano rye n’uwo yihebeye, cyane ko yari yarayisezeranyije kuba umusaserudoti iteka ryose nk’uko iyo bagiye kwinjira muri uyu murimo basezerana babivuga.

title: Abanyarwanda baba muri Amerika batanze miliyoni zisaga 45 Frw zo gufasha abagizweho ingaruka na COVID-19
content: Mu gukumira ko iki cyorezo cyarushaho gukwirakwira mu gihugu, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe ingamba zirimo gufunga ibikorwa bitandukanye, ingendo zitari ngombwa zirahagarikwa, bigira ingaruka ku bantu benshi cyane cyane abaryaga ari uko uwo munsi bakoze. Guverinoma yahise itangira kugoboka bene abo bantu. Ubu imirimo myinshi imaze gusubukurwa, iheruka ni ingendo z’abamotari nubwo zigifunzwe mu turere twa Rusizi na Rubavu. Umuvugizi wa Diaspora nyarwanda muri Amerika akaba na Visi Perezida w’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba muri uwo mugabane, Emmanuel Muvunyi, yavuze ko bashimira Perezida Paul Kagame ku mbaraga n’ibyiza akomeje kugeza ku gihugu, harimo n’ingamba zo kurinda ubuzima bw’abaturarwanda mu kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19. Yavuze ko bijyanye n’ingamba u Rwanda rwafashe, rwabaye icyitegererezo birenga na Afurika, mu gihe nko kuri Amerika, kubera uburangare no gutinda gushyiraho ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwiza rya Coronanavirus, iki cyorezo gikomeje guhitana imbaga y’abantu benshi. Yakomeje ati “Natwe nk’abanyarwanda batuye muri Amerika mu mpanuro nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika adahwema kutugezaho, abatuye muri diaspora ni uko aho duherereye twaje guhaha ubwenge, ubumenyi no gushaka imibereho, dusabwa gusubiza amaso inyuma tukibuka n’aho dukomoka n’imiryango twasize inyuma, kutibagirwa igihugu cyatubyaye, kuko ni cyo cyatugize abo turi bo.” Ni muri urwo rwego bishyize hamwe bakusanya inkunga yo gufasha abaturarwanda babikeneye, kubera ingaruka za Coronavirus. Yakomeje ati “Abanyarwanda batuye ku mugabane wa Amerika bazakomeza gushyigikira gahunda za Leta ziteza imbere imibereho yabaturarwanda ndetse n’igihugu muri rusange.” Mu ibaruwa bandikiwe n’Umunyamabaga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Imari n’Igenamigambi ushinzwe Imari ya Leta, Richard Tusabe, ku wa 29 Gicurasi 2020, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yashimiye aba banyarwanda ku musanzu batanze. Yakomeje ati “Mu izina rya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, ndifuza kubashimira nabamenyesha ko twakiriye umusanzu wanyu ungana na USD 47.918,04, mu guhangana n’ingaruka zirimo guterwa n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 binyuze mu bikorwa byo kwita ku mibereho y’abaturage.” Iki cyorezo cyageze mu Rwanda muri Werurwe, kugeza ubu abamaze kwandura ni 397, mu gihe abantu babiri bamaze guhitanwa n’iyi ndwara.

title: Umuzimu wasaritse abarwanya u Rwanda uzorohera Twagiramungu na Rusesabagina bihuje?
content: Amasezerano hagati y’ishyaka RDI Rwanda Rwiza, rya Twagiramungu na MRCD, igizwe na RRM ya Nsabimana Callixte ‘Sankara’, ufungiwe mu Rwanda, PDR Ihumure na CNRD Ubwiyunge ya Gen. Irategeka Wilson wiyomoye kuri FDLR, yasinywe kuri uyu wa Kabiri i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi. MRCD niyo Nsabimana ‘Sankara’, yari abereye umuvugizi na Visi Perezida wa kabiri. Ifite ishami rya gisirikare ryitwa FLN, ikaba ari umutwe w’iterabwoba wagabye ibitero mu Majyepfo y’u Rwanda, bigahitana abaturage icyenda, 19 bagakomereka ndetse n’imitungo myinshi igasahurwa indi ikangizwa. Uwari umuvugizi w’uyu mutwe Nsabimana yumvikanye ku maradiyo ya BBC na VOA, n’imbuga nka YouTube yigamba ibyo bitero, avuga ko ari ibya FLN iyobowe na Habimana Hamada. Umusesenguzi mu bya politiki y’ibiyaga bigari, akaba impuguke mu itangazamakuru, Albert Rudatsimburwa, avuga ko kuba Twagiramungu yahisemo kwihuza ku mugaragaro n’umutwe w’iterabwoba, MRCD, bisobanura ko atakiri muri politiki gusa ahubwo yinjiye no mu iterabwoba. Avuga ko Twagiramungu yifuza guhirika ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda ariko akaba yarabuze uko abigenza, bityo akaba yihuje n’abandi babimazemo iminsi, ariko ku bwe iri huriro ntacyo ryageraho. Ati “Ni amagambo gusa, ni ukuvugira kuri radiyo hirya no hino ariko ntacyo bivuze, nta n’ikintu gifatika gihari”. Inenge kuri Rusesabagina na Twagiramungu Rudatsimburwa avuga ko aba bagabo bose bafite inenge izingiye ku ‘bushobozi buke’ butuma ubufatanye bwabo ntacyo bwageraho. Mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, Paul Rusesabagina yari umuntu usanzwe, yavukiye i Murama ya Gitarama ku wa 15 Kamena 1954, ariko nyuma yagiye gutura i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Uburyo abantu bamuzi bwahinduwe cyane na filimi Hotel Rwanda yamukinweho nk’uwarokoye abantu 1268 muri Hôtel des Mille Collines, abayobejwe nayo batangira kumuhundagazaho ibihembo kugeza kuri ‘Presidential Medal Award of Freedom’, yahawe na Perezida George W. Bush wa Amerika mu Ugushyingo 2005. Rudatsimburwa agaruka ku mateka ya Rusesabagina akavuga ko atari umunyapolitiki, ahubwo yari umuntu wakoreraga hôtel akaza kugirwa igitangaza na filimi bityo agatangira kwibaza ko uwo muntu uri muri filime ari we kandi atari we. Ati “Ni ukwisumbukuruza gusa kandi nta bushobozi afite uretse ko yabonye abantu bamwumva kuko bibaza ko ari wawundi wo muri filime ariko mu banyarwanda nta kintu avuze, ntacyo bamuziho uretse ibyo ahwihwisa mu maradiyo gusa n’ahandi”. Akomereza kuri Twagiramungu, akavuga ko we yabaye umunyapolitiki kuva kera ariko ubu akaba ari ‘umunyapolitiki wasigajwe inyuma n’amateka’, kuko uko u Rwanda rwateye imbere ntacyo bimubwiye akiri mu bya kera yari yaramenyereye ku ngoma zindi. Mu nteruro imwe Rudatsimburwa ati “Nta hantu bishobora kubageza kuko nta ruhare bafite no ku banyarwanda”.  Umuzimu wasaritse abarwanya u Rwanda bazawukira? Si ubwa mbere abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, bifatanyije bagashyiraho amahuriro ngo bahuze imbaraga bagere ku mugambi wabo ariko bikarangira bishwanyutse ntacyo bigezeho. Ingero ni nyinshi cyane. Ntawe utazi uko RNC ya Kayumba Nyamwasa yashwanyutse. Uguterana amagambo hagati ya Dr Théogène Rudasingwa na Kayumba Nyamwasa, bari bahuriye muri RNC, mbere y’uko bacikamo ibice, byatumye n’abo bizezaga ibitangaza bacika intege. Aha niho havutsemo amashyaka atemewe mu Rwanda arimo na RRM ya Nsabimana, nayo yacitsemo ibice mbere y’ifatwa rye kubera ubwumvikane buke, gusuzugurana no kutemera uburyo abayobozi bishyira mu myanya. Hari kandi n’amatiku hagati y’abasivili n’abahoze mu gisirikare. RRM igizwe n’abantu ahanini bavuye mu Rwanda bahunze ibyaha bakoze cyangwa andi makosa. Twagiramungu ubwe nawe yashinze ihuriro ry’amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta y’u Rwanda (CPC), ryari rigizwe na FDLR, UDR, RDI, CNR, na PS Imberakuri, igice cya gatatu. Abarigize baje kunaniranwa nawe bamushinja igitugu. Muri rusange iyo ugiye kwitegereza umuzimu wasaritse aya mashyaka, ni ugupingana no kuryana, buri wese arwanira kuba ku isonga no guhabwa ibyubahiro by’umukuru w’ishyaka cyangwa uzayobora igihugu igihe bageze ku butegetsi. Rudatsimburwa yongeraho izindi mpamvu abashinga aya mahuriro ntacyo bageraho ari uko ikibagenza ari inyungu zabo bwite, kwitwaza iturufu y’amoko n’intege nke basanganywe. Ati “Ubundi mu mvugo zabo usanga nka Rusesabagina afite akantu ko kuzana iby’amoko, RNC usanga ikibazo bafite ari umuyobozi mukuru. Ni uguhuza gusa ariko ubona ko bafite intege ziri hasi cyane, bakibaza ko guhuza imbaraga byatuma bazamura urwego rw’imbaraga zabo ariko akenshi ubona ko kuba ari abantu bifitiye gahunda zabo bwite, birangira akenshi bashwanye kuko hari aho batazahuza”. Rudatsimburwa akomeza agira ati “Ntibafite ingengabitekerezo ifatika yatuma babona n’imfashanyo, birangirira aho. Mu by’ukuri (Twagiramungu), aba ashaka kwihuza n’abandi kuko nta bushobozi na buke afite, niwe wenyine wibaza ko izina gusa rikurura ariko hashize imyaka 25 uriya muntu ntabwo azwi, ntawe yakurura, nta na benewabo yakurura.” Avuga ko FPR Inkotanyi yashobotse bitewe no guhuza mu bitekerezo byari bifitiye akamaro abanyarwanda bose yaba abari impunzi n’abandi bari mu gihugu babaho mu buzima bw’ingoma ya Habyarimana. Ati “Niyo mpamvu FPR yakuruye abantu n’ubushobozi bw’abo bantu. Ikindi harimo n’abantu bafite ubunararibonye bw’uko niba byanze muri politiki hari uko babikora bakurikije ubushobozi bwo gushoza intambara. Abandi ntabyo bafite, akenshi banafashwa n’abantu bashaka kugirira u Rwanda nabi ariko nabo kubera aho u Rwanda rugeze nta ngaruka yindi bifite uretse gukerereza iterambere ryabo”. U Budage ntibwakwicarana n’abahoze ari aba-Nazi Twagiramungu n’abandi bafatanyije kurwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, ntibasiba kumvikana bavuga ko bazagaruka mu Rwanda habaye ibiganiro. Rudatsimburwa asanga ntaho ibi biganiro byahera kuko u Rwanda rudaheza kandi ruhora rushishikariza impunzi n’abari mu mahanga gutaha, bityo n’abo bashaka ibiganiro bakwiye gutaha niba hari icyo bahindura ku cyerekezo cy’u Rwanda, bakagikora. Icyakora avuga ko harimo n’abantu kuganira na bo byagereranywa no kuvuga uti ‘u Budage bw’iki gihe bukwiye kwicarana n’abahoze ari aba-Nazi cya gihe cya Hitler’ kuko abuzukuru babo babisabye. Abo Twagiramungu yifatanyije nabo harimo abashyiriweho impapuro mpuzamahanga zibata muri yombi, Rudatsimburwa avuga ko nta kabuza uyu musaza agomba gufatwa nk’umuterabwoba kuko kuba yifatanyije nabo bivuze ko yemera ibyo bakora. Kugeza ubu ikibazwa ni ikidasanzwe ubufatanye bwa MRCD na RDI Rwanda Rwiza buzanye ku buryo bidatinze abantu batazumva iri huriro ryatewe n’umuzimu wasaritse abarwanya u Rwanda, nabo bagacikamo ibice.

title: U Rwanda rugeze he rukumira imyuka yangiza ikirere n’ibikoresho bikonjesha ikoreshwamo?
content: Aya masezerano agamije ko ibinyabutabire bya Hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs), akenshi bituruka mu byuma bikonjesha nka za frigo, ibitanga ubuhehere bizwi nka ‘Air Conditioner’ n’ibindi byacika burundu ku Isi, guhagarika ikora n’ikoreshwa ry’iyi myuka bikaba bishobora kugabanya dogere 0.5 ku gipimo mpuzandengo cy’izamuka ry’ubushyuhe bw’Isi mu myaka 100. Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuziranenge (RSB), Murenzi Raymond, aheruka kubwira IGIHE ko ikigo ayobora gifatanya n’igishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije (REMA) mu gukumira ko iyo myuka ikomeza kwinjira mu gihugu. Ati “Ubu rero iyo myuka iza muri ibyo byuma bikonjesha cyangwa se iza mu kubisana ntikinjira mu Rwanda kuko itemewe. Byumvikane ko ubu turimo kuyirwanya ndetse n’aho iri turimo kugenda dusobanurira abayifite ingaruka zayo kugira ngo aho ikoreshwa izagere igihe twihaye yarashize burundu.” Umuyobozi ushinzwe amabwiriza n’ubuziranenge muri REMA, Uwera Martine, yabwiye IGIHE ko hari imyuka imwe yamaze guhagarikwa burundu kwinjizwa ku butaka bw’u Rwanda. Ati “Ibyuma bikoresha umwuka [Gaz] witwa R22 birakumiriwe kwinjizwa ariko umwuka wo urinjizwa habanje gusaba uruhusa muri REMA. Hari ibindi byaciwe burundu byakoreshaga uwitwa R12 na R11. Ibyo yaba ibikoresho cyangwa umwuka bikoresha nta na kimwe cyemerewe kwinjira ku isoko ry’u Rwanda.” Yasobanuye ko impamvu uyu mwuka wa R22 ucyinjira mu gihugu mu gihe ibikoresho bikonjesha biwukenera byakumiriwe ari uko hari ibyinjijwe mbere kandi bigifite igihe cyo gukoreshwa. Ati “Tugomba kuba twabihagaritse burundu bitarenze 2030. Ubwo rero urumva, ntabwo umwuka bikoresha twahagarika kuwinjiza burundu. Tugomba kugera icyo gihe uwo mwuka tuwinjiza mu gihugu ku kigero cya 0%.” Uyu muyobozi yasobanuye ko hazashyirwaho gahunda yo guca burundu ibikoresho bikoresha uwo mwuka byinjijwe mbere mu gihugu ku buryo bizagera mu 2030, ababisanganywe nabo batakibikoresha. Ati “Ubu abantu bari kugura frigo n’ibindi byuma bitanga ubuhehere, turi kubashishikariza gukoresha izikoresha imyuka igezweho ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Ubu zamaze kugera ku isoko nta mpungenge n’imwe ihari, twe dufite n’icyizere ko tuzanagera icyo gihe abantu baramaze gutangira gukoresha izigezweho.” Kuba ubusanzwe ibyuma byinshi bikonjesha bimara igihe kitarenze imyaka 20, uyu muyobozi avuga ko bitanga icyizere ko bizagera mu 2030 nta muntu ugikoresha ibi byuma byahagaritswe kwinjira mu gihugu mu 2009. REMA ivuga ko hari inyigo igiye gukora izagaragaza ingano y’ibikoresho bikonjesha, bikoresha umwuka uhumanya biri ku butaka bw’u Rwanda.

title: U Rwanda ku mwanya wa mbere mu bihugu bizasurwa cyane muri Afurika mu 2020
content: Uru rutonde rwatangajwe ku wa 7 Ugushyingo 2019 rugaragaza ibihugu 30 bifite ibintu bikurura abakerarugendo, bitanga icyizere ko bizasurwa cyane kurusha ibindi mu 2020. Ibihugu byatoranyijwe muri uyu mwaka byatangajwe muri iki cyumweru ku rubuga TravelLemming.com rusanzwe ruteza imbere urwego rw’ubukerarugendo, mu muhango wabereye mu Bwongereza. Ku mwanya wa mbere hatoranyijwe Georgia, igihugu kiri hagati y’u Burayi na Aziya nk’igitanga icyizere cyo kuzasurwa cyane mu 2020 kubera urunyurane rw’imisozi iri mu gace ka Caucasus kandi kikagira imijyi ihendutse kuyibamo. Iki gihugu ngo gikunda gusurwa cyane hagati ya Mata n’Ukwakira. Iki gihugu gikurikirwa na Nova Scotia, Intara yo muri Canada ifite ibice bikunze gusurwa cyane birimo Pariki y’Igihugu ya Cape Breton n’ibindi. Ni igace k’ikirwa kihariye ku bwiza gakondo n’inyubako zitangaje gakunda gusurwa cyane muri Kamena n’Ukwakira. U Rwanda ruza ku mwanya wa kane inyuma Cook Islands iherereye mu Majyepfo y’Inyanja ya Pacifique. Ibirwa byihariye ku kugira umucanga wo kwidagaduriraho, ukundwa n’abakerarugendo cyane. U Rwanda rwihariye ku ngagi zo mu Birunga, Pariki ya Nyungwe n’izindi ngoro ndangamurage, Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi n’ibindi bikunzwe n’abakerarugendo, rukurikirwa na Kyrgyzstan, Equateur, Suède, n’ibindi. U Rwanda rukunze gusurwa cyane guhera mu Ukuboza hagati kugera mu ntangiriro za Gashyantare no muri Kamena na Nzeri. Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Kig0 cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB), Belise Kariza, yavuze ko “Twishimiye kwakira iki gihembo no kuba mu bihugu bya mbere bizasurwa n’abakerarugendo mu 2020 nk’uko byagaragajwe na travel bloggers.” Yakomeje agira ati “Iki gihembo tugisangiye n’abanyamuryango bose ba gahunda yo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda (Visit Rwanda), abashinzwe kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibidukikije n’ibinyabuzima, abakora mu bukerarugendo, amahoteli bagira uruhare buri munsi mu gutuma u Rwanda ruba ahantu hadasanzwe ho gusurwa.” Kariza yavuze ko ku batarasura u Rwanda bahawe ikaze kugira ngo baryoherwe n’ubwiza karemano, umuco n’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima birurimo.  Mu mpamvu u Rwanda rwatoranyijwe mu bihugu byahawe iki gihembo harimo kuba World Economic Forum iheruka kurushyira ku rutonde rw’ibihugu bifite umutekano muri Afurika kandi RwandAir ikaba iteganya mu 2020 gufungura icyerekezo gishya cya Kigali- JFK muri New York, ku kibuga mpuzamahanga cyitiriwe John F. Kennedy. Umwe mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka ka Travel Blogger katoranyije u Rwanda, Amarachi Ekekwe, yavuze ko rukomeje kugira impinduka zikomeye mu rwego rw’ingendo z’indege muri Afurika mu byiciro bitandukanye. Ati “Bizaba bishimishije gusura Kigali ukareba impinduka zitangaje n’imbaragaga ishyira mu kwita kuri Pariki z’igihugu.” Undi mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka Amanda Mouttaki, yavuze ko ‘U Rwanda ruri ku mwanya wa mbere w’ibihugu nzasura muri Afurika nkibonera byinshi mu mico itandukanye, ubwiza karemano bwarwo n’ubw’ingagi zikurura benshi, hari n’ibindi byinshi birimo ingoro z’umuco gakondo abantu bahasanga.’ Igihugu cya Afurika kiza hafi ni Namibia iri ku wa 13 mu gihe Ethiopia yo iri ku mwanya wa 30.

title: Rutangarwamaboko yakoze umuhango gakondo wo gutura Umuganura abakuru (Amafoto)
content: Umuganura  ni Umuhango ukomeye mu mateka y’u Rwanda rwo hambere  ari nacyo cyatumye Leta y’Ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda iwugarura ndetse ikawushyiriraho itegeko riwuha imbaraga ku buryo ku munsi wo kuwizihiza mu gihugu hose haba hari ikiruhuko. Uyu munsi mukuru udasanzwe ushushanya ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda. Ni umuhango wizihizwa buri wa gatanu wa mbere w’ukwezi kwa Kanama buri mwaka. Mu 1925 ubwo ubukoloni bwazaga mu Rwanda nibwo umuganura wacitse, leta zikurikiyeho ntizabiha imbaraga, leta y’ubumwe bw’abanyarwanda irangajwe imbere na Paul Kagame niyo yongeye kuwugarura. Rutangarwamaboko yakoze ibidasanzwe  mu  Bibungo bya Mukinga, mu Murenge wa Nyamiyaga, mu Karere ka Kamonyi ho mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo aho avuka ahakorera ibirori byo gutura umuganura ababyeyi bitungura benshi ku gasozi kose k’iwabo. Rutangarwamaboko yabwiye IGIHE ko ibi yakoze ari ukugarura umuco wabagaho kera mu muganura abana bagatura ababyeyi babo. Ati “Ni ukugarura umuco wa kera mu muganura aho abana baturaga umuganura ababyeyi babo nk’ikimenyetso cyo gushima imbuto n’imigisha babahaye, noneho ababyeyi bakawubasangiza.” Agaya benshi mu rubyiruko bamara gukura bakajya kwiga mu mahanga cyangwa se kuba i Kigali ababyeyi babo ntibongere kubaca n’irihumye bakazapfa bikubye kandi barabyaye. Mu byo uyu muryango mugari wa Rutangarwamaboko waganuye harimo umusaruro mwiza w’umwe mu bana bavuka muri uyu muryango wari wasoje icyiciro cya kabiri cya kaminuza witwa Uwase Niyonigenera Clenie wanakoze ubushakashatsi bwashimwe na benshi kuko yatangije uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga buzajya butuma abantu badatonda umurongo ku bitaro bishyura nk’uko byagendaga ahubwo bigakorwa mu kanya gato kuri telefoni. Umuganura wo hambere Mu muco nyarwanda ukiri umwimerere utarinjirirwa n’ibyateye, ababyeyi iyo babyaraga abana barabareraga bakabakuza, bakazanabubakira nabo bakaba abantu bakuru. Mu kububakira rero babahaga imbuto nkuru z’u Rwanda mu gihe babatekeshaga zirimo; uburo, Amasaka, Isogi n’Inzuzi.” Bababatongeraga babatuka imigisha bati “Bana bacu dore imbuto tubahaye muzabibe mweze, muzatunge mutunganirwe, muzabyare muheke, muzagire ubugiri n’ubugwiza maze namwe muzabone ibyo mutanga nk’uko namwe mubihawe”. Abana rero iyo bamaraga kubaka bakaremya, bakabyara bagaheka, bagahinga bakeza, bagahaha bakaronka, ntabwo barekeraga aho gusa ahubwo mu mpera za buri mwaka w’Umuganura wa Kinyarwanda, bazirikanaga ikintu gikomeye bakorewe gitumye bariho. Bakazirikana  isoko baturukamo, bakibuka abakuru maze bakegeranya imitwa n’abana n’inshuti n’abandi b’umuryango buri wese aho atuye bagahurira ku mubyeyi wabo mukuru bamutuye amature y’ishimwe ko imigisha yabatutse yinononsoye, ko baje gushimira kubaho kwabo n’uburere buruta ubuvuke bahawe, ko baje kuzirikana ko bafite aho bakomoka ndetse ko Abakuru batariho nabo batabaho. Bagatura  ababyeyi ayo mature agizwe na za mbuto nkuru, bagatura amata n’inzoga z’uburyo butandukanye cyane ikigage nk’amazi y’amasaka, bagatura amafu y’amasaka n’uburo maze bagasusurutsa ababyeyi batyo urugo ntirwigunge ngo n’uko abana barushizemo kuko bakuze bakubakirwa ingo zabo ahubwo bagahora iteka bashishira ababahaye kubaho, ibyo rero bikaba ariwo mugenzo witwaga ‘Gutura Umuganura’ mu muhango w’Umuganura. Iyo  abana bamaraga gutura ababyeyi ayo mature, ababyeyi nabo bafataga kuri ya fu bakavugira umutsima abana bakabazimanira n’ibyo kunywa cyane amata n’ikigage bikaba ari byo byitwa Gutanga Umuganura. Abana baturaga umuganura abakuru, abakuru nabo bakawutanga bakawusangiza abana n’inshuti n’abaturanyi b’umuryango bikaba ari ikimenyetso cyiza cyasigasiraga ubumwe bw’umuryango ntutatane, ntugire amakimbirane kandi yanaza bakayacoca kuko abasangiye batarasana. Ubwo kandi ababyeyi bakongera kubaha imbuto bazabiba ubutaha no kongera kubahesha imigisha y’Imana y’i Rwanda ngo bazahorane ishya n’ihirwe nabwo bazongere babone ibibatungisha n’ibyo batura nabo bagatanga bagatungisha abandi no gutura abakuru babatungishije kuko ngo indinda ari ebyiri mu muco nyarwanda: Ndinda Dawe na Ndinda mwana. Rubanda narwo rwaturaga umuganura abatware nabo bakawutura Umwami nawe akabona akaganuza rubanda, ko ari nako abana batura umuganura ababyeyi nabo bakabona bakabaganuza. Ibi bikaba ikimenyetso gikomeye ko Igihugu cyawe kiguha ibyo wagihaye. Rutangarwamaboko asanzwe ari umushakashatsi, umwigisha w’ubuzima bushingiye ku muco akaba n’inzobere mu by’umuco, amateka, imbonezabitekerezo (Filosofiya) n’ubuzima bwa muntu bushingiye ku myizerere, imyumvire, imitekerereze, imyitwarire ndetse n’imigirire. Ni nawe  watangije kandi akaba n’Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo Nyarwanda cy’Ubuzima Bushingiye Ku Muco, Kigamije Iterambere ry’Igihugu rishingiye ku muco biturutse mu bushakashatsi yakoze ku muco n’ubuzima ubwo yasozaga kaminuza. Umwaka ushize nabwo yakoze  ibirori bimeze nk’uko byagendaga hambere mu gusohora umwana no kumwita amazina. Ubwo yitaga izina umwana we  w’umukobwa bamwita w’imfura ye yise ‘Rutangarwamaboko Umugiramana’ mu gushimangira ko afite amahirwe n’imigisha ikomeye ku bwo kuba yaravukiye mu Rwanda.

title: Lionel Messi yahishuye uko yakiriye kuba Barcelona itarabashije kugura Neymar
content:
Kabuhariwe Lionel Messi, yahishuye ko yifuzaga bikomeye ko Neymar yagaruka i Camp Nou ariko atazi neza niba ubuyobozi bwa FC Barcelona bwaba bwarakoze ibishoboka ngo ibi bigerweho. Ibi ’La Pulga’ nk’uko bamwe mu bakunzi be bamwita yabitangaje mu kiganiro kihariye yahaye Sport, aho uyu munya-Argentine ubusanzwe uzwiho kudakunda kuganira n’itangazamakuru yagarutse cyane ku makuru yavugishije benshi mu bakunzi ba ruhago yerekeye igaruka rya Neymar muri FC Barcelona ariko isoko ry’impeshyi ryo kugura abakinnyi rigafunga bidakunze, uyu munya-Brezil akaguma muri PSG. "Mvugishije ukuri, nibyo. Nari gushimishwa nuko Neymar agaruka. Numva ababirwanije kandi ni ibisanzwe nyuma y’ibyabaye byose hamwe na Ney, uburyo yavuye mu ikipe n’uburyo yadusize. Ni ibisanzwe kandi birumvikana ko hari abantu benshi barwanya igaruka rye. Ariko urebye ku ruhande rwo mu kibuga (sportif), Neymar kuri njye ni umwe mu bakinnyi beza ku  isi ndetse kumugira mu ikipe yacu byari kongera amahirwe yacu yo kugera ku musaruro twifuza kugeraho.", Messi aganira n’iki kinyamakuru kegamiye ku ntara ya Catalan ibarizwamo FC Barcelona.

Messi na Neymar bagiranye ibihe byiza muri FC Barcelona ndetse bahinduka inshuti Bitandukanye n’ibyakunze kugarukwaho mu itangazamakuru, Messi yanyomoje ko atigeze asaba abayobozi b’ikipe ye kugarura byanze bikunze Neymar. "Havugwa byinshi…Gusaba ko agurwa (Neymar), sibyo. Ariko kandi twabiganiriyeho hagati yacu mu rwambariro ubwo twumvaga ko hari ayo mahirwe y’uko yagaruka. Twatanze ibitekerezo byacu ku kuba tubishyigikiye cyangwa tudashaka iryo garuka. Ariko ntabwo twigeze na rimwe tubwira ubuyobozi ko bagomba kumugura. Nta na kimwe twategetse (…) Ndi umukinnyi mu bandi. Ntabwo ari njye usaba ibyagakozwe. Ikintu kimwe gusa nifuza ni ugukomeza gutwara ibikombe.", Messi

Ubutatu bwabo, Messi, Neymar na Luis Suarez bwararyanaga Uyu kabuhariwe wa Barça yahamije ko Neymar "yifuzaga kugaruka", ashingiye ku biganiro byihariye bagiye bagirana, gusa Leo Messi avuga ko ku ruhande rw’ubuyobozi  bw’iyi kipe atazi neza niba bwarakoze ibishoboka byose ngo ibashe kumugarura. “Ntabwo mbizi. Mu kuri sinzi niba ikipe yarakoze ibyashobokaga byose kuko ntabwo mfite amakuru menshi ajyanye n’uburyo ibiganiro byagendaga (hagati ya PSG na Barcelona)”.
 Ikindi Messi yagarutseho muri iki kiganiro ni igurwa ry’Umufaransa Antoine Griezmann muri FC Barcelona avuye muri Atletico Madrid aho benshi mu bakurikiranira hafi bari bagiye bahamya ko abakinnyi benshi bakomeye mu rwambariro rw’iyi kipe batamushakaga muri abo hakaba harimo na Messi ubwe. Messi utashakaga kwinjira cyane muri iki kibazo yasubije umunyamakuru ati "Simuzi cyane (Antoine Griezmann). Ukuri ni uko bagiye (abandi bakinnyi ba FC Barcelona) mu mikino itegura shampiyona. Ubwo nazaga nari naravunitse ndetse sinitozanyaga n’abandi. Bagiye gukina imikino ya gicuti kandi ubwo bagarukaga twabonanye gake mu rwambariro. Ntabwo nari mu myitozo. Tuzagira umwanya wo gusangira ibintu byinshi." Ikiganiro kirambuye cya Messi

title: Qatar 2022: Amavubi yanyagiye Seychelles ibitego 10 mu mikino ibiri ahita yerekeza mu matsinda
content:
Mu rugamba rwo gushaka itike yerekeza mu matsinda yo gushaka itike y’igikombe cy’isi 2022 muri Qatar, ikipe y’igihugu y’u Rwanda, Amavubi yashimangiye intsinzi yayo inyagira Seychelles ibitego 7-0 mu mukino wo kwishyura wabereye kuri stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo, byasangaga 3-0 yari yayitsindiye iwayo mu mukino ubanza. Ni umukino byari byitezwe ko Amavubi agomba kwitwaramo neza akongera kwiyunga n’abakunzi bayo bataherukaga kuyabona atsinda imbere yabo. Ntibyatinze kuko ku munota wa 16 gusa w’igice cya mbere Bizimana Djihad yafunguye amazamu nyuma ya coup franc yari itewe neza na Muhadjili Hakizimana. Ku munota wa 27 Kagere Meddie yatsinze igitego cya kabiri cyahise gikurikirwa n’icya Jacques Tuyisenge nyuma y’amasegonda make ndetse uyu musore anatsinda igitego cya kane ku munota wa 33 ari nako igice cya mbere cyarangiye. Igice cya kabiri kigitangira ahagana ku munota wa 52 Meddie Kagere yatsinze igitego cya 5, mu gihe Yannick Mukunzi yaje gutsinda icya gatandati ku munota wa 56. Igitego cy’agashinguracumu cyatsinzwe na Muhadjili Hakizimana ku munota wa 79.

11 babanjemo, uhereye ibumoso: Emery Bayisenge, Yannick Mukunzi (yasimbuwe na Niyonzima Olivier Sefu), Djihad Bizimana, Ombolenga Fitina, Manishimwe Emmanuel (Mangwende), Kagere Meddie (yasimbuwe Sugira Ernest), Rwatubyaye Abdoul (yasimbuwe na Manzi Thierry), Kevin Muhire, Muhadjili Hakizimana, Kimenyi Yves na Jacques Tuyisenge Nyuma y’iyi ntsinzi u Rwanda rwahise ruba imwe mu makipe 14 yabashije gusanga izindi kipe 26 zo zitanyuze muri iri jonjora ryaciyemo amakipe yari ahagaze nabi muri Afurik ku rutonde ngarukakwezi rwa FIFA, bityo zihita ziba ikipe 40 ari zo zizavamo amatsinda 10 y’amakipe ane azashaka itike y’igikombe cy’isi. Ikipe 10 za mbere zizaba zazamutse ari iza mbere muri aya matsinda, hazongera habe tombola izahuza ebyiri ebyiri maze eshanu zizitwara neza abe arizo zizaserukira Afurika mu gikombe cy’isi. Uretse u Rwanda dore andi makipe yabonye iyi tike: Ethiopia,Tanzania, Equatorial Guinea, Liberia, Malawi, Zimbabwe, Djibouti, Mozambique, Angola, Togo, Guinea-Bissau, Sudan na Namibia.

title: Umunyarwandakazi ari guhatanira ‘Top Model Europe 2019’
content:
Top Model Europe riri mu marushanwa akomeye cyane i Burayi yerekeye ibyo kumurika imideli gusa ntabwo ari kenshi umunyarwanda yagize amahirwe yo kuyitabira ngo bimenyekane nka Mukamurigo Marie Chantal wageze mu cyiciro cya nyuma muri uyu mwaka. Si urugendo rwari rworoshye kuri we kuko yatoranyijwe mu bamurika imideli 3000 mu bihugu bitandukanye i Burayi bari bitabiriye, aza gutsinda ajya mu cyiciro cya nyuma kiri gushakishwamo uzahiga abandi mu 150 bari guhatana. Ati “ Ubusanzwe murika imideli, kandi kugira ngo bagufate ni ukuba wujuje ibisabwa. Mu gutangira twageraga mu 3 000. Bagendeye ku bintu bitatu basanga ndabyujuje, hanyuma turarushanwa bagenda batoranya tuza gusigara tungana n’abantu 150.” 
Muri ibyo bagenderaho harimo kuba uhatana yiyekerekana uko ari, kuba ari umunyamideli wabigize umwuga ndetse no kwerekana igitabo gikubiyemo umushinga wawe. Avuga ko ari intambwe ikomeye cyane kuko hari n’abandi benshi bashakaga kuba bahatana muri iri rushanwa ariko bakabura amahirwe. Ubusanzwe avuka i Rwamagana. Afite imyaka 28 y’amavuko, aba mu Bubiligi gusa afite ubushabitsi mu Mujyi wa Rubavu ndetse akenshi akunda no kuza mu Rwanda. Avuga indimi esheshatu zirimo Igifaransa n’Icyongereza akaba inzobere mu Buforomo, ariko yiyeguriye ibyo kumurika imideli. Ubu akorana na Agence z’ibijyanye n’imideli nyinshi n’ikomeye i Burayi yitwa People Choice ikorera mu Bubiligi. Mukamurigo aganira na IGIHE yagiriye inama abakora ibijyanye n’imideli mu Rwanda gukomeza gukora cyane no kwiga. Ati “Muri rusange ukuntu bihagaze ntabwo ari bibi kuko bafite ubushake ariko hakenewe byinshi byo kwiga.” Mukamurigo ari guteganya gushinga ishuri ryigisha ibijyanye no kumurika imideli no gutanga amahugurwa ndetse bibaye amahire akabona ibikenewe byose muri Kanama uyu mwaka uyu mushinga we yawutangira. Ati “Kuri gahunda yanjye hagati ya Kanama no mu Ukuboza 2019 nzaba namenye uko bihagaze kuko hari byinshi bisabwa, ariko nk’abana b’Abanyarwanda bashishikariye gukora akazi nkunda kandi nkora ngomba kubafasha.” Ibirori nyir’izina byo gutoranya Top Model Europe 2019 Mukamurigo Marie Chantal ari guhatanira, bizaba ku wa 17 Werurwe 2019. Top Model mu 2018 yabaye Léa Vanderroost wahigitse abandi bari bahatanye.

title: Goma: Bwa mbere hagaragaye umurwayi wa Ebola
content: Mu Burasirazuba bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo i Goma, umujyi uhana imbibi n’akarere ka Rubavu mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba bw’u Rwanda, hagaragaye umuntu udwaye Ebola. Ni amakuru yahamijwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri iki gihugu ndetse na OMS nyuma y’isuzuma rya laboratwari. Uyu murwayi ni umupasiteri w’imyaka 46 wageze muri aka gace mu gitondo cyo kuri iki Cyumweru cyashize avuye ahitwa Butembo, kamwe mu duce twashegeshwe n’iyi ndwara. Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri RDC yasabye abaturage gukomeza kuba maso no kurangwa n’ituze. Ubuyobozi kandi bwavuze ko ibyago byo kuba iyi ndwara yakwirakwira cyane muri uyu mujyi wa Goma biri hasi cyane kuko uyu murwayo yabonywe byihuse ndetse n’abandi bagenzi 18 bari kumwe muri bus bahise bamenyekana ndetse baratangira gukurikiranwa kuva kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 15 Nyakanga 2019 nkuko itangazo rya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yabishimangiye mu itangazo yashyize hanze.

title: Umutoza wa Rayon Sports yemerewe  amasezerano nyuma yo gushima umusaruro we
content:
Umutoza wa Rayon Sports w’agateganyo Ivan Minnaert agiye guhabwa amasezerano mashya nyuma yo gushima umusaruro we mu mikino mike amaze kuyitoza
 Ikipe ya Rayon Sports nyuma yo gusezererwa n’ikipe ya Mamelodi Sundowns, benshi bakemeza ko iyi kipe yitwaye neza ugereranyije n’urwego iyo bayikanaga isanzwe iriho, umutoza wa Minnaert byamuhaye amahirwe yo kuguma kuba umutoza mukuru w’iyi kip
Umunyamabanga uhoraho w’ikipe ya Rayon Sports Itangishaka Bernard, yatangaje ko bashimye umusaruro w’umutoza Ivan Jacky Minnaert watozaga nk’umutoza w’agateganyo wari mu igeragezwa "Ntabwo umusaruro ari muke, ahubwo tubona ko ari mwiza, kuko mwabonye ko n’umupira dukinnye n’iyi kipe yajujubije abandi, n’umutoza wabo yaje aratubwira ngo turi mu makipe yamugoye, kandi n’umutoza (Minnaert) yabigizemo uruhare, urumva ko tugomba kumuha amasezerano." Umutoza Ivan Minnaert yaje mu ikipe asimbuye Olivier Karekezi uheruka gutandukana n’iyi kipe agahita yisubirira muri Sweden, aho yari yahawe inshingano zo gukina imikino ya Shampiona ibiri irimo uwa Gicumbi na Marines yose yatsinze, ndetse n’imikino ya Mamelodi Sundowns. Niyomugabo Albert

title: Perezida Kagame yakiriye David Luiz na Didier Drogba mu bihe bitandukanye
content:
Nyuma yaho muri iki cyumweru U Rwanda rugize umugisha wo kwakira ibihangage bibiri muri ruhago, Didier Drogba wakanyujijeho muri Chelsea na David Luiz na we wubatse amateka muri Chelsea, PSG, ubu akaba ari kubarizwa muri Arsenal, Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 11 Ukwakira 2019 bakiriwe n’umukuru w’igihugu, Perezida Kagame. Nkuko imbuga nkoranyambaga z’ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu zabitangaje, ku ikubitiro Perezida Kagame yakiriye Umunye-Brazil David Luiz wari uherekejwe n’umukunzi we ndetse na nyina baraye bageze mu Rwanda ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kane.

Perezida Kagame yakiriye David Luiz, umukinnyi wa Arsenal wa mbere usuye u Rwanda mu bakiri mu kibuga

David Luiz yaje mu Rwanda aherekejwe n’umukunzi we, nyina ndetse n’inshuti yabo, Perezida Kagame ari kumwe na Clara Akamanzi uyobora RDB bakaba babahaye ikaze

David Luiz yahaye Perezida Kagame impano y’umwambaro wa Arsenal uriho numero ’23’ yambara ndetse n’izina PK bisobanuye Paul Kagame Ntihatangajwe icyo baganiriye, gusa ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu, Village Urugwiro byavuze ko "Perezida Kagame yakiriye umukinnyi wa Arsenal David Luiz uri mu gihugu ku bw’amasezerano y’ubufatanye  hagati y’iyi kipe n’u Rwanda binyuze muri #VisitRwanda."

Uruzinduko rwa David Luiz mu Rwanda rufitanye isano n’amasezerano yo kwamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda Arsenal yasinyanye n’u Rwanda Mu masaha yakurikiyeho kandi ni bwo Perezida Kagame yakiriye Umunye-Cote d’Ivoire Didier Drogba n’itsinda bari kumwe. Uyu mugabo washinze fondasiyo yitiriye izina rye ’Didier Drogba Foundation’ ari mu Rwanda kuva ku mugoroba wo ku wa Gatatu aho yari yaje mu ihuriru ry’urubyiruko nyafurika ’YouthConnekt Africa Summit’ aho yaganirije urubyiruko rwitabiriye iri huriro aruha impanuro.

Perezida Kagame asuhuza Didier Drogba

Bagiranye ibiganiro mbere y’uko Drogba ava mu Rwanda 
Mbere y’uko abonana n’umukuru w’igihugu, David Luiz yasuye urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali aho yashenguwe n’icuraburindi ryagwiriye u Rwanda, gusa avuga ko "binatanga isomo rikomeye kubona uburyo abanyarwanda bunze ubumwe bagafatanya kubaka ahazaza habo n’ah’abandi", maze abashimira mu izina ry’umuryango wa Arsenal


Amafoto David Luiz yasangije abamukurikira kuri Instagram ubwo yari ku rwibutso rwa Jeneside yakorewe Abatutsi rwa Kigali

title: Leta yatangiye gupima Coronavirus mu bamotari mbere y’uko basubira mu muhanda
content: Inama y’Abaminisitiri yo ku wa 18 Gicurasi 2020 yemeje ko ingendo zihuza Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali zizongera gusubukurwa ku wa 1 Kamena, ndetse ko ari na wo munsi moto zitwara abantu zizemererwa kongera gukora. Mu gihe habura iminsi ibarirwa ku ntoki ngo moto zongere gutwara abagenzi, kuri uyu wa Kabiri bamwe mu bamotari bapimwe Coronavirus, kugira ngo hirindwe ko bazaba intandaro yo gukwirakwiza iki cyorezo. Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Ngamije Daniel, yavugiye kuri televiziyo y’igihugu ko igituma abamotari bari gusuzumwa ari uko bizwi ko bazahura n’abantu benshi, bityo akaba ari ngombwa ko hamenywa uko bahagaze mbere yo gutangira imirimo yabo. Ati “Turashaka rero kugira itsinda risaga nka 1000 banyanyagiye mu mujyi ahangaha, buri gihe tuzajya dusuzuma turebe muri bo niba nta wanduye kuko bazaduha amakuru niba nta cyorezo cyaba kiri mu baturage, kuko ukuntu bagenda bahura n’abantu babatwara, nihagira umumotari wandura bizaduha amakuru y’uko hari ikibazo kiri mu baturage”. Yakomeje agira ati “Twabasuzumye, ubu twabifashe nk’igipimo fatizo muri kiriya cyiciro cy’abamotari, tuzabikurikirana buri gihe kugira ngo turebe uko icyorezo cyaba gihagaze mu Mujyi wa Kigali ndetse n’ahandi.” Minisitiri Ngamije avuga ko gusuzuma abamotari kandi bigamije kumenya uko ubwandu buhagaze muri bo, aho hafashwe ibipimo bimwe hagendewe ku myaka, aho batuye, ku buryo bizatanga ishusho y’uko icyorezo cyaba gihagaze mu bamotari. Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP Kabera Jean Bosco, yavuze ko hari umuco abamotari bakwiye kujyana ku itariki ya 1 Kamena 2020, wo gukaraba intoki, kwambara agapfukamunwa no kubahiriza intera. Ati “Bagomba kumva ko uwo muti wo gukaraba intoki bawufite, icya kabiri ni uguhana intera...kumva ko bagomba kwambara agapfukamunwa. Nibajyane umuco wo kumva ko amasaha yashyizweho ntarengwa yo kuba bavuye mu muhanda ari umuco”. Umuyobozi wa Ferwacotamo, Ngarambe Daniel, yavuze ko abamotari biteguye yaba mu buryo bazahagarara neza muri metero imwe, gukaraba ndetse no kugendana umuti wo gukaraba ‘alcohol’, ku buryo umugenzi ashobora gukaraba ndetse ugapuriza muri casque. Ati “Ibyo byose turi kubitegura ku buryo uzatega moto azaba yumva ko ubwirinzi buhari kandi ntagire impungenge ko ashobora kwandura ari kuri moto, kubigisha uburyo bashobora kuzaba bafite agapfukamunwa n’umugenzi utagafite ntibamutware”. Ngarambe yavuze ko hari uburyo buzakoreshwa mu kwishyura moto bwa ‘cashless’, aho hari uburyo bwo gushyira mubazi kuri moto ku buryo izajya yereka umugenzi amafaranga agiye kwishyura noneho hagakoreshwa ikoranabuhanga umuntu adafata amafaranga mu ntoki. Imibare yo kuri uyu wa Kabiri yerekana ko mu Rwanda abanduye Coronavirus ari 339, abakize ari 244, abakirwaye ari 95, nta muntu uritaba Imana. Ibipimo bimaze gufatwa ni 60 443.

title: Impinduka zitunguranye ku mukino uzahuza Rayon sport na Police FC
content:
Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda (FERWAFA) ryahinduye ikibuga n’amasaha ikipe ya Rayon Sports igomba kwakiriraho Police FC ku munsi wa 20 wa shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda. Uyu mukino uteganyijwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 30 Mata 2016, wagombaga kubera kuri Stade ya Kicukiro saa 15:30 ariko nyuma yo gusanga icyo kibuga ari gito nta bushobozi gifite bwo kuwakira wimuriwe kuri Stade ya Kigali saa 18:00. Ni mukino uzabanzirizwa n’uzahuza AS Kigali idahagaze neza muri iki gihe na AS Muhanga iherutse gutsindwa umukino wa mbere kuva imikino yo kwishyura yatangira. APR FC ya mbere ku rutonde rwa shampiyona iherutse gukura amanota atatu kuri Bugesera FC izaba yasubiye mu Burasirazuba gusura Rwamagana City irimo kurwana no kutamanuka mu cyiciro cya kabiri ikaba yaranihagazeho imbere ya Police FC mu mukino uheruka iyikuraho inota rimwe i Kigali.  Imikino yose y’umunsi wa 20 wa shampiyona  Tariki ya 30 Mata 2016
