Ibiciro by’inzu zo guturamo mu mudugudu uzwi nka Vision City, byagabanyijweho 60% ku bakozi ba leta bakeneye inzu zo guturamo zijyanye n’icyiciro bariho. Izi nyubako ziherereye i Gacuriro mu Karere ka Gasabo. (inkuru ya IGIHE) Itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB n’ikigo Ultimate Developers Ltd (UDL) gikurikirana uyu mushinga, rigaragaza ko abashyiriweho aya mahirwe ari abakozi ba leta batari ku rwego ruri hejuru y’Umuyobozi w’Ishami cyangwa urwego bingana. Rivuga ko kandi bagomba kuba ari ubwa mbere bagiye gutunga inzu haba no ku bo bashakanye ku bashyigniwe. Bazaba bemerewe kugura za ‘appartement’ zirimo iy’ibyumba bibiri, bitatu cyangwa bine, ku giciro cyagabanyijwe. Muri ubu buryo, inzu y’ibyumba bibiri izajya igurishwa miliyoni 63,000,000 Frw, zivuye ku giciro gisanzwe cya miliyoni 108 Frw. Iy’ibyumba bitatu izajya igurishwa miliyoni 94Frw mu gihe ubusnzwe yagurishwaga miliyoni 163, naho iy’ibyumba bine igurishwe miliyoni 108Frw mu gihe yagurishwaga miliyoni 187Frw. Ibi bigo byatangaje ko ku bakeneye inguzanyo, bazajya bayihabwa kuri 11% ishobora kwishyurwa mu myaka 20. Umuntu ukeneye inzu ku nguzanyo ashobora gusabwa 10% by’igiciro n’ubwo atari icyitonderwa. Nk’uko byatangajwe, abakeneye kugura izi nzu bazatanga ubusabe bwabo hagati ya tariki 16-31 Ukwakira 2018. Isuzuma ry’abemerewe inzu rizakorwa hagati ya tariki 1-21 Ugushyingo 2018. Umuyobozi wa Banki ya Kigali yemeye gutanga inguzanyo kuri izi nzu, Dr Diane Karusisi aheruka kubwira IGIHE ko iyi banki yemeye gutanga inguzanyo ku nyungu iri hasi kandi yishyurwa mu gihe kirekire, kuko ku isoko hamaze kuboneka inzu zijyanye n’igihe kandi bigaragara ko zikeneye igihe ngo zishyurwe bitewe n’igiciro ziriho. Icyo gihe byatekerezwaga ko inyungu kuri nguzanyo y’izi nzu yazaba ari ku nyungu ya 12%. Yagize ati “Iyi ni intangiriro ya gahunda yacu y’igihe kirekire yo gufasha Abanyarwanda mu mikoro yose bafite, ngo babashe kugira inzu; turi kwita iyi gahunda uburyo bushya bwo gutanga inguzanyo y’inzu.” Yakomeje agira ati “Inyungu ya 12 ku ijana ku nzu za Vision City ni umwihariko twagezeho hamwe n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu. Kongera imyaka yo kwishyura inguzanyo ikava kuri 15 ikagera kuri 20 ni ikimenyetso cy’uburyo tworohereje abantu, ku buryo bitewe n’amikoro y’umuntu, ashobora kwishyura munsi yayo, mu myaka irindwi, ariko ntirenge 20.” Iyi gahunda nshya yo gutanga inguzanyo z’inzu yashobotse ku bufatanye bw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubwishingizi, RSSB, gifite imigabane igera kuri 25.1% muri BK, kikaba ari nacyo muterankunga w’umushinga w’ubwubatsi ushyirwa mu bikorwa na UDL. Icyo gihe Umuyobozi w’agateganyo wa UDL, Eng. Alain Abimana, we yabwiye IGIHE ko bazajya babanza kumvikana n’umukiliya, bakabona kumwohereza muri banki. Yagize ati “Umuntu ushaka inzu azajya aza twumvikane, noneho tumwohereze muri banki, irebe ibisabwa kuko iyo banki igiye guha umuntu inguzanyo hari ibyo igomba kubanza gusesengura. Nibamara kumvikana na banki twe tuzasinyana amasezerano y’ubugure nawe, tuyohereze muri banki itwishyure, ubundi nawe asigare ayishyura.” Yakomeje avuga ko ari uburyo bwo gufasha abantu kugura inzu mu buryo buboroheje, kuko uyu munsi kujya muri banki gufata inguzanyo y’igihe kirekire, nibura baguha kuri 17.5%, ikinyuranyo hagati yayo n’iyi nguzanyo kikazaba ari amafaranga menshi. UDL ifite umushinga wo kubaka inzu zisaga 4,500 mu byiciro bine mu gihe cy’imyaka umunani. Mu cyiciro cya mbere hubatswe inzu 504, muri Mata izigera ku 120 zari zimaze kugurishwa.

Umudugudu wa Vision City uherereye mu Karere ka Gasabo

title: Ubushakashatsi: Havumbuwe baleine y’amaguru ane yabaga ku butaka mu myaka miliyoni 42,6 ishize
content:
Abahanga mu bushakashatsi bw’ibisigazwa by’amagufa n’imibiri y’ibiremwa (paléontologues), bavumbuye ku butaka buherereye muri Pérou ibisigazwa by’inyamaswa yo mu bwoko bw’ibisekuruza bya ’baleine’ y’amaguru ane ifite ubushobozi bwo kuba ku butaka no ku mazi (amphibie). Ni ubuvumbuzi bwatumye aba bashakashatsi babasha kugera ku mwanzuro w’ubushakashatsi bwabo bwo kumenya uburyo izi nyamaswa z’inyamabere zavuye ku buzima bwo kuba ku butaka zikigira mu nyanja. Bivugwa ko ibisekuruza by’ubwoko bw’amafi manini ya baleines na dauphins yabaga ku butaka mu myaka miliyoni 50 ishize mu gace k’u Buhinde na Pakistan y’ubu. Aba bashakashatsi bari baranavumbuye muri Amerika y’Amajyaruguru ibisigazwa bituzuye bimaze imyaka miliyoni 41,2 byatumye batekereza ko muri icyo gihe izi nyamaswa nini zo mu mazi zishobora kuba zaratakaje ubushobozi bwo guhaguruka no kugenda ku butaka.

Baleine ni bumwe bwoko bw’inyamaswa y’amafi manini kandi y’inkazi ziba mu mazi Ubu bwoko bushya bwavumbuwe bwasobanuwe mu bushakashatsi bwashyizwe hanze n’ikinyamakuru Current Biology ko bumaze imyaka miliyoni 42,6 ndetse bukaba bwuzuza imbonerahamwe igaragaza imihindagurikire (évolution) y’ibi binyabuzima by’ibinyamabere biba mu mazi. Byavumbuwe ku kilometero kimwe uvuye ku nkengero y’inyanja ya Pacifique ahitwa Playa Media Luna mu bilometero 250 mu majyepfo ya Lima umurwa mukuru wa Pérou. Urutwe (mandibules) rw’iyi nyamaswa rwagaragaye ruhinguka ku butaka bw’ubutayu, maze mu gucukura aba bashakashatsi babasha kuvumbura ibindi bice byose harimo urwasaya rwo hasi (mâchoire inférieure), amenyo, urutirigongo, imbavu, ibice by’amaguru by’imbere n’inyuma kugeza ku magufwa y’intoki. 

Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bakurikije imiterere y’amagufa y’iyi nyamaswa basanga yari ifite metero enye z’uburebure Bashingiye ku miterere y’ibisigazwa by’iyi nyamaswa bavumbuye, abashakashatsi bavuga ko yashoboraga kuba yagenda bisanzwe ku butaka ikaba yanakoga mu mazi. "Igice kimwe cy’amagufa agize urutirigongo ugana ku murizo agaragaza ibimenyetso bihuye n’inyamabere z’iki gihe zibasha kuba ku mazi no k’ubutaka (mammifères semi-aquatiques) nka loutres (udusimba tugira ubwoya bwinshi tubasha kuba mu mazi no ku butaka).", Olivier Lambert inzobere mu by’ibisigazwa by’inyamaswa mu kigo cya siyansi kamere mu Bubiligi (Institut royal des Sciences naturelles de Belgique), aganira na AFP. Olivier Lambert akomeza agira ati "turabona inyamaswa ishobora gutangira kugenda ikoresha umurizo mu koga mu mazi, ibi bikayitandukanya n’imiterere y’izindi za kera cyane zo mu Buhinde na Pakistan."

Baleine ubu zisigaye ziba mu mazi gusa Ha mbere ibice bya baleines y’amaguru ane byari byaragiye bibonwa mu Misiri, Sahara y’uburengerazuba, Sénégal, Togo no muri Nigeria...Ariko ibi bisigazwa ntibyabaga bifite ibice byuzuye neza (fragmentaires) ku buryo bitashoboraga guhita byemezwa ko izi nyamaswa zashoboraga koga mu mazi. Olivier Lambert akomeza avuga ko ’ubu bwoko bwavumbuwe ari bwo bwuzuye bwa baleine bugaragaye hanze y’u Buhinde na Pakistan’. Aba bashakashatsi bavuga ko kuba iyi baleine yo muri Pérou yashoboraga koga mu mazi nka loutre, bigaragara ko nta gushidikanya yambutse inyanja ya Atlantique inyuze mu gice cy’uburengerazuba bwa Afurika igana muri Amerika y’Amajyepfo, imigabane bivugwa ko yahoze yegeranye cyane inshuro ebyiri kurusha uko biri ubu, hafi kilometero igihumbi na maganatatu (1,300km), iyi nyamaswa ngo ikaba yarafashijwe muri icyo gihe n’umuyaga wavaga mu burengerazuba werekeza mu burasirazuba, ibi bikaba bitandukanye n’ibyari byaragaragajwe ko baleines zageze muri Amerika zinyuze mu majyaruguru, zigaca muri Groenland.


Loutre, inyamaswa ifite imiterere igereranywa n’iya baleine yo mu myaka miliyoni 42 ishize, ibasha kuba mu mazi no ku butaka

title: Scholastique Mukasonga yasohoye igitabo kivuga kuri Kibogo wafatwaga nk’umukiza w’abanyarwanda
content: Mbere y’uko abamisiyoneri bazana inkuru nziza ya Yezu i Rwanda bivugwa ko uwo Kibogo ari we wafatwaga nkuko Abakristu bafata Yezu . Scholastique Mukasonga ni Umwanditsi w’umunyarwanda abakunda gusoma ibitabo n’abakurikiranira hafi ibijyanye na sinema bibuka filimi Notre Dame du Nil ishingiye ku gitabo cye yasohotse muri Gashyantare 2020. Igitabo cya Mukasonga ’ Kibogo est monté au Ciel’gifite paji 160. Cyasohowe n’inzu isohora ibitabo yo mu Bufaransa, éditions Gallimard. Ni ubwoko bw’ibitabo by’inkuru ndende mpimbano cyangwa se Roman (Novel).  Ugendeye ku mateka ya Kibogo uvugwa mu mateka y’u Rwanda wumva ari igitabo kigaragaza ko imyemerere cyangwa ibisa n’ibyo abanyamadini bigisha kuri Yezu hari uwari uhari kandi abifite mbere. Agace gasa no gutera amatsiko yashyize ku rubuga Gallimard, kabaza uwaba yaragiye mu Ijuru hagati ya Kibogo w’i Rwanda na Yezu yita uw’abamisiyoneri ndetse nyuma yo kujya mu Ijuru akagirira abantu ineza. Ati "Ari Kibogo, umuhungu w’umwami na Yezu w’abamisiyoneri ni nde wazamutse mu Ijuru? wongeye kugusha imvura, agakiza abantu amapfa n’inzara?" Akomeza yibaza niba abantu bakwiye kwizera inkuru cyangwa imigani baciriwe n’abera kurusha kwizera izo babwiye n’ababyeyi babo amanywa n’ijoro. Ati "Ese birakwiye ko twakwizera imigani twaciriwe n’abagabo b’abera b’ubwanwa burebure cyangwa twakwemera iyo ababyeyi bacu baducira buri mugoroba." Igitabo cyitwa Le Rwanda ancien cyanditswe na De Lacger, kuva ku rupapuro rwa 167 kugeza ku rwa 68 kigaragaza ko mbere y’umwaduko w’ubukirisitu mu Rwanda hari imyizerere gakondo idafite aho itandukaniye n’ubukirisitu ndetse ikaba yari ifite akarusho ko kuba ishingiye ku muco gakondo w’abanyarwanda. Ayo makuru yemeza ko mu Rwanda hahoze inkuru nziza y’“umukiza (umutabazi) Kibogo", yaje guteshwa agaciro n’inkuru nziza y’“umukiza (umutabazi) Yezu“ yazanywe n’abakoloni. Mu Rwanda rwa kera umutabazi yari umuntu wemeraga gutanga amaraso ye ku bushake akameneka ku butaka bw’umwanzi bigatuma umwica cyangwa uwo amenekeye mu gihugu atsindwa. Ibi ngo byaba byaratangiwe na “Kibogo“, izina ry’Ikinyarwanda rikomoka ku nshinga kubogora ihwanye n’iyo mu gifaransa bita “sauver“, “redresser“ cyangwa se ‘Gutabara’. Igitekerezonkomoko cy‘umutabazi Kibogo mu Rwanda Mu mateka y’u Rwanda dutangira kumva iby’Umutabazi bwa mbere muri wa mugani w’Ibimanuka mu gice cya wo cy’Umugani uvanze n’igitekerezo. Lacger yanditse agira ati “Ubwo Kigwa n’umuvandimwe we Mututsi na mushiki wabo Nyampundu bacibwaga mu ijuru bitewe n’icyaha cya nyina wamennye ibanga ry’Imana, bururukiye mu Mubali bavuye mu ijuru. Bagera mu Mubali rero, bibonye bambaye ubusa bakennye. Hashize iminsi icumi bafite agahinda gakabije, bafite inzara, inyota n’imbeho bifuza gupfa gusa, bambaza Imana bati: Mana y’u Rwanda tugirire impuhwe utubabarire. Muri ako kanya inkuba ikubitira mu kirere maze umurabyo ukongeza ibyatsi byumye maze babona agashirira baragafatisha babona umuriro barota.” “Hashize iminsi ijuru rirakinguka babona hamanutse impeke, ibishyimbo, amasaka n’insina y’imineke. Hashize iminsi na none mu ijuru hamanuka ikibumbe cy’ubutare bwo gucuramo ibyuma n’amasuka bati: Imana ni yo itwoherereje ibi byose”. Ngo icyo gihe maze ni bahinze batihingishije! Muri ako karere bamanukiyemo, hari hatuye imiryango itatu: Abasinga, Abazigaba n’Abatwa bo mu ishyamba. Abo bantu bose bari barakomotse mu ijuru aho ba sekuruza bari barirukanywe bitewe n’icyaha bahakoreye. Kubera ko bo batari barigeze basaba Imana imbabazi, ni cyo cyatumye ibarekera mu butindi n’ubukene. Abo baje nyuma nibo babatungishije. Ubwo Kibogo yicwaga n’abagome nyuma Imana ikamuzura Kugira ngo abo bantu batazarimbuka bagashiraho, byatumye Imana yohereza Umutabazi Kibogo aza ku ruhembe rw’umurabyo arababwira ati “Mwitinya nimuhumure ni Imana ibantumyeho! Nzaba umuhuza wanyu n’Imana kandi icyo muzasaba cyose niba ari cyiza Imana izakibaha!. Umutabazi ni impongano y’Imana ku bana bayo bayiringira.” Nyuma ariko abagome ngo baramufashe bamumanika ku giti bakoresheje ibyuma bisongoye baramwica. Imana yaje komora ibikomere bye imugaruramo ubuzima hanyuma Imana yohereza umurabyo umuzamura mu kirere asubira ku Mana. Lacger yavuze ko iyo u Rwanda rugize amakuba, umuzimu w’Umutabazi aza gutura muri umwe mu bana b’Umwami agahinduka Umutabazi agakiza igihugu. Bavuga ko abatambyi bo mu Mubali aribo bamubambye bakamwica ariko ko “Imana yomoye ibikomere bye imugaruramo ubugingo hanyuma yohereza n‘umurabyo umuzamura mu kirere asubira ku Mana”.

title: Kugera ku mukino wa nyuma nicyo Uwacu Julienne asaba Amavubi
content: Minisitiri w’Umuco na Siporo, Julienne Uwacu, yatangaje ko intego bahaye ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi ari ukugera ku mukino wa nyuma w’igikombe cya CHAN ndetse byanashoboka akagitwara. Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 8 Mutarama 2015 avuga ku myiteguro ya CHAN, Minisitiri Uwacu yatangaje ko ibikorwa byose biri mu murungo mwiza ndetse imyiteguro isa niyarangiye. Yatangaje ko intego bahaye Amavubi ari ukugera ku mukino wa nyuma ndetse byashoboka agatwara igikombe. Minisitiri Uwacu yemeza ko bishoboka cyane kuko akurikije imyiteguro ndetse n’uburyo ikipe ihagaze hari icyizere ko izabasha kubigeraho. Yagize ati “Imikino ya gicuti ikipe yakinnye ndetse n’imyiteguro twahaye ikipe itwizeza ko bazagera ku mukino wa nyuma kuko dufite ikipe nziza kandi ikomeye ku buryo twizera ko izabigeraho.” Amavubi araza gukina umukino wa nyuma yitegura CHAN kuri iki Cyumweru akina na Repubulika Iharanira Demokasi ya Congo aho ku wa Mbere ikipe izahita yerekeza i Kigali gukomeza imyiteguro ya CHAN. U Rwanda ruzafungura CHAN rukina na Côte d’Ivoire, kimwe mu bihugu bikomeye muri Afurika aho mu mikino itandatu amakipe yombi amaze gukia Côte d’Ivoire, yatsinze u Rwanda inshuro 4 banganya ibiri. Amafaranga agera kuri miliyari 16 na miliyoni 200 niyo ngengo y’imari yateganyijwe mu mikino ya CHAN. Agera kuri miliyari ebyiri azakoreshwa mu bikorwa byo kwakira abakinnyi no kubaha ibindi nkenerwa mu gihe Miliyari 14.2 ari kwifashishwa mu kubaka ibikorwa remezo nkuko bitangazwa na Minisiteri y’Umuco na Siporo. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Bwa mbere mu Rwanda hagiye gutangizwa umukino wo gutega wemewe na Leta
content: Nyuma yigihe kitari kinini mu Rwanda hatangiwe serivisi zo gutegera imikino itandukanye ariko zigakomezwa kunengwa na benshi ko zitubahiriza amasezerano ziba zagiranye n’abazigana, ndetse zikanengwa guhindura benshi mu rubyiruko imbata, ubu noneho hagiye gutangira kompanyi yo gutega yemewe n’amategeko. Ni Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 10 Kanama 2019 mu Rwanda hazatangizwa uburyo bw’imikino yo gutega [betting] ifite umwihariko wo gukorera kuri murandasi na telefone ngendanwa. Ubu buryo bwitwa Gorilla Games bwashyiriweho abanyarwanda n’ikigo cya Cheza Game Rwanda.Mu gihe ibindi bigo bikoresha imikino y’amahirwe no gutega bifite aho bikorera haba hazwi ku buryo ushaka gukina aba agomba kujyayo, Gorilla Games yo ifite umwihariko wo kuba ikorera no kuri internet,muri telefone zigezweho n’izisanzwe. Kuri mudasobwa umuntu ashobora kwifashisha urubuga rwa internet ari rwo www.gorillagames.africa, porogaramu ya gorilla games muri telefone zigezweho cyangwa se *878# ku bakoresha telefone zisanzwe. Umuntu ashobora gutega ku mikino itandukanye iri kuba ako kanya cyangwa n’indi y’amahirwe myinshi bafite. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyabaye kuri uyu wa 08 Kanama 2019, Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi muri Gorilla Games, Hebert Kalisa, yavuze ko icyiza cy’ubu buryo bwo gukina imikino y’amahirwe bukorwa byoroshye kandi mu gihe icyo ari cyo cyose. Ati “Icya mbere biroroshye kuyikoresha, ni uburyo bwizewe ukoresha aho uri hose, uko ubishaka kose, ifite umutekano kandi ikurikiza amategeko.” Utsinze amafaranga ayabona binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga Nk’uko umuntu ushaka gukina imikino ya Gorilla Games ashobora kubikorera aho ari hose yifashishije ikoranabuhanga, gushyiraho no kubikuza amafaranga nabyo niko bikorwa. Umuntu ushaka gushyira amafaranga ye kuri konti ye ya Gorilla Games kugira ngo abashe gutega yifashisha uburyo bwa Airtel Money,MTN Mobile Money cyangwa se konti yo muri banki. Amwe mu mabwiriza agenga uyu mukino n'uko umuntu utarageza Ku myaka 18 ntiyemerewe gukina imikino itangwa n’iki kigo. Uburyo ikoranabuhanga rya Gorilla Games ryubatse, ryahujwe n’amakuru y’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe indangamuntu ku buryo umuntu utaruzuza imyaka 18 adashobora kwiyandikisha mu bakina ngo bimukundire. Indi ngingo mu mabwiriza nuko uwabaye imbata yo gukina ashobora guhagarikwa. Gorilla Games ni ikigo cy’ubucuruzi ariko kitaye ku mibereho myiza y’abakigana ku buryo badakeneye kumva umuntu wakennye ari bo biturutseho. Bikunze kugaragara ko umuntu wakinnye imikino y’amahirwe nabi bishobora no kumuviramo kubatwa nayo, ni muri urwo rwego umuyobozi Ushinzwe Ikoranabuhanga, Parag Adsare yavuze ko bakoze ku buryo uwo bigaragayeho ko ageze ku kigero cyo kuba imbata ahita ahagarikwa. Ati “Hari urugero rworoshye nkunda gutanga niba tubonye ko umuntu runaka akina cyane saa munani cyangwa saa cyenda z’ijoro, imyitwarire nk’iyo yashyizweho kode ku buryo ihita igaragara, dufite ikipe ibishinzwe nikurikiza intambwe zose igasanga ari ko bimeze bazahita bamuhagarika.” Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu kuri stade Amahoro i Remera nibwo hazatangizwa ku mugaragaro Gorilla Games aho hazaba hari n’umuhanzi Bruce Melodie. Nsengiyumva Jean Damascene/MUHABURA.RW

title: Hatoranyijwe abanyamideli bazitabira ‘Mercedes Fashion Week’ i Kigali (Amafoto)
content: Itoranya ry’aba bamyamideli bagomba kuzitabira Mercedes Fashion Week Kigali ryabereye kuri Century Park Hotel i Nyarutarama. Abanyamideli batandukanye bagera ku 150 baturutse mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi nibo bitabiriye iki gikorwa, baje basanga abandi 60 bo mu mahanga basabye kuzitabira banyuze kuri internet. Ndayishimiye Daniel wari usanzwe uri mu itsinda ritegura iki gikorwa n’ubundi muri Ghana wanagize uruhare kugira ngo noneho kibere mu Rwanda, yabwiye IGIHE ko byari ibintu bidasanzwe mu ruganda rwo kumurika imideli. Ati “Abantu bitabiriye ku kigero cyo hejuru cyane kandi benshi baje n’ubundi ni abanyamideli basanzwe bazwi mu Rwanda. Ugereranyije n’ibindi bikorwa byo gutotanya abanyamideli bibera mu Rwanda iki kiri mu byitabiriwe n’abanyamahanga benshi kuko haje abagera ku 10.” Muri iki gikorwa hajemo Umudage,Umubiligi, Umuhinde, Umunye-Congo ndetse n’abanye-Ghana. Yavuze ko abahanga imideli 20 aribo bazambika abazitabira iki gikorwa, batanu akaba aribo b’abanyarwanda abandi basigaye bakaba abanyamahanga. Akanama katangaga amanota ku bagomba gukomeza mu kindi cyiciro gikurikira kari kagizwe na Munyana Cynthia, Daniel Ndayishimiye, Serge Shema, Antoinette Kabanyana na Charlotte Dukundane. Mu guha amahirwe abanyamideli bagomba gukomeza hagenderwaho ku kuberwa n’amafoto, intambuko ndetse n’uko agaragara. Abanyamideli batoranyijwe bazatangazwa mu cyumweru gitaha nyuma yo guhuza umubare w’abasabye kuzitabira bifashishije internet ndetse n’abigaragaje uyu munsi. Iki gikorwa kizaba guhera ku wa 31 Gicurasi no ku wa 1 Kamena 2019 muri Kigali Convention Centre. Amafoto: FOCUSiCON

title: Dore impamvu  Jay-Z  abona  Nick  Jonas  nka Justin Tumbalake  w’ahazaza
content:
Ku myaka 22 y’amavuko, ubusanzwe  Nick Jonas  ni umwe mu bahanzi bakora umuziki wo mujyana ya pop hariya muri leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika akaba akomeje kwerekana ubuhanga muri iyi njyana cyane ko ibikorwa amaze kugeraho ku myaka ye bitungura benshi. 

 Jay z na Timbalake ku rubyiniro 
  Nk’uko tubikesha hollywoodlife.com Jay Z yatangaje ko zimwe mu mpamvu zituma avuga ko uyu muhanzi ukiri muto uririmba injyana ya pop afite ejo hazaza heza ari uko amubona mo impano nziza yakwifashisha aho bazakorana imishinga myinshi.” yagize ati Nick Jonas ni Justin Timbalake wejo hazaza nkaba nifuza ko twazakorana indirimbo mu rwego rwo gutangira guhuza ibikorwa n’uyu muhanzi ukiri muto” 

 Nick Jonas witegura gusimbura Justin mu njyana ya pop
 Twabibutsa ko Jay-z mumwaka wa 2013 aribwo  yakoranye indirimbo na Justin Timberlake yitwa “Suit & Tie” yaje gukundwa cyane nyuma yaho bongera gukora indi yitwa “Holy grail”, hitezwe indirimbo nshyasha ubwo ikirangirire muri HipHop Jaz-y azaba akorana numuhanzi Nick Jonas ndetse na Beyonce. Yanditswe na Janvier Jbson/Muhabura.rw

title: U Bwongereza bumaze gukoresha miliyari 5.7$ muri Brexit
content: NAO yatangaje ko u Bwongereza bumaze gukoresha 70% bya miliyari 6.3 z’ama-pound zateganyirijwe urugendo rw’imyiteguro ya Brexit, hagati ya kamarampaka yo muri Kamena 2016 na tariki 31 Werurwe uyu mwaka. NAO ivuga ko amafaranga menshi yakoreshejwe ku bakozi bihariye angana na miliyari 1.9 z’ama-pound, kubaka ibikorwa remezo bishya byatwaye miliyari 1.5 z’ama-pound naho kwishyura abajyanama bitwara miliyoni 288 z’ama-pound. Umuyobozi wa NAO, Gareth Davies, yavuze ko ‘iyi raporo ku nshuro ya mbere itanze ishusho nyayo y’uburyo guverinoma y’u Bwongereza, yakoresheje ingengo y’imari n’ibyo yayikoreshejemo’. NAO ivuga kandi ko imibare yayo yibanze ku ngano y’ibyo u Bwongereza bwakoresheje mu myiteguro ya Brexit, itarebye ku bindi buzatanga mu gihe kiri imbere harimo nka miliyari 39 z’ama-pound za gatanya bwemeranyijwe na EU. Intumwa ihagarariye u Burayi mu biganiro n’u Bwongereza mu rugendo rwa Brexit, Michel Barnier, ubwo hasozwaga ibiganiro bya mbere nyuma ya Brexit kuri uyu wa Kane, yavuze ko hari ibyo u Bwongereza na EU batarimo kumvikana kandi bikomeye. Ati “Mvugishije ukuri kose, hari ibitumvikanwaho kandi birakomeye, bishobora kuba birenze ibisanzwe”. U Bwongereza bwari bumaze imyaka irenga 50 muri EU, bwayivuyemo kuwa 31 Mutarama uyu mwaka. Ubu buri mu gihe cy’inzibacyuho kizarangira mu mpera za 2020, aho amategeko ya EU agikurikizwa mu gihe impande zombi zikiganira ku masezerano y’ubucuruzi.

title: Abarundi Pierrot na Shassir bafashije Rayon Sport gutangirana Insinzi imbere ya Police FC
content:
N’ubwo uyu mukino wabaye abantu bibwira ko Rayon Sport ishobora kuba itari tayari ahanini kubera ibyari byavuzwe ko ishobora kutawukina, byarangiye kuri uyu wa 14 Ukwakira Rayon Sport itangiye neza Azam Premier League Rwanda 2016/17 itsinda Police FC 3-0, byose by’Abarundi Pierrot na Shassir, hari kuri Stade ya Kigali. Ni umukino watangiye saa 18:00 maze ibitego bitsindwa na Kwizera Pierrot ku munota wa 20, mu gice cya mbere na ho ibindi bibiri bitsindwa na Nahimana Shassir ku munota wa 65 n’uwa 82. 
Kwizera Pierrot watsinze icya mbere

Nahimana Shassir yatsinze bibiri  Umwe mu bakinnyi bari batumye Rayon Sport ivuga ko itagombaga kwitabira uyu mukino mu gihe ibye byari kuba bitakemutse, Nova Bayama, yaje kugaragara muri uyu mukino. Yinjiye mu kibuga asimbuye Kevin Muhire wari uhuye n’ikibazo ubwo yagonganaga na Hussein wa Police. Dore urutonde rw’abakinnyi babanje mu kibuga ku mpande zombi  Rayon Sports: Ndayishimiye Eric Bakame, Ndacyayisenga Jean DdAmour, Irambona Eric, Manzi Thierry, Mutsinzi Ange, Mugheni Fabrice, Kwizera Pierrot, Savio Nshuti Dominique, Djabel Manishimwe, Kevin Muhire, Shassiri Nahimana. Police FC: Nzarora Marcel, Uwihoreye, Celestin Ndayishimiye, Fabrice Twagizimana, Hussein Habimana, Eric Ngendahimana, Mohamed Mushimiyimana, Amin Muzerwa, Innocent, Danny Usengimana, Isaïe Songa. 
Abafana bari besnshi kuri sade ya Kigali Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Ferwacy yatangaje uduce tuzanyuramo Tour du Rwanda 2016
content:
Isiganwa ku Magare hano mu Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2016(Tour de Rwanda 2016) yazanye impinduka ku ncuro ya mbere ibaye mpuzamahanga ikaba igiye kwerekeza mu Karere ka Rusizi ahazakoreshwa umuhanda mushya wa Karongo-Nyamasheke- Rusizi Iri siganwa rigiye kuba ku ncuro ya munani kuva ribaye mpuzamahanga mu 2009 rizitabirwa n’amakipe arenga 30 aturuka mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru, ubuyobozi bw’umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare mu Rwanda bwatangaje ku mugaragaro 
 
Inzira Tour de Rwanda 2016 izanyuramo:  Prologe: ku Cyumweru tariki 13 Ugushyingo 2016, Stade Amahoro 3.3Km
Agace ka mbere: Kuwa Mbere tariki 14 Ugushyingo 2016, Kigali- Kicukiro- Ngoma, 96.4 km
Agace ka kabiri, kuwa Kabiri tariki 15 Ugushyingo 2016, Kigali-Karongo, 124.7 km
Agace ka gatatu, kuwa Gatatu tariki 16 Ugushyingo 2016, Karongo-Rusizi, 115.9km
Agace ka kane, kuwa kane tariki 17 Ugushyingo 2016, Rusizi- Huye, 140.7 km
Agace ka Gatanu tariki 18 Ugushyingo 2016, Muhanga- Musanze, 125.8 km
Agace ka Gatandatu tariki 19 Ugushyingo 2016, Musanze-Kigali, 103.9 km
Agace ka nyuma tariki 20 Ugushyingo 2016, kuzenguruka stade Amahoro, 108 km Nyuma yaho abanyarwanda begukaniye Tour du Rwanda inshuro zigera kuri ebyiri zikurikirana ese kurubu irongera kwegukanwa nabo ko abasore bose bitwaye neza bayitwara bose baza kuyikina bakinira amakipe bagiyemo hanze nkababigize umwuga.

 Yanditswe na Editor 1/Muhabura.rw

title: Netflix igiye guhagarika konti z’abantu bamaze igihe batayikoresha kandi bishyura
content: Netflix yerekana ibiganiro byo mu bihugu bitandukanye biciye kuri internet birimo nka filime mbarankuru n’iz’ubundi bwoko, ariko bigasaba kubanza kuba umufatabuguzi. Kuba umufatabuguzi wa Netflix, umuntu asabwa amafaranga ari hagati y’amadolari arindwi na $ 14 ku kwezi bitewe n’icyiciro ashaka kubarizwamo. Akurwa kuri konti ye yatanze yiyandikasha bwa mbere. Ubuyobozi bwa Netflix bwatangaje ko bwasanze hari abantu bakurwaho amafaranga buri kwezi nyamara badaheruka kugira icyo bareba kuri urwo rubuga. Bwatangaje ko konti zigaragaza kumara umwaka zitanga amafaranga ariko nta kintu zireba zigiye guhagarikwa. Ni umwanzuro ugamije gufasha abakiliya bibagiwe ko biyandikishije kuri Netflix, kudasesagura amafaranga yabo. Abakiliya bamaze umwaka batareba amashusho kuri Netflix ariko bishyura, bazandikirwa bamenyeshwe, babazwe niba bagikeneye kubana na Netflix. Mu gihe uwabajijwe adasubije, konti ye izahagarikwa. Uzashaka kongera kuba umukiliya azabisaba konti ye ikangurwe. Netflix yatangaje ko abantu bangana na 0.5 % by’abakiliya bayo aribo babarizwa muri icyo cyiciro cy’abishyura batareba. Netflix irebwa mu bihugu 190 hirya no hino ku Isi, aho ifite abakiliya basaga miliyoni 182. Yabonye abayikoresha bashya bagera kuri miliyoni 16 muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.

title: Mu buriri nta kintu amarira mungire inama
content:
Bavandimwe dusangiye uru rubuga mbona hari ibibazo bivugirwa hano bigakemuka, na njye ndaje ngo mungire inama ku kibazo mfite mu muryango wanjye.
 Ndi umugore ukiri muto, ndubatse mbana n’umugabo tumaze kubyarana kabiri, umwana wacu mukuru afite imyaka itatu umutoya afite umwaka umwe.
Umugabo wanjye twashakanye mukunda cyane, afite akazi keza kamuhemba amafaranga ahagije nanjye mfite akazi keza muri Leta. Mu by’ukuri umugabo wanjye dushakana nafashe icyemezo cyo kureka abahungu bose twari twarakundanye mbere, mubonamo umuntu unyuze ku mutima. Gusa mbere abo bahungu twakundanye buri umwe twararyamanaga mu gihe twakundanaga ariko ntabwo twagize umushinga ngo hagire uwo turushingana. Mu rugo iwanjye, umugabo tubana nabonaga ari umusore mwiza utagira uko asa haba mu mico no mu myifatire kandi ni ko ameze, mbona ari umuntu w’inyangamugayo, ariko mu buriri nta kintu amarira (ntampaza) ku buryo ubu numva aho kubura ibyishimo ngiye kumureka. Nagerageje kwihangana, mubwira ikibazo cy’uko numva mu buriri ntacyo amarira ariko nkabona ntacyo ahindura. Ntinya kumubwira ko nakundanye n’abandi bahungu mbere ndetse tukanaryamana kuko ntinya ko yambonamo umusambanyi akanangabanyiriza icyizere, cyangwa we akumva ko ntacyo amaze. Mu by’ukuri umugabo wanjye aho bigeze numva nta kibashije kwihanga kuko atakibasha kumpaza mu buriri, numva namureka nkigendera.
Ubu mfite ikibazo cy’abo bana twabyaranye, kuko ndabakunda. Aho bigeze aha, umugabo wanjye twarasezeranye imbere y’Imana no mu mategeko, ariko mbura aho mpera naka gatanya kuko nabuze aho nahera nsobanurira umuryango impamvu yo gutandukana n’umugabo wanjye babona ari indakemwa mu mico no mu myifatire. Bavandimwe  mwamfasha kungira inama y’icyo nakora. Ese byashoboka ko uyu mugabo namwihanganira nkemera kubabara bigahera ku mutima.Umugabo wanjye se nimubwiza ukuri ikibazo mfite hari icyo yakora kugira ngo mu buriri bige bigenda neza mu buryo buhuye n’ibyifuzo byanjye? Abana banjye se iki nicyo gihe cyo kubasiga cyangwa nkabatwara se? Ubu se ko numva umugabo wanjye ntakimwizey n’ubwo mu mutima harimo izo ntambara, nakora iki? Mbaye mbashimiye ku nama zanyu mugiye kumpa, Imana ibahe umugisha.

title: Imwe mu nkura eshanu zazanywe mu Rwanda zivuye i Burayi, yarapfuye
content: Ishyirahamwe ry’u Burayi rishinzwe ibijyanye n’ahororerwa Inyamaswa, EAZA; Umuryango Nyafurika urengera urusobe rw’Ibinyabuzima, African Parks na RDB, nibo batangaje ko iyi nkura yapfuye. Iyi nkura yapfuye yitwaga Manny, yari imwe muri ebyiri z’ingabo zikuze zakuwe muri Safari Park Dvůr Králové muri Tchèque. Yapfuye ku wa 10 Gashyantare 2020. Zari zazanywe ari eshatu z’ingore mu gihe ebyiri zari ingabo. Zari hagati y’imyaka ibiri n’icyenda. Harimo izavukiye muri Safari Park Dvůr Králové muri Tchèque zitwa Jasiri, Jasmina na Manny. Iyitwa Olmoti yaturutse muri Flamingo Land mu Bwongereza naho iyitwa Mandela ituruka muri Ree Park Safari muri Denmark. Izi nkura zoherejwe mu Rwanda nk’impano yahawe Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB). Itangazo ryashyizwe agaharagara na EAZA, African Parks na RDB, rivuga ko iyi nkura itishwe na ba rushimusi, ahubwo ko ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko yapfuye kubera ibibazo by’igogora ry’ibyo yabaga yariye gusa “impamvu ya nyuma y’urupfu rwayo ntiratahurwa”. Rigira riti “Dutegereje ko ibisubizo by’ibizamini byisumbuyeho bya laboratwari bigaragaza umucyo, gusa kubera amabwiriza akomeye yashyizweho mu kwirinda COVID-19, biragoye ko twakira ibi bisubizo mu gihe cya vuba”. Iyi nkura yagenzurwaga umunsi ku wundi n’impuguke ndetse yahabwaga ibiribwa biyifasha kumera neza. Gusa nyuma y’aho ubuzima bwayo buhindutse ahanini mu myitwarire yayo mu mirire, ubuyobozi bwa pariki bwahise bumenyesha abaganga b’amatungo n’inyamaswa, iza gupfa mbere y’uko bayiha ubufasha. Izindi nkura zazanye zo ziri mu buzima bwiza nta kibazo na kimwe zifite. Uburyo bwo kwimura inyamaswa nk’ubu bugamije ko zongerwa mu kindi gihugu, gusa imiterere y’ikirere ishobora gutuma zigorwa no kumenyera aho zimuriwe. Mbere yo kuzanwa mu Rwanda, zamaze amezi zitegurwa ku buryo zitazagira ibibazo muri uru rugendo rwamaze amasaha 30. Zazanywe mu buryo bugezweho ziri mu cyo umuntu yakwita nk’igisanduku aho zahererwaga amazi n’ibyo kurya. Kuri ubu Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera ifite inyamaswa nini eshanu zikunze gukurura ba mukerarugendo ari zo; Intare, Inzovu, Ingwe, Inkura n’Imbogo. Indi nkuru wasoma: U Rwanda rwakiriye inkura eshanu zaturutse muri Tchèque (Amafoto)

title: Coronavirus ku wa 5 Kamena: Mu minsi ibiri gusa abanduye barenze ibihumbi 250
content: OMS ivuga ko muri iyo minsi abandi bantu 10743 aribo bapfuye. Ibi byatumye abamaze kwandura ku Isi ari 6 703 095 mu gihe abandi 393 224 bamaze gupfa naho abamaze gukira ni 3 252 378. Brésil nicyo gihugu cyugarijwe cyane ku Isi, kuri uyu wa Kane cyapfushije abantu 1 492 mu gihe abandi 31 890 banduye. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zo zapfushije abantu 1 031 mu gihe abandi 22 268. Kugeza ubu kandi Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nizo zikomeje kuza imbere mu kugira umubare w’abanduye n’abamaze gupfa benshi ku Isi, kuko abamaze kwandura ni 1 924 051 naho abamaze gupfa ni 110 173. Brésil niyo iza ku mwanya wa Kabiri aho ifite abanduye 615 870 naho abamaze gupfa ni 34 039, u Burusiya buza ku mwanya wa gatatu kuko bufite abanduye 441 108, hamaze gupfa 5 384, muri Espagne handuye 287 740 hamaze gupfa 27 133, naho mu Bwongereza handuye 281 661, hamaze gupfa 39 904. Ku mugabane wa Afurika wose hamaze kugaragara abantu 172 183 banduye Coronavirus, abamaze gupfa ni 4 783 naho abakize ni 75 830. Afurika y’Epfo iri imbere mu kugira abafite ubwandu benshi kuko ari 40 792, abamaze gupfa ni 848, ikurikirwa na Misiri ubu ifite abamaze gupfa benshi kuri uyu mugabane kuko bageze kuri 1 126 naho abamaze kwandura ni 29 767. Muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Kenya nicyo gihugu cyugarijwe cyane kuko hamaze kwandura abantu 2 340, hapfuye 78. U Rwanda rufite abanduye 410, hamaze gupfa abantu babiri ariko hamaze gukira abandi 280; muri Uganda hari abanduye 522, Tanzania ifite abanduye 509 hamaze gupfa 21, mu Burundi handuye abantu 63 hapfa umwe naho muri Sudani y’Epfo hamaze kwandura abantu 994, hamaze gupfa 10. Mu bihugu bihana imbibi n’u Rwanda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo niyo yibasiwe cyane, kuko ubu ifite abanduye 3 644 barimo 78 bamaze gupfa.

title: Aka Guardiola na City karashobotse kuko na Messi yabijemo
content: Luis Enrique yaryohewe no kubona Lionel Messi agarukana igitego ubwo batsindaga Deportivo la Coruna 4-0, uyu ni umwiteguro mwiza ku mukino karundura bafitanye n’uwahoze ari umutoza wabo mukuru Pep Guardiola na Manchester City ye muri UEFA Champions league kuwa gatatu. Messi yatsinze igitego cya kane ku mupira wa gatatu gusa yari akozeho nyuma yo kuva mu bihe by’imvune yari amazemo hafi ukwezi. Umutoza we Luis Enrique yavuze ko ari insinzi y’ingenzi mu gihe bitegura City, ngo ni na byiza kubona insinzi nk’iyi nyamara abakinnyi bavuye mu biguhu byabo. Ku ruhande rwa City izaza Camp Nou, yo imaze gutakaza imikino itatu yose iheruka, ni nyuma yaho no kuri uyu wa gatandatu bananiwe gutsinda Everton maze bakanganya 1-1. Mu mikino ine iheruka guhuza aya makipe, Barca yarayitsinze yose ubwo hari muri 2013-14 na 2014-15. Gusa ntibibuza Enrique kuvuga ko City ari ikipe izigaragaza ku ruhando mpuzamahanga. Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Justin Bieber yateye abantu kwibaza byinshi nyuma yo gukorana imyitoza n’abakinnyi ba Barcelona
content:
Nyuma yo kubona ubuhanga bwe muri ruhago, abenshi batangiye kuvuga ko Justin Beiber yagakwiye kuba yaratekereje no kuri iyi mpano n’ubwo n’aho ari muri muzika ntacyo wamunenga. Ese ko atari ubwa mbere uyu musore agaragaye muri iyi kipe, uyu waba ariwo mwanya wo kuza kuyikinira n’ubwo kuri iyi nshuro Atari cyo cyamugenzaga? The pop star, Justin yasuye Barcelona muri iki gihe ari muri European tour. Aha yaje gusanga abanya-Brazil Neymar na Rafinha maze bakorana imyitozo y’umupira w’amaguru. 
 Mu byo yagaragaje, ni impano yo gutsinda ibitego kimwe no gutindana umupira. Ku myaka 22 uyu munyacanada yakomereje no mu izamu ariko ho biranga, yasanze ari bicamukwaha. 
Ku myaka 22 uyu munyacanada yakomereje no mu izamu

content: Urukiko Rukuru rwashimangiye umwanzuro uherutse gufatwa n’Urukiko Rwisumbuye rwa Gasabo wo gufunga by’agateganyo abayobozi b’Itorero rya Pentekote mu Rwanda, ADEPR, bakurikiranyweho ibyaha byo kunyereza umutungo w’itorero

title: Twitege Visit Rwanda muri Formula 1 na NBA?
content: Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere y’imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona y’u Bufaransa, Ligue 1 mu gihe kandi aya magambo agaragara ku myambaro y’ikipe y’abagore. Mu masezerano harimo kandi icyumweru cy’imishinga y’abanyempano b’abanyarwanda n’Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe “Semaine du Rwanda à Paris” kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda. Ubu bufatanye bwatangajwe nyuma y’umwaka umwe n’igice, RDB itangiye gukorana n’ikipe ya Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza, aho binyuze muri Visit Rwanda, iyi kipe yo mu Mujyi wa Londres yamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda. Kuva icyo gihe, hari abanyabigwi benshi bakomeye ba Arsenal baje mu Rwanda barimo Tony Adams wabaye kapiteni wayo igihe kirekire, Lauren Etame Mayer, Alex Scott wabaye kapiteni w’ikipe y’abagore na David Luiz kuri ubu ukinira iyi kipe, bose baje mu Rwanda. Muri ubu bufatanye kandi, abatoza babiri b’Ingimbi za Arsenal FC, Simon McManus usanzwe ari Umutoza Mukuru w’Amashuri yigisha umupira w’amaguru ya Arsenal na Kerry Green, bahugura ab’Abanyarwanda mu kubafasha kubatoza umupira ugezweho nk’uwo iyi kipe ikina. RDB ivuga ko kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal binyuze muri Visit Rwanda mu 2018, ba mukerarungo baza mu Rwanda bamaze kugera kuri miliyoni imwe na 700 (byatangajwe mu Ukuboza 2019) ndetse yizeye ko bazakomeza kwiyongera mu myaka iri imbere. Ese birashoboka ko tuzabona Visit Rwanda mu marushanwa nka Tour de France, Formula 1 cyangwa NBA? Imwe mu mpamvu ituma habaho ubu bufatanye bw’u Rwanda n’amakipe akomeye i Burayi, ni ugutekereza kure kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzabe igihugu gikize mu myaka iri imbere ndetse n’Abanyarwanda bagire ubushobozi buhagije bwo gukora ibyishimirwa n’abanyamahanga. Tour de France niryo siganwa rya mbere ry’amagare rikomeye ku Isi, Formula 1 naryo ni isiganwa rya mbere rikomeye mu mukino wo gusiganwa mu modoka mu gihe NBA yo muri Amerika ari yo Shampiyona ya Basketball ikunzwe na benshi ku Isi. Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Ariella Kageruka, yavuze ko bishoboka ko u Rwanda rwagirana ubufatanye n’imwe mu makipe agaragara muri aya marushanwa kuko byose bisaba kwiha intego ndetse bikagira uko bikorwa. Ati “Sinavuga ko hari igihe runaka bizabera, ariko nta kintu kidashoboka kuko iyo urebye ikintu gisabwa ni ukureba niba ibikorwaremezo dufite bihuye n’ibyo. Nko kuri Formula 1, icya mbere ni imihanda kandi nkeka imbaraga Leta yashyize mu kubaka imihanda dushobora kuyibyaza umusaruro.” “Ku kwerekana Visit Rwanda muri NBA, BAL (Basketball Africa League yashyizweho na NBA) yo ubwo yaje aha, mwabonye ko ikipe yacu (Patriots BBC) yari ihagarariye u Rwanda yari yambaye Visit Rwanda. Ni ukuvuga ngo ni ukugenda intambwe ku ntambwe kandi byose birashoboka. Icya mbere ni ukugira ngo tubyaze umusaruro ubufatanye dufite uyu munsi kuko ni ukubanza kureba icyo dukuramo, tukaba twava mu mupira w’amaguru tukajya muri Basketball.” Kageruka avuga ko nubwo kuri ubu ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda mu bukerarugendo bushingiye ku mugabane w’u Burayi, bitabuza ko n’Abanyamerika barumenya kuko nka Arsenal ikunda gukorerayo imyiteguro ya Shampiyona ijyanye n’itangazamakuru ryayo rigari ndetse ubwo David Luiz yazaga mu Rwanda, byavuzwe cyane muri Brésil. Ni iki cyakorwa ngo Siporo y’u Rwanda itange umusaruro mu bukungu bw’igihugu?  Siporo ni umwe mu nkingi z’iterambere u Rwanda rushaka kubakiraho ndetse igihugu kiri gushora cyane mu mikino kuko bitanga icyerekezo cyiza cy’igihugu ndetse bigafasha n’Abanyarwanda gutera imbere. Mu kiganiro yatanze ubwo yari yatumiwe mu mahugurwa yahuje abagize ingaga za Siporo, yateguwe n’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Ariella Kageruka, yavuze ko muri Siporo hari amahirwe menshi arimo ashobora kwinjiriza igihugu nko gukora imyenda n’inkweto bya Siporo. Kageruka yakomeje avuga ko itangazamakuru rishobora kwifashishwa mu kumenyakanisha Siporo y’u Rwanda, abakinnyi n’abatoza b’Abanyarwanda bagahabawa amahugurwa abafasha kugira ubumenyi buri ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Ati “Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo kubyaza umusaruro muri siporo, nko gushyiraho inganda zikora ibikoresho bya Siporo mu gihugu. Mu bijyanye n’ubukerarungo bushingiye kuri siporo, ubufatanye twagiranye n’abatwamamaza bwarengeje ibyo twari twiteze. Twari twiteze ko binyuze muri uku kwamamaza tuzabona miliyoni 28£, ariko mu mwaka umwe twabonye miliyoni 36£.” Indi nzira yafasha u Rwanda kwinjiza binyuze muri Siporo hari ugutegura amarushanwa akomeye abera mu gihugu hakanategurwa ibikorwa byishimirwa n’Abanyamahanga baje muri iyi mikino, nko gusura ingagi n’izindi Pariki, gutembera mu Kivu no kuzamuka imisozi. RDB ivuga ko kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal mu myaka ibiri ishize, hamaze gutozwa abana n’abatoza basaga 120 ndetse no mu bufatanye na Paris Saint-Germain hazakorwa gahunda nk’iyi. Inzu y’imikino ya Kigali Arena, ikibuga cya Cricket kiri i Gahanga, ikibuga cya Kigali Golf Club kiri kuvugurwa biri mu byitezweho kuzazamura ubukeragendo bunyuze muri siporo. Mu 2017 ubukerarugendo bwinjirije u Rwanda miliyoni 401 z’Amadolari, ariko intego ya Guverinoma ni ukuzamura ayo madolari akaba miliyoni 800 mu 2024. Amafoto: Umurerwa Delphin

title: Imikino ikorwa abantu bategeranye yemerewe gusubukurwa mu Rwanda
content: Kuva tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020 nta gikorwa cya siporo cyari cyemewe mu Rwanda nyuma y’uko hari hashize umunsi umwe Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itangaje ko mu Rwanda habonetse umurwayi wa mbere wa COVID-19. Mu kwezi gushize, tariki ya 5 Gicurasi, Minisiteri ya Siporo yagiranye inama na Komite Olempike n’abahagarariye amashyirahamwe y’imikino n’ingaga za Siporo, hemezwa ko kare imikino ishobora gusubukurwa mu Rwanda ari muri Nzeri haba amarushanwa mu gihe muri Kanama hashobora gutangira imyitozo. Nk’uko bigaragaragara mu itangazo iyi Minisiteri yashyize ahagaragara ku wa Kane tariki ya 4 Kamena, imikino ikorwa abantu bategeranye irimo uwo kunyoga igare, gutwara imodoka, Tennis, Golf, kugenda n’amagare (Hiking) n’imikino ngororamubiri ishobora gusubukurwa ariko hakurikizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda. Yagize iti “Hashingiwe ku myanzuro y’Inama y’Abaminisitiri yo ku wa 2 Kanama 2020 ku ngamba zafashwe zo gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19, Minisiteri ya Siporo mu bufatanye na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, iratangaza ingamba zikurikira zo kubahiriza hasubukurwa ibikorwa bya siporo y’umuntu umwe cyangwa izindi zikorwa bategeranye.” “Ibikorwa bya siporo n’imikino byemerewe gusubukurwa ni: kwiruka (jogging), imikino ngororamubiri, kunyonga igare, imyitozo yo kugenda n’amaguru (hiking), Golf, Tennis, Umukino wo gutwara imodoka na Fencing (barwanisha inkota).” "Isubukurwa ry’ibikorwa bya siporo zavuzwe bitangirana na tariki ya 8 Kamena. Aya mabwiriza azavugurwa nyuma y’iminsi 15 hashingiwe ku isesengura ry’inzego z’ubuzima." Amabwiriza azubahirizwa ubwo iyi mikino izaba isubukuwe harimo kwambara agapfukamunwa mbere na nyuma y’imyitozo, kubahiriza intera ya metero imwe n’igice hagati y’abakorera siporo n’imyitozo hanze, kwitwaza imiti yo gusukura intoki mu gihe ukorera siporo no kuyikoresha igihe cyose bibaye ngombwa. Hari kandi kwitwararira ku isuku y’ahakorerwa siporo n’imikino hakoreshejwe imiti yemewe yica udukoko, gusukura ibikoresho byifashishwa no kwita by’umwihariko ahakorwa kenshi nko ku nzugi. Buri mukinnyi azajya ashyira ibikoresho bye ukwe, imikino yasubukuwe ntiyemewe gukoresha Stade Amahoro uretse hanze yayo (umuzenguruko wayo) mu gihe abagaragaje ibimenyetso birimo inkorora, kuribwa umutwe, ibicurane no kwitsamura, batemerewe gukorera imyitozo ngororamubiri mu ruhame ahubwo bagomba kwegera inzego z’ubuzima zikabakurikirana.

title: Dore amwe mu marenga wakoresha ugatuma umuntu agukunda byihuse
content:
Hagendewe ku bivugwa mu gitabo cya Lowndes, dore amwe mu marenga wakoresha ugatuma umuntu agukunda byihuse.  Benshi ntibita ku mikoreshereze y’amarenga (body language), nyamara ugendeye ku gitabo cya Leil Lowndes yise “How To Talt To Anyone” ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda bivuga “uko wavugisha buri wese”, ushobora kubona uko wakwigarurira umutima w’umuntu mu kanya gato utavuze ijambo na rimwe. Hagendewe ku bivugwa mu gitabo cya Lowndes, dore amwe mu marenga wakoresha ugatuma umuntu agukunda byihuse. 1.Inseko nziza Uyu mugabo Lowndes agaragaza ko atari byiza gusekera umuntu ukimusuhuza ako kanya; ngo iyo ubikoze bishobora guha amahirwe n’abandi bari aho bakamenya icyo ugambiriye. Uburyo bwiza bwo gutwara umuntu ukoresheje inseko ni ukwitonda, ukamureba mu maso nk’isegonda hanyuma ukareka mu maso hawe hagataha umucyo ukamusekera inseko nziza, bimwe Abanyarwanda bavuga ngo “Araseka amasaro agaseseka”. N’ubwo iyo nseko itamara amasegonda menshi, izemeza uwo muntu ko koko ari we igenewe. Ku bwa Lowndes ngo inseko nziza ishobora kukongerera ubutunzi n’icyizere abantu bakugirira. 2.Reba mu maso uwo muvugana
 Igihe uvugana n’umuntu, mera nk’aho amaso yawe amuteyeho, kabone n’ubwo yaba yarangije kuvuga, ntukarebe hirya uko wiboneye. Niba wumva ushaka kuba wareba ku ruhande bikore witonze kandi gahoro, kugeza igihe amaso yanyu atandukaniye. Ushobora no kugerageza kubara inshuro uwo muri kuvugana ahumbya. Ibi byagaragaje ko ababikora bakundwa cyane na bagenzi babo. 3.Gutumbera umuntu Iyo uri mu bantu benshi, ku bw’amahirwe ushobora kubona umuntu ukumva uramwishimiye, murebe umutumbere utitaye ku muntu uri kuvuga. Iyo umurebye cyane n’ubwo yaba ari kumva ibivugwa, ahita abona neza ko umwitayeho birenze cyangwa se wamwishimiye. Gusa ugomba kumenya ko gutumbera umuntu cyane bishobora kumutera isoni mu bandi. Ugomba kureba uvuga ariko yaba atari kuvuga ingingo zikomeye ugatumbera umwe wishimiye. 4.Garagaza urukundo nk’urwo ugaragaza ku mwana muto
 Abantu bose bita cyane ku buryo bitwara iyo bahuye n’abandi bwa mbere. Iyo uhuye n’umuntu bwa mbere igire nk’aho ubonye akana gato gateye amabengeza umugaragarize urukundo rutagabanyije, mbese nk’urwo waha akana gato kaje gakambakamba kakuririra ku birenge byawe. Urugero: Ushobora kubwira umuntu muhuye bwa mbere uti “Yo! Uri igitangaza”. 5.Gabanya ubukubaganyi no kwikorakoraho Niba wifuza ko abantu bakugirira icyizere, gerageza kugaragaza kudakubagana cyane igihe uganira nabo. Tuza, wigira ubwoba, wizenguruka cyane cyangwa ngo ushishure/ ushwanyaguze ikintu ufite. Lowndes avuga ko gukomeza kwikorakoraho nko mu maso, ku zuru, ku kananwa, ku munwa n’ahandi bishobora gutuma batekeraza ko ushobora kuba uri kubabeshya cyangwa utifitiye icyizere. Gerageza kureba uwo muvugana umugaragarize ko ibyo uri kumubwira ubishyizeho umutima kandi ubifite mu biganza byawe. 6.Irinde kuzinga umunya Uburyo wifata mu bantu ni yo ntsinzi ya mbere. Irinde kuzinga umunya mu maso uhorane isura icyeye. Uko winjiye mu muryango jya utunguka ku bo usanze ucyeye mu maso. 7. Muraho nshuti
 Nuhura n’umuntu bwa mbere, ifate nk’aho ari inshuti yawe ya kera, ibi bituma ibyiyumvo byawe kuri we byiyongera kuva ku ndoro yawe kugeza ku mano. Icyiyongera kuri ibi ni uko iyo ukoze nk’aho wakunze umuntu, ubwo buhanuzi bugusohoreramo ugasanga watangiye koko kumukunda. Ibi bivuzwe haruguru nubyitaho, ukagerageza gukoresha amarenga, ukirinda kuvuga menshi, ushobora gusekerwa n’amahirwe yo kubona urukundo wifuzaga kuva kera.

 Yanditswe na Eddie/Mwerekande/Muhabura.rw

title: Umwuka w’intambara ukomeje gututumba hagati ya Amerika na Iran
content: Iki gitero cyategetswe na Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, cyanahitanye Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, wari umuyobozi wungirije w’umutwe bivugwa ko ufashwa na Iran witwa (Popular Mobilization Forces), ibiro by’ubutasi bya Amerika (CIA) byemeje ko ariwo wateguye ukanagaba igitero kuri Ambasade ya Amerika mu mujyi wa Bagdad mu minsi ishize. Gen Qasem Soleimani na Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis barasiwe ku kibuga cy’indege cya Iraq i Bagdad, bari mu modoka hamwe n’abandi bantu batanu. Umuyobozi w’ikirenga muri Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, wahise ategeka iminsi itatu y’icyunamo mu gihugu hose, yavuze ko hateganyijwe kwihorera gukomeye ku bishe Gen Qasem Soleimani. Perezida wa Iran, Hassan Rouhani, na we yashimangiye ko igihugu cye kizakora ibishoboka byose kikihorera, aho yunganiwe na minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga muri Iran, Javad Zarif, wavuze ko igitero cya Amerika ari icy’iterabwoba. Ati “Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zizirengera ingaruka z’ubujiji bwazo.” Gen Qasem Soleimani yakundwaga kandi agafatwaga n’abanya-Iran benshi nk’umwe mu bantu bashobora kurinda ubusugire bw’igihugu cyabo. Ubuhangange bwe kandi bwareberwaga mu ishusho y’uko yafatwaga nka nomero ya kabiri mu bafata ibyemezo muri Iran. Abasesenguzi bavuga iki kuri uyu mwuka w’intambara? Abademokarate benshi bavuga ko icyemezo cya Trump gishobora gutuma intambara yeruye irota, kandi bakamunenga ko yagifashe atabanje kugisha inama Inteko Ishinga Amategeko. Kuba Soleimani yari umwanzi wa Amerika hari abademokarate babyemeza ariko bakavuga ko kwica umuntu wa kabiri ukomeye muri Iran kandi bigakorwa nta bwumvikane n’Inteko ishinga amategeko ari ikosa rishobora gushyira akarere kose Iran ihereremo mu ntambara. Joe Biden wabaye Visi perezida wa Amerika ku ngoma ya Barrack Obama, we yeruye avuga ko Trump yakojeje agati mu ntozi. Andrew Yang uteganya kwiyamamaza ku mwanya w’umukuru w’igihugu, ahagarariye ishyaka ry’abademokarate yagize ati “ Uko mbibona turashaka intambara na Iran ariko nsanga byaba byiza turebye kure tukirinda gushyira abaturage bacu batuye muri kariya karere mu kaga ko kwibasirwa n’abanzi bacu.” Elizabeth Warren, na we wifuza kuzahagararira ishyaka ry’abademokarate mu matora, yavuze ko icyemezo cya Trump kitarimo ubushishozi. Ati “Soleimani yari umwicanyi, wahitanye ubuzima bw’abantu benshi barimo n’amagana y’abanyamerika, ariko iki cyemezo kitarimo ubushishozi cyazamuye umwuka w’intambara hagati yacu na Iran, kandi gishobora gutuma hapfa abantu benshi mu karere ko mu burasirazuba bwo hagati Iran iherereyemo. Icy’ingenzi cyari gikwiye ni ukwirinda indi ntambara.” Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Burusiya, busanzwe ari umuterankunga wa mbere wa Iran, yavuze ko igitero cya Amerika kirongera ibibazo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati. Ku rundi ruhande ariko aba ‘republicains’ bo bavuga ko kwica uwo mugabo byari amahitamo akwiye kuko yari afite amaraso y’abanyamerika mu biganza bye, kandi yari imbogamizi ikomeye ku mutekano w’abanyamerika babarizwa mu karere ko mu burasirazuba bwo hagati n’inyungu zabo. Lindsey Graham, umusenateri uhagarariye leta ya Carolina y’Epfo yagize ati “Wakoze bwana Perezida kubwo guhagararira Amerika. Iki gikorwa cya Perezida Trump n’ingabo zacu, ni igisubizo nyacyo ku bushotoranyi bwa Iran bwari burangajwe imbere na Gen Soleimani n’abamushyigikiye.” Yongeyeho ati “Niba Iran ikomeje gutera Amerika n’abadushyigikiye, bagomba kubyishyura ku kiguzi kinini, kirimo no gusenya amariba yabo ya peteroli. Kuri leta ya Iran, niba mushaka kuguma mu bucuruzi bwa peteroli, mureke Amerika n’abadushyigikiye, kandi muhagarike gutera inkunga imitwe y’iterabwoba hirya no hino ku isi.” Hari amakuru avuga ko iki gitero cyahitanye Gen Soleimani, ingabo za Israel zaba zakigizemo uruhare. Nta muyobozi n’umwe muri Israel wari wagira icyo avuga kuri iki gitero kuko abaminisitiri bose babujijwe kugira icyo babivugaho kuko bishobora gukururira akaga icyo gihugu. Umutwe wa Hezbollah ubarizwa muri Liban, ukaba ushyigikiwe na Iran wahamagariye isi yose guhuriza hamwe bagahorera urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani. Umuyobozi w’uyu mutwe, Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah, yagize ati “Intego ya Leta Zunze Ubummwe za Amerika mu karere ntikwiye kugerwaho binyuze mu cyaha gikomeye cyo kwicwa abajenerali.” Minisitiri w’intebe wa Israel wari mu ruzinduko mu Bugereki, yahise arusubika rutarangiye nyuma yo kumva urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani, mu gihe Naftali Bennett, wari wamusigariyeho yahise atumiza inama y’igitaraganya yigaga ku mutekano i Tel Aviv, ndetse na za ambasade n’ibiro bihagarariye inyungu z’ibindi bihugu bahabwa umuburo wo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Bufaransa, Amelie de Montchalin, yavuze ko igihugu cye kizakomeza gukora uko gishoboye mu guteza imbere ituze n’umutekano mu karere k’uburasirazuba bwo hagati nyuma y’ibitero bya Amerika. Ati “Ibiri kuba nibyo twatinyaga, umwuka mubi hagati ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika uri kwiyongera.” Mu minsi ishize Gen Soleimani yari yaravuze ijambo ryarakaje Amerika, aho yagize ati “Ndakubwiye wowe Trump umukinnyi w’urusimbi, ndakubwiye, umenye ko turi hafi yawe kuruta uko ubikeka. Uzatangiza intambara, ariko nitwe dufite ubushobozi bwo kuzayisoza.” Ibibazo hagati ya leta ya Washington na Tehran byazamutse nyuma yuko Donald Trump akuye igihugu cye mu masezerano yo muri 2015 arebana no kubuza Iran gucura intwaro za kirimbuzi. Aya masezerano yabuzaga Iran kwigwizaho ibitwaro bya kirimbuzi mu gihe cy’imyaka 10, yafatwaga na benshi nk’intambwe ikomeye yatewe na Perezida Barack Obama muri politiki y’ububanyi n’amahanga. Kuva mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, abantu benshi biraye mu mihanda yo mu murwa mukuru Tehran, bigaragambya bamagana urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani. Ikindi kibazo kimaze kwigaragaza, ni izamuka rikomeye ry’igiciro cy’ibikomoka kuri peteroli hirya no hino ku masoko mpuzamahanga, ibigaragaza ko nubwo intambara y’amasasu itaratangira mu buryo bweruye, ariko iy’ubukungu yo yahise yaduka.

title: I Kigali hateguwe ibirori by’imideli bizakusanyirizwamo inkunga yo gufasha impunzi
content: Ni ibirori byiswe ‘Refugees Matter Show’ cyateguwe n’ikigo cyitwa Abigaelle Closet gisanzwe gikorera i Portland muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Iki kigo cyashinzwe n’urubyiruko rukomoka mu Rwanda no mu Burundi gikora kikanagurisha imyenda y’amoko atandukanye. Mu kiganiro n’umuyobozi wa Abigaelle Closet, Abigaelle Judicaelle Irakoze yabwiye IGIHE ko yagize iki gitekerezo cyo gukora ibi birori nyuma y’iminsi yari amaze i Kigali, yiyambaza abandi bantu batandukanye bakora umwuga nk’uwe ngo bafatanye gutegura iki gikorwa kizakusanyiriza hamwe amafaranga azajya gufasha impunzi mu nkambi ya Mahama mu Karere ka Kirehe. Yagize ati “Twifuje kubera ijwi abatarifite, kuba icyizere ku batagifite, ni muri urwo rwego twatekereje gukoresha kumurika imideli nka kimwe mu bikorwa byagira akamaro mu gufasha abatishoboye.” “Twateguye iki gikorwa mu rwego rwo gufasha impunzi z’Abarundi ziri mu nkambi ya Mahama, amafaranga azavamo yose azakoreshwa mu bikorwa by’ubufasha birimo kubagezaho ibikoresho nkenerwa, imyambaro n’ibindi tuzasanga ari ngombwa kuri bo.” Yongeyeho ko usibye amafaranga azakusanyirizwa muri iki gitaramo, abazitabira bashobora no kwitwaza imyambaro mizima itagikoreshwa mu rwego rwo kongera ingano y’imfashanyo izatangwa ku mpunzi ziri mu nkambi ya Mahama bifuje gufasha. Ibi birori by’imideli biteganyijwe kuba ku wa Gatanu tariki 16 Ukuboza 2016 muri Hotel des Milles Collines i Kigali guhera saa kumi n’ebyiri kugeza saa yine z’ijoro. Kizasusurutswa n’abahanzi batandukanye barimo Eric 1Key n’abanyarwenya barimo na Michael Sengazi uzaba n’umushyushyarugamba w’iki gitaramo. Abigaelle Closet yateguye iki gikorwa, izifatanya n’abandi bahanzi b’imideli barimo abo muri Uzuri K&Y ikora inkweto, abo muri ByAlpha Couture bakora ibijyanye n’imisatsi, Dokmai Rwanda n’abandi benshi. Imwe mu mideli ihangwa na Abigaelle Closet

title: Police FC niyo yatanze agahimbazamusyi gahanitse mu 2019/20: Uko andi makipe ahagaze
content: Amakipe y’abashinzwe umutekano, Police FC na APR FC, ni yo ayoboye andi mu gutanga agahimbazamusyi kari hejuru ku bakinnyi bayo mu mwaka ushize w’imikino wa 2019/20. Agahimbazamusyi ni ishimwe ku bantu bakoze neza, bakuzuza inshingano zabo, ndetse na Bibiliya bene abo batungwa n’ibyo bakoze. No mu mirimo itandukanye irimo imikino, hatangwa agahimbazamusyi ku bakinnyi kugira ngo barusheho guharanira intsinzi dore ko bamwe imishahara bayikumbura, abandi bakayitegereza amezi asaga arindwi. Police FC ni yo yatanze agahimbazamusyi kari hejuru Ikipe y’abashinzwe umutekano ni yo yatanze agahimbazamusyi gahanitse kurusha andi makipe mu mwaka ushize w’imikino. Mu 2019/20, buri mukinnyi wa Police FC yahabwaga ibihumbi 60 Frw ku mukino batsinze, by’akarusho agahabwa ibihumbi 150 Frw mu gihe batsinze umukino wabahuje na ya makipe akomeye. Ikipe ya kabiri kuri uru rutonde ni APR FC itanga ibihumbi 50 Frw kuri buri mukinnyi, iyo batsinze umukino bakiriye mu gihe ku mukino bakiniye hanze, iyo bawutsinze buri umwe ahabwa ibihumbi 80 Frw. Aha ariko, ku mukino wa Rayon Sports, biba bitandukanye ndetse bivugwa ko abakinnyi ba APR FC bakubiwe inshuro zirenga eshatu agahimbazamusyi ubwo batsindaga mukeba ibitego 2-0 mu Ukuboza 2019. Mu buryo busa n’ubutunguranye, Musanze FC niyo kipe ya gatatu yatanze agahimbazamusyi kari hejuru ku bakinnyi bayo, aho ku mukino iyi kipe yatsinze, buri umwe yahabwaga ibihumbi 40 Frw. Ubusanzwe Musanze FC itanga agahimbazamusyi k’ibihumbi 20 Frw ku mukino, ariko Umuyobozi wayo, Tuyishime Placide, yatangaga andi ibihumbi 20 Frw. AS Kigali, Bugesera FC na Kiyovu Sports zose zitanga agahimbazamusyi k’ibihumbi 30 Frw gusa nk’uko bimeze no ku yandi makipe, amafaranga ashobora kwiyongera bitewe n’ikipe bagiye gukina. Rayon Sports, Sunrise FC na Gicumbi FC zitanga agahimbazamusyi k’ibihumbi 25 Frw ku mukino. Amafaranga menshi abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports babonye muri uyu mwaka w’imikino ni kuri Kiyovu Sports aho bahawe ibihumbi 50 Frw ubwo bayitsinda igitego 1-0 mu Ukuboza 2019. Kuri Gicumbi FC yamanutse mu cyiciro cya kabiri, imikino ine abakinnyi bayo batsinze birashoboka ko hari icyo yabafashije mu buryo bumwe cyangwa ubundi kuko baheruka umushahara mu Ugushyingo 2019. Mukura Victory Sports, Gasogi United, Etincelle FC na Espoir FC zose zitanga agahimbazamusyi k’ibihumbi 20 Frw ku mukino. Mukura ifite umwihariko wo kuba iyo abakinnyi batsinze imikino yikurikiranya, hagenda hiyongeraho ibihumbi 10 Frw. Heroes FC yasubiye mu cyiciro cya kabiri nyuma y’umwaka umwe, yatangaga agahimbazamushyi k’ibihumbi 15 Frw ku mukino mu gihe AS Muhanga na Marines FC zatanga ibihumbi 10 Frw ku mukino, ashobora kwiyongera bitewe n’ikipe bagiye guhura nayo. Uwashushanyije: Umurerwa Delphin

title: Hagiye gushorwa miliyoni $18 mu ikoranabuhanga rizaca uburiganya mu bamotari
content: Ni amasezerano yasinywe n’impande zombi kuri uyu wa mbere agamije gushyira ikoranabuhangaririmo mubazi na GPS kuri moto ndetse na porogaramu izajya ishyirwa muri telephone ku buryo abashinzwe umutekano babasha kugenzura moto aho yaba iri hose. Muri uyu muhango wo gusinya amasezerano, Minisiteri y’ibikorwa remezo yatangaje ko umunsi iri koranabuhanga rizaba ryatangiye gukoreshwa, rizafasha guca imwe mu myitwarire idahwitse n’amakosa byagaragaraga mu mwuga wo gutwara abantu kuri moto. Umukozi ushinzwe Ubwikorezi rusange n’umutekano wo mu muhanda mu Minisiteri y’ibikorwa remezo, Zirikana François, yagize ati “Kugeza ubu iyo urebye mu bamotari benshi bakora impanuka usanga nta bwishingizi bafite ariko muri iri koranabuhanga umumotari udafite ubwishingizi tuzajya tumureba tumenya ko bwarangiye.” “Icya kabiri ni uko umumotari udafite ibyangombwa ntabwo azashobora kongera gutwara moto kuko iryo koranabuhanga rizajya rihabwa umuntu ufite icyangombwa”. Zirikana yavuze ko kandi iri koranabuhanga rizaba ririmo akuma kazafasha gukurikirana umumotari igihe yakoze amakosa. Mininfra yavuze ko iri koranabuhanga ritagamije guca abamotari mu muhanda ahubwo ko rije mu buryo bwo kurushaho gushimangira imikorere myiza. Umuyobozi wa Pascal Technology (PTY) Limited, Pascal Ndizeye, yavuze ko iri koranabuhanga rizatangira gushyirwa muri moto uhereye mu cyumweru gitaha kuko icyabakerezaga ari amikoro. Ati “Kuva dusinyanye amasezerano y’imikoranire ni iyi kompanyi nini muri Afurika kandi ibikoresho byinshi by’ibanze byamaze kuhagera, turatangira mu cyumweru gitaha duhereye ku bamotari barenga ibihumbi birindwi bamaze kwiyandikisha.” Ndizeye yongeyeho ko kugera muri Mutarama abamotari 10 000 bazaba bamaze kugezwaho iri koranabuhanga. Iri koranabuhanga rizajyana na porogaramu ya telefoni aho umuntu ashobora kuzuzamo nimero ziranga moto agahita abona aho iherereye, igihe yakoze amakosa. Kuri ubu umumotari wifuza iri koranabuhanga ashobora kwishyura ibihumbi 200 n’amafaranga 200 mu byiciro cyangwa akayishyurira rimwe. Uretse ibijyanye n’umutekano iri koranabuhanga ryitezweho kuzafasha mu bijyanye n’igenamigambi kuko izi mashini zizerekana umubare w’abantu bakoresha moto mu Rwanda ndetse n’uw’abari muri uyu mwuga wo gutwara abantu kuri moto.

title: Abahanzi Nyarwanda bahinduje uruhu rwabo bamaze kwamamara – “Reba amafoto”
content:
Iterambere rya muntu akenshi usanga rijyana n’impinduka haba ku mu biri we ndetse n’ibikorwa bye, aha ku bahanzi Nyarwanda bo siko bimeze cyane ko n’abafana babo bagenda babivugaho amagambo atandukanye kuko bamwe bemeza ko atari uguter’imbere k’umuhanzi ahubwo ari ukwihinduza uruhu cyangwa kwitukuza.

Aha kandi icyo umuntu yavuga ku kuba umuntu cyangwa wenda umuhanzi yakwihinduza uruhu ntago byagakwiye kuba ikibazo cyane usibyeko burya ku rundi ruhande buri gihugu kigira umuco wacyo ari nayo mpamvu no mu muco Nyarwanda icyo kintu cyo kuba umuntu yakwitukuza twavuga ko kigaragara nk’aho ari ikintu kidasnzwe. Hari abahanzi benshi bagaragara ko bitukuje hano mu Rwanda n’ubwo iyo urebye usanga biba kuri buri muntu wese ugenda atera imbere cyane cyane mu rwego rw’agafaranga ariko iyo umuntu ari imboni ya rubanda usanga we abonwa mbere y’abandi ari nayo mpamvu aba bahanzi twaguteguriye nyuma yabo hari n’abandi benshi ariko wenda usanga batavugwa cyane n’abangaba.  1. title: Nkurunziza Gustave umuyobozi wa federasiyo ya volleyball n’uwari umubitsi bari mu maboko ya Police
content:
Umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Volleyball mu Rwanda FRVB, Nkurunziza Gustave, yatawe muri yombi na Police y’u Rwanda ku mugoroba w’ejo aho akekwaho icyaha cya ruswa. Ni nyuma y’aho tariki ya 8 Gashyantare umuvugizi wa Police y’u Rwanda yatangarije  ko umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa muri FRVB Hatumimana Christian ndetse n’umubitsi Uwera Jeannette bakekwaho icyaha cya rusa mu gucunga umutungo wa federasiyo cyane cyane mu bihe byo guteguraga amatora y’ubuyobozi bushya bwabo. Tariki ya 9 Gashyantare, umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa muri Komite National Olempike Mukundiyukuri Jado na we yatawe muri yombi akekwaho icyaha cya ruswa. ACP Theos Badege umuvugizi wa Police y’u Rwanda Yagize ati “Kugeza ubu iperereza rira cyakomeza ubu abari mu baboko ya Police bagera kuri bane aho bose bakekwaho icyaha cya ruswa cyane cyane mu bihe by’amatora y’ubuyobozi bushya”. Amatora y’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino wa Volleyball mu Rwanda yabaye tariki ya 4 Gashyantare uyu mwaka aho uwari usanzwe ayobora Nkurunziza Gustave ari we wongeye gutsindira aya amatora ndetse n’Uwera Jeannette yongera kuba umubitsi wa Federation. Komite nshya yatowe Ku mwanya w’umuyobozi mukuru wa FRVB: Nkurunziza Gustave.
Visi Perezida wa mbere: Kansime Julius (wari umukandida umwe rukumbi).
Visi Perezida wa kabiri: Ribanje Jean Pierre.
Umunyamabanga Mukuru: Mfashimana Adalbert umukandida (wari umwe rukumbi)
Umwanya w’umubitsi:  Uwera Jeannette wari usanzwe kuri uyu mwanya.
Umugenzuzi w’imali: Umutesi Marie Jose na Imibereho Irene MUHABURA.RW

title: Inkuru ndende y’urukundo “Amaherezo” igice 4
content: Akenshi mu rukundo habamo ibyishimo bidasanzwe kimwe n’uko ibigeragezo iyo byageze mu rukundo ahanini usanga bake aribo babasha kubyihanganira no kubyakira ariko ugasanga abandi bikabananira guhagarara ku cyemezo bahisemo cyo kujya mu rukundo.  Amaherezo Igice cya 3  Kubabashije gukurikira agace gaheruka muzi neza ko Sifa na Jado bwa mbere bari bavuganye kuri telephone nyine ari ibicika. Ubu rero tugiye gukomeza n’agace gakurikiraho ubundi mwiyumvire amaherezo y’aba bombi nako si amaherezo ahubwo ni agace gakurikiraho ……. kunshuro yambere Jado yandikira Sifa yahise amubwira ati nukuri ndishimye uvugana nawe ariko nzashimishwa cyane n’uko ibi bizakomeza tukajya tuvugana kandi n’ubucuti bwacu bukazarenga aha ngaha, gusa nyine nk’undi mukobwa wese burya aramanza akareba umuhungu ese afite gahunda ki kuri ngewe? Ese ni ubucuti busanzwe? Ese agamije iki kuri ngewe? Ubwo nyine na Sifa yanze guhita asubiza ubwo butumwa yari yandikwe na Jado ahubwo yabaye aretse kubusubiza.sasa rero ubundi bavugana kuri telephone bwa mbere hari mu masaha yo ku manywa ubwo nyine Jado yatangiye kimwe bita guhinga dore ko yageze kuburiri ninjoro agiye kuryama agahamagra Sifa akamubaza amakuru nyine n’ukuntu yiriwe ubundi ako kanya nibwo bahise bemeranya ko umwe azajya agura messaje n’undi akazigura kugirango bajye baganira bakoresheje ubutumwa bugufi Ubwo nyine birumvikana ako kanya bamaze kuvugana batangira kwandikirana ubutumwa bugufi gusa muri uwo mwanya  baganiraga ibitandukanye n’ibyo bajyaga baganira kuri Facebook cyane ko batangiye kwibwirana neza mu buryo bwimbitse kuburyo umwe yabazaga umwe ikibazo kijyanye n’ubuzima bwe n’undi akamubaza gutyo gutyo kuburyo iryo joro kuryama kuri buri umwe byabaye ikibazo, sasa nyine iryo joro ryasize buri umwe yatangiye kwiyumvamo undi ari nabwo kuva uwo munsi umubano wabo watangiye kujya uhindura isura kuburyo Jado yatangiye kujya abaza Sifa niba yariye, Yanyoye icyayi, Yashashe, Yakoze isuku ndetse n’utundi tubazo umuhungu cyangwa umukobwa ajya akunda kubaza umukunzi we  cyane ko nabo bari batangiye kujya babana nk’abakunzi n’ubwo bwose atariko byari bimeze gusa nyine aho byashyaga bishyira buri umwe yabaga ahabona Sasa ubwo muri iyo minsi nibwo Jado yaje gufata umunsi umwe dore ko uwo munsi waje kuba amateka kuri aba bombi ari nayo mpamvu baje gukomezanya murukundo ndetse kuri ubu bakaba babyiruye umwana mukuru kandi babana byemewe n’amategeko uwo munsi umwe rero w’amateka niwo Jado yagize atya afata amafaranga 200 maze aravuga ati ngomba kuya…… Agace gakurikira ntucikwe Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Uganda: Minisitiri Simon  yavuze ko shitani yamurushije imbaraga
content: Minisitiri Simon Lokodo w’imyitwarire muri Uganda yavuze ko shitani yamurushije imbaraga akananirwa kuburizamo iserukiramuco ry’umuziki rya Nyege Nyege ry’uyu mwaka.Ni nyuma y’uko uyu muyobozi yagerageje guhagarika iri serukiramuco ndetse akanandikira Polisi ya Uganda ko baburizamo iki gikorwa kugira ngo nti kibe ariko byarangiye kibaye. Minisitiri Lokodo avuga ko iri serukiramuco rishishikariza abantu gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ku karubanda, imibonano mpuzabitsina y’ab’igitsina kimwe ndetse no gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. Ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor ducyesha iyi nkuru,gisubiramo amagambo ye agira ati"Nagerageje uko nshoboye ngo ndiburizemo, ariko shitani ifite ikiganza gikomeye. Nagombaga gukuramo akanjye karenge." Ku wa kabiri, Bwana Lokodo yari yatangaje ko iri serukiramuco ngarukamwaka ritazaba ariko hashize amasaha macye Jeje Odong, Minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu wa Uganda, aburizamo icyemezo cye. Leta ya Uganda nyuma yaje kwemerera iri serukiramuco kuba, nuko ritangira ku wa kane. Kuva ryatangira kuba mu mwaka wa 2015, iri serukiramuco ryakomeje kuba buri mwaka rikabera ku nkombe z’uruzi rwa Nili mu burasirazuba bwa Uganda. Ryitabibwa cyane n’urubyiruko rwo mu mijyi. Mu gihe cy’iminsi ine, abahanzi baturutse muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika, i Burayi no mu bindi bice by’Afurika, byitezwe ko bazasusurutsa abitabiriye iri serukiramuco riterwa inkunga n’abarimo ikigo cy’umuco cy’Ubwongereza, kompanyi y’itumanaho ya MTN ndetse n’ikinyobwa cya Coca-Cola. Abateguye iri serukiramuco bavuga ko biteze ko abantu ibihumbi 8 bazaryitabira, bavuye ku bihumbi 6 baryitabiriye umwaka ushize, nkuko bitangazwa n’ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor. Minisitiri Lokodo wigeze no kuba padiri, azwi kubera ukuntu ashyigikira ko imibanire y’abantu ya kera idahinduka. Ku wa kabiri, yavuze ko iri serukiramuco "rimeze nko gusenga shitani kandi ntibyemewe." Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor ati "Iki kintu [Nyege Nyege] nta cyiza cyacyo na busa. Nacukumbuye ibyacyo nsanga atari shyashya. Ni igikoresho kiri gukoreshwa na basaza bacu na bashiki bacu bo muri Amerika n’ab’i Burayi ngo batuzanire umuco n’imyitwarire by’amahanga bitari mu mategeko, umuco n’ukwemera kwacu." SOMA INKURU BIFITANYE ISANO:http://muhabura.rw/amakuru/hanze/article/uganda-ubutinganyi-bukabije-bwatumye-leta-ihagarika Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Abanyarwanda batuye mu Busuwisi bibutse ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi (Amafoto)
content: Bitewe n’ibihe bidasanzwe byo guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus cyugarije Isi, ibikorwa byo kwibuka mu Busuwisi byakozwe mu buryo budasanzwe. Igikorwa cyo gutangiza Icyumweru cy’Icyunamo ku wa 7 Mata 2020, cyabaye hifashishijwe imbuga nkoranyambaga mu guhererekanya ubutumwa n’amashusho bijyanye no kwibuka. Umuhango wo Kwibuka wateguwe ku bufatanye bwa Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Busuwisi, Ibuka Suisse na Diaspora Nyarwanda muri iki gihugu. Wabimburiwe no gushyira indabo ku rwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ruri imbere y’Ibiro Bikuru by’Umuryango w’Abibumbye i Genève, aho bita Places des Nations. Wakurikiwe n’umunota wo kwibuka no gucana urumuri rw’icyizere. Mu rwego rwo kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda Coronavirus, umuhango wo gushyira indabo ku rwibutso rwa Jenoside wakozwe na Rwakazina Marie Chantal uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Busuwisi no mu Muryango w’Abibumbye i Genève; Umuyobozi wa Diaspora Nyarwanda, Yves Cyaka na Perezida wa Ibuka muri icyo gihugu, Murangira César. Abanyarwanda batuye mu Busuwisi n’abandi bifatanyije na bo basabwe kubahiriza umunota wo kwibuka no gucana urumuri rw’icyizere mu miryango yabo aho bari. Ambasaderi Rwakazina yavuze ko nta kintu gishobora kubuza Abanyarwanda kwibuka abarenga miliyoni bazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Yasobanuye ko kwibuka ari ukwiyubaka, kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside no kuyikumira binyuze ku masomo ava mu byo igihugu cyanyuzemo. Yagize ati “Kwibuka ni uguha agaciro abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside no kubashimira uruhare rwabo mu bumwe n’ubwiyunge bw’Abanyarwanda no mu kubaka igihugu muri rusange. Ubuhamya batanga butuma Abanyarwanda bigira ku byabaye dore ko ijoro ribara uwariraye.’’ Ambasaderi Rwakazina yavuze ko umugambi wo gukora Jenoside wacuzwe mbere n’abategetsi babi bayoboye u Rwanda ariko ushyirwa mu bikorwa mu 1994. Nyuma y’imyaka 26, Ingabo zari iza RPA zihagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi hari abakigaragara mu bikorwa byo kuyihakana no kuyipfobya mu bihugu bitandukanye ku Isi cyane mu bihugu by’Iburengerazuba. Yakomeje ati “Babeshya ko baharanira amahoro, uburenganzira bw’ikiremwamuntu n’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge mu Rwanda ndetse bakifashisha inama, ibiganirompaka, inyandiko zo muri kaminuza, itangazamakuru n’imbuga nkoranyambaga. ” Ambasaderi Rwakazina yashimiye ibihugu byashyizeho amategeko ahana ihakana rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, anahamagarira ibindi kubikurikiza. Abitabiriye uyu muhango banasangijwe ubutumwa bw’Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni, Antonio Guterres, wavuze ko Kwibuka Jenoside bituma ‘twigira ku mateka y’abacitse ku icumu ku bijyanye n’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge no kongera kwiyubaka.’ Yanavuze ko nyuma ya Jenoside u Rwanda rwerekanye ko bishoboka ko ibihugu byongera kwiyubaka bihereye ku busa. U Rwanda rwanyuze mu nzira itoroshye kuva Jenoside ihagaritswe, igihugu cyasanwe guhera ku busa, cyubaka ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda ndetse kinateza imbere ubukungu budaheza n’igihugu kigendera ku mategeko. Ni intambwe igihugu cyagezeho kibikesha ubuyobozi bwiza burangajwe imbere na Perezida Paul Kagame, binyuze muri gahunda za Leta ziri mu cyerekezo cya 2020 n’icya 2050. Mu butumwa bw’abayobozi ba Loni bijeje gukomeza kurwanya imvugo zihembera urwango. Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Loni i Genève, Tatiana Valovaya, yavuze ko n’ubwo hashize imyaka 26 ‘ntidushobora kwibagirwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.’’ Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Loni i Vienne, Ghada Fathi Waly, na we yashimiye abitangiye kurokora ubuzima bwa benshi n’umuhate w’Abanyarwanda baharaniye ubumwe n’ubwiyunge. Ati ‘‘Tugomba kunga ubumwe tukarwanya inzangano n’irondakoko.’’ Perezida wa Ibuka Suisse, Murangira César, mu butumwa bwe yahumurije abacitse ku icumu, ababwira ko atari bonyine. Yavuze ko imyaka 26 ishize ibafasha gusubiza amaso inyuma bakareba aho bavuye, urugendo bamaze gukora, aho bageze ndetse n’aho bagana. Yagize ati ‘‘N’ubwo urugendo rwo kwiyubaka rwari rugoye ariko nta cyatubujije kureba imbere tugana aho twifuza kugera.’’ Yashimye intambwe ikomeye yo kwiyubaka no kwiyomora ibikomere bigaragara n’ibitagaragara byasizwe na Jenoside. Imbuga nkoranyambaga zakoreshejwe mu gikorwa cyo kwibuka zifashishijwe mu gihe cyose cy’icyunamo zibanda ku buhamya bw’abacitse ku icumu n’ibiganiro bigamije kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside.

title: Incamake ku gitabo “Stop Working for Uncle Sam” gikebura abahora barambirije ku mushahara
content: Abafite akazi na bo bararira, bamwe binubira umushahara w’intica ntikize bahabwa, abandi barambiwe guhora bafatirwa imyanzuro y’icyo bakora, igihe bagikorera n’uko bagikora nta ruhare babigizemo. Sunday Adelaja ni umupasiteri wo muri Nigeria, yabavunnye amaguru mu gitabo cye ‘Stop Working for Uncle Sam’ cyasohotse mu 2017. Ni igitabo kigaragaza inzira zose wanyuramo ukareka gukorera abandi, aho gukoreshwa ugatangira gukoresha abandi. Iki gitabo kigereranya abakorera umushahara nk’abacakara bahorana ubukene bw’amafaranga, bagenerwa utuvungukira ku murundo w’ibyo baba babiriye icyuya, kandi hari uburyo nabo bakwiteza imbere. Umwanditsi asobanura Uncle Sam nk’ahantu hose ujya gushaka akazi cyangwa uburyo bw’imikorere aho imibereho yawe yose uyikesha uwo muntu cyangwa urwo rwego ruguha umushahara. Kubaho ukorera abandi Sunday abigereranya nk’ubucakara buburizamo ubwigenge bw’umuntu, aho ukora icyo bakubwiye cyose nta mwanya wo gutekereza cyangwa gukora ibintu nk’uko wowe ubishaka. Ati “Mu gihe ukorera Uncle Sam, uba wishyira mu bucakara ku bushake bwawe kubera ko akwishyura udufaranga tw’intica ntikize. Kubera utwo tuntu duke, uremera ukagurisha ubuzima bwawe, ukagurisha ukwishyira ukizana kwawe, uba uboshye udashobora guhindukira ngo ugane iburyo cyangwa ibumoso.” “Ntushobora kuvuga ngo ugiye mu biruhuko igihe ushakiye umukoresha wawe atabyemeye. Ntushobora kwihitiramo ngo ngiye aha n’aha mu gihe wenda cy’ukwezi, uba uziritswe.” Ni igitabo kigaragaza uburyo bwo guhunga ubucakara bwo kuba umukozi ahubwo ukaba umukoresha, ukareka kuba wa muntu uhorana ubukene kandi ukora buri munsi. Iki gitabo kigaragaza kandi ko abantu bose badakwiye kumva ko bakwikorera, ahubwo bashobora gukorera abandi, bakitanga bishoboka ariko batameze nk’abacakara. Agira inama abantu ko bakwiriye kwirinda kuguma mu kazi banga, kuko uko kukagumamo bituma bagakora nabi kurusha, bikarangira bashwanye n’abakoresha babo. Ingingo yo gukoresha igihe neza, nayo umwanditsi ayigarukaho, aho asobanura ko igihe kigereranywa n’ubuzima, kugikoresha nabi bikaba bisa no kwangiza ubuzima bwawe. Asobanura kandi ibyiza byo kwiga, ariko mu bundi buryo, aho usanga abantu benshi bumva ko kwiga bakaminuza bihagije kugira ngo babeho mu buzima bwiza bifuza, aho avuga ko atari byo ndetse bitanahuye. Iki gitabo cy’amapaji 292 kiboneka kuri Amazon.

title: Islam yagize icyo ivuga nyuma yokubuzwa gukoresha indagururamajwi ku misigiti
content:
Nyuma yuko Umurenge wa Nyarugenge  kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki ya 14 Werurwe usohoye itangazo rivuga ko hafashwe icyemezo cyo guhagarika indangururamajwi zo ku misigiti umujyanama wa Mufti w’ Rwanda yatangaje ko kiriya cyemezo cyababangamiye ariko bagiye gusaba Leta ngo ice inkoni izamba,ngo ni byananirana bazifashisha ubundi buryo mugutora Adhana nko gushyira adhana muri telefone, igihe cyagera cyo gusenga ikibutsa nyirayo . hashingiwe ku bugenzuzi bwakozwe ku nsengero n’imisigiti ku wa 19 Gashyantare 2018, bagasanga imisigiti ikoresha indangururamajwi hejuru yayo bigatera urusaku. Mu ibaruwa yandikiwe imisigiti, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyarugenge, Havuguziga Charles, yagize ati “Mbandikiye ngira ngo mbasabe guhagarika gukoresha izo ndangururamajwi mugashaka ubundi buryo budateza urusaku iyo muhamagara abayoboke ku isaha y’isengesho.”

Nyuma y’iki cyemezo Umujyanama wa Mufti w’ Rwanda, Sheikh Mbarushimana Suleiman, yabwiye itangazamakuru  ko guhagarika gukoresha indangururamajwi mu guhamagarira abayoboke gusenga ari icyemezo cyababangamiye. Yagize ati “Twumva ko rero igikwiye atari uguhagarika iyo ‘adhana’ ahubwo ari ukuyikora neza, umuhamagaro ugakorwa ku buryo nta n’umwe ubangamirwa; ubundi ahari nk’amikoro ifite ijwi rirangira bigatuma hari abo ribuza gusinzira cyangwa kuruhuka, ibyo rwose tugasaba ko bikorwa mu ijwi ryiza rigera kuri ba bandi bakora isengesho kuri uwo musigiti.”

Yakomeje avuga ko ‘gutora adhana’ bishingiye ku kwemera kw’ibanze kwa Islam agira ati"kuko n’ubundi uba uhamagarira abantu kuza gusingiza ya Mana imwe, gusenga ya Mana imwe, iruta byose; kubakura muri wa murongo w’ibindi bikorwa bakibagirwa igihe cyo gushimira Imana. Ku buryo rero kuba hari uwavuga ati ‘uwo muhamagaro nuhagarare’ yaba ahagaritse kwemera Imana no kuyiha agaciro ikwiye mu gihe cyayo.” Mu gihe leta yahakanira Islam gukomeza gukoresha indangururamajwi, Sheikh Mbarushimana yavuze ko hari izindi nzira eshatu bahita bifashisha mu ‘gutora adhana’. Yagize ati “Twasaba ko ziriya ndangururamajwi, amajwi agarukira imbere mu rusengero, tukongera tugakoresha ubundi buryo bwa kabiri bwo kumenyereza abayisilamu ko igihe cyo gusenga niba kigeze baba bakizi bose bakahagera mbere y’igihe. Ku buryo na wa wundi wari utegereje ko ari bwumve ijwi rimuhamagara rirangurura ridahari, akabimenya akibwiriza akaza mbere.” Uretse ubwo, Sheikh Mbarushimana yavuze ko kuri ubu ikoranabuhanga rifasha, ku buryo adhana yashyirwa muri telefone, igihe cyagera ikibutsa nyirayo ko isaha yo gusenga ibura iminota 15, akitegura. Inzego za leta zimaze iminsi mu igenzura ry’insengero hirya no hino mu gihugu, aho zisanze hari ibyo zibura zigafungwa. I Kigali no mu Majyaruguru gusa, hafunzwe insengero zirenga 1400. Mu birebwa harimo no kuba zidateza urusaku aho zikorera. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Amafoto: Yatengushye abamutumiye aza gucana urumuri rwa Christmas yambaye hafi ubusa
content:
Nyuma yo kwegukana X Factor umwaka ushize, mu ijoro ryo kuwa Kane w’icyumweru gishize Louisa Johnson w’imyaka 18 yitabiriye ubutumire bwo kuza gucana urumuri rwa Christmas, ubwo yageraga imbere y’imbaga yari yambaye ikanzu igaragaza ubwambure bwe nyamara agishyika aho byabereye, Shieffild yari yiyambariye ibigera ku marenge. 
Nyamara agishyika aho byabereye, Shieffild yari yiyambariye ibigera ku marenge. Uyu mukobwa wamenyekenye ku ndirimbo nka The Tears, hejuru ho yari yambaye jacket y’mabara menshi mu rwego rwa kurwanya imbeho dore ko hariya I Burayi bageze mu bihe by’ubukonje 


 Muri uwo mugoroba kandi, Louisa yifatanyije na mugenzi we James Arthur nawe wegukanye ITV talent show, maze baririmbira abari aho muri Meadowhall Presents Christmas Live muri Meadowhall Shopping Centre. Byahuriranye no gushyira hanze indirimbo ye yitwa So Good.  
James Arthur nawe wegukanye ITV talent show 2015 Nyuma gato yaje kugirana ikiganiro na MailOnline, Louisa avuga ko bisanzwe. Ngo ntiyumva impamvu abantu babigize intambara kandi we ntacyo bimutwaye. Kuwa Gatandatu yaje kubigarukaho, agira ati: “ntekerezako bageze kure! Hari amagambo menshi n’ibitekerez byinshi kuri ibyo, ariko nge numva ari ngombwa ko abantu Bambara uko biyumva. Iyo nyirabyo abyishimiye, yumva nta pfunwe, akumva ameze neza kandi ari Sexy, nge mbona ari byiza. “nge ntacyo bimbwiye, nari ndi kubyinjiramo. Ndabyemera, none mbonye aho kubikorera ntigeze mbona kuva cyera, kwambara biryoshye gutya…. Nk’umuntu ukiri muto, ukonje kandi ugezweho. Hari myambarire myinshi, ni ngombwa kureba ibyo ukunda n’ibyo udakunda. Ndi umunyamahirwe kuba mfite amahirwe yo kumenyaibimbereye. Ndanikunda! Ni ibyo". 
 



 Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Impamvu umwuka mubi hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda atari ikibazo bwite cya Perezida Kagame na Museveni
content: Kuba itandukaniro ry’amahame rihindurwa ikibazo kiri hagati y’abantu bigaragaza urwego icengezamatwara rigezeho muri aya makimbirane, bigapfukirana icyari itangazamakuru ririmo gutera imbere mu karere, bikangiza icyizere abantu bari bamaze kugirira abafatwaga nk’abavuga ukuri muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. Abantu bamwe batekereza ko ikibazo gihari uyu munsi ari ingaruka zatinze kugaragara z’intambara za Kisangani mu myaka ya 1990. Nubwo hashobora kubamo ukuri ko abantu bamwe mu bakuze bo mu bajenerali ba Uganda, ahanini ba hafi ba Salim Saleh, bananiwe kwakira isoni bakojejwe, ibyabaye ubwabyo zari ingaruka z’ikibazo kiri hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda. U Rwanda rufite amahame rugenderaho kuri Uganda kandi Kagame ni we yubakiyeho nka Perezida w’u Rwanda. Ni amahame y’u Rwanda nk’igihugu cyigenga, ntabwo giteze guhinduka ikindi gice runaka, noneho kiyobowe na Perezida Yoweri Kaguta Museveni. Ntabwo ari ibiri hagati y’abantu, ni umubano hagati ya za leta – ni ibintu bireba ibihugu. Ubwo RPF yajyaga ku butegetsi mu 1994, Museveni n’abambari be batekereje ko babonye ikindi kibuga cyo kongera ku cyo bari bafite. Museveni yashakaga gutegeka ngo ni nde ujya muri Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ndetse bene wabo bamanukira muri Kigali bashaka amasoko nk’uko babikoraga kandi n’ubu bakibikomeje muri Uganda. Museveni wari umaze gukurirwa inzira ku murima yahise atangira amayeri ye. Yatangiye ibikorwa yibwiraga ko bizatera igitutu ubutegetsi bwa Kigali bugaha rugari ugushaka kwe ko kugenzura u Rwanda, mbere na mbere mu nyungu z’umuryango we. Byanze, yahise agaragaza neza ko afite ubushobozi bwo guteza akaduruvayo kuri icyo gihugu cyari kikiri gito, tuvugishie ukuri, gifite ubuyobozi bumaze igihe gito muri Kigali. Icyo cyari kuba ikiguzi cyo kumwima uburenganzira bwo kugira ijambo rya nyuma ku byemezo bikomeye ndetse no guha rugari umuryango we ngo usahure igihugu uko ubyifuza.
