Mu mukino wa mbere w’ijonjora Amavubi azahura n’ikipe y’igihugu ya Ethiopia aho ku itariki ya 20 Nzeri mu mukino ubanza, naho uwo kwishyura ukaba ku ya 10 Ukwakira.

 Basesekaye i Kinshasa  Aba nibo bakinnyi 23 bajyanywe muri Congo mu rwego rwo kwitegura uyu mukino
Abanyezamu: Ndayishimiye Eric Bakame (AS Kigali), Kimenyi Yves (Rayon Sports) na Rwabugiri Umar (APR FC). Ba Myugariro: Omborenga Fitina (APR FC), Imanishimwe Emmanuel (APR FC), Rutanga Eric (Rayon Sports), Iradukunda Eric (Rayon Sports), Manzi Thierry (APR FC), Mutsinzi Ange (APR FC), Nsabimana Aimable (Police FC) na Bishira Latif (AS Kigali). Abakina hagati: Niyonzima Haruna (AS Kigali), Iranzi Jean Claude (Rayon Sports), Butera Andrew (APR FC), Niyonzima Olivier Sefu (APR FC), Nsabimana Eric Zidane (AS Kigali), Nshimiyimana Amran (Rayon Sports).

title: USA: Batangiye guteganya icyakorwa Joe Biden ahagaritse kwiyamamaza; Hillary na Obama bahanzwe amaso
content:
Amatora yo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika azaba mu Ugushyingo uyu mwaka. Joe Biden niwe mukandida uhabwa amahirwe yose yo guhangana na Perezida Donald Trump uhagarariye aba-républicains. Douglas MacKinnon wahoze ashinzwe itumanaho mu biro bya Perezida wa Amerika yatangaje ko aba- démocrates batangiye gutekereza ku wasimbura Joe Biden mu gihe yaba akuyemo kandidatire. MacKinnon yavuze ko Biden afite ibisitaza bitatu bishobora kubangamira kandidatire ye. Muri byo harimo imyaka ye dore ko afite 77, umugore witwa Tara Reade umushinja ko yigeze kumufata ku ngufu n’ibibazo by’umuhungu we Hunter Biden ushinjwa gukorana ubucuruzi rwihishwa n’abanya-Ukraine. MacKinnon yagize ati “Kubera izo mpamvu n’izindi nyinshi, ese twakwitega ko Biden azava mu isiganarwa cyangwa akabikora ku bushake gusa? Reka tuvuge biramutse bibaye mbere cyangwa nyuma y’inteko rusange y’ishyaka, byagenda gute?” Mu gihe Biden yaba yikuye mu irushanwa, hatorwa undi mukandida umusimbura.
MacKinnon avuga ko Hillary Clinton wiyamamaje mu 2016 agatsindwa na Trump ari we ufite amahirwe menshi yo kuba yatoranywa agasimbura Biden akuyemo akarenge, naho Barack Obama wigeze kuba Perezida akamubera visi Perezida. Icyo gitekerezo cya MacKinnon icyakora kiracyahura n’imbogamizi mu mategeko, aho Itegeko Nshinga Amerika rikirimo icyuho ku kuba Visi Perezida warigeze gutorerwa kuba Perezida inshuro ebyiri. Itegeko Nshinga rya Amerika ubwo ryavugururwaga ku nshuro ya 22, ryemeje ko nta muntu wemerewe gutorerwa manda zirenze ebyiri ari Perezida wa Amerika. Ubusanzwe mu gihe Perezida agize ikibazo gituma atabasha kuyobora, Visi Perezida we niwe uhita amusimbura by’agateganyo. Ibyo bivuze ko Obama abaye Visi Perezida, Clinton akagira ikibazo gituma adakomeza kuba Perezida, Obama yahita amusimbura akaba abaye Perezida inshuro eshatu kandi bitemewe. Icyakora, abasesenguzi bavuga ko Obama abaye Visi Perezida muri ubwo buryo ataba yishe Itegeko Nshinga kuko ryo rivuga ko ‘umuntu atemerewe gutorerwa manda zirenze ebyiri’ kandi uburyo Obama yaba agiyeho ngo ntibwaba bunyuze mu matora. Itegeko Nshinga kandi rya Amerika ku bijyanye na Visi Perezida, rivuga ko umuntu ufite imiziro yo kutaba Perezida atemerewe no kuba Visi Perezida. Ibyo abasesenguzi bavuga ko bituma Obama atakwemererwa kuba Visi Perezida kuko no kuba Perezida atabyemerewe.

title: Uko ndushaho kuririmba numva ndushaho kwegera ubuntu bw’Imana- umuhanzi-Igorora
content:
Umuhanzi Igorora Iritararenga Dieudonné, uririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana agarukanye indirimbo nshya yise Ntawe uhwanye nawe Mana. Iyi ndirimbo ije ikurikira izindi nka Umujyanama, Iyo Uwiteka agukunze, na El Shaddai.
  Mu kiganiro twagiranye twamubajije impamvu y’iyi ndirimbo maze ati" Ubu ni bwo butumwa numvaga bubyiganira mu mutima wanjye, narebye ibibaho, uko bikorwa maze ntekereje ku mugenga wa byose numva iyi ndirimbo ari yo igezweho ndavuga nti’ Mana ntawe uhwanye na we’ kandi mbinyuza mu ndirimbo." Yakomeje agira ati" mu isi kugira ngo ubone imbabazi runaka bisaba icyiru cyangwa ingurane ariko ku Mana yo ni ubuntu busaga, kandi mu gihe dushavuye, turira, mu gahinda Uwiteka atubera ubuhungiro, nsanga rero ntawe uhwanye na we." 

 Umuhanzi Igorora ukora indirimbo zihimbaza Imana
   Mu gushaka kumenya icyo ubu butumwa bumariye abantu yagize ati" Ubu butumwa bugarura intege mu bantu kumva ko mu gihe wihebye hari uwakwakira kandi usumba abandi ari we Uwiteka, birahumuriza rwose kandi bikunze kugaragara ko ari ho duturiza, duhabwa ihumure kurenza imidurunganyo yo mu isi." Igorora, ubarizwa mu itorero rya ADEPR, ngo aterwa imbaraga no kuririmba indirimbo nk’izi. Abazwa ikimutera imbaraga mu kongera ibihangano, yatubwiye ko bimufasha kurushaho kwegera ubuntu bw’Imana, Igorora ati" Nahoze ndirimba Hiphop, ariko ubu mbona itandukaniro kuko umujinya nakundaga kugira wagabanutse, urwango, kutishima ubu numva nararuhutse ndatuje kandi bimpa kurushaho kubana n’abandi mu mahoro." 

 Gukorera Imana nibyo bimwongerera imbaraga
  Uyu musore Igorora Iritararenga Dieudonne, ubu ngo arateganya gukomeza kugisha inama Imana mu rwego rwo gukomeza kwagura ibikorwa bya muzika bye byuje ubutumwa bwo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana. Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: COVID-19: Ndamusubiza nti ariko wowe niba udatinya urupfu wirugemurira abarutinya - Pasteur Antoine Rutayisire
content: Pasteur Antoine Rutayisire arakebura  bamwe mu Bakirisito binubira zimwe mu ngamba zafashwe mu gihugu zigamije gukumira icyorezo cya Koronavirusi ( COVID-19), harimo no gufunga amateraniro y’abantu benshi basenga. Yibutsa ko atari  ikintu Leta yashyizeho ngo kibangamire abantu cyangwa ngo kibuze amadini gusenga, ngo isonzeshe insengero n’abapasitori ahubwo ko ari ikintu cyagiyeho ku bwirinzi no kugirira neza Abanyarwanda kugira ngo baticwa n’indwara z’ibyorezo. Yagize ati: “Mwebwe iyo bafunze insengero nizo bafunze zonyine?” Akangurira Abakirisitu kujijuka, bakamenya ko ibi byemezo ari mu nyungu zabo ntibakomeze kumva ko babangamiwe kuko niba harimo no ku bangamirwa biri  ku banyarwanda bose. Hari bamwe mu bakirisitu bavuga ko  batwikiriwe n’amaraso ya Yesu, akabibutsa ko n’abantu barimo gupfa basenga. Yagize ati: “Urabona hari igihe kwizera kwacu kuvangamo n’ikintu cyo kutajijuka n’amarangamutima yo kumva ko twebwe ubwo twizera Imana turinzwe ntacyatubaho ariko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 yarabaye Abatutsi barapfa kandi Imana yari ihari. Sindimo gupfobya umurimo w’Imana kuko niyo yaturemye twese, niyo itubeshaho, ibyorezo byagiye bibaho, ibihugu byabayemo Ebola n’Abakirisitu barapfuye rero bamwe bakavuga ngo twebwe ukagira ngo mu Rwanda ho hari iyindi Mana dufite izabuza Coronavirus bityo, umuntu agende nta gukaraba, nta kwirinda, nta kwigengesera ngo twe turarinzwe!  Icyo nicyo dushobora gukosoraho abantu bakumva ko ibi ari ibyemezo byafashwe kubw’inyungu zacu.” Kuba kugeza ubu hari n’abavuga ko ari  ibyemezo bya Leta, abibutsa ko atari gahunda ya leta ahubwo ari  gahunda y’Abanyarwanda bityo, agasaba  buri Munyarwanda wese ko  yagombye no kwibwiriza agakurikiza amabwiriza batanabimutegetse akibwiriza, akabikora ku bw’inyungu z’abandi. Yagize ati : “Hari uwo twahuriye mu nzira aravuga ati twe ntidutinya urupfu.  Ndamusubiza nti ariko niba utarutinya wirugemurira abarutinya. Wowe rwigumanire ariko we kugenda ukwirakwiza indwara.” Ashimira ubuyobozi bw’igihugu cy’u Rwanda uburyo buri kwita ku Babanyarwanda kuko ingamba zose zigenda zifatwa ari izo kugirira umumaro Abanyarwanda. Yaboneyeho gusaba Abakirisitu kugira ituze n’ibyiringiro, uyu mwanya babonye wo kuguma mu ngo abantu bawukoreshe mu kwitekerezaho no kurushaho kwegera Imana. Icya kabiri ni ukurushaho gukurikiza amabwiriza atangwa n’ubuyobozi bw’igihugu kubera ko nk’uko abishimangira ngo iyo udakurikije amabwiriza wowe ushobora kumva ko ntacyo bigutwaye ariko uba ubangamiye mugenzi wawe. Ashimira abayobozi ubwitange no kurara amajoro batekerereza Abanyarwanda ku bw’ibyemezo bagenda bafata ndetse n’ingamba zihari banakomeje gufata. Arabasaba kandi kugumana ibyiringiro kuko nkuko abishimangira ngo abakuru babaye muri iki gihugu babonye Imana ikiza u Rwanda, akavuga ko abo  Corona Virus imaze kwica ku isi yose ntabwo bangana n’impuzandengo y’abapfaga mu Rwanda ku munsi umwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Ku bw’ibyo, akavuga ko Imana yakijije Abanyarwanda  ibyo n’ibindi izabibakiza. Yagize ati: “Turi ubwoko bufite ibyiringiro kuko twanyuze no mu birenze ibi ngibi, ubu badusabye kuguma mu ngo ariko nta rupfu ruri mu mihanda. Hari igihe twagumye mu ngo ari ukugira ngo urupfu rudusange mu nzu. Hari igihe batugumishije mu mazu kugira ngo babone uko bica abantu. Ubu rero aya mabwiriza ntabwo yagombye kudutera ubwoba tuzihanganira ibibazo birimo nko kuba harimo abatarajya kubyina.” Asaba Abanyarwanda gufata iyi minsi nk’umwiherero, gusabana n’imitima yabo, kuba batari buge ku kazi atari umunsi w’ikiruhuko ahubwo babanze bashyire ubuzima bwabo muri gahunda ndetse n’umwanya wo kwibuka Imana cyane cyane kubitwazaga ko akazi kababanye kenshi. Chief editor /MUHABURA.RW

title: Perezida Kagame yifuza kuzasimburwa n’umugore (Video)
content: Yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza ubwo yagaragazaga uko igihugu gihagaze mu ijambo yagejeje ku bitabiriye inama ya 17 y’Umushyikirano. Imbere y’ibihumbi byitabiriye iyo nama, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko guteza imbere abagore byahinduye byinshi mu buzima bw’igihugu ku buryo bisigaye binigaragaza ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Yagize ati “ Mwabonye muri iyi minsi ibijyanye n’uburinganire abagore n’abagabo ku Isi yose  ibihugu ijana na mirongo turi mu ba mbere 10, mu by’ukuri hari aho bagera ngirango abantu bakarambirwa u Rwanda bagashaka kurugabanyiriza ubundi twagakwiye kuba turi mu ba mbere batanu ariko turi mu ba mbere 10 nabyo turabyemera.” Perezida Kagame yagaragaje ko uwo mwanya atari mwiza cyane kuko u Rwanda rwigeze kuza mu bihugu bitandatu bya mbere mu guteza imbere uburinganire bw’abagabo n’abagore, gusa agaragaza ko n’aho ruri atari habi. Yavuze ko politiki y’uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye ijya kujyaho, akamaro kayo kagaragaraga kandi n’abandi bamaze kubibona. Ati “Iyi politiki imaze imyaka twayikoze tuyemera kandi twumva akamaro kayo kandi ifite umusaruro ugaragarira n’abandi babona ko bikora ariko dukore n’ibindi tugera mu ba mbere batanu. Hari akazi ko gukora kenshi bafatanyije n’abagabo. Abadamu bamaze kugira aho bagera, dushyiremo umuvuduko dufatanye mu bucuruzi mu buyobozi, ubutabera, abashinzwe umutekano,  abashinzwe byose.” Ashingiye ku byagezweho ku bufatanye n’abagore, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko yifuza ko umunsi umwe umugore yazayobora u Rwanda. Ati “Njye nifuza rimwe ko uyu mwanya mwampaye ubukurikira uzatwarwa n’umugore, abagabo bari hano niba ndi bubakire simbizi ariko nabo bashobora kuba ari byo bashaka.” Perezida Kagame yasabye abanyarwanda gukomeza kongera imbaraga mubyo bakora, kuko hari byinshi byagezweho benshi batumvaga ko byashoboka. Kuva mu 2003 Itegeko Nshinga rigena ko mu myanya yose itorerwa mu buyobozi no muri guverinoma, abagore bagomba kugiramo 30%. Perezida w’Urwego Ngishwanama rw’inararibonye mu Rwanda, Rutaremara Tito yigeze gusobanura ko gushyira abagore mu buyobozi ari “ubushake bwa politiki bujyanye n’ibibera mu Rwanda. Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, abagore banganaga hafi na 70% by’abaturage bose.’’ Muri  Guverinoma, abagore bangana na 50 %, mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko mu Mutwe w’Abadepite mu Rwanda bangana na  61.3% bavuye kuri 14% mu 1994. U Rwanda nirwo ruyoboye ibindi bihugu byo ku Isi mu kugira abagore benshi mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko. Mu bucamanza ni 49.6% mu gihe mu buyobozi bw’inama njyanama z’uturere abagore ari 41%. Mu burezi abakobwa bitabira amashami y’imibare, ubumenyi n’ikoranabuhanga bavuye kuri 56.7% muri 2015 bagera kuri 63.9% muri 2018, na ho abitabira amashuri y’imyuga n’ubumenyingiro bavuye 41.8% muri 2015 bagera kuri 43.8% muri 2018, mu gihe abagore bigisha muri aya mashuri bavuye kuri 32.9% muri 2010 bakagera kuri 42.7% muri 2018. Abagore 59.99% bafite ubutaka basangiye n’abo bashakanye mu gihe 24.63% bafite ubutaka bihariye. Ibi bigatuma 38% by’abagore bakorana n’ibigo by’imari, batanze ingwate ku butaka bwabo. Abagore bakorana n’ibigo by’imari na bo bikubye 2 mu myaka 4, aho bavuye kuri 36% muri 2012 bagera kuri 63% muri 2016.

title: Rtd Brig Gen  yemerewe kwiyamamariza umwanya wo kuyobora FERWAFA
content:
Akanama gashinzwe amatora y’Umuyobozi wa FERWAFA ateganyijwe mu mpera z’uku kwezi, kemeje Kandidatire ya Rtd Brig Gen Sekamana Jean Damascene, wiyongereye mu bifuza kuyobora iri shyirahamwe.
 Kandidatire ya Rtd Brig Gen Sekamana Jean Damascene yemejwe ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, nyuma y’uko yari yashyikirije iyi komisiyo Kandidatire ye Tariki 23 Gashyantare 2018. Nk’uko bigaragara ku rubuga rwa twitter rwa FERWAFA, aka kanama gashinzwe amatora Gahagarariwe na Kalisa Adolphe Camarade, ngo kanemeje Kandidatire ya Rurangirwa Louis nawe wifuza kuzahatanira uyu mwanya. Brig Gen Sekamana si we musirikari wenyine waba uyoboye FERWAFA aramutse atowe kuko Lt. Gen. Caezar Kayizari yayiyoboye hagati ya 1995-2005 na Maj. Gen. Kazura Jean Bosco ayiyobora hagati ya 2006-2011. Abajijwe impiduka azazana muri FERWAFA, yavuze ko azategereza akazabitangariza mu mwanya wagenewe kwiyamamaza. *Dore uko ingengabihe y’amatora ya FERWAFA iteye Tariki 19 – 23 Gashyantare 2018: Gutanga kandidatire kw’abifuza kwiyamamaza. Tariki ya 28 Gashyantare 2018: Kwiga Ubusabe bw’abatanze kandidatire. Tariki ya 9 Werurwe 2018: Gutangaza abemerewe kwiyamamaza Tariki ya 12 Werurwe 2018: Gutangira kwiyamamaza kw’abakandida Tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2018: Amatora Yanditswe na Niyomugabo Albert

title: Dore uko icyumweru kizakugendekera bitewe n’igihe wavukiye (Horoscope)
content:
Iyi ni inkuru ngaruka-cyumweru ikubiyemo icyo abahanga mu byo kwitegereza ahazaza (les voyants) bavuga ku bizaba ku muntu uko icyumweru gitashye, ukurikije igihe yavukiye. Dore uko icyumweru cyo ku ya 15 kugeza ku ya 21 Mutarama kizagenda  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 21 Werurwe na 19 Mata (Belier)  Mu rukundo  Muri iki cyumweru muzaba mufite umutima wo kumva no gufasha abo mukunda kandi mu buryo bubanogeye mwembi. Niba nta mukunzi ufite ni byiza ko wirinda gushakisha cyane kuko ushobra guhura n’abatagukwiriye, ubanze ushishoze. Mu butunzi Iyi minsi 7 izababera myiza cyane ku mishinga irebana no guteza imbere urugo ndetse no kurutunga uko bikwiriye. Muzamenyana n’abantu bazabagirira akamaro mu minsi iri imbere. Muzagira ibitekerezo bishya ndetse rimwe na rimwe ibyuyimviro byanyu bizabaherekeza mu gufata umwanzuro ufatika. Gusa mugomba kurangwa no kwihangana kugira ngo ibintu banyu mutabyihutisha hakabamo guhubuka. Mu kazi Muri iki cyumweru, abo mukorana cyane cyane ababakuriye bazagaragaza imbaraga nyinshi mu kazi. Murasabwa ibakwe rero ngo mubashe kugendera ku muvuduko nk’uwabo. Niba ukorana n’abantu benshi, birashoboka ko bashaka kukurusha imbaraga, bityo nawe urasabwa gukorana umwete ntabyo kujenjeka bitabaye ibyo uzasigara.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 20 Mata na 20 Gicurasi (Taureau)  Mu rukundo Muzanyurwa cyane mu rukundo kuko muzaruhundagazwaho yaba n’abo mukunda cyangwa se n’umuryango. Muziyumvamo icyizere cyinshi cyo gukomeza ubuzima kuko muzibona nk’abantu bakunzwe cyane. Muzafata umwanya wo kwiyegurira bya nyabyo uwo mukundana kandi bizabanyura mwembi mu gihe kirekire cyane. Mu butunzi
Muzatangira gukora imibare ubabashisha gutangira gusohora amafaranga make cyane. Ibyifuzo byanyu byo gutera imbere no kugera kure bizababashisha kwiyima kugira ngo mubashe kwibikira iby’ejo. Mwitegure kandi kugira ibintu bitunguranye byo guhaha mu rugo. Mu kazi Gutekereza mu buryo bwiza bizabafasha mu kazi kanyu ka buri munsi muri iki cyumweru. Murasabwa kwitegereza cyane ibijyanye n’ejo hanyu mu murimo mukora kandi ibi mukabitangira nta gutinda kuko iki cyumweru ari icy’amahirwe kuri mwe.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 21 Gicurasi na 21 Kamena (Gemaux)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru urukundo rwanyu ruzazamuka ku rwego rwo hejuru. Ntabwo muzagarukira gusa ku bigaragarira amaso. Muzinjira neza mu buryo mubanyemo n’uwo mukunda maze mubashe gukuramo ibibanezeza cyane. Muzitonde mu mpano muzatanga muzirinde gukabya kuko muri iki cyumweru urukundo rubari hafi nta gushakisha. Ntimuzate umwanya mutekereza byinshi kuko muzi neza icyo mwifuza muzagikore nta gushidikanya. Mu butunzi Muzasubira neza mu mibare muri iki cyumweru maze bitume mutangira kwiga uburyo bwo gukoresha umutungo muke. Ubushake bwo gutera imbere buzatuma mwunguka ubwenge bwo gutekereza kabiri mbere yo gusohora n’igiceri kimwe. Muzatungurwa n’ibikenewe mu rugo mugomba guhaha. Mu kazi Muzakenera impinduka muri iki cyumweru mu kazi. Muzakora byinshi kandi mu gihe gito, nta kanya na gato muzaba mufite ko kwicara ahubwo muzifuza gukora cyane no guhanga udushya. Ni byiza ko muganiriza abandi ibijyanye n’utwo dushya kandi muhitemo neza abo mubiganiriza mwirinda ababaca intege.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 22 Kamena na 22 Nyakanga (Cancer)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru muziyumvamvo ubusahake budasanzwe bwo gutuza mu bijyanye n’urukundo. Ibyo muzakora byose muzarangwa no kugusha ku ntego mu kuri kutagize ibyo kwangiriza. Muziyumvamo ko mukeneye gufasha cyane abo mukunda ndetse ko mubafitiye akamaro. Ni ngombwa rero ko mugenzura neza ibyo mukora hato abo mukunda batazabigenderaho bagakabya kubasaba byinshi.
Mu butunzi  Muri iki cyumweru muzongera mugenzure neza uko mukoresha umutungo wanyu. Muri iki cyumweru birashoboka ko uko mwari mumenyereye kwinjiza bitinda ntibigende nk’uko byari bisanzwe bityo rero murasabwa kwitonda mukihangana ngo mwirinde ingaruka z’igihe kirekire. Mu kazi Uburyo bwanyu bwo kuyobora abandi mudategwa nibwo buzagira ingufu nyinshi mu kazi kanyu ka muri munsi muri iki cyumweru. Imikorere yanyu yihariye izababera isoko y’imbaraga nyinshi zizabageza ku ntego mwihaye. Gusa muzajya mukoresha imbaraga nyinshi ku buryo umunsi uzajya urangira mwananiwe bikabije ariko ntimuzacike intege kuko bizabongerera amahirwe yo gukura mu mwuga.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Nyakanga na 22 Kanama(Lion)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru muziyumvamvo ubusahake budasanzwe bwo kwigenga. Abo mukundana bazababura nubwo mwaba muhari intekerezo zanyu zizaba zira ahandi. Bizabagora gusobanurira abakunzi banyu uko mwumva ibintu ariko muzitonde kugira ngo mutazarema ikibazo kuremereye cyasenya urukundo rwanyu, muzabigendemo gake. Mu butunzi Muri iki cyumweru muragirwa inama yo kwishakamo ubuhanga bwo guhanga imirimo mishya ishobora kubyara inyungu kandi amahirwe ari mu ruhande rwanyu ku buryo iyi mirimo ishobora ku babyarira inyungu z’igihe kirekire. Mu kazi Uburyo budasanzwe bwo gutunganya akazi mu buryo bw’umwihariko nibwo buzabaranga muri iki cyumweru kandi ibi bizagira ingaruka nziza mu kazi kanyu. Muzagira amahirwe ya gusobanura ibyo mukora n’uburyo mubikora kandi ntimuzayapfusha ubusa, muzamenya icyo kuvuga mu gihe cyayo. Ni byiza rero kwitegura hakiri kare.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Kanama na 22 Nzeri (Vierge)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru muzahura n’abantu mudahuje imico ariko nibo bazabaviramo inshuti nziza. Muzaryoherwa n’ubuzima bwo kugira uwo mukundana. Muziyumvamo umutima wo koroherana maze murusheho kuryoherwa n’ubuzima bw’urukundo ruzira intonganya. Muzatekereza byinshi binezeza abo mukunda. Mu butunzi Iki cyumweru muziyumvamo inyota ikomeye yo gutera imbere maze muhereye ku kugabanya ibyo muhaha bitari ngombwa cyane, mutangire gutekereza kuzigama umutungo wanyu. Muzagira amahirwe yo kunoza ubuzima bwanyu bwo guhaha no gusohora umutungo. Mu kazi Iki cyumweru kizabahira cyane ku murimo. Kubo bishobokera ni byiza ko mwasubira mu ishuri mukongera ubumenyi cyane cyane mu byo mukunda. Mushobora kwiyumvamo integer nke mu mubiri ariko akazi kanyu niba mugakunda kazabibagiza ibyo bibazo murusheho gukora neza.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Nzeri na 22 Ukwakira (Balance)  Mu rukundo Urukundo rwanyu muri iki cyumweru ruzarangwa n’intekerezo nyinshi. Muzagira umwanya uhagije wo kwitekerezaho no kureba aho muhagaze mu rukundo kandi imyanzuro muzafata izabaherekeza mu gihe kirekire mu buzima bw’urukundo mwaba mufite abakunzi cyangwa ntabo. Mu butunzi  Gutekereza kwanyu kuzabageza mu nzira ikwiriye, mbese uko muzarushaho gutekereza mu buryo bwiza niko muzaba mwiyegereza inzira mukwiriye kunyuramo ngo ubutunzi bwanyu bumere neza. Bizaba ngombwa ko mwisuzuma kandi mukita ku bintu byose ntacyo mwirengagije kuko uku kwirengagiza n’ubwo kaba ari akantu gato gushobora kubagusha mu mutego wabatera igihombo gikomeye. Mu kazi Muri iki cyumweru akazi kanyu kazakurikiranamu buryo budasanzwe kandi bwihuse cyane. Muzabona impinduka nyinshi ariko kujyana nazo nibyo bizabafasha kubaka neza umwuga wanyu, muwuha inking zikomeye z’ejo hazaza.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Ukwakira na 22 Ugushyingo (Scorpion)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru muziyumvamvo ubusahake budasanzwe bwo kwigenga. Abo mukundana bazababura nubwo mwaba muhari intekerezo zanyu zizaba zira ahandi. Bizabagora gusobanurira abakunzi banyu uko mwumva ibintu ariko muzitonde kugira ngo mutazarema ikibazo kuremereye cyasenya urukundo rwanyu, muzabigendemo gake. Mu butunzi
Muri iki cyumweru muragirwa inama yo kwishakamo ubuhanga bwo guhanga imirimo mishya ishobora kubyara inyungu ariko ibi ntibizababuze kwibuka ko hari ibindi mukeneye ndetse n’ibyo abari hafi yanyu bifuza kandi mugomba guhaza ibyifuzo byabo. Gusa intekerezo zanyu nizo zizababera intwaro ituma ubutunzi bwanyu bukoreshwa neza muri iki cyumweru. Mu kazi
Akazi kanyu kazahura n’intambara zitoroshye ariko nimuzitwaramo kigabo muzabona umusaruro mwiza nko guhindurirwa imirimo. Niba mwikoresha muzatangira imishinga mishya kandi namwe muragirwa inama yo kubigendamo gitwari kuko ikosa rimwe rishobora kubagusha mu mutego ukomeye.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 23 Ugushyingo na 21 Ukoboza (Sagittaire)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru ubuzima bw’urukundo rwanyu buzahindura inzira. Muzahura n’impinduka nyinshi kandi muzabasha kuzisangira n’abo mukunda. Niba ibintu bitameze neza, iki cyumweru cyuzuye amahirwe menshi yo kubikemura. Muzirengagiza bimwe mu bitekerezo bibaca intege mwari mumaranye iminsi mutangire gukora ibintu uko mubyumva. Mu butunzi
Muri iki cyumweru muzongera mugenzure neza uko mukoresha umutungo wanyu. Muri iki cyumweru birashoboka ko uko mwari mumenyereye kwinjiza bitinda ntibigende nk’uko byari bisanzwe bityo rero murasabwa kwitonda mukihangana ngo mwirinde ingaruka z’igihe kirekire. Mu kazi Uburyo bwanyu bwo kuyobora abandi mudategwa nibwo buzagira ingufu nyinshi mu kazi kanyu ka muri munsi muri iki cyumweru. Imikorere yanyu yihariye izababera isoko y’imbaraga nyinshi zizabageza ku ntego mwihaye. Gusa muzajya mukoresha imbaraga nyinshi ku buryo umunsi uzajya urangira mwananiwe bikabije ariko ntimuzacike intege kuko bizabongerera amahirwe yo gukura mu mwuga.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 22 Ukuboza na 20 Mutarama (Capricorne)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru urukundo rwanyu ruzagurumana kandi muzatangira gushaka impinduka ntabyo gushyira imbaraga nyinshi mu bintu ngo ubashe gukundana neza. Muzakuraho ya mipaka mwishyiriyeho maze mwirekure kugira ngo mwebwe n’abo mukundana murusheho kubana neza kandi mubohotse nta kwishishana. Mu butunzi Muri iki cyumweru muzongera imbaraga mu mibare mukora ku bijyanye n’amafaranga yanyu. Inyota yo gutera imbere izabatera gutangira kwizigamira mwirinda ibishuko bibatera gukoresha amafaranga yanyu nabi. Mushobora gutungurwa no guhaha ibintu bitari bisanzwe muri gahunda. Mu kazi Muri iki cyumweru muzakora cyane ndetse mwerekane ko mushoboye. Mushobora kutiyumvamo umwete ariko inshingano mufite zizabatera gukora mutikoresheje kandi ibi bizabazanira inyungu z’igihe kirekire cyane cyane ku birebana n’iterambere ry’umwuga wanyu.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 21 Mutarama na 18 Gashyantare (Verseau)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru muzirinda cyane gukora byabindi mumenyereye ahubwo muzatangira gutungurana muzana udushya. Abakunzi banyu bazarangwa no kubaba hafi maze mwiyumvemo icyizere maze namwe murusheho kubahaza mu byifuzo byabo kandi mwongere ikibatsi cy’urukundo rubarimo. Uramutse ushaka urukundo rushya iki cyumweru si cyiza kuri wowe kuko benshi mubo muzahura bazakuvangira, ntimuzahuza na gato. Mu butunzi Muri iki cyumweru uburemere bw’ibyo mukora buzatanga umusaruro. Muzabona amahirwe atunguranye yo kwinjiza ariko igikomeye ni ukumenya guhitamo ibibafitiye akamaro kuko ikosa rito rishobora gutuma musubira inyuma cyane. Ntimuzakururwe cyane n’imishinga mubonana abandi ahubwo muzitegereze neza imibare yanyu muyibyaze umusaruro ufatika mudatwawe n’ibya rubanda. Mu kazi Muri iki cyumweru akazi kazabisukiranyaho ari kenshi cyane. Muzagira byinshi bibatunguye ariko murasabwa kubyitwaramo kigabo bitabaye ibyo akazi kanyu kazapfa kandi bizagira ingaruka z’igihe kirekire. Gusa muragaragaza icyizere cyo kumenya kwihangana no gukoresha ubwenge bwanyu byihuse mu gukemura bene ibyo bibazo bitunguranye. Umusaruro muzatanga uzatungurana kuburyo benshi bazatangira kugenda babavuga.  Uwavutse hagati y’itariki ya 19 Gashyantare na 20 Werurwe (Poissons)  Mu rukundo Muri iki cyumweru urukundo rwanyu muzarubamo nta bikabyo. Muziyerekana uko muri ndetse muzakuraho ugushidikanya kose abo mukundana bari babafiteho. Muzakenera ariko kwagura urukundo rwanyu bityo muzagirana ibiganiro byubaka n’abo mukunda. Kuri mwe ukuri kose muzishimira kukuvuga ahubwo munoze amagambo mukoresha mukuvuga. Mu butunzi Umutungo wanyu ushobora guhura n’amahirwe awuzamura muri iki cyumweru. Muzahura n’ibigeragezo binshi bibasaba gukoresha amafaranga mwibwira ko murimo kuvugurura ubuzima bwanyu. Muzabyitondere maze mubanze mubare neza mbere yo kugira amafaranga cyangwa undi mutungo wose musohora bitari ngombwa. Mu kazi  Muri iki cyumweru muzumva mushaka cyane gushimwa bityo muzakora mutikoresheje ngo mubigereho. Akazi kanyu kazaborohera kandi muzabona ubufasha buturutse hirya no hino kandi muzabwakirane ineza gusa muzabanze mushishoze kuko siko bose bazaba babifuriza ibyiza gusa. Ni aha mpiniye, ahasigaye mugire icyumweru gihire! Ni aho mu cyumweru gitaha.

title: Menya byinshi Amasohoro yongera ibyishimo kubagore!
content:
foto internet Nk’uko 7sur7 dukesha aya makuru ibitangaza, aba bashakashatsi berekanye ko abagore bakorana imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiye n’abagabo babo cyane bibarinda guhangayika ku buryo bwinshi kurusha abandi. Ubu bushakashatsi bwerekanye ko abagore baryamana n’abo bahuje ibitsina cyangwa abaryamana n’abagabo mu gihe runaka kandi bakoresheje agakingirizo, bahora bahangayitse, badafite amahoro kurusha abaryamana n’abagabo gusa Ubu bushakashatsi kandi bwerekana ko guhorana umunezero bitava gusa ku kuba ukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ko ahubwo bituruka ku ngano y’amasohoro agera mu mubiri w’umugore. Gusa ibi ni ibyo kwitondera. Mbere yo gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiye n’umuntu uwo ariwe wese, ugomba kubanza kumenya ko atanduye virusi itera SIDA cyangwa se indi ndwara iyo ariyo yose yandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina. KANDA HANO USOME INDI NKURU BIFITANYE ISANO ARIKO KUBAGABO

title: Uburyo bushya ushobora gusura ingagi zo mu birunga wibereye mu rugo
content: Muri iki cyumweru Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB), ku bufatanye na The Ellen Fund, Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund na Habitat XR, batangaje ko bazanye uburyo abantu bashobora gusura ingagi zo mu birunga bifashishije uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga buzwi nka ‘Virtual Reality (VR)’. Ubu buryo bwatangijwe kuwa 22 Mata 2020, ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi wahariwe kurengera Isi n’ibiyiriho, butuma abantu basura ingagi zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga, bibereye mu rugo. Umunyamerikakazi akaba n’Umunyarwenya Ellen DeGeneres, uri no kubaka ikigo kizajya urimo kubaka ikigo kizajya gifasha mu bikorwa byo kubungabunga Ingagi muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga mu Rwanda, yavuze ko ubu buryo bwo gusura ingagi ‘budasanzwe kuko ari nk’aho uba uri kumwe n’ingagi’. Iyi filimi y’iminota itandatu n’amasegonda atatu ikwereka imbonankubone ingagi zo mu birunga mu buryo butangaje ziri aho zisanzwe ziba mu birunga kandi ziri mu buzima busanzwe bwa buri munsi. Bugufasha kuryoherwa n’ubwiza bwo gusura ingagi zo mu birunga mu Rwanda ukamera neza neza nk’uri kumwe na zo kuko amajwi yazo n’ay’inyoni z’aho ziri byose uba ubyumva nk’uri kumwe nazo. Iyi filimi kuyireba ni ubuntu, ushobora kuyireba ku mbuga nka Oculus, Within, Samsung VR, Littlstar na VeeR. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo na Pariki z’igihugu muri RDB, Belise Kariza, avuga ko urwego rw’ubukerarugendo ku Isi rwashegeshwe bikomeye na Coronavirus, yatumye ibihugu bihagarika by’agateganyo gusura ingagi. Avuga ko bibabaje kuba badashobora kwakira abashyitsi baje kureba no kwishimira ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda ariko ari mu nyungu za buri wese kuguma mu rugo mu gihe bakomeje gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa mu gukora no gusangiza abantu ibyiza nk’ibiri muri iyi filimi yo gusura ingagi uri mu rugo. Iyi filimi ushobora kuyireba no kuyimanura ku buntu (download) unyuze hano

title: Iran: Umugabo arashinjwa kuryamana n’abakobwa barenga 20 ababeshya ko ari Messi
content:
Umugabo w’umunya-Irani, Reza Paratesh wamamaye cyane kubera uburyo asa na kabuhariwe Lionel Messi, kuri ubu yongeye kuvugwa cyane aho ashinjwa kubeshya mu buryo butangaje abakobwa n’abagore barenga 20 ko ari ’Messi nyawe’ kugira ngo aryamane nabo. Ni inkuru yatangiye kusakara kuva ku wa Kabiri w’iki cyumweru nkuko ikinyamakuru cyo muri Esipanye, Marca cyabigarutseho. Uyu musore w’imyaka 26 y’amavuko magingo aya ukurikirwa n’abasaga ibihumbi 700 kuri Instagram ngo yaba amaze kuregwa n’abagore 23 bamushinja kubabeshya ko ari Messi bakagirana imishyikirano ivamo kuba banaryamana.

Reza Paratesh yaramamaye muri Iran ku buryo yifotorezwaho n’abahisi na bagenzi Nyuma y’uko ibi birego bifashe intera ndende, Reza Paratesh yashyize ubutumwa buri mu rurimi rw’icyongereza kuri konti ye ya Instagram aho yahakanaga ibyo ashinjwa byose. Ati "Ndabasabye, ntimugakine no kwanduza isura n’icyizere by’abantu. (...) Iyo ibi biba aribyo haba harabayeho ibirego ngakurikiranwa (...) uyu munsi mba ndi muri gereza.."  واقعا ادم با شنيدن يك سري شايعات تنش ميلرزه، خواهش ميكنم با ابروي كسي بازي نكنيد. و ازتون ميخوام اگه پست يا خبري از اين شايعه ديديد لينك اين پست منو براش ارسال كنيد قربون معرفت همتون #رضاپرستش #rezaparastesh A post shared by  iranian messi ( Messi Irani ) (@rezaparastesh) on Jun 26, 2019 at 10:24am PDT 
Uyu mugabo arashinjwa kuryamana n’abagore ababeshya ko ari Messi nyirizina

title: REMA ihangayikishijwe n’uko igihugu gikennye imishinga yo kurengera ibidukikije n’ihindagurika ry’ibihe
content: Green Climate Fund, itera inkunga imishinga itandukanye igamije kurengera ibidukikije no gukumira ingaruka z’ihindagurika ry’ibihe, cyane cyane mu bihugu biri mu nzira y’amajyambere n’ibyabasirwa cyane n’izo ngaruka. Kuri uyu wa 27 Werurwe 2018 ubwo umuyobozi mukuru wungirije wa REMA, Munyazikwiye Faustin, yatangizaga amahugurwa y’abahanga mu kurengera ibidukikije, agamije kubongerera ubumenyi, yavuze ko nta mishinga ihari. Yagize ati “Minisiteri y’ibidukikije yemerewe guhabwa miliyoni ziri hagati ya 10$ na 50$ ku mushinga umwe wo kurengera ibidukikije. Mutekereze umushinga wa miliyoni 50 mukaba mudafite na mike mushobora gutanga. Guhera mu 2015 nibwo twemerewe ariko muri uyu mwaka nibwo twakiriye umushinga wa mbere wa miliyoni 32[...]mutekereze kuba twaremerewe mbere ariko tukaba nta mishinga dufite! Icyo nicyo kibazo dufite, nicyo namwe mufite.” Munyazikwiye yakomeje avuga ko imishinga icyo kigega gitera inkunga ari igamije kurengera ibidukikije no gukumira ingaruka z’ihindagurika ry’ibihe nk’imvura, imyuzure, amapfa n’ibindi ikubiye mu nkingi zitandukanye irimo iy’ubukungu, ubuhinzi, ingufu, ubwikorezi n’ahandi kandi ko nyuma y’ayo mahugurwa, izo nzobere zizaba zifite ubushobozi buhambaye bwo kuyitegura, bagafasha ibigo bya Leta n’ibyigenga, ku buryo ishobora guhabwa icyo kigo kikayiha amafaranga igatangira gukora. Perezida w’ishyirahamwe ry’abahanga n’inzobere mu bidukikije (RAPEP), Egide Nkuranga, yavuze ko rimaze igihe gito ritangiye ku buryo igikenewe kandi cyihutirwa ari guhugura abanyamuryango. Yagize ati “Icyihutirwa ni ukugira ngo abanyamuryango bahugurwe bari hamwe, cyane mu kazi dukora kugira ngo kavemo ireme rifatika[..] iyo mishinga iterwa inkunga n’icyo kigega tugiye guhugura, ni iteza imbere igihugu mu buryo bwo kurengera ibidukikije. Nitubikora neza, bizatuma ibyo igihugu cyateguye bigerwaho mu buryo bworoshye.” Aya mahugurwa y’iminsi ibiri yateguwe na REMA iafatanije na RAPEP, arahuza abahanga n’inzobere mu bidukikije basaga 50.

title: Me. Flamme wunganiraga Fabien Neretse yatsimbaraye ku ipfobya rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
content: Neretse yari akurikiranyweho ibikorwa by’ubwicanyi mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi i Nyamirambo no mu Mataba mu yahoze ari Komini Ndusu mu Ruhengeri hagati ya 6 Mata 1994 na 14 Nyakanga 1994. Yarezwe gushishikariza abasirikari kwica Abatutsi, aho 13 biciwe i Nyamirambo. Yanashinze Umutwe w’Interahamwe mu Mataba, awuha intwaro mbere yo kugaba ibitero ku Batutsi, ariko anabaha ibihembo by’amafaranga. Icyemezo cy’Urukiko rwa Bruxelles cyo gukatira Neretse imyaka 25 gifite umwihariko kuko ni ubwa mbere u Bubiligi bwakurikiranye bukanahana icyaha cya Jenoside hashingiwe ku itegeko rihana. Cyanyuze uruhande rw’abarega. Umunyamategeko ubahagarariye, Me. Karongozi André Martin, yabwiye IGIHE ko nubwo rwitabiriwe n’abagenzwa n’impamvu zitandukanye, rwagenze neza. Ati “Ku bwacu urubanza rwagenze uko rwagombaga kugenda, nubwo byari bikomeye harimo ingorane nyinshi zuko hari abanyabuhamya baguriwe, z’uko hari abaza guhimba ko mu Rwanda abantu batisanzura.  Ibyo byose ikintu nishimiye ku giti cyanjye, ni ukubona ko Abanyarwanda bavuze badategwa abenshi berekanye ibyaha Neretse yakoze ari nabyo urukiko rwahereyeho. Harimo n’abaje kwigamba, harimo n’abaje guhakana Jenoside.” Urubanza rwa Neretse rwaranzwe n’amagambo ahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yavuzwe n’umwunganira, Me Jean Flamme. Imvugo ze zatumye abari mu rubanza harimo n’abacamanza bagaragaza ko yarengereye mu kuvuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri. Nyuma y’umwanzuro w’urubanza yakomeje kwinangira ku bitekerezo bye bipfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Me Flamme waganiriye na IGIHE asa n’uwabihiwe yavuze ko atishimye umwanzuro w’urukiko ku mukiliya we. Ati “Uru rubanza rwatangiye nabi cyane, banze abatangabuhamya, rwatangiye nabi bikomeza mu rubanza rwose. Njye ntabwo mbyishimiye. Ni akaga ku butabera bw’u Bubiligi.” Yavuze ko adahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ahubwo ko mbere yuko iba habayeho Jenoside na nyuma yayo haba indi. Ati “Simpakana Jenoside, icyo navuze ni uko mbere yayo habaye Jenoside yakorewe abahutu kandi ko nyuma yayo, habaye Jenoside muri Congo yasize ibihumbi 10 by’inzirakarengane.” Umunyamakuru wa IGIHE yamubajije niba yarigeze agera mu Rwanda ngo yihere ijisho ibyahabereye,yamusubije agira ati “Muri Kanama 1994 nari mu Rwanda ndi kumwe n’abanyamategeko batagira umupaka, nzi ibyo mvuga.” Abajijwe niba yarabonye imibiri y’inzirakarengane, mu ijambo rimwe arasubiza ati “yego”.  Yongeyeho ko ari ibintu bibabaje ariko akarenga akavuga ko uwo yunganiraga (Neretse) yarenganye. Umwunganizi w’abiciwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu manza zitandukanye zibera mu Bubiligi, Michèle Hirsch, yavuze ko ari urubanza rudasanzwe ruhamya akamaro gakomeye k’urukiko rw’abaturage rwa Bruxelles. Yavuze ko rwagaragayemo ibintu bidasanzwe byinshi birimo n’abatangabuhamya badasanzwe, abarokotse bagize imbaraga zo guhagaragara bakavuga aribyo byatumye umwanzuro wafashwe ufatwa. Ati “Ndatekereza ko icyemezo cy’urukiko kizandikwa mu mateka y’Urukiko rwa rubanda rwa Bruxelles kizandikwa mu mateka y’u Bubiligi n’ay’ikiremwamuntu.’’ Urubanza rwa Fabien Neretse w’imyaka 71 rwatangiye mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo hatoranywaga itsinda ry’abaturage bagomba gutanga ubuhamya bumushinja n’ubumushinjura. Nyuma y’iminsi itatu rutangira kuburanishwa mu mizi. Fabien Neretse ukomoka mu Ruhengeri yafatiwe mu Bufaransa mu 2011. Uyu mugabo wari ufite ijambo ku butegetsi bwa Habyarimana, ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica Umubiligi Claire Beckers n’umugabo we Isaïe Bucyana n’umukobwa wabo Katia. Aba biciwe i Kigali ku wa 9 Mata 1994, nyuma y’iminsi mike Jenoside itangiye. Neretse wahise atabwa muri yombi ajya gufungwa, afite iminsi 15 yo kujuririra umwanzuro w’Urukiko rwa Bruxelles.

title: Lionel Messi yahagaritswe amezi atatu adakinira ikipe y’igihugu anacibwa ibihumbi 50 by’amadorari
content:
Kizigenza mu mupira w’amaguru ku isi akaba na kapiteni w’ikipe y’igihugu ya Argentina,Lionel Messi yahagaritswe amezi atatu adakinira ikipe y’igihugu imikino mpuzamahanga nyuma y’uko atangaje ko igikombe cya Copa America cyaranzwe na ruswa. Uyu mukinnyi usanzwe akinira FC Barcelona w’imyaka 32 y’amavuko yasohowe mu kibuga ubwo ikipe ye Argantine yakiniraga umwanya wa gatatu n’ikipe ya Chile ikaza no gutsindwa ibitego 2-1 ahita avuga ko igikombe n’ubundi cyari cyagenewe ikipe y’igihugu cya Brezil. Usibye guhagarikwa igihe kingana gutyo, ishyirahamwe n’umupira w’amaguru muri Amerika y’amajyepfo ’Conmebol’ ryamuciye ibihumbi 50 by’amadorari y’Amerika ahwanye n’amayero asaga ibihumbi 41. Kuri ubu Messi afite iminsi irindwi yo kujuririra iki cyemezo yafatiwe n’iri shyirahamwe. Uku guhagarikwa kuri Messi bivuze ko atazakina imikino ya gishuti Argantine izakina mu mezi ya Nzeri n’Ukwakira igahura na Chile, Mexico ndetse n’Ubudage. Ikipe y’igihugu Argentina izatangira kwitegura igikombe cy’isi cya 2022 mu mwaka utaha wa 2020 mu kwezi kwa Werurwe. Messi yeretswe ikarita itukura ku munota wa 37 w’umukino ubwo bakinaga n’ikipe ya Chile nyuma y’ugushyamirana na Gary Medel nawe wahanwe. Icyo gihe Messi yagize ati "Ntabwo twe twakoresha iyi ruswa.Bitweretse ko nta cyubahiro kiri muri iri rushanwa". Akomeza agira ati "Birababaje,ruswa,abasifuzi,ntabwo batumye abantu baryoherwa na ruhago". Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Argantine ryakomeje kwinubira imisifurire yabaye muri ririya rushanwa nyuma y’uko ikipe y’igihugu itsindiwe n’ikipe ya Brezil muri 1/2. Gusa ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Amerika y’amajyepfo ryasubije kuri ibyo ryashinjwaga rivuga ko ntabyagaragaye ahubwo ko ibyo bigaragaza agasuzuguro.


Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Isiganwa ry’imodoka “Nyirangarama Rally” rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri
content: Mu mwaka ushize ubwo iyi Rally yabaga ku nshuro ya mbere, yegukanywe na Giancarlo Davite mu gihe mu 2018 habaye igisa n’igeragezwa ry’iri siganwa ribanziriza ayandi mu mwaka wa Shampiyona yo gusiganwa mu modoka. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyabaye kuri uyu wa Gatanu kuri Pilipili i Nyarutarama, Nzamwita Eric, uyobora isiganwa ry’uyu mwaka, yavuze ko imyiteguro bayigeze kure, aho bamaze kuvugana n’abapilote bashobora kuzaza gukina n’imihanda ikaba yaramaze kwemezwa. Ati “Twatumiye abapilote 10 bo mu Rwanda n’abo hanze bagera ku munani bo mu Burundi. Kugeza ubu ntabwo navuga abamaze kwemeza ko bazaza kuko baracyafite igihe cyo kwemeza ko bazakina, umunsi wa nyuma ni tariki ya 13 z’uku kwezi.“ Nzamwita yakomeje avuga ko isiganwa ry’uyu mwaka rizakinirwa ku ntera y’ibilometero 295.5 (birimo 151.8 byo gusiganwa), mu mihanda ya Kinini, Cyinzuzi, Tumba no ku musozi wa Tare, hose inshuro ebyiri. Kalisa Thierry, umwe mu bari bahagarariye Entreprise Urwibutso Nyirangarama ya Sina Gérard, yavuze ko bishimira gutera inkunga iri siganwa ry’amamodoka kuko rifasha akarere ka Rulindo kumenyekana cyane umusozi wa Tare. Ati “Siporo tuyishyigikira kuko ifasha Abanyarwanda. Hamwe n’akarere ka Rulindo, duhora twifuza ko ibyo dukora bitagarukira ku byo kurya gusa cyangwa ubumenyi duha abanyeshuri. Sina Gérard yiyemeje gutera inkunga iyi Rally. Ni ubwa gatatu tugiye kuyitera inkunga.” “Gushyigikira uyu mukino byatumye agasozi kacu kamenyekana n’ishuri ryacu riramenyekana. Umubare w’abanyeshuri wariyongereye kuva dutangiye gukorana nabo.” Nyirangarama Rally ni ryo siganwa rya mbere rizakinwa uyu mwaka riri ku ngengabihe ya Shampiyona y’umukino wo gusiganwa mu modoka mu Rwanda, rikaba rizabanziriza Rwanda Mountain Gorilla Rally izaba muri Gicurasi (ikaba inabarwa mri Shampiyona Nyafurika) mu gihe hazakurikiraho Huye Rally  na Rallye des Milles Collines. Amafoto: Uwihanganye Hardi

title: The Ben na Pricillah bakoze indirimbo ifite byinshi isobanuye “Yumve hano”
content:
The Ben ndetse na Pricillah Abahanzi Nyarwanda bakorera umuziki mu gihugu cya Leta Zunze ubumwe za America bashyize hanze indirimbo yari imaze iminsi ivugwa ho ibitandukanye n’abantu benshi gusa n’ubwo iyi ndirimbo yamenyekanye itari yasohoka n’ubusanzwe na bene gukora iyi ndirimbo batangaza ko ari indirimbo idasanzwe haba kuruhande rwa The Ben ndetse na Pricillah. Iyi ndirimbo ndetse n’amagambo ayigize buri umwe atangaza ko ntaho ihuriye n’ubuzima bwe bwite ahubwo ari mu rwego rw’akazi ndetse no gushimisha abafana babo ndetse no kubaha indirimbo nziza yo gusoza umwaka no kubifuriza ibyiza byo mu minsi mikuru ya Noheli n’Ubunani.
 Yumve hano indirimbo ya The Ben na Pricillah “Ntacyadutanya”

title: Yvan Buravan uri gukora kuri album ye ya kabiri, yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise “Low key”
content: Uyu muhanzi nyuma yo kwegukana igihembo cya Prix Decouvertes akaza no kumurika Album ye ya mbere yakoze ibitaramo birenga icumi mu bihugu bitandukanye bya Afurika. Nyuma y’ibi bitaramo yafashe ikiruhuko yari amazemo igihe mbere yuko atangira gukora kuri album ye ya kabiri, kuri ubu Yvan Buravan yatangiye gusohora indirimbo ziyigize cyane ko ayigeze kure. Ubwo bashyiraga hanze iyi ndirimbo nshya bise “Low key” uyu muhanzi yagize ati ”Nyuma yo kumurika Album ‘The love lab’ byanagenze neza, n’ibitaramo nitabiriye nyuma yo kwegukana igihembo cya Prix Decouvertes, nafashe icyemezo cyo gufata akaruhuko no gukora ku yindi mishinga itandukanye. Kuri ubu ngarukanye indirimbo nshya ikaba imwe mu ziri kuri Album yanjye ya kabiri.” Iyi ndirimbo nshya ikubiyemo amagambo y’urukundo n’ubundi uyu ukaba ariwo mujyo uyu muhanzi azwiho mu gukora ibihangano bye. Yumvikana asaba umukobwa baba bakundana kumuha urukundo ntakindi yitayeho kuko iyo bakundana aryoherwa n’uko babanye, ni indirimbo iririmbye mu ndimi enye arizo Ikinyarwanda, Igifaransa, Igiswahili ndetse n’Icyongereza. Indirimbo “Low Key” Yvan Buravan mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe na Bob Pro mu gihe amashusho yayo yo yafashwe anatunganywa na Dric Ent. Kompanyi y’umusore uzwi cyane mu gufatira abahanzi amashusho magufi yaba mu bitaramo no mu bindi birori. Reba "Low Key" indirimbo nshya ya Yvan Buravan

title: COVID-19 : Umuhanzi Bobi Wine akaba n’umunyaporitiki ukomeye yasohoye indirimbo kuri Coronavirus
content: Umugande w’Umuhanzi  Bobi Wine akaba n’umunyaporitiki wazonze muri ino minsi Perezida Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa Uganda kubera kurwanya ubutegetsi bwe yasohoye indirimbo ivuga k’ubukangurambaga bwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus kibangamiye isi muri iki gihe muri rusange. Ni indirimbo ivuga ububi bw’iyi ndwara ndetse anavuga byimbitse ibyakorwa kugirango isi yose ihagurukire ingamba zo gukumira iki cyorezo kizengereje isi.Muri iyo ndirimboya yise "Corona Virus Alert" Kanda hano wumve indimbo yise "Corona Virus Alert"  Bobi Wine aragira ati:"Coronavirus ni icyorezo cyugarije isi ,buri wese agomba kuba birandeba kuri cyo mu rwego rwo kukirwanya .Akomeza kandi avuga uburyo kukirwanya ari ukubahiriza amabwiriza yo kugira isuku cyane cyane gukaraba intoki,ukubahiriza kudategerana n’abantu ndetse no kuba mu rugo." Muri iyi ndirimbo Kandi akomeza avuga ko ntawe iki cyorezo kitareba ndetse akagaruka kuri bimwe mu bihugu bimaze kuzahazwa n’icyo cyorezo ku buryo bugaragara. Agira ati: Icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze gushegesha ubushinwa ndetse n’ubutariyani aho usanga imibare y’abapfa imaze kuzamuka ku rwego rwo hejuru rero buri wese nagire uruhare rwo kukirinda akurikiza amabwiriza yose yagenywe." Iyi ndirimbo ayisohoye mu gihe isi yose yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus aho cyatangiriye mu Bushinwa ndetse kikaba kimaze gukwirakwira mu isi yose ndetse no muri Afurika. Mu bihigu by’ibiyaga bigari naho nticyahatanzwe aho mu Rwanda abapimwemo icyo cyorezo bagera kuri 40 ariko bakaba barikwitabwaho ahabugenewe ,nta n’umwe Kandi urahitanwa nacyo mu Rwanda. Mu  muri Uganda  hamaze kuboneka abarwayi 14 Minisiteri yaho y’ubuzima ikaba ikomeje gutangaza ko nabo barikwitabwaho  .Bobi wine rero asohoye iyi ndirimbo atanga ubutumwa bukomeye abuha Uganda ndetse n’isi yose mu rwego rwo gukumira icyo cyorezo cyoretse isi yose. Denis Fabrice Nsengumuremyi/MUHABURA.RW

title: Ibyemezo by’ inama y’Abaminisitiri  yateranye kuri uyu wa Gatanu
content:
Uyu munsi  ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 16 Werurwe 2018,
Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yateraniye muri
Village Urugwiro, iyobowe na Nyakubahwa
Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul KAGAME. Inama y’Abaminisitiri yamenyeshejwe aho
imyiteguro y’inama idasanzwe y’Umuryango wa
Afurika Yunze Ubumwe iteganyijwe kubera mu
Rwanda ku itariki ya 21 Werurwe 2018 igeze,
ishima ko imyiteguro irimo kugenda neza, inzego
zose zibishinzwe zirimo gukora ibyo zisabwa. 1. Inama y’Abaminisitiri yemeje imyanzuro
y’Inama y’Abaminisitiri yo ku wa 14 Gashyantare
2018, imaze kuyikorera ubugororangingo. 2. Inama y’Abaminisitiri yemeje Imishinga
y’Amategeko ikurikira: a) Umushinga w’Itegeko ryemera kwemeza
burundu amasezerano y’inguzanyo yashyiriweho
umukono i Kigali mu Rwanda ku wa 12 Werurwe
2018, hagati ya Repubulika y’u Rwanda n’Ikigega
cya OPEC Gitsura Amajyambere Mpuzamahanga
(OFID), yerekeranye n’inguzanyo ingana na
miliyoni makumyabiri z’Amadolari
