title: Sport: Argentine mu gikombe cy’Isi bikozwe na Messi
content: Argentine yari kimwe mu bihugu by’ibihangange bifite amahirwe yo kucyerekezamo ariko yaraye ikoze ibisa n’ibitangaza ibifashijwemo na rutahizamu Lionel Messi ikatisha itike. Argentina yari ku mwanya wa gatandatu mu bihugu 10 byarimo bihatanira amatike atanu yo kuzahagararira umugabane wa Amerika y’Amajyepfo mu gikombe cy’Isi mbere y’uko ikina umukino wa nyuma na Équateur aho yasabwaga gutsinda bitaba ibyo igasezererwa burundu mu irushanwa yakinnye umukino waryo wa nyuma mu riheruka ryabereye muri Brazil mu 2014. Ntabwo byatangiye neza kuko ku munota wa mbere gusa yari imaze gutsindwa igitego cya mbere cya myugariro Romario Ibarra byasaga n’aho icyizere cyose abakunzi ba Argentine n’umukinnyi wayo, Lionel Messi uri mu bakunzwe cyane ku isi, bari bafite gitangiye kuyoyoka. Byasabye iminota 11 kugira ngo Messi umaze gutorwa nk’umukinnyi wa mbere ku isi inshuro eshanu, atangire guhindura umukino aho yatsinze igitego cya mbere ku mupira yari ahawe na Angel Di Maria. Nyuma iminota irindwi Messi yashyizemo icya kabiri cyatumye imitima y’Abanya-Argentine itangira gusubira mu gitereko ndetse aza gushimangira inzozi zabo zo kuzagaragara mu gikombe cy’Isi ku munota wa 62 atsinda igitego cya gatatu, umukino wari amahirwe ya nyuma urangira ari ibitego 3-1. Nubwo Messi yafashije Argentine kubona itike ikiyongera ku bihugu nka Brésil iyobowe na Neymar, Uruguay ya Luis Suarez, Colombia ya Radamel Falcao na Peru izaca mu mikino ya kamarampaka; kimwe mu bihangange kuri uyu mugabane cyatunguwe ni Chile iyobowe na rutahizamu wa Arsenal, Alex Sanchez, yarangije ari iya gatandatu ikaba izasigara ku rugo. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika nayo yatunguwe ndetse ntabwo izagaragara muri iki gikombe yari imaze imyaka 27 itaraburamo na rimwe kuko mu gice cya CONCACAF ishakiramo itike, Mexique, Costa Rica na Panama nizo zayibonye naho Honduras ikazanyura mu mikino ya kamarampaka. Ku mugabane w’u Burayi, ni ibyishimo ku Bafaransa nabo baraye babonye iyi tike bigoranye nyuma yo gutsinda Belarus ibitego 2-1 bya Antoine Griezmann na Olivier Giroud kimwe na Portugal iyobowe na Cristiano Ronaldo yabonye itike bidasubirwaho itsinze u Busuwisi ibitego 2-0. Igihugu gikomeye cyatunguwe ni u Buholandi bwatsinze Suède ibitego bibiri ku busa byombi bya Arjen Robben gusa ntibyagira icyo biyifasha kuko yasabwaga gutsinda ibiri hejuru ya birindwi bityo ikaba itazagaragara muri iri rushanwa.

title: #KWIBUKA 26  : Tariki 9 Mata 1994  Abasirikare ba Leta ya Habyarimana batwitse Abatutsi  mu Nyakabanda
content:
Uyu munsi ni tariki 9 Mata 2020 , hashize imyaka 26  ahantu hatandukanye mu Rwanda habereye ubwicanyi bukomeye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Gusa kuri iyi tariki ya 09 Mata 1994 ingabo za RPA inkotanyi zari zatangiye kurokora Abatutsi. Ni ibyaranze iyi tariki muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Nibwo hatangiye Operation Amaryllis, iyobowe na Generali Henri Poncet mu rwitwazo rwo guhungisha abanyaburayi bagera ku 1400 babaga mu Rwanda. Interahamwe n’abasirikare barindaga Habyarimana, bishe abatutsi bari bahungiye kuri paruwasi gatulika yitiriwe Mutagatifu Vicenti wa Paloti i Gikondo bagera kuri 500. Kuri uwo munsi, Ingabo za Loni ziboneye ubwicanyi bwakorewe abatutsi biganjemo abana muri kiliziya i Gikondo. Abasirikare ba Leta ya Habyarimana batwitse abatutsi bari bahungiye Nyakabanda II munsi ya BAOBA Abatutsi bari bahungiye ku misozi ya Murama, Murundi, Nyamirama na Kabare (mu karere ka Kayonza) barishwe. Abatutsi bari bahungiye kuri paruwasi gatolika ya Kabuye, ubu ni mu murenge wa Jabana, bose barishwe. Hagati y’itariki ya 9-10-11/04/1994, abatutsi bari bahungiye i Kiramuruzi (ubu ni mu Karere ka Gatsibo), barishwe. Nk’ uko byatangajwe ku rubuga rwa CNLG dukesha iyi nkuru ngo tariki 9 Mata nibwo Interahamwe zishe abatutsi muri Nyagatare I (ubu ni mu karere ka Nyagatare). Habaye ubwicanyi bwakorewe Abatutsi bari bahungiye kuri paruwasi ya Zaza muri Kibungo, guhera tariki ya 09 kugeza tariki ya 12 Mata, Abatutsi babarirwa hagati ya 500 na 800 barishwe. Abatutsi bari bahungiye ku musozi wa Nyamagumba (Mabanza) muri perefegitura ya Kibuye bagabweho igitero, babanje kwihagararaho mu gihe kingana n’iminsi itanu guhera tariki ya 09 kugeza tariki ya 14 Mata biba iby’ubusa n’ubundi ababarirwa mu 12000 baricwa. Abatutsi bari bahungiye Nyabikenke, ku biro byahoze ari iby’umurenge wa Karama muri Bumbogo, barishwe. Hishwe Abatutsi i Nyarushishi (Nkungu) • Hishwe Abatutsi b’i Cyabingo • Hishwe Abatutsi mu Mataba (Gakenke) • Hishwe Abatutsi muri centre ya Kararama (Gakenke) • Hishwe Abatutsi bari bahungiye ku Rusengero rw’Aba Baptiste rwa Rusiza muri 
Kabumba, Perefegitura ya Gisenyi, ubu ni mu Karere ka Rubavu. • Hishwe Abatutsi bari bahungiye mu Kiliziya ya Nyundo no mu nkengero zayo, muri Perefegitura ya Gisenyi, ubu ni mu Karere ka Rubavu. • Hishwe Abatutsi bari bahungiye muri Maternite ya Nyundo muri Perefegitura ya Gisenyi, ubu ni mu Karere ka Rubavu. 
 Richard Ruhumuriza/MUHABURA.RW

title: Chelsea FC isa nk’iyamaze kwemeranywa n’umutoza uzayitoza nayo mu minsi iri imbere
content:
Ubusanzwe byari byitezwe, ku itariki ya  24 Werurwe ariho hagombaga gutangazwa ibijyanye na Chelsea n’umutoza Antonio Conte. Biravugwa ko byarangiye ahubwo Chelsea yo ikaba idashaka gukora ikosa nk’iryokozwe na Buyern Munich na Manchester City ryo gutangaza abatoza mbere.
 Umutoza ufite Chelsea Fc by’agateganyo Guus Hidink , yamaze gutsembera iyi kipe avugako bidashoboka ko yagumana iyi kipe,  Amasezerano ye agomba kurangirana ‘umwaka w’imikino ku rutonde rw’abahabwaga amahirwe  harimo Pep Guardiola byararangiye kuko we yamaze gusinyira Manchester City  undi kandi uri ku rutonde  n’umutoza w’ikipe y’igihugu ya  Chile gusa nawe yamaze kubivamo kubera ikibazo cy’icyongereza. Undi ni Diego Simeon wa Atletico Madrid ariko nawe nta mahirwe na make agihari. Usigaye ahabwa amahirwe ni Antonio Conte utoza ikipe y’igihugu ya’Ubutaliyani.Uyu aherutse no kubonana n’abahagarariye Chelsea n’ubwo ibyavuyemo byagizwe ubwiru. Icyagaragaye ni uko uyu Mutoza yanze kongera amasezerano mu ikipe y’igihugu dore ko ayo afite azarangirana na EURO 2016 izaba muri Kamena.
 Antonio Conte ushobora kuba yakomezanya na Chelsea mu minsi iri imbere  Ngo mu gihe yaba yarangizanyije na Chelsea, umutoza Claudio Ranieri utoza Leicester City niwe wahabwa akazi ko gufata ikipe y’Ubutaliyani. Antonio aramutse aje yaba yiyongereye kuri benshi bashya bazagaragar muri shampiyona y’ubwongereza ummwaka utaha. Aba bayobawe na Pep Guardiola waasinyiye Man.City, Rafa Benitez wasinyiye Newcastle, ndetse n’undi ugomba gufata Manchester United. Impinduka ziritezwe muri iyi kipe mugihe yaba ifashwe na Antonio nk’uko bigenda ahandi, Diego Costa yatangaje ko ntaho azajya n’ubwo uyu Conte yavuzeko yakubakira kuri ba rutahizamu babiri aribo Edson Cavanni na Na Mario Icardi wa Inter de Miran. Ikindi ni uko Zizedine Zidane utoza Real Madrid yatangaje ko yiteguye gutanga James Rodriguez muri Chelsea maze akabona Eden Hazard.

Yanditswe na Rukundo Xaver/Muhabura.rw

title: RDB yitabiriye imurika rikomeye ry’ubukerarugendo muri Amerika
content: Iri murika ry’ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo riri mu ya mbere akomeye muri Amerika y’Amajyaruguru. Riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Manhattan ahazwi nka Jacob K.Javits. Ryatangaiye taraiki 24 Mutarama, rirasozwa kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020. Nyuma y’imurika, itsinda rihagarariye u Rwanda rizakomereza ibikorwa byo kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda hirya no hino mu bice bya Leta ya California nka San Diego, Orange County na Los Angeles mbere yo kugaruka mu Rwanda. Ibigo byigenga bikora iby’ubukerarugendo bihagarariye u Rwanda birimo Mantis Rwanda, Akagera Aviation, New Dawn Associates, Heritage Safaris, Far Trek Africa Safaris, Silverback Africa na FCM Charleston. Mu byo bari kwerekana harimo umuco w’u Rwanda, urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima ruboneka mu Rwanda, ubwiza bw’u Rwanda n’ibijyanye no kwakira abakerarugendo. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Belise Kariza, yavuze ko muri Amerika y’Amajyaruguru ari hamwe mu haturuka ba mukerarugendo benshi basura u Rwanda, ko ari iby’ingenzi gukomeza kuhamenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda. Ati “Kuba twitabiriye iri murika rizwi rya New York Times Travel Show, tukagaragara mu bandi bamurika basaga 700 baturutse hirya no hino ku isi biratuma abitabiriye bamenya ko u Rwanda ari ahantu heza ho gusura ku isi. Twiteguye guha ikaze abakerarugendo bashaka gusura igihugu cyacu cyiza.” New York Times Travel Show ni imurika ry’ubukerarugendo riri mu akomeye ku Isi. Ryitabirwa n’abantu basaga 35 000, barimo abamurika basaga 700 bavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 175.

title: Ivan Minnaert wahoze atoza Rayon Sport agiye gutwara Undi mukinnyi wayo muri AFC Leopards
content:
Abakinnyi babiri b’ikipe ya Rayon Sports, Ismaila Diarra na Emmanuel Imanishimwe bamaze kwerekeza mu ikipe ya AFC Leopards yo muri Kenya itozwa n’umubiligi Ivan Minnaert. AFC Leopards yo mu cyiciro cya mbere muri Kenya ikaba yaguze aba bakinnyi babiri bakiniraga Rayon Sports kugira ngo izabifashije mu mukino yo kwishyura ya shampiyona izatangira mu kwezi gutaha. Aganira na RuhagoYacu umutoza w’ikipe ya AFC Leopards akaba yadutangarije ko Diarra yasinye umwaka umwe n’igice mu gihe Emmanuel yahawe amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri. “Diarra yasinye amezi 18 mu gihe Emmanuel yasinye amezi 24. Bazaza muri Leopards umwaka w’imikino urangiye”- Ivan Minnaert atangaza. Ismaila Diarra akaba yari afite amasezerano y’amezi 6 agomba kurangira n’uyu mwaka w’imikino kimwe na Imanishimwe Emmanuel. Kugeza ubu, Rayon Sports ikaba iri ku mwanya wa 3 ku rutonde rwa shampiyona n’amanota 54, aho isigaje imikino ibiri hamwe n’ibirarane bitatu itakiniye igihe. Ismaila Diarra akaba atemerewe gukina umukino w’umunsi wa 29 wa shampiyona uzahuza Rayon Sports n’Amagaju kuri uyu wa Gatatu kubera amakarita abiri y’umuhondo yabonye mu mikino iheruka.
AFC Leopards ikaba iri ku mwanya wa 11 n’amanota 17 mu mikino 15, ni nyuma yo gukurwaho amanota atatu mu minsi ishize kubera imyitwarire mibi.

 Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: FERWAFA yabonye umunyamabanga mushya
content: Kuri uyu wa kabiri mu masaha yo Ku gicamunsi,Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda “FERWAFA” ryatangaje ko Uwayezu Francois Regis w’imyaka 35 ariwe munyamabanga mukuru waryo mushya. Uwayezu wahabwaga amahirwe muri benshi bari basabye kuba abanyamabanga ba FERWAFA afite impamyabumenyi y’ikiciro cya gatatu cya kaminuza mu bushabitsi “Master of Business Administration (MBA)”, kandi ngo azwiho gukunda umupira w’amaguru. Rtd Sekamana Jean Damascene Perezida wa FERWAFA  yabwiye urubuga rwa FERWAFA ko afitiye ikizere uyu munyamabanga we mushya. Yavuze ko ari inararibonye ye mu miyoborere n’ubumenyi afite ku mupira w’amaguru ndetse n’uburambe bizafasha cyane FERWAFA. Muhabura.rw

title: Dan Alves Yagiriye Coutinho inama yo kuva muri Liverpool
content:
Nyuma y’aho Liverpool itsindiwe na Seville ku mukino wa nyuma  wa UEFA Europa league, byatumye iyi kipe ibura itike yo kuzitabira Uefa Championsleague. Ibi bikaba byiyongera ku kuba nta n’itike yo kuzitabira Europa mu mwaka utaha, muri make ntizagaragara ku rwego rw’u Burayi mu mwaka utaha,  Ni imbogamizi ku bakinnyi bakomeye baba abayirimo ndetse n’abifuzaga kuyizamo.  Byaje kuba igikuba ku bafana ubwo Coutinho yasaga nkuvugira mu migani ku bijyanye nno kuba nyotewe ibikombe. Byaje gucika ubwo mugenzi we bakinana mu ikipe y’igihuhu ya Brazil Dan Alves amujyiriye inama yo kuva muri Liverpool. Philippe Coutinho  ni umukinnyi ukina mu bo hagati ariko ataha izamu. Ku myaka ye 23  yatawe nk’umukinnyi w’umwaka mu ikipe ya Liverpool. Afite impano idasanzwe kandi ibonwa na buri wese. Uwavugako ntakipe ku isi atakinamo ntawamuter ibuye. Ibi bifite gihamya kuko ya FC Barcelona, Paris Saint Germain,.. zagiye zigaragaza ko zimwifuza ariko Liverpool ikagomeza kumuryamaho ari nako bagenda bamwereka ko imbere h’ikipe ari heza.  Gusa nyuma yo kubura itike yo kuzitabira nibura irushanwa rimwe ku mugabane w’I Burayi, byatangiye kuba bibi. Aho bari mu ikipe y’igihugu ya Brazil iri mu mikino ya Copa America Centenario muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, uyu musore yaje kuvuga ko iyi Copa Amerika yavuze ko uyu ari umwanya wo gutwara igikombe kuko nga ubusanzw atigeze abibona aho akina. Aha benshi bumvise ko yavugaga muri Liverpool.  Yaje no kohererezwa ubutumwa na Dan Alves bumubwira ko Ruhabo ari ukwizihiza ibihe, ko Liverpool ifite amateka ariko ari byiza gutekereza ku gukina Champions League. Dan Alves yanongereyeho ati “ na nge ngiye kujya mu Butaliyani.” Uretse ko FC Barcelona yagaragaje ko imushaka mu minsi yashize, nta kidasanzwe cyakonzwe kuri Transfer ye muri Barcelona. Kuri ubu ikipe ya Paris Saint Germain yo yabijemo ikomeje. Muri icyi cyumweru hakwiriye igihuha ko irigutanga milliyoni 45 z’amayero. Ikigaragaza ko bikomeye ni uko hari abakinnyi batanu ba PSG bashobora kubigenderamo bakisanga muri Liverpool. Abo ni Edson Caani, Javier Pastore, Lucas Digne, Lucas Moura na Marquinhos.Gusa ngo byaba ari amahano nk’uko umunyamakuru wa Liverpool Echo, JamesPearce yabivuze. Yagize ati “natungurwa Coutinho aramutse ashaka kuva muri Liverpool cyangwa Liverpool yemeye kumugurisha.”



Yanditswe na Rukundo Xaver/Muhabura.rw

title: Unguka Bank Plc yashishikarije abakiliya bayo kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga muri serivisi bakeneye
content: Ni uburyo bwongerewemo imbaraga muri iki gihe, ndetse ikiguzi cyo guhererekanya amafaranga muri ubu buryo cyagiye gikurwaho. Mu rwego rwo kurinda abakiliya bayo n’abandi bose bayigana, Unguka Bank Plc yabashishikarije gukoresha ikoranabuhanga, rishobora kubafasha kugera kuri serivisi zinyuranye iyi banki itanga. Bumwe mu buryo yashyiriyeho abakiliya bayo harimo ubwa Mobile banking, aho abakiliya b’iyi banki bashobora kugera kuri serivisi zayo bakoresheje telefoni ngendanwa zabo. Muri ubwo buryo bashobora kohereza amafaranga, kugura ibintu bitandukanye ndetse no kwishyurana. Umukiliya ushaka kuyikoresha arabanza akiyandikisha muri iyi serivisi, ubundi agakanda *951# ugakurikiza amabwiriza. Hari kandi ikarita yo kubikuza no kwishyura (Debit cards). Ni amakarita Unguka Bank Plc yageneye abakiliya bayo, bashobora kuyakoresha babikuza ku byuma bya ATM bifite ikirango cya smart cash mu Rwanda hose ndetse no kwishyura nk’ibicuruzwa mu maguriro atandukanye, aho bafite ku imashini za POS. Mu bijyanye no kwishyira imisoro, hari uburyo bwa E-TAX bw’ikoranabuhanga, abakiliya ba Unguka Bank Plc bifashisha mu kwishyura imisoro mu Kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe imisoro n’amahoro, RRA. Ubwo buryo bwiyongeraho ubuzwi nka ‘Push and Pull’, aho umukiliya ashobora kuvana amafaranga kuri konti ya Unguka Bank Plc akayashyira kuri konti ya mobile money kandi ku buntu, cyangwa bakayavana kuri konti yo kuri telefoni akayimurira kuri konti ya banki. Iyi serivisi isaba ko ubanza guhuza konti yawe ya Unguka Bank Plc na konti yawe ya mobile money. Ku muntu ushaka kuvana amafaranga kuri konti yo muri Unguka Bank ayashyira kuri Mobile money akanda *182*4*3*9#, yaba ashaka kuyavana kuri mobile money ayashyira kuri konti ya Unguka Bank Plc, agakanda *182*4*2*9#. Unguka Bank Plc yasabye abakeneye ibindi bisobanuro kugana ishami ryayo, gahamagara umurongo utishyurwa 9591 cyangwa gusura imbuga nkoranyambaga zayo kuri @Ungukabank haba kuri Twitter, Instagram, Facebook na YouTube. Unguka Bank yashinzwe mu 2005 nk’ikigo cy’imari iciriritse, ayo yatangiranye n’abanyamigabane 214 n’imari shingiro ya miliyoni 321 Frw. Mu 2011 Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda yayemereye gukora nka banki Iciriritse (Microfinance Bank), iva ku kuba IMF-UNGUKA S.A iba Unguka Bank. Mu 2018 yavuye ku kuba Unguka Bank Ltd iba Unguka Bank Plc. Unguka Bank Plc imaze kugira amashami 15 mu turere icyenda two mu gihugu.

title: Airtel yatangije ‘Application’ ya mbere ihuriza hamwe serivise zose isanzwe itanga
content: Iri koranabuhanga rikubiye muri porogaramu yiswe ‘My Airtel App’, rifasha urikoresha kuryoherwa na serivisi zose zitangwa na Airtel bitamugoye na gato kandi ziri ahantu hamwe. Serivise ziri muri ‘My Airtel App’ zirimo izo “kugura ama-inite, internet, kwishyura ibyo ukeneye byose nk’amazi, amashanyarazi, ifatabuguzi rya televiziyo, […] kohereza amafaranga haba mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, byose bigakorwa hifashishijwe ikarita ya banki cyangwa Airtel Money.” Umukiriya wa Airtel kandi azaba ashobora kureba uko ibikorwa byo kwishyura byagenze no kugenzura ibyakorewe kuri simukadi ye ya Airtel byose yinjiriye ahantu hamwe. Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Airtel Rwanda, Amit Chawla, yavuze ko ibihe bidasanzwe isi irimo byo guhangana n’ingaruka za COVID-19 byatumye habaho impinduka zikomeye by’umwihariko mu bucuruzi n’ibindi bikorwa bihuza bantu benshi, bityo ko izo mpinduka zikwiye kubyazwa amahirwe, abantu bagaterana imbere na zo. Ati “ Twashyizeho iyi porogaramu nyuma y’igihe kinini dukora ubushakashatsi ku byo abakiriya bakunze gukenera, tumaze no kumva neza ko bakeneye urubuga bakoreraho ibintu byose, bitabatwaye umwanya kandi bakabikora ku buryo buboroheye.” Yakomeje avuga ko gukoresha iyi porogaramu nshya bizarushaho gufasha abakiriya ba Airtel Rwanda kumenyera serivise zifashisha ikoranabuhanga rikomeje gushyirwa imbere mu bikorwa bitandukanye mu Rwanda. Ati “Gukoresha iyi porogaramu yo kwihereza biroroshye, birizewe kandi bizorohereza abakiriya ba Airtel gukora ibintu byinshi harimo kureba ama inite bafite kuri telephone zabo, interineti bafiteho, ayo bafite kuri Airtel Money, banabashe kongeramo ama inite, kureba no kugura pack zihari zitandukanye.” ‘My Airtel App’ ikora igihe cyose (24/7), izanafasha abayikoresha gukurikirana buri gihe ibibera kuri konti za bo za banki na Airtel Money bitabagoye na gato, ndetse ikaba idasaba kuba umuntu afite internet mu gihe ari kuyikoresha. Umutekano w’iyi ‘Application’ wizewe ku rwego rwo hejuru kuko itemerera undi muntu kuba yakoresha imyirondoro yawe agamije kwiba amafaranga ufite kuri konti iyo ari yo yose cyangwa gukora ikindi kintu cyabangamira umukiriya wa Airtel uyikoresha. Ibi kandi bijyana n’uko telefone zose zigaragaweho kuba imiterere ya zo yakorohereza abajura kwiba uyikoresha, itemera kuyijyamo. Akarusho kandi ni uko kugura ama-inite ukoresheje iyi ‘application’ biguhesha uburenganzira bwo guhabwa inyongera ndetse koherereza undi muntu byo bikaguhesha ubwasisi bwa 5% by’ama-inite yose wohereje. Iyi application izorohereza abajyaga bagorwa no gufata mu mutwe za kode zitandukanye mu kugura cyangwa gukoresha serivise za Airtel kuko buri kimwe cyose cyorohejwe muri ‘My Airtel App’. Ubuyobozi bwa Airtel Rwanda buvuga ko gukoresha iyi application bizarushaho kugabanya guhura kw’abantu muri ibi bihe byo guhangana na COVID-19. Umuntu ukeneye gukoresha iyi porogaramu ya ’My Airtel App’ ajya muri ’Play Store’ kubakoresha telefoni za ’Android’ cyangwa ’App Store’ ku bakoresha iOS; ukandika mu ishakiro "My Airtel", hakaza ifite amagambo ya ’Airtel Africa’, ubundi ukayishyira muri telefone yawe nk’uko bikorwa ku zindi porogaramu. Umaze kuyishyiramo, urayifungura, ukuzuzamo nomero yawe, ubundi ugakurikiza amabwiriza ajyanye n’ibyo bagusaba. Mu gutangaza ku mugaragaro imikorere y’iyi porogaramu, Airtel Rwanda yaboneyeho no gushimira uburyo abanyarwanda muri rusange bari kwitwara muri ibi bihe byo guhangana na COVID-19, ndetse yongera kubasaba kurushaho kubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri ibi bihe bidasanzwe. Ishyirwa hanze ry’ububasha bwo kwihereza bwahawe abakiriya ba Airtel ni kimwe mu bikorwa bigaragaza umuhati wa Airtel mu kugeza ku mukiriya serivise nziza zijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga no kubaha ubushobozi bwo kwicungira ibikorwa byose byo ku murongo wabo wa Airtel, nta wundi bitabaje.

title: Col Byabagamba na Rusagara urukiko rw’ubujurire rwabagabanyirije igifungo, bakatirwa 15
content: Urukiko rw’Ubujurire rwakatiye Col Tom Byabagamba na Rtd Brig Gen Frank Rusagara igifungo cy’imyaka 15, bari bajuriye nyuma yo kutanyurwa n’igihano bakatiwe n’Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gisirikare mu 2016. Mu mwanzuro watangajwe ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 27 Ukuboza 2019, umucamanza yatangaje iki gifungo nyuma yo gusanga Byabagamba ahamwa n’ibyaha birimo gusuzugura ibendera ry’igihugu. Umucamanza yavuze ko iki cyaha cyasuzumwe hashingiwe ku mashusho yagaragaye, ubwo we ubwe [Byabagamba] atigeze aterera isaluti ibendera ry’igihugu ryazamurwaga, mu gihe nk’umusirikare yari abitegetswe. Mu bindi byaha yahamijwe harimo icyo kwamamaza nkana ibihuha no kugomesha rubanda arwangisha ubutegetsi buriho, gukora igikorwa kigamije gusebya Leta ari Umuyobozi ndetse no gutunga imbunda binyuranije n’amategeko. Mu gihe ibyaha yahamijwe ari nabyo urukiko rwa gisirikare rwashingiyeho rumukatira gufungwa imyaka 21, umucamanza w’Urukiko rw’Ubujurire yavuze ko basanze hari ibyo urukiko rwa mbere rwirengagije, kuko ibyaha Byabagamba yarezwe bihanishwa igifungo kiri hagati y’imyaka 10 na 15. We yajuriraga asaba urukiko ko yagirwa umwere, ariko urukiko rw’ubujurire rumuhanisha igihano kinini mu biteganywa ku byaha aregwa, ni ukuvuga gufungwa imyaka 15. Rtd Brig Gen Frank Rusagara na we yakatiwe gufungwa imyaka 15, nyuma y’uko Urukiko rw’Ubujurire rwasanze ahamwa n’ibyaha byose nk’uko Urukiko rukuru rwa Gisirikare rwabimuhamije, rukamukatira gufungwa imyaka 20. Birimo kwamamaza nkana ibihuha no kugomesha rubanda arwangisha ubutegetsi buriho, gukora igikorwa kigamije gusebya Leta ari Umuyobozi ndetse no gutunga imbunda binyuranije n’amategeko. Na we Urukiko rw’Ubujurire rwavuze ko ibyaha yahamijwe n’Urukiko rukuru rwa gisirikare bimuhama, ariko ko urukiko rwa mbere hari ibyo rwirengagije, kuko itegeko rihana ibyaha yaregwaga riteganya igifungo kiri hagati y’imyaka 10 na 15, bityo ahanishwa ikinini muri ibyo, ni ukuvuga gufungwa imyaka 15. Byabagamba na Rusagara bakatiwe mu bujurire nyuma y’imyaka itanu bamaze muri gereza, kuko batawe muri yombi mu 2014. Ni ukuvuga ko basigaje indi myaka 10 ngo barekurwe, kereka bafunguwe by’agateganyo kubera imyitwarire yabo n’igihe bazaba barangije ku gihano cyabo. Isomwa ry’urubanza rwabo ribayeho nyuma yo gusubikwa inshuro eshatu kubera ko imyanzuro yari itararangiza kwandikwa. Ubwo iburanisha mu bujurire ryasozwaga muri Nzeri 2019, urukiko rwatangaje ko umwanzuro uzasomwa tariki 15 Ugushyingo, biza kwimurirwa ku wa 13 Ukuboza, nyuma bishyirwa kuri uyu wa 27 Ukuboza. Aba uko ari babiri bari banafunganywe na Sgt Kabayiza François wahoze ari umushoferi wa Rusagara, we igifungo cy’imyaka itanu yari yakatiwe cyarangiye urubanza rukiburanwa mu bujurire, ahita arekurwa. Me Buhuru Pierre Celestin wunganira Rusagara, yavuze ko bishimiye umwanzuro w’Urukiko rw’Ubujurire rwagabanyije igihano cy’uwo yunganira, ariko avuga ko asanga nta mpamvu yagombaga gutuma akatirwa igifungo kuko ari umwere. Yavuze ko agiye gufata igihe akavugana n’umukiliya we, ku buryo bibaye ngombwa banajuririra Urukiko rwa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. Src:Igihe

title: Tour du Rwanda 2020: Skol yifashishije The Ben mu gusangira ibyishimo n’abakunzi b’amagare (Amafoto)
content: Tour du Rwanda iri kuba ku nshuro ya 12 yatangiye kuri uyu wa 23 Gashyantare 2020, mu gace kegukanywe na Yevgeniy Fedorov ukinira Vino- Astana Motors yo muri Kazakhstan. Uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 20 yakoresheje amasaha abiri, iminota 44 n’amasegonda 59 ku ntera y’ibilometero 114.4. Ni we wa mbere wo muri Kazakhstan wegukanye agace muri Tour du Rwanda. Usibye kuryoherwa n’igare, abitabiriye itangizwa rya Tour du Rwanda banataramanye n’abahanzi bahoza ku mutima. Uruganda rwenga ibinyobwa bisembuye n’ibidasembuye rwa SKOL Brewery Limited Rwanda ruzaherekeza Tour du Rwanda, rwazirikanye abakunzi b’umuziki butegura igitaramo cyaririmbwemo na The Ben. Mugisha Benjamin wamamaye mu muziki nka The Ben yataramiye ku Kimironko aho isiganwa ryasorejwe kuri iki Cyumweru. Yifashishije indirimbo ze zikunzwe cyane yashimishije abakunzi b’umuziki Nyarwanda n’abihebeye ibihangano bye by’umwihariko. The Ben afatanyije n’ibihumbi by’abafana baririmbanye “Ndaje”,  “Naremeye”, “Vazi (Vas-y)’’, “Fine girl” n’izindi bagaragaza ibyishimo. Uyu muhanzi yanaririmbye indirimbo yahimbiye Skol, ishimagiza ibinyobwa by’uru ruganda. The Ben azongera gutaramira abakunzi b’umukino w’amagare i Musanze ku wa 27 Gashyantare 2020, asoze ibitaramo bye ataramana n’abanyamujyi b’i Nyamirambo ku wa 29 Gashyantare 2020. Skol ni umuterankunga wa Tour du Rwanda ndetse mu 2018 yasinye amasezerano yo gukomeza kuyitera ingabo mu bitugu mu myaka itatu. Niyo ihemba umukinnyi watwaye agace k’isiganwa ndetse aho gasorezwa hatangirwa ibinyobwa ku biciro bigabanyije ndetse abanyamahirwe bagatsindira ibihembo bitandukanye. Kuva muri Nyakanga 2018, Skol ifasha ingimbi zo mu makipe yo mu Rwanda kwitoreza mu Bubiligi. Muri Tour du Rwanda 2020 ifitemo ikipe yayo ifatanyije n’Ikigo cya Adrien Niyonshuti kigamije kuzamura impano mu mukino w’amagare (ANCA). Iyi kipe yitwa Skol Adrien Cycling Academy (SACA) ni nshya, iri ku rwego rwo gukina amarushanwa yo ku mugabane “continental’’, yashinzwe mu rwego rwo guteza imbere impano z’Abanyarwanda bakina umukino w’amagare. Abakinnyi batanu bayihagarariye barimo Mugisha Moïse (Kapiteni), Habimana Jean Eric, Dukuzumuremyi, Hakizimana Seth na Nsengiyumva Shemu. Uretse Tour du Rwanda 2020, SACA iteganya kwitabira andi masiganwa arimo Tour de l’Egypte, Tour de Limpopo, Tour du Cameroun, Tour du Sénégal n’ayandi atandukanye. Mu Ukuboza 2019 nibwo Skol yatangaje ko iri ku rwego rwo kwenga ibinyobwa bifite ingano ya hegitolitiro ibihumbi 500 ku mwaka. Isanzwe ikora ibinyobwa bitandukanye birimo Skol Lager, Skol Malt, Skol 5, Virunga Mist, virunga Gold, Panache Lemon byose biboneka hirya no hino mu gihugu ku giciro cyiza. AMAFOTO: NIYONZIMA Moses

title: Mowzey Radio: “Lilian Mbabazi ni umugore wange”
content:
Mowzey Radio wo mu itsinda rya Good Life, usanzwe ari papa w’umwana yabyaranye na Lilian Mbabazi, kuri ubu bamaze iminsi badacana uwaka n’ubwo kuri ubu uyu muhanzi yamaze kuvuguruza aya makuru y’abantu kuri we yita abanzi b’uyu muryango wa Radio na Lilian.


Ubwo yaririmbaga mu gitaramo cyitiriwe Famous Galaxy fm ahitwa Zzina Beach Fest mu mpera ziki cyumweru uyu muhanzi yafashe umwanya abwira abafana be ko yiteguye kurwana n’undi wese ushobora kuzivanga mu rukundo rwe na Lilian Mbabazi aho ava akagera, ati: “Mbabazi Lilian aracyari umugore wanjye kandi azahora ari umugore wange ibihe byose rero abanzi ni mushaka mwiyahure”. Tubibutse ko aba bahanzi bombi bakomoka mu gihugu cya Uganda ndetse akaba ari naho bakorera umuziki kuri ubu bakaba bafitanye abana babiri umuhungu n’umukobwa. Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Miss Wema  yaje mu Rwanda mu  birori  bi dasanzwe[ Reba Video ye na  Diamond]
content: Miss Wema Sepetu yaje mu Rwanda kwitabira ibirori bizahuriza hamwe abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga’, yageze i Kigali saa mbili z’ijoro kuri uyu wa 22 Ugushyingo 2017. Miss Wema Sepetu yazanwe no kwitabira ibirori bya Instagram Party bizaba kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 24 Ugushyingo 2017. Ni ku nshuro ya mbere uyu mukobwa w’icyamamare muri Afurika y’Uburasirazuba ageze mu Rwanda ndetse akigera ku kibuga cy’indege cya Kanombe yavuze ko ‘yari afite amashyushyu yo kureba iki gihugu n’umwihariko acyumvaho mu itangazamakuru’. Yavuze ko gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga byamwaguriye impano yifitemo mu bya sinema, bimuhesha amafaranga ndetse by’umwihariko ngo byatumye arushaho kumenyekana ari nayo mpamvu yatumiwe mu Rwanda nk’icyamamare. Yagize ati "Imbuga nkoranyambaga zikwiye kuba urubuga rwo kwiyerekana ugahaguruka ugakora, hari abazifata nk’urubuga rwo gukiniraho ariko iyo uzikoresheje neza zikuzanira inyungu, nkanjye namamazaho filime zanjye, nkagurishirizaho applications nanjye ubwanjye nkiyamamaza...abantu bakwiye gukoresha izi mbuga mu buryo bwiza zikabahindurira ubuzima, ni nayo gahunda y’iki gitaramo njemo." Wema Sepetu akigera mu Rwanda yahise ajya gukorana ikiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyabaye ahagana saa yine z’ijoro ahitwa Chillax Lounge mu Mujyi wa Kigali ari naho hazabera ibirori yatumiwemo. Muri ibi birori bya Instagram Party kandi hatumiwemo n’abandi bantu b’ibyamamare bazwi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zikoreshwa cyane mu Rwanda aho bazahura n’abafana babo bakishimana.

title: Abanyarwanda baba muri Canada batanze miliyoni 20 Frw zo gufasha abagizweho ingaruka na Coronavirus
content: Umuyobozi w’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba muri Canada, Joachim Mutezintare, yabwiye IGIHE ko nubwo batuye muri Canada, umutima wabo uterera mu Rwanda ibyo bikabatera guhora bakurikiranira hafi ibihabera. Yavuze ko bafashe icyemezo cyo kwishakamo inkunga bagenera Abanyarwanda bari imbere mu gihugu, nyuma yo kubona ko hari abagizweho ingaruka no kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19. Ati “Kubera iki cyorezo cya Covid-19 n’ingaruka za Guma mu rugo, twatekereje Abanyarwanda ubusanzwe babonaga ikibatunga ari uko basohotse, nka ba nyakabyizi. Ni ho igitekerezo cyo kubashakira inkunga cyavuye, tukifatanya n’abandi banyarwanda, tugahuza imbaraga zo kurwanya ingaruka za Coronavirus ku batishoboye.” Nyuma yo kugira icyo gitekerezo, abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu bakoresheje urubuga rwa "Gofundme", umuntu agatanga uko abishoboye, bakusanya $ 21.519 mu byumweru bibiri. Guverinoma y’u Rwanda iheruka gufata icyemezo ko ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe bifungurwa, gusa hari imirimo imwe n’imwe nk’abari basanzwe ari abamotari igifunzwe, hakiyongeraho abatakaje imirimo yabo ubu bakeneye gufashwa. Guverinoma yashimiye Abanyarwanda baba muri Canada ku bwo kuzirikana abanyarwanda bari imbere mu gihugu. Mu ibaruwa Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Imari n’Igenamigambi ushinzwe imari ya Leta, Tusabe Richard, yabandikiye ku wa 5 Gicurasi, yagize, ati “Mu izina rya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ndabashimira nanabamenyesha ko twakiriye inkunga yanyu ingana na $21.519 igamije gufasha mu guhangana n’ingaruka za Covid-19 binyuze mu gufasha abatishoboye.” Mu buzima busanzwe, Mutezintare yavuze ko nta kibazo cyihariye Abanyarwanda baba muri Canada bafite, uretse ibyo basangiye n’abanya-Canada muri ibi bihe. Muri rusange abadashobora gukora kubera ibikorwa byahagaritswe, Leta ibaha Amafaranga yo kubatunga. Mu kwezi gushize banahuriye hamwe mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakrewe Abatutsi, ibikorwa byabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.

title: Abaholandi barimo Van Gaal bagaragaje urwibutso basigaranye mu rugendo bagiriye mu Rwanda
content: Louis Van Gaal yabigarutseho ku wa 20 Mutarama 2020 mu gikorwa cyiswe B2B cyahuje abaserukiye ibigo bitwara abakerarugendo mu Rwanda n’ibigo binini byo mu Buholandi bicuruza ubukerarugendo. Iki gikorwa cyateguwe na Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi cyabereye i LaHaye, u Rwanda rwari ruhagarariwe n’ibigo birimo Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB), Sosiyete Nyarwanda y’Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir, Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi n’ibigo by’ubukerarugendo birimo Amahoro Tours, Palast Tours and Travel na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda. Ibi bigo byari byitabiriye Imurikagurisha Mpuzamahanga ry’Ubukerarugendo rya Vakantiebeurs mu Mujyi wa Utrecht mu Buholandi. Byarimurikiyemo amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo ari mu gihugu binyuze muri gahunda ya ‘Visit Rwanda’. Abayobozi babyo ku mugoroba wo ku wa Mbere bahuye n’Abaholandi basuye u Rwanda hagamijwe kungurana ibitekerezo, kugaragaza uko bakiriwe no gutanga inama ku byanozwa kugira ngo bakomeze bishimire serivisi bahabwa nk’abakerarugendo. Muri Nzeri 2019, Van Gaal ni umwe mu banyacyubahiro 25 bise amazina abana b’ingagi mu Rwanda, ni umuhango wabereye mu karere ka Musanze witabirwa kandi na Perezida Paul Kagame. Aloysius Paulus Maria van Gaal OON w’imyaka 68 yavuze ko ibyo yishimiye mu Rwanda harimo kuba yarise izina umwana w’ingagi, igikorwa yavuze ko ari iby’agaciro. Yagize ati “Ikindi nahabonye ni abantu badasanzwe kubera ko mu Rwanda mu myaka 25 ishize ibintu byari bimeze nabi, ariko iyo urebye uko bimeze bakemuye ibyo bibazo, ibi kandi ni ukubera umukuru w’igihugu, njye nk’umutoza ndabizi ko bitoroshye guhindura imyumvire mu buryo bworoshye, bitwara igihe ariko we yarabikoze.” “Abantu baho baratandukanye, ni abantu ubona ko bitonze kandi bazi kwakira abashyitsi, mu Rwanda ni abantu bazi kureba kure kandi ikirere cyaho ni cyiza, twagiye mu modoka nini, byari bishimishije.” Yavuze ko amahoteli yo mu Rwanda ari meza, agaragaza ko abantu bashobora gukeka ko wenda yagiye muri hoteli y’inyenyeri eshanu ariko ko atari byo. Yavuze ko aho wajya hose uhasanga ibintu byiza, ibiryo ndetse hakaba hari n’isuku iri hejuru. Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Karabaranga Jean Pierre, yavuze ko hari byinshi ibihugu byombi bisangiye, harimo ko haba mu Rwanda no muri iki gihugu abantu usanga bafite inzozi zo kugera kure mu kubaho neza. Yagize ati “Iyo urebye mu myaka 25 ishize ukareba aho twavuye n’aho turi uyu munsi, ni ukubera ko Abanyarwanda twavuze tuti tugomba kugira imibereho myiza kandi turabiharanira.” Ku birebana no gusura u Rwanda, Amb. Karabaranga yagize ati “Dufite iterambere, dufite ahantu hafite ikirere cyiza, imisozi myiza kandi nzi neza ko abenshi muri mwe usanga bagenda ahantu harambitse ariko twe byose turabyishimira.” Umuyobozi muri RDB Ushinzwe kumenyekanisha Ubukerarugendo, Mutesi Linda, yavuze ko u Rwanda ari igihugu gitekanye, benshi bishimira gusura. Ati “U Rwanda ni igihugu gishimishije, ni igihugu cyiza kandi kigira ibihe byiza, iki ni kimwe mu bihugu byiza mu kugira umutekano mu kubitemberamo. Dufite ahantu heza ho gusura harimo mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda, mu Majyepfo, mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda dufite ingagi z’Ibirunga zisangwa gusa mu bihugu bitatu ku Isi.” “Mu Burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda tuhafite Ikiyaga cya Kivu ukaba wahafatira amafoto meza, dufite kandi uburyo bwiza bwo kugera muri izo parike kuko dufite kajugujugu zishobora kuva ku Kibuga cy’indege i Kanombe zijyayo, uramutse ushaka kujyayo hari RwandAir iva Brussels mu Bubiligi inshuro enye mu cyumweru ukagera i Kigali.” Yababwiye kandi ko kugira ngo ubone VISA bidasaba ko uyakira mu gihugu urimo, ahubwo iyo ugeze ku kibuga cy’indege mu Rwanda uhita uyibahwa. Kuri ubu isoko ryo mu Buholandi riza mu myanya umunani ya mbere, mu kugira abakerarugendo benshi bakorana n’u Rwanda. Abarusura biyongereyeho 11.9 %, bavuye ku 4918 mu 2017 bagera kuri 5501 mu 2018. Guverinoma yihaye intego ko mu 2024 inyungu u Rwanda ruvana mu bukerarugendo izagera kuri miliyoni $800 zivuye kuri miliyoni $404 yinjiye mu 2017.

title: Imihango n’imigenzo yakorwaga n’Abanyarwanda mu kwirukana ibiza n’ibyorezo
content: Imihango yakorwaga ahanini yabaga ishingiye ku biteganywa n’Ubwiru, umwuga w’Ubupfumu, Ubuvubyi Ubuhennyi, Ubuhoryo n’Ubuhaditsi. Igitabo “Imizi y’u Rwanda” cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere mu muco, amateka n’Ubuvanganzo, havugwamo ko buri cyorezo cyateraga u Rwanda, habaga hari uburyo bwateguwe bwo kucyohera cyangwa kukirukana bakoreshejwe imwe muri iyo migenzo n’imihango yashyizwe u Rwanda rwahangwaga. Inzira ya Kivu: Ni inzira yabagamo urwunge rw’imihango yakorwaga mu gihe mu gihugu habaga hateye umwuzure ukangiza byinshi mu gihugu. Bakoraga imihango yo kwirunka uwo mwuzure. Inzira ya Muhekenyi: Ni inzira yabagamo urwunge rw’imihango yakorwaga mu gihe habaga hateye ibyonnyi n’indwara z’amatungo, bityo hagakorwa imihango n’imigenzo yo kuyohera. Nyuma y’imihango y’ibwami ijyanye n’ubwiru bwo kohera ibiza n’ibyorezo, hakurikiragaho abahanga gakondo mu kuvura icyateye icyo cyorezo no kucyohera ntikizagaruke. Bamwe muri bo bakoraga iyo mihango, ni aba bakurikira: Abavubyi: Mu Rwanda rwo ha mbere, abavubyi bari bafite umumaro uhanitse mu mibereho myiza y’abaturage cyane cyane mu buhinzi . Umwuga wabo gakondo wari uwo kuvuba imvura ikagwa iyo yabaga yahagamye, no kuyohera ikagenda iyo yabaga yaciye ibintu. Iyo habaga hateye amapfa cyangwa se umwuzure, icyo gihe nibwo abavubyi nk’inzobere mu kumanura imvura bahagurukaga bagakora imihango yo kuyimanura ikagwa, amapfa akagenda. Iyo yabaga yaciye ibintu hakaba umwuzure, nabwo bakoraga imihango yo kuyohera. Abahoryo: Abahoryo nabo ni bamwe mu banyamihango b’ibwami bagiraga uruhare runini ku gukurikirana ibihingwa mu murima no kuvura ibyonnyi by’indwara zabaga zadutse mu myaka. Barahagurukaga bagakora imihango yo kuvuma ibyo byonnyi no kuvuguta imiti yo kubyamurura ku butaka bw’u Rwanda. Abahaditsi: Ni bamwe mu banyamihango b’ibwami bari bagiraga uruhare runini ku gukurikirana indwara z’amatungo zabaga zadutse mu bworozi bw’I Rwanda. Icyo gihe nibwo Abahaditsi barahagurukaga bagakora imihango yo kuvuguta imiti yo kubyamurura mu Rwanda. Abahennyi: Abahennyi nabo bari bamwe mu banyamihango b’ibwami bifashishwaga mu kuvura indwara z’ibyorezo zibasiye abantu no kuvuma ababisha banga u Rwanda. Iyo habaga hateye ibyorezo by’indwara, icya mbere bakoraga ni ukumenya inkomoko yabyo, basanga ari ibirogano bagahenera uwabikoze akaba ikivume, basanga ari icyorezo cy’inzaduka bakagishakira amasubyo yo kucyohera. Nibo batangaga amasubyo yo kuvura amahumane, ibinyoro, ubushita n’izindi. Mu kwamurura no kohera ibyozezo by’indwara z’abantu n’amatungo, Abanyarwanda bifashishaga kandi amazi y’ubuhoro, yeza igihugu agakiza ubwandure akamurura ibiza by’indwara n’umuze byazengereje igihugu. Bigaragaza ko kuva kera Abanyarwanda bari bafite ubuhanga n’ubushobozi bifashishaga mu guhashya umwanzi w’ubuzima bwabo n’ibyabo. Ni abantu bakoresheje ubwenge bw’umwimerere mu kwirwanaho bahagarara ku buzima bwabo ngo butaganzwa n’ibyorezo by’indwara n’ibiza by’amapfa n’imyuzure.

title: Icyo u Rwanda ruzungukira mu bufatanye na PSG n’impamvu rwaguye imbibi zikarenga ubukerarugendo
content: Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere y’imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona y’u Bufaransa, Ligue 1. Ubu bufatanye bwatangajwe nyuma y’umwaka umwe n’igice, RDB itangiye gukorana n’ikipe ya Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza, aho binyuze muri Visit Rwanda, iyi kipe yo mu Mujyi wa Londres yamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Televiziyo Rwanda, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yavuze ko impamvu u Rwanda rwahisemo kurenga imbibi z’ubukerarugendo muri ubu bufatanye rwagiranye na Paris Saint-Germain ari ukugira ngo bifashe no kuzamura Abanyarwanda binyuze mu byo bakora, bimenyekane no mu mahanga. Ati "Mu gukomeza guteza imbere ubukungu bw’igihugu cyacu n’ubukungu ndetse n’ubuzima bw’abanyarwanda dukomeza gushaka uburyo twakongera ubushobozi bw’ubukungu bwacu mu gihugu ndetse no hanze y’igihugu.’’ ’’ Twasinyanye nabo kugira ngo tumenyekanishe Visit Rwanda mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo, ariko ntabwo aribyo gusa no mu rwego rwa Visit Rwanda tuzakoresha n’abakurikirana PSG mu Bufaransa n’ahandi hose, bafitanye ubufatanye n’abantu bari mu nzego zitandukanye, yaba abakora imyenda, gukora icyayi n’ikawa […]. Tuzacuruza icyayi cyacu muri Parc des Princes aho PSG ikinira n’ikawa imenyekanishwe mu Bufarana ndetse ducuruze byinshi kurushaho.’’ Akamanzi avuga ko ubu ari uburyo bwiza bwo kumenyekanisha ibikorerwa mu Rwanda n’Ubukerarungendo bwarwo kugira ngo abanyamahanga barusheho kubumenya ariko nabo baze bagure ibintu byo mu Rwanda. Ati’’ Mu kugura ibyo bintu, bizatanga akazi ku Banyarwanda bakora ibi bintu, bakomeze kubikora kandi babikore ku bwinshi, babone amafaranga bitume n‘igihugu cyacu gikomeza gutera imbere.’’ Agaruka ku mpamvu ubufatanye na Paris Saint Germain butarebye gusa ku bukerarugendo, Akamanzi yavuze ko byatewe n’uburyo iyi kipe yo mu Bufaransa imeze ku buryo babona nayo ikoresha umupira w’amaguru mu kumenyekanisha bindi bikorwa bitandukanye abantu bakunda. Ati’’ Impamvu twagiye mu bukerarugendo n’ibindi ni uko twabonye umufatanyabikorwa tugiye gusinyana na we [PSG] adakina umupira gusa, bakoresha umupira kugira ngo abantu bagaragaze ibintu bakunda, haba mu myidagaduro, umuco, byose barabishyigikira, bakagaragaza ko ushobora gukoresha umupira kugira ngo uteze imbere ibindi bintu bituma ubaho neza.’’ " Ni ukureba uburyo twakoresha izina bafite kugira ngo dukore ibindi bashyigikira mu buzima no mu bukungu. Niyo mpamvu twahisemo kugira ngo turenge ubukerarugendo, dushake uko twakorana duteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda.’’ Muri ubu bufatanye bw’u Rwanda na Paris Saint Germain, hazabaho kandi icyumweru cy’imishinga y’abanyempano b’abanyarwanda n’Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe “Semaine du Rwanda à Paris” kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda. Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB avuga ko muri iki cyumweru Abanyarwanda bakora ibintu bitandukanye bazajya bahabwa umwanya wo kujya kubyerekana mu Mujyi wa Paris. Ati"Tuzacuruza ikawa n’icyayi cy’u Rwanda muri Stade. Nta kindi gihugu kizabikora, nitwe gusa. Bivuze ko bazatumenya cyane kurusha uko batuzi ubu.’’ "Ntabwo ari ibyo gusa, tuzakomeza tumenyekanishe u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, buri mwaka tuzagira ikintu cyitwa ‘’Icyumweru muri Paris’’, aho tuzana abantu batandukanye bakora imyenda, bakora ubukorikori, bakora ibintu bitandukanye bashobora gucuruza hanze, tubahe umwanya wo kwerekana ibyo bintu no kwerekana Umuco wacu ku buryo bizatuma abantu baza mu Rwanda bakagura n’ibintu byaho.’’ Akamanzi yashimangiye ko ubufatanye u Rwanda ruri kugirana n’amakipe akomeye i Burayi bugamije gutekereza kure kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzabe igihugu gikize mu myaka iri imbere ndetse n’Abanyarwanda bagire ubushobozi buhagije bwo gukora ibyishimirwa n’abanyamahanga. Ati "Turashaka gucuruza ibintu byinshi kurushaho hanze y’igihugu. Turashaka ko byakwiyongera mu bwinshi ndetse no mu bwiza bwabyo. Icyo tumaze kubona nk’igihugu ni uko tugomba kugira icyerekezo cy’igihe kirekire cyane. Dutekereze ngo mu myaka 10, 20 cyangwa 50 tuzaba turi hehe? Turifuza kuba igihugu gikize, Abanyarwanda bize kandi bafite ubushobozi, bashobora gukora ibintu bifite agaciro kari hejuru.’’ Umuyobozi wa RDB avuga ko kuri ubu umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa ari mwiza ndetse bahisemo gukorana na Paris Saint Germain nk’ikipe ishaka kuzamura abato n’urubyiruko no gushyikira gukora ibintu binoze nk’uko bimeze no k’u Rwanda. Yakomeje avuga ko kuba u Rwanda ruri gushora cyane mu mikino ari uko rwabonye ko bitanga icyerekezo cyiza cy’igihugu ndetse bizafasha n’Abanyarwanda gutera imbere. Ati’’ Nk’igihugu turimo gushora mu mikino. Twubatse Kigali Arena kugira ngo Basketball ikinwe, hari ikibuga cya Cricket, hari amagare ndetse Abanyarwanda bitwara neza, hari Golf Club turi kubaka kugira ngo igere ku rwego mpuzamahanga, bigaragaza ko Leta iri gushora cyane mu mikino kugira ngo izamuke kandi nayo bizatuma itanga umusaruro mu bukungu bwacu.’’ PSG izagira uruhare mu kuzamura abakiri bato binyuze mu gushinga ishuri ry’umupira w’amaguru i Kigali, aho iyi kipe izajya itegura imyitozo y’abatoza n’abakiri bato mu kubafasha kugira ubunararibonye bw’iyi kipe ikomeye ku mugabane w’u Burayi, by’umwihariko yanditse amateka mu Bufaransa. RDB ivuga kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal binyuze muri Visit Rwanda mu mwaka ushize, kuri ubu ba mukerarungo baza mu Rwanda bamaze kugera kuri miliyoni imwe na 700 ndetse yizeye ko bazakomeza kwiyongera mu myaka iri imbere.

title: Banga gushyira amavuta muri RAV 4 ihengamye ngo baze kundeba ariko undi akayashyira mu ndege aje kundeba:Rugagi
content:
Bihop Rugagi Innocent uyobora Redeemed Gospel Church avuga ko hari abantu banga kumusura bagenda muri RAV4 zihengamye ahubwo akarenga agasurwa n’abaje mu ndenge.Bityo ngo kugeza ubu yamaze kubona ko isi yose imwemera ndetse ahamya ko atazapfa atabonye bamwe mu bakirisito be batunze indege zabo bwite. Ibi Bishop Rugagi yabitangaje mu materaniro yo kuri iki cyumweru tariki 11 Ugushyingo 2018,aho yabihereye ku kuba mu cyumweru gishize yaragiranye ibiganiro n’umuherwe w’umupasiteri witwa Dr.Shepherd Huxley Bushiri uzwi nka Major 1 cyangwa se Prophet Bushiri wari uri mu Rwanda. Rugagi yavuze ko Bushiri yari yaje mu Rwanda kuharuhukira ariko yahagera akamwandikira ngo aze baganire, ibi byatunguye Rugagi ndetse ngo yabanje no gushidikanya ko ari abatekamutwe bamwoherereje ubwo butumwa. Rugagi yavuze ko mu minsi yashize yari yaragerageje guhura na Prophet Bushiri ariko agasanga amafaranga byamutwara atarayatunga kuva Imana yamurema. Gusa ngo icyifuzo cye Imana yakibonye iri mu ijuru maze imukorera igitangaza irabahuza. Bushiri ngo yabwiye Rugagi ko mbere yo kuza mu Rwanda Imana yamubwiye byinshi ku we. Rugagi yavuze ko Prophet Bushiri ari igikomerezwa ku buryo adashobora gusura itorero riciriritse. Ngo ni yo mpamvu atasuye itorero rya Rugagi ku Cyumweru. Ati “Igishobora gutuma adateranira hano nuko amavuta ye atari ayo mu itorero nk’iri.Ni yo mpamvu tutashobora kugirango tumwakire ahangaha”. Rugagi yagaragaje agaciro yahawe na Prophet Bushiri agira ati “Abantu bajya banga gushyira amavuta muri RAV 4 ihengamye ngo baze kundeba ariko undi agashyira amavuta mu ndege aje kundeba! ….akishyura amafaraga ataba rika kubera umuntu umwe!” “Isi yose yaranyemeye” 
Rugagi yemeza ko niyo yakwicara mu masangano y’umuhanda yahamiriza Imana ko isi yose yamumene kandi nta wabihakana Rugagi yavuze ko kuba umushumba w’itorero rikomeye ku isi akaba n’umuherwe uzwi ku isi yarageze mu Rwanda akamutumira ngo baganire, ngo byonyine bihagije kugirango byerekane ko isi yose yemeye Rugagi. Ati “Ubu njyewe noneho nubwo nakwicara mu masangano y’imihanda, ni ukubwira Imana gusa nti ‘Isi yose yaranyemeye’, narabirangije, nubwo nonaha nagenda nkicara mu masangano y’umuhanda gusa nkamanika amaguru, ubu isi yaranyemeye! byararangiye! Ubyange cyangwa ubyemere ibyo birahagije". Rugagi yavuze ko Prophet Bushiri amaze guhura n’abaperezida barenga 47 kubera uburyo ari umuntu ukomeye. Kubw’ibyo Bishop Rugagi arahamya ko kuba yahuye na we Imana yamuzamuye mu yindi ntera. 
Kuri we ngo ubuhanuzi bwarasohoye ntazapfa atabonye bamwe mu bakirisito be batunze indege zabo bwite Ati "Imana yarankomeje, ubuhanuzi bwarasohoye…uyu munsi mfite amavuta yuzuye, …ndimo ndumva uburemere budasanzwe…ibyari inzozi ntibikiri inzozi bimaze kuba ibintu bifatika”. ‘Sinzapfa ntarabona abakirisito batunze indege zabo’ Nyuma yo kugaragaza uburyo Imana yamuhuje n’umuntu ukomeye, Bishop Rugagi yahamirije abakirisito ati “Ntabwo nzapfa ntarabona abakirisito batunze indege zabo!” Bishop Rugagi yavuze ko guhura na Prophet Bushiri byasohoje ibyo Imana yamubwiriye mu masengesho yasengeye mu mazi no ku misozi ya Kanyarira na Kinyamakara. Ese uyu Prophet Bushiri Rugagi yirahira ni muntu ki? 
Prophet Bushiri Ngo yatangiye ubucuruzi akiri muto ahawe inguzanyo na se umubyara Dr.Shepherd Huxley Bushiri uzwi nka Prophet Bushiri cyangwa Major one yavutse mu 1983. Ayobora itorero ryitwa Enlightened Christian Gathering rifite icyicaro i Pretoria muri Afrika y’Epfo rikagira n’amashami hirya no hino ku isi. Ni umushoramari ukomoka muri Malawi, afite ikigo cy’ishoramari gikomeye cyitwa Shepherd Bushiri Investments (Pty) Ltd. Akora iby’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, ibijyanye n’ubwubatsi, serivisi z’amahoteri n’ingendo z’indege n’ibindi. Prophet Bushiri Ngo yatangiye ubucuruzi akiri muto ahawe inguzanyo na se.Prophet Bushiri ni umuvugabutumwa ukomeye akaba anafite ifaranga ritubutse Itorero rye ngo rifite amashami arenga 1700. Ajya akoresha ibiterane bikitabirwa n’abasaga ibihumbi 95. Ni umwe mu bapasiteri b’abaherwe muri Afrika no ku isi dore ko afite indege ze bwite eshatu, televiziyo, kaminuza, ishuri ry’imikino (sports academy), n’ibigo by’ubucuruzi bikomeye. Bivugwa ko afite umutungo urenga miliyoni 150 z’amadorali y’Amerika. Aba mu nzu ya miliyoni hafi ebyiri z’amadorali y’Amerika. Akunze kugira uruhare mu bikorwa byo kubakira abatishoboye, kubarihira amashuri, no gutanga ibiryo kubahuye n’inzara. Umufasha we yitwa Mary Bushiri, bakaba bafitanye abana babiri gusa. Bushiri avuga ko yagiye mu ishoramari kugira ngo abone ibitunga umuryango we nyuma yo gusobanukirwa ko itorero ridashinzwe gutunga umuryango we. Uyu ni we waganiriye na Rugagi ndetse ngo yamuhuje n’abandi bashumba b’amatorero b’abaherwe barimo umumiliyoneli witwa Prophet Uebert Angel uyobora itorero ryitwa Good News Church rikorera mu Bwongereza. Uyu Prophet Uebert ni na we Bushiri afata nk’ikitegererezo cyangwa umubyeyi we wo mu buryo bw’umwuka. Rugagi na we amaze kwamamara mu Rwanda kubera ibintu akora n’ibyo avuga bigateza ururondogoro. Yamamaye cyane ubwo yizezaga abakristo be gutunga Range Rover mu mezi atatu gusa, icyakora ukabanza gutanga ituro ry’ibihumbi bitanu (5,000Frw), no kwizera ko bizasohora. Yigeze no gutangaza ko agiye kujya azura abapfuye. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Gahunda y’myigaragambyo irakomeje ku bafana ba Aresenal
content:
Igihe kibaye kinini abakunzi b’ikipe ya Arsenal bitotombera umutoza wabo Arsene Charles Wenger ariko bikaba iby’ubusa. Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ubwo  baraza kubabakna na Norwich City bafite gahunda yo kuza kuzamura ibitambaro byanditseho ngo ‘Time For Change’. Bivuga “igihe cy’impinduka” ibi ngo birakorwa ku munota wa 12 bibutsa ko hashize imyaka 12 nta gikombe gikomeye batwara. 
Barabyongera no kuwa 77 ni uuvuga n’ubundi hasigaye minota 12 ngo umukino urangire. Hari kandi ndi ngo ibintu 10 bifuza ko bihinduka.


Abafana bavugako barambiwe ibyo kuza muri Big 4 (amakipe ane yambere muri shampiyona), ngo n’ubwo bituma bitabira UEFA Champion League ntacyo bimaze kuko n’ubundi ntaho bagera-ntibarayitwara na rimwe. Ibi kandi bizabinajhurirana n’ikibazo kimaze iminsi mu makipe menshi yo mu bwongereza cy’imizamukire y’ibiciro by’amatike yo kwinjira ku bibuga. Mu bintu abafana batishimira, bashaka ko bihindukaharimo ibijyanye n’igura n’igurisha ry’abakinnyi. Ibyo kubakira kuri gahunda yo kuzamura abana ngo igihe cyabyo cyararangiye, icyivuzo ni ukugura abakinnyi bo ku rwego rwo hejuru ntakindi kintu kigendeweho. Ikindi ngo ni gahunda ifatikamuri UEFA Champions League. Ibyo guhora bitabira barabihaze. Baranifuza impinduka mu buyobozi cyane cyane  Stan Kroenke utita ku bibera mu kibuga akareba ibyo mu biro gusa. Undi bari kwikoma ni CEO Ivan Gazidis, arazira gushyigikiraWenger na Kroenker.  Ikiruta byose ni uko bakeneye undi mutoza. Bisa nk’ibyamaze kuba akavuyo cyane. Abenshi bati nagende, abandi ngo nahagume ahubwo ahindure imikorere. Ngo wenger ni umubeshyi icye ni ugusezeranya abafana ibintu yarangiza ntabibakorere kandi bishoboka. K’ubu ntibumva ukuntu avugango ntiyagura umwataka kuko ngo uwo yifuza ntawe yabona, ngo abandi babakura he? Ngo ikindi ni uburyo abakinnyi basigaye bakina ubona ntacyo barwanira.


Abakurikirana ibya Wenger na Arsenal hafi, bavuga ko bigoye ko uyu musaza azava muri iyi kipe amasezerano ye atarangiye. Ubwe aherutse kuvuga ati “ndi umuntu w’umugabo. Nubaba akazi kange ndetse n’amasezerano mba nagiranye n’abantu.” Ibi rero bikaba bishaka kuvugako nta gahunda yo kugenda amasezerano atarangiye. Ibi binashimangirwa nuko yavuze ko ntayindi kipe azajyamo igihe azaba avuye muri Arsenal
Yanditswe na Rukundo/MUHABURA.RW  .

title: 2020, ihurizo ku ireme rya demokarasi ya Afurika y’Iburasizuba kubera amatora ateganyijwe
content: Tanzania Ni igihugu cyakunze kurangwa no guhererekanya ubutegetsi mu mahoro guhera igihe cyaboneye ubwigenge. Ishyaka riri ku butegetsi Chama Cha Mapinduzi riracyahabwa amahirwe yo kugumana ubutegetsi. Mu gihe hitegurwa amatora rusange azaba mu Ukwakira 2020, abatavuga rumwe na Leta n’imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta bafite impungenge ko Guverinoma ya Perezida John Pombe Magufuli ishobora kubangamira ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo. The East African yatangaje ko kuri ubu Guverinoma yakuyeho ibikorwa by’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, bivuze ko nta bikorwa byo gukoresha inama bishoboka mu mashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta. Hari abantu bafunzwe, abanyamakuru bamwe baburirwa irengero abandi barafungwa nk’urugero rw’umunyamakuru Eric Kabendera cyangwa Paul Magotti wari impirimbanyi y’uburenganzira bwa muntu. Uko kubangamira abatavuga rumwe na Leta kwatumye amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta yanga kwitabira amatora y’inzego z’ibanze yabaye mu Ugushyingo umwaka ushize, bituma ishyaka CCM riyatsinda ku kigero cya 99%. Umunyapolitiki utavuga rumwe na Leta, Tundu Lissu aherutse kuvuga ko guhagarika ibikorwa y’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, ari ikimenyetso ko amatora ya 2020 atazaba mu mucyo. Perezida Magufuli yatowe mu 2015 afite intego yo kurwanya ruswa. Nubwo yatangije intambara ku baryi ba ruswa, ashinjwa kubangamira demokarasi mu gihugu, gupfukirana amajwi y’abamunenga no kubibasira. U Burundi Amatora atenganyijwe muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, mu gihe hakiri urujijo niba Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza azongera kwiyamamaza nyuma ya manda ya gatatu yafashe mu 2015 igateza imvururu. Ikindi gihangayikishije ni ukumenya niba Guverinoma ye ifite ubushobozi bwo gutegura amatora anyuze mu mucyo, kuko imiryango n’ibihugu byinshi byateraga inkunga icyo gihugu, byarayihagaritse bishinja Nkurunziza guteza akaduruvayo mu gihugu. Nubwo Nkurunziza yatangaje ko atazongera kwiyamamaza, ababirebera hafi bavuga ko ashobora kwisubiraho cyangwa agashyiraho umuntu azajya atagekeramo. Nta kimenyetso cyerekana ko Nkurunziza agiye kuva muri politiki y’u Burundi mu gihe muri Gashyantare umwaka ushize, yimuye ibiro bya Perezida akabijyana mu Mujyi wa Gitega ari naho avuka. Raporo y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yo muri Nzeri 2019, igaragaza ko nta cyizere cy’imigendekere myiza y’amatora mu Burundi mu 2020, mu gihe hakiri Perezida wigaragaza nk’igitangaza’. Loni ivuga ko ari Perezida wigwijeho ububasha bwose we n’ishyaka rye CNDD FDD, n’ibyaha bishinjwa urubyiruko rw’ishyaka rye ruzwi nk’Imbonerakure rushinjwa guhutaza uburenganzira bw’abaturage n’abatavuga rumwe na Leta. Icyakora Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Burundi, Ezechiel Nibigira, aherutse kubwira Inteko rusange ya Loni, ko mu gihugu hari umwuka mwiza uzatuma amatora agenda neza. Somalia Amatora yo muri Somalia ni ingenzi cyane ku mutekano w’akarere. Iki ni igihugu kimaze igihe mu mvururu. Hashize imyaka 50 Perezida atorwa n’itsinda ry’abantu bake baba batoranyijwe, kubera ubwoba bw’uko hateguwe amatora rusange abaturage bakitabira, bishobora guteza imvururu n’umutekano muke. Mu matora ya 2009, aya 2012 na 2017 hose abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko na Perezida bagiye batorwa n’abantu 14 000 babaga batoranyijwe ngo bahagararire ubwoko buba muri icyo gihugu. N’uyu munsi haracyari impungenge niba amatora yo muri Somalia koko azaba dore ko aya Perezida aherutse yabereye muri parikingi y’ikibuga cy’indege. Ikibazo cy’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa al Shabaab ndetse no kuba abatavuga rumwe na Leta baherutse gushinja Perezida Mohamed Abdullahi Farmaajo gushaka kuguma ku butegetsi biteye impungenge ku mutekano w’amatora ateganyijwe. Guverinoma yatangaje ko yiteguye gukoresha amatora agaca mu mucyo kandi buri muturage wemerewe gutora agatora. Guverinoma yanavuze ko vuba aha izageza ku Nteko Ishinga Amatora umushinga w’amatora kugira ngo wemezwe. Icyakora, iki gihugu cyiracyafite ikibazo cyo kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga. Nubwo itsinda ryahawe kurivugurura ryagejeje ku Nteko umushinga w’itegeko, haracyari imbogamizi. Iya mbere ni uko nta matora ya kamarampaka ashobora kuba hatarakemuka ikibazo cy’agace ka Somaliland kifata nk’igihugu ukwacyo mu gihe Somalia igafata nk’agace kayo. Mu bindi kandi ivugurura ry’itegeko Nshinga rigomba kureba harimo aho umurwa mukuru ukwiriye kuba, uburyo ubuyobozi bwa za Leta zigize icyo gihugu bukorana na Leta nkuru n’ibindi. Mu gihe ivugurura ry’itegeko Nshinga ritaraba, n’tegeko rigenga amatora ntirizashoboka kuko abantu ntibashobora gutangira kwiyandikisha hataraboneka itegeko rigenga amatora kandi naryo rigomba kugenwa n’Itegeko Nshinga. Indi mbogamizi ni umutekano muke. Igice kinini cy’igihugu kiracyari mu maboko y’umutwe wa al Shabaab, bivuze ko aho hantu al shabaab ifite amatora atazashoboka. No mu murwa mukuru Mogadishu naho umutekano waho ntiwizewe. Ibyo bigaragazwa n’uko tariki 28 Ukuboza 2019, imodoka itezemo igisasu yaturikiye aho abantu basakirwa mu murwa mukuru kigahitana abantu 78. Perezida Farmaajo yavuze ko icyo gitero ari icy’iterabwoba kandi kitazihanganirwa, icyakora abatavuga rumwe na we bamushinja kubembekereza al shabaab kuko uduce Leta yigaruriye guhera mu 2017 ubwo Farmaajo yajyaga ku butegetsi ari duke. Ethiopia Amatora ateganyijwe muri Gicurasi 2020, ni aya mbere azaba abaye guhera Minisitiri w’Intebe wahawe n’igihembo cyitiriwe Nobel, Dr Abiy Ahmed agiye ku butegetsi. Umwanzuro aherutse gufata wo gusesa amashyaka yose yari agize Ihuriro EPRDF (Ethiopian People’s Revolutionary Democratic Front), agashinga ishyaka rya PP watumye havuka impungenge n’umwuka mubi mu gihugu. Hari abadashyigikiye iryo shyaka PP kuko risa nk’irije guhanagura umuco n’umuhate bashyizeho bubaka amashyaka yabo mu myaka 30 ishize. Abatabyumva cyane ni abo mu mashyaka nka Tigray Peoples Liberation Front (TPLF), n’igice cy’ishyaka Oromo Peoples Democratic Organisation (OPDO) ari naryo Abiy aturukamo, rishobora no kumurwanya agatsindwa. Amavugurura yakozwe na Dr Abiy yazanye umucyo muri Ethiopia yahoze ifatwa nk’igihugu kibangamira uburenganzira bwa muntu ariko byanateje imvururu zishingiye ku turere zitewe n’abandi bantu bakomeye bafite inyota y’ubutegetsi. Guhera mu 1995, Ethiopia yagiye ikora amatora mu gihe cyagenwe. Icyakora, uretse mu 2005, nta na rimwe higeze habaho amatora arimo guhangana kugaragara nkuko The East African yabitangaje.

title: Imyiteguro ya Shampiyona irarimbanyije muri Espoir FC, kugeza ubu byifashe bite?
content:
Ikipe ya Espoir FC ibarizwa mu karere ka Rusizi, irimbanyije imyiteguro ya shampiyna y’u Rwanda iteganyijwe gutangira kuwa 14 Ukwakira, intego ni ukurangiza muri enye za mbere. Ni ikipe itaritwaye neza muri shampiyona ishize kuko yarangije ku mwanya wa 11, imyanya itatu gusa imbera ya Rwamagana na Muhanga zasubiye mu cyiciro cya kabiri. Ibi ariko si ko byagenze mu gikombe cy’amahoro dore ko yageze muri kimwe cya kabiri ikaza gusezererwa na APR FC, yaje gufata umwanya wa kane nyuma yo gutsindwa na AS Kigali. Kuri ubu imyiteguro irakomeje bakina imikino ya gicuti, muri weekend ishize hari hatahiwe gusura ikipe nshya yo mu karere ka Nyamasheka yitwa Nyamasheke Sport Club. Umukino warangiye Espoir itsinze ibitego 3-0. Umukino wabereye Ku kibuga cya Kirambo Ndayizeye Jimmy, Umurundi wigeze no kuba umutoza wungirije w’ikipe y’igihugu “Intambamurugamba” niwe uri gutoza iyi kipe. Ayifitemo amasezeramo y’umwaka umwe akaba yarasabwe n’ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe kuzayigeza mu makipe ane ya mbere muri shampiyona ya 2016/17.

Ndayizeye Jimmy umutoza wa Espoir FC Yatubwiye ko ikipe ye iri gutera indi ntambwe. aganira na Muhabura.rw, yagize ati: “Icya mbere ni uko ikibuga cyatugoye cyane n’ubwo twabonye insinzi. Urebye imikino tumaza gukina, hari byinshi bimaze guhinduka. Mu byumweru bibiri bisigaye ngo shampiyona itangire, hari amakosa menshi tugiye gukosora. Dusigaje umukino umwe wa gicuti n’ikipe itiramenyekana. Twazanye abakinnyi bashya nka batanu, nta wundi tuzagura, keretse mu mikino yo kwishyura,”

Nta bandi bakinnyi bifuza, kerete nibura imikino ibanza nirangira Abakinnyi bashya baje muri iyi kipe ni:
Ndikumana Bodo (Entencelle)
Renzaho Hussein (Musanze)
Hatungimana Basil (Musanze)
Hakizimfura Adolf (Amagaju)
Boa Balora (Kiyovu, ukomoka muri Cameroon)
Sozera Ancelmet (AS Kigali ukomoka i Burundi)
Gatoto Serge 
Nyamasheke Sport Club ni ikipe nshya, yatsinzwe na Espoir 3-0 Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw
