Ati “Mu bihe bidasanzwe, haba hakenewe ingamba zidasanzwe, niyo mpamvu mbashishikariza kongera ingamba mu kwita ku bavandimwe barokotse Jenoside kuko gutekana kwabo mu mutwe, ni umutungo dukwiriye kurinda no kubungabunga.” Mu guha icyubahiro abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Ubuyobozi bwa Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Bubiligi, ubwa Ibuka-Belgique n’ubw’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba mu Bubiligi bashyize indabo ku nkingi ihagarariye imva y’abazize Jenoside.

title: Urugendo rwa Ashish Thakkar winjiye mu bucuruzi ku myaka 15, ubu ageze ku ruganda rwa Mara Phones
content: Idi Amin yabyutse atanga iminsi 90 bose bakaba bamuviriye mu gihugu. Hafi ibihumbi 50 by’abaturage bafite inkomoko muri Aziya barirukanwe. Abenshi bafashe inzira igana mu Bwongereza. Mu bahungiyeyo icyo gihe harimo Jagdish na Sarla ababyeyi b’umunyemari Ashish Thakkar washinze Mara Phones, uruganda rwa mbere rukora telefone muri Afurika, arushinga mu Rwanda. Igisekuru cya Thakkar cyavuye mu Burengerazuba bw’u Buhinde muri Leta ya Gujarat mu myaka ya 1890, kiza gutura muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. Nyuma yo kwirukanwa muri Uganda, ababyeyi ba Thakkar bagiye mu Bwongereza ari naho uwo munyemari yavukiye  mu mujyi wa Leicester mu 1981. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru Le Point cyo mu Bufaransa, Ashish Thakkar yagize ati “Ndi igisekuru cya kane mu muryango wanjye guhera ugeze muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. Twubatse sosiyete ya Mara Group duhereye ku busa none ubu ni sosiyete y’icyitegererezo muri Afurika.” Umuryango wa Thakkar waje kuva  mu Bwongereza ugaruka muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, kuri iyi nshuro baza mu Rwanda. Muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, byinshi mu byo uwo muryango wari umaze kugeraho byarasenywe basubira hasi cyane. Yavuye mu ishuri atangira ubushabitsi Ku myaka 15, nibwo Thakkar yatangiye ubucuruzi nyuma yo kugira amahirwe akabona inguzanyo y’amadolari 5000. Yagize ati “Ubwo ababyeyi banjye banyuraga mu byabaye muri Uganda, nari ntaravuka. Icyakora nyuma y’ibyo babayemo mu Rwanda nkumva n’ibyo babayemo mbere, byampaye imbaraga zo kugira icyo nkora.” Yahise ahagarika ishuri, atangira ubucuruzi hagati ya Dubai na Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. Ubucuruzi bwe nta bundi, kwari ukuzana ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga byakoreshejwe akabicuruza mu mujyi wa Kampala muri Uganda mu iduka rito ababyeyi be bari barashinze, dore ko baje gusubira muri Uganda bakahaba nk’impunzi. Mu byo yacuruzaga habaga harimo mudasobwa n’ibikoresho byose bijyana nazo, telefone n’ibindi. Ni ubucuruzi bwamuhiriye dore ko icyo gihe benshi batari bakamenye neza iby’ubucuruzi bw’ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga. Mu mwaka wa 2013, Thakkar yahuye n’umuherwe w’umunyamerika ufite inkomoko mu Bwongereza, Bob Diamond, akaba yarahoze ari mukuru wa banki ya Barclays. Bamaze kuganira bafatanyije gushinga Atlas Mara, sosiyete y’ishoramari mu mabanki ku mugabane wa Afurika. Mu gihe gito, abo banyemari babashije kubona miliyoni 325 z’amadolari, bahita bandikisha sosiyete yabo ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane ry’i Londres. Ibintu byaje kugenda nabi, basanga ubyuryo binjiye mu kibuga cyo muri Afurika butaratekerejweho neza, maze batangira guhomba. Thakkar avuga ko kubera gufungura amashami mu bihugu badasobanukiwe neza imikorere, byabahombeje cyane kugeza ubwo ibikorwa bya sosiyete Atlas Mara biguye ku kigero cya 84 %. Ubu Atlas Mara iri mu biganiro byo kuguranisha imigabane yayo muri Equity Group yo muri Kenya. Icyo gihombo cyagarutsweho mu gitabo cya Ashish Thakkar yise ‘The Lion Awakes : Adventures in Africa’s Economic Miracle’. Muri icyo gitabo agira ati “Uko twafataga Afurika turi hanze yayo bitandukanye n’ibihabera. Kuhakorera ubucuruzi ni ibintu bigoye rwose.” Yakomeje agira ati “Sosiyete zo hanze y’umugabane zakomeje guhabwa ikaze muri Afurika, twe nka sosiyete nyafurika bikaturakaza. Ntabwo twitaga ku kuba tugiye gushinga ubucuruzi busa nk’ubw’uwo uvuye hanze y’umugabane nyamara ari we ufite amahirwe menshi.” “Nk’umugabane, ibikorwa byacu n’ubwinshi bihagaze neza. Dufite miliyari y’abaturage ariko turacyagabanyijemo ibihugu 54. Ni abantu mugomba gukorana ariko b’imico n’imyumvire bitandukanye.” Uyu mugabo avuga ko ibintu byarushijeho kuba bibi mu 2013 ubwo yatandukanaga n’uwahoze ari umugore we Meera Manek bikagera mu rukiko baburana imitungo. Uko yatangije uruganda rwa telefone zigezweho mu Rwanda Mu myaka mike, Ashish Thakkar yafashe umwanzuro wo gutangiza uruganda rwa mbere rukora telefone zigezweho ku mugabane wa Afurika. Abajijwe uko byaje, yagize ati “Icya mbere ni ukureba uko guhererekanya amafaranga binyuze kuri telefone bihagaze muri Afurika , no gutekereza amahirwe ari kuri uwo mugabane kubera ikoreshwa ry’ikoranabuhanga. Kuri ubu abanyafurika bagomba guhitamo hagati ya telefone ihendutse cyangwa telefone yujuje ubuziranenge. Hashingiwe ku kuboneka kwa internet ya telefone na porogaramu z’ingirakamaro, telefone igezweho ishobora gufasha mu guhanga imirimo kandi igateza imbere guhanga udushya.” Yongeyeho ati “Muri iryo hanga ry’umurimo no gukoresha ibyahanzwe, niko umugabane wa Afurika uba uri gutera imbere.” Uruganda rwa Mara Phones ruherereye mu cyanya cyahariwe inganda i Masoro mu karere ka Gasabo. Byafashe imyaka itanu kugira ngo Ashish Thakkar we na Bob Diamond babashe gutangiza imirimo yo kubaka urwo ruganda mu Rwanda, bafashijwe na Leta y’u Rwanda. Ni umushinga wa miliyoni 22 z’amayero. Urwo ruganda rufite ubushobozi bwo gukora telefone igihumbi buri munsi, nkuko byatangajwe na Eddy Sebera umuyobozi Mukuru w’urwo ruganda. Kugeza ubu urwo ruganda rusohora ubwoko bubiri bwa telefone, aribwo Mara X na Mara Z, bukoresha Android. Ni telefone zifite batiri zirambana umuriro n’ububiko bunini. Buri telefone iba ikozwe n’udukoresho tw’ikoranabuhanga dusaga igihumbi twose dukorerwa muri urwo ruganda. Ashish Thakkar avuga ko Mara Phones ari rwo ruganda rwa mbere muri Afurika rukora telefone ibiyigize byose byakorewe kuri uwo mugabane, mu gihe izindi nganda zisanzwe zo ziteranya ibyakorewe ahandi. Thakkar ati “U Burayi ntibukora telefone zigezweho, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ntizikora telefone ndetse no mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati ntazo bakora. Dufate nka Apple ikorerwa mu Bushinwa, Samsung ni iyo muri Korea, Huawei ni iyo mu Bushinwa.” Yongeyeho ati “Mara Phones ni inyafurika , ibyo bigaha amahirwe menshi abanyaburayi cyangwa abanyamerika bagira impungenge ku bijyanye n’ubutasi n’umutekano wabo. Nibura telefone zacu zifite uwo mwihariko.” Thakkar avuga ko bishimishije uburyo Guverinoma zo muri Afurika zagiye zihindura imyumvire muri iyi myaka ishize, zigaha rugari ivuka ry’ishoramari by’umwihariko muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara, aho Banki y’Isi igaragaza ko buri mwaka havuga sosiyete ziciriritse ibihumbi 500. Kugeza ubu muri Afurika hari izindi sosiyete ziteranya telefone zigezweho nka Elikia muri Congo, Kunfabo ya Fadima Diawara muri Guinée na Nile X zikorwa na sosiyete yo mu Misiri ya Sico. Icyakora ibigize izo telefone zose bikorerwa mu Bushinwa ku nkunga y’icyo gihugu. Abajijwe uko bazahangana n’izo telefone nshya zihendutse muri Afurika, Thakkar yagize ati “Biroroshye kubizana muri Afurika ariko dutekereje gutyo nta na kimwe twazikorera ubwacu. Afurika igomba gutekereza guhanga ibyayo kuko mu gihe uri kwigana iby’abandi, muba mukiri inyuma cyane.” Kuba barahisemo u Rwanda, Ashish Thakkar yavuze ko ari igihugu gikataje mu guteza imbere ibyakorewe muri Afurika kandi gifite amarembo akinguye ku  bashoramari. Ati “U Rwanda ubu rurajwe ishinga no guteza imbere ibyakorewe mu Rwanda. Ni igihugu giha ikaze ubucuruzi, gifunguriye amarembo umugabane wose hamwe na Guverinoma isobanukiwe ibiba hirya no hino ku isi n’ubuyobozi bwiza. Ni igihugu gishaka kuba igicumbi cy’ikoranabuhanga, birigaragaza hose.” Uyu munyemari yagaragaje ko telefone za Mara Phones zoherezwa mu bihugu 53. Muri byo, inyinshi zigurishwa mu Budage, u Butaliyani, muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika no mu Bufaransa. Thakkar avuga ko bashaka  ko telefone za Mara Phones zigaragara mu maduka menshi acuruza telefone. Mara Group yafunguye urundi ruganda rumeze nk’urw’i Kigali i Durban muri Afurika y’Epfo. Inzozi za Ashish Thakkar ni ugukomeza guteza imbere ibijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga, akagira uruhare muri Afurika n’isi muri rusange.

title: Uruganda rwa Kinazi rwasabye abantu kwita ku buziranenge igihe bagiye kugura ifu y’ubugari
content: Tariki 7 Kamena buri mwaka, Isi yizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe ubuziranenge bw’ibiribwa, buri wese asabwa kugira uruhare mu guharanira ubwo buziranenge. Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima ku Isi, OMS, ritangaza ko ibiribwa bitujuje ubuziranenge bihitana abantu bagera ku bihumbi 420 buri mwaka. OMS igaragaza ko abana bari munsi y’imyaka itanu aribo bibasirwa cyane n’ibi biribwa, kuko abapfa bagera ku bihumbi 125 buri mwaka. Kugeza ubu imyaka umunani irashize uruganda rwa Kinazi rufite icyicaro mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo mu Karere ka Ruhango rugeza ifu ku banyarwanda n’abanyamahanga. Uru ruganda rusaba abantu gukomeza gukoresha ifu yarwo ariko banirinda izindi fu bashobora kugura kandi zitujuje ubuziranenge ku buryo byanabaviramo gupfa. Umuyobozi w’Uruganda, Mbabazi Christian, mu kiganiro yahaye IGIHE, yavuze ko kugeza ubu uru ruganda ruhagaze neza kuko rwakira umusaruro w’abaturage kuva mu bice bitandukanye by’Amajyepfo mu Turere dutanu, ariko ubu bageze no mu Burasirazuba mu Karere ka Bugesera, aho batangiye gukorana n’abaturage baho bakabagezaho umusaruro. Ati “Uruganda rufite ubushobozi bwo kwakira toni 120 z’umusaruro w’abaturage ku munsi murumva ko ari mwinshi, ibi byanatumye tuva mu Majyepfo tujya no mu Burasirazuba ariko dukomeje gukangurira n’ibindi bice by’igihugu guhinga imyumbati bakagemurira uruganda, kuko usanga uruganda rugikora ku kigero cya 35% gusa.” Ubuziranenge buhagaze gute? Mbabazi yavuze ko ku bijyanye n’ubuziranenge hari byinshi leta yakoze harimo gushyiraho ibigo bishinzwe ubwo buziranenge ku rwego rw’igihugu, ibi bikaba aribyo bigenzura ibyo bakora, bikaba ari nabyo bibaha ibyangombwa. Ati “Ibyo bigo byose bikorana na Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda ku buryo bashobora no kuba baguhana mu gihe basanze ukora ibitujuje ubuziranenge cyangwa bakaba banagufungira.” “Nk’ubu mu gice cyacu cy’abakora ifu hari abandi usanga nabo bakora iy’imyumbati, twe nka Kinazi turi banini ariko hari abandi bato kandi badafite ibyo byangombwa. Abo iyo bakoze nta byangombwa cyangwa nta buziranenge nibwo usanga bakoze ibyo bashatse n’igiciro bakaba bakigira gito, ariko bikarenga aho kuko abantu barya ibintu bihumanye. Tujya tuganira na leta bakatubwira ko babikurikirana kandi nkeka ko uko ibintu biza bizagenda bikosoka.” Hari ibyago ku muntu warya ibitujuje ubuziranenge Mbabazi yavuze ko abantu bakwiye kujya bagenzura ifu bagiye kugura, bakareba niba yujuje ibisabwa ndetse ifite n’ibirango bitangwa n’Ikigo gishinzwe Ubuziranenge.’ Ati “Twebwe nk’uruganda ibyo dukwiye gukora turabikora no ku rwego rw’igihugu ni uko, hano mu ruganda dufite itsinda ku buryo nta kintu cyasohoka kitabanje kugenzurwa ko cyujuje ubuziranenge, icyo dusaba abantu ni ukurya ifu yacu ariko bakwiye kumenya ko ushobora kurya ibihumanye bikaba byakugiraho ingaruka.” Uru ruganda ruvuga ko nubwo rutarabona abantu barwiyitirira ariko hari bamwe bumva ko bashobora kuba bafata ifu ya Kinazi, bakayipfunyika mu bindi bipfunyiko byabo, bakaba bayigurisha ku mafaranga menshi mu mahanga kuko isanzwe ari nziza. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubuziranenge muri uru ruganda, Ngabonzima Viateur, yavuze ko mu ruganda bagenzura isuku y’abantu, imashini n’ibindi byose. Ati “Ifu y’uruganda rwa Kinazi yahawe ikirango cy’ubuziranenge gitangwa n’Ikigo gitsura ubuziranenge, RSB, twanarenze imbibi ku buryo ifu yacu yemewe n’ikigo cy’Abanyamerika kigenzura ubuziranenge bw’ibiribwa, ubu ishobora gucuzwa ku isoko rya Amerika.” Umuyobozi ushinzwe umusaruro winjira muri uru ruganda, Rutagungira Eve Nicolas, we yavuze ko uruganda rukorana neza n’abaruzanira imyumbati, kuva rwatangira mu 2012. Kugeza ubu uruganda rwa Kinazi rufite isoko mu Rwanda no ku mugabane w’u Burayi, ibijya hanze bikaba biri ku kigero kirenze 40%, aho ruteganya no kwagura rukajya muri Amerika kuko naho hari isoko rinini. Uru ruganda rutangaza ko ifu yarwo idakorwamo ubugari gusa, ahubwo ishobora kuvangwa n’andi mafu igakorwamo keke, Capati, Pizza n’ibindi.

title: Nyuma ya Kaminuza, Abangilikani barashaka kubaka ibitaro na Stade mu Rwanda
content: Byangajwe kuri iki  Cyumweru mu gikorwa cyateguwe n’itorero Angilikani ry’u Rwanda  ryamurikiraga  abakiristo ku mugaragaro ibikorwa ryakoze mu mezi 18 ribonye umwepisikopi Mukuru mushya Dr Laurent Mbanda, igikorwa cyabereye kuri Katederali ya Diyosezi ya Gasabo. Umwepisikopi Mukuru  w’Itorero Angilikani ry’u Rwanda Dr.Laurent Mbanda yavuze ko ubwo yarahiriraga  inshingano nshya   tariki  ya 10 Kamena 2018 yemeye  ibikorwa azakora mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu bikubiye mu nkingi eshanu zirimo  ivugabutumwa,kwigisha abakozi b’itorero banatangiza Kaminuza y’abangilikani , gushyira imbaraga mu burezi bahereye mu marerero n’ibindi. Dr Laurent Mbanda yavuze ko  mu gihe cy’amezi 18  itorero rimaze gukora  byinshi birimo kubaka Kaminuza y’Abangilikani i Kabuga izatangira muri  Mutarama 2020, kubaka icumbi ry’Umwepisikopi Mukuru i Kibagabaga  no kubaka amashuri y’amarerero   mu gihugu hose asaga 400. Mu bindi bikorwa Angilikani imaze gukora harimo kuba   ryujuje Katederali  y’igihugu i Kibagaba  ,ubu bakaba  bari no kubaka inzu z’ubucuruzi zizaba zuzuye  mu ntangiriro ya 2020 . Musenyeri Dr.Laurent Mbanda yatangarije abakristo ko usibye ibyo bimaze gukorwa ubu bagiye gutangiza imishinga mishya  irimo  kubaka  ibitaro muri Gasabo  i Bumbogo  n’ibindi  bibiri    hanze ya Kigali ,gutangiza ikigo cy’imari ( Anglican Church Sacco),kubaka ikigo cy’ubukerarugendo  cyizajya kigisha amateka y’ububyutse i Gahini, gutangiza ikigo cy’ubushakashatsi  ku bibazo abaturage bahura nabyo i Kabuga no kubaka Stade Mpuzamahanga  i Kabuga  izajya yakira imikino yose ,ibi byose  bikazatangira gushyirwa mu bikorwa  umwaka utaha Minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu,  Prof. Shyaka Anastase  yashimiye itorero ry’Abangilikani ku bikorwa bari gukora bijyanye n’icyerekezo cy’igihugu mu iterambere,  avuga ko nka Leta bashimishijwe n’umushinga  wo kubaka kaminuza izajya itegura abapasiteri. Yanashimye by’umwihariko imbaraga itorero ryagaragaje mu kubaka amashuri y’inshuke  arera abana mu gihugu hose, avuga ko bari gusubiza umuhigo igihugu cyihaye wo  kubaka uburezi bahereye hasi. Yagize ati “Ibi biragaragaza ko mufite abayobozi beza  kuko ibyo yadusezeranyije dutangiye kubibona mu gihe gito.” Minisitiri  Shyaka  yashimye  umuco mwiza wo kumurikira abakiristu ibikorerwa mu itorero  nk’ikimenyetso cyo gukora neza no  gukorera mu mucyo ,abizeza  ubufatanye. Itorero Angilikani ubu rifite diyosezi  11, mu gihe cyavuba bakaba bagiye gutangiza izindi ebyiri  arizo Kibuye na Nyaruguru.

title: Uganda ihera he  ihakana ko ikorana n’abashaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda?
content: Yabivuze imbonankubone imbere y’abadipolomate b’abanyamahanga baba muri icyo gihugu, nyuma abisubiramo imbere ya kamera z’abanyamakuru baba ab’imbere mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga. Uwo mugabo yavuze ko nta kibazo igihugu cye gifitanye n’u Rwanda, ko ikibazo ari u Rwanda rwafunze imipaka, rukabuza abaturage kwambuka. Imvugo ya Kutesa yarakaje bamwe mu banyarwanda bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga zirimo na Twitter, maze bazifashisha bamugaragariza ibimenyetso simusiga byemeza ko igihugu cye kiri mu bikorwa bigamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda. Hashize imyaka isaga ibiri abanyarwanda bafatwa bagafungirwa mu bigo bya Gisirikare muri Uganda, bagatotezwa abagize amahirwe bakarekurwa ari intere bakajugunywa mu Rwanda. Nta cyumweru gishira batajugunywe ku mupaka, ubuhamya bwabo bwagaragaye kenshi mu binyamakuru bitandukanye bivugira iyicarubozo  bakorewe ubwo babaga bari mu buroko. Kuba Kutesa yemeza ko igihugu cye nta we gikorana na we ushaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda benshi babigaragaje nk’ikinyoma gikomeye no kwirengagiza ukuri no gukina ku mubyimba amagana y’abanyarwanda bafungiye ubusa muri icyo gihugu, bazizwa gusa ko banze kwifatanya n’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa Kayumba Nyamwasa, RNC, ufite intego zo guhungabanya umutekano mu Rwanda. Perezida Yoweri Museveni ni we wiyemereye ko aherutse guhura na Charlotte Mukankusi umwe mu bashinzwe dipolomasi muri RNC ndetse nyuma byamenyekanye ko uwo mugore yahawe Pasiporo ya Uganda azajya yifashisha mu bikorwa byo gushakisha inkunga no kwamamaza RNC hirya no hino ku isi. Abakoresha Twitter bibukije Minisitiri Kutesa ko Perezida Museveni adasiba guhura n’abayobora RNC ndetse by’ikimenyimenyi aherutse guhurira i Kampala na Kayumba Nyamwasa umuyobozi wa RNC, umutwe w’iterabwoba ubarizwa mu misozi ya Minembwe muri RDC no muri Uganda. Ubwo yari muri Uganda, Kayumba yagaragaye i Kampala muri hotel ihenze ari kumwe n’abakomando bakomeye b’umutwe udasanzwe mu gisirikare cya Uganda uzwi nka SFC. Mukankusi, Eugène Gasana, Tabaro,Ben Rutabana, Frank Ntwali n’abandi bayobozi muri RNC bahora i Kampala mu bikorwa byo gushakisha inkunga. Uganda yahaye ubutaka bwisanzuye inyeshyamba za RNC bwo gukoreraho ibikorwa byabo.  Ubwo butaka bukoreshwa nk’ibirindio byo kwinjirizamo  abarwanyi  bashya  ndetse  bugakoreshwa nk’ikibuga cy’imyitozo ya gisirikare. Uganda yashinze ibinyamakuru bisaga 30 byo kuri internet bigamije gukwirakwiza icengezamatwara rigaragaza nabi isura y’u Rwanda. Ibyo binyamakuru byibasira ubudasiba Perezida Kagame na Guverinoma ye. Ibyo bijyana no guha umwanya w’imbere abayobozi ba RNC mu binyamakuru bya Leta ya Uganda nka New Vision, maze bagaharabika abayobozi b’u Rwanda bigatinda. Igihamya gikomeye ko Uganda ikorana n’abashaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda cyagaragajwe na Raporo y’impuguke za Loni yasohotse mu Ukuboza umwaka ushize. Yerekanye ko Uganda n’u Burundi, ari indiri yo gushakiramo abajya mu mutwe wa gisirikare ukorera muri RDC, mu kizwi nka P5, irwanya u Rwanda, aho RNC na FDLR ari abayigize bo mu rwego rwo hejuru. Abari abayobozi ba FDLR barimo La Forge Bazeye wavugiraga uwo mutwe na Lt. Col. Abega wari ushinzwe iperereza mbere yo koherezwa mu Rwanda bari bafashwe n’ingabo za Congo bavuye muri Uganda mu biganiro byari bigamije ku bahuza na RNC ngo banoze umugambi wo guhungabanya u Rwanda. Hejuru y’ibi bihamya, benshi bibaza impamvu Minisitiri Kutesa atinyuka akavuga ko ntaho igihugu cye gihuriye n’ibikorwa byo gufasha abashaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.

title: Umukecuru Zula Karuhimbi warokoye Abatutsi barenga 100 muri Jenoside, yatabarutse
content: Ku myaka 109 y’amavuko, umukecuru Zula Karuhimbi wari umuyoboke w’idini ya Islam, wabaye ikimenyabose kubera ubwitange budasanzwe bwamuranze mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, yitabye Imana. Ni inkuru yatangiye kuvugwa ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa 17 Ukuboza 2018 aho bivugwa ko nyakwigendera yazize uburwayi. Zula Karuhimbi yahawe igihembo na erezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame nk’umurinzi w’igihango. Mu 2009 ni bwo uyu mubyeyi yahawe umudari w’ishimwe kubera ubutwari yagaragaje muri Jenoside ndetse yubakiwe inzu mu karere ka Ruhango mu murenge wa Ruhango ho mu kagari ka Musamo. Mu 2015, Ubuyobozi bw’Umuryango w’Abayisilamu mu Rwanda (RMC) nabwo bwahembye Karuhimbi kubera uruhare mu kurokora Abatutsi barenga 100. Karuhimbi yakoresheje amayeri atangaje mu kurokora Abatutsi bahigwaga bari bahungiye iwe, aho avuga ko yashyiraga igisura n’isusa mu nzu ye, akanabisiga ku bikuta by’inzu ngo birye interahamwe zashakaga abantu yahishe ndetse akanababwira ko abateza Nyabingi, bigatuma bahunga badakoze umugambi mubisha wabagenzaga.

title: T.I. asuzumisha ubusugi bw’umukobwa we w’imyaka 18 buri mwaka
content:
Umuraperi Clifford Joseph Harris Jr. uzwi nka T.I yatangaje ko buri mwaka ajyana umukobwa we kwa muganga gusuzumisha ko akiri isugi. Ibi yabitangarije mu kiganiro ’Ladies like us’ ubwo yabazwaga niba kugeza ubu yari yaganiriza umukobwa we ubu ufite imyaka 18 y’amavuko ku byerekeranye n’ubuzima bw’imyororokere ndetse n’imibonano mpuzabitsina. Mu gusubiza iki kibazo, T.I yavuze ko ibyo babiganira cyane ndetse ko ikirenze kuri ibyo, buri mwaka bajya kwa muganga gusuzumisha ko umukobwa akiri isugi. Ati "Ntitwabiganiriyeho gusa ahubwo tujya no kwa muganga buri mwaka kureba ko akiri isugi."

 Umukobwa wa T.I. Deyjah Harris, akoreshwa ikizamini gisuzuma ubusugi buri mwaka  T.I yavuze ko ibi babitangiye ubwo umukobwa we yuzuzaga imyaka 16 y’amavuko, ndetse akaba yaranamusinyijishe urupapuro rumuhesha uburenganzira rwo kumenya uko ubuzima bwe buhagaze, ibi bikamuhesha uburenganzira bwo guhabwa icyemezo cyemeza ko umukobwa we ari isugi buri mwaka.

 T.I. n’abakobwa be  Ibi ntibyavuzweho rumwe cyane cyane ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, aho benshi bashinja T.I kuba umubyeyi w’umunyagitugu ndetse ko ahohotera umukobwa we, amukoza n’isoni mu bantu, bituma n’umukobwa we ahita areka kumukurikirana (unfollow) ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zose.

 Deyjah ntagikurikirana se ku mbuga nkoranyambaga

title: Depite Mutesi yasabye ko kwizigamira mu Rwanda byagirwa itegeko
content: Yabisabye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 21 Gicurasi ubwo Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi yagezaga ku Nteko Ishinga Amategeko imitwe yombi imbanzirizamushinga y’ingengo y’imari y’igihe giciriritse hamwe n’imibare y’ikigereranyo cy’ingengo y’imari ya 2020/2021-2022/2023. Minisitiri Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana yavuze ko Guverinoma izakomeza gushishikariza abaturage kwitabira ikigega ‘Ejo Heza’, imwe muri gahunda z’igihe kirekire ziha buri Munyarwanda wese uko amikoro ye angana, uburyo bwo kwizigamira bworoshye buzamugirira akamaro. Uretse Ejo Heza, Ndagijimana yavuze ko hari n’ikindi kigega cy’ubwizigame cyitwa Rwanda National Investment Trust Ltd (RNIT) Iterambere Fund gitanga ubundi buryo bwo kuzigama butari igihe kirekire cyane ariko bwunguka. Depite Mutesi Anita yavuze ko ubukangurambaga bwo kwizigama ari bwiza ariko ko hakenewe ko ubwizigame ku banyarwanda biba itegeko cyane ku bakorera imishahara. Ati “Mu by’ukuri umuco w’abanyarwanda wo kwizigamira uragoye cyane, ntekereza ko kwizigamira bibaye itegeko cyane cyane ku bahembwa umushahara n’iyo bakurwaho akantu gato ariko hakagira ikintu umuntu yizigamira, byaba byiza.” Isuzuma ryakozwe n’ikigo FinScope mu 2016, ryagaragaje ko abanyarwanda basaga 86 % by’abakuze bakorana n’ibigo by’imari, ni ukuvuga abagera kuri miliyoni 5.1. Icyakora umwaka ushize, Minisiteri y’imari n’igenamigambi yagaragazaga ko ubwizigame mu Rwanda bukiri munsi ya 15 % by’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu, mu gihe rwari rwiyemeje ko muri 2020 ubwizigame bw’abaturage buzaba bungana na 20 % by’umusaruro mbumbe. Minisitiri Ndagijimana yavuze ko hari ibindi bitekerezo byagiye bitangwa mbere bisaba ko kwizigamira bigirwa itegeko, gusa ngo nta mwanzuro wigeze ufatwa. Ati “Ibiganiro byagiye bibaho kuri iki kibazo ariko nta mwanzuro wa nyuma urafatwa. Kugeza ubu abantu barakangurirwa kuzigama ku bushake bakanoroherezwa ariko abantu bakomeza kungurana ibitekerezo niba ubu buryo bwafasha abanyamishahara kuba bagira ikintu bazigama gihoraho.” Ikigega RNIT Iterambere Fund kimaze kujyamo ubwizigame busaga miliyari 11 Frw mu gihe muri Ejo Heza hamaze kujyamo asaga miliyari ebyiri. Ibihugu byose byateye imbere ni ibifite umubare munini w’abaturage bakorana na za banki n’ibindi bigo by’imari ku buryo byorohera igihugu kumenya uko ubukungu buhagaze no kumenya ahakiri icyuho ngo gikurweho. U Rwanda rufite intego yo kuzamura ubukungu bwarwo bukava ku rwego rw’ibihugu bikennye rukagera mu biyingayinga ibikize mu 2035 no kugera mu bikize mu cyerekezo cya 2050.

title: Imodoka nini zica ku mupaka wa Rusumo zariyongereye mu minsi icumi ishize
content: Izi modoka ziyongereye nyuma yaho tariki ya 04 Gicurasi abashoferi bo muri Tanzania bari bigaragambije bakabuza imodoka zigana mu Rwanda kurenga ahitwa Benako. Imvano y’iyi myigaragambyo ngo ni uko u Rwanda rwari rwateguye uburyo abashoferi b’amakamyo baturuka hanze bajya bagarukira ku mupaka batinjiye mu gihugu, imodoka zabo zigatwarwa n’abandi bakazigeza aho zipakururira, hirindwa coronavirus. Abanya-Tanzania ntabwo babyakiriye neza kuko bahise birara mu bashoferi b’abanyarwanda barabahohotera bafunga umuhanda w’ahitwa Benako bihagarika urujya n’uruza rw’imodoka nini kugeza ubwo amakamyo 1000 yari azanye ibicuruzwa mu Rwanda yari yaheze muri Tanzania. Tariki ya 15 Gicurasi 2020, itsinda ry’u Rwanda n’irya Tanzania bagiranye ibiganiro mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga bemeza guhita bakuraho uburyo bwo guhinduranya abashoferi ku mupaka wa Rusumo. Bemeje ko ibicuruzwa bizajya bipakururirwa ku mupaka uretse amakamyo atwaye ibicuruzwa byangirika n’atwaye ibikomoka kuri peteroli. Komiseri ushinzwe gasutamo mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imisoro n’Amahoro RRA, Uwamariya Rosine yabwiye IGIHE ko muri iyi minsi icumi bakiriye amakamyo 2843, amenshi akaba yari yaraheze Benako. Ati “ Kubera ya minsi 14 yashize abashoferi ba Tanzania barigaragambije byatumye imodoka zitinda ahantu hitwa Benako, mu gihe zigiye kwinjira rero zinjiriye rimwe nibyo byateye ubwinshi bw’imodoka nyinshi mu gihe cy’iminsi mike.” Komiseri Uwamariya yakomeje avuga ko inyinshi zaje zitwaye ibicuruzwa by’u Rwanda byari bitegerejwe muri iriya minsi 14 yashize abanya-Tanzania baranze kuzirekura.  Ati “ Mbere imodoka twakiraga zari munsi ya 200 none muri iyi minsi twakiraga imodoka nyinshi hari nubwo twakiriye 470 umunsi umwe. Ubu serivisi zose za gasutamo turi kuzitangira hano mu birometero birindwi uturutse ku mupaka kugira ngo turinde abantu icyorezo cya Coronavirus.” Yavuze ko ahimuriwe gasutamo hari n’abaganga bafite ibikoresho bihagije byo gupima aba bashoferi kuburyo ngo iyo hari ugaragayeho iki cyorezo yitabwaho nk’abandi barwayi bose. Mu birometero birindwi uvuye ku mupaka wa Rusumo niho hubatswe gasutamo ku buso bungana na hegitari 7.5. Iyi gasutamo ifite n’ububiko bw’ibicuruzwa bukoreshwa n’ibigo bizobereye muri ako kazi. Hari kandi amacumbi abashoferi bararamo mu gihe serivisi bari guhabwa zitararangira.

title: Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko Isi iri mu kaga kubera ubushyuhe bukabije buri kwiyongera
content: Raporo y’ubwo bushakashatsi yatangarijwe mu nama ikomeye y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yiga ku mihindagurikire y’ikirere ubwo Umunyamabanga mukuru, Antonio Guterres yahamagariraga ibihugu kongera ingamba zo kugabanya ibyuka bihumanya Ikirere. Raporo “Ishimangira ko hagomba gushyirwaho ingamba zihamye zo guhangana n’ikibazo cy’ubushyuye n’ingaruka zikomeye z’imihindagurikire y’Ikirere”. Impuzandengo y’ubushyuhe bwaranze Isi hagati ya 2015 na 2019 igaragaza ko kugeza ubu ariyo myaka itanu igiye kurangwa n’ubushyuhe bukabije mu mateka y’Umubumbe w’Isi, nkuko byagaragajwe n’iyo raporo. Igaragaza ko “Ubu ubushyuhe bwazamutseho 1.10C ugereranyije na mbere y’iterambere ry’inganda hagati y’imyaka ya 1850 na 1900 na 0.20C z’ubushyuhe ugereranyije no kuva 2011 kugeza 2015”. Umuyobozi mukuru w’Itsinda rirwanya umwuka wa Karubone (anti-carbon group E3G), Tom Burke, yabwiye Al Jazeera ko ikibazo kiri kwiyongera kurusha uko abantu babitekereza. Ati “Ndatekereza ko ibyago biri kwiyongera bivuze ko dufite igihe gito cyo gukemura icyo kibazo kurusha uko tubitekereza. Ni ukuvuga ngo niba dushaka kurandura imihindagurikire y’Ikirere tugomba guhagarika gutwika ibinyabutabire byohereza ibyuka bihumanya ikirere.” Mu cyumweru gishize, Guterres yavuze ko Isi iri gutatanya imbaraga ashingiye kuri iyo raporo igaragaza icyuho kiri hagati y’ibisabwa n’ibiri gukorwa. Mu 2018 umwuka uhumanya ikirere, CO2 wiyongeyeho 2% bihita bigeza ku mubare wo hejuru mu mateka ungana na Toni miliyari 37. Igiteye impungenge ni uko nta bimenyetso bigaragara byo kugera ku ntego yo gutangira kugabanyuka kw’ibyo byuka byoherezwa mu kirere. Amasezerano y’i Paris yo mu 2015 agaragaza ko ibihugu byiyemeje gushyiraho ingamba zo kugabanya izamuka ry’ubushyuhe kugeza nibura kuri 20C cyangwa 1.50C kuko aribyo bishobora guhagarika izamuka ry’ubushyuhe mu buryo buhamye. Gusa ubwo bushakashatsi bwatanze umuburo uvuga ko nubwo buri gihugu cyagera kuri iyo ntego, ubushyuhe buzazamuka kuva kuri 2.90C kugera kuri 3.40C. Kandi nabyo kugira ngo bishoboke ni uko Ibihugu byakuba gatatu umuvuduko biri kugenderaho ubu bishaka kugera kuri 1.50C.

title: Ubwongereza bunyagiye Nigeria ibitego 8-1
content: Kuri uyu wa 9 Ugushyingo, rutahizamu wa Newcastle United, Adam Armstrong yihereranye abanyanigeriaya abakubita ibitego bitatu mu munani batsinze mu mukino wabo wa mbere mu irushanwa mpuzamigabane ry’abatarengeje imyaka 20 riri kubere muri Koreya y’Epfo. Ni itsinda ririgukinira kuri Suwon World Cup Stadium, rikaba ririmo Ubwongereza, Nigeria Koreya y”epfo na Iran. Ibitego by’ubwongereza byatsinzwe na Taylor Moore ku munota wa19, Adam Armstrong 20, 27, 70, Dominic Solanke 25, Callum Connolly 46 na Patrick Roberts 49, 87. Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Davido yihakanye umwana we w’imfura bibabaza umugore we wa mbere
content: David Adedeji Adeleki uzwi cyane mu muziki nka Davido, umuhanzi ukorera muzika mu gihugu cya Nigeria aherutse kwibaruka umwana wa kabiri Hailey wavukiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika ku mugore we wa kabiri Amanda, ibintu bitashimishije umugore we wa mbere Ayomide Labinjo na gake. {}

title: Producer Holybeat wo muri The Mane yatawe muri yombi kubera ibiyobyabwenge
content: Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ava mu nshuti za hafi z’uyu musore avuga ko yafatiwe mu karere ka Kicukiro ari kumwe n’inshuti ze, bakaba bakurikiranyweho gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. Uyu musore acumbikiwe kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Kicukiro nk’uko byanahamijwe n’Umuvugizi wa RIB, Marie Michelle Umuhoza wemereye IGIHE ko uyu musore yatawe muri yombi akurikiranyweho icyaha cyo gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge. HolyBeat izina rye ryazamutse cyane ubwo yakoreraga ibijyanye n’umuziki muri Urban Record aho yavuye yerekeza muri The Mane muri 2019. HolyBeat yinjiye muri Studio ya Urban Record mu mwaka wa 2018 ubwo bayifunguraga ku mugaragaro. Yakoranye n’iyi studio imishinga itandukanye y’indirimbo ariko by’umwihariko indirimbo yamamaye cyane mu zo yakoze ni “Nta Kibazo” yari ihuriyemo abahanzi benshi ariko mu by’ukuri ari iya Urban Boys. HolyBeat yinjiye muri The Mane abisikana na Li John wari usezerewe muri iyi sosiyete ifasha abahanzi ibarizwamo Marina, Queen Cha na Kelvin Mbanda.

title: Chris Brown yatabawe n’ijwi ry’Imana ubwo amashitani yari yamuteye- “benshi mu rujijo”
content:
Icyamamare muri muzika kuri iyi Si dutuyeho Chris Brown yemeye ku mugaragaro ko arambiwe gukorera amashitani ndetse anahamya ko aherutse guterwa n’imyuka mibi hanyuma ijwi ry’Imana rikamuvugiramo ubuzima bwe burokoka ubwo.
 Aya ni amagambo yanditse abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter uyu muhanzi Chris Brown yagize ati: Iyo wumva urambiwe na *** by’imyuka mibi ishaka kukwangiriza ubuzima ariko akenshi uzajya wumva ijwi ry’Imana riza imbere rikuvugiremo nta muntu n’umwe uzi ngewe ibyo mba nkora umunsi ku munsi usibye Imana yange niyo mpamvu ariyo izanamfasha kuba nakwikiza abanteza iyo myuka mibi yose” Yakomeje avuga ati usanga abenshi batiyumvisha uburyo umuntu akora nk’ibyo dukora kubw’imbaraga zisanzwe ariko nzi neza ko Roho yange izahora mu maboko y’Uwiteka Imana ndetse nzakomeza ngaragare uko mu mbona ariko nanone sinzarekeraho ku ririmba kabone n’ubwo benshi bakekako mbikoreshwa n’imyuka mibi, ariko ubusanzwe baravuga ngo “wowe ba umugabo.” Ibi byatumye benshi bavuga ko aya magambo y’uyu muhanzi yaba afitanye isano n’umuryango wa Illuminate ndetse na Anti Christ bisanzwe bizwi ko uyu muhanzi ari umwe mu babarizwamo ndetse akaba yavuze aya magambo mu rwego rwo kubihakana.

Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: TANZANIA:Abakirisitu Gatorika bahinduriwe umunsi basengeraga ho
content: Mugihugu cya Tanzania  abayoboke bitorero ry’Abagaturika basabwe kuza senga kw’isabato cyangwase kuwagatandandu tariki 24 Ukwakira 2015 kugira ngo hatazagira umuntu uzitirwa nogusenga bika mubuza kwitorera umukuru w’igihugu mu matora ateganyijwe kuri 25 Ukwakira 2015 hazaba ari kucyumweru. Muri iki  gihugu cya Tanzania hatanzwe uburenganzira kubapadiri bose n’insengero zabo  muri icyo gihugu kuzasenga kuwa gatandatu (ku Isabato ku bemera amahame y’idini y’Abadivantisite b’umunsi wa karindwi) azaba ari  tariki 24 Ukwakira 2015 ubwo nyine ni mu rwego rwo kugirango kucyumweru tariki 25 Ukwakira 2015 kugirango abayoboke babo bazabone umwanya uhagije wokwitorera  umukuru w’igihugu, ndetse n’Abadepite  hamwe na njyanama z’uturere. Nkuko tubikesha ikinyamakuru kitwa MTANZANIA. Kibivuga   ko ibingibi byatangajwe n’umunyamabanga w’inama nkuru ya bepiskopi muri Tanzania (TEC) Musenyeri  SEVERIN Niwemugizi, musenyeri Niyomugizi  yasabye ko buri basenyeri bagomba kubikoragutyo  bamenyesha  aba padiri  yuko  abayoboke babo bazasenga kuwagatandatu. Ikindi nuko yasabye abayoboke bitorero gaturika kujya ba kurikirana abakandida babo mugihe biyamamaza  kugirango bumve imigabo n’imigambi baba fitiye, bityo bazitorere abayobozi  baba nogeye. Yashoje avugako bakomeza gusaba Imana Izabafashe Ibahe amahoro  murikigihe cyokwiyamamaza kwa bakandida , umunsi wa matora  nanyuma y’amatora   abakandida n’Abaturage  bazakire ibyavuye mumatora n’umutimamwiza  kugirango barusheho kugira ubumwe n’amahoro  mugihugu cyabo. Tubibutse ko amatora mugihugu cya Tanzania ateganyijwe kuba kuri 25 Ukwakira 2015  hazaba ari kucyumweru,  Mubakandida  bahabwa amahirwe murayo matora ni  John  Magufuri  guturuka mu Ishyaka riri kubuyobozi ( CCM) Chama Chama Mapinduzi. Hamwe na Edward Rowasa wavuye muriryo shaka rya CCM, akajya muri CHADEMA, Chama chakidemokrasia na Maendereo. Yanditswe na Bagabo John/Muhabura.rw

title: Kurekura Abanyarwanda icyenda b’inzirakarengane ni intangiriro nziza ariko Museveni akeneye gukora ibirenzeho
content: Basabye Uganda kutarekura gusa Abanyarwanda bafungiye muri Gereza n’inzu z’ibanga za gisirikare ziri muri icyo gihugu ahubwo no kuzuza ibyo biyemeje mu masezerano ya Luanda ibihugu byombi byashyizeho umukono muri Kanama 2019, by’umwihariko ingingo ivuga ko Uganda igomba guhagarika gushyigikira imitwe y’iterabwoba igambiriye guhungabanya u Rwanda. Nyuma y’irekurwa ry’aba Banyarwanda icyenda, Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, yavuze ko Uganda ikwiye kurekura amagana y’Abanyarwanda bagifungiyeyo no guhagarika gukomeza gushyigikira imitwe yitwaje intwaro irwanya u Rwanda. Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Uganda, Frank Mugambage, yashimangiye ubu butumwa mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru ku wa 8 Mutarama 2020, asaba Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Uganda, Sam Kutesa, ko n’abandi barekurwa. Ikintu gikomeje kugaruka muri iri cengezamatwari riyobya rinyuzwa mu bitangazamakuru bya Uganda ni uko igihe cyose Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yakomeje kugaragaza ibi bibazo n’ibindi bisa bireba umubano warwo na Uganda, rwabikoze mu mucyo ku buryo busesuye. Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Uganda, Sam Kutesa, yashatse kuyobya uburari, ashaka ku gutsimbarara ko Abanyarwanda nabo atari shyashya kandi ko kubarekura ari umwanzuro wafashwe ku nyungu za politiki. Mu by’ukuri nk’Umunyamategeko, Minisitiri Kutesa yakagombye kuba yari abizi ko nta guverinoma cyangwa ubucamanza bufunga abantu imyaka itatu nta kuburanishwa niba koko atari ibya politiki. Uretse ko n’abahohotewe muri iki kibazo bari abaturage b’ikindi gihugu b’inzirakarengane badafite aho bahuriye na politiki. Ikirenze kuri ibyo Minisitiri ku bwende yavanze ikibazo asaba u Rwanda narwo kugira icyo rukora ku ruhande rwarwo. Nta na kimwe gihari cyo kugirwamo uruhare, mu gihe u Rwanda rutigeze rufunga Umunya-Uganda n’umwe uretse no kuba rwabakorera iyicarubozo, baracyakora ibikorwa byabo hano nta muntu n’umwe ubabangamiye. Nibyo koko Uganda buri gihe yagiye ishaka gushyiraho urujijo, igerageza gushyira ubu bushyamirane mu ishusho y’umwanzuro wa Guverinoma y’u Rwanda wo kugira inama abaturage bayo kutajya muri Uganda aho CMI yabatangijeho ibihe byo kubahiga. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyabereye i Kigali ku wa 8 Mutarama 2020, Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, yatangaje ko igihe guverinoma izaba yanyuzwe n’uko Uganda yahagaritse gufunga no gukorera iyicarubozo inzirakarengane z’Abanyarwanda iki cyemezo kizakurwaho. Ku rundi ruhande muri Kampala, Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda Mugambage Frank, mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru cyateguwe na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Uganda yasabye ubuyobozi bwa Uganda gukemura ikibazo cy’imitwe y’iterabwoba ifashwa ikanashyigikirwa n’ubutegetsi bwa Kampala. Nk’uko nabigaragaje mbere ibi si bishya ku Rwanda, guhangana n’ibibazo nk’ibi ndetse no gukorana na buri wese wari witeguye gufasha kubikemura. Mu myaka 25 ishize, igihugu cyahuye n’ibibazo bisa nk’ibi ndetse n’ibibirenze ahanini bitewe na Guverinoma ya Uganda. Nibyo koko hari inzira byakemuwemo zishobora gufasha guharura inzira niba koko Uganda ikomeje mu gushaka igisubizo kirambye. Ku wa 4 Nyakanga 2001, ikinyamakuru cya Leta ya Uganda ‘New Vision’ cyasohoye inkuru ku rupapuro rubanza igira iti ‘Kigali yaburiye Cols Mande, Kyakabale”, nyuma y’umwaka abasirikare bakuru ba Uganda bavuye mu gihugu, bahunze itotezwa rya guverinoma bambuka baza mu Rwanda. Isubira mu itangazo ryakorewe i Kigali, The New Vision yarongeye itangaza ko Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yemeye kwinjira kw’aba basirikare. Mu by’ukuri ibyavuzwe n’u Rwanda byashimangiraga ko abagambanyi bo muri UPDF bari kwemererwa kuguma mu gihugu ari uko bemeye ko batazajya mu bikorwa na bimwe bya politiki birwanya igihugu cyabo cy’amavuko. Afurika y’Epfo yakoze ibisa n’ibyo byatangiye kubahirizwa kuva tariki ya 1 Mutarama 2020 ariko n’ubundi u Rwanda rwari rwarerekanye inzira mu myaka hafi 20 ishize. Abayobozi bo muri Uganda bari barashishikarijwe gusaba ubuhungiro mu Rwanda, nyuma y’uko agatsiko k’abahoze ari abasirikare b’u Rwanda, bafashijwe n’abayobozi b’i Kampala kwinjira muri Uganda aho batangirije ibikorwa byo guhungabanya u Rwanda, bafashijwe na CMI n’izindi nzego zishinzwe umutekano mu gihugu. Gusa ubwo abasirikare ba UPDF bivumburaga, urukweto rwari ku rundi ruhande na Kampala yasabwe guhagarika ubufasha yageneraga abo basirikare b’Abanyarwanda badafite ubwenge ndetse ibashakira n’ibindi bihugu bibakira, nk’uko u Rwanda rwari rwarabikoze ku basirikare ba Uganda bari barahunze. U Rwanda nta mutwe n’umwe w’Abanya-Uganda wifuza guhungabanya igihugu cyabo rufite ku butaka bwarwo, nta n’uwo rwigeze. N’abagerageje gushaka ubuhungiro hano, mu myaka nka 20 ishize ntibigeze bahamara igihe kuko Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yahise ako kanya ibashakira uko boherezwa i Burayi. Ni ku bw’ibyo, igihe kigeze ngo Guverinoma ya Uganda ntihagarike gusa ubufasha n’inkunga yageneraga RNC na FDLR, n’indi mitwe y’iterabwoba igambiriye gutera u Rwanda ahubwo ishake n’ibindi bihugu byakwimurirwamo abayobozi bayo, bahawe uburenganzira bwo gukoresha ubutaka bwabyo mu gutoza no gutegura abahoze batera u Rwanda, nk’uko byagenze vuba aha mu Ukwakira 2019 mu Kinigi, mu Karere ka Musanze aho abantu 14 b’inzirakarengane bishwe.

title: Hari kwigwa uko hakorwa amacupa ashobora kubora mu mwaka umwe
content: Iki gitekerezo gishyizwe mu bikorwa byaba ari inkuru nziza ku kurengera ibidukikije ku Isi, aho amacupa ya pulasitiki akomeje kwiyongera ari ko yangiza ibidukikije haba ubutaka, inyamaswa zo mu Nyanja n’ibindi. Avantium yatangaje ko hari ibigo bikora inzoga byatangiye gushyigikira uwo mushinga nk’Uruganda rwa Carlsberg. Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Avantium, Tom van Aken, yavuze ko bizeye ko ibigo bikomeye mu gukora ibikoresho byo muri pulasitiki bizabiyungaho vuba bagateza imbere icyo gitekerezo. Ibigo bikomeye nka Coca-Cola na Danone nabyo byagaragaje ko bishyigikiye uwo mushinga mu rwego rwo kugabanya umubare w’amacupa ya pulasitiki akorwa mu bikomoka kuri peteroli. KuIisi hose buri mwaka hakorwa amacupa ya pulasitiki agera kuri miliyoni 300, agira uruhare mu iyangirika ry’ibidukikije. Aya macupa iyo ajugunywe mu nyanja ashobora kumara imyaka n’imyaka atarabora. Amacupa azajya akorwa na Avantium bivugwa ko azaba afite ubushobozi bwo kubika neza ibinyobwa birimo ikinyabutabire cya CO2. Igerageza ryakozwe rigaragaza ko ayo macupa akozwe mu bimera ashobora kubora mu mwaka umwe mu gihe ashyizwe mu kimoteri, naho yajugunywa imusozi akamara indi myaka mike. Biteganyijwe ko biramutse bigenze neza amacupa ya mbere yaba yagejejwe ku isoko bitarenze umwaka wa 2023.

title: Zari Hassan yahishuye ku mugaragaro umubano we na Diamond nyuma yo gutandukana
content: Zari Hassan wahoze ari umugore wa Diamond Platnumz, yahishuye uburyo umubano wabo wakomeje kuzamba nyuma yo gutandukana, ashinja Diamond kwirengagiza inshingano z’ababyeyi. Mu kiganiro kirekire Zari aherutse kugira na Ayo TV yamusuye aho atuye muri Afurika y’Epfo, yagarutse ku mubano we na Diamond nyuma yo gutandukana. Uyu mugore w’abana batanu barimo babiri ba Diamond Platnumz, yahishuye ko uyu mugabo yashatse ko bongera kubana bagakora ubukwe, ariko undi akamubera ibamba kuko yari yarananiwe kwihanganira ingeso ye y’ubushurashuzi. Ati “Yarambwiye ati ‘reka dukore ubukwe ducecekeshe abavutuga’ ndamubwira nti ‘Nasibu ikibazo si ugukora ubukwe nawe, ikibazo ni wowe ubwawe. Nubwo twakora ubukwe ntuhinduke ntacyo byahindura. Urabyara, urasambana sinzi na Tunda na buri wese muri Tanzaniya none urashaka ko dukora ubukwe?” Zari yavuze ko abitse umurundo w’ubutumwa Diamond yamwoherereje amusaba ko basubirana ku buryo yiteguye kubwerekana aramutse abihakanye. Nubwo Diamond yasabaga Zari ko basubirana ngo yanashakaga ko azana umwana yabyaranye na Hamisa Mobeto bakamurerana n’abandi, ibintu uyu mugore atakozwaga na gato. Ati “Yarambwiye ngo arashaka guhuriza hamwe abana ndamubwira nti ‘ntabwo ndakira ibikomere bw’ibyo wankoreye, ntushobora kuza unsindagiraho umwana wabyaranye n’undi mugore’.” Zari yavuze ko amaze guhakanira Diamond yahise agira uburakari bukomeye bituma anasubika kwitabira ibirori byo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka ibiri y’umukobwa wabo Tiffah. Baraye mu nzu imwe ukubiri Mu mwaka ushize hari ubwo Diamond yaraye mu rugo rwe ruri muri Afurika y’Epfo ari naho Zari abana n’abana be, abantu batangira gutekereza ko baba basubiranye. Zari yavuze ko icyo gihe nta rukundo na ruke yari agifitiye Diamond ku buryo yimutse mu cyumba cye akajya kurarana n’abana. Ati “Hari ubwo yari avuye mu gitaramo muri Namibia aca mu rugo, icyo gihe yerekanye amafoto ari mu cyumba cyanjye, abantu baravuga ngo basubiranye. Yaraje muharira icyumba cyanjye ku bwo kumwubaha njya kurara mu cyumba cya Tiffah.” Mu kumwereka ko atakimukunda, Zari yanze kumutekera araburara, ndetse bunakeye ngo ntiyigeze amubirwa na mwaramutse. Ati “Bari bavuye gufata amashusho bagera mu rugo nka saa ine z’ijoro. Nta biryo byari bahari kandi bari bashonje, umutima urankomanga ko nari kuba nabatekeye ariko nduvuga nti ‘ntawe unshima’.” Kuva icyo gihe kugeza n’ubu ntabwo bongeye kubonana cyangwa se ngo bavugane no kuri telefone. Diamond yanze gutanga indezo nk’umubyeyi Yavuze ko baheruka kubona amafaranga aturutse mu ntoki ze ubwo yamuhaga ibihumbi $2000 kugira ngo bategure isabukuru y’umukobwa wabo mukuru Tiffah. Mu mvugo irimo uburakari Zari yanyomoje Diamond ujya uvuga ko atanga indenzo, avuga ko nta mugabo umurimo. Ati “Abana bafite umushoferi wabo, bariga, bambara imyenda yo mpeshyi n’itumba, turasohoka mu mpera z’icyumweru, nta n’isoni bigutera nk’umugabo ? Ubwo bahamagara abagabo nawe ukazamo? Uri umubyeyi nyabaki?” Zari yavuze ko inzu Diamond yaguze muri Afurika y’Epfo badateze kuyimuha kuko ari iy’abana babyaranye. Diamond yagiye ashaka ko abana be bajya kumusura muri Tanzania ariko ntibyakunda bitewe n’ukutumvikana. Niyomugabo Albert/MUHABURA.RW

title: Abitabiriye imurikagurisha rya ILTM-Cannes basangijwe amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo ari mu Rwanda (Amafoto)
content: ILTM-Cannes ni imurikagurisha riri mu yo ku rwego ruhambaye abera mu Bufaransa, ahahurira ibigo bikomeye bikora muri uru rwego biturutse mu mfuruka zose z’Isi. U Rwanda rwitabiriye ILTM (International Luxury Travel Market) ruhagarariwe na RDB n’ibigo icyenda byigenga  byaturutse  mu rw’Imisozi 1000. Bigizwe n’amatsinda ahagarariwe na Manzi Kayihura (Thousand Hills Africa), Robert Gakimbiri (Primate Safaris), Daniel Ndizeye (Akagera Aviation), Elise Milenge (Charleston Tours), David Rutikanga ( Songa Africa), Eloisa Barberis Canonico (Volcanoes Safaris), Roberto Viviani (Wilderness Safaris), Simon Bruce Miller (Uber Luxe Safaris) na Bonita Mutoni (One&Only). RDB nk’ikigo kigenzura, kikanareberera hafi ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo cyari gihagarariwe na Kageruka Ariella na Ndandali Philbert. Mu gusoza iri murikagurisha rishyirwaho akadomo kuri uyu wa 5 Ukuboza 2019, RDB yasangiye abaryitabiriye amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo ari mu Rwanda n’uko igihugu cyahanze uburyo bworohereza ishoramari ryabwo. Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Kageruka Ariella, yavuze ko imurikagurisha ryo ku rwego nka ITLM ari umwanya mwiza wo kwamamaza ibyo u Rwanda rukora mu bukerarugendo no kugaragaza ibishya ruteganya. Yagize ati “Yari inama yihariye yari yateguriwe u Rwanda gusa tugirana inama mbwirwaruhame tuganira na bagenzi bacu bakora mu bigo  by’ubukerarugendo mu bihugu bitandukanye by’Isi, twabasobanuriye byimbitse ibyo dufite byo kugaragariza abakerarugendo.’’ Yavuze ko abantu bahuye na bo ari abifuza cyane kumenya amakuru yerekeye u Rwanda. Yakomeje ati “Abantu benshi barakomeza kuduha ubuhamya bati u Rwanda ba mukerarugendo barakomeza kurushaka kubera uko mukora ubuvugizi naho mugeze. Ibi rero biratwongerera ibakwe ryo kurushaho kubashakira ibyiza no kunoza serivisi baza basanga kugira ngo u Rwanda rukomeze rureberwe muri iyo ndorerwamo.’’ Yashimangiye ko ubukerarugendo bugezweho ari bwa bundi buhindura ubuzima bw’uwafashe umwanya we agatembera. Ati “Ubukerarugendo burahinduka mu buryo abakerarugendo batakijya gusa gusura ahantu ahubwo bifuza ko n’aho hantu na bo habasigira ikintu cyubaka ubuzima bwabo mu mitekerereze cyangwa mu myumvire.’’ Abenshi mu basuye aho ibigo byo mu Rwanda byamurikiye serivisi bitanga abenshi babazaga amakuru ajyanye n’ibiciro cyangwa ibindi bintu bakora birenze gusura ingagi n’izindi nyamaswa ziboneka muri Pariki zitandukanye mu gihugu. Kageruka yavuze ko bafite ishimwe cyane ko iminsi bamaze i Cannes mu Bufaransa yatanze umusaruro mu rugendo rwa Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yo guteza imbere ubukungu bushingiye ku bukerarugendo. Imibare ya RDB igaragaza ko mu 2017 u Rwanda rwinjije miliyoni $438 zivuye mu bukerarugendo, bijyanye n’intego ya Guverinoma yihaye ko mu 2024 inyungu ruvana mu bukerarugendo igomba kwikuba kabiri ikagera kuri miliyoni $800. Abitabiriye ibiganiro bisoza imurikagurisha ryabereye mu Mujyi wa Cannes babajije ibibazo bitandukanye, bamarwa amatsiko na RDB n’abandi bahagarariye ibigo byabo byari bihagarariwe. Buri wese mu witabiriye ahawe impano ya film ngufi yakozwe ku Rwanda na Visit Rwanda; uko bakoresha ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu kubona amakuru y’ingenzi ku Rwanda. Abahagarariye ibigo byaturutse mu Rwanda babwiye IGIHE ko iki gikorwa ari ishoramari ryiza rizatuma barushaho kwagura ibikorwa n’ibitekerezo kugira ngo abaza gusura u Rwanda basanganizwe serivisi zinoze.  Abayobozi baserukiye ibigo byo mu Rwanda bari biganjemo urubyiruko, imigirire itanga icyizere ku hazaza h’ubukerarugendo rwubakiye ku bakiri bato.  Ibigo byitabiriye imurikagurisha ry’i Cannes birimo ibitanga serivisi zo gutwara ba mukerarugendo, amahoteli n’ibindi. ILTM Cannes 2019 yitabiriwe n’abasaga 6000 barimo abakiliya, itangazamakuru n’abamurika baturutse mu bihugu 134 ku Isi. Amafoto: Karirima Ngarambe/ Cannes

title: Wild Connector Safaris yatanze umwihariko mu gutembereza abantu Pariki y’Akagera mu minsi mikuru
content: Uruzinduko ruzaba kuwa Gatandatu tariki 21 Ukuboza 2019, muri Pariki y’Akagera icumbikiye inyamaswa nyinshi. Abazitabira bazabasha kubona amoko atandukanye y’inyamaswa ziba muri iyo pariki, imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika nyuma yo kuzanwamo intare n’inkura. Pariki y’akagera irimo n’izindi nyamaswa zitanduknaye nk’impala n’imparage, impongo, inzovu, imvubu, ingwe, inyoni z’amoko asaga 500 n’ibindi. Ushinzwe iyamamazabikorwa muri Wild Connector Safaris , Rugamba Alexis yakanguriye cyane cyane ababyeyi kuzana abana bari mu biruhuko, babafasha gusobanukirwa neza ibitatse igihugu cyabo. Ni n’umwanya kandi ku muryango n’abakundana gusoza umwaka bishimye batembera ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda. Ati “Iki gihe abana benshi baba bari mu biruhuko. Ni umwanya mwiza kuri bo wo gutembera no kumenya byinshi ku gihugu cyabo. N’abakuru ni uko, muze dusure pariki yacu y’Akagera tunezezwe no kureba inyamaswa za mbere zikomeye ku isi.” Kujyana na Wild Connector Safaris muri Pariki y’Akagera, umuntu umwe arasabwa kwishyura amafaranga 30 000 Frw mu gihe abanyamahanga badaturuka mu muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba bazishyura amadolari 110. Muri ayo mafaranga harimo itike, uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri pariki, ifunguro rya ku manywa, abakuyobora n’ibindi. Abantu bakundana baziye rimwe ndetse n’abana bazagabanyirizwaho 10 %. Undi mwihariko w’uru rugendo ni uko hazaba hari umufotozi wabigize umwuga uzafata amafoto kandi buri wese akazahabwa umwanya wo kubaza ibibazo byose ku bijyanye n’ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda. Ku bindi bisobanuro kandi aha: Www.Wildconnectorsafaris.com

title: Bakame birangiye ahawe uburenganzira bwo kujya kwishakira indi kipe
content:
Nyuma y’iminsi minsi itari micye yari ishize uyu munyezamu Ndayishimiye Eric uzwi nka Bakame yarahagaritswe n’ikipe ya Rayon Sports bamushinja kuba yaragambaniye iyi kipe, kuri ubu yamaze kwemererwa na Rayon Sports kuba yajya mu ikipe ashaka. Ni mugihe yabanje kwicishwa icyayenge igihe yasabaga ikipe yakiniraga Rayon Sport bakaza no guteza uruntu runtu mu batari bacye bakurikiranira hafi ruhago mu Rwanda aho bamwe bamusabiraga ko yahabwa urwandiko rumurekura cyangwa akababarirwa ariko birangiye ibyavuzwe hakozwemo kimwe aho yamaze guhabwa urupapuro rumurekura (Release letter). Kuri ubu akaba abonye uburenganzira busesuye bwo kwishakira indi kipe yakinira dore ko ariko kazi ke kamutunze we n’umuryango we. Gusa byari bimaze iminsi bivugwa ko ashakishwa cyane n’ikipe ya AFC Leopards yo muri Kenya ndetse ko bari baranamaze kumvikana, ashobora guhita ayerekezamo bitari cyera. 

Habarurema Djamali/MUHABURA.RW

title: Danny Vumbi ageze kure imyiteguro ya album nshya azamurikira kuri internet (Video)
content: Semivumbi Daniel uzwi nka Danny Vumbi yamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zandikanye ubuhanga ariko ziri no mu mudiho wa Kinyafurika zirimo nka "Ni danger", "Ni uwacu", "Abana babi" n’izindi. Kuri ubu uyu mugabo ari mu myiteguro ikomeye yo kumurika album azashyira hanze mu ntangiriro za Nyakanga yifashishije imbuga nkoranyambaga. Mu myitozo Danny Vumbi ari gufatanya n’itsinda ry’abacuranzi rizwi nka Neptunez Band, rizamufasha mu gitaramo ari gutegura. Mu kiganiro na IGIHE uyu muhanzi yijeje Abanyarwanda kuzabona igitaramo cyiza. Yakomeje avuga ati ”Ndi gutegura ibintu byiza cyane, natangiye imyiteguro kare kandi yaba njye cyangwa abo turi gufatanya ndabizi ko tuzaha abakunzi b’umuziki igitaramo cyiza.” Danny Vumbi yavuze ko ateganya gukora igitaramo mu ntangiriro za Nyakanga 2020. Ati "Turi gutekereza tariki 4 Nyakanga 2020 ariko ntabwo turabyemeza, turacyashakisha igihe cyiza twabikorera tuzakomeza kubamenyesha.” Uyu muhanzi ahamya ko kumurika iyi album yifashishije imbuga nkoranyambaga byatewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahinduye uburyo bifuzaga kubikoramo. Yagize ati “Twateganyaga ko muri Kanama 2020 nzajya kumurikira album yanjye mu Bufaransa no mu bindi bihugu by’u Burayi ibiganiro byari bigeze kure. Mu gihe twiteguraga gutangaza aya makuru hahise haduka icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyashegeshe ibijyanye n’imyidagaduro ku Isi yose, tubonye ko bitagishobotse nibwo twatekereje uko twabyitwaramo.” Nyuma yo kwicara bagatekereza bakabona ko bishobora kugorana ko ibitaramo batekerezaga byabaho, yaba Danny Vumbi n’abamufasha biyemeje kumurikira album ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Avuga ko ”Hari amakuru menshi tutaratangaza ariko tuzababwira mu minsi iri imbere kuko hari ibyo tucyumvikana n’abaterankunga nubwo hari abandi bari kwiyongera. Mu minsi mike amakuru yose kuri iki gitaramo cyo kumurika album turaza kuyabaha.” Byitezwe ko nta gihindutse muri iki gitaramo Danny Vumbi yafatanya n’abahanzi nka Bruce Melodie, Mico The Best na Riderman. Album Danny Vumbi yitegura kumurika yise “Inkuru nziza” ni iya gatatu agiye gushyira hanze nyuma ya “Umudendezo” yakoze mu 2012 na ”Kuri twese” yasohoye mu 2015. Ikiganiro na Danny Vumbi ugeze kure imyiteguro y’igitaramo cye

title: Ibintu 10 byakwereka  ko umuhungu akunda umukobwa by’ukuri cyangwa yishakira kuryamana nawe
content:
Ni  gute wowe mukobwa cyangwa mugore, wamenya niba umugabo agukunda by’ukuri? Iki ni ikibazo gikomeye Ku gisubiza kuko hari bamwe mu bagabo benshi baba  bifitiye irari ryo gukunda abagore ariko bakaba bafite umugambi wo kuryamana nabo Atari ukugira ngo bashyingiranwe.Gusa hari n’abandi bakunda abakobwa babafitiye umugambi wo ku rushinga ndetse  rugakomera nta buryarya. Mukobwa Ibi ni ibimenyetso 10 byakwereka niba umuhungu agukunda by’ukuri cyangwa yishakira ko muryamana gusa.
 1.Iyo ashishikajwe no kumenya uko umunsi wawe wagenze, bivuze ko aba ashaka ko mukundana bizira uburya bitagamije ukuryamana. 2.Iyo akwandikiye cyangwa akaguhamagara mu gitondo, bisobanuye ko uri ikintu cyambere atekerezaho igihe cyose, bivuze ko agukunda by’ukuri ndetse anacyeneye ko mwazashyingiranwa. 3.Iyo akwandikiye ariko akabikora ninjoro, aba yishimiye cyangwa ashishikajwe no kuryamana nawe, mu by’ ukuri ntabwo aba agambiriye ko mwazashyingiranwa usibye gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsina gusa. 4.Uko akwita bishobora kukugaragariza niba agukunda by’ukuri cyangwa ashaka ko mwiryamanira.Akenshi azakwita amazina wumva ntakizere atanga k’umubano wanyu w’ahazaza mwembi usibye y’amazina ashirana n’agahararo. 5.Iyo agusabye ko umwoherereza amafoto yawe agaragaza umbwambure bwawe ukoresheje telefone ,aba yishimira Ku kwamamaza gusa nta rukundo aba agufitiye ruzatuma mushyingiranwa usibye kuryamana. 6.Ikintu kibaho iyo muri kumwe cyerekana ko agukunda by’ukuri cyangwa ko mukundana byo kuryamana.Iyo ashaka ko mugirana ikiganiro kiza,icyo gihe muba mukundana bifite intego yo kurushinga.Ariko iyo ibyo akora byose biganisha kuba yagukorakora Ku mabuno, kukwitegereza cyane cyangwa Ku kwiyegereza cyane muhagaze, ntakabuza ibyo aba acyeneye biba ari ukuryamana gusa. 7.  Iyo yohereje ubutumwa, ibyo ategura byose bikaba ari ukukubona kandi akavuga n’ibintu bidasobanutse, ibyo byose aba ashaka kuba ari ukwiryamanira gusa. 8.Iyo ahora aguhamagara cyangwa akakwandikira bikaba ikiganiro kirekire kidafite icyo kigamije, burya aba agukunda bya nyabyo nta gushidikanya.aha bisobanurwa n’uko akenshi iyo ashaka ko muryamana akuganiriza avuga ngo ndagukumbuye mukunzi ndetse n’ibindi byinshi. 9.  Mu gihe muri gukorana ikiganiro,iyo ibyo ari kuvuga byose biba byerekeranye n’ibice bigize umubiri wawe kandi atari si uko abashaka ngo akumenye neza,icyo aba ashaka nta kindi usibye kuryamana nawe. 10.Iyo ashaka kumenya byinshi kuri wowe mu biganiro byose mugirana,icyo gihe aba agukunda bitagira amacyemwa kandi bishobora kurangira mushyingiranywe. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Umusozi wa Kigali wasabirwagaho kugira Umutima w’u Rwanda
content:
Umusozi wa Kigali n’Igenamigambi ry’ingoma inye (Ubu twagereranya na Vision 2020 cyangwa 2050).
 Kumenya icyerekezo cy’u Rwanda mu myaka ijana  ni byo bitwereka  neza icyo ubusugire n’ubwigenge by’u Rwanda gakondo  byari  bisobanuye, bityo  na none tukabasha  no  gusobanukirwa neza  n’icyari ku mutima (Philosophie) w’abakurambere baremye u Rwanda bakarwubaka, bakarurwanira ndetse  benshi  bakanarupfira. Aha tugiye kubona ko ubusugire n’imibereho myiza y’Abanyawanda ku ngoma eshatu bwategurwaga n’Abami bitwa Mutara na Cyilima mbereho nk’ imyaka ijana. Nk’uko musanzwe mubizi, mu mazina y’Abami atanu yasimburanaga mu bihe bine yakurikiranaga atya: Mutara, Kigeli, Mibambwe, Yuhi na Cyilima. Aha biragaragara neza ko hagati ya Mutara na Cyilima hacagamo Ingoma eshatu mbere y’uko Cyilima atangiza ikindi cyiciro cy’Abami. Inshingano z’abami Kigeli na Mibambwe zabaga ari ukwagura u Rwanda kuko ku ngoma eshatu zabaga zarabanje Inka n’Abantu byabaga byaragwiriye bityo hakaba haragombaga kuboneka uruhumekero habayeho kwagura ubutaka bw’igihugu. Yuhi  yari ashinzwe imihango y’i Bwami cyane cyane Umuriro waho utarazimaga ukaba wararangaga ubusugire bw’igihugu. Aha murumva ko Yuhi yari ashinzwe gutunganya ibijyanye n’ubusugire bw’igihugu n’ibijyanye n’imiyoborere myiza kimwe n’Iyobokamana kugira ngo abandi bami bane babone urufatiro rukomeye bazubakiraho. Ubwo hari aho bitaniye cyane n’ibikorwa ubu mu igenamigambi rirerire? Yaba Yuhi, Kigeli na Mibambwe uko ari batatu babanzirizwaga kandi bagaherukwa na Mutara cyangwa na Cyilima. Musenyeri Kagame yaragaragaje ko mu Rwanda Ingoma eshatu zamaraga imyaka 100 kuko buri yose yari imyaka yegereye 33. Mbese ni ukuvugako kuva Mutara cyangwa Cyilima batanze kugera hongera kwima undi Mutara cyangwa undi Cyilima; muri rusange habaga hashize imyaka 100.  Umuhango wo kwaka Umutima w’Ingoma 
 Mutara na Cyilima bari Abami b’Inka kandi bagombaga kugira umuhango ukomeye wo mu Bwiru bakoraga ujyanye n’icyerekezo cy’u Rwanda mu ngoma eshatu zigiye gukurikiraho. Niwo  mu Bwiru bita “Inzira y’Ishora”. Hari umuhango baheragaho wo kuvugurura Ingoma z’ibwami nka Kalinga, Cyimumugizi, Kiragutse na Mpatsibihugu.  Barebaga niba mu myaka hafi ijana ishize nta kibazo izo ngoma zagize kugira ngo bibaye ngombwa babe basisazura cyangwa se ngo bazisimbuze izindi. Iyo basangaga izo ngoma zikiri nzima cyangwa bagasanga zigomba gusimbuzwa; byanze bikunze bagombaga kuziha icyo bitaga “kuziha imitima mishya”. Iyo mihango yo kubonera Ingoma z’ingabe  imitima, imwe bayikoreraga ahitwa i Karama ku murwa wa Kigali hariya ku musozi  wa Mont Kigali aho bavuga ko mu mirwa yose y’Abami  umurwa wa Kigali  ari wo wari Imfura y’imirwa yose y’Abami. Aho i Karama bahajyaga baje kuhatora imitima y’Ingoma z’ingabe arizo Cyiragutse, Cyimumugizi, Mpatsibihugu na Kalinga. Mu gihe ingoma Kalinga yari Ingabe y’ubwami bw’u Rwanda, ziriya zindi uko ari eshatu zo bigaragara ko zari ingabe za buri mwami muri bariya Bami batatu bari hagati ya Mutara na Cyilima.  Bishoboka ko Cyiragutse ari ingabe ya Mibambwe maze Mpatsibihugu ikaba iya Kigeli bitewe n’uko bose bari bashinzwe kwagura u Rwanda nk’uko amazina y’izo ngoma abigaragaza. Cyimumugizi ikaba ingabe ya Yuhi kuko ariwe wari ushinzwe imihango y’ubwami bw’u Rwanda nk’uko na none izina ryayo ribigaragaza. Ibi rero ubona bimeze nka bya bindi by’Umwami Salomo wo muri Bibiliya igihe yajyaga gutambira ku musozi wa Gabaon nk’uko tubisoma mu 2 Abami 3:1-14. Ubwo Salomo yariho atamba Imana yaramubonekeye imubwira kuyisaba icyo ashaka maze Salomo ayisaba ubwenge kugira ngo agire ubushishozi bwo kuyobora ishyanga rya Israel. Uriya muhango wa Salomo wo gusaba Imana ubwenge (Umutima) bari ku musozi muremure nk’uwa Kigali urasa cyane n’ibyo Abiru b’i Rwanda bakoraga bafatanije n’Umwami nk’uko tugiye kubibona. Iyo rero Abiru n’abandi banyamihango bageraga ku murwa wa Kigali babaga bazanye:  Umutsobe w’isugi, Umukobwa w’isugi n’Umwenenyabirungu w’isugi, bakazana amata, inzoga n’imbuto bagatereka aho. Hanyuma rero bendaga ya mata na za nzoga bagakozamo icyuhagiro icyarimwe bakuhagira igiti cy’umurama (ngo gitere uburame) babaga bazanye maze Umutsobe mukuru agapfukama agasenga avuga aya magambo:   Gahorane Imana Kigali.
           Tuje kwenda imitima y’ingoma
           Ngo Umwami mu Rwanda agire umutima
           Ingoma mu Rwanda zigire umutima
          Abagabo mu Rwanda bagire umutima
          Abagore  mu Rwanda bagire umutima
          Inka mu Rwanda zigire umutima
         U Rwanda rwose rugire umutima. Aha murabona ko niba Ingoma y’Ingabe y’u Rwanda ari yo Kalinga iyo ibonye Umutima ugereranya Ubwenge n’Ubushishozi, Umwami wayimye nawe aba abonye umutima. Na none Ingoma z’Abami ari zo Cyimumugizi, Kiragutse na Mpatsibihugu iyo zibonye umutima, ni ubutegetsi bw’imyaka ijana bw’Abami Kigeli, Mibambwe na Yuhi burangwa n’umutima. Uwo mutima rero ni wo ugera mu baturage no mu nka. Ibyo birangira ari u Rwanda rwose rubonye umutima kugira ngo rubone kuba umurame. Ibyo bimeze nk’uko Umwami Salomo yasabye ubwenge Imana ikamushima ikamubwira ko izamuha n’ibyo atasabye nko kurama, ubukire, amahoro no kunesha abanzi bitewe n’uko yahisemo neza. Ibyo Imana yamusezeranyije byose bimeze nk’ibyo Abanyarwanda bizeraga kubona bamaze kubona Umutima w’Ingoma. Dore uko uduce tw’ubwiru dukurikira tubivuga:  Uri umurame umwami abe umurame
       Ingoma mu Rwanda zibe umurame 
       Abagabo b’i Rwanda babe umurame
       Abagore b’iRwanda babe umurame
      Inka mu Rwanda zibe umurame
       U Rwanda rwose  rube umurame Nyuma rero yo kubona umutima no kubona uburame; ibyo ntabwo byari  bihagije  kuko  u Rwanda rwose rwagombaga  kuzira ubusembwa, kuvogerwa  no guhumana  ari byo bishushanywa na ba bantu b’amasugi bazanye. Ubusanzwe umuntu w’isugi ni umuntu ugifite ababyeyi bombi cyangwa umukobwa utarasambanyijwe. Muri ya masengesho y’Umutsobe mukuru yakomezaga agira ati:  Aya ni amasugi umwami abe isugi
      Ingoma i Rwanda zibe amasugi
     Abagabo i Rwanda babe amasugi
     Abagore mu Rwanda babe amasugi
     Inka i Rwanda zibe amasugi
    U Rwanda rwose ruhorane amasugi
 Usibye imihango yo mu bwiru yo gusabira u Rwanda rwose umutima, uburame n’ubusugire, mu magambo amwe n’ayo tubonye hejuru, na none icyerekezo cyari ukugira ubuhoro (amahoro) mu Rwanda rw’Umwami.   Umwami w’i Rwanda agira ubuhoro
  Ingoma z’i Rwanda zigira ubuhoro,
  Abagabo b’i Rwanda bagira ubuhoro
  Abagore b’i Rwanda bagira ubuhoro
  Inka z’i Rwanda zigira ubuhoro
  U Rwanda rwose rugira ubuhoro Nyuma y’ibyo byose u Rwanda rukagira uburumbuke bw’amata, ubuki n’inturire.  Ibyo nabyo babivugaga mu mugambo ahwanye n’ayo hejuru bati  Ng’aya amata n’ubuki
Kugira ngo Umwami agire amata n’ubuki
Ingoma mu Rwanda zigire amata nubuki 
Abagabo bagire amata n’ubuki 
Abagore bagire amata n’ubuki 
Inka mu Rwanda zigire amata n’ubuki. Nyuma y’ibi, hazaga amasengesho yo gucyamura (gukebura) amahanga yose adatura umwami w’u Rwanda. Dore amagambo bavugaga muri ubwo Bwiru:   Twacyamura u Burundi ku ngoma
    Twacyamura u Bushubi ku ngoma
   Twacyamura u Bunyabungo ku ngoma
   Amahanga yose adatura umwami w’u Rwanda
   Twayacyamura Ibi twabigereranya na diporomasi y’ubu iba igamije  gutuma amahanga yandi ayoboka iby’igihugu cyawe. Amahame remezo y’u Rwanda gakondo
 Iyi  mihango yakorwaga n’Abami bitwa Mutara na Cyilima hari ibintu idusobanurira neza bigatuma tumenya  Ihame-ngengabitekerezo ryubatse u Rwanda rikaruha Indangagaciro. Ihame-ngengabitekerezo ni ryo soko y’ibikorwa n’imyitwarire by’umuntu cyangwa by’ikigo biturukamo. Ni yo mpamvu nta muntu, nta kigo, nta shyaka nta n’ishyanga byabaho bidafite Ihame-ngenga-bitekerezo ababigize bagenderaho.  Ku gihugu Ihame-ngengabitekerezo ni ryo rigena kandi rikagenga Indangagaciro na Kirazira by’igihugu! None abakurambere baturaze u Rwanda barwubatse babikuye ku rihe hame-ngengabitekerezo ukurikije ibyo tumaze kubona? Ihame-ngengabitekerezo rya mbere ryagenaga kandi rikagenga ibyo mu Rwanda byose; ni iritumenyesha icyo u “Rwanda rwose” ari cyo: “u Rwanda rwose” ntabwo ari ubutaka bwose bw’aho twita mu Rwanda gusa; ahubwo ni ahantu hari: Ingoma-Umwami -Abagabo -Abagore-Inka. Ibi rero ni nabyo byerekana ibyo twabonye by’Ibanga ry’Umwami n’Ingoma, n’Ibanga ry’Inka n’Ingabo. Aha icya mbere kigomba kumvikana mu Ihame ngenga-bitekerezo ry’abahanze u Rwanda,  ni uko ahantu hose ku isi hari kuba haboneka Umwami wimye Ingoma-ngabe yahawe umutima, hakaboneka Abagabo n’Abagore ndetse n’Inka, habashaga  kuboneka  u “Rwanda rwose.”Kimwe n’uko ibyo byose uwari kubivana ku butaka bw’u Rwanda haba hatakaje kuba “u Rwanda rwose.” Impamvu ni ko ikihagira u Rwanda rwose ari izi ndangagaciro z’Abanyarwanda zihari tuzi ko izo ndangagaciro zari zubakiye ku Mana, Inka n’Ingoma. Nk’uko Umwami   yabaga ahatswe n’Ingoma maze Ingabo (Abaturage) nazo zikaba zihatswe n’Umwami; ni nako u Rwanda rwose rwabaga ruhatswe n’Imana bitewe n’uko Ingoma yimye u Rwanda ari Imana yayihaye umutima. Nk’uko Inka ihaka isabwa kubyara icyo ihatse; ni nako Imana ihatse u Rwanda na yo isabwa guhora irubyara (irugoboka). Burya mu Kinyarwanda ijambo“gusenga” risobanuye gukesha byose uguhatse! Ni yo mpamvu usanga n’isengesho gakondo ryo gusabira u Rwanda na ryo ari ibyo ryabaga ryerekejeho. Nimwongere murebe amagambo arigize: Seka seka gasani k’i Rwanda 
Rusekere rugubwe neza
Rusenderezemo amahoro n’amahe
Rutsindire ubukenya n’ubugingo buke
Rutsindire ubusame n’ubusharire
Rutsindire icyago n’icyagane
Rutsindire nyamunsi n’intumwa yayo 
Rutsindire umwanzi wo mu kirambi
N’umurozi uvuka ishyanga
Garika ibiganza utugabire 
Rugaba, Rugabo, Rwagisha
Maze twishyuke mu Rwanda umu.  Ihame-ngengabitekerezo ry’abahanze u Rwanda ni ukugira Ishyanga aho Umwami yima Ingoma-ngabe yahawe umutima (ubushishozi) n’Imana, maze ingoma (reigns) zikagira umutima (ubushishozi) bigatuma Ingabo z’Umwami (Abagabo n’Abagore) nabo bagira umutima  uzagera no ku nka na zo zikagira umutima (wo gukamwa no konsa izazo). Murabona neza ko uru ari uruhererekane rw’Umutima uva ku MANA ukagera mu Mwami unyuze mu NGOMA-NGABE maze ukarangiriza mu NKA unyuze mu ngabo (Abagabo n’Abagore). Uru ruhererekane kandi ni rwo rwahoze rukoze “umutima w’u Rwanda rwose”. Byongeye kandi u Rwanda rwose iyo rwabaga rubonye umutima; ni byo na none byateraga igihugu kugira uburame, ubusugire, ubuhoro n’uburumbuke ndetse no kugarura amahanga adatura u Rwanda. Ibi rero abakurambere bacu bakoraga kera ngo bahorane Umutima w’u Rwanda (w’Ubunyarwanda) n’ubu mpamya ko bikenewe. Kubura uwo umutima w’u Rwanda, w’ubunyarwanda ni byo byatumye abanyarwanda bishora mu mahano ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Ngo na Ruganzu Ndoli amaze kubohora u Rwanda amacakubiri yatumye rugirwa ingaruzwamuheto imyaka irenga icumi, yatangiye yigisha umutima w’u Rwanda. Arwanya ba mutima-nda, mutima-rwana, mutima-muke, agakunda cyane mitimi-igwanye (ihuje). Ese ubu abo ba mutima-nda sibo batumye u Rwanda rutabohoka burundu?  Imana tugira ni uko “imiyaga isubiza inyuma indege itwaye abanyarwanda itayibuza kugera iyo ijya” nk’uko Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika aherutse kubyibutsa Abanyarwanda bo mu Rwanda rutugendamo! Naho ibidindiza Ndi Umunyarwanda byo ubanza dukwiye kubirebera mu mizi yabyo mikuru twitabaje amahame-remezo yagengaga ishyaka ry’u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda. Ibitekerezo bya Gérard Nyirimanzi na Nyirishema Célestin, Abacukumbuzi b’Ireme ry’Umuco n’Amateka by’u Rwanda. Babikuye mu Ubwiru, Inzira y’Ishora, vers 279-310.

title: Kenya: Umwongereza yafotoye inzovu idasanzwe iri mu zakendereye muri Afurika
content: Iyi nzovu yiswe ‘Elephant Queen’, ifite umubyimba udasanzwe, amahembe yayo ni maremire ku buryo agenda ikora hasi. Abahanga mu by’imibereho y’inyamaswa zo mu gasozi bavuga ko muri Afurika habarizwa izitarenze 30. Will Burrard-Lucas yayifotoreye muri Pariki y’Igihugu ya Tsavo muri Kenya; yafatanyije n’Umuryango udaharanira Inyungu wa Tsavo Trust nk’uburyo bwo gukomeza ubukangurambaga bwo kubungabunga izi nyamaswa. Uyu Mwongereza w’imyaka 36 yabwiye CNN ko “Byari ibihe bidasanzwe. By’umwihariko muri iyi myaka aho inzovu zifite imitonzi miremire zagabanutse.’’ Burrard-Lucas wabaye muri Tanzania mu buto bwe, igihugu gifite pariki nyinshi, bituma yihebera gufotora inyamaswa zo mu gasozi. Amafoto y’inzovu yayafashe yifashishije camera ikoranye ikoranabuhanga rimwemerera gufata inyamaswa iri mu ndiri yayo. Ati “Mu myaka yashize nayikoresheje ku mishinga itandukanye, no kuri uyu nabikoze nk’uburyo bwo kugaragaza ingano y’izi nyamaswa.’’ “Ndizera ko abantu bagira ishyaka ryo kwita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima kandi bashobora gushyigikira imiryango nka Tsavo Trust itanga umusanzu mu kurinda izi nyamaswa.’’ Tsavo Trust ikorana n’Ikigo gishinzwe Inyamaswa zo mu Gasozi cya Kenya Wildlife Service mu gutera inkunga ibikorwa byo kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima birimo no guhangana na ba rushimusi. Will Burrard ni we wafotoye igisamagwe cy’umukara agifatiye muri ‘Laikipia Wilderness Camp’ mu Majyaruguru y’Umujyi wa Nairobi muri Kenya nyuma y’imyaka isaga 100, ubwoko bw’iyi nyamaswa busa n’ubwacitse muri Afurika. Aya mafoto yagarutsweho cyane ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yasohowe ku wa 11 Gashyantare 2019. Uyu Mwongereza yashimangiye ko inzovu zifite amahembe maremire zigaragara hake cyane kurusha Igisamagwe cy’umukara.

title: Kigali: Ibiciro bya Lisansi na mazutu byongeye kuzamuka
content: Igiciro cya lisansi na mazutu cyazamutse mu Rwanda nkuko byemejwe na RURA(Urwego Rugenzura Imirimo Ifitiye Igihugu Akamaro), aho ibiciro bishya bizatangira gukoreshwa kuva kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 10 Mutarama, 2018. Mu itangazo RURA yashyize ahagaragara yavuze ko iri zamuka ry’ibiciro rishingiye ku izamuka ry’ibiciro by’ibikomoka kuri peteroli ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Kuri ubu igiciro cya lisanzi i Kigali ngo ntikigomba kurenga amafaranga 1,042frw kuri litiro mu gihe igiciro cya mazutu cyo kitagombakurenga amafaranga 1, 005 Frw kuri litiro. Ibi bivuze ko igiciro muri rusange kiyongereyeho amafaranga 11 y’u Rwanda. Tubibutse ko igiciro cy’ibikomoka kuri peteroli cyaherukaga kuzamuka mu Ugushyingo 2017, aho litiro ya lisansi yageze ku mafaranga y’u Rwanda 1031 ivuye kuri 993 ni ukuvuga ko yinyongereyeho 3.8% naho mazutu ikaba yaraguraga 994 ivuye kuri 954 kuri litiro, izamuka ringana na 4%.

title: Sugira yongeye gucungura Amavubi yasezereye Etiyopiya agakatisha itike ya CHAN 2020
content:
Ikipe y’igihugu y’u Rwanda, Amavubi y’abakina imbere mu gihugu ni imwe mu makipe 16 azaba ari muri Cameroun mu ntangiriro z’umwaka utaha ahazabera igikombe cya Afurika cy’abakina imbere mu bihugu byabo (CHAN2020). Ibi Amavubi yabigezeho yiyushye icyuya nyuma yo kunganyiriza i Kigali na Etiyopiya igitego 1-1 mu mukino wabereye kuri stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 19 Ukwakira 2019 maze ayisezerera ku giteranyo cy’ibitego 2-1 kuko umukino ubanza abasore b’umutoza Mashami Vincent bari babashije gutsindira Etiyopiya iwayo igitego 1-0. Nkuko byagenze mu mukino ubanza, rutahizamu Sugira Ernest ni we waboneye Amavubi igitego cyaruhuye imitima y’abanyarwanda ku munota wa 82 kuko cyazaga kishyura icyo Lemeen Tafesse yari yaboneye Etiyopiya ku munota wa 71 ku makosa ya Manzi Thierry n’umuzamu Kimenyi Yves.

Herve Rugwiro ahetse Sugira
 Ni umukino waranzwe ni uko igice cya mbere ikipe y’igihugu ya Etiyopiya yageragezaga guhanahana neza ikina umupira wo hasi ariko uburyo bukomeye imbere y’izamu bukaremwa n’Amavubi yakoraga bike by’ingenzi ibifashijwemo na kapiteni wayo Haruna Niyonzima. Ku munota wa 13 Nsabimana Eric yahushije igitego cyari cyabazwe ku mupira mwiza yari ahinduriwe na Manishimwe Djabel mu gihe mbere y’uko igice cya mbere kirangira Sugira Ernest nawe yashatse gutungura umuzamu ariko umupira awushyira muri kuroneli. Igice cya kabiri Etiyopiya yaje yahinduye imikinire itangira gukina imipira yihuta itera icyugazi izamu rya Kimenyi Yves kugeza ubwo yabonaga igitego ku munota wa 71cyahise gikangura ndetse gishyira ku gitutu abasore ba Mashami kugeza ubwo Sugira yatabaraga ku mupira mwiza yateye adahagaritse wari uhinduwe na Omborenga Fitina.

Sugira yari yazonze ab’inyuma ba Etiyopiya Amavubi yerekeje muri CHAN ku nshuro ya gatatu yikurikiranije dore ko kuva yayakira mu 2016 akaviramo muri 1/4 atarasiba. Mu 2018 nabwo yabonye itike asezereye Etiyopiya ariko ntiyabasha kurenga imikino yo mu matsinda. Indi nshuro u Rwanda rwitabiriye aya marushanwa ni mu 2011 ubwo ryaberaga muri Sudani naho mu nshuro esheshatu rimaze gukinwa akaba ari inshuro ebyri gusa rutabonye itike harimo ubwo ryakinwaga bwa mbere mu 2009 no mu 2014.

Nyuma y’umukino abafana bahaye Sugira amafaranga Kugeza ubu ibintu ni byiza k’umutoza Mashami Vincent uri kugenda akora neza inshingano yari yahawe mu masezerano y’amezi atatu aho amaze kugera kuri bibiri muri bitatu yasabwaga ari byo gusezerera ibirwa bya Seychelles agashyira u Rwanda mu matsinda yo guhatanira itike y’igikombe cy’isi no gusezerera Etiyopiya akabona itike ya CHAN. Ubu hakaba hasigaye kureba uko azitwara mu kwezi gutaha ari nako kwa nyuma mu masezerano ye aho asabwa kubona byibuze amanota ane mu mikino ibiri yo gushaka itike yo kwerekeza mu gikombe cya Afurika (CAN) kizabera muri Cameroun mu 2021 aho azasura Mozambique ku ya 14 Ugushyingo, akanakira Cameroun i Kigali ku ya 19 maze yabyitwaramo neza agahita ahabwa amasezerano y’igihe kirekire.

title: Ukuri kwambaye ubusa ku itoroka ry’abakinnyi umunani b’itorero inganzo ngari n’indahiro babanje kurahira[REBA AMAFOTO]
content:
Ku wa 14 Gicurasi, abasore n’inkumi 20 bagize Itorero Inganzo Ngari bahagurutse mu Rwanda berekeza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bitabiriye Iserukiramuco Nyafurika ry’Imbyino rizwi nka Dance Africa Festival. Iri serukiramuco ritegurwa n’Ikigo cya Brooklyn Academy of Music. Kugira ngo itorero ryitabire haba habayeho gukora igenzura mu bihugu byose bya Afurika hagatoranya kimwe kizaserukirwa. U Rwanda nyuma yo kwemeza ko aricyo gihugu kizahagararira Afurika, abagize itsinda ritegura iri serukiramuco basuye amatorero yo mu gihugu bareba imikorere yayo, baza kwemeza ko Inganzo Ngari ariyo izahagararira u Rwanda. Hari ku nshuro ya 42 iri serukiramuco ryari ribaye. Ku wa 14 Gicurasi 2019 nibwo iri torero ryahagurutse i Kigali ariko mbere yo kugenda, 20 bari baserutse babanje guhabwa ibiganiro birimo indangagaciro zikwiye kuranga umunyarwanda, kirazira ndetse n’umuco w’ubutore. Ni ibiganiro bahawe na Perezida w’Itorero ry’Igihugu, Bamporiki Edouard hamwe na Senateri Tito Rutaremara, ndetse aho muri icyo gikorwa uko ari 20 bagombaga kujya muri Amerika, bamaze kwigishwa barahiriye kuzubahiriza inshingano zabo ndetse no kuzagaruka mu gihugu cyabo, bakanabisinyira imbere ya noteri. Buri wese yarahiraga agira ati “Maze kumva ibyo amategeko agenda urugendo rw’Inganzo Ngari muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ndahiriye imbere y’Imana ishobora byose n’iri koraniro, ko nzubahiriza amasezerano ngiranye n’itorero, ko nzitwara neza ngendeye ku ndangagaciro zibereye umunyarwanda,” “ko ntazakoza isoni itorero muri iki gikorwa harimo no gusubira mu gihugu cyambyaye u Rwanda, nindenga kuri aya masezerano nzakurikiranwe n’amategeko.” Muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ryabombaga gukora ibitaramo bitanu no kwigisha abana bakiri bato ibijyanye no kubyina bya kinyarwanda ; ni ibikorwa byose byagombaga kubera muri Leta ya New York. Kugira ngo ibi bitaramo bigende neza, hari hateganyijwe ko mbere yabyo, hazabanza icyumweru cy’imyitozo y’umukino ugaragaza amateka y’u Rwanda. Umuyobozi w’Itorero Inganzo Ngari, Alain Nzeyimana, yabwiye umunyamakuru ko wari umukino uvuga ku Rwanda mbere y’Abakoloni, mu gihe cyabo uko babibye amacakubiri n’urwango mu banyarwanda bikageza kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi na nyuma y’ayo uko rwiyubatse. Ati “Umukino warangiraga duhamagarira abantu kuza gusura igihugu cyacu, cyane ko abanyamerika bari baraje hano babonye ibyiza by’u Rwanda bakora umukino bashingiye ku byabaye. Bize amateka y’igihugu baragenda bayakorera umukino.” Ni umukino wakinwe n’amatsinda ane, yose hamwe yabaga agizwe n’abantu 80. Nzeyimana yakomeje avuga ko ari umukino wanyuze benshi, ku buryo hari abafatwaga n’amarangamutima bakarira badashaka ko urangira, bikanashimangirwa n’ubwitabire bwaranze ibi bitaramo aho nibura kimwe cyabaga kirimo abantu bagera ku bihumbi 10. Ati “Hari ibinyamakuru byinshi byawanditseho, bigaragaza u Rwanda mu isura nshya, bagaragaza ubwiyunge bwabayeho mu Banyarwanda, bumvaga ko bidashoboka ariko uwo mukino, barebye amateka yose, babasha kumva imbaraga abanyarwanda bakoresheje nyuma y’imyaka 25 ishize. Icyo ni cyo kintu kizima cyasigaye mu mitwe y’abanyamerika.” Amissa Umuhoza umwe mu babyinnyi umunani b’Itorero Inganzo Ngari watorotse. We yatandukaniye n’abandi ku Kibuga cy’Indege bari mu nzira bagaruka mu Rwanda
Uko ababyinnyi umunani batorotse Mu itsinda ryagarutse mu Rwanda mu mpera za Gicurasi, haburaga 8 mu bakinnyi 20 bari baragiye. Abatorotse uko ari umunani, nta n’umwe wari umaze muri iri torero imyaka iri munsi y’ibiri. Umuto muri bo mu myaka ni Gasigwa Emmanuel wavutse mu 1996 mu gihe umukuru ari Hategekimana Ismael wavutse mu 1981. Abandi ni Mukashyaka Clarisse, Nsabimana Aloys, Uwizerwa Albert, Uwitonze Dieudonne, Umuhoza Amissa, Ntwarabashi Salvan na Gasigwa Emmanuel. Nzeyimana yavuze ko nyuma y’iminsi ibiri bageze muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aribwo umukobwa wa mbere yabuze, hashize iminsi itatu abandi babiri baragenda bisa n’aho hacitse igikuba. Ati “Twagerageje kwisuganya tuganira n’itorero, nk’umuntu wari ubayoboye ndababwira nti mu by’ukuri hari igikorwa cyatuzanye, turi hano duhagarariye Afurika, duhagarariye u Rwanda mugerageze mwumve uburemere bw’akazi dufite.” Yavuze ko kuva kuri uwo munsi abari basigaye bamwumviye ku buryo nta wundi wigeze uva mu itsinda ryari risigaye, hatangira ibikorwa byo gushaka abaziba icyuho, haboneka umwe mu bigeze kuba muri iri torero uba muri Amerika ubu. Nyuma y’ibitaramo igihe cyo gutaha kigeze ku wa 28 Gicurasi, mu gitondo bazindutse bajya gushaka ibyo bari bucyure mu Rwanda, bigeze mu masaha yo gufata ifunguro uwa kane nawe arabura. Abandi ubwo bageraga ku kibuga cy’indege bitegura kugaruka mu Rwanda, ako kanya abandi batatu baragiye hasigara itsinda ry’abantu 13, undi umwe aza kubura yamaze kwinjira mu Kibuga cy’indege. Ati “Twamaze amasaha abiri ku kibuga cy’indege dutegereje, muri ayo masaha abiri ntabwo tuzi igihe undi yagendeye kuko twamubuze tugeze mu ndege. Twageze mu ndege turi abantu 12, turamushaka turamubura.” Mu munani batorotse, umwe niwe wasigaranye Pasiporo Ubwo iri tsinda ryageraga muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, abategura irushanwa bagize impungege hakiri kare ko hari abashobora gutoroka maze bose bamburwa pasiporo bakazajya bagendera ku ikarita igaragaza ko baje mu iserukiramuco. Ku munsi wa nyuma ubwo bari bageze ku kibuga cy’indege bataha, nibwo basubijwe pasiporo, usibye uwatorotse yamaze kwinjira mu kibuga cy’indege wari wayisubijwe. Ubu pasiporo za barindwi basigaye muri Amerika zasigaranywe n’itsinda ryateguraga iri serukiramuco aho rigomba kuzishyikiriza Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nzeyimana avuga ko ababashije kugaruka mu Rwanda bagaragaje ubutwari kuko wasangaga benshi bashaka kuguma muri iki gihugu ariko bakagaragaza ko bahasigara ari uko bafite ibyangombwa bibibemerera aho gutoroka. Yasabye imbabazi abanyarwanda ku bwo kuba muri iri tsinda yari ayoboye harabonetsemo ibigwari byambitse isura mbi igihugu, avuga ko icyiza ari uko ubutumwa bwatanzwe mu mukino buruta kure igisebo cyatewe n’abatorotse. Ati “Hari ikindi twubatse muri ayo mahanga, abo batorotse byamenyekanye ku rwego rw’ikigo twatumiwemo ariko ubutumwa twatanze, bwakwiriye mu banyamerika benshi kurusha ubutumwa bubi bw’abacitse. Icyiza cyaruse ikibi cyabayeho.” Ni ku nshuro ya mbere ababyinnyi b’iri torero batorotse baserukiye igihugu mu mahanga. Iri torero ryashinzwe mu 2006, ubu rifite abanyamuryango bagera kuri 80. MUHABURA.RW

title: Imikino itanu ya shampiyona mu mupira w’amaguru mu Butaliyani yasubitswe
content: Imikino itanu ya shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere mu mupira w’amaguru mu Butaliyani, Serie A, yari iteganyijwe kuba mu mpera y’iki cyumweru yasubitswe kubera coronavirus, harimo n’umukino Juventus yari kwakiramo Inter Milan. Imikino ya Udinese, AC Milan, Parma na Sassuolo na yo yasubitswe kubera ubu bwoko bushya bwa coronavirus mu Butaliyani. Mbere byari byatangajwe ko iyo mikino izakinwa nta bafana bari ku kibuga, ariko ubuyobozi bwa shampiyona ya Serie A mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa gatandatu bwafashe icyemezo cyo kuyisubika. Uko ari itanu yimuriwe ku wa gatatu ku itariki ya 13 z’ukwa gatanu uyu mwaka. Kubera iyo mpamvu, umukino wa nyuma w’igikombe cy’Ubutaliyani, Coppa Italia, wari uteganyijwe kuba kuri uwo munsi wimuriwe mu cyumweru gikurikiyeho, ku wa gatatu ku itariki ya 20 z’ukwa gatanu. Hazaba habura iminsi ine ngo umwaka w’imikino wo mu Butaliyani urangire.
