Ubutaliyani bwahagaritse ubuzima mu mijyi yo mu majyaruguru y’igihugu nyuma yaho abantu barenga 400 bemejwe ko banduye coronavirus naho abandi 12 ikabica. Gusubikwa kw’iyo mikino kuje gukurikira ibyabaye mu mpera y’icyumweru gishize ubwo imikino ine yo muri Serie A i Milan, Bergamo, Verona n’i Turin yahagarikwaga ndetse n’ikipe ya Cremonese yo muri Serie B igakora urugendo rw’imodoka rwa kilometero zigera kuri 482 ijya ku kibuga cy’ikipe ya Ascoli, yahagera igahita isubizwa iwayo. Ndetse no ku wa kane, umukino wa Europa League Inter Milan yatsinzemo Ludogorets ibitego 2 - 1 na wo wakinwe nta bafana bari ku kibuga cya San Siro. Imikino yo muri iyi mpera y’icyumweru y’amakipe ya Lazio, Napoli, Lecce na Cagliari izaba nta gihindutse hari abafana nkuko bisanzwe, ariko umukino wa Sampdoria wo ku wa mbere wo ntabwo urafatwaho icyemezo. Niyomugabo Albert

title: Abanyarwanda baba muri Norvège bibutse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
content: Umuhango wo kwibuka kuri iyi nshuro wabaye mu buryo budasanzwe bitewe n’ingamba zafashwe n’ibihugu bitandukanye ku Isi zo kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus. Muri Norvège, iki gikorwa cyateguwe n’Umuryango Urukundo w’Abanyarwanda baba muri Norvège usanzwe utegura igikorwa cyo kwibuka. Kuri iyi nshuro umuhango wo kwibuka wabaye hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, wanyujijwe kuri Page ya Facebook ya “Urukundo Rwandisk Organisasjon – Norway’’ no kuri WhatsApp group “Kwibuka #26 Norway”. Wakurikiwe n’abantu 262. Uyu muhango watangijwe hatangwa ubutumwa bwo kwibuka no kwihanganishanya ndetse n’isengesho rya Pasiteri Aloys Munyeshyaka uba Norvège. Abawitabiriye banakurikiye ubutumwa bw’ijambo ry’umukuru w’igihugu rijyanye n’umunsi wo kwibuka, ryakurikiwe n’umuhango wo kwenyegeza urumuri rw’icyizere no gushyira indabo ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ruri ku Gisozi ku wa 7 Mata 2020. Perezida w’Umuryango Urukundo, Muhigana Marie Chantal, ni we watangije igikorwa cyo kwibuka muri Norvège, ari iwe mu rugo bitewe n’ingamba zo kwirinda Coronavirus. Yashimiye abaharanira ko Jenoside itagira abayipfobya barebera kuko bitinza umurindi ingengabitekerezo yayo. Ati “Ndashimira mwese muzirikana ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ari icyaha ndengakamere, mwese muharanira iteka kurwanya no kuvuguruza abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, kuko gupfobya ari uburyo bwo kuyikomeza no gukomeretsa abayirokotse.’’ Yavuze ko urumuri rw’icyizere rushushanya urukundo, imbaraga n’ukwigira byaranze abarokotse Jenoside n’icyizere cyo gukomeza kubaho no kwirinda ko yakongeraho kubaho ukundi. Yagize ati “Dufite inshingano zo kwigisha abato amateka kugira ngo bajye bahora baharanira ko ibyabaye bitazasubira ukundi. Tugomba guharanira ko tutazazima.’’ Mu butumwa bwatanzwe n’abana bato na bo bashimangiye ko bidakwiye ko abantu bazira uko bavutse. Umwe yagize ati “Turibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ni akaga. Abantu ntibakwiye gupfa kubera abo bari bo. Tuzaharanira ko bitazongera kubaho ukundi.’’ Perezida w’ Ihuriro ry’abanyarwanda baba muri Norvège (ARC-Norway), Mugisha Peter, yavuze ko uyu mwaka kwibuka byakozwe mu buryo budasanzwe ariko bihora ari ngombwa. Yagize ati “Turibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Twibuke twiyubaka. Uyu ni umunsi ukomeye, ubaye mu bihe bidasanzwe. Kwibuka biri mu nshingano za buri wese. Ni ngombwa kwibuka abatuvuyemo no kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside kuko hari abashaka kuyihindura uko bishakiye.’’ Abitabiriye iki gikorwa banasangijwe ubuhamya na Muhire Veronique. Uyu Munyarwandakazi wagize amahirwe yo kuba akiriho, ahamya ko Jenoside y’Abatutsi yatangiye mu 1959, igasozwa mu 1994. Yatanze ubuhamya bw’uburyo inkuru y’ihanurwa ry’indege yabasanze bicaye mu nzu, bavuga ko bashize. Ati “Twahise tuzimya televiziyo, abakuru turarira.’’ Yaje guhungira kuri St Paul mu Mujyi wa Kigali aza no kuharokokera nyuma yo kwisanga mu maboko y’Inkotanyi mu ijoro ryo ku wa 16 rishyira 17 Kamena 1994. Hanatanzwe ubuhamya bwa Umugiraneza Léontine warokotse Jenoside. Bwakurikiwe n’ubutumwa bw’abana bwihanganisha ababyeyi babo bunizeza kuzaharanira u Rwanda rwiza ruzira Jenoside ukundi. Mu gihe ibikorwa byo kwibuka bizamara iminsi 100, haracyatangwa ubutumwa bunyuze mu biganiro bijyanye no kwibuka, ubutumwa bwihanganishanya cyane cyane ko nta gusurana, ku buryo usanga abantu bari hamwe. Umuhango wo kwibuka wasojwe n’igikorwa cyo gukusanya inkunga izafasha Intwaza n’abandi bacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside bafite n’ubumuga bunyuranye.

title: Perezida Kagame yishimiye ko mugenzi we Ali Bongo wa Gabon yorohewe (Amafoto)
content: Perezida Kagame yabigaragaje kuri uyu wa Mbere ku munsi wa mbere w’uruzinduko rwe rw’iminsi ibiri i Libreville muri Gabon. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru ryo muri Gabon, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko yaje gukomeza gutsura umubano mwiza uri hagati y’ibihugu byombi no gusura mugenzi we Ali Bongo uri koroherwa nyuma y’igihe arwaye. Mu Ukwakira umwaka ushize nibwo Perezida Bongo yajyanywe mu bitaro i Riyadh muri Arabie Saoudite nyuma yo gufatwa n’indwara yo kwangirika kw’imitsi y’ubwonko. Muri Mutarama yasubiye mu gihugu cye amaze koroherwa, akomeza gukurikiranirwa hafi n’abaganga. Perezida Kagame yavuze ko bishimishije kuba Bongo yarorohewe akanasubira mu nshingano ze. Yagize ati “Nishimiye kuza hano muri Gabon gukomeza inzira yo kwimakaza umubano uri hagati ya Gabon n’u Rwanda. Ni n’umwanya kuri njye wo gusura mugenzi wanjye wari umaze igihe arwaye. Nishimiye ko yorohewe akanakomeza inshingano ze.” Yakomeje agira ati “Mu muco w’abanyafurika, inshuti dusurana mu bihe byiza no mu bibi.” Perezida Kagame yavuze ko Gabon, by’umwihariko Perezida Bongo yagiye agira uruhare runini mu gushyigikira intego zigamije guteza imbere Afurika. Ati “Gabon yagiye iharanira inyungu za Afurika, icyerecyezo n’ingamba zigamije kugera kuri icyo cyerecyezo. Perezida Bongo yagize uruhare runini mu gukorana n’abandi bayobozi ku mugabane wacu, mu kuzamura urwego rw’iterambere ryacu”. Mu kwezi gutaha nibwo byitezwe ko muri Afurika hazatangizwa ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’amasezerano ashyiraho isoko rusange rya Afurika. Gabon iri mu bihugu 44 byashyize umukono ku masezerano ashyiraho isoko rusange ry’ibihugu bihurira mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe, AU, azwi nka AfCFTA. Ibihugu 22 bisabwa kuyemeza burundu ngo ashyirwe mu bikorwa byarabonetse ndetse biteganyijwe ko mu kwezi gutaha azatangizwa ku mugaragaro. Agaruka kuri ayo masezerano, Perezida Kagame yabwiye abanyamakuru ko ibihugu byose bya Afurika bizi akamaro kayo ku buryo n’ibitarayasinya bizabikora. Ati “N’ibihugu bitarayemeza burundu si uko bitabona inyungu cyangwa ngo bibone ko ari ngombwa ahubwo biracyafite ingorane mu bijyanye n’amategeko n’ibindi  bya tekiniki bagomba kubanza gukemura mbere yo kuyashyira mu bikorwa.” Yagarutse kandi ku muti watuma amakimbirane ahora agaragara hirya no hino muri Afurika acika, avuga ko bisaba ubufatanye bw’ibihugu bigize uwo mugabane. U Rwanda na Gabon bisanzwe bifitanye umubano mwiza. Byombi bihuriye mu Muryango w’Ubukungu bw’Ibihugu bya Afurika yo Hagati, CEEAC. U Rwanda na Gabon basinyanye amasezerano y’imikoranire mu 1976, aza kuvugururwa mu 2010. Bifitanye ubuhahirane buhagaze neza dore ko indege ya RwandAir ikorera ingendo mu Mujyi wa Libreville. Muri Kamena 2016 ibihugu byombi byakuyeho amafaranga yacibwaga umuntu ukoresheje umurongo wa telefoni mu guhamagara hagati yabyo.

title: Diamond Platnumz na Rayvanny barashinjwa gushishuru indirimbo ’Tetema’
content:
Mu gihe abahanzi b’abanyarwanda bakunze gushinjwa gushishura cyangwa kwigana indirimbo z’abandi,noneho Diamond Platnumz na Rayvanny abahanzi bo mu gihugu cya Tanzania nabo barashinjwa gushishura indirimbo ‘Tetema’ basohoye mu minsi ine ishize. Iyi ndirimbo nshya Tetema aba bahanzi bayisohoye ku wa 6 Gashyantare 2019, bityo mu minsi ine imaze igiye hanze,kubera ukuntu ikunzwe imaze kurebwa n’abasaga miliyoni ebyiri kandi ari igishishwa cyakomotse ku bihangano by’abandi bahanzi babiri aribo Olamide na Tyler the Creator. Nk’uko byagiye bigaragazwa n’abakoresha imbugankoranyambaga, iyi ndirimbo ya Diamond na Rayvanny bayishishuye umuhanzi Tyler the Creator n’indirimbo ye ’See You Again’. Muri iyi ndirimbo uhereye ku masegonda 15 y’iyi ndirimbo ya Diamond na Rayvanny, hari amwe mu magambo ahura mu bitero, cyane cyane ku mashusho yayo,aho aba basore bakoresheje itsinda ry’Ababyinnyi bambaye imipira y’imyeru n’ingofero zitukura, batambuka bari ku mirongo inyuma yabo haparitse indege, amashusho asa neza neza 100% n’ayo mu ndirimbo ‘See you Again” ya Tyler the Creator yasohoye umwaka ushize. Iki kinyamakuru Hakawutungu gikomeza gitangaza ko muri iyi ndirimbo ya Diamond na mugenzi we harimo ingoma (beat) bibye mu ndirimbo y’undi muhanzi.Ingoma zirimo zivuga neza neza nk’iziri mu ndirimbo ’Motigbana’ ya Olamidi yasohoye umwaka ushize. Kuri ubu aba bashinjwa ubujura bwo gushishura aribo Diamond na mugenzi we bakaba ntacyo baratangaza kuri ibi bashinjwa dore ko iyi ndirimbo yabo ifite ibitekerezo byayitanzweho bisaga 8000, bamwe bagaruka kuri ubu bujura bwakozwe n’aba basore bafatwaga nk’abahanga mu kwikorera ibyabo none nabo bafatanywe igihanaga.

 Tyler the Creator amashusho y’indirimbo ye ’See You Again’ ni foto kopi ya Tetema
Uyu muhanzi Olamide beat(ingoma) y’indirimbo ye ’Motigbana’ niyo yakoreshejwe muri Tetema
Niyomugabo Albert/MUHABURA.RW

title: Ibintu 5 utari uzi kuri Jasmine V wahoze ari umukunzi wa Justin Bieber
content:
Jasmine V w’imyaka 21 yatangaje inkuru nziza ko atwite inda y’amezi atandatu nyuma y’aho atanduakaniye na Justin Bieber, uyu akaba ari umwana we wa mbere azaba abyaye. Uyu mukobwa atandukanye cyane n’abandi bakobwa ni nayo mpamvu twifashishije urubuga rwa hollywoodlife twabateguriye ibintu 5 ukwiye kumenya kuri uyu mukobwa Jasmine V. 1. Jasmine V yagaragaye mu mashusho y’indirimbo nyinshi  
Urugero rw’izo ndirimbo ni iya Kanye west yitwa Jesus walks, iya Kingston yitwa Eenie Meenie


2. Yatandukanye n’inshuti ye ya mbere ku myaka 11
Uyu muhanzikazi agifite imyaka 11 y’amavuko gusa nibwo yaje gutandukana n’uwari umukunzi we wo mu bwana


3. Abafana be bitwa Jasminators
Uyu muhanzikazi ni umwe mubafite abakunzi benshi cyane kuri konti ye ya YouTube bakaba barenga milliyoni 100 ndeste n’indirimbo ye nshya yitwa That’s Me Right There afatanyije n’umuhanzi Kendrick Lamar


4. Ni we muhanzikazi ukoreshwa ku bifuniko bya alubumu z’abahanzi benshi
Uyu muhanzikazi amaze kugaragara cyane kuri Cover(ibifuniko) bya Album( Imizingo) y’abahanzi batandukanye hariya ku mugabane wa America ahanini bitewe n’ubwiza bwe.


5.Yakoze ku mateleviziyo menshi
Uyu muhanzikazi kandi yabaye umunyamakuru kuri za Televiziyo zitandukanye aho agenda akora ibiganiro byo gushimisha abana bato. Uyu mukobwa ntakintu atageragejemo amahirwe kuko yakoze ibintu byinshi bitandukanye n’ubwo akiri umwana

title: EPISODE 2: Fiston yemerewe kujya kuba hanze y’ikigo muri Getho na Frank ariko ikibazo ni uko…………
content: Ubushize Angel yari aherekeje Fiston amugejeje kuri biro bikoreramo ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo (Adminitration), bari bamaze gusezeranaho gusa Angel amaze kubwira Fiston ngo azajye aza ku mureba mu ishuli yigamo amusuhuze gusa hari ikintu Angel yari agiye gusa Fiston n’ubwo tutigeze tubasha kikimenya ni muri iyi Episode ……………. Angel: Nonese uwagusaba ikintu hari ikibazo? Fiston:Ntakibazo nukuri uburyo wangiriye neza nta kintu nakwima pe Angel: Nonese waretse tukaza kongera kubonana nimugoroba ko abanyeshuli baragaruka hano mu kigo kwiga (yavugaga gukora Etude ya nimugoroba)? Fiston: Nonese urumva naza kukubona gute n’ubwo ibyo wari unsabye byoroshye kandi nanakubwiye ko nta kintu wansaba ngo nkikwime kandi uzi neza uburyo wangiriye neza Angel: Cyangwa reka tubireke basi tuzabonana ejo ku manywa ngewe nzaza kukwishakira ntugire ikibazo Fiston :Urakoze nukuri nzaba ngutegereje, ahubwo reka njye mu biro kureba abayobozi ubwo nawe ugire ibihe byiza Angel: Sawa kandi nkwifurije amahirwe muri iki kigo

title: Mbatembereze i Strasbourg, Umujyi ubumbatiye amateka y’Abafaransa n’Abadage (Amafoto)
content: Ni umujyi uhana imbibi n’u Budage ndetse ubitse amateka menshi hagati y’ibi bihugu byombi, uherereye mu gace ka Alsace. Ntabwo ari umujyi utuwe cyane kuko uri ku buso bwa kilometero kare 7826, ibarura ryo mu 2017 rigaragaza ko wari utuwe n’abaturage 280966. Ufatwa nk’Umurwa Mukuru w’u Burayi kubera ko ariwo ubarizwamo ibikorwa by’inama y’ubujyanama bw’u Burayi, Urukiko rw’u Burayi rw’uburenganzira bwa muntu, Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Burayi n’ibindi. Ni umujyi kandi ubarizwamo ibikorwa byinshi bibungabungwa na UNESCO nk’umutungo kamere w’Isi. Muri ibyo harimo nka Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Strasbourg n’agace gakundwa na ba mukerarugendo kazwi kitwa Petite France. Ni agace karimo imigezi myinshi ndetse mu myaka yo hambere kakundaga kubamo abarobyi cyane, magingo aya ni ko gace gasurwa cyane muri Strasbourg yose. Imiterere yako igaragaza imyubakire yo mu Bufaransa kera mu kinyejana cya 17 ari nayo mpamvu UNESCO yahisemo kugashyira mu duce tubungabunzwe kubera amateka yako. Naho Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Strasbourg igizwe n’inyubako zigaragaza amateka ya kera y’Abaromani, ndetse igaragazwa nk’urugero rwiza rwo kwerekana amateka yo hambere dore ko mu myaka ya 1647 na 1874 yabaye inzu ya mbere ndende ku Isi, ireshya na metero 142. Uyu munsi ni kiliziya iri mu nsengero esheshatu ndende mu mateka y’Isi ndetse yihariye agahigo ko kuba ariyo ya mbere ndende mu mateka y’Isi yubatswe hagati y’ikinyejana cya Gatanu n’icya 15. Umusizi Victor Hugo n’umudage Goethe nawe wari umwanditsi, bakunze kuyigereranya n’igiti cy’Imana bashaka kuvuga uburebure bwayo. Bitewe n’uko iteye, ahantu hose hari umusozi muri uyu mujyi, iyo uwugiyeho bituma umuntu abasha kuyibona neza Ku bantu bakunda gutembera bihera amaso ibyiza bitatse Isi, ni umujyi mwiza cyane. Mu 2009 ubwo habaga inama ya NATO, Barack Obama na Chancelier w’u Budage, Angela Merkel, bakoze urugendo rw’amateka n’amaguru, bava Strasbourg bagera mu Kehl banyuze ku kiraro cya Passerelle des Deux Rives cyubatswe mu 2004 nk’ikimenyetso cy’ubumwe mu Burayi. Nta passport bisaba ku muntu ushaka gukora uru rugendo nk’urwabo, ugera mu Budage mu gace ka Rhine. Alsace agace ka Strasbourg kazwi ho kugira umuvinyo uryoheye ijigo ndetse n’inzoga nyinshi zituruka mu baturanyi b’Abadage. Mu masaha y’ijoro usanga hafi ya Notre-Dame hari abantu benshi bari ku gacupa bungurana ibitekerezo, Umujyi wa Strasbourg guhera mu 2008 uyoborwa na Roland Ries nyuma yo kuba Umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya Strasbourg n’Umusenateri muri aka Karere imyaka icyenda. Amafoto: Karirima A. Ngarambe

title: The Bright Five Singers yashyize hanze indirimbo yo gufasha abantu kwizihiza umunsi mukuru wa Pantekote
content: Kuri uyu wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 muri Kiliziya Gatolika n’andi madini yemera Yezu barazirikana igihe Yezu Kristu yasubiraga mu Ijuru maze akaboherereza Roho Mutagatifu. Mu kuzirikana uyu munsi no gufasha abakirisitu kuwizihiza, abaririmbyi ba The Bright 5 Singers bahimbye indirimbo yitwa ‘Roho, ngwino utumurikire’ ijyanye n’uwo munsi kugira ngo bafashe abakristu bose kuzirikana ibanga ryawo. Iraguha Alain Marius uhagarariye The Bright 5 Singers yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo bashyize hanze irimo ubutumwa busaba roho w’Imana kumurikira abantu.  Ati “Irimo ubutumwa busaba Roho w’Imana kumurikira abantu kugira ngo babashe gukorera Imana badategwa, kuko muri iyi minsi benshi bacitse intege.” Itsinda rya The Bright Five Singers ryatangiye gukora ubutumwa mu 2015 ku itariki 15 Ukwakira ariko abarigize bose bari basanzwe ari abaririmbyi dore ko benshi muri bo bize muri Seminari zitandukanye. Barangije amashuri yisumbuye, bane muri bo bahuriye mu yahoze ari Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda i Huye (NUR) muri korali yitwa Le Bon Berger. Ubwo habaga amahugurwa yari yateguwe na Choeur International et Ensemble Instrumental de Kigali agenewe abaririmbyi mu 2011 igatumira umugabo w’umuhanga muri muzika wo muri Cameroun witwa Jean Jacques Gregoire Belobo, niwe wabateye iyo nyota yo kurushaho gukunda umuziki, ariko anabasigira ubumenyi ari nabwo bifashishije mu kuzamura imiririmbire yabo. Nyuma y’aho basoreje amashuri nibwo bihuje bakora iri tsinda. Bakunda gukora ibitaramo bitandukanye biteguriye cyangwa se batumiwemo. Iri tsinda ryanashyize hanze Album ya mbere yitwa ‘Musabe Muzahabwa’. Yagiye hanze kuwa 15, Ukwakira 2017. Bafite izindi zirimo iyitwa "Uhoraho", "Sangwa Mariya", "Dusingize Imana" n’izindi. Indirimbo nshya yakozwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Emmy Pro usanzwe akora indirimbo iz’abaririmbyi bo muri kiliziya Gatolika naho amashusho atunganywa na Gaga.

title: Nsengiyumva ’Igisupusupu’ yashyize hanze indirimbo ’Rwagitima’ -VIDEO
content: Umuhanzi Nsengiyumva Francois umaze kwamamara cyane nka ’Igisupusupu’ nyuma y’indiribo ze e byiri zikunzwe n’abatari bake ’Mariya Jeanne’ na ’Icange mukobwa’, ubu noneho yongeye gukora mu nganzo ashyira hanze iyo yise ’Rwagitima’. ’Rwagitima’ ntabwo  ari nshya mu matwi y’abakurikirana uyu mugabo kuko ari imwe mu zo yayiririmbaga mu tubari no mu masoko cyera ataramamara maze amashusho agasakazwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Gusa ubu iyi ndirimbo yanononsowe mu buryo bugezweho ndetse amwe mu magambo aravugururwa. Yatunganyijwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na producer Jay P naho amashusho yayo ayoborwa ndetse atunganywa na producer Fayzo. Iyi ndirimbo yayitiriye kamwe mu duce tw’iwabo mu karere ka Gatsibo kitwa ’Rwagitima’, ariko muri rusange ni indirimbo ivuga inkuru y’urukundo, ikaba inagaragaramo bamwe mu bakinnyi ba filime nyarwanda b’abanyarwenya barimo Kirahinda na Makanika. Kanda hano hasi urebe amashusho y’iyi ndirimbo

title: Abakinnyi ba PSG bifatanyije n’u Rwanda mu Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
content: Kuva ku wa 7 Mata 2020, Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda bari mu minsi 100 yo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, yahitanye inzirakarengane zisaga miliyoni mu mezi atatu gusa. Ni muri urwo rwego, Ikipe ya Paris Saint-Germain ihagarariwe n’abakinnyi barindwi barimo Kylian Mbappé watsinze ibitego byinshi muri shampiyona y’uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20 mu Bufaransa, yatanze ubutumwa bwo kwifatanya n’u Rwanda muri ibi bihe. Ni ubutumwa bw’amashusho y’amasegonda 40, aho aba bakinnyi bose uko ari barindwi bagenda bakuranwa mu kuvuga amagambo yo kwifatanya n’u Rwanda mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Butangirwa n’amagambo y’Ikinyarwanda avugwa na Kylian Mbappé ati “Twibuke Twiyubaka”, agahita yakirwa n’Umunya-Sénégal, Idrissa Gana Gueye n’abandi bagakurikira mu gihe busozwa n’ubundi aba bakinnyi bavuga bati “Twibuke Twiyubaka” nk’amagambo agize insanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka. Bose bagize bati “Twibuke Twiyubaka. Rwanda, abakinnyi ba Paris Saint-Germain bagufitiye ubutumwa. Twifatanyije nawe mu kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Mu myaka 26 ishize kuva icyo gihe, wagaragaje ubumwe, kwihangana n’impinduka z’intangarugero Isi ishobora kukwigiraho, ikanakurikiza. No muri ibi bihe bikomeye, turi kumwe nawe dukomeza gushyigikira intambwe u Rwanda rukomeje gutera. Sitwe tuzarota dusura u Rwanda mu gihe cya vuba. Twibuke twiyubaka.” Guhera mu Ukuboza 2019, u Rwanda rwagiranye ubufatanye na Paris Saint-Germain, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo. Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere y’imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona y’u Bufaransa, Ligue 1. Mu biganiro byahuje abahagarariye Paris Saint-Germain na Minisiteri ya Siporo, hemejwe ko iyi kipe izubaka ishuri ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Karere ka Huye.

title: Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro bageze mu Rwanda aho bagiye gukorera ibitaramo bikomeye (Video)
content: Aba bahanzi bageze ku kibuga cy’indege cya Kanombe ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare bari kumwe n’irindi tsinda ry’abaririmbyi bazafatanya nabo. Adrien Misigaro yabwiye itangazamakuru ko yababajwe cyane no gufungwa kwa Fireman nubwo ntacyo yari kubikoraho kuko gahunda zagombaga gukomeza mu gihe umuntu yaguye mu makosa. Ati “Nk’umukozi w’Imana ndamusengera nta kindi kintu nabivugaho, gahunda za leta zigomba gukomeza kuko umuntu iyo ari mu makosa aba agomba gufungwa yaba arengana akarenganurwa. Hari gahunda tuzakorana, hari n’indirimbo ze twakoze.” Gentil Misigaro we yavuze ko yari akumbuye mu Rwanda ndetse anagaragaza ko ari ahantu ahoza ku mutima cyane ko yanaje yambaye imyambaro yahakorewe. Mu mwaka wa 2019 nibwo Adrien Misigaro yagiye gusura urubyiruko ruri kugororerwa i Iwawa, iki gihe uyu muhanzi yavuyeyo atangije Ubukangurambaga yise “Melody of New Hope” bugamije gukangurira urubyiruko rutandukanye kwirinda no kwitandukanya n’ibiyobyabwenge. Asubiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aho asanzwe atuye, uyu muhanzi uri mu bagezweho muri Diaspora mu bakora indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana yasobanuriye ubuyobozi bw’itorero asengeramo ibyo avuyemo mu Rwanda. Nyuma yo kwishimira iki gikorwa yatangije, ubuyobozi bw’Itorero asanzwe asengeramo muri Amerika bwiyemeje kumutera ingabo mu bitugu bukamushyigikira ndetse kugeza ubu uhereye ku muyobozi w’iri torero n’abandi bakozi b’Imana bafatanya umurimo bazamuherekeza mu bitaramo ateganya gukorera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020. Ibi bitaramo byiswe “Each one reach one” byateguwe mu rwego rwo gukangurira buri wese mu banyarwanda kuba bafasha byibuza umuntu umwe wabaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge kubivamo bityo bigafasha kwihutisha ubukangurambaga bwa “Melody of New Hope”. Mu gihe azamara mu Rwanda, Adrien Misigaro n’ikipe bazaba bari kumwe bazasura ibigo bitandukanye bifasha ababaswe n’ibiyobyabwenge. Igitaramo cy’i Kigali kizaba tariki 8 Werurwe 2020 muri Intare Arena mu gihe tariki 15 Werurwe 2020 bazakomereza muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, Ishami rya Huye muri Auditorium.

title: Imicungire n’imiterere y’amashuri makuru yigenga mu Rwanda bikwiye kunozwa
content:
N’ubwo bwose uburezi bushingiye ku mashuri buhera ku rwego rw’ibanze rukagenda ruhererekanya inshingano n’izikurikiyeho ku buryo bwisumbuye, muri aka kanya twifuje kuvuga gusa ku burezi mu mashuri makuru yigenga mu gihugu cyacu. Ibyo tuvuga  bikaba  bigamije gutanga umusanzu wacu muto ku cyatuma icyo cyiciro cy’amashuri kirushaho gukora neza no kuba cyatanga umusaruro mwiza wateza imbere sosiyete y’Abanyarwanda. Muri iyi minsi hakunze kuvugwa ibibazo binyuranye mu mashuri makuru yigenga ( private Higher Learning Institutions) mu Rwanda, bishingiye, cyane cyane  ku mikorere mibi ndetse bikagira n’ingaruka mbi ku ireme ry’uburezi buhatangirwa. Iyo umuntu yitegereje neza uko ayo mashuri akora, asanga ibibazo bihari biterwa ahanini n’imicungire mibi yayo ikunze kuhagaragara muri rusange. Kudacunga neza umutungo w’ayo mashuri, cyangwa kuwukoresha ibyo utagenewe, bituma abakozi bamara amezi menshi badahembwa kandi ntibanabone n’ibindi umukozi agenerwa, nko gutangirwa umusanzu w’ubwitegenyirize bw’izabukuru, kutagira ubwishingizi bwo kwivuza, n’ibindi. Haza kandi n’ikibazo cyo kutagira ibikoresho bihagije, kandi nyamara bikenewe mu kazi ka buri munsi, ndetse tutibagiwe hamwe na hamwe, no kutagira aho gukorera hahagije cyangwa hatunganye. Umwe mu miti yafasha gukemura icyo kibazo ni uko minisiteri y’Uburezi yifashishije Urwego rushinzwe Amashuri Makuru (Higher Education Council–HEC) yarushaho gukurikirana imikorere y’ayo mashuri kandi igafata ibyemezo ku buryo bwihuse ku bibazo binyuranye  bigenda biyabonekamo, ibyo bigakorwa hakiri kare, amazi atararenga inkombe. Ikindi umuntu yavuga muri uru rwego ni ukureba uko itegeko rigenga amashuri makuru mu Rwanda ryasuzumwa kugira ngo harebwe niba koko rijyanye neza n’imiterere y’amashuri rireba. Ibyo ndabivuga  mpereye ko hari amashuri makuru amwe n’amwe usanga yarabaye kandi akagendera ku mategeko asanzwe agenga sosiyete z’ubucuruzi (companies) zisanzwe. Aha rero turatekereza ko uburezi ari ikintu gikomeye cyane ku buzima bw’igihugu no ku hazaza hacyo, ku buryo amategeko areba uburezi yakagombye kugira umwihariko wayo, aho  kugira ngo uburezi bufatwe nk’ubundi bucuruzi cyangwa ubushabitsi busanzwe. Hari ababona ko ibibazo binyuranye birangwa mu mashuri makuru yigenga muri iki gihe, bishobora kuba biterwa  n’igabanuka, kubera impamvu zinyuranye  ry’umubare w’abanyeshuri bayagana; maze nabyo bigatera igabanuka ry’amafaranga y’ishuri batangaga; ahanini ari nayo akoreshwa mu bikorwa bindi by’ishuri. Ibivugwa bishobora kuba byagira ishingiro, ariko rero umuntu wakurikiye neza uko ibintu byagiye bihinduka mu rwego rw’Uburezi mu gihugu cyacu  muri iyi myaka 25 ishize, yahamya ko abo bireba by’umwihariko bakagombye kuba  barafashe ingamba zihamye mbere, kugira ngo ibintu ntibibe bimeze uko biri muri ibi bihe. Mu rwego rwo gushaka ibisubizo byatuma umubare w’abanyeshuri wiyongera, ni ngombwa gutekereza byimbitse ku miterere y’amashuri makuru yigenga dufite mu Rwanda. Muri gahunda igihugu cyacu gifite yo kugira iterambere rishingiye ahanini ku burezi, ntabwo twavuga ko turagera ku mubare uhagije w’abize amashuri makuru kandi baba umusemburo ukomeye w’iterambere. N’iyo urebye amashuri dufite, cyane cyane ayashizwe n’Abanyarwanda, usanga muri rusange, asa nk’ayibanda ku nyigisho zimwe, kandi nyamara hari ibice binyuranye by’ubumenyi bukenerwa mu buzima bw’igihugu tutabona ubu  mubyo amashuri yigenga atanga mu gihugu cyacu. Ibi rero birerekana ko amashuri yacu akeneye impinduka mu miterere yayo. Bikaba byaba byiza buri shuri rigize ibyo ryigisha byihariye kandi rikabinoza neza ku buryo buzobereye (différenciation et spécialisation), ibyo bikaba byanatuma umubare w’abarigana wiyongera kuko buri shuri ryaba rifite ibyo ryihariye ayandi ataba afite. Ariko nabwo rero, iyo urebye uko amashuri yacu yigenga akora n’uko akorana, dushobora kuvuga ko kugira ngo iyo ntambwe izagerweho na none  inkunga ya minisiteri y’Uburezi mu Rwanda ikenewe cyane, kugira ayo mavugururwa azashobore  gukorwa kandi agerweho neza. Mu magambo ahinnye, dusoza iyi nyandiko, twavuga ko twifuje kugaruka kuri bimwe mu bibazo ubu biboneka, muri rusange, mu mashuri  makuru yigenga mu Rwanda n’uburyo byashobora gushakirwa ibisubizo. Twanerekanye uruhare rw’ingenzi minisiteri ishinzwe Uburezi  mu Rwanda yagira mu gushaka umuti watanga ibisubizo byaba bikwiye, ku buryo burambye. Dr Gasana Sébastien
Umwarimu wa Kaminuza n’Umushakashatsi.

title: Euro 2016: Portugal yamaze kwicara muri 1/2 kirangiza
content:
Ikipe y’igihugu ya Portugal ibaye ikipe yambere ibimburiye izindi kugera muri kimwe cya kabiri kirangiza, nyuma yo gutsinda Poland kuri penaliti 5-3. Robert Lewandowski wa Poland niwe wafunguye amazamu, umukino umaze amasegonda 100 utangiye, igitego cyaje kwishyurwa ku munota wa 33 n’umukinnyi Renato Sanches wa Portugal. Cristiano Ronaldo yagiye ahusha uburyo bwiza bwari kubyazwamo ibitego, umukino waje kurangira amakipe yombi anganya igitego 1-1. Hitabazwa iminota 30 y’inyongera ngo haboneke ikipe igera muri kimwe cya kabiri kirangiza Iminota 30 yarangiye nta kipe ibashije kureba mu izamu ry’indi, amakipe yombi yitabaza penaliti. Portugal yinjiza, 5 kuri 3 za Poland, ku ruhande rwa Portugal zatewe na Cristiano Ronaldo, Renato Sanches, Joao Moutinho, Nani na Ricardo Quaresma winjije iya nyuma yabahaye itsinzi. Umukinnyi warase penaliti ku ruhande rwa Poland ni Jakub Blaszczykowsk, abandi bari bazinjize ni Robert Lewandowski, Arkadiusz Milik na Kamil Glik. Portugal ikaba itegereje kuzakina n’ikipe izatsinda hagati ya Wales na Belgium ziza gukina kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 1 Nyakanga 2016.












Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Dore bimwe mu binyoma abasore bakunze kubeshya abakobwa
content:
Kuba muri iyi nkuru tugiye kuvuga bimwe mu byo abasore bakunze kubeshya, ntibivuze ko ari ihame ridakuka ko igihe cyose umusore abivuze aba abeshya, nyamara bikunze kubwirwa abakobwa babeshywa. 1. Umubare w’amafaranga akorera
 Abasore benshi burya ngop ntibakunda kuvuga umubare nyawo w’amafaranga akorera, ashobora kubwira umukobwa macye ku yo akorera kugira ngo atamusaba impano z’umurengera cyangwa se akamubwira menshi ari ku mwiyemeraho cyane cyane iyo abona ueo mukobwa afite amarere maremare yo gukunda abantu bafite amafaranga, cyangwa se hari n’abasore biyemera gutyo gusa agahitamo kubeshya umukobwa bakundana. 2. “Byabaye rimwe ntibizongera” Iyi ni imvugo y’abasore b’abahehesi igihe bafashwe, niba umufatanye n’undi mukobwa mu bintu runaka agahita yihutira kukubwira ko byamutunguye kandi ko ari ubwa mbere n’ubwa nyuma bitazongera, nyamara ngo ukuri ni uko umusore wishoye mu gushurashura mu bakobwa barenze umwe umubare munini ari uw’abatabireka. 3. “Sinzi impamvu uwo twakundanaga akomeza kumpamagara”
 Ibi bishobora kubaho igihe umusore afite umukobwa mushya akundana nawe ariko akaba yarakundanye nawe atarigeze areka uwo yari afite mbere, akaba ahari hose, bityo igihe wa wundi wa mbere ahamagaye umusore akabeshya wa mukobwa mushya ko nta mubano bagifitanye. 4. “Akazi kabaye kenshi uyu munsi.. sinzi impamvu boss ashaka kunkoresha amasaha y’ikirenga”
 Ushobora kubora kuba ufite umukunzi uzi nyinshi muri gahunda ze z’akazi ndetse ukaba uzi neza ko bitajya bipfa gushoboka ko akora amasaha y’ikirenga, ukajya kumva nk’umunsi mufitanye gahunda runaka akubwiye ko atakibonetse kubera akazi kandi bitari bisanzwe bibaho, icyo gihe ushobora gutangira kugira amakenga ko ataba ashaka gusubika gahunday awe ku zindi mpamvu. 5. “nta mukunzi mfite” Iyo ukimenyana n’umusore bwa mbere, ashobora gushaka kugutereta kubera impamvu nyinshi zitandukianye ariko wowe ntuba wamenya ikimugenza. Abasore bagira ubutwari bwo kuvugisha ukuri ko bafite umukunzi igihe bahuye n’undi mukobwa mwiza ni bake 6. ”Sinari nzi ko biri bukubabaze”
 Abasore bafite umukunzi bizeye neza ko abakunda bashobora gukora ibyo bishakiye bishobora kubabaza umukunzi wabo kubera ko bizeye neza ko ari bubababarire. 7. “Uraruta abandi bakobwa bose naba naramenye”
 Iki ni ikinyoma abasore benshi babeshya atari uko ari ukuri ahubwo ari ukugira ngo wumve wishimye cyangwa kugira ngo agusabe icyo ashaka yabanje kugutegura mu mutwe wemere nta mananiza. 8. “Simukunda nkunda wowe” Iri ni ikosa rikunzwe gukorwa n’abakobwa, gukunda umusore ukiri kumwe n’undi mukobwa. Abasore bakunda ku buryo bukomeye kurusha abakobwa, niba afite umukobwa akunda kandi atatandukanye nawe, kukubwira ko uruta wa mukobwa aba ari ukukubeshya gusa ngo ureke guhora uhangayitse. 9. “Ni inshuti yanjye bisanzwe ... nta kintu nakorana nawe”
 Byashoboka ko umusore yakubwira ibi akubwiza ukuri cyangwa se byashoboka ko yanakubeshya, ukuri ni uko hari ababeshya ko umukobwa runaka ari inshuti isanzwe kandi nyamara bafitanye umubano wihariye ubangamiye urukundo rwanyu. 10. “Singamije kuryamana nawe” Iyi nayo ni imvugo abasore bakunda gukoresha cyane cyane igihe babonye ko umukobwa yabavumbuye akamenya ko ikibagenza ari ukuryamana gusa, akagerageza kwiregura. Niyomugabo Albert/MUHABURA.RW

title: Minisitiri Mujawamariya yibukije abangiza ibidukikije ko nta yindi si bafite yo kuzaturaho
content: Ibi yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 19 Ugushyingo 2019, ubwo iyi Minisiteri yahuraga n’abafatanyabikorwabayo harebwa uko bakomeza kunoza ubufatanya mu kurengera ibidukikije. Iyangirika ry’amashamba, imyuka ihumanya ikirere iva mu nganda no mu binyabiziga, ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bya muntu, ni bimwe mu biza ku isonga mu gukomeza kwangiza ibidukikije hirya no hino ku Isi. Minisitiri Mujawamariya avuga ko iyi nama iba igamije guhuza abafatanyabikorwa mu bikorwa bitandukanye barimo abakora mu by’amashyamba, ubutaka n’abandi, intego ari ugukokomeza kugira igihugu cyiza. Ati “Dukeneye kubungabunga ibidukije ariko n’igihugu gikeneye amajyambere byaba mu bucuruzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro n’ahandi, icyo dusaba abafatanyabikorwa ni ugukomeza mu nzira turimo nk’u Rwanda dukomeza guteza imbere ibidukikije, kandi dukomeza kugira igihugu kirangwamo n’ibidukikije byitaweho kuva ku mwana kugera ku mu kambwe.” Ati “Iyi si dutuyeho niyo yonyine dufite aho gutura, tugomba rero kuyirinda kubera ko nta handi dufite dutura ni aha gusa, buri wese uko yaba angana kose akwiye kumva ko ari inshingano ze zo kubungabunga ibidukikije.” Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kubungabunga ibidukikije, Eng. Coletha Ruhamya, yavuze ko hakiri imbogamizi mu kubungabunga ibidukikije zirimo ingengo y’imari igenerwa uru rwego, kudahuza ibikorwa mu nzego ndetse n’ishoramari ridahagije mu kurinda ibidukikije. Agira ati "Usanga ingengo y’imari leta yakoresheje yose, 2,9% ni yo yagiye mu bintu birengera ibidukikije, ibyo byose rero turashaka kureba ukuntu izo nzego zindi zibishyira muri gahunda yazo.’’

title: Mu Rwanda hagiye gutangizwa banki itera inkunga imishinga y’ibidukikije
content: Amakuru ajyanye n’itangizwa ry’iyi banki mu Rwanda yatangarijwe mu kiganiro cyatangangiwe mu nama ya Cop 25 iherutse kubera muri Espagne mu mpera z’umwaka ushize kireba uruhare rwa banki zigamije guteza imbere ibidukikije mu gutuma ibihugu bigera ku ntego zabyo. Muri iyo nama niho hatangarijwe ko u Rwanda ruzashyiraho banki igamije gushyigikira imishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije, “Rwanda Catalytic Green investment bank”. Uru rwego rw’imari ruzafasha mu gukangurira ibigo byigenga gushyigikira ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imishinga itangiza ibidukikije mu gihugu. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibijyanye n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere muri Banki Nyafurika itsura Amajyambere (AfDB), Anthony Nyon, yatangaje ko hakenewe ingamba zihamye mu guhanga ikoranabuhanga rishya rigamije guhangana n’ibibazo by’imihindagurikire y’ibihe. Ati “Ku bw’iyo mpamvu, Banki Nyafurika itsura Amajyambere, binyuze mu bufasha bw’ikigega kigamije kurengera ibidukikije, iri gukorana n’ihuriro rya banki zigamije kurengera ibidukikije mu kureba uburyo butandukanye bwo gushyira igishoro mu bikorwa bifasha kurengera ibidukikije ku rwego rwo hasi, ari nako tuzamura uruhare rw’abikorera.” Kubera ibibazo by’imihindagurikire y’ibihe, nibura abahinzi bo mu Rwanda batakaza 40% by’umusaruro wabo. Leta yashyizeho ikigega Fonerwa cyahawe inshingano zo gufasha u Rwanda kugera ku bukungu butangiza ibidukikije binyuze mu gutera inkunga imishinga ya Leta n’abikorera iri muri uyu murongo. Kuva iki kigega cyashingwa, hahanzwe imirimo 138000 itangiza ibidukikije. Mu 2017, habarurwaga ko ubutaka bungana na hegitari 21 847 bwatunganyijwe hagamijwe kwirinda ko butwarwa n’isuri ndetse hegitari 12,998 z’inkombe n’imigezi n’ibiyaga zarasubiranyijwe ndetse imiryango ifashwa 17 449 kubona ingufu zidakomoka ku ngomero z’amashanyarazi. Icyo gihe FONERWA yari imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyoni 100 z’amadorali, iyi nkunga ikaba ihabwa imishinga yatsinze binyuze mu marushanwa.

title: Young Grace yahishuye ko atwite
content:
Umuraperikazi Abayizera Marie Grace wamenyekanye cyane nka Young Grace, aritegura kwibaruka imfura ye mu gihe cya vuba. Abicishije kuri konti ye ya Instagram, kuri uyu wa Gatanu umunsi wizihirizwaho Umunsi w’Abagore, Young Grace yasangije abamukurikirana, amashusho y’umwana uri gukina mu nda, arangije yandika amagambo agaragaza ko anezerewe. Ati "Ndimo kuba muri bya bihe by’ubufindo buri mugore wese aba ategereje mu buzima bwose. Ubu inda yanjye ni iy’agaciro nk’umutima wanjye. Imbaraga z’umugore."

Young Grace yagaragaje ko atwite Young Grace amaze iminsi akundana n’umusore witwa Rwabuhihi Hubert bakunze kwita Piqué, ukina umupira w’amaguru aho abarizwa mu cyiciro cya kabiri mu ikipe ya Heroes.

Young Grace n’umukunzi we Rwabuhihi Hubert (Piqué) Uyu musore akaba yaranamwambitse impeta (Bague de fiançailles) mu mpera z’umwaka ushize ku mugoroba wo ku itariki ya 19 Nzeri 2018 ubwo uyu muraperikazi yizihizaga isabukuru y’imyaka 25, amusaba ko babana, undi abyemera atazuyaje, kuva icyo bavuga ko bagiye mu myiteguro y’ubukwe. Nubwo Young Grace atahishuye niba umwana atwite ari uw’uyu musore, benshi baketse ko nta kabuza ari uwe kuko kugeza ubu bakigaragaza ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ko nta cyasha kiri mu mubano wabo, hakaba hari n’abemeza ko baba babana mu nzu imwe.

Ubwo Piqué yapfukamaga agasaba Young Grace ko bazarushingana

title: Urukiko muri Australia rwategetse ko Musenyeri mukuru wa Kiliziya Gatolika agomba gufungwa
content: Urukiko rwo muri Australia rwategetse ko uwahoze ari Musenyeri mukuru wa Kiliziya Gatolika muri Australia, agomba kumara amezi 12 afungiye iwe nyuma yo guhamwa n’icyaha cyo guhishira ihohotera ry’abana rishingiye ku gitsina. Iki cyemezo cy’urukiko gisobanuye ko Philip Wilson - weguye ku mirimo ye nka Musenyeri mukuru wa Adelaide nyuma yo guhamwa n’icyaha - atazashyirwa mu buroko. Wilson w’imyaka 67 y’amavuko, ni we muyobozi wo hejuru wo muri Kiliziya Gatolika ku isi uhamijwe icyaha cyo guhishira ihohorera ry’abana rishingiye ku gitsina. Abamwunganira mu mategeko bavuze ko kuri uyu wa kabiri bajuririra iki cyemezo cy’urukiko. Umucamanza yavuze ko Wilson atangira iki gihano ako kanya, akagikorera mu nzu ya mwenewabo aho azajya agenzurirwa hifashishijwe icyuma cy’ikoranabuhanga kizajya kigaragaza niba ahaguma. Nyuma y’amezi atandatu akaba yashobora gusaba kurekurwa bishingiye ku myitwarire ye muri iki gihano. Ubwo yasohokaga mu cyumba cy’urukiko kuri uyu wa kabiri, Wilson ntabwo yasubije ikibazo yari abajijwe n’umwe mu bigeze gukorerwa ihohoterwa wamusatiriye yifuza ko amusaba imbabazi. Muri uru rubanza, Wilson yahakanye ko atigeze amenya ko Padiri James Patrick Fletcher yakoreye ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina abana b’abahungu bamuherezaga kuri alitari mu myaka ya 1970. Ariko mu kwezi kwa gatanu, urukiko rwanzuye ko abakorewe iri hohotera bari baramenyesheje Wilson iby’iri hohotera akananirwa kugira icyo akora. Mu mwaka wa 2004, Padiri Fletcher yahamwe n’ibyaha 9 by’ihohotera ry’abana rishingiye ku gitsina.Yaje gupfira mu buroko mu mwaka wa 2006. Niyomugabo Albert Muhabura.rw

title: Ronaldo na Benzema bagarutse muri  Real Madrid iza guhangana na Manchester City
content:
Zinedine Zidane, umutozawa Real Madrid yamaze kwemeza ko mu mukino ikipe ye irajya gusuramo Manchester City abasore be babiri Christiano Ronaldo na Karim Benzema baraba bahari,  Ni mu mikinoya UEFA Champions league ½ umukino ubanza urabera kuki buga Etihad cya Man.City, mu Bwongereza.Ronaldo ntiyari yagaragaye ku mukino ikipe ye ya Real yakinaga mu mperaz’icyumweru gishize kubera akabazo k’imitsi, Benzema we yasohotse muri uwomukino ku munota wa42  bitewen’ikibazo yari agize mu ivi. Aba basoreni babiri muri batatu bagize bwa butatu bwa Real Madrid, BBC. Bahagurukanyen’abandibere keza mu Bwongereza .bakigera ku kibuga Etihad, umutoza Zidane yavuze ko ngo bari buze gufata icyemezo cyanyuma bamaze gukora imyitozo yanyuma, gusa ngo afite icyizereko izi nkingi ze za mwamba ziza kuba zimufasha kwegera kundunduro yo gukabya inzozi ze agasezerera ikipeya City. Utu butatubwa Real Madrid bumaze gutsinda ibitego 92. Muri ibyo harimo 47 bya Christiano Ronaldo, harimo 27 bya Karim Benzamna 18 bya Gareth Bale utarakinnye imikino ihagije ahanini kubera ibibazo by’imvune, Christiano usanzwe ari umukeba wa Man.City kuva cyera akina muri Man.Utd, arabura igitego kimwe ngo agree  kugahigo yakoze muri  2013-2014 ubwo yatsindaga ibitego 17.

Yanditswe na Rukundo Xaver/Muhabura.rw

title: Mu basuye Pariki y’Akagera umwaka ushize, 48 % ni Abanyarwanda
content: Ugereranyije abasuye iyo pariki umwaka ushize n’abayisuye mu 2018, habayeho ubwiyongere bwa 12 %. Parike #Akagera yakiriye abakerurgendo basaga 49,000 muri 2019. Habayeho ubwiyongere bwa 12% ugereranyije na 2018. 48% by'abasuye parike uyu mwaka ni ABANYARWANDA. #Ibyaranze2019#VisitRwanda — Akagera (@AkageraPark) January 21, 2020 Iyi pariki  kuva mu 2010 icungwa n’umuryango wita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, African Parks. Mu myaka itanu ishize hagiye haba amavugurura agamije guteza imbere urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima muri iyo pariki no kurushaho gukurura ba mukerarugendo bayisura. Nubwo umubare w’amafaranga yinjijwe umwaka ushize utatangajwe, ashobora kuba yariyongereye ugendeye ku bwiyongere bw’abayisuye. African Parks icunga iyi pariki igaragaza ko amafaranga yinjiza yavuye ku madolari 200 000 mu 2010, akagera ku madolari miliyoni ebyiri mu 2018. Ibyo byatumye iyo pariki ibasha kwihaza ku ngengo y’imari ikoresha ku kigero cya 75 %. Iyi pariki irimo amoko atandukanye y’inyamaswa, ikaba imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika nyuma yo kuzanwamo intare n’inkura. Pariki y’Akagera irimo n’izindi nyamaswa zitandukanye nk’impala n’imparage, impongo, inzovu, imvubu, ingwe, inyoni z’amoko asaga 500  n’ibindi. Mu 2015, Pariki y’Akagera yazanywemo intare zaherukagamo mu myaka ya 1990. Mu mwaka wa mbere zigaruwemo, umubare w’intare wikubye kabiri kuko zahise zibyara ibyana 11. Mu 2017, hazanywemo izindi ntare ebyiri z’ingabo zivuye muri Afurika y’Epfo. Mu 2017 kandi, muri iyo pariki hazanywemo inkura z’umukara 18, nyuma y’imyaka icumi ubwo bwoko bw’inyamaswa bwarazimiye. Umwaka ushize, Pariki y’Akagera yari yasuwe n’abakerarugendo 44000, kimwe cya kabiri ari Abanyarwanda.

title: Roma: Ku butaka bwa Vatican hasanzwe ibisigazwa by’imibiri
content:
Ibisigazwa by’imibiri byabonywe ku butaka bwa Vatican i Roma, ndetse ibi bishobora gutuma polisi y’Ubutaliyani isubukura iperereza ku bantu babiri babuze mu buryo budasobanutse mu 1983. Ni amakuru yatangajwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki ya 30 Ukwakira 2018 n’iki cyicaro gikuru gitagatifu cya Kiliziya Gatolika. Mu itangazo bashyize hanze bagize bati "Ubwo hakorwaga imirimo yo kuvugurura inzu y’ambasade ya Vatican mu Butaliyani, havumbuwe ibice by’amagufwa y’abantu.", Polisi yo mu Butaliyani yahise imenyeshwa, ndetse iperereza rigiye gutangira kugira ngo hamenyekane imyaka, igitsina ndetse n’igihe aba bantu baba barapfiriye. Abazakora iri perereza bazaba bareba by’umwihariko niba ADN y’ibi bisigarizwa by’imibiri byaba bihuye na Emanuela Orlandi cyangwa Mirella Gregori, abana babiri babuze mu bihe bitandukanye i Roma mu 1983.

Ibyapa bigaragaza aba bana bombi babuze bafite imyaka 15 y’amavuko Emanuela Orlandi, wari umukobwa w’umwe mu bapolisi b’i Vatican yabonywe bwa nyuma ku ya 22 Kamena 1983 ubwo yari avuye kwiga isomo ry’umuziki.  

Ibyapa bigaragaza Emanuela Orlandi, ubwo basaba ko Vatican yavuga irengero rye mu 2012 mu isengesho rya Papa Benedigito XVI Hari bamwe bavuga ko uyu mwana w’umukobwa wari ufite imyaka 15 y’amavuko yaba yarashimuswe n’agatsiko k’abagizi ba nabi bashakaga gushyira igitutu ku bayobozi b’i Vatican kugira ngo bahanagurweho umwenda w’amafaranga, abandi bakavuga ko yaba yarashimuswe kugira ngo harekurwe Mehmet Ali Agca, umunya-Turikiya wagerageje guhitana Papa Yohani Pawulo II mu 1981.

Ku ya 22/06/2014 kuri Saint Peter’s Square ubwo abiyerekanaga bibukaga imyaka 30 ishize Emanuela Orlandi aburiwe irengero Musaza we Pietro, umaze imyaka myinshi myinshi atangije ubukangurambaga bugamije gukurikirana iby’aya mayobera mu irengero rye, yanenze Vatican kuba yararuciye ikarumira ndetse n’uruhare ifite muri iki kibazo. Ku ruhande rwa Vatican yo yakunze kuvuga inshuro nyinshi ko yakoranye uko bikwiye na Polisi yo mu Butaliyani kuri iki kibazo. Mirella Gregori we yabuze iminsi 40 mbere y’uko Emanuela Orlandi abura. Nyina w’uyu mwana w’umukobwa we avuga ko umwana we yasubizaga telefone avuga ko ari kumwe na mugenzi we bigana ko hari ibyo yagiye kumuganiriza mbere y’uko ataha, ariko kuva ubwo ntiyongeye kuboneka. Src:7sur7

title: Urukundo nkunda umwarimu unyigisha rugiye kunsaza….Mbigenze nte?
content:
Nitwa Lucie Dera    ndi  Umunyarwandakazi uba  USA ndi umunyeshuri  muri  make ntago nkuze cyane pe ,kuko mpfite  imyaka 22. Gusa ahaturi mu mahanga dukunda gusoma imbuga. Zo Mu Rwanda. Kugirango tubashe kumenya ibibera iwacu. Niyo mpamvu na fashe umwanzuro wo kwandikira Muhabura.rw nkunda ku bona inkuru z’urukundo ya ndika.cyane cyane inkuru z’urukundo za ndikwa n’Umunyamakururu Witwa Sarongo  Richard. Nukuri ziranyura nkakunda ukuntu agira inama urubyiruko, mu bucukumbuzi munkuru z’urukundo . Hari ho igihe ya ndika inkuru k’urukundo nkumva ninjye we  ya nditse! urugero  n’inkuru iherutse  gutambuka ivuga k’urukundo Umwarimu  ya kunze Umunyeshuri ugisha Inama .
Nanjye rero muri make mbanje gusuhuza abakunzi ba muhabura.rw  kunkuru z’urukundo agisha Inama, Nanjye mpfite umwarimu nkunda cyane cyane kdi narabimubwiye gusa ntakintu yanshubije ahubwo araseka. Ariko urukundo mukunda nanjye rwaranyobeye kuko mu kunda cyane kuburyo ntabasha no kubisobanura no kwiga byarananiye nirirwa mureba aho anyuze kandi nkatinya kumuvugisha. iyo mbonye ari kuvuga n’abandi baseka birambabaza cyane kuko njye atajya abinkorera. None ubwo arankunda cyangwa none se ko ku mu kumunda atankunda bikambabaza mbigenze nte?

Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/ Muhabura.rw

title: King James yavuze ko kuba adakururana n’abakobwa bitavuze ko akundana n’abahungu bagenzi be
content:
King James mu muziki azwiho gukora ibintu bye acecetse, ntupfa kumenya gahunda ze ziri imbere igihe yihaye kitaragera. Avuga ko kuba nta mukobwa uzwi nk’umukunzi we bitavuze ko akundana n’abahungu bagenzi be.
 Bitandukanye n’abandi bahanzi b’abasore nka we, King James ntaragaragara ari kumwe n’umukobwa bizwi ko ari umukunzi we, nyamarani umugore w’imyaka 27, mu bihe byashize bigeze kumukekeraho gukundana na Knowless na Princess Priscilla ariko we yavugaga ko bahuzwaga n’akazi. Gusa kuri bamwe mu bamukurikiranaga cyane hakaba hari abavugaga ko akundana na Priscilla ndetse ajya muri Amerika kumusura mu ibanga. King James yavuze  ko kuba adakururana n’abakobwa bitavuze ko akundana n’abahungu bagenzi be. Ahubwo afite umukunzi we w’umukobwa ariko bitaraba ngombwa ko ashyira ku karubanda. Mu gitwenge gikomeye cyane ati “Ndatangaye cyane kuba hari abatekereza ko nteye ntyo. Si ndi umu ‘Gay’ mfite umukobwa w’inshuti yanjye gusa sindashaka ko amazina ye ajya hanze. Ibyo nti byaba impamvu yo kuvuga ko nkundana na bagenzi banjye”. Guhera muri 2009 kugeza 2012 ubwo yari atangiye kwamamara cyane, byagiye bivugwa ko adakunze gukururana n’abakobwa nk’abandi bahanzi baba bagezweho ‘Stars’.
Haje no gutangazwa inkuru muri 2015 ko yaba ari mu rukundo rw’ibanga na Priscilla uri muri Amerika. Ayo makuru yose aza kuyanyomoza avuga ko ari inshuti bisanzwe. Mu ntangiriro za 2016 nabwo biravugwa cyane ko yaba noneho ari mu rukundo n’umukobwa witwa Ishimwe Elcy ndetse ari nawe yakoreye indirimbo yise ‘Ndagukunda’. Si King James gusa utarashyira hanze umukobwa bari mu rukundo. Abahanzi barimo The Ben na Meddy nabo ikijyanye n’umukobwa bavuga ko igihe kitaragera. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru ubwo yari akigera mu Rwanda, The Ben yavuze ko impamvu atajya ajya mu rukundo ari uko yifuza kuzakundana n’umukobwa umwe gusa akaba ari nawe babana nk’umugore n’umugabo.  Yanditswe na  Ubwanditsi / Muhabura.rw

title: Impamvu 4 nyamukuru zituma abantu bagira ikimwaro iyo bari kumwe n’ abakunzi babo
content:
Ikimwaro abakunzi babo ku mpamvu zitandukanye kandi bataba bashaka ko ubo bakunda bazimenya,ari naho usanga iyo bari mu bantu atamwikoza cyangwa ngo amwereke urukundo mbese ntabwo aba atekanye neza iyo muri muruhame rw’abantu benshi ,ariko mwabavamo akabona kukwitaho.
Mu gihe wamenye ibimenyetso bikwereka ko umukunzi wawe agira ikimwaro iyo muri kumwe,ufite no kumenya impamvu rero ituma umutera ikimwaro

1.Imirebere



Buri umwe wese akunda kuba yabona umukunzi we afite imirebere myiza,ari nayo mpamvu uzabona iyo muri mu bantu benshi atakwereka urukundo cyangwa ngo akwereke ko umwatira,iyi nimwe mu mpamvu ituma abantu bakunze kugirira ikimwaro abakunzi babo.

2.Urwego

 Urwego urimo,ubwo ni ukuvuga akazi kawe,amashuli yawe yewe n’umuryango uturukamo uko babayeho,ari nayo mpamvu uzasanga umukunzi wawe agira isoni zo kukwerekana mu bandi bitewe n’urwego ubarizwamo.

3.Imiterere y’umubiri wawe.

 Ushobora kuba uri munini cyane cyangwa unanutse cyane ibi bigatuma umukunzi wawe umutera ikimwaro mu bandi,ikindi rero ushobora kuba ufite umutwe munini,amenyo y’imingikirane,ureba mirari,iminwa minini,taye itameze neza,ibiheri mu maso nibi ni zimwe mu mpamvu zituma umukunzi wawe akugirira ikimwaro.

4.Imyambarire itari myiza


Iyo imyambarire yawe itari myiza ariko iy’umukunzi wawe ikaba ari myiza iyo mwasohokanye agira ikimwaro cy kugendana nawe bitewe nuko wambaye bitameze neza mbese ku buryo agerageza no kwijijisha ngo hatagira umenya ko munakundana. Yanditswe na Sarongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: Nicolas Cage yasabye gatanya nyuma y’iminsi 4 gusa akoze ubukwe ’ngo yabukoze yasinze!’
content:
Umukinnyi wa filimi akaba umwanditsi wazo n’umushoramari, Nicolas Cage yasabye ko yabona gatanya nyuma y’iminsi ine gusa akoze ubukwe na Erika Koike usanzwe akora umwuga wo gusiga abantu (makeup artist) i Las Vegas. Ku wa Gatandatu ushize tariki ya 23 Werurwe 2019 ni bwo Nicolas Cage wamamaye muri filime bakunze kwita iz’imirwano (film d’action) nka Rock, Volte-face, 60 secondes chrono n’izindi, yashyingiranwe n’uyu wari umukunzi we Erika Koike i Las Vegas. Uwo munsi ni nawo bahise baboneraho icyemezo cy’abashakanye (certificat de mariage) Gusa ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 27 Werurwe, ni ukuvuga nyuma y’iminsi ine bakoze ubukwe, mu buryo butunguranye Nicolas Cage w’imyaka 55 y’amavuko yasabye ko ubu bukwe buseswa. Yasobanuye ko bombi bari basinze bikomeye ko ndetse ’atarasobanukiwe ibyo arimo ubwo yarongoraga Koike’.
 Abunganizi ba Nicolas Cage mu by’amategeko (avocats) bavuze ko "bari banyweye (Cage na Koike), hanyuma ubwo Koike yasabaga Nicolas Cage ko bashyingiranwa, yahise abyemera atabitekerejeho ataniyumvishije ingaruka zabyo." Nicolas Cage asobanura kandi ko Erika atari yarigeze amubwira "imiterere nyayo  y’umubano yari afitanye n’undi mugabo". Yanavuze ko yamenye amakuru ko uyu mukobwa "yari afite ibyaha aregwa, ndetse harimo ibirego bishya", gusa ntiyasobanuye neza ibyo yavugaga.

Amasaha make nyuma y’ubukwe bwabo bafotowe bari gutongana Nicolas Cage na Erika bari bamaze igihe bakundana urukundo rw’ibanga bahishe itangazamakuru. Bwa mbere babonywe bari kumwe mu biruhuko muri Porto Rico muri Mata 2018, bongera gufotorwa bari kumwe muri Gicurasi uwo mwaka ubwo bari muri imwe muri resitora iherereye i Los Angeles. Nicolas Cage amaze gushyingiranwa inshuro eshatu. Yabanje gushakana na Patricia Arquette bakoze ubukwe mu 1995 baza gutandukana mu 2001. Nyuma yaho yacuditse na Penelope Cruz amezi make mbere y’uko arongora umuhanzikazi Lisa Marie Presley muri Kanama 2002 gusa baza gutandukana mu Ugushyingo uwo mwaka nyuma y’igihe kitageze ku mezi ane. 

Nicolas Cage n’umugore we wa mbere Patricia Arquette

Nicolas Cage n’umugore we wa kabiri Lisa Marie Presley wanabanje kuba umugore wa Michael Jackson hagati ya 1994-1996 Umugore wa gatatu yashatse ni Alice Kim wakoraga muri resitora (serveuse) bashyingiranwe mu 2004 ndetse banibaruka umwana w’umuhungu nyuma y’umwaka, uyu bakaba baraje gutandukana mu 2016 nyuma y’imyaka 12 babana.

Nicolas Cage na Alice Kim

title: Tariki 24 Ukwakira, intangiriro y’indunduro ya Mobutu Sese Seko wa Zaïre
content:
Ni intambara ikomeye kuko niyo  yashyize iherezo ku butegetsi bw’umunyagitugu Mobutu Sese Seko wari umaze imyaka 32 ayoboye Zaïre nk’urugo rwe, kugeza ubwo hari bamwe bari baramufashe nk’Imana cyangwa se umuntu utazapfa, nawe akabyuririraho akiyita Umwami wa Zaïre Imyaka 32 ku butegetsi bwa Mobutu yayimaze yishakira abanzi ari nabo bamurunduye, haba imbere mu gihugu no ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Mu myaka ya 1990, ubukungu bwa Zaïre bwari aharindimuka , aho umuturage yabonaga nibura amadolari atagera kuri magana atatu ku mwaka, ugize imyaka 49 akiriho akaba ari umurame. Muri iyo myaka kandi Mobutu yari ku gitutu mpuzamahanga, aho ibihugu bikomeye byifuzaga kandi bigashyigikira impinduka n’amaraso mashya mu buyobozi bw’ibihugu bya Afurika, byasaga n’ibiyobowe cyami nta jambo abaturage bafite. Ibihugu nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Bufaransa byashyigikiye Mobutu mu mizo ya mbere, byari bitangiye kumukuraho amaboko bimutegeka gukuraho ubutegetsi bw’ishyaka rimwe, akemera amashyaka menshi. Igisirikare cya Zaïre  (FAZ) nacyo cyari aharindimuka kuko imyitwarire mibi yari ikigeze kure ahanini kubera kudahembwa no kutagira ubuyobozi buhamye, byatumaga bahuka mu baturage gusahura, bikongera isura mbi ya Mobutu mu baturage. Binavugwa ko ngo hari ubwo Mobutu yigeze kubaza abasirikare be uburyo bataka kudahembwa kandi yarabahaye imbunda!. Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, imbarutso y’indunduro ya Mobutu
 Nyuma y’uko Ingabo zari iza FPR Inkotanyi zihagarikiye Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu Rwanda, Interahamwe n’ingabo za Leta bayishyize mu bikorwa bahise bahungira mu burasirazuba bwa Zaïre, hafi y’imbibi z’u Rwanda. Ubusanzwe amategeko mpuzamahanga ntabwo yemera ko impunzi zishyirwa hafi y’umupaka w’igihugu zahunze, nyamara izavuye mu Rwanda zo zahawe rugari,  maze ingabo zahoze ari iza Leta y’u Rwanda yakoze Jenoside, abahoze mu butegetsi n’abandi batangira kwisuganyiriza ku butaka bwa Zaïre  ya Mobutu ngo bagaruke kugaba ibitero kuri Leta nshya yari imaze kujyaho mu Rwanda. Inkunga ikomeye yatangwaga ivuye muri Guverinoma ya Zaïre yari iyobowe na Mobutu Sese Seko. U Rwanda rwamenyesheje imiryango mpuzamahanga icyo kibazo ibyima amatwi, rufata umwanzuro wo kwambuka muri Zaïre  gusenya inkambi impunzi zisuganyirizagamo ngo zigabe ibitero mu Rwanda, banashishikariza impunzi zabyifuzaga gutaha kuza. Uko kwinjira k’u Rwanda muri Zaïre kwahaye ingufu indi mitwe itaravugaga rumwe na Leta ya Mobutu, nibwo umutwe wa Alliance des forces démocratiques pour la libération du Congo (AFDL) wari uyobowe na Laurent-Désiré Kabila watangije ibitero bihereye mu Burasirazuba bwa Zaïre maze ukomeza ujya gufata ubutegetsi i Kinshasa. Intambara yahise yanzika, AFDL ishyigikiwe n’u Rwanda na Uganda, Angola, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Zambia na Zimbabwe n’inyeshyamba nka SPLA yashakaga ubwigenge bwa Sudani y’Epfo. Kubera ubukene, ruswa n’ubwirasi muri Guverinoma ya Mobutu, abaturage benshi bagiye ku ruhande rw’inyeshyamba biba impinduramatwara kurusha uko byari intambara. Uruhande rwa Mobutu rwagerageje kwirwanaho rushyigikiwe na Sudani ndetse n’Inyeshyamba za UNITA zashakaga ubutegetsi muri Angola. Ni nabyo byatumye Angola ishyigikira uruhande rwashakaga gukuraho Mobutu dore ko yo yaninjiyemo nyuma. Mobutu wari no mu bihe bibi arembejwe na kanseri, yahaye ibiraka abacanshuro benshi bo kumufasha gusubiza inyuma  inyeshyamba n’abari bazishyigikiye ariko biba iby’ubusa kuko umunsi ku munsi barushagaho kwegera umurwa mukuru Kinshasa. Kwinjira kwa Angola mu ntambara noneho kongereye ingufu uruhande rwa Kabila rwarwanyaga Mobutu, ku buryo bugaragara barusha ingabo za Leta imbaraga. Mu mezi ya nyuma y’urugamba, ingabo za Mobutu ntizari zigiteye ikibazo inyeshyamba ahubwo ikibazo cyasigaye ari ibikorwa remezo bike nk’imihanda byorohereza inyeshyamba kugera i Kinshasa. Tariki 16 Gicurasi 1997, Mobutu wasaga n’uwabuze epfo na ruguru, yahunze igihugu, bucya Laurent Desire Kabila n’ingabo ze batangaza ko bafashe igihugu bashyiraho Guverinoma nshya. Mobutu yabanje guhungiro muri Togo, avayo ajya muri Maroc ari naho yaje kugwa nyuma y’amezi ane azize kanseri y’ubugabo bw’epfo (Prostate cancer) tariki 7 Nzeri 1997. Kabila amaze kujya ku butegetsi, yahindutse u Rwanda atangira gukorana n’abasize bakoze Jenoside na we atangira kubafasha ngo bazagaruke gutera u Rwanda. Nibyo byagejeje ku ntambara ya kabiri ya Congo.

title: Inyungu ku Rwanda, aho imyiteguro yo kwakira CHOGM igeze…Ikiganiro na Minisitiri Dr Biruta
content: Ku itariki 22 kugeza kuri 27 Kamena 2020 u Rwanda rwiteguye kwakira inama ya CHOGM (The Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting). Mu myiteguro bimwe byaratunganye ibindi bikomeje gutegurwa no gushyirwa mu buryo kugira ngo abazayitabira bazakirwe neza. Ni inama u Rwanda ruzakira nyuma y’uko rugaragaje ko rubiftiye ubushake n’ubushobozi rumaze kubona ko umugabane wa Afurika ariwo utahiwe. CHOGM ni inama yitabirwa n’abantu bari hagati ya 5 000 na 8 000. Kuyakira bisaba ko igihugu cyerekana ubushake hakabaho kureba ko igihugu gifite ubushobozi. Mu kureba ubwo bushobozi harebwa ibintu bitandukanye, birimo aho inama izakirirwa,  indege zigana aho hantu, uko bantu babona Visa, umutekano, imiyoborere n’ibindi. Minisitiri Biruta mu kiganiro na Televiziyo Rwanda, yavuze ko nyuma yo kwemezwa kuzayakira, u Rwanda rwatangiye imyiteguro ndetse ngo irarimbanyije. Ati “ Tumaze iminsi twitegura, hari n’ibihugu byohereje intumwa zabyo ziza kureba aho bigeze kureba aho inama izabera,  aho bazacumbika, uburyo bazakirwa ku kibuga n’ibindi. Ibyo byose birakorwa mu gihe twitegura iriya nama.” Inyungu z’u Rwanda muri Commonwealth U Rwanda rwinjiye muri Commonwealth mu Ugushyingo 2009. Ni umuryango uhuza ibihugu 54 byiganjemo ibyakolonijwe n’u Bwongereza bikaba binakoresha Icyongereza ariko hakabamo n’ibindi birimo n’u Rwanda bitakolonijwe nabwo ariko bikoresha Icyongereza. Mu myaka irenga 10 u Rwanda rwabonyemo inyungu nyinshi zirimo iza Politiki n’iz’ubukungu. Uretse ibyo, Minisitiri Biruta avuga ko  ishoramari ryiyongera binyuze mu nama nk’iyo ya CHOGM rugiye kwakira. Ati “Iyo habayeho inama nk’iriya ntabwo ari abakuru b’ibihugu gusa. Haba harimo n’igice gihuza urubyiruko, abikorera, imiryango itari iya leta, abagore n’ibindi. Iyo tugeze ku bikorera urumva ko haba harimo ibintu by’ishoramari, ibyo byose ni ibintu dufitemo inyungu usibye ko byose bizaganirwaho nk’ibidukikije, imiyoborere, ikoranabuhanga na inovasiyo.” Dr Biruta kandi yagarutse ku nyungu abanyarwanda bazagira kubera kwakira CHOGM, nk’abazabona akazi mu rwego rw’amahoteli, ubukerarugendo n’ubucuruzi. Ati “Amahoteli yose azaba yuzuye n’amahoteli mato cyangwa aho abantu bacumbika hose  hatandukanye   bazaba bafite abashyitsi,  urumva rero harimo akazi ari abafite imodoka bakodesha harimo akazi ndetse bariya bantu baba bafite ibibatunga bitandukanye, ibyo bashaka kugura bazajyana iwabo mu buryo bwo kwiyibutsa ko baje mu Rwanda.” Mu gihe habaye inama mpuzamahanga, hari ubwo biba ngombwa ko imihanda runaka ifungwa kugira ngo abashyitsi batambuke. Nubwo hari abo bibangamira, Dr Biruta yavuze ko byumvikana ko iyo umujyi wagize abashyitsi barimo n’abakuru b’ibihugu mu gihe runaka umuhanda ushobora kuba ufunze, ariko ko ugereranyije n’inyungu ziri mu kwakira iyo nama bitakagombye kuba ikibazo. Ati “ Bishobora kugira icyo bibangamiraho abatuye uyu mujyi […] ariko n’abanyarwanda mu bihe nk’ibi byo kwakira abashyitsi turabateguza kugira ngo babe babizi banadufashe no kwakira abo bashyitsi kandi bumve neza inyungu ikomeye irimo iruta kure ibyo byashobora kubangamira umuntu ku isaha iyi n’iyi.” Yongeyeho ati “Ni ibintu by’iminsi navuga nk’ibiri cyangwa nk’itatu igihe abakuru b’ibihugu bazaba baza cyangwa bataha  ibyo ni ibintu tumenyereye ariko inyungu iva mu kwakira iriya nama zirenze kure ari ibyo dushoramo mu kuyitegura ndetse ari n’ibishobora kutubangamira ku isaha iyi n’iyi ku munsi uyu n’uyu muri iriya minsi. Imyiteguro n’ingengo y’imari yo kuyikora U Rwanda rusanzwe rwakira inama  mpuzamahanga kandi abazitabiriye bagataha bishimye. Kuri iyi nshuro nabwo, ibikorwaremezo nk’imihanda, aho inama izabera n’ibindi bikenewe bikomeje gutunganywa. Umujyi wa Kigali watangaje ko mu mihanda mishya iri kubakwa harimo uva Rwandex ukanyura mu Myembe cyangwa se Rwandex- Kigali Convention Centre. Uyu muhanda wamaze kuzura. Undi muhanda ni unyura ku Biro by’Akarere ka Gasabo - Airtel- Sport View Hotel - Control Technique wo wari  ugeze ku kigero cya 35% wubakwa muri Mutarama. Hari undi muhanda wa Nyabisindu – Nyarutarama - Green Hills – Kibagabaga wo wari ugeze kuri 30%. Uyu muhanda wagenewe miliyari 3.3 Frw hamwe n’uzahuza Kabeza-Alpha Palace uzatangira kubakwa mu cyumweru gitaha. Mu mihanda iri gusanwa harimo uwa Murindi - Rusororo wo wari ugeze kuri 25 %. Umwaka ushize Guverinoma yemeje ingengo y’imari ya miliyari 20.1 Frw zigenewe ibikorwa bibanziriza CHOGM, harimo miliyari 10.87 Frw zizakoreshwa mu kwagura aho indege ziparika ku Kibuga Mpuzamahanga cya Kigali i Kanombe n’ibindi bikorwa ku kibuga. Minisitiri Biruta yatangaje ko uretse ikurikiranabikorwa rikorwa n’ibihugu bizitabira CHOGM nta yindi nkunga rwahawe yo kwitegura CHOGM. Kuri we ngo nta gihombo kirimo kuko ibikorwa byubakwa biba bizahoraho igihugu kigakomeza kubikoresha kandi bikaba byanagihesha no kwakira izindi nama kubera uko cyagaragaye. Ati “Byinshi ni ibikorwa bizaguma aha kandi n’ubundi twari dukeneye. Iyo waguye umuhanda cyangwa ugakora undi ni bikorwa birambye, n’abashyitsi nibagenda ni ibikorwa tuzakomeza gukoresha […] kandi birumvikana nitumara kwakira iyi nama bizaba byumvikana ko dushobora kwakira izindi nama ziri muri ruriya rwego kandi imari yashowe izakomeza igire akamaro no mu bihe bizaza kuko ntibizarangirana n’iriya nama gusa.” Ku kuba  u Rwanda rwaba rwarasabye inkunga yo kurufasha kwitegura, yagize ati “U Rwanda nta bufasha bundi twabonye nta nubwo twanasabye tubikora twumva ko ari ibyacu.” Minisitiri Biruta yasabye ko buri munyarwanda bireba yagira uruhara kugira ngo iyo nama izasige isura y’igihugu igaragaye neza mu ruhando mpuzamahanga. Imyiteguro no kuyimenyekanisha ku buryo buruseho byatangiranye na tariki ya 9 Werurwe 2020 hizihizwa umunsi wahariwe kwizihiza umuryango w’ibihugu bikoresha ururimi rw’Icyongereza Commonwealth. CHOGM izaba igizwe n’ibiganiro bitandukanye birimo ibireba urubyiruko, abikorera, abagore, imiryango itari iya leta n’iby’abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinoma.

title: Inzira z’Ubukerarugendo gakondo zitezweho gukuba kabiri umubare w’abasura i Nyanza
content: Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu mu muganda rusange aho hakozwe ibikorwa by’isuku muri imwe muri izo nzira iherereye mu Murenge wa Busasamana. Hasobanuwe ko izo nzira ziswe ‘The Nyanza Cultural Trials’ ari eshatu zitandukanye ariko zuzuzanya. Iya mbere yitwa ‘Royal Trail’ ifite kilometero 10 izenguruka Umujyi wa Nyanza igakikiza Ingoro z’Umurage ebyiri zihari ari zo Ingoro y’Abami mu Rukari n’Ingoro y’Umurage wo kwigira iherereye ku Rwesero ahahoze hatuye Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa. Iyo nzira kandi izanyura ahari ibindi byiza biranga amateka y’u Rwanda mu Karere ka Nyanza nk’Umusezero w’Abami i Mwima hatabarijwe Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa tariki ya 28 Nyakanga 1959; Umwami Kigeli V watabarijwe ku ya 15 Mutarama 2017 ndetse n’Umwamikazi Gicanda Rosalie wahatabarijwe tariki ya 20 Mata 1995. Inzira ya kabiri yitwa ‘Big View’ y’ibirometero umunani ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagera ku musozi wa Remera. Iyo uri kuri uwo musozi wa Remera uba ushobora kureba ku ntera y’umurambararo wa kilometero 50. Ubasha kureba imisozi itandukanye ikikije Nyanza ndetse waterera amaso kure ukaba wabona ibindi bice by’u Rwanda birimo n’ibirunga biri mu Majyaruguru y’igihugu. Inzira ya gatatu yitwa ‘Gatagara Trail’ y’ibiromtero  12 ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagenda ikikiza ibishanga ikagera  i Gatagara ahari ibikorwa by’ububumbyi biteye imbere ndetse n’ikigo cyita ku bafite ubumuga. Izo nzira zose uko ari eshatu zifite umwihariko w’uko ari utuyira twa Kinyarwanda tunyura mu misozi, ibibaya aho abantu batunyuramo bagenda bareba ahantu hateye indabyo, ahahinze imyaka  itandukanye, ahatuwe, urutoki n’ibindi byiza bitandukanye bihaboneka. Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert, yavuze ko izo nzira ziyongera ku bindi byiza biranga amateka mu Karere ka Nyanza bigatuma ba mukerarugendo bahasura biyongera. Ati “Twazanye ubundi bwoko bw’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda n’amaguru baciye muri izi nzira gakondo za Kinyarwanda. Ni ukuvuga ngo abo bantu nibajya baza aho kugira ngo bamare amasaha abiri nibura bazajya bamara iminsi itatu cyangwa barenzeho kandi uko batinda ni ko bituzanira inyungu yo kudusigira amafaranga.” Amb. Masozera yashimiye abaturage bitabiriye umuganda rusange wo gukora isuku muri izo nzira, abararikira kuzaza  kuzitaha ku mugaragaro tariki ya 4 Ukuboza 2019. Ati “Ni igikorwa gikomeye cyane kizatuma hano i Nyanza cya cyifuzo mwari mufite cy’uko haba igicumbi cy’umuco kiba impamo. Dutekereza ko izo nzira zizatuma abantu basura Nyanza bava ku bihumbi 70 nibura bakagera ku bihumbi 150 ku mwaka.” Amb. Masozera yasobanuye ko inzobere mu bijyanye n’ubwo bukerarugendo zimaze iminsi zisura izo nzira ari nako zitanga amanota hakaba hari icyizere ko zizaza mu za mbere nziza 1 000 ziri ku Isi. Muri izo nzira bagiye bashyiraho ibyapa byerekana ibyerekezo ariko abazajya bazinyuramo hari ubwo bazajya bakenera ababasobanurira amateka y’uduce dutandukanye duhari. Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe iterambere ry’ubukungu mu Karere ka Nyanza, Kajyambere Patrick, yasabye abaturage kwirinda kongera kumena imyanda hafi y’izo nzira. Yabibukije ko bagomba kugira isuku muri byose, buri rugo rukagira aho  kujugunya imyanda habugenewe ntibongere kuyishyira aho babonye. Ati “Nahoze mbona umwanda wari uri hano muri iyi nzira; umuntu arava mu rugo akaza kumena ibishingwe hano cyangwa akagajugunya ibishishwa by’ibitoki kubera ko atumvaga agaciro k’iyi nzira.” Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Nyanza bawiye IGIHE ko nyuma yo kumenya agaciro k’izo nzira bagiye kuzitaho ku buryo hatazongera kugaragara umwanda. Mukankunzi Jeannette ati “Twishimiye ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bikomeje kwiyongera hano iwacu; izo nzira ntabwo zizongera kugaragaramo umwanda kuko buri wese agiye kuba ijisho rya mugenzi we ku buryo nta muntu uzongera kuza kuhamena imyanda.” Kalisa JMV nawe yavuze ko bishimiye ubusobanuro bahawe ku bijyanye n’izo nzira kandi yumvise  bizagirira akamaro Akarere kabo ka Nyanza. Akarere ka Nyanza kabumbatiye amateka menshi yiganjemo ayo hambere kuko Nyanza yabaye Umurwa Mukuru w’Ubwami kuva mu 1899 kugeza mu mu 1962 I Nyanza hahoze ari Umurwa w’Ubwami kuko hatuwe n’Abami bane ari bo Kigeli IV Rwabugiri wari utuye ku misozi ya Mwima na Mushirarungu; Yuhi IV Musinga watuye i Mwima na Gakenyeri; Mutara III Rudahigwa watuye mu Rukali ndetse n’Umwami Kigeli V Ndahindurwa watuye i Busasamana. Muri nyanza kandi haboneka Amariba ya Mutende yafukuwe ku ngoma y’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, aho Inyambo ze ndetse n’inka z’abaturage ziturutse imihanda yose zashokaga. Hari kandi Icyuzi cya Nyamagana cyafukujwe n’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa afatanyije n’agoronome w’Umubiligi witwaga Dubois. I Nyanza kandi hafatwa nk’igicumbi cy’ubutabera kuko hahoze urukiko umwami yaciragamo imanza. [email protected]

title: Nouvelle-Zelande: Ifoto ya Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko aha amata uruhinja mu ngoro yatangariwe
content:
Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’igihugu cya Nouvelle-Zelande, Trevor Mallard  yakoze agashya ubwo yari ayoboye imirimo y’inama y’abagize iyi nteko maze abikomatanya no kugaburira uruhinja. Ni ibintu byatangariwe cyane nyuma yaho Trevor Mallard asangije abamukurikira kuri Twitter ifoto ya ari guha inkongoro y’amata uru ruhinja rw’umudepite witwa Tāmati Coffey wo mu ishaka ry’abakozi rya Waiariki, watangaje ivuka ry’uyu mwana wiswe Tūtānekai Smith-Coffey mu kwezi gushize kwa Nyakanga. Uyu mwana yabyawe n’umugore wari wahawe ikiraka cyo kumutwita (mère porteuse), uyu mudepite  Tāmati Coffey akaba amuhuriyeho na Tim Smith basanzwe babana bahuje igitsina ari nawe watanze intanga. Ubwo yatangazaga iyi nkuru yo kwibaruka, Coffey yavuze ko we n’uyu mugabo babana "barenzwe n’igitangaza cy’ubuzima kandi umugore wari ubatwitiye umwana yaruhutse neza" Ku wa Gatatu w’iki Cyumweru tariki ya 21 Kanama 2019 ni bwo Coffey yitabiriye ku nshuro ya mbere imirimo y’inama y’abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko, nyuma yo kurangiza ikiruhuko cy’ababyeyi (congé de paternité) aho yazanye uru ruhinja rwe. Ubwo bari hagati mu nama ni bwo Perezida w’Inteko Mallard usanzwe ari se w’abana batatu, yafashe inshingano atari asanganywe zo kwita kuri uru ruhinja rwa mugenzi we abifatanya no gukomeza kuyobora imirimo y’inama y’abadepite. Mu ifoto yasangije abamukurikira, Trevor Mallard yavuze ko "ubusanzwe intebe ya Perezida w’Inteko ikoreshwa gusa n’abayobozi, ariko uyu munsi umunyacyubahiro (VIP) yaje turayifatanya", yaboneyeho gushumira Coffey na Tim ku bw’umunyamuryango mushya bungutse.

Ubutumwa Trevor Mallard yaherekesheje iyi foto Abandi badepite barimo Gareth Hughes nabo bashyize kuri twitter ifoto ya Coffey ateruye uru ruhinja mu ngoro y’inteko Ishinga Amategeko bavuga ko byari ibintu byiza cyane kubona uyu mwana mu Nteko.
 Ku ruhande rwa Coffey ubwo yaganiraga na M. Newshub yavuze ko yiyumva nk’ushyigikiwe cyane na bagenzi be b’abadepite. Coffey abaye umudepite wa nyuma uheruka kuzana ubwana mu Ngoro Ishinga Amategeko nyuma y’abandi banyepolitike batandukanye ku isi bagiye babikora. Jo Swinson, umuyobozi wa Lib Dem nawe yitabiriye ibiganiro mpaka ari kumwe n’umwana we mu 2018 mu gihe mu 2017 umusenateri w’umunya-Ositaraliyakazi, Larissa Waters nawe yonkereje umwana mu Nteko, aba akaba ari bamwe mu bavuzwe cyane. Muri Nzeri umwaka ushize nabwo Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Nouvelle-Zélande, Jacinda Ardern yakoze amateka ubwo yajyanaga umwana we ku cyicaro cya Loni i New York.

Ubwo Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Nouvelle-Zelande yari agiye kugeza ijambo rye ku bitabiriye Inama rusange ya Loni, aha umugabo babana Clarke Gayford yari ateruye uruhinja rwabo Source:BBC Afrique

title: Imyaka 10 irashize: “Materazzi yahishuye impamvu yatumye Zinedine Zidane amukubita umutwe”
content:
Hari mu mikino y’igikombe cy’Isi cyo mu mwaka wa 2006 ubwo Zinedine Zidane wakiniraga Ubufaransa muri icyo gihe yakubise umutwe mugenzi we Marco Materazzi bakinaga nawe wakiniraga ikipe y’Igihugu y’Ubutariyani, kuri ubu uyu Materazzi aka yahishuye impamvu yatumye uyu Zinedine amukubita umutwe dore ko ari inkuru yavuzweho byinshi bitandukanye harimo n’abavugaga ko yamututse ku mubyeyi we.
 Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru L’Equipe, Marco Materazzi yatangaje ko anenga cyane abanyamakuru bakomeje gushimangira ko yatutse Zinedine Zidane ku babyeyi akaba yagize ati “ Ngewe singeze ntuka Zidane ku babyeyi be gusa we yarahindukiye arambaza ati :Ese ushaka umwenda wanjye nambaye kuburyo umukino nurangira nza kuwuguha? Nuko nange ndamubwira nti ngewe sinshaka umupira wawe ahubwo uze kumpa mushiki wawe w’indaya” . Materazzi kandi akomeza abwira iki kinyamakuru ko icyo gihe yaje no kubisubiramo akabishimangira ati umukino nurangira uze kumpa mushiki wawe w’indaya ubwo nibwo ngo Zidane yaje guhita ahindukira amukubita umutwe ako kanya. Materazzi kandi yahamije ko atigeze atuka Zinedine Zidane ku mubyeyi we kuko azi agaciro ka maman w’umuntu cyane ko uwe yapfuye ubwo yari afite imyaka 15 y’amavuko gusa akaba yavuze rero ko atabasha gutuka mugenzi we ku mubyeyi.
 


 Yanditswe na  Snappy Akayezu Jean de Dieu/Muhabura.rw

title: Perezida wa FIFA Gianni Infantino yatangaje Ibyo yaganiriye na Perezida Kagame
content:
Umuyobozi wa FIFA, Gianni Infantino, yagiranye ibiganiro na Perezida Paul Kagame byibanze ku guteza imbere umupira w’amaguru uhereye mu mashuri binyuze mu mushinga witwa ‘Football for schools’. Ubwo aba bayobozi bombi bahuraga kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 25 Ukwakira 2018 baganiriye kuri byinshi byateza imbere umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda no muri Afurika ibi kandi byatizwa umurindi n’uko Perezida Kagame ubu ari umuyobozi w’Umuryango wa Afurika yunze ubumwe,bityo bikaba byoroshye ko hari umusanzu ukomeye muri gahunda zo guteza imbere ruhago kuri uyu mugabane. Uyu muyobozi wa FIFA Infantino yasabye Perezida Kagame ubufasha bwa za Guverinoma zose z’ibihugu bya Afurika mu guteza imbere umupira w’abana b’ingimbi bari hagati y’imyaka 6 na 16. Yemeza ko byoroshye kubategura kuko bahurira ku mashuri. Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 26,mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru Infantino yavuze ko baganiriye ku mushinga woguteza imbere umupira w’amaguru mu mashuri. Yagize ati “Twaganiriye byinshi byateza imbere umupira w’amaguru hano. Iby’ingenzi navuga ni umushinga wa ‘Football for schools’ wo kuzamura urwego rw’ubushobozi bw’ibigo by’amashuri mu mupira w’amaguru ahantu hashobora kuva abana benshi bagira umwuga umupira.” Infantino kandi yavuze ko baganiriye ku bijyanye no gukaza ingamba no gushyiramo ingufu zo gucunga umutekano ku bibuga hirindwa ko ibitero bikunze kwibasira ahantu hahurira abantu benshi nko ku bibuga nk’uko byabaye mu 2015 i Paris ubwo Ubufaransa bwakinaga n’Ubudage. Yagize ati “Ni ukongera imbaraga n’ubushobozi mu gucunga umutekano kuko igihe tugezemo si icyo kumva umubare w’abantu runaka bapfiriye ku bibuga by’umupira kubera umutekano mucye.” Ikindi bemeranyijweho ni uko hakwiye ubufatanye mu kurwanya ruswa n’ibindi bihabanye n’amategeko bikirangwa mu mupira w’amaguru muri Afurika, ahatanzwe urugero ku bihugu bya Ghana na Sierra Leone. Rusa ikunze kugaragara cyane mu basifuzi bamwe na bamwe aho barya amafaranga bagasifura nabi babogamira ku wabahaye amafaranga,ibyo bikaba bituma umwimerere wa ruhago utakara.

title: FIFA na UEFA zije guhanganira i Kigali ku cyemezo cy’amarushanwa mashya
content:
Guhera kuwa Kane tariki 24 Ukwakira 2018 i Kigali harateranira inama ihuza abayobozi bakuru b’ishyirahamwe ry’umukino w’umupira w’amaguru ku isi. Imwe mu myanzuro itegerejwe na benshi ikaba ari icyemezo ku mushinga wa Perezida wa FIFA wo gushyiraho amarushanwa mashya y’umupira w’amaguru, amarushanwa yamaganiwe kure na UEFA. Tariki 25 na 26 Ukwakira abagiza Inama Nyobozi ya FIFA (FIFA Council) arateranira i Kigali muri Convention Center mu nama ngarukamwaka ihuza aba bayobozi bakuru b’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru ku isi. Biteganyijwe ko muri iyi nama hazaganirwa ku miyoborere mu mashyirahamwe y’umupira w’amaguru agize FIFA ariko umwe mu myanzuro itegerejwe ikaba ari umwanzuro ku mushinga wa Perezida wa FIFA Gianni Infantino ku marushanwa mashya mpuzamahanga arimo irushanwa irushanwa ry’igikombe cy’isi cy’amakipe (Club World Cup) ndetse n’irushanwa rishya ry’isi rihuza amakipe y’ibihugu. Infantino arifuza ko hongerwa umubare w’amakipe agihatanira akaba 24 aho kuba arindwi nk’uko byari bisanzwe. Uwo mushinga watanzwe n’itsinda ry’abashoramari ryo mu Buyapani rizwi nka SoftBank ku mafaranga yatanzwe n’igihugu cya Arabia Saudite hamwe na United Arab Emirates. Aleksander Ceferin, Perezida w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru i Burayi (UEFA)
Gusa Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru ku mugabane w’i Burayi (UEFA) ntiribikozwa kuko risanga iki gikombe cyongerewe imbaraga cyahangana n’irushanwa rihuza amakipe ya mbere mu mashampiyona y’i Burayi rizwi nka Champions League. Undi mushinga ni uwo gushyiraho shampiyona y’isi y’amakipe y’ibihugu ikazajya iba ukwayo itandukanye n’igikombe cy’isi cy’umupira w’amaguru, ubusanzwe kiba buri myaka ine. Uyu mushinga nawo UEFA ntiwukozwa kuko isanga wabangamira irushanwa nk’iri UEFA iherutse gutangiza rihuza amakipe y’ibihugu ku mugabane w’i BUrayi rizwi nka UEFA Nations League. UBwo Infantino yatangaga bwa mbere igitekerezo kuri iyi mishinga muri Werurwe uyu mwaka mu nama yabereye muri Colombia, Perezida wa UEFA Aleksander Ceferin yakirwanyije yivuye inyuma birangira gisubitswe ndetse isaba ko kitanagarurwa mu nama igiye kubera i Kigali ariko amakuru aturuka muri FIFA nuko iyi mishanga iri mu bigimba kuganirwaho. Ikinyamakuru New York Times cyatangaje ko Abanyaburayi batiteguye kwemera ko habayo aya marushanwa abiri ya FIFA, bivugwa ko ashobora gushorwamo amafaranga menshi kandi akitabirwa n’abafana benshi ku buryo yabangamira Champions League na UEFA Nations League. New York Times ikaba ndetse yatangaje ko aba Banyaburayi bashobora no gusohoka muri iyi nama igihe haba hafashwe imyanzuro batishimiye. Inama Nyobozi ya FIFA igizwe na Perezida wa FIFA, abamwungirije umunani n’abandi banyamuryango 28.  MUHABURA  EDITORIAL

title: Ubuso bw’u Rwanda 30 % bwamaze guterwaho amashyamba
content: Mu 2011, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yihaye intego ko mu 2020, ubuso bungana na 30%, buzaba buteyeho amashyamba, naho mu 2030 bukaba bugeze kuri hegitari miliyoni ebyiri mu 2030, hagamijwe kurengera urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Mu isuzuma ry’aho urwego rw’amashyamba rugeze, mu ntego nyinshi zitandukanye rwihaye n’intego zo kuruteza imbere mu myaka iri imbere, hagaragajwe ko intego ya mbere yagezweho, nkuko The New Times yabitangaje. Minisitiri Vincent Biruta, yagize ati “Mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari wa 2018/19 urwego rw’ibidukikije n’umutungo kamere rwageze kuri byinshi ndashimira ubufatanye n’abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye. Ndagira ngo mbabwire ko ubwo bufatanye bwatumye tugera kuri 30% dutera amashyamba aho atari ateye n’aho yatemwe.” Iyi ni intego y’ibanze mu zigamijwe kugerwaho mu 2020. Ati “Dushobora kwishimira aho tugeze.” Inyigo yerekanye ko hagati ya 1990 na 2010, u Rwanda rwatakaje 37% by’amashyamba yarwo bitewe no kuyatema. Minisitiri Biruta yagize ati “Twongeye gutera ibiti aho byari bayatemwe kugira ngo tubungabunge imigezi kandi nishimiye kubabwira ko hegitari zirenga 3,000 zatewe kuri Nyabugogo, Muvumba, Sebeya n’igice cya ruguru cya Nyabarongo.” Yongeyeho ati “Abikorera bajya mu bijyanye no kubungabunga amashyamba nabo bariyongereye. 30% by’amashyamba ya leta ubu aracungwa n’abikorera kandi tuzakomeza gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa mu kongera kugeza kuri 80% mu 2024.”  Amashyamba ya leta ari kuri hegitari 65,000 hatabariwemo Pariki z’igihugu. Mu gukaza politiki n’amategeko Minisitiri Biruta yavuze ko Minisiteri yashyizeho politiki nshya n’ingamba zigamije kwita ku mashyamba, ibidukikije, imihindagurikire y’ibihe, ubutaka no gucunga ibipimo by’ubushyuhe. Guverinoma yashyizeho uburyo bushya bwo kongera amashyamba bikozwe n’abikorera ndetse no kuyacunga neza. Yashyizeho amatsinda y’abikorera yo gucunga amashyamba “Private Forest Management Units:PFMU” aho amashyamba ari ku buso buto acungwa n’amakoperative. Ayo matsinda agizwe n’amakoperative 8 y’abikorera bato yageragerejwe mu turere twa Gakenke, Gicumbi, Rulindo na Rwamagana mu buryo bw’igerageza yabashije gutera amashyamba kuri hegitari 276. Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wita ku bidukije (IUCN) utangaza ko gusana hegitari imwe y’ubutaka haterwa amashyamba, bisaba amadolari asaga 1000 ariko mu Rwanda ngo ntageramo (ari hagati ya 200 na 400) kubera byinshi bikorwa n’abaturage mu muganda.

title: Bishop Rugagi yahishuye ko gusenga cyane bidatuma itorero ryubahwa ahubwo ko ryubahishwa n’ubutunzi =business
content:
Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hasakaye amashusho agaragaza Umushumba mukuru w’itorero Redeemed Gospel Church, Bishop Innocent Rugagi avuga ko kubahwa kw’amatorero akomeye ku isi bidaterwa n’imisengere yo ku rwego rwo hejuru ahubwo ko biterwa n’uko afite ubutunzi bwinshi ndetse n’inyubako nziza bityo usesenguye neza wasanga ibi ntaho bitaniye neza neza na business. Uyu mushumba yabitangaje kuri iki cyumweru cyo ku wa 8 Nyakanga 2018 ,mu materaniro asanzwe aba ku Cyumweru mu itorero ayoboye. Bishop Rugagi yavuze ko impamvu imutera gushishikara abwiriza abantu ngo ni ukugira ngo itorero rye rizemo abaherwe benshi bafite amamiriyoni maze itorero rye ritere imbere mu buryo bugaragarira buri wese, ntirikomeze kuba insuzugurwa muri rubanda. Rugagi yagize ati “Mba nshaka aba multimillionaires (abafite akayabo ka za miliyoni) ngo baze mu rusengero ariko sindababona, agakiza ni kimwe n’imigisha iva mu gakiza ni icya kabiri,…ntidushobora gutera imbere nk’itorero rya Kristo dufite ubukene. Impamvu nashishikara mbwira Imana kugutabara no kugusubiza ni ukugira ngo itorero rya Kristo ridasuzugurwa.” Yakomeje avuga ko gukomera kw’andi madini bitava mu misengere ihambaye ituma Imana ibahesha icyubahiro mu bantu, ngo ahubwo biterwa n’ubutunzi bafite bubatera gutumira uwo bashatse. Yagize ati “Ugize ngo impamvu aya madini yubahwa ni iki ? Ni uko asenga cyane se? Oya. Ahubwo ni amafaranga ndetse n’inyubako nziza, ibi bizu….” Aha ni ho ahera avuga ko iyo atumiye abakomeye muri gahunda zitandukanye zitegurwa n’irotero rye, ngo ntababona kubera ko we ari rubanda rugufi ahubwo bamwoherereza abaciriritse bo ku rwego rwe. Rugagi abivuga muri aya magambo “Ni yo mpamvu ibatera gutumira abakomeye bakajyayo, ari ko njye nabatumira bakibaza bati ΄afite iki ? yubatse he ? atunze nde ?… Mumwoherereze uriya wo ku muteremuko hariya.” Aha ni na ho yahishuriye abayoboke ko impamvu ibihangange mu mupira w’amaguru bishagararirwa na buri wese, atari uko bambaye ahubwo ibyo bakenyereyeho. Ati “Buriya Messi aramutse ageze hano yambaye imyenda avanye mu kibuga ndetse na kamambiri, twamwakira dukoma amashyi, amatereviziyo amufata amashusho.
