Nta muntu wakwita ku ikabutura yambaye ahubwo mwarwana no kumwifotorezaho (selfi) mutitaye ku ikabutura yambaye ahubwo mubitewe n’uko ari umukire uyakenyereye kuri iyo kabutura.” Gusa ikindi kandi, Bishop Rugagi yagaragaje urutonde rw’ibihugu byo muri Afurika birimo amatorero yubashywe ku isi kubera ko ayo matorero aba asengeramo abaherwe. urugero yatanze rw’ibyo bihugu Nigeria, Afurika Y’Epfo, Ghana na Kenya. Ahita avuga ko abayobozi b’amatorero muri ibi bihugu bubashye kubera ko Imana yabahaye abashyiramo agafaranga gatubutse. Rugagi yavuze kandi ko mu myaka 10 iri imbere itorero rye Redeemed Gospel Church Imana izarizamura mu ntare aho izarizanamo abakomeye ndetse bavuga rikijyana kandi bahora bihagazeho aho bari hose. Ibi bishimangirwa n’umushinga bafite wo kubaka urusengero rw’akataraboneka dore ko ubu aho basengera ari mu icumbi. 


 Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Igisibo cya Ramadhan kizakorwa gite mu bihe bya coronavirus ?
content: Kuwa Gatanu tariki 24 Mata 2020 nibwo biteganyijwe ko igisibo cya Ramadhan kizatangira mu Rwanda. Igisibo cya Ramadan ni ukwezi gutagatifu ku bayisilamu aho biyiriza, bagahurira mu masengesho bakanasangira amafunguro ku mugoroba ari nako bakora ibikorwa by’urukundo. Nko mu Rwanda ibikorwa byose bihuriza abantu hamwe byarahagaritswe mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus, ku buryo bitazakunda ko abayisilamu bakora ibyo bikorwa bari basanzwe bakora nkuko byahoze. Sheikh Mbarushimana Suleiman, ni umujyanama wa Mufti w’u Rwanda yabwiye IGIHE ati “Kubera ibi bihe by’icyorezo cya coronavirus, biteganyijwe ko igisibo cya Ramadan kizakorwa abayisilimu bose bakorera mu ngo amasengesho asanzwe akorwa mu gisibo, igihe cyo gufata amafunguro ku mugoroba abayisilamu batumiranaga bagasangira Iftar, ubu ntabwo bizashoboka kubera ibihe turimo.” Gusari byari bisanzwe bikorerwa mu misigiti, bizajya bikorerwa mu ngo icyakora gutora Adhana (kumenyesha abayisilamu ko isaha yo gusari igeze) bizakomeza gukorwa. Gufasha abatishoboye n’ibindi bikorwa by’urukundo, Sheikh Mbarushimana avuga ko nabyo bizajya bikorwa mu buryo bwihariye. Ati “Byakorwa mu buryo bwo kunganira nk’umuvandimwe ukeneye ifunguro aho kumubwira ngo aze basangirire mu rugo ahubwo akaba yamwoherereza nk’amafaranga binyuze kuri Mobile Money akigurira ifunguro.” Ku bashaka kugira abo bafasha mu buryo bwa rusange, ngo bizaba ngombwa ko bamenyesha ubuyobozi bw’Umuryango w’Abayisilamu mu Rwanda bukabafasha. Kugeza ubu coronavirus imaze gutangazwa mu bihugu 185 hirya no hino ku isi. Umuhango wo gukorera urugendo rutagatifu i Maka nkuko bisabwa abayisilamu, nabyo uyu mwaka bishobora kutazashoboka mu gisibo cya Ramadan kuko ingendo zahagaze hirya no hino. Sheikh Mbarushimana avuga ko ari ubwa mbere bibayeho ko igisibo cya Ramadan kiba mu buryo nk’ubu. Icyakora, yavuze ko hari amabwiriza Intumwa y’Imana Muhamad yigeze gutanga ubwo habonekaga icyorezo mu bice birimo Ethiopia y’ubu. Ati “Hari inyigisho ihari muri Islam ivuga ko no ku gihe cy’Intumwa y’Imana byigeze kubaho ibihe by’ibyorezo, hanyuma hakagaragazwa umurongo w’imyitwarire uko ugenda. Intumwa y’Imana yavuze ko bibujijwe kujya ahantu havugwa icyorezo.” “Hari habayeho icyorezo, bimenyekana ko aho hari uburwayi bw’icyorezo kandi harabagaho kugenderana , ababaga batuye i Maka baragendaga kajya muri Afurika y’amajyaruguru. Intumwa y’Imana irababuza, itanga umurongo w’uko mu gihe ahantu hari icyorezo nta muntu wemerewe kuba yajyayo ngo atandura.” Igitabo gitagatifu cya Korowani kivuga ko iyo umuntu arwaye mu gihe cy’igisibo, asonewe kwiyiriza cyakora akaba yazafata igihe yamaze atiyiriza akayiriza yaramaze gukira. Abantu bakuze, abagore batwite n’abonsa nabo bemerewe kutiyiriza.

title: Kamonyi: Ubudasa mu muganda wo gusoma witabiriwe n’abana n’ababyeyi babo -Amafoto
content:
Umuganda wo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki ya 28 Nzeri 2019 wagizwe umwihariko wahurije hamwe ababyeyi n’abana hirya no hino mu gihugu aho mu gihe ababyeyi batangaga umuganda w’amaboko, ku rundi ruhande abana babo bari bahuze basoma inkuru zitandukanye. Mu karere ka Kamonyi, Umurenge wa Gacurabwenge mu kagali ka Kigembe aho umunyamakuru wa Kigali Post yari ari, aha akaba ari naho habereye umuganda wo ku rwego rw’akarere, abana baturutse k’Urwunge rw’Amashuri rwa Gatizo biga mu mwaka wa mbere kugeza mu wa gatatu w’amashuri abanza ni bo bitabiriye uyu muganda wihariye wo gusoma.

Umuganda ku rwego rw’akarere ka Kamonyi wabereye i Rugobagoba Mu gihe ababyeyi babo bari mu muganda wo kubakira abatishoboye ndetse no gusukura aho batuye mu mudugudu wa Rugobagoba, aba bana bari hafi yabo ku rusengero rwa E.A.R Rugobagoba hamwe n’abarezi babo buri wese afite igitabo asoma.


Abana bari bishimiye uyu muganda udasanzwe wo gusoma bazindukiyemo Mu nama ikurikira umuganda hatoranijwe abana batatu (uhagarariye buri mwaka) basomera inkuru abitabiriye umuganda maze nyuma abayobozi bari bitabiriye uyu muganda barimo Visi Meya w’Akarere ka Kamonyi ushinzwe Ubukungu, Tuyizere Thadée, Uhagarariye Njyanama y’Akarere ka Kamonyi, Habimana Deogratias na Raphael Karanganwa uhagarariye umushinga Soma Umenye mu turere twa Bugesera, Kamonyi, Muhanga n’Umujyi wa Kigali.


Nyuma y’umuganda, abana n’ababyeyi bahuriye hamwe Mu ijambo rye, Umuyobozi wungirije w’akarere ushinzwe ubukungu, Tuyizere Thadee yashishikarije ababyeyi gukunda gusoma bityo bakabikundisha ndetse bakanabitoza abana. Ati "Umwana azitabira gusoma ari uko n’ababyeyi babikora, bakanabimutoza (...). Birasaba ko abana tubafasha ibyo bitabo tukabibagurira ariko n’uwo mwanya tukawubashakira kuko hari ubwo umwana agera mu rugo imirimo yo mu rugo ikamubuza gukora ibindi byose yari akwiye gukora. Umwana rero icy’ibanze ni ukwiga, wenda akanafasha ababyeyi ariko umwanya munini tuwuharire kwiga"

Tuyizere Thadée. Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu mu karere ka Kamonyi asomera abana inkuru Tuyizere yaboneyeho gushimira Minisiteri y’Uburezi n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo ku ngufu bashyize mu gukwirakwiza ibitabo by’abana hirya no hino. Yongeyeho ko abana bakwiye kumenya gusoma mu ndimi nyinshi zishoboka ariko bahereye ku Kinyarwanda. Raphael Karanganwa wari uhagarariye USAID-Soma Umenye yavuze ko gusoma mu ndimi zitandukanye ari umusingi w’ubumenyi, by’umwihariko Ikinyarwanda kikaba ishingiro rya byose. Yagize ati "Gusoma no kwandika indimi zose ni wo musingi w’ubumenyi niho byose bishingiye kuko ubumenyi bwose buturuka mu ndimi. Ikinyarwanda by’umwihariko twagihaye imbaraga cyane."

Karanganwa Raphael wari uhagarariye USAID Soma Umenye muri uyu muganda wahawe izina rya ’Umuganda Literacy’ Karanganwa kandi yavuze ko nta mwana n’umwe ukwiye guhezwa yaba abahungu cyangwa abakobwa, ndetse n’abafite ubumuga. Ati "Abana bose ni abana, abahungu, abakobwa ndetse n’abandi bose bafite ubumuga bose mujye mubaha igihe mubafashe gusoma no kwandika. Niba utazi gusoma ujye umubaza amashusho areba mu gitabo urebe ko yumva icyo ayo mashusho avuga cyangwa se wisunge abaturanyi n’abavandimwe bazi gusoma."

Abana bitegura kwerekeza aho ababyeyi barangije umuganda bari bari Uyu muganda wo gusoma wateguwe na Minisiteri y’Uburezi ifatanije na REB ndetse n’abafatanyabikorwa n’abaterankunga babo barimo Mureke Dusome na USAID Soma Umenye, ukaba wateguwe mu gihe u Rwanda ruri mu kwezi kwahariwe gusoma no kwandika kwatangiye ku ya 08 Nzeri 2019 ubwo kuri uwo munsi hizihizwaga ’Umunsi Mpuzamahanga wahariwe Gusoma no Kwandika’.

Abana bo muri G.S Gatizo ni bo bitabiriye umuganda wo gusoma

Aha, abana biga mu wa gatatu n’abarezi babo, bishakagamo uza kubahagararira mu gusoma

Umuganda w’abanyarwanda ni igikorwa ngaruka kwezi kimaze kubaka izina muri Afurika no ku isi kubera uruhare kigira mu iterambere ry’igihugu bigizwemo uruhare na bene cyo

Abana bishimira gusoma inkuru zishushanyije cyangwa zirimo ibishushanyo byinshi

Umwana wiga mu wa kabiri asomera ababyeyi imwe mu nkuru igaragara mu gitabo kigenewe abana bo muri uyu mwaka

Umuganda wasojwe abana basomera ababyeyi inkuru zo mu bitabo, abayobozi basaba ababyeyi gushyigikira abana babo

title: Umuhungu wa Jose Mourinho ukina mu imuzamu kuri ubu yabonye ikipe nshya
content:
Byamaze kumenyekana ko umuhungu wa Jose Mourinho ari umukinnyi mushya wa Fulham. Jose Junior w’imyaka 16 ubwe abinyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yatangaje ko ari umukinnyi mushya muri Fulham mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri. Ni ubwa mbere agiye kure ya papa we kuko mu makipr se yatozaga ubundi babaga bari kumwe.Sky Bet Championship club Fulham. Haba muri Real Madrid ndetse no muri Chelsea. Ku myaka ye 16, Jose Junior ukina nk’umunyezamu yakinnye mu makipe nka Real Madrid na Chelsea ubwo papa we yayatozaga. Yamaze gushyira umukono ku masezerano n’ikipe ya Fulham y’imyaka ibiri. Ubwe niwe wabaye uwa mbere kbwitangariza ubwo yashyiraga ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ifoto ye arigusinya ayo masezerano. Ni amasezerano azamara imyaka ibiri. Agiye kumara icyo gihe yigira muri Academy k’iyi kipe. Ki ifoto yashyize kuri Instagram ye yari iherekejwe n’aya magambo “ ntewe ishema no kuvuga ko maze gusinya amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri muri Fulham. Ndashima buri wese wamfashije. Nzabahesha ishema.  Ni ibihe byiza ku muryango wa Mourinho kuko na Mourinho senior ari mu bihe bye byiza mu kazi gashya na Manchester United. Nyuma yo gusinya imyaka itatu atoza Luis Van Gaal, ubu yamaze gusinyisha abakinnyi babiri. Abo ni gihangange Zlatan Ibrahmovic, n’umunya Cote D’Ivoire Eric Bailly.



Yanditswe na Rukundo Xaver/Muhabura.rw

title: Miss Chanel yashyize hanze amafoto agaragaza ko akuriwe
content:
Umuhanzikazi akaba n’umukinnyi w’amafilime Nirere Ruth uzwi na benshi ku izina rya Miss Shanel kuri ubu arakuriwe nk’uko bigaragazwa n’amafoto yashyize hanze y’ubuheta agiye kwibaruka nyuma y’aho tariki 3 Nzeri 2015 ari bwo yibarutse imfura ye y’umukobwa. Nkuko yabitangarije abakunzi be akoresheje urubuga rwa Facebook, nyuma yo kubabwira ko akuriwe ndetse ko ari mu kiruhuko gihabwa umubyeyi ukuriwe witegura kubyara, Miss Shanel yabatangarije ko mu gihe cya vuba azabagezaho indirimbo ye nshya. Yagize ati: (….. Nzagaruka vuba mbasangiza indirimbo nshya maze igihe nkora).
Miss Shanel yashakanye n’umufaransa Guillaume Favier bambikana impeta tariki 2 Kanama 2014. Tariki 3 Nzeri 2015 ni bwo bibarutse imfura yabo y’umukobwa. Gushaka umugabo no kubyara ntabwo byaciye intege Miss Shanel mu muziki we kuko nyuma yo kubyara imfura ye yakomeje gukora umuziki, yitabira ibitaramo harimo n’ibyo mu Rwanda ndetse n’ubu yatangaje ko n’ubwo akuriwe, ko agiye kugeza ku bakunzi be indirimbo nshya.








 Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi ikomeje kwesa imihigo
content: Ikipe y’igihugu y’umupira w’amaguru Amavubi yazamutse ku rutonde ngarukakwezi rw’Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru ku isi (FIFA) imyanya 6. Uru rutonde ngarukakwezi FIFA yarutangaje kuri uyu wa gatatu tariki ya 4 Gashyantare 2016. Ubu Amavubi ageze ku mwanya wa 85 avuye ku mwanya wa 91 nk’uko urubuga rwa internet rwa FIFA rubitangaza. Mbere y’irushanwa ry’abakinnyi bakina muri shampiyona yabo ku mugabane w’Afurika (CHAN), Amavubi yanganyije na Cameroun ubusa ku bundi ndetse inatsinda Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo igitego 1-0. Mu Karere ka Afurika y’u Burasirazuba, ikipe ya Uganda iri ku mwanya wa 70 yasubiye inyuma imyanya 8, Kenya yasubiye inyuma imyanya 2 iri ku mwanya wa 99, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo yazamutse imyanya 3 iri ku mwanya wa 57, Tanzania yazamutse umwanya umwe iri ku mwanya wa 125, Ethiopia yasubiye inyuma imyanya 6 ikaba iri ku mwanya wa 124. Uko amakipe akurikirana bihereye ku mwaya wa mbere ku mugabane w’Afurika, Cote d’Ivoire  yasubiye inyuma imyanya 9 iri ku mwanya wa 28, Cape Verde yazamutse imyanya 6 iri ku mwanya 33, Algeria yasubiye inyuma imyanya 8 iri ku mwanya wa 36, Ghana yasubiye inyuma imyanya 8 iri ku mwanya wa 41, Senegal yagumye ku mwanya wayo wa 45. Uko amakipe akurikirana ku rwego rw’Isi kuva ku mwanya wa mbere kugera kuwa 5: Ububirigi, Algentina, Esipanye, Ubudage na Chile. Amakipe atatu ya nyuma anganya amanota ni Djibouti iri ku mwanya wa 204, Eritrea iri ku mwanya wa 204 naho Somalia iri ku mwanya wa 204. Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Ikipe y’u Rwanda mu isiganwa ry’amagare yaciye agahigo mu mikino ya  “All Africa Games 2015″ irimo kubera muri Congo ...
content:
Kuri uyu  wa 10 Nzeri Ikipe y’igihugu y’u Rwanda mu gusiganwa ku magare yabaye yatangiye ikora amateka aho yaje  ku mwanya wa 3 ikurikiye  Afurika y’Epfo na Algeria. ku munsi wa mbere hakaba habaye uburyo bwo gusiganwa n’isaaha ariko bagakina nk’ikipe “Team Time Trial”.
 Iyi kipe y’u Rwanda  igizwe na Nsengimana Bosco ,Hadi Janvier, Aleluya Joseph, na Ndayisenga Valens. Basiganwa ahantu hareshya n’ibirometero 25, iyi kipe ikoresha iminota 30, amasengonda 30 n’ibice 52 Umutoza w’ikipe y’igihuhu wungirije, Sempoma Felix yatangaje ko bimushimishije cyane kuba babashije kwegukana uyu mudali w’umunya wa 3 n’ubwo bifuzaga  uwa mbere.
Umutoza Felix yakomeje kandi agira ati “Iri rushanwa rirakomeye, Twaje twifuza umudali wa zahabu ariko n’uyu tubonye ndawakiriye kandi ndishimye cyane”. Kapiteni w’ikipe y’igihugu y’amagare. 

 Ikipe y’igihugu iyobowe na Sempoma Felix  Hadi Janvier nawe yagize icyo avuga  ati ” Turishimye kuba tubonye uyu mwanya wa 3, twashobora no kuza imbere ariko ikirere cyatugoye cyatubanye kibi . Icyo Afurika y’Epfo yaturushije bashoboye gutambika ikindi bari bafite amagare meza ya course contre la montre kuko turi babiri twari tuyafite gusa, ariko twakoze neza”. Tubibutse ko Ikipe yabaye iya mbere y’Afurika y’Epfo yakoresheje iminota 29, amasegonda 32 n’ibice 12 naho Algeria ikoreshaiminot 29, amasegonda 50 n’ibice 54. Uyu munsi taliki 11 Nzeri 2015, isiganwa rirakomeza, aho haza abakinnyi baza gusiganwa n’igihe ariko buri mukinnyi ku giti cye “Individual Time Trial”.Mu bahungu harasiganwa Hadi Janvier na Ndayisenga Valens naho mu bakobwa hasiganwe Girubuntu Jeanne D’Arc. Abahungu barasiganwa ibirometaro 12.5 naho abakoba basiganwe ibirometero 12. www.muhabura.rw

title: Kanuma Jean Damascène yashyize hanze indirimbo nshya yise ‘Nkurya Munsi’
content: Imijyi myinshi muri Amerika no hanze yayo irimo imyigaragambyo ikomeye yamagana irondaruhu nyuma y’urupfu rwa Floyd wishwe mu Cyumweru gishize, bikozwe n’umupolisi wamushikamiye akoresheje ivi kugeza aheze umwuka. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu Papa Francis yavuze ko irondaruhu atari iryo kwihanganira, ariko yongeraho ko ubugizi bwa nabi nabwo ari inzira yo kwiyangiza no gusenya. Yavuze ko urupfu rwa Floyd rubabaje ndetse ko ari kumusengera n’abandi bose bapfuye bazize “icyaha cy’ivanguramoko’. Yagize ati “Nshuti zanjye ntabwo twakwihanganira cyangwa ngo twirengagize irondaruhu n’ihezwa ry’ubwoko bwose, hanyuma ngo tuvuge ko turengera igitinyiro cy’ubuzima bwa muntu.” Agaruka ku myigaragambyo yagaragayemo ubugizi bwa nabi imaze iminsi ikorwa muri Amerika, Papa yagize ati “Ni nako kandi tugomba kumenya ko ubugizi bwa nabi bumaze iminsi bwigaragaza, ari uburyo bwo kwiyangiza no kwitsinda. Nta na kimwe wageraho ukoresheje ubugizi bwa nabi ahubwo wangiza byinshi.” Papa Francis yasabye abanyamerika kwiragiza Imana ikabafasha kugarura amahoro n’ubwiyunge.

title: Kuki Col Ruhashya Epimaque yiswe Ruhashyinyenzi?
content: Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE, Ruhashya Egide, yagarutse ku buryo se yafashe icyemezo cyo kujya mu Gisirikare atari yishimiwemo kubera ko yari Umututsi uturuka mu Batsobe bavagamo Abiru b’Ibwami. Ruhashya avuga ko se akiri mu mashuri yisumbuye mu Ndatwa za Groupe Scolaire i Butare mu myaka ya za 1960, yumvise ko hari ibizamini byo kujya mu Ishuri rikuru rya Gisirikare ryaje kwitwa ESM (Ecole Supérieure Militaire). Yashakishije amakuru ajyanye n’ibyo umuntu akora nyuma yo kurisohokamo, arabikunda ajya kwiyandikisha. Mu buhamya bwe avuga ko umubyeyi we yari azi ko aziga ibijyanye na Agronomie. Col Ruhashya yinjiriye rimwe n’abandi basirikare muri promotion ya mbere y’iryo shuri barimo Habyarimana Juvénal wari ufite Matricule nr 01, Kanyarengwe Alexis M. 02, Nsekalije Aloys M.03, Benda Sabin M.04. We yari afite Matricule nr 05. Ruhashya Egide avuga ko akiri muto yakundaga kwegera no kuganira na se, akaba ari nawe wamuvunguriye kuri ayo mateka, anasoma izindi nyandiko. Ati ‘‘Data rero yasohotse muri ryo shuri ari Sous-Lieutenant. Yatangiye imirimo ya gisirikare ari Major. Yambwiye ko muri icyo gihe abasirikare benshi bakuru mu Rwanda bari Ababiligi abandi abato ari Abanye-Congo. Icyo gihe nibwo Abanyarwanda bari bagiye kuba mu basirikare ba mbere bakuru u Rwanda rugize.’’ Col Ruhashya mbere yo kwemererwa kwinjira mu Gisirikare uwari Minisitiri w’Ingabo icyo gihe witwa Sebazungu yabanje kumwangira ariko aza kubwirwa n’umutware Kayumba wari ufitanye ubucuti na Mbonyumutwa ko Umututsi umwe ntacyo atwaye. Mbonyumutwa ngo yavugaga ko ‘byanagaragara neza Umututsi umwe arimo’. Nibwo yinjiranye na bagenzi be barimo Habyarimana Juvénal n’abandi.  	Imibereho ya Col Ruhashya mu gisirikare cya Habyarimana Ruhashya Egide yagaragaje ko umubyeyi we nta bucuti bwihariye yagiranye na Habyarimana kuko binjiranye mu Gisirikare. Yagize “Buriya igisirikare ni ahantu ha mbere abakirimo bakurikiza amategeko, kuvuga ko yaba yarabaye umusirikare wa Habyalimana ndagira ngo mvuge ko atari byo, habaho umusirikare w’igihugu nta musirikare wa kanaka ubaho. Byumvikane neza.’’  	Byavuye he ngo Col Ruhashya yitwe Ruhashyinyenzi? Ruhashya Egide yavuze ko mu bitaga umubyeyi we ‘Ruhashyinyenzi’ barimo abakabyaga n’ababimwitiriye ngo berekane ko arimo kurwana na bene wabo kandi nk’umusirikare wese mu gihugu gitewe usabwa kujya ku rugamba. Urwo rugamba kuri Ruhashya wagira ngo ni we musirikare wenyine wari mu bice byose byatewe haba mu Bugesera, mu Bweyeye, Nshiri n’Umutara.  	Icyo Col Ruhashya yabwiye umuhungu we kuri Coup d‘Etat yo ku wa 5 Nyakanga 1973 Umuhungu wa Col Ruhashya avuga ko byabaye ngombwa ko umubyeyi we ‘ajya mu mubare w’abayikoze ariko byateguwe atabizi abimenya bitinze nibwo agaragaye mu mafoto ya komite yari iyigize byinjira mu mateka bityo.’ Egide Ruhashya yakomeje avuga ko bitari kumvikana ko yari kwitandukanya na bagenzi be biganye. Ati ‘‘Ntibyari kumvikana ukuntu aza gusigara mu bandi kandi ari muri promotion ya mbere n’iya kabiri kuko nizo zakoze Coup d’Etat; aha nibutse ko kandi yarayoboye ikigo gikomeye cyo mu Ruhengeri.’’ Mbere y’ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’uwo mugambi, Col Ruhashya yigeze gusagarirwa n’umucamanza witwa Kanani Aminadabu, bigera naho akubitwa urushyi acirwa mu maso, kubera uburakari akuramo imbunda agiye kumurasa, yisubiraho arihangana, atsinda uwo mujinya. Nyuma yaje gukora mu mirimo itandukanye ya gisirikare irimo kuyobora ESO Butare, Ikigo cya Camp Kigali, Ikigo cy’Urubyiruko gishamikiye kuri Minisiteri y’Ingabo icyo gihe ari nacyo yakozemo igihe kinini. Ruhashya Egide avuga ko ‘‘Aho yabaraga amagi y’inkoko, areba imirima yahinzwe imbuto bakoresheje, ibintu bimupyinagaza ku rwego yariho.’’ Col Ruhashya ntiyigeze na rimwe arenga u Rwanda ajya mu yahoze ari Zaïre, Tanzania, u Burundi na Uganda ngo yoherejwe mu butumwa bw’amahoro kuko yakoreshwaga igihe bibaye ngombwa. Yifashishije urugero, umuhungu we yavuze ko mu 1990, mu gihe cy’Intambara yahawe umwanya ukomeye ku izina gusa aho yari ashinzwe kumenya ibintu byose byaba intwaro, ibikoresho byose bikenerwa n’abasirikare ku rugamba. Ati ‘‘Nta na rimwe yigeze akoresha uwo mwanya bagiraga ngo bimwitirirwe gusa berekane ko bari kumwe na we mu kazi. Ntacyo yakoraga mu nshingano zijyanye n’icyo uwo mwanya uvuze. Hari n’izindi ngero nyinshi zagaragaje ihohoterwa n’ishyirwa mu kato mu gihe yari umusirikare mukuru. Ibi byose byakorwaga kuko yari Umututsi, asuzugurwa n’abasirikare bato.’’ Umunsi umwe Col Ruhashya yigeze gusangira n’abandi basirikare bakuru nyuma y’Umunsi Mukuru wabaga ku wa 5 Nyakanga noneho abasirikare bakuru bajya muri Mess ya gisirikare baridagadura. Ruhashya Egide avuga ko ngo ‘‘Haje kujyamo indirimbo nuko Gen Major Habyarimana abwira Col Ruhashya ko bo babyinnye na we yakwidagadura mu ndirimbo ya ‘bene wanyu’ ndetse yayibyinnye wenyine, abandi bamushungereye baseka.’’  	Uko Ruhashya Egide yafashe icyemezo cyo kujya ku rugamba rw’Inkotanyi Ruhashya Egide yavuze ko “Nkurikije ibyo nabonaga nasanze ntaho ntaniye n’ibyatumye abandi bafata icyemezo cyo kujya ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu.’’ Ubwo yafataga icyo cyemezo yabanje kumenyesha umubyeyi we, amubwira aho agiye, na we nk’umuntu mukuru uzi ubwenge yaramwumvise amuhesha umugisha wa kibyeyi. Yamubwiye ati ‘‘Mwana wanjye uri umugabo ugende ntuzasibire inyuma.’’ Icyo gihe urugamba rurangiye yagize amahirwe yo kumusanga n’umuryango bongera kubana. Ubwo yageraga mu rugo avuye ku rugamba, yari yambaye impuzankano ya gisirikare. Avuga ko agikubitana amaso n’umubyeyi we, yamuhaye isaruti igaragaza ko amwubashye nkuko bigenda mu gisirikare, na we amuha uburenganzira bwo kumuramutsa barahoberana. Yakomeje avuga ati ‘‘Nongeye nshimishwa no kumubona akorera igihugu cye kuko Leta yari iyobowe na FPR yamugaruriye icyizere. Aho namubonye bikashimishwa ni ubwo yari mu mwambaro w’abasirikare bakuru ku rwego rwa Colonel igihe habaga umunsi mukuru wo kwibohora.’’ Urubyaro rwa Col Ruhashya, witabye Imana azize uburwayi, bishimira ko umubyeyi wabo yahesheje agaciro impuzankano ya Gisirikare, anagihagararira mu butumwa bw’amahoro, amahirwe yari yarimwe ku ngoma ya Habyarimana.  	Reba ibice bitatu by’ibiganiro birambuye IGIHE yagiranye na Ruhashya Egide, umwana wa nyakwigendera Col Ruhashya [email protected]

title: Sergio Aguero yagiye kurutonde rwa batatu bamaze gutsinda Chelsea FC Hat-trick iwayo -"Reba Amafoto"
content:
Mu mukino wa Shampiyona Chelsea FC yari yakiriyemo Manchester City kukibuga  Stamford Bridge.Byarangiye amateka yisubiyemo maze 3-0 Man.City yari yastinze Chelsea mu mukino ubanza, ni nabyo yayitsinze mu mukino wo kwishyura. Uyu mukino kandi wabaye inzira Aguero yakoresheje yandika amateka yo gutsindira Chelsea ibitego 3 kuri iki kibuga. Abandi babikoze ni Robin Van Persie na Nuanko Kanu. Uyu mukino wagiye gutangira abakinny ba City basa nk’abameze neza mu mitwe kurusha Chelsea kubera ko bamaze gukora amateka yo kugera muri ½ cya UEFA Champions League. Byaje no kubahira kukoku munota wa 33 Aguero yatsinze icya mbera, kuawa 54 arabasubira maze kuwa 81 arabasonga kuri penalte ari nako kuwa 79 Thibaut Courtois uuzamu wa Chelsea yabonye ikarita itukura. Ibi rero birashimangira ko ibyo abantu bakekaga ko Pellegrine yasiga iyi kipe ahabi , we atariko abyifuza. Byose biraganisha ku kukuba umwakaw’imikino iutaha City izakina UEFA Champions league. Iyi kandi ni intambwe nziza yo kongera icyizere mu bakinnyi kuburyo byazanabafasha guhanga na Real Madrid bazahura muri UEFA Champions league. Ku rundi ruhande, ikipe ya Chelsea irimo kwikura mu mwanya wo kuba basi yanahatanira gukina UEFA Europaleague umwaka utaha. Byaba ari uurage urtari mwiza umutoza Antanio Conte ari gusigirwa cyane ko n’ubwo bivugwa ko agomba kugura abakinnyi, ntawakirengagiza ko umuherwe wa Chelsea afite gahunda yo kubaka stade .










 Yanditswe na Rukundo Xaver/Muhabura.rw

title: Nyuma y’imyaka ibiri n’igice Liverpool yafashe umwanya wa mbere, ibindi bigugu bihagaze gute?
content:
Nyuma y’umunsi wa 11 wa English Premier league, Liverpool yafashe umwanya wa mbere yari iherutseho muri season ya 2013/14, byavuye mu nsinzi ikomeye bakuye Anifield imbere ya Watford, 6-1. Ni nyuma y’uko amakipe banganyaga amanota yombi yatakaje.
 
Umutoza Jurgen Klopp amaze guhindura Liverpool FC Ni ibitego byatsinzwe na Sadio Mane ufitemo bibiri, Philippe Coutihno, Emre Can na Roberto Firmino naho kimwe cya Watford kikaba cyatsinzwe na Daryl Janmaat. 
Ubutatu busatitirizi bwa Liverpool ni yo attack ikomeye mu bwongereza (Coutihno, Mane na Firmino Mu mikino yari yabanje, amakipe yanganyaga na Liverpool amanota, yombi yari yatakaje: Arsenal yanganyije na Tottenhm 1-1 mu gihe no Kuwa gatandatu Manchester City yari yanganyije na Middlesbrough 1-1. Ibi byatumywe urutonde ruhinduka.  1.	Liverpool FC  26 2.	Chelsea FC 25 3.	Manchester City 24 4.	Arsenal 24 5.	Tottenham 21 6.	Manchester United 18

title: Dore ibintu 7 umukobwa cyangwa  umugore  agomba kuba yujuje  Ku buryo buri mugabo wese yamwifuza
content: Umugore wese cyangwa umukobwa aho ava akagera aba yumva yakishimirwa na buri muntu uwo ari we wese ari nayo mpamvu uzasanga buri mugore wese aba aharanira gukora uko ashoboye kose kugira ngo agaragarire neza abamubona. Aha MUHABURA.RW yabateguriye  ibintu 7 bituma umugore arushaho kwishimirwa n’umugabo umubonye wese. 1.Kwigirira icyizere Mu buzima bwa buri munsi burya ni byiza kwigirira icyizere, burya ngo abagore biyumva ko ari beza bakanyurwa n’uko bari abagabo barabakunda cyane ! abagabo ntibakunda umuntu wisuzugura. 2.Kwisanzura Kwisanzura bavuga hano ni nko kwishyira ukizana, abagabo burya bakunda umugore ubisanzuraho, bagakunda umugore kandi wumva ko ntacyo abujijwe gukora kandi ko nta mupaka uhari atagomba kurenga. 3. Gutangaza ibitekerezo bye Abahungu bamwe batinya abakobwa bakunda gutangaza ibitekerezo byabo, Ariko abagabo bo barabishimira cyane, N’ubwo ariko hari bamwe badakunda abagore/abakobwa bakunda kumvikana bavuga ibitekerezo byabo hari abandi benshi babyishimira, cyane cyane iyo byavuzwe n’umuntu bakunda birabanezeza cyane. 4. Kwita kuri buri kintu Abagabo bakunda abagore baha agaciro buri kintu cyose berekejeho amaboko, niba ari akazi abagabo baba bifuza abagore bashoboye akazi kandi bakabikorana umutima ukunze, Aha ngaha kandi abagabo bakunda abagore baha umwanya umuryango bakaganiriza abana ndetse n’umugabo. 5.Kwiyubaha/kwiha agaciro Abagabo aho bava bakagera bose burya bakunda abagore biyubaha, aha ngaha kwiyubaha biri mu byiciri byinshi, Urugero: mu myambarire, mu mivugire,…Abagabo bakunda abagore biyubaha mu myambarire ndetse no mu biganiro byabo, umugore wihesha agaciro kuri ibi bintu usanga akurura abagabo benshi. 6.Kuba inyangamugayo Mu mibanire y’umugabo n’umugore burya ubunyangamugayo burakenewe cyane, nibwo butuma habaho kwizerana hagati yabo, iyo umuntu ari inyangamugayo ntakora ibigayitse cyangwa ibimusuzuguza ,umugore w’inyangamugayo arakundwa cyane ku buryo buri mugabo wese aba amwifuza. 7.Kwita ku mugabo kandi akanamukunda Umugabo uwo ari we wese aba ashaka umugore umukunda kandi akanamwitaho cyane Niba uri umugore ukaba utajya wita k’umugabo wawe ngo umwiteho kandi umwereke urukundo umenye ko urugo rwawe rutazigera rukomera na rimwe mu gihe utari wabikora. Abagabo bakururwa cyane no kwitabwaho. Ufite ibindi bitekerezo mwatwandikira kuri email: Muhabura10@gmail.com Salongo Richard \Muhabura.rw

title: Kwizera uheruka kurushinga n’umugore umurusha imyaka 27, afunzwe akurikiranyweho gutera inda umwana
content:
Kwizera Evariste ni izina ryamamaye cyane mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka ubwa hasakaraga inkuru y’uko agiye kurushinga n’uwitwa Mukaperezida Clotilde umurusha imyaka 27 kuko afite imyaka 48 mu gihe umusore afite 21. Kuri ubu uyu mugabo ari mu maboko y’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha, RIB. Uyu mugabo warushinze ku ya 31 Mutarama 2019, ubu yongeye kugaruka mu itangazamakuru nyuma y’uko RIB itangaje ko yamutaye muri yombi akurikiranyweho gufata ku ngufu no gutera inda umwana w’umukobwa utarageza imyaka y’ubukure. Kwizera Evariste  ngo yaba yarasambanije ndetse anatera inda umwana w’umukobwa ufite imyaka 15 y’amavuko maze ahita ahunga ajya kuba i Kigali kugira ngo adakurikiranwa dore ko yari asanzwe atuye i Rwamagana aho akomoka. Amakuru y’itabwa muri yombi rya Kwizera yemejwe n’Umuvugizi wa RIB, Mbabazi Modeste. Aganira na Igihe yagize ati “Nibyo ari gukurikiranwa n’ubugenzacyaha ku cyaha cyo gusambanya umwana. Afungiwe kuri Sitasiyo ya Kigabiro.”

Ubukwe bwa Kwizera na Mukaperezida bwaravuzwe cyane Mu gihe iki cyaha cyaba kimuhamye uyu mugabo w’imyaka 21 y’amavuko wari umaze amezi ane n’icyumweru arushinze yahanishwa n’ Ingingo ya 133 y’Igitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda iteganya ko umuntu usambanya umwana utarageza imyaka y’ubukure iyo abihamijwe n’urukiko, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’imyaka 20 ariko kitarenze imyaka 25.

title: U Bushinwa: Abanyarwanda baba mu Ntara ya Xinjiang bahuriye mu bikorwa byo Kwibuka
content: Kuwa Kabiri tariki 7 Mata 2020, nibwo Abanyarwanda basaga 550 baba mu Bushinwa bifatanyije n’u Rwanda gutangiza iminsi 100 yo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ibaye. Hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Mu busanzwe, nyuma yo Kwibuka ku rwego rwa Ambasade, ibikorwa byo Kwibuka bikomereza hirya no hino mu Ntara zo muri icyo gihugu, hagendewe kuri gahunda zo Kwibuka ziba ziri gukurikizwa mu Rwanda, ariko ubu siko byagenze kubera Covid-19. Abanyarwanda baba mu Ntara ya Xinjiang mu mugi wa Urumqi bo babwiye IGIHE ko babashije guhura kubera ko icyorezo cya Covid 19 gisa nk’aho cyaharangiye. Umuhango wo Kwibuka watangijwe n’umunota wo kwibuka ndetse hacanwa urumuri rw’Icyizere bikurikirwa n’ibiganiro bitandukanye. Mu biganiro byatanzwe harimo icyagarutse ku ruhare rw’ ubutabera mu kubaka umuryango nyarwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, n’ikigaruka ku mateka y’itegurwa n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Umuyobozi w’Abanyarwanda baba mu Ntara ya Xinjiang, Gasirabo Aboubakar yasobanuye Jenoside icyo aricyo, gupfobya n’ingaruka mbi zabyo. Gasirabo yasabye Abanyarwanda guhangana n’abapfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakoresheje imbuga nkoranyambaga, bakagaragaza amakuru y’ukuri. Ati “Dukwiye kurushaho gukoresha ikoranabuhanga hamwe n’imbuga nkoranyambaga mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ipfobya rikorerwa ku mbunga nkoranyambaga hagatangazwa amakuru ya nyayo.” Mu gutangiza ibikorwa byo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26, Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bushinwa, James Kimonyo, yasabye abanyarwanda baba mu Bushinwa kurangwa n’indangagaciro z’ubwitange zaranze ingabo za RPA, ubwo zahagarikaga Jenoside ziyobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame.

title: Abakozi ba Ferwafa bashinjwa guha umusifuzi ruswa’ batawe muri yombi
content: Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda, Ferwafa, ndetse n’Ushinzwe Amarushanwa, batawe muri yombi mu iperereza ku byaha bakekwaho byo guha ruswa umusifuzi ku mukino wahuje ikipe y’u Rwanda Amavubi n’Inzovu za Côte d’Ivoire . Aba bagabo batawe muri yombi ni Eric Ruhamiriza ushinzwe amarushanwa muri FERWAFA na Francois Regis Uwayezu, usanzwe ari Umunyamabanga mukuru muri iki kigo. Umuvugizi w’Urwego rw’igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha,RIB, Mbabazi Modetse yatangarije umunyamakuru  ko aba bagabo bombi batawe muri yombi, kugira ngo bakurikiranwe icyaha bakekwaho cyo gutanga ruswa. Yagize ati “Nibyo koko Eric Ruhamiriza ushinzwe amarushanwa na Francois Regis Uwayezu, Umunyamabanga mukuru muri Ferwafa batawe muri yombi ku wa Gatatu.” Yakomeje avuga ko Ubugenzacyaha burimo gukurikirana ibyaha aba bagabo bakekwaho.Kugeza ubu bombi bafungiye aho RIB ikorera ku Kimihurura. Umunya-Namibia Jackson Pavaza wasifuye umukino w’u Rwanda na Côte d’Ivoire wabaye ku Cyumweru, niwe wareze Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda, Ferwafa, Francois Regis Uwayezu na Eric Ruhamiriza Ushinzwe Amarushanwa abashinja ko bashatse kumuha ruswa ngo abogamire ku ikipe y’u Rwanda Amavubi. Jackson Pavaza yari yahise atanga ikirego mu ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Afurika CAF, ashinja abo bayobozi ko bashatse guha ruswa abasifuzi yari ahagarariye ngo babogamire ku ikipe y’Amavubi. Mu kirego Pavaza yatanze, yavuze ko abo bayobozi bamuzaniye amafaranga muri anvelope y’ikaki, akababwira ko adashobora kwemera impano ivuye kuri buri wese, kuko n’amategeko ya CAF atabyemera. Niyomugabo Albert

title: Ubuhamya bwa Olga Lorie, umuhanzikazi wavuye i Burundi agana mu Rwanda kuhashakira amaronko (Video)
content: Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE yavuze ko yatangiye aririmba zihimbaza ndetse agakorana n’abaramyi bakomeye mu gihugu cy’ivuko rye cy’u Burundi nyuma akaza gufata umwanzuro wo kubivamo. Ati “Natangiye ndirimbo zihimbaza Imana ndirimbana na Fortrant Bigirimana hagati yo mu 2007 na 2009. Nyuma njye mu itsinda ryitwa The Cousin na none ndongera ntangira kuririmbana na Lorilo indirimbo zitari nkeya rero nyuma mpita ninjira mu gucuranga muri band.” Uyu mukobwa yamamaye mu ndirimbo nyinshi iwabo mu Burundi zirimo iyitwa ‘Akarorero’, ariko ahita areka kuririmba nk’umuhanzi ku giti cye ahubwo ajya kuririmbana na Peace & Love bamamaye cyane mu ndirimbo ‘Ic’Imana Yifatanirije’ ayifasha mu bitaramo bitandukanye we n’abandi bagenzi be. Mu 2015 bahisemo gutandukana n’iri tsinda ryakunzwe cyane mu bihugu byo muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba baza mu Rwanda gushakisha ko babona aho bazajya baririmbira abantu muri ‘Karaoke’ ndetse no mu buryo bwa live music. Ati “Mu 2015 nibwo twafashe icyemezo cyo kureba twaza mu Rwanda, tukaza tukareba ibyo abandi bakora, icyo gihe Peace & Love twayisize mu Burundi. Twazanye n’abandi twafatanyaga muri iri tsinda, twaje turi abakobwa babiri n’abahungu bane. Twaje tuvuga tuti ikiba kibe kuko nta n’umuntu twari tuzi mu Rwanda.” Akomeza avuga byari bikomeye cyane bageze mu Rwanda. Babanje kuba muri Hotel igihe gito batangira kubona akazi nyuma banitabaza inshuti bagiye bahura nazo zirabacumbikira. Avuga ko hari igihe baryaga ubundi ntibarye kubera ko nta kintu babaga babonye. Ubu Olga Lorie wasaga n’uwaretse umuziki yawugarutsemo ndetse ahita indirimbo nshya. Arifuza gukorana n’abahanzi bakomeye bo mu Rwanda kugira ngo akomeze guhamya ibigwi bye. Reba indirimbo nshya ya Olga Lorie

title: Paul Hagayi wari umaze imyaka ibiri atuje yasohoye indirimbo yise “Negamiye Imana”
content: Paul Hagayi ni umuramyi, umwanditsi w’indirimbo, akaba anazitunganya (Producer). Indirimbo ye nshya yasohokanye n’amashusho yayo iri mu zizaba zigize album ya kabiri ari gukoraho. “Negamiye Imana” ni indirimbo irimo ubutumwa buvuga ko mu byo abantu bakora n’ibyo banyuramo bakwiye kwizera Imana. Paul Hagayi yavuze ko mu kuyikora yahamyaga ko ubuzima bwose bushingiye ku Mana yonyine kandi ko umurimo abantu bakora ariyo yonyine izawusohoza. Igitekerezo cyo kuyandika yakigize ubwo yari mu bibazo asa n’uwaburiye ibisubizo. Yubakiye ku magambo menshi aboneka muri Bibiliya mu bitabo bitandukanye. Yakomeje ati “Indirimbo nayanditse ndimo nibaza ibibazo byinshi naburiye igisubizo, hahandi uba wumva hari intambara nyinshi urimo kurwana mu buryo bw’intekerezo aho rero ni ho Imana yanganirije mu ijambo ryayo dusanga muri Yeremiya 1:5 (Nakumenye ntarakurema kandi nakwejeje utaravuka).’’ "Numvise ngize imbaraga mu bugingo bwanjye, numva nsubijwe n’ibyo bibazo byose nibazaga muri njye. Icyo gihe nahise mfata gitari na telefoni ntangira kwandika indirimbo gutyo.’’ Paul Hagayi yavukiye mu muryango ukijijwe, se ni Pasiteri mu Itorero rya ADEPR. Yavuye mu Rwanda mu 2013, aho yasengeraga muri ADEPR, Umudugudu wa Bugunga muri Gicumbi. Uyu mugabo kuri ubu abarizwa mu Itorero rya Power of Prayer Church mu Buholandi, aho ari umwe mu baramyi bakuru mu itorero. Paul Hagayi yatangiriye umuziki mu matsinda atandukanye. Mu 2014 ni bwo yinjiye muri studio gukora indirimbo ze wenyine za mbere mu Buholandi. Mu rugendo rwe rwa muzika, amaze gusohora album imwe yise ‘‘Nta rindi zina’’. Ari gukora album ye ya kabiri ndetse afite intego yo gukomeza kwamamaza ubutumwa bwiza kugera ku mpera z’Isi yose. Hagayi avuga ko bitoroshye ariko Imana izamushoboza. Ati “Hano muri ibi bihugu usanga ikoranabuhanga ryaratumye abantu ubwabo biyizera, bibagirwa Imana. Nubwo bimeze bityo haracyari abakizwa kandi bashikamye ku byo bizeye.’’ Paul Hagayi wari umaze igihe kirekire ataboneka mu muziki, muri Nyakanga 2019 nibwo yarushinze na Bakunda Odette mu birori byabereye mu Buholandi.  	Reba indirimbo ‘‘Negamiye Imana’’ ya Paul Hagayi

title: Amafoto: Ese koko Liam Payne, umwe mu bari bagize One Direction yaba agiye kwibaruka?
content:
Niba atari ibiryo byinshi kuri Cheryl Cole umugore wa Liam Payne wahoze muri One Direction, aba bombi baba bagiye kwibaruka umwana nk’uko byagaragaye ubwo batemberaga mbere yo kuryoshya muri Christmas carols.
 Kuri ubu Liam afite imyaka 23 akaba ari umukunzi wa Cheryl Cole kuva muri Girls Aloud, kuwa kabiri bagaragaye batemberana I London aho bari baje kwizihiza umunsi wa St James Christmas Carol. Aha uyu mukobwa yagaragaraga nk’aho mu nda harimo akantu. Byaravuzwe cyane ariko kugeza ubu yaba Liam Payne cyangwa Cheryl Cole nta wuragira icyo avuga ku kuba Cole w’imyaka 33 atwite cyangwa yari yariye ibiryo byinshi. Amafoto yamufotowe kuri uwo munsi yose yagaragaje ko munda ye yahindutse 






 Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Byinshi kuri Banki yihariye izatera inkunga imishinga irengera ibidukikije mu Rwanda
content: Iyi banki biteganywa ko izitwa ‘Rwanda Catalytic Green Investment Bank’, yitezweho kongera amafaranga yashorwaga mu mishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije mu gihugu. Izaba ikora nk’izindi banki ariko yibanda gusa ku gutanga inguzanyo no gushora imari yayo mu mishinga igamije kurengera ibidukikije. Uru rwego rw’imari ruteganywa gushyirwaho, ruzafasha mu gukangurira ibigo byigenga gushyigikira ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imishinga itangiza ibidukikije mu gihugu. Umukozi ushinzwe itumanaho mu kigega cya leta gisanzwe gitera inkunga imishinga irengera ibidukikije (Fonerwa), Doreen Nakure, yabwiye IGIHE ko Fonerwa ari yo ishinzwe gukurikirana by’umwihariko ishyirwaho ry’iyo banki, cyamaze gushyiraho itsinda ry’inzobere rizatanga ishusho nyayo y’imiterere n’imikorere y’iyo banki mu gihe cya vuba. Ati “Ubu twamaze guha akazi umuryango ‘Coalition for Green Capital’ kizadusesengurira ndetse kikaduha imiterere y’ishusho y’iyo banki ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Ibijyanye n’ingano y’amafaranga iyo banki izatangiza bizagaragazwa n’inyigo iri gukorwa n’icyo kigo gifatanyije n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa.” The Coalition for Green Capital ni umuryango udaharanira inyungu, wibanda cyane ku guteza imbere isoko ry’ingufu zidahumanya, binyuze mu gushyiraho banki ziteza imbere imishinga irengera ibidukikije. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2009, uyu muryango ufatanya n’ibihugu, ndetse n’imiryango itari iya Leta gushyiraho ibigo by’imari bishyigikira imishinga migari irengera ibidukikije, kigakora ubuvugizi, ndetse kigatanga ubujyanama n’ubugenzuzi mu mikorere y’ibyo bigo. Kugeza ubu ntibirasobanuka neza niba iyi banki izaba ari iya Leta cyangwa iy’abikorera; gusa Nakure avuga ko bizaterwa n’ibintu byinshi bikiri kuganirwaho ubu, ariko akagaragaza ko byagakwiye kuba igikorwa cy’abikorera. Iyi banki nitangira, izajya itera inkunga imishinga ya Leta n’abikorera igamije kurengera ibidukikije, habanje kurebwa niba yujuje ibisabwa. Nakure avuga ko iki gitekerezo cyo gushyiraho iyi banki kiri gushingira ku mahame yihariye ajyanye no kugena uburyo bwo kwifatira ibyemezo mu ishoramari, ubushobozi bwo kwiyongerera imari ivuye mu bigo by’imari ndetse no mu bikorera, hashingiwe cyane cyane ku bikorwa by’indashyikirwa bya banki mpuzamahanga zitera inkunga imishinga irengera ibidukikije, ubufasha bwa Fonerwa ndetse n’abandi bagira uruhare muri iri soko. Amakuru ajyanye n’itangizwa ry’iyi banki mu Rwanda yatangarijwe bwa mbere mu kiganiro cyatangiwe mu nama ya Cop 25 iherutse kubera muri Espagne mu mpera z’umwaka ushize yigaga ku ruhare rwa banki zigamije guteza imbere ibidukikije mu gutuma ibihugu bigera ku ntego zabyo. Igitekerezo cyo gushyiraho banki nyarwanda itera inkunga imishinga irengera ibidukikije, kije nyuma y’uko Afurika y’Epfo na yo yashyizeho iyo banki ifite imari shingiro ya miliyoni 100 z’amadorali ya Amerika. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibijyanye n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere muri Banki Nyafurika itsura Amajyambere (AfDB), Anthony Nyon, ubwo yari mu nama ya COP 25, yatangaje ko hakenewe ingamba zihamye mu guhanga ikoranabuhanga rishya rigamije guhangana n’ibibazo by’imihindagurikire y’ibihe. Ati “Ku bw’iyo mpamvu, Banki Nyafurika itsura Amajyambere, binyuze mu bufasha bw’ikigega kigamije kurengera ibidukikije, iri gukorana n’ihuriro rya banki zigamije kurengera ibidukikije mu kureba uburyo butandukanye bwo gushyira igishoro mu bikorwa bifasha kurengera ibidukikije ku rwego rwo hasi, ari na ko tuzamura uruhare rw’abikorera.” Leta yashyizeho ikigega Fonerwa cyahawe inshingano zo gufasha u Rwanda kugera ku bukungu butangiza ibidukikije binyuze mu gutera inkunga imishinga ya Leta n’abikorera iri muri uyu murongo. Kuva iki kigega cyashingwa muri 2013, hahanzwe imirimo 138 000 itangiza ibidukikije. Mu 2017, habarurwaga ko ubutaka bungana na hegitari 21 847 bwatunganyijwe hagamijwe kwirinda ko butwarwa n’isuri ndetse hegitari 12 998 z’inkombe n’imigezi n’ibiyaga zarasubiranyijwe, hegitari 41 116 ziterwaho amashyamba, ndetse imiryango 65,340 ifashwa kubona ingufu zikomoka ku mirasire y’izuba mu gihe toni miliyoni 65 z’imyuka ihumanya ikirere zakumiriwe. Icyo gihe Fonerwa yari imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyoni 100 z’amadorali, iyi nkunga ikaba ihabwa imishinga yatsinze binyuze mu marushanwa. Umushinga w’uruganda rw’amashanyarazi rutanga megawati 8.5 ruri mu karere ka Rwamagana, ni urugero rwiza rw’ishoramari ryakozwe mu rwego rwo kurengera ibidukikije. U Rwanda rwihaye intego ko mu 2050, ruzaba rwagabanyije umwuka uhumanya ikirere ku rugero rwifuzwa.

title: Zidane yishongora, Cristiano atsinda igitego cya 500 nyuma ya Ballon d’Or, Real Madrid yisanga kuri final y’igikombe ...
content:
Ku munsi wejo Umutoza wa Real madrid, Zinedine Zidane yatangaje amagambo yo kwishongora ku ikipe ya Club America yo muri Mexico yatwaye CONCACAF bari bamaze gutsinda ibitego 2-0 bya Benzema na Ronaldo maze Los Blancos bagera ku mukino wanyuma w’igikombe cy’isi cy’ama-club cyirikubera mu Buyapani. Nyuma y’umukino Zinedine Zidane yagize ati: "hari amakipe agira amahirwe rimwe gusa mu buzima yo gukina na Real Madrid, ndakeka ari amahirwe bagize. Real Madrid iri ku gitutu cyo gutsinda buri mukino kuko abantu babitubonamo. Gutsinda imikino 50 cyangwa 40 nta tandukaniro rinini ririmo.” 
Benzema ni we wafunguye amazamu igice cya mbere cyenda kurangira Zinedine Zidane yari yatangije ikipe ikomeye bishoboka harimo na Cristiano Ronaldo wishimiraga Ballon d’Or ye ya kane aza no kunyeganyeza inshundura umukino wenda kurangira bityo atsindira Real igitego cya kabiri cyane ko icya mbere cyari cyatsinzwe na Karim Benzema. Aba bombi bari baruhukijwe mu mukino ushize wa shampiyona. 
Cristiano yuzuzaga ibitego 500

title: Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko Umuryango w’ingagi zo mu Birunga uri kwaguka
content: Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekana ko ingagi zo mu ishyamba rya Bwindi muri Uganda na Sarambwe muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) zavuye kuri 400 zikagera kuri 459. Mu Rwanda, imibare y’ingagi yariyongereye zigera kuri 604 zivuye kuri 480 zabarurwaga umwaka ushize. Ibyo byatumye ingagi zibarurwa mu gice cy’imisozi y’Ibirunga zigera ku 1,063. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe bigizwemo uruhare n’Ikigega cyita ku ngagi muri Pariki y’Ibirunga (Dian Fossey Gorillas Fund) bushyirwa ahagaragara ku wa mbere tariki 16 Ukuboza 2019. Umuyobozi wa Dian Fossey, Dr Tara Stoinski, yagize ati “ Ibyavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi ni gihamya y’imbaraga zo kwita ku bidukikije, hagati ya Guverinoma zirimo iy’u Rwanda, RDC na Uganda.” Yongeyeho, ati “Ingagi zo mu misozi ni zimwe mu nyamaswa zirinzwe cyane kuri uyu mugabane, kandi uyu munsi turabona icyo imbaraga z’abafatanyabikorwa mu kuzitaho zishobora gukora. Ni akazi gakomeye ku baturage, abayobozi ba za Guverinoma n’ababungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, ariko bishobora gukorwa.” Mu bushakashatsi bwabanje, ku ngagi zo mu misozi, ababukoze bageze mu bice byose by’ishyamba bashaka ibyafasha kubona amakuru ku ngagi n’izindi z’inyamabere n’ibimenyetso by’ibikorwa bya muntu. Mu bikorwa byabo bakusanyije umwanda wazo kugira ngo harebwe inkomoko yazo, ibyo byakozwe inshuro ebyiri kuva muri Werurwe kugeza Gicurasi 2018 no kuva mu Kwakira kugeza Ukuboza 2018 kugira ngo bimenyekane neza ko buri ngagi yagezweho. Mu mwaka ushize, Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere (RDB) cyongeye ubuso bwa Pariki y’igihugu y’Ibirunga iherereye mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda buva kuri Hegitari 16,000 bugera ku 16,027 hagamije kwita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima biyirimo.

title: Ibintu 10 buri mugabo adakunda ku mugore we
content:
“Urwango” ni ijambo ribi cyane. Ariko ntibivuze ko ryaba ribi ku rwego byageraho bibabaza umugabo ugereranyije nuko agukunda. Nibyo koko ushobora kuba warumvise neza cyangwa se uzi ko hari ibintu bidashimisha abagabo. Ni ibintu bigoranye kuba yabikubwira ko bitamushimisha kuko umutima we akenshi ntiwabimwemerera. Reba ibintu 10 umugabo wawe cyangwa yanga inshuti yawe y’umuhungu idakunda kuri wowe: 1.	Ntakunda kumva ngo umeze nabi
 Mu gihe wumva umeze nabi umugabo wawe nawe akabimenya ahita yumva mu mubiriwe atameze neza kukurusha kuko ntago aba yifuza ko wagira uburibwe muri wowe. Umutima we uratera cyane ukamurya kubera ukuntu abayumva agukunda cyane. Icyo akora ni ugushaka inzira zose zishoboka kugira ngo akwiteho mu buryo bwose. Ntuzumve ko atakwitayeho, ahubwo biba byamubabaje ku buryo utakumva. Iki kintu rero ntabwo umugabo wawe agikunda cyangwa inshuti yawe y’umuhungu igikunda. 2.	Ntakunda kuba yakubona urira Nta kintu kibabaza kikanatera agahinda umugabo wawe kukubona urimo urarira, kabone nubwo yaba yagukuise. Ashobora kuba yarakumvise urimo uraririra gake nko mu rwiyuhagiriro muvuganye nabi. Ariko ntakunda kuba yabona umugore we arira, kuko amarira yawe aramushavuza akagira aghinda kenshi ku mutima we. Naramuka aguhojeje uzemere uceceke kuko bizamushimisha cyane kuko kukubona urira ntabwo ari byiza kuri we. 3.	Ntakunda ko wamujya kure
 Umugabo wawe agukumbura cyane akumva yahindutse nk’umusazi muri we, birenze uko wowe ubitekereza. Kukubura iruhande rwe biramushavuza cyane akumva abuze amahoro muri we atakubonye. Ibi niukuri kuko aba agutekereza cyane birenze.  Nkiyo hari ahantu wagiye abayumva utatinda yo kuko akenshi aranakubwira ngo ubanguke ntutinde yo.
Kandi wibuke ko wowe mugore umugabo wawe no mubyatumye ngo akugira umugore kwari ukugira ngo umube hafi ibhe byose ajye akubona. 4.	Ntakunda kukubona nta cyizere wifitiye Umugabo wawe nta kunda kuba yaba akuri iruhande kubera aba akeka ko umeze neza nta kibazo na kimwe ushobora guhura nacyo. Akunda kuba ari kumwe nawe mu gihe abona ko wifitiye icyizere cy’ibyo uri gukora. Ariko iyo abona wifitemo akavuyo ntago abikunda, areba intege nke zawe.
Biramubabaza kubona utari gukora ibyo ugomba gukora neza, kuko ngo aba abona nta cyizere wifitiye bikamubabaza. 5.	Ntakunda umuntu yagufata nabi Ubusanzwe abagabo barihangana mu buzima bwabo. Niyo mpamvu amaraso yabo atishimira kubona undi muntu agufata nabi, uko utari ugasanga akeneye kumenya byinshi kuri wowe.
Ibi biramubabaza cyane kurusha uko wowe wumva bikubabaje. Utekereze ko impamvu y’ibi aruko agukunda kandi ataba asobanukiwe impamvu abantu batakubaha nkuko abayumva byagakwiye kugenda. 6.	Ntakunda ko washaka kwigira nkuko abandi bagore bameze
 Akenshi aho tuba ndetse n’abo tubana nibo bashobora gutuma duhindura imitekerereze n’imikorere. Niba ushakanye n’umusore wigira ukumva amabwire y’abandi bagore bakubwira koi bi cyangwa biriya aribyo umugabo wawe yakunda kurusha biriya wamukoreraga. Umugabo wawe yagukundiye uko uri ndetse n’uburyo wamushimishagamo ariko niwiha gushaka gukora ibintu btamushimisha habe na gato ntabwo azigera abyihanganira ahubwo uzabona akunda guhora arakaye wibaze impamvu yabyo uyibure. Ntiyishimira ko wakigana ibyo abandi bakora kugira ngo bashimishe abagabo babo kuko wowe icyo yagukundiye ni icyo umukorera cyangwa se wamukoreraga. Nushaka kumva amabwire wowe mugore, urimo urasenya urugo rwawe. Ibyo rero ntago umugabo azabyihanganira. 7.	Ntakunda kukubona watsinzwe  Umugabo wawe arashaka ko ahora akubona ushoboye, wimwereka ko nta kintu rero ushoboye. Ahubwo gerageza ukomeze umushimishe nkuko wajyaga umushimisha,
ndetse nibinaba ngombwa ujye umukorera udutendo kugira ngo ukomeze bagarire urukundo mufitanye kandi unaruvomerera. Akunda kukubna iruhande rwe umufata neza uko bikwiye. Ariko ni byiza guhora ukora icyashimisha umugabo wawe, kandi ntukishimire gutsindwa ngo umugabo wawe akubone wakonje. 8.	Ntakunda kumva uvuga ko utari mwiza nk’abandi Mu buzima bw’abagore birazwi ko umubiri wabo uhinduka cyane ndetse rimwe na rimwe bakaba bakumva biyanze ku giti cyabo. Wowe mugore ikintu ugomba kumenya nuko umugabo wawe icyo yagukundiye akenshi atari isura yawe ahubwo ari umutima mwiza ufite cyangwa se ukuntu umushimisha bikamurenga. Ikindi kandi gishimisha umugabo wawe ni uburyo umubwira ibyo ushaka n’ibyo wifuza akaba yabasha kubigukemurira mu buryo bwihuse. Kuri we kumva uvuga ko utari mwiza cyangwa udashimisha n’imihindagurikire y’umubiri wawe ntibimugwa neza. 9.	Iyo akoze ikintu cyikababaza umutima wawe ntibimushimisha Ushobora kuba wibaza niba koko atishimira ko cyakubabaza impamvu agikoze bikagucanga, Umenye ko inshuro nyinshi atari uko aba yabigambiriye ahubwo biba bimutunguye. Iyo akubwiye nabi akabona ntabwo wishimye arushaho kubabara cyane kandi birangira yicujije cyane impamvu yabimuteye akabikora. Ikimubabaza cyane nuko bishobora kuba byabaviramo ugutandukana kandi atabyifuza.
10.	Ntakunda kuba yakubona utishimye Birasoboka cyane ko wababara cyane, ariko umugabo wawe ntago bimushimisha habe na gato kuko ibyishimo bye abibonera mukuba wishimye, uri kumusekera n’ibinezaneza byose. 
Ashobora kuba ari amakosa ye yatumye utushima, ariko nawe bizamubabaza cyane nabona wagira ngo wapfushije. Bityo rero, ikintu kizakubwira ko umugabo wawe cyangwa umuhungu winshuti yawe ugukunda nuko akenshi adashimishwa no kukubabaza mu buzima bwe.
Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Ibanga ry’Amahoro kuri bene Gihanga ku bwa Padiri Obalidi
content:
Ku Cyumweru tariki ya 15 Mata ni bwo abakristu ba kiliziya Gatolika baturutse imihanda yose bahuriye kuri stade Amahoro mu isengesho ngarukamwaka ryo gusengera abarwayi n’abandi bose bafite ibikomere batewe na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, uyu akaba ariwo wari umwihariko w’uyu mwaka. Ni isengesho ryatangiye mu masaha ya mu gitondo ribimburirwa n’igitambo cya misa cyayobowe na Padiri Ubald Rugirangoga mu nyigisho yagarutse ku gikorwa kibi cyaranze abakristu bo mu gihe cya Jenoside avuga ko umukristu wica undi akwiye guhindurirwa izina agashakirwa irindi. 

Padiri Ubald amaze kwamamara cyane mu gusengera abantu ibikomere bikomoka Uyu mupadiri wibanze cyane ku nyungu ikomeye yo gutanga imbabazi no kuzisaba yabwiye abakristu ko buri muntu nicyo ari cyo cyose afite urufunguzo rwo kubohora mugenzi we. Mu magambo ye yagize ati “Wowe wacitse ku icumu ufite urufunguzo rwo kubohora no gukiza ibikomere uwakwiciye umuha imbabazi, nawe ufite abo wiciye ufite urufunguzo rwo gusaba imbabazi!”
 Padiri Ubalidi yaboneyeho anamurika filimi yise ‘Gusaba no Gutanga imbabazi niryo banga ry’Amahoro’, filimi yakozwe n’abakristu ba Paruwasi ya Mushaka asanzwe ayobora, akaba yarayigizemo uruhare rukomeye mu ikorwa ryayo. Ni filimi igaragaramo ubutwari bukomeye bugaragazwa nabo bakristu bwo gusaba no gutanga imbabazi.

Abakirisitu ba kiliziya Gatolika bari bitabiriye ku bwinshi Nyuma y’igitambo cya misa, Ubalidi yazengurukije isakaramentu ry’ukarisitiya abayoboke biri dini bemeza ko rikirizwamo ibyaha. Nyuma y’ibi nibwo hatangiye kugaragara ibitangaza, ibikomere birakira ku bwinshi abari baranangiye gusaba no gutanga imbabazi nabo bahava biyemeje kwihambura iyo migozi yari baziritse yo kutiyunga.








 Isengesho kandi ryitabiriwe na Minisitiri w’Umuco na Siporo, Uwacu Julienne aho mu ijambo rye yabwiye abari aho ko ubukristu nyabwo bukwiye kujyana n’ubunyarwanda nyabwo. “Nkuko mukora ibindi bikorwa bitandukanye bya kiliziya muvugurura ubukiristu bwanyu ni nako mukwiye no kwitabira ibikorwa bya Leta cyane cyane nk’iki gihe turimo mufasha abacitse ku icumu munitabira ibikorwa byo kwibuka.”, Minisitiri Uwacu Julienne wasoje arema agatima abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi abihanganisha ababwira ko imbere ari heza. Amafoto:IGIHE

title: Igifenesi, urubuto rushobora kuba imari ishyushye ku isoko ry’u Rwanda
content: Uru rwagwa aho aruranguza barugurisha amafaranga 500 ariko ngo ntarashobora guhaza isoko afite bitewe n’uko ari rinini cyane. Uyu mugore byamuteje imbere ku buryo yubatse uruganda rukora inzoga muri urwo rubuto, akaba afite gahunda yo guhinga ibifenesi byinshi no kubikangurira abandi. Igifenesi ni rumwe mu mbuto zo bwoko bw’inkeri bitewe n’uburyo kiremye, kikaba gikomoka mu Buhinde ariko gikunze kugaragara cyane no muri Thailand, Malaysia na Indonesia. Mu Rwanda urubuto rw’igifenesi ntirukunze kugaragara nk’izindi bitewe n’uko abanyarwanda bataratangira kwitabira kuruhinga, ariko ni urubuto rukize cyane ku ntungamubiri ndetse runafasha kugabanya umuvuduko w’amaraso, kugira uruhu rwiza n’isukari y’umwimerere. Mugabo Jean Pierre uyobora ishami ry’amashyamba mu Kigo gishinzwe guteza imbere amazi n’Amashyamba, RWFA, yavuze ko ari urubuto abantu benshi bakwiriye guhinga. Ati “Igifenesi ni urubuto rwifitemo isukari y’umwimerere, kigabanya umuvuduko w’amaraso, gifasha umuntu kugira uruhu rwiza, kikagira n’intungamubiri za magnesium zigira uruhare mu gukomeza amagufa.” Mugabo yongeraho ko igifenesi gifasha umuntu kubona neza cyane cyane kubageze mu zabukuru, kikagira ubutare buvura indwara yo kubura amaraso bukanatera amaraso kudatembera neza. Ikindi ni uko ibiti by’ibifenesi bishobora kwifashishwa mu kwirinda isuri, bikaba byakwifashishwa kandi mu gukora ibikoresho byo mu nzu, imirimo y’ubwubatsi, ibikoresho by’umuziki. Igifenesi kandi cyifashishwa mu gukora verini basiga imbaho, guhoma ubwato n’imyenge y’indobo. Mugabo yakanguriye abanyarwanda gutera igiti cy’igifenesi cyane ko ngo Ishami ry’amashyamba mu Kigo gishinzwe guteza imbere amazi n’Amashyamba, RWFA, rizabafasha kubona ingemwe, bakaba baniteguye gushyira igiti cy’igifenesi mu bizaterwa mu gikorwa ngarukamwaka cyo gutera ibiti. Ati “Abanyarwanda turabasaba kugitera ku buryo buhagije kugira ngo n’abagikeneye babashe kukibona cyane ko bashobora kubibona mu buhumbikiro butandukanye. Twebwe tuzakomeza kubafasha kubona ingemwe kugira ngo cyinjizwe no muri gahunda ngarukamwaka yo gutera ibiti, dufashe n’abikorera kucyongerera umusaruro.” Urubuto rw’igifenesi rweze rupima ibiro hagati ya 3-5, rukaba rumara amezi 16 mu buhumbikiro. Kugira ngo nyirarwo atangire kurusarura ni uko byibuze ruba rumaze imyaka itandatu rutewe. Igifenesi gisarurwa kabiri mu mwaka, igiti kimwe gifite ubushobozi bwo kwera imbuto 200. Ni igiti gikunze guhingwa mu duce dushyuha nko mu Bugesera, Kayonza, Huye, Gisagara, Nyanza, Ngoma na Rusizi. Mu 2018, Akarere ka Ngoma nka kamwe mu duce duhingwamo igifenesi cyasaruye toni 69. Ku isoko usanga uru rubuto ruri hagati ya 1000-1500 Frw. Inkuru bijyanye: Uko Kankwanzi yahaye agaciro igifenesi muri Kirehe agikoramo inzoga

title: Mourihno yageze ku ntego
content: Ni ku mukino wa nyuma w’umunsi wa munani wa English Premier League shampiyona y’igihugu cy’Ubwongereza aho Liverpool yakiriye Mancheester United maze bakaza kunganya 0-0, umtoza Mourihno wahabwaga amahirwe make yagaragaje ko inota rimwe ryari rimuhagije urebye uburyo yari yubatsemo umukino. Abatari bake bibajije ikinti Marouane Fellaini yaraje gukora mu kibuga mu gihe ashijwa kuba ari we utuma iyi kipe ikina umukino utihuta. Igisubizo ariko cyanagaragaraga ku bakurikiranira hafi ibya Mourihno, bwari uburyo bwo gufungira hagati kugira ngo bime Liverpool umwanya wo gukina wa mupira wayo. Ibi ariko banabifashijwemo no kuba umukinnyi wo hagati Adam Lallana uhagaze neza muri Liverpool atabanje mu kibuga kubera igihe yari amaze mu mvune. Nyuma yo kuza mu kibuga ikipe ya Manchester yarushujwe ku buryo bugaragara ariko biba iby’ubusa bagabana amanota. Yanditswe na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Nta murwayi mushya wa Coronavirus wabonetse mu cyiciro cya gatandatu cy’ibipimo byafashwe muri Premier League
content: Icyiciro cya gatandatu cy’ibipimo bimaze gufatwa mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bitatu, cyakozwe ku wa Kane no ku wa Gatanu nyuma y’uko amakipe amaze icyumweru akora imyitozo abakinnyi bakoranaho ndetse amwe akaba yaratangiye gukina imikino ya gicuti. Itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara ku wa Gatandatu, rigira riti “Premier League uyu munsi iremeza ko ku wa Kane tariki ya 4 Kamena no ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 5 Kamena, abakinnyi n’abandi bo mu makipe 1195 bapimwe COVID-19. Muri abo, nta wasanganywe icyo cyorezo.” Iyi ni inkuru nziza kuri Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere mu Bwongereza iteganya gusubukurwa mu minsi 10 iri imbere. Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri hatabonetse umurwayi mu bipimo byafashwe amakipe yose 20 mu byiciro bitandatu by’ibipimo bimaze gufatwa mu gihe umuntu umwe ari we byagaragaye ko yanduye Coronavirus mu byiciro bitatu biheruka. Kuva iyi gahunda itangiye, Premier League imaze gufata ibipimo 6274. Abanduye icyorezo cya COVID-19 ni 13 gusa. Umukinnyi uzongera kugaragaraho iki cyorezo azajya yishyira mu kato mu gihe cy’iminsi 14. Premier League izongera gusubukurwa nyuma y’iminsi 100 ihagaritswe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi. Uko amakipe azahura mu mikino 32 y’iminsi itatu ibanza byatangajwe ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 5 Kamena, hamwe n’iya ¼ y’Igikombe cy’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Bwongereza (FA Cup) kizakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 27 n’iya 28 Kamena. Imikino 92 isigaye muri Premier League, izaba mu muhezo, yerekanwe na Sky Sports, BT Sport, BBC Sport cyangwa Amazon Prime. Premier League izasubukurwa Aston Villa ihura na Sheffield United tariki ya 17 Kamena mbere y’uko Manchester City yakira Arsenal kuri uwo mugoroba.

title: Afurika na Aziya mu kaga k’ihumana ry’umwuka abantu bahumeka
content: Inyigo ya OMS yasuzumye ibyago bituruka ku byuka bihumanya, yaba ibyo mu rugo n’ibyo hanze yarwo muri rusange, yerekanye ko ababarirwa muri miliyoni zirindwi bapfa buri mwaka bazize ibyo byuka. Igaragaza ko abarenga 90 % by’abicwa n’ibifitanye isano n’imyuka bihumanya ikirere ari abo mu bihugu bikennye n’ibifite ubukungu buciriritse byiganje muri Afurika na Aziya. Maria Neira uyobora ishami rishinzwe ubuzima rusange n’ibidukikije muri OMS, yavuze ko ‘iki ari ikibazo giteye ubwoba.’ Iyi mibare yibanze cyane ku bubi bw’uduce duto duto tutabonwa n’amaso twivanga n’umwuka duhumeka dufite umurambararo uri munsi ya micrometre 2.5 (PM2.5) n’udufite umurambararo uri hagati ya micrometres 2.5 na 10 (PM10). Uduce two mu bwoko bwa PM 2.5, turimo; sulphate n’umwuka mubi  wa ‘Black carbon’, dutera ingaruka zikomeye ku buzima iyo twinjiye mu bihaha cyangwa mu mugendo w’amaraso mu mubiri w’umuntu. Ibi bitera indwara zirimo umutima, umuvuduko w’amaraso, kanseri y’ibihaha, indwara zandurira mu myanya y’ubuhumekero nk’umusonga. Iyi raporo ivuga kandi ko abatuye Isi barenga 40 % badafite uburyo bwo guteka budahumanya ikirere n’ikoranabuhanga bakifashisha mu ngo zabo. Gutekesha amakara ni kimwe mu bihumanya ikirere mu ngo, bikaba byica abagera kuri miliyoni 3.8 ku mwaka. Umuyobozi wa OMS, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, avuga ko ‘atari ibintu kwihanganira kuba abarenga miliyoni eshatu, biganjemo abagore n’abana birirwa bahumeka imyuka  ihumanya ituruka mu byo batekesha mu ngo zabo.’ Nubwo hari intambwe imaze guterwa mu gushaka uburyo bwo gutekesha budahumanya abantu n’ikirere, muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara biracyari imbogamizi. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo Kubungabunga Ibidukikije mu Rwanda (REMA) bwagaragaje ko imodoka, amakara n’inkwi biri ku isonga mu guhumanya umwuka mwiza uhumekwa mu Rwanda. Mu bice by’imijyi ahantu hegereye umuhanda, umwuka abantu bahumeka uhumanywa n’imyuka isohorwa n’ibinyabiziga mu gihe mu bice byagenewe imiturire n’iby’ibyaro, umwuka uhumanywa cyane cyane n’ikomoka mu gutwika no gucana ibikomoka ku biti nk’inkwi n’amakara. Imwe mu ngamba yihutirwa ikaba ari ukongerwa ibikoresho bifasha abaturage guteka hadasohowe umwotsi mwinshi ariko bikagabanyirizwa ibiciro ku buryo bugaragara. Birimo Biogaz, rondereza, imirasire, ingufu zikomoka ku muyaga na gaz.

title: Ntabwo Coronavirus yatwibagije abakeneye ubundi buvuzi - Minisanté
content: Ubushakashatsi bushya bw’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima (OMS), bwagaragaje ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyagize ingaruka zikomeye ku buvuzi ndetse na serivisi zihabwa abafite izindi ndwara cyane cyane izitandura zirimo Cancer, Diabète n’indwara z’umutima. OMS yavuze ko yasanze benshi mu barwaye indwara zitandura batitabwaho uko bikwiye muri iki gihe cy’icyorezo, kandi ari bo bafite ibyago byinshi byo gushegeshwa na cyo. Umuyobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ushinzwe imikoranire n’Itangazamakuru, Julien Mahoro Niyingabira, yabwiye IGIHE ko mu Rwanda iki kibazo kidahari kuko ubundi buvuzi bwakomeje gutangwa uko bisanzwe, utitaye ku kuba bigaragara ko imbaraga nyinshi ziri gushyirwa mu gukumira indwara ya Coronavirus. Yagize ati “Abagomba kuvurwa baravurwa, amavuriro yacu yari afunguye, no mu gihe ingendo zitari zemewe, kuba umuntu yari afite ‘transfert’ cyangwa se yari afite ‘rendez-vous’ ya muganga, ibyongibyo byamuberaga icyangombwa cyo kwambukiranya intara akajya aho iyo rendez-vous yagombaga kuyubahiriza”. Niyingabira yakomeje avuga ko izindi gahunda zirimo inkingo zakomeje guhabwa abana, abarwayi bakomeza kuvurwa nk’uko bisanzwe ku buryo ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, nta muntu wari ukeneye ubuvuzi ubwo ari bwo bwose ngo abubure. Ati “Ntabwo rero mu by’ukuri ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda twavuga ko hariho icyo cyuho cyo kuvuga ngo Coronavirus yatwibagije cyangwa yatumye abari bakeneye ubundi buvuzi batabubona”. Indege nto zitagira abapilote ‘Drones’, zisanzwe zimenyerewe mu gutwara amaraso n’imiti ku bitaro bitandukanye mu Rwanda, zifashishijwe mu kugeza ibinini n’indi miti ku barwayi ba kanseri mu gihe cya guma mu rugo. Imiti yohererezwa abarwayi hifashishijwe ibitaro bibegereye. Iyi gahunda igamije korohereza abarwayi kubona imiti hafi kandi biboroheye, bigendanye n’igihe bamaraga bagiye gufata umuti. Uretse kwifashisha Drones mu gufasha abarwayi ba kanseri, hari abasigaye bohererezwa imodoka zijya kubafata aho batuye bakajya kwivuza i Butaro. Hashyizweho kandi uburyo mu Bitaro bya gisirikare i Kanombe, havurirwa abarwayi ba Kanseri bavuye mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba no mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Kugira ngo bahagere ni uko ku bufasha bwa Partners in Health, hashyizweho imodoka zigenda zikabakura aho aho batuye, abasigaye mu zindi Ntara bavurirwa i Butaro. Niyingabira yakomeje avuga ko n’izindi ndwara zandura zari zikeneye ubuvuzi nka virusi itera Sida hari ibisubizo byagiye bishyirwaho kugira ngo abantu batabura imiti, aho bahabwa iy’amezi abiri aho kugira ngo bahabwe iy’ukwezi kumwe nikurangira bongere bajye mu ngendo. Ati “Byakozwe mu buryo bwo kugabanya ingendo ariko imiti bakeneye bakayibona. Umuntu ashobora kureba imbaraga zashyizwe mu kurwanya Coronavirus akibwira ko ibindi byibagiranye, ariko ntabwo ari ko bimeze”. Gushyira abaganga benshi mu kurwanya Coronavirus Ubushakashatsi bwa OMS bwerekana ko mu bihugu birenga 90% bwakorewemo, abakozi bo mu rwego rw’ubuzima bimuriwe mu nshingano zo kurwanya Coronavirus ndetse ingamba zo gukumira ikwirakwira ryayo zituma gahunda nyinshi zo kwivuza ziburizwamo. Umuyobozi wa OMS, Dr Tedros Ghebreyesus yagize ati “Ni ingenzi ko ibihugu bishaka ubundi buryo butuma serivisi z’ibanze zihabwa abafite indwara zitandura zikomeza gutangwa no muri iki gihe cyo kurwanya Coronavirus”. Ubushakashatsi bwa OMS bwerekana ko kuba ubuvuzi butari ukurwanya Coronavirus budatangwa uko bisanzwe bizagira ingaruka nyinshi ku bihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amajyambere. Niyingabira avuga ko ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, hashyizweho ibigo bivura Coronavirus by’ibanze bibiri ariko kandi nanone hanagenwa uburyo muri buri bitaro by’akarere hajya havurirwa Coronavirus. Yakomeje avuga ko ibitaro by’akarere bigera kuri 48, byose byashyizwemo uburyo hashobora gukorwa akato k’umurwayi akaba yavurirwa kuri ibyo bitaro akarinda akira atarindiriye kujya muri biriya bigo bibiri biri i Kanyinya na Nyamata. Ati “Hashyizweho uburyo bwo kuvura hirya no hino mu gihugu ariko butanabangamiye indi mirimo y’ibitaro cyangwa se y’inzego z’ubuzima. Ntabwo rero abaganga bose b’igihugu bafashwe ngo bajyanwe muri bya bigo bibiri byashyizweho byihariye”. Kuva umurwayi wa mbere wa COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko gashya ka Coronavirus agaragaye mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, hamaze kuboneka 377 banduye mu bipimo 69 151 bimaze gufatwa, 262 barayikize mu gihe 114 bitabwaho n’abaganga naho umwe yitabye Imana. OMS yerekana ko buri mwaka abagera kuri miliyoni 41 bicwa n’indwara zitandura, bikaba bigize 71% by’impfu zose ku Isi.

title: Abapasiteri bageze mu zabukuru bishimiye ko bagiye gusaza neza
content:
Itorero Méthodiste Libre mu Rwanda ryagabiye inka abapasiteri 21 bageze mu zabukuru, mu rwego rwo kubafasha kugira amasaziro meza.
 Ubuyobozi bwi torero bwemeza ko ari ubwa mbere gahunda nk’iyi ibaye mu myaka hafi 75 rimaze rigeze mu Rwanda. Umwanzuro wo kugabira inka aba bapasiteri wafatiwe mu nama ya conference ya Kinyaga, yabereye muri aka karere, aho abapasiteri 20 kuri 21 bageze mu zabukuru mu Rwanda hose bagomba guhabwa izi nka bari bahari. Umwepisikopi w’iri torero akaba n’umuyobozi waryo mu Rwanda no muri Uganda, Musenyeri Samuel Kayinamura yavuze ko iki cyemezo gifashwe muri iriya nama yamaze iminsi 3, kikaba ari ikintu kitari cyarigeze gikorwa muri iri torero. Yagize ati “Hano habaye ikintu tutigeze dukora ahandi, aho twahuje abapasiteri bageze mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru bo mu Rwanda hose, tubazana hano mu karere ka Rusizi tubakorera umwiherero, tuganira na bo, tuganira amateka y’iri torero, cyane cyane ko tunitegura Yubile y’imyaka 75 rimaze rigeze mu Rwanda. Bariya bakaba ari bo bazajya baduha amateka yaryo, tukaba twafashe gahunda yo kujya dusajisha neza uwakoreye itorero tumugabira, buri mupasiteri ugiye mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru akazajya ahabwa inka, duhereye kuri bariya 21 bari basanzwe bari mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.” Avuga ko iri ari ishimwe rikomye ry’imirimo baba barakoze iriya myaka yose, kandi ko umuntu witangiye abandi mu myaka ingana kuriya aba adakwiye gusaza nabi, cyangwa ngo asaze atanywa amata kandi aba yarigomwe ibyagombaga kumuha ayo mata, akitangira bagenzi be akabateza imbere mu buryo bw’umwuka n’ubw’umubiri. Yagize ati “Ubu ni uburyo bwiza bwo kugira ngo tububahishe n’abazaza nyuma bazabone ko abababanjirije batasuzuguwe mu murimo bakoreye Imana, kandi natwe twiyubahishe, kuko natwe tugenda dusatira icyo gihe, natwe abo tuzaba dusize inyuma bazadufate neza.” Pasiteri Sibomana Jean wo mu murenge wa Nyabitekeri ufite imyaka 68 ariko we utari muri bariya 21 akazayihabwa ubutaha, yavuze ko iki ari ikintu gishimishije cyane kuko buri wese ugeze muri kiriya kigero yahageraga ahangayikishijwe n’imisazire ye, mu gihe aba yarigomwe igihe cye cyo gushaka amasaziro akitangira umurimo w’Imana. Yagize ati “Ibi ni ibishya tubonye bitigeze bibaho mu itorero ryacu, biratunejeje cyane kuko bizadufasha gusaza tunywa amata, abana bacu batandaraye, tubona mituweli, mbese tudasabiriza kandi twarakoreye Imana n’itorero.” Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi Muhabura.rw

title: Abasore n’inkumi barindwi bazaserukira u Rwanda mu iserukiramuco ry’imideli muri Guinée
content: Iserukiramuco ‘Festival International de la Mode Guinéenne’ rimaze kumenyekana muri Afurika, ni ku nshuro ya gatatu rigiye kuba. Iry’uyu mwaka rizamara icyumweru guhera kuwa 8 Gicurasi kugeza ku itariki ya 13 Gicurasi 2017. Abahanzi b’imideli n’aberekana imideli bazahagararira u Rwanda barimo Franco Kabano ihuriro ry’abamurika imideli mu gihugu [Rwanda Fashion Models Union], Shema Ryabasinga , Cissy Ngamije, Mucyo Sandrine, Ntabanganyimana Jean de Dieu [Jay Rwanda], Ganza Irihose Jean Fidèle [Ganza Gabey] ndetse na Sekamana Eric Louis . Iri serukiramuco risanzwe ritegurwa na Bah Alpha Oumar Ly abicishije mu nzu y’imideli yitwa Alphao Fashion ku bufatanye na Minisiteri ya Siporo, Umuco, umurage n’amateka muri  Guinée. Mu kiganiro Bah Alpha Oumar Ly yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru Guinée Matin, yavuze ko icyerekezo iri serukiramuco rifite ari ugufasha urubyiruko rwa Afurika n’urwa Guinée by’umwihariko kwiteza imbere binyuze mu guhanga umurimo no kubyaza inyungu ubuhanzi n’impano ya buri wese. Yagize ati “Icyerekezo nyamukuru dufite ni ukuzamura impano z’urubyiruko no guteza imbere gahunda yo gutungwa n’impano, waba uri umunyamideli cyangwa wambika abantu. Twahereye mu gihugu imbere tunareba no mu bindi bihugu aho imideli igenda izamuka…” Alpha yavuze ko uyu mwaka hatumiwe abanyamideli bo mu bihugu 14 hakiyongeraho na Guinée izaba ihagarariwe n’abasore n’inkumi 15 bazatoranywa mu gihugu hose. Ibi bihugu byatumiwe bizerekana imideli buri wese mu cyiciro cye mu kugaragaza umwihariko wa buri gace ka Afurika mu birori bizaba kuwa 12 Gicurasi 2017.

title: Eliza, izina ry’abakobwa bifitemo impano y’ubuyobobozi
content: Izina Eliza ni ijambo riri mu rurimi rw’Igiheburayo risobanura ngo “Imana ni isezerano ryanjye.” Mu kinyejana cya 18 n’icya 19 hakoreshwaga izina rya Elzabthe ariko Eliza riba ariryo ryamamara cyane mu Bafaransa. Iri zina rifitwe n’ibihangange bitandukanye ku Isi birimo Umunyamerika w’umunyarwenya Eliza Kate Coupe; Umunya-Australia Eliza Szonert ukina filime n’umuhanzi Eliza Carthy ukomoka mu Bwongereza.  	Ibiranga ba Eliza Ba Eliza barangwa no kugira ubwira n’imbaraga mu byo bakora ndetse bakunze no kuba abatunzi. Bifitemo ubuyobozi muri bo kandi bakunda gukemura ibibazo by’abandi. Ni abantu bifitemo impano yo kuba abayobozi kandi bagira umwete ku kazi kabo. Igifite agaciro kuri bo ni uko babona akazi bagombaga gukora kagenze neza. Ba Eliza ikintu gito bakibonamo ikinini kandi bahorana ingamba zo kugera ku ntsinzi y’ibyo biyemeje.  Bashoboye kuyobora amatsinda bakayageza ku ntego yiyemeje, kandi bazi kumenya ubushobozi bw’abo bari kumwe mu matsinda ku buryo bababyazamo umusaruro. Ba Eliza bakunda guhirwa n’ubucuruzi ku buryo akenshi bituma bahirwa bakaba abakire mu buzima bwabo.

title: Clarisse Karasira yakoze indirimbo ikubiyemo inkuru mpamo y’abajya gushakira ubuzima mu mahanga
content: Yabwiye IGIHE ko ari indirimbo yatuye abantu bose basize iwabo bakajya gushakira ubuzima ahandi cyane cyane hanze y’u Rwanda. Ati “‘Uwacu’ ni Indirimbo ituwe abantu basize iwabo bakajya gushakira ubuzima ahandi cyane cyane mu mahanga. Ni inkuru mpamo yanjye nakuye ku buzima inshuti zanjye ziba mu mahanga zibamo. Iributsa urukundo rw’umuryango igatanga intashyo kuri ba ‘Uwacu’ ibakumbuza iwabo.” Iyi ndirimbo nshya yise ‘Uwacu’ mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe na Evydecks naho amashusho yayo afatwa na Fefe faith. Karasira yavukiye i Masaka mu Mujyi wa Kigali, yiga amashuri mu bigo binyuranye arangiza ayisumbuye mu ndimi. Kaminuza yize Itangazamakuru muri Mount Kenya University. Nyuma y’umwaka umwe yaje kurisubika atangira kwiga ibijyanye na Politiki Mpuzamahanga muri ULK ubu ari mu mwaka wa kabiri. Uyu mukobwa yatangiriye itangazamakuru i Gicumbi kuri Radio Ishingiro, akomereza kuri Flash Fm na Flash Tv ahakora igihe kitari gito aza gusezera muri Kanama 2018 ubwo yatekerezaga kwinjira mu muziki. Clarisse Karasira yakoze indirimbo zitandukanye zakunzwe zirimo ‘Gira neza’, ‘Twapfaga Iki?’, ‘Ubuto’, ‘Kabeho’, ‘Imitamenwa’, ‘Ntizagushuke’, ‘Uzibukirwa kuki?” n’izindi. Reba indirimbo nshya ya Karasira

title: Umunyamideri kazi yatangaje uburyo igitsina cye cyamugize umuherwe kazi [REBA AMAFOTO]
content:
Umunyakenyakazi, Huddah Monroe uzwi cyane mu mwuga wo kumurika imideli yemeza ko gucuruza igitsina cye byatumye atera imbere kuko nk’imitungo afite yose ayicyesha uburanga bwe ndetse n’igitsina cye nk’uko yabitangarije Times FM. Uyu mukobwa ni umwe mu bakunze gushyira hanze amafoto ararura abagabo ndetse uyu mukobwa akaba akunze kuvugwaho n’ubusambanyi cyane,kuri ubu uyu mukobwa akaba avuga ko gukoresha umubiri we muri ubu buryo bisigaye bimwinjiriza agatubutse. Huddah aganira na Times FM yahishuye ko imodoka atunze n’indi mitungo yose afite, ayikesha igitsina cye. Huddah yagize ati “Ubu ndatwara imodoka ihenze, igitsina cyanjye nicyo cyanzamuye, …”. Huddah yagaragaye i Kigali ku italiki ya 26 Ukuboza 2015, mu gitaramo gihuza abambaye imituku “Red Avenue” cyaje kurangira atishimiye kuko polisi y’u Rwanda yagihagaritse kirimbanyije mu masaha y’ijoro. 





Uyu mukobwa ajya agirana ibihe byiza n’ibyamamare bitandukanye Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Urutonde ngaruka kwezi rwa FIFA, U Rwanda rugeze he, 5 biza imbere muri Afurika no ku Isi
content:
Kimwe mu byo uru rutonde ruzanye ni uko nyuma y’imyaka itanu aho Wales yari ku 117, ubu bageze mu icumi ba mbere, Espanye yo yasohotse muri top ten iyobowe na Argentina ari na ko Cote d’Ivoire iza imbere muri Afurika mu gihe n’u Rwanda rwazamutse. Wales yageze kuri ibi nyuma yo kwitwara neza muri Euro 2016 aho bagarukiye muri semi finale, bikiyongera ku mukino baheruka gutsindamo Moldova 4-0 bashaka itike y’igikombe cy’isi. U Rwanda rwazamutseho imyanya 14 kuko ubu ni urwa 107 ku isi. Bitanu bya mbere ku isi
1.	Argentine
2.	Ububiligi
3.	Ubudage
4.	Clombia
5.	Brazil Bitanu bya mbere muri Afurika
 1.	Cote d’Ivoire (34)
2.	Algeria (35)
3.	Senegal (39)
4.	Tunisia (42)
5.	Ghana (43) Yanditswea na Lucky van Rukundo/Muhabura.rw

title: Ubwumvikane bucye n’umuyobozi we mushya bwatumye umunyamakuru Oswakim ahagarika akazi ku Radio
content: Mutuyeyezu Oswald uzwi uku izina rya Oswald Oswakim umaze iminsi atumvikana kuri radiyo yari asanzwe akoraho yatangaje ko ubwumvikane bucye n’ubuyobozi bwa City radio buhagarariwe n’umuyobozi mushya aribwo bwamuteye kuba ahagaritse akazi ariko ko bishobora no kurangira asezeye kuri iyi radiyo burundu mu gihe ibyifuzo bye bitahabwa agaciro. Kuri uyu wa Kabiri abinyujije ku rukuta rwe rwa Facebook yasubije abantu bose barimo kumubaza impamvu atacyumvikana kuri radiyo aho yavuze ko byatewe nuko hagati ye n’ ubuyobozi bwa City Radio hari ibyo batumvikanaho neza hagati yabo ndetse ko ibyifuzo bye biramutse bidahawe agaciro yasezera burundu ku kazi . Yagize ati “Inbox sinasubiza buri umwe ngo mbone umwanya uhagije wo kubisobanura neza, reka mbyandike hano. Ikiganiro Umunsi Ucyeye njye n’uwo mwita impanga yanjye twubatse mu gihe cy’imyaka irindwi, haje uwatubwiye ko ari ’umushoramari’ ahindura uburyo twagikoraga, wa mwanya twavugagamo amakuru n’amatangazo turirimba/dusetsa arawugabanya cyane, ikiganiro cyuzuzwa indirimbo ziri automated. Nk’umunyamakuru wari ukuriye abandi, chief editor, namaze hafi ukwezi kose mwereka ko ubwo buryo bushya buzatuma ikiganiro gitakaza abakunzi batari bake, nkamwereka ibivugirwa ku magroups y’abakunzi ba radio babaga banenga uburyo tutakibaha amakuru…. yanga kunyumva. Bagenzi banjye bashyizeho akabo, aratsimbarara. Mu nama yabaye tariki 30 Nyakanga ni bwo namubwiye ko uburyo bushya mbona butuma ibintu byiza twajyaga dutegurira abatwumva tutabona umwanya wo kubibaha bakagera n’aho badutuka on air, nti ’none rero nimukomeza kumfusha ubusa ndasezera.’ Sindasezera officially ariko na none sindimo no gukora muri iyi minsi. Hari impaka zikigibwa zirimo n’izirebana n’amasezerano y’akazi, ariko icyo intore itemera ni ’ukwambarira ubucocero aho yambariye inkindi

title: Umuhanzi Tyga  yongeye gusubizwa imbere y’Urukiko
content:
Ku myaka 25 y’amavuko umuhanzi mu gihugu cya Leta zunze ubumwe za America Tyga nan’ubu ntago yari yagira ubushobozi bwo kuba yatura mu nzu ye bwite mu gihe umukunzi we Kylie w’imyaka 18 kuri ubu we afite inzu ye bwite ihagaze mu kayabo ka milliyoni 2.7 z’amadorali ya America.


Kuri ubu uyu muhanzi nyuma y’uko agenda avugwa cyane mu nkiko zitandukanye hariya mu gihugu cya USA ko atajya yishyura inzu akodesha kuri ubu yasubijwe mu nkiko aho arimo kuregwa ko yaba yanze kwishyura amezi abiri ashize yose kuko atigeze yishyura akayabo k’amafaranga bihumbi 2.5 by’amadorali ya America ya buri kwezi ubwo yose hamwe ni ibihumbi 5 ku mezi abiri.


Tmz.com dukesha iyi nkuru ivuga ko uyu nyir’inzu Tyga abamo yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko uyu muhanzi naramuka arengeje iki cyumweru atishyuye ubukode bw’inzu azajya yishyura amadorali 833.33 ku munsi y’inyungu.


Ikintu gisekeje ni uko uyu muhanzi yavuzeko umwunganizi we ari uwahoze ari umukunzi we Black Chyna kuko ngo niwe babanaga muri iyi nzu.

Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Papa Francis, yavuze ko Kiliziya Gatolika ikwiye gusaba imbabazi abatinganyi
content:
Papa Francis, yavuze ko Kiliziya Gatolika ayoboye ikwiye gusaba imbabazi abatinganyi kubera uburyo yabahaye akato mu gihe cyashize. Ibi yabivuze ubwo yari avuye muri Armenia ku Cyumweru mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru ari mu ndege.
Umunyamakuru yamubajije niba yemeranya n’umwe mu bajyanama be uherutse gutangaza ko Kiliziya ikwiye gusaba imbabazi kubera yabahaye akato.

title: U Bwongereza: Inshuti z’u Rwanda zirimo abakinnyi ba Arsenal bifatanyije n’abanyarwanda Kwibuka26
content: Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Bwongereza, Yamina Karitanyi yavuze ko mu kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Bwongereza yahurije hamwe abakozi bayo, abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu n’inshuti z’u Rwanda abayobozi muri Guverinoma n’Abadipolomate ku wa 7 Mata 2020 hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga. Mu buryo busanzwe abo bose bagombaga guhurira kuri Paruwasi St Marylebone mu mujyi wa Londres mu gusubiza icyubahiro abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no gufata mu mugongo abayirokotse ariko ntibyashobotse kubera icyorezo cya Covid-19. Ambasade yasabye abantu kwenyegeza urumuri rw’icyizere mu ngo zabo no gufata umunota wo kwibuka. Umunota wo kwibuka wakurikiwe no gusangizanya ubutumwa bw’icyizere bwo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26. Mu butumwa bwe, Ambasaderi Yamina Karitanyi yasabye abantu bose “gukora cyane mu gukomeza kubaka amateka meza.” Ubutumwa bwa Amabsaderi bwibanze ku kurwanya abahakana, no guteza imbere ubutabera, bwanagarutsweho na Linda Melvern, umwanditsi akaba n’umunyamakuru ukora inkuru zicukumbuye, wasabye ko abantu barwanya guhakana aho kwagaragara aho ariho hose. Umuyobozi ushinzwe amasomo ku ishuri ryitwa Harrow, Dr. Michael Gray, yavuze ko guhakana ari uburyo bukomeye bw’abashaka gupfukirana ukuri. Rev. Canon Dr. Stephen Evans uyobora Paruwasi St Marylebone wakunze kwitabira gahunda zo kwibuka i Londres, yongeye gushimangira ko hakenewe “kubaka umuryango, sosiyete, igihugu n’isi bitagira uwo iheza.” Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Umuryango w’ibihugu bikoresha ururimi ry’Icyongereza (Commonwealth), Patricia Scotland yashimye “imbaraga n’agaciro’ by’uko abanyarwanda bishyize hamwe mu rwego kwimakaza ubumwe n’ubwiyunge no kwiyubaka.” Depite Andrew Mitchell washinze umushinga ‘Umubano’ yavuze ko hakiri ibyo gukora mu Bwongereza mu kugeza abakoze Jenoside imbere y’ubutabera, bishimangirwa n’Umwanditsi akaba n’Umunyamakuru, Andrew Wallis wavuze ko batazihanganira kutagira icyo abantu bakora no guceceka ku bakoze ibyaha bya Jenoside. Hatanzwe ubutumwa bwihanganisha abanyarwanda burimo ubw’abakinnyi ba Arsenal; barimo, David Luiz, Reiss Nelson, Pablo Mari na Alexandre Lacazette, bashimangiye ko bifatanyije n’Abanyarwanda. Luiz, wanasuye urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali ku Gisozi n’umuryango we umwaka ushize, binyuze muri gahunda ya Visit Rwanda, u Rwanda rufitanye n’ikipe ye, yavuze mu izina ry’ikipe, agira ati “Turi umuryango.” Umuyobozi wungirije w’umuryango Urumuri w’Abacitse ku icumu mu Bwongereza Chantal Uwamahoro yavuze ko “Kurokoka abyumvamo umukoro n’inshingano…zirimo Kwibuka no kuba ijwi ry’abazize Jenoside.” Abadipolomate, abayobozi muri Guverinoma y’u Bwongereza n’abandi banyacyubahiro bakoresheje Twitter bagaragaza ubutumwa bwo kwifatanya n’abanyarwanda. Barimo Ambasaderi Israel mu Bwongereza Mark Regev, Depite Lisa Nandy wo mu Bwongereza na Lord Jack McConnell wo muri Écosse.

title: Inkuru ndende y’urukundo “Amaherezo” igice 8
content: Akenshi mu rukundo habamo ibyishimo bidasanzwe kimwe n’uko ibigeragezo iyo byageze mu rukundo ahanini usanga bake aribo babasha kubyihanganira no kubyakira ariko ugasanga abandi bikabananira guhagarara ku cyemezo bahisemo cyo kujya mu rukundo.
