Kubo duherukana twari tugeze aho  Jado na Sifa bari mu bihe byiza gusa nyine hari kuri telephone ntago mbibabwira kuko mwese murabizi aba bashije gusoma igice cyatambutse rero mu buryo bwihuse     Ndagirango kuburyo bwihuse natwe duhite twikomereza n’agace gakurikira kuko ndizerako bigeze aharyoshye nta mpamvu yo kubatinza ariko nanone nabasabaga nk’abasomyi banjye kujya mumpa ibitekerezo aha kuri  www.muhabura.rw ukajya hasi ahanditse igitekerezo mukandika ibitekerezo byanyu ahabugenewe cyangwa se nanone mukajya munyandikira kuri E-mail yange sakayezu@gmail.com   sawa ndabashimiye ubwo nyine murakaza neza abashima ,abajyanama, abafatanyabikorwa, ndetse n’abanenga nibyiza muhawe ikaze. Twakomeje n’igice gikurikira ……… Rero kuri uwo munsi bahise bafata umwanzuro wo kuzajya bakora isabukuru ariko nanone ako kanya nibwo Jado yahise yerurira Sifa ko yumva yifuza ko bakundana urukundo rwuje ubunyakuri ntabintu byo kujya umwe atendeka cyangwa ngo abeshye undi ako kanya Sifa yanze kugira icyo abivugaho gusa yaramubwiye ati bizajya bigenda biza gake gake nyine ntakibazo ariko kimwe cyarangaga aba bombi ntago bajyaga bakunda kuvuga kubakunzi babo basanganwe usibye ko mbere y’uwo munsi hari igihe bari barabivuzeho gusa ntibabigira intambara yaba Sifa cyangwa Jado. Sasa uwo mugoroba w’amateka kuri aba bombi waje kurangira Jado ajya kwiga amasomo ya nijoro nk’uko bisanzwe ariko nyine kurya icyo gihe ntago yagiyeyo kuko bamaze kuvugana bwamaze kwira cyane kandi Jado akaba yarariraga muri Restaurant y’ikigo birumvikana yari gusanga bafunze kurya byarangiye ubwo uwo mu goroba kurya ntago yigeze abyikoza cyane ko yari ari mu nyungu gusa gusa birumvikana yari yasubijwe mu mutima we ndetse wagirango Imana yari yamukoreye mo cyane ko uwo bari bemeranyije gukundana uwo munsi ubu niwe basezeranye kubana akaramata ndetse ubu bafitanye umwana w’imfura nk’uko twabibonye dutangira iyi nkuru yacu. Uwo mugoroba rero Jado ntago yatinze muri etude kuko birumvikana yari agomba kujya muri chambre yararagamo akajya kubwira abo babana ko yabonye inshuti y’ubizima bwose. Rero yaje kugenda ajya muri chambre ahita anahuriramo na Gerrard aje kuryama ubwo nyine Gerrard na bwa bwiyemezi bwe yagiraga yahise abwira Jado ati sha wowe uriya mu gore wange amakuru ye aba akubeshya ngwiki ubusanzwe ko ari uwange? Ubwo ariko Jado we kuko yari icyo yibikiye aje kubwira abo bagenzi be yahise aseka cyane hanyuma ahita abwira Gerrard ati ahubwo wowe tuza gato utege amatwi kuko ngewe nje hano aricyo kinzanye kubabwira ko ngewe ubu tuvugana ndi umugabo uhiriwe umugani wa Tom Close kuko umwana yankuze ubu ngewe na Sifa ntago wakumva buryo urukundo rurimo kugurumana kuko kuri ubu ntan’undi mukonbwa nzongera kuvugisha mu gihe mfite Sifa wange.  Sasa bose barasetse kuko nyine aho muri Chambre hari harimo uwo Gerrard, Moses ndetse n’undi bitaga Charles ubwo bose bahise basekera rimwe noneho nyine Gerrard aratangira ababwira muri make Sifa ni muntu ki? Amakosa ye ndetse nyine abumvisha uburyo…… Agace gakurikira ntucikwe  Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Perezida Kagame ubwe yinjiye mu kibazo cy’umukobwa ushinja umushoramari kumuhohotera
content:
Mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi nibwo umukobwa witwa Kamali Diane yatangaje ko akomeje gushengurwa n’uburyo yatutswe ndetse agakubitirwa mu ruhame na Dr Francis Habumugisha, ariko kugeza ubu uyu mushoramari akaba na nyiri Goodrich TV akaba adakurikiranwa kandi yaramureze ku nzego bireba. Abinyujije ku butumwa yashyize kuri Twitter ku ya 05 Nzeri 2019, uyu mukobwa yagize ati "Nakubitiwe mu ruhame n’umugabo witwa Dr Francis (GoodRich TV). Ku wa 16.07.2019, mbimenyesha @RIBRwanda hashize amezi 2 atarahanwa. Ese kuba umuntu afite amafaranga, ngo anaziranye n’abayobozi bakomeye bimwemerera guhohotera ntahanwe?" Kamali Diane yagaragaje amashusho yafashwe na camera y’icyumba cy’inama barimo hamwe n’abandi muri imwe mu nyubako ziherereye i Kigali ubwo yakubitwaga, anavuga ko afite amajwi yumvikanisha ibyabaye. Yakomeje avuga ko yagize amahirwe yo kubona ibi bimenyetso kuko byibuze abona icyo ashingiraho asobanura ihohoterwa yakorewe. Uyu mukobwa kandi anyuze kuri Twitter yamenyesheje iki kibazo inzego zitandukanye zirimo n’Umukuru w’Igihugu, Perezida Paul Kagame wanamushubije kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 11 Nzeri 2019 amumara impungenge ko agiye kwikurikiranira iki kibazo. Perezida Kagame yagize ati “Turabikurikirana tumenye icyabaye tunafate imyanzuro ya ngombwa. Biratunguranye niba RIB yaramenyeshejwe ni gute itakoze ibyagombaga gukorwa?”
 Uyu mukobwa asobanura ko uyu mugabo yamwatse telefone ye akayicamo ibice ndetse akamukubita kuko yaketse ko yarimo afata amashusho ubwo yarimo atuka undi mukobwa muri iyo nama ibitutsi ’nyandagazi’. Nyuma y’uko uyu mukobwa agaragaje iki kibazo kuri Twitter, Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha (RIB) na rwo rwagize icyo ruvuga ku butumwa bw’uyu mukobwa, rusobanura ko ikibazo cye rwacyakiriye kandi ko rurimo kugikurikirana ndetse rumwizeza ko azahabwa ubutabera kuko ngo nta muntu n’umwe uri hejuru y’amategeko. Minisitiri w’Ubutabera, Johnston Busingye na we yanditse ubutumwa kuri Twitter asubiza uwo mukobwa witwa Diane Kamali ko ashimishijwe no kuba RIB imwizeza ko irimo gukurikirana ikibazo cye, na we yongera kuvuga ko nta muntu n’umwe uri hejuru y’amategeko cyangwa ngo arenganye abandi yitwaje ubukire cyangwa se umubano afitanye n’abafata ibyemezo. Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere Dr Francis Habumugisha avugwaho guhohotera abakozi be dore ko byanavuzwe ko uretse kubatoteza hari nabo yahaye akazi nk’abanyamakuru ariko bagatangazwa no kubona abakoresha ibindi birimo nko kumasa (massage) abakiliya. Mu 2015 yarenzwe n’abanyamakuru batatu b’igitsinagore ko yabirukanye nyuma yaho abasabye kumasa bamwe mu bakinnyi b’imwe mu makipe ya hano mu Rwanda bari baje kuri iyi televiziyo ariko bakabyanga ndetse byaramuhamye acibwa amande anishyura ibikoresho byabo yari yangije.

title: Ronaldinho wahoze ari rutahizamu yatawe muri yombi na polisi
content: Ronaldinho wahoze ari rutahizamu w’ikipe y’igihugu ya Brazil ubu ari mu maboko ya polisi ya Paraguay ashinjwa gukoresha urwandiko rw’inzira (’passport’) ruhimbano mu kwinjira muri icyo gihugu, nkuko abategetsi babivuga. Ejo ku wa gatatu, polisi yasatse hoteli yo mu murwa mukuru Asuncion wa Paraguay aho Ronaldinho yari ari kuba n’undi mugabo bavukana. Minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu yabwiye televiziyo ESPN yo muri Brazil ko abo bombi batatawe muri yombi, ko ahubwo bari gukorwaho iperereza. Minisitiri Euclides Acevedo yanavuze ko abo bombi bahakana bavuga ko nta kibi bakoze kandi ko bari korohereza abategetsi muri iryo perereza. Mu kwezi kwa karindwi mu mwaka ushize wa 2019, amakuru avuga ko ’passports’ za Brazil na Espanye z’uwo wahoze ari umukinnyi w’umupira w’amaguru zafatiriwe kubera imisoro atishyuye. Minisitiri Euclides Acevedo yabwiye ibiro ntaramakuru AFP ati: "Ronaldinho araza kubazwa saa mbili za mu gitondo kuri uyu wa kane [saa saba z’amanywa mu Rwanda no mu Burundi] ku biro by’umushinjacyaha". Yongeyeho ko abategetsi bashinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka na bo bazakorwaho iperereza. Acevedo yabwiye ibitangazamakuru byo muri Paraguay ati: "Nubaha ibyo yagezeho mu mikino, ariko amategeko agomba kubahirizwa. Hatitawe ku wo uri we, amategeko nawe akugeraho". Ronaldinho w’imyaka 39 y’amavuko yatsindiye inshuro ebyiri igihembo cy’umukinnyi w’umupira w’amaguru wahize abandi ku isi. Yari yagiye muri Paraguay gukora ubukangurambaga ku gitabo no ku bikorwa bye by’ubukangurambaga bwo gufasha abana bo mu miryango icyennye. Undi mugabo wajyanyeyo n’abo bavandimwe bombi - Wilmondes Sousa Lira w’imyaka 45 y’amavuko - na we ari guhatwa ibibazo. Mu myaka ya 2004 na 2005, Ronaldinho yatsindiye igihembo cy’umukinnyi wahize abandi ku isi ndetse ibihe byiza cyane by’umupira we yabigiriye muri Barcelona. Mu mwaka wa 2002, yafashije ikipe y’igihugu cye kwegukana igikombe cy’isi, ari kumwe n’abandi ba rutahizamu b’ibihangange, Ronaldo na Rivaldo. Bigereranywa ko umutungo we ubarirwa hagati ya miliyoni 80 na miliyoni 100 z’amapawundi. Bivugwa ko kuri buri butumwa bwo ku rubuga rwa Instagram yamamaje, arihisha arenga ibihumbi 150 by’amapawundi. Fabrice Denis Nsengumuremyi \MUHABURA.RW

title: Abahitanywe na Coronavirus barenze ibihumbi 400
content:
Kugeza ubu, abantu 7 000 824 ku Isi hose nibo bamaze kwandura iki cyorezo, mu gihe abakize ari 3 422 299. Uko ibihugu bikurikiranye mu kwibasirwa n’iki cyorezo  	Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ifite abantu 1 988 545 banduye na 112 096 bapfuye
 	Muri Brésil hamaze kwandura 676 494 mu gihe abapfuye ari 36 044
 	U Burusiya bufite abantu 467 673 banduye na 5 859 bapfuye
 	Espagne ifite ubwandu bungana na 288 390 na 27 135 bapfuye Muri rusange, u Burayi bufite abantu 2 089 782 mu gihe abapfuye ari 178 761 mu gihe Amerika ya Ruguru yo ifite ubwandu 2 258 034 n’abantu 135 128 mu gihe Aziya ifite abantu 1 339 647 banduye na 34 587 bapfuye. Muri Amerika y’Amajyepfo hari abantu 1 117 287 banduye na 48 871 bapfuye mu gihe muri Afurika abanduye ari 186 483 naho abapfuye bakaba ari 5 089.

title: Nyagatare: Ibitaro bya Gatunda bizatahwa muri uyu mwaka
content: Ibi bitaro byari bimaze imyaka ibiri byubakwa bigiye kuzura ku mafaranga miliyari enye. Nyagatare niko karere kanini mu gihugu. Kagizwe n’imirenge 14 n’abaturage bagera ku bihumbi 700 nyamara gafite ibitaro bimwe. Abaturage n’abayobozi babwiye itangazamakuru ko ibitaro bya Gatunda nibyuzura, bizateza imbere serivisi z’ubuzima mu ntara y’Iburasirazuba. Meya wa Nyagatare, Claudian Mushabe yagize ati “Ntabwo turamenya neza itariki yo kubitaha ariko turi mu mirimo ya nyuma yo kubaka.” Yakomeje agira ati “Nyuma yo kuzura hazajyaho ibyo kubona ibikoresho ariko icyo tuzi neza ni uko mu mpera z’uyu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari, ibitaro bizaba byaruzuye.” Ubuyobozi bw’akarere buvuga ko ibyo bitaro bizaha serivisi abaturage bagera ku bihumbi 400 bo mu mirenge ya Gatunda, Kiyombe, Karama, Mimuri, Mukama n’ibice bya Rukomo. Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’ubuzima muri Nyagatare, Elia Kamanzi, yavuze ko bafite icyizere ko muri Kamena uyu mwaka ibitaro bizaba byatangiye gukora. Ati “Inyungu za mbere z’ibi bitaro ni uko umubare w’abantu bajyaga mu mujyi wa Nyagatare uzagabanyuka. Nyagatare ni kamwe mu turere dutuwe cyane ariko gafite ibitaro bimwe, bikaba byagiraga ingaruka kuri serivisi zitangirwa mu bitaro.” Jean de Dieu Bavugirije, umuturage w’imyaka  54 wo mu murenge wa Karama, yavuze ko bishimishije kuba bagiye guhabwa ibitaro hafi. Ati “Hari abarwayi bajyaga boherezwa I Nyagatare, bamwe barimo ababyeyi batwite  bikagore imiryango yabo.” Mu 2017 ubwo Perezida Kagame yiyamamarizaga kuyobora u Rwanda, nibwo yemereye abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Gatunda, Akarere ka Nyagatare n’indi mirenge bihana imbibi kububakira ibitaro mu kubaruhura ingendo bakora bajya kwivuza.

title: APR FC  yungutse umuterankunga  mushya
content: APR FC  yungutse umuterankunga  mushya, AZAM, uruganda rukora ifarini rwo muri Tanzania, APR izanjya ya mamaza binyuze mu kwambara imyambaro iriho ibirango byarwo. Azam na APR FC bari bamaze iminsi mu biganiro mu gihe kandi iyi Sosiyete yaganiriye n’andi makipe yo mu Rwanda. Umuvugizi wa APR FC, Kazungu Claver, yatangaje ko amasezerano y’ubufatanye hagati y’impande zombi azashyirwaho umukono kuri uyu wa Gatatu. Ati ‘’Ejo saa kumi ku ruganda rukora ifarini rwa Azam i Masoro, hazasinywa amasezerano y’ubufatanye ya AZAM na APR FC.’’ Impande zombi zemeranyijwe gukorana mu gihe cy’imyaka ine. AZAM izajya yamamaza ibikorwa byayo ku myambaro y’iyi kipe y’ingabo, ku kibuga aho APR FC yakiniye ndetse inahacuruze ibikorwa byayo. Niyomugabo Albert \Muhabura.rw

title: Muhungu:Inzira zagufasha gutinyuka kwegera umukobwa watinyaga ugakorana nawe ikiganiro cy’urukundo
content: Umubare mu nini w’abahungu, gutangira ikiganiro n’umukobwa bwa mbere ni nko kunyura mu kibatsi cy’umuriro ugurumana.Ugasanga gutinyuka kugitangira byaba bikomeye kurusha kugendagenda mu bushyuhe bw’amakara cyangwa guterura Imbabura yaka umuriro yatokomboye. Ariko ni mu gihe,kuko akenshi ushobora kugenda uhubutse ukahakura imbwa yiruka cyangwa ugaterwa bimwe bita indobo bigatuma uzinukwa n’ijambo cyangwa izina umukobwa mu kanwa kawe cyangwa kumubona. Gusa siko bihora bibaye gutyo ngo umwe agutere indobo ucike intege,bamwe ntibazashaka abagore maze bagahora ari imanzi cyangwa ingaragu. Aha hari inzira zagufasha kwigobotora ubwo bwoba mu gihe wabugize ukaba Wabasha gutangira ikiganiro kinogeye amatwi cy’urukundo n’umukobwa watinyaga. 1.Ntuzasuzugure uburemere bw’akajambo “Bite”ni akajambo gato ariko gafite imbaraga kakaba n’urufunguruzo rukomeye mugutangira ikiganiro. 2.Shaka ikintu kingenzi mwahurizaho hafi aho hantu muri. Icyo nacyo ni ingenzi kandi cyoroshye gihita gituma akwitaho mugakomezanya ikiganiro mukurije kukantu gato. 3.Ba umuntu ufite amakuru y’ibyamamare ndetse n’ayimyidagaduro kuburyo buhagije.Ibi abakobwa hafi ya bose barabyishimira kandi bakanabikunda. 4.Igire nk’umuntu ucyeneye igitekerezo cye n’ inyunganizi ku kintu runaka muri kuvugaho.aha biba byiza cyane igihe muri kumwe n’inshuti zanyu kandi hakaba hari icyo utari kumvikanaho nazo bityo ukamusaba igitekerezo. 5.Buri gihe gerageza kuba ufite utuganiro twihariye kandi turyoheye amatwi dusekeje. 6.Gukora intego(gutega) hagati yanyu ibi bizagufasha guhura kwanyu gukomeza kubaho. uku gutega bibaho wemeza cyangwa utomboza ko ikintu runaka kimwerekeyeho ari cyo, maze watsindwa ukamugurira icyo kunywa cyangwa akandi kantu gashimishiji. 7.Gutangiza ikiganiro hamwe n’inshuti zawe kivuga kubyerekeranye n’imirango mungo ariko ukaba wizeye ko izo nshuti zawe zifitanye umubano wahafi nawe.iyi nzira nayo iba nziza kuko akenshi abantu baba bashaka kwihagararaho iyo haganiriwe ibyerecyeye n’imiryango ndetse n’ibibazo biyirangwamo. 8.  Kugerageza kugira uruhare mu kiganiro cye utanga inyunganizi ndetse ibyo ari kuvugaho ukagira icyo wongeraho. 9.Kumuha icyo kunywa cyangwa kumugurira akantu ubona acyeneye muri ako kanya.Nyuma y’ibyo byose, ntakabuza umubano uhera aho ukagera aho wifuza ndetse nawe akakwiyumvamo mukabana ubuzira herezo. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Abageni 2 bataye ubukwe bwabo bajya mu kizamini
content:
Mu gihugu cya Nigeria abakobwa 2 bavuye mu bukwe bwabo hagati bajya ku ishuri mu kizamini. Dorcas Atsea na Deborah Atoh ni abakobwa babiri bari barateguye ubukwe ku itariki ya 7 Mata, 2018 ariko baza kugira ikibazo cy’uko ikizamini bari bafite ku ishuri cyigijwe inyuma kivanwa ku itariki yacyo gishyirwa kuri iyi tariki y’ubukwe bwabo. Bakoresheje uko bashoboye binginga abayobozi b’ishuri ryabo ngo babahindurire umunsi w’ikizamini ariko ntibyakunda bityo basanga nta kundi babigenza uretse kuva mu bukwe bagakora ikizamini kuko no gusubika ubukwe nabyo bitari gushoboka.

 Ntibashoboraga gusubika ubukwe bwabo, ariko ntibagombaga no gusiba ikizamini  Deborah aganira na CNN yagize ati "Ubukwe bwanjye bwari bwaramaze gutegurwa, narabwiye abantu bose ko nzashyingirwa ku ya 7 Mata ndetse narohereje n’impapuro z’ubutumire. Twahisemo rero kudahindura umunsi w’ubukwe ahubwo tubikora kuriya." Aba bageni bombi rero, nyuma yo gusezerana imbere y’Imana bahise bihutira ku ishuri ryabo maze bakora ikizamini babona gusanga abandi mu birori byo kwiyakira.

title: Amagambo 11 Wabwira Umukunzi Wawe Umutima we ukanyurwa urukundo rukikuba birenze uko ubitekereza
content: Abahanga mu by’urukundo bavuga ko ari nk’ubugenge.Gukunda nawe ugakundwa ntako bisa kandi ni ikintu cyiza cyane gishobora kuba ku muntu uwo ariwe wese.Hari amagambo ashobora gushimisha umutima w’umukunzi wawe kandi bikanatuma arushaho kugukunda cyane birenze uko ibyumva cyangwa uko wabitekerezo. Gusa nti bivuze ko hari n’uwo ushobora kuyabwira ukamera nk’uwasa urutare cyangwa uwutema mu mazi.Urukundo rw’iki gihe namwe muzi akenshi rushingiye ku mafaranga aho umuhungu udafite ubutunzi cyangwa amafaranga ntacyo aba avuze imbere y’inkumi.Ibi nibyo bituma abakobwa b’iki gihe bemera bagakundana n’abangana na basekuru, kugirango bibonera aba baha ibyishimo by’igihe gito nyuma bikaba amarira n’agahinda. Aya ni amagambo wabwira umukunzi wawe akarushaho kugukunda bya nyabyo 1.Urukundo ni inzira ebyiri zidahinduka umuntu ashobora kugendamo nta kibazo; ibi wabibwira umukunzi wawe ushaka kumwumvisha ko ari inzira yawe ugendamo kandi ikuyobora ahantu hose unyuze. 2.Wankunze rimwe ariko njye igihe cyose nkurebye ndushaho ku gukunda ibihe byose. 3.Ushaka gusobanukirwa impamvu nkukunda n’icyo nkukundira byantwara amajoro yose, ushaka kumubwira ko umukunda byimazeyo. 4.Nishimira kuba ndi kumwe nawe,kuvugana nawe ni iby’igiciro cyinshi kandi mba numva wanyigumira iruhande ibihe byose. 5.Igihe uzumva uri wenyine, ujye ureba iruhande rwawe mba ndi kumwe nawe aho intoki zawe ziba zigukumbuye 6.Ndagukunda kandi mba numva ntifuza kuba ntakubura iruhande rwanye kuko ubuzima bwanjye bushingiye kuri wowe rukundo rwanjye 7.Igihe nakubonye narimfite ubwoba bwo kuba nahura nawe.Mpuye nawe ngira ubwoba bwo kuba nagusoma, nkusomye ndumva ngize ubwoba bwo kukubwira ko nkukunda. Ariko ubu kuko nkukunda ukaba ari byose byanjye, nkubuze nasara. 8.Uri akabavu ko mu mbavu zanjye kandi uri akara ko mu mara yanjye. Iyo nkubuze nta mutekano ngira muri njyewe, mba numva nahungabanye. 9.Naguhaye ikibanza mu mutima wanjye kitavogerwa n’uwariwe wese, kuko nifuje kugituzamo wowe wenyine. 10.Muri iyi si ya rurema uri umuntu w’agaciro mba numva nshaka gohora mbona imbere yanjye, simba nifuza kukubura iruhande rwanjye kuko undutira bose. 11.Kugukunda nta gihombo kirimo kandi niyo utankunda nzakomeza nkukunde kuko kugukunda nawe bigize intego y’ubuzima bwanjye. Tanga igikerezo ku nkuru z’ibitekerezo by’umusaza ’’’BIRANYOBERA’’’ tugiye kujya tukugezaho buri kuwa Gatanu w’icyumweru. Chief Editor/MUHABURA.RW

title: Kigali: Louis Van Gaal, Tony Adams, Ne-Yo na Meddy bazaza Kwita Izina
content: Ibirangirire birimo umuririmbyi w’Umunyamerika Ne-Yo, umukinnyi Tony Adams wakanyujijeho muri Arsenal, umutoza Louis van Gaal, n’umunyarwanda Meddy bazitabira ibirori byo Kwita Izina Abana b’Ingagi biteganyijwe tariki 06 Nzeri. Umuyobozi Ushinzwe ubukerarugendo mu kigo k’Igihugu k’Iterambere (RDB), Belise Kariza yatangaje aya makuru mu kiganiro n’Abanyamakuru gitegura biriya birori Ngarukamwaka bizabera mu Karere ka Musanze. Belise Kariza yavuze ko ibiro byo kwita abana b’ingagi by’uyu mwaka bizagaragaramo udushya twinshi turimo abashyitsi bakomeye barimo abasanzwe ari ibirangirire ku Isi. Umuhanzi w’Umunyamerika uririmba injyana ya R&B azamanukana n’umunyarwanda Ngabo Medard Jobert uzwi nka Meddy baze kwita Ingagi mu birori bizabera mu karere ka Musanze tariki ya 06 Nzeri. Aba bombi bukeye bwaho bazakora igitaramo cyo kizabera mu mujyi wa Kigali cyo kwishimira ibi birori bibumbatiye ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda. Kwinjira mu gitaramo kimwe kizabanziriza umuhango wo Kwita Izina kizwi nka Gala Dinner, abantu 10 bazajya bishyura 2000 USD ku meza, abantu babiri (couple) bishyure ibihumbi 230 Frw, mu gihe umuntu ku giti ke azishyura ibihumbi 137 Frw. Naho igitaramo kizaba nyuma yo kwita Izina ku wa 07 Nzeri, tike ya VVIP ni ibihumbi 50 Frw, VIP ikaba ibihumbi 25 Frw naho ahasigaye hose bikaba 15 000 Frw. Mu birori byo kwita izina kandi hazaba hari abakinnyi n’abahoze baconga ruhago n’abandi bakomeye mu mupira w’amaguru ku isi barimo Louis Van Gaal watozaga Manchester United na Tony Adams wakanyujijeho muri Arsenal. Umunyarwandakazi Sherrie Silver umaze kumenyekana ku isi kubera imibyinire ye, na we azaba ari mu bazita izina umwe mu bana b’ingagi. Abana b’ingagi bateganyijwe kwitwa amazina ni 25 bavutse nyuma y’uko abandi bana biswe umwaka ushize. Inkuru y’Umuseke

title: Paris: Abantu 30 bafashwe bashinjwa guteza imvururu hafi y’aho Fally Ipupa yakoreye igitaramo
content: Mbere y’iki gitaramo, ahagana saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba hafi y’aho bategera ’Gare de Lyon’, i Paris, hagaragaye inkongi yatewe n’abigaragambya bagamije kubuza abantu kwitabira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa, cyaberaga hafi aho. Aba biganjemo abarwanya ubuyobozi bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, batwitse ibishyirwamo imyanda ndetse n’utumoto duto twari aho. Icyakora bakomwe mu nkokora na Polisi y’u Bufaransa n’abazimya umuriro bahise bawucyaha. Umunyamakuru wa BBC wari uri aho byabereye yagize ati” Hari umwotsi mwinshi cyane, abantu biruka batwika ibintu. Byagaragaraga ko barakaye. Urujya n’uruza rwari rwakumiriwe mu byerekezo byose. Byari akaga”. “Abigaragambya bajugunyaga buri kimwe bashoboye kuri polisi ndetse n’abazimya inkongi bageragezaga gukora akazi kabo. Batwikaga buri kimwe bashoboye kandi bakakirwanisha.” Igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa cyabereye ahitwa Accor Hotels Arena. Polisi yabashije gukumira ko aba bigaragambyaga irabatatanya ndetse ntibabangamira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa, kuko byarangiye kibaye cyitabirwa n’abarenga 20 000. Abigaragambyaga bari bagamije gukumira abantu kwitabira igitaramo cya Fally Ipupa ushinjwa kuba inshuti ya hafi ya Perezida Felix Tshisekedi umaze umwaka ayobora Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Polisi yavuze ko yataye muri yombi abantu 30 mu gihe abarenga 54 bo baciwe amande bashinjwa kugira uruhare muri iyi myigaragambyo. Nyuma y’igitaramo cyagenze neza, Fally Ipupa abinyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga yashimiye buri umwe wakitabiriye ndetse anihanganisha abatabashije kwinjira kubera ko amatike yari yarashize cyera. Yagize ati” Ndashimira abantu 20000 bitabiriye igitaramo cyanjye kitazibagirana cyo ku wa 28 Gashyantare 2020, urukundo rwanyu rwatumye twongera kwandika amateka mashya. Ndihanganisha abatabashije kwinjira imbere, tuzasubira. Ndabakunda cyane.” Nubwo habanje akaduruvayo, Fally Ipupa yishimiye uko igitaramo cyagenze  👑🦅 Merci aux 20.000 personnes qui hier soir ont rendu cette soirée du 28.02.2020 inoubliable.Votre détermination,votre courage mais surtout votre amour ont permis de réécrire une nouvelle histoire .🙏🏾 Mes regrets les plus sincères à tous ceux et celles qui n’ont pas pu accéder à l’intérieur de la salle, ce n’est que partie remise je vous aime ❤️... Thank you to all the 20,000 people who made last night an unforgettable evening! Your determination, your courage but above all your love made it possible to rewrite history 🙏🏾. My most sincere regrets to all those of you that were unable to access the arena! We Will do it again !! I love you guys so much❤️ #swetlife #onelove #fallyaccordhotelsarena2020 A post shared by  Fally Ipupa (@fallyipupa01) on Feb 29, 2020 at 2:04am PST Hafi y’ahagombaga kubera igitaramo imyigaragambyo yari ikomeye  Ils empêchent les #pompiers d’éteindre les #incendie #GareDeLyon #casseur @Qofficiel pic.twitter.com/BIF4toqWFK — joel belafa (@jbelafa) February 28, 2020

title: Dore impamvu 7 zituma abantu bakunda gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina
content:
Ni byiza kugira ubushake bwo kumenya byinshi kubijyanye n’impamvu abantu bakunda gukora cyane imibonano mpuzabitsina, ibi byagufasha mu buzima bwawe bwa buri munsi. Impamvu imibonano mpuzabitsina ikundwa cyane zamenyekanye mu buzima bwa buri muntu aba yumva yakayikoze. Ibanga n’ibyiza byo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina byagiye ahagaragara, iyumvire. Niba ushaka kumenya uko amahoro n’ibyishimo byataha uburiri bwawe ndetse nawe ukumva unezerewe, nkuko tubikesha www.elcrema.com dore ibanga wakoresha kugira ngo urusheho gushyira ubuzima bwawe ahantu heza no kuba hafi y’umukunzi wawe muri rusange. Ibanga ryavumbuwe mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, dore izo mpamvu zirindwi ni izi zikurikira: Kuruhuka igihe kirekire; bituma umugore wawe cyangwa umukunzi wawe akunda kuba yumva afite ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Kuruhura umubiri no kuruhura umutwe bituma imibonano igenda neza kandi igatanga ubuzima bwiza ku bayikora. Gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina nibura rimwe mu cyumweru; bitera ibyishimo bidasanzwe nkuko tubikesha ubushakashatsi bwa Kaminuza nkuru ya Michigan. Gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsina n’umukunzi wawe nibura rimwe mu cyumweru byongera ibyishimo byawe n’umunezero wawe. Siporo ngororamubiri; ubushakashatsi dukesha Ikigonderabuzima cya Cedars-Sinai muri Los Angeles, America buvuga ko imirimo ngorora mubiri nka siporo ari byiza cyane ku buzima bw’umuntu kuko ngo akenshi bitera gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, bigatuma amaraso yawe atembera neza mu buzima. Bituma nta ndwara ya kanseri ushobora kurwara; gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina cyane cyangwa kenshi gashoboka bituma nta ndwara ya kanseri ishoborta gufata umubiri wawe nkuko tubikesha ubushakashts bwakozwe na Kaminuza ya Montreal. Gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina kenshi ni imwe ntwaro yakurinda indwara ya kanseri. Bituma ushobora gukorera amafaranga menshi mu gihe gito; nkuko bigaragazwa mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na kaminuza ya Anglia Ruskin muri Cambridge, UK, buvuga ko gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina inshuro ebyiri cyangwa eshatu mu cyumweru bishobora kuguha amafaranga bingana na 4.5% mu kazi kurusha uko wayikora inshuro imwe. Byongera uburambe mu kazi, bivugwa ko abasore b’ibiro bike badashoboye akazi ko gutera akabariro ariko ntabwo ari amakuru yizewe kandi nta nubwo ari byiza. Abagabo baringaniye ngo nibo usanga bagerageza, ariko iyo bigeze ku bagabo b’amatuza uba usanga ari inzobere mu kazi nkuko tubikesha ubushaka shatzi bwajozawe na kaminuza ya Chapman. Bityo gukora imibonanompuzabitsina bituma urushaho kugira uburambe mu kazi no kuba inzobere muriko ari nabyo bitanga amahoro n’ubuzima bwiza. Gufatanya akazi ko mu rugo byongera ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina; nkuko tubikesha ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na kaminuza ya Alberta, butugaragariza ko kugira ubufatanye mu rugo bituma habaho imibonano mpuzabitsina ku mpande zombi kandi yi mibonano ikaba ifite ubuzima bwiza kuri banyirukuyikora. Gukora imibonano mpuzabitsin byongera iminsi ndetse n’igihe cyo kurama kandi kugira ubufatanye mu rugo bituma ubuzima burushahokumera neza; ndetse no gukor imibonano mpuzabitsina kenshi bituma ubufatanye ku murimo ndetse no mu rukundo rwanyu byiyongera.


Yanditswe na Bizimana Jean Damascene/Muhabura.rw

title: Urotonde rw’abahatanira BET Awards 2016 rwashyizwe ahagaragara.
content:
BET Awards, igihembo gihabwa ibyamamare bifite ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa kurusha abandi igiye kuba na none. Abashinzwe kubitegura bakaba batangaza ko umuhanzi Drake ariwe uyoboye ku majwi aho akubye Beyonce na Rihanna incuro ebyiri. 
Kuri iyi nshuro umuhanzi Diamond Platnumz guturuka mu gihugu cya Tanzania akaba ri mu bahatana ku mwanya w’umuhanzi mpuzmahanga mwiza muri Afrika, ahoahanganye na WizKid ndetse n’abandi bakomeye hano muri Afrika. BET Awards yatangarije Associated Press kuri uyu wa kane ko Drake afite amahirwe cyane kuko muri video nziza harimo ize ebyiri “Hotline Bling” na “Work” yafatanije na Rihanna. Mu bandi bari imbere mu majwi kuri video nziza ni Beyonce “Formation”, Kendrick Lamar “Alright”, n’umuhanzi mushya mwiza(rising newcomer) Bryson Tiller “Don’t”.

title: Impinduka muri Kigali Fashion Week ya 2019
content: Ibi birori biteganyijwe ku wa 9 Nyakanga 2019, kuri iyi nshuro bizaba bitandukanye n’ibyabanje cyane ko ubu byamaze kujya mu maboko ya Sosiyete yitwa ‘Iby’iwacu’ ikaba ariyo izabitegura ndetse ikanabikurikirana kuva bitangiye kugeza birangiye. John Bunyeshuri wari umaze imyaka umunani ategura ibi birori bya Kigali Fashion Week bibera mu Rwanda, yabwiye IGIHE ko bahisemo gushyira iki gikorwa mu maboko y’iyi kompanyi kubera ko bashaka guha umwanya n’abakiri bato bakigaragaza mu bijyanye no gutegura ibirori by’imideli. Ati “Twatekereje gushyira iki gikorwa mu maboko ya ‘Iby’iwacu’ kubera ko dushaka guha umwanya abakiri bato bakigaragaza mu bijyanye no gutegura ibirori by’imideli.” Yakomeje avuga ko we icyo azakora ari ukuzaba ari mu bujyanama bw’abazategura ibirori bya Kigali Fashion Week ibindi byose bikazakurikiranwa na ‘Iby’iwacu’. Ibindi birori bya Kigali International Fashion Week birimo ikizabera mu Mujyi wa Montreal muri Canada, i New York muri Amerika, Londres mu Bwongereza, Genève mu Busuwisi no mu Buyapani byo bizakomeza gutegurwa na John Bunyeshuri. ‘Iby’iwacu’ isanzwe iyoborwa na Umulisa Fiona Cécile igamije kumenyekanisha ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, ndetse ijya ikora amamurikagurisha atandukanye ajyanye n’iki gikorwa. Iryo iheruka gutegura ni iryabereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku wa 8 Werurwe 2019, ku Munsi wahariwe Abari n’Abategarugori. Icyo gihe Umuyobozi wa ‘Iby’iwacu’, Umulisa Fiona Cécile, yatangarije IGIHE ko iri murikagurisha ryari rigamije kumenyekanisha ibikorerwa mu Rwanda ariko by’umwihariko byakozwe n’abagore. Ni ku nshuro ya cyenda Kigali Fashion Week izaba ibaye nyuma y’izabaye mu myaka umunani ishize.

title: Inkumi yagaye Messi ‘witwaye nk’umurambo’ bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina
content: Inkuru igezweho kuri Messi ni iy’umunyamideli wo muri Argentine witwa Xoana Gonzalez  wandagaje uyu mugabo, yamwise umunebwe bwimbi mu buriri ahereye ku mibonano mpuzabitsina bakoze muri 2011. Umunyamideli Xoana Gonzalez yavuze ko atazibagirwa ibihe bibi yagiranye na Lionel Messi wamusabye ko bakorana imibonano mpuzabitsina ariko bagera mu gitanda akitwara nabi ku kigero cyo hejuru. Uyu rurangiranwa mu gutaha izamu mu mupira w’amaguru asanzwe azwiho ubuhanga mu gutsinda ibitego muri FC Barcelona. Gonzalez ariko ‘yagaye cyane imyitwarire ya Messi wananiwe gutaha izamu ubwo bari hagati y’amashuka’. Mu kiganiro ’the value of truth’ gica kuri Televiziyo yo muri Peru, Gonzalez yavuze byimbitse iby’umubano we na Lionel Messi umaze kwegukana  Balon d’Or inshuro eshanu. Yahamije ko yakundanye by’igihe gito na Messi ndetse bakorana imibonano mpuzabitsina itaramuhaye uburyohe ku bw’umusore wananiwe gukora akazi. Yagize ati “Ni mu myaka ishize. Mu by’ukuri yari [Messi] akiri muto ariko yari azi ibyo akora kuko ntiyari munsi y’imyaka y’ubukure, nicyo cyari ingenzi.” Yongeraho ati ‘Abashinzwe umutekano we  barambwiye ngo ‘babonye umuntu ushaka ko tumenyana’. Nagize amatsiko yo kumubona, nibazaga uwo ari we, naratitiye nkibona ari Messi nakundaga, naratitiye.” Umukobwa ngo yatahuye Messi ko ari umunyabwoba ku nkumi rugikubita kuko yatinye kumwiteretera ahubwo amutumaho abamurinda. Ati “Navuga ko afite intinyi, kuko yohereje abashinzwe umutekano we baza kumfata. Nahise mvumbura ko ari umunyabwoba cyane.” “Twavuganye iby’umuziki, sinibuka niba naramubajije niba afite umukunzi cyangwa niba bitarabayeho. Hashize umwanya twagiye mu nzu yari acumbitsemo muri Puerto Madero.” Gonzalez na Messi bageze mu buriri, umusore yitwaye nabi ku buryo ngo inkumi yakekaga ko uwo baryamanye ari umurambo. Yavuze ko atiyumvisha uburyo Messi yananirwa kwirwanaho imbere y’inkumi kandi ari we wamusabye ko bajyana mu gitanda. Ati “Nashakaga ko ankorera ibirenze biriya, ku ruhande rumwe numvaga nsa n’uryamanye n’umurambo!” Lionel Messi w’imyaka 29 ntaragira icyo atangaza kuri aya makuru yavuzwe na Gonzalez. Messi afite ibihembo bitanu by’umukinnyi mwiza ku Isi, yatwaye ibikombe bikomeye birenga 30 ari kumwe n’ikipe ya FC Barcelona akinira kuva afite imyaka 17. Yasezeye mu ikipe y’igihugu nyuma y’uko yari amaze imyaka 11 ayikinira.

title: Umuhanzikazi Kayirebwa yababajwe bikomeye n’urupfu rwa Kizito Mihigo
content:
Polisi  y’u Rwanda yatangaje  ko umuhanzi Kizito Mihigo wari ufungiwe kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Remera, mu gitondo cyo kuwa Mbere basanze yiyahuye.gusa ur’urupfu rwe rwavugishije abantu benshi , bagaragaza akababaro batewe n’urupfu rwa Kizito Mihigo harimo n’umuhanzikazi Kayirebwa  . Umuhanzikazi  Cecile Kayirebwa  mu kiganiro n’Umunyamakuru  yagarutse ku rupfu rubabaje kandi rutunguranye rw’Umuhanzi Kizito ahamya ashize amanga ko yababajwe by’indengakamere n’urupfu rwe.Yagarutse ku buzima bwamuranze ndetse ko ijwi rye ryasaga n’irya Papa  wa (Se)  Kayirebwa. Kayirebwa yavuze ko kugirango umuntu yiyahure biba byageze kure maze ukumva  nta cyo ukimaze maze ukagaragaza ubwihebe maze akiyambura ubuzima. Yagize ati:"Kwiyahura ni ikimenyetso cy’ubwihebe ,ugata ubumuntu maze ukagera aho wiyambura ubuzima,birababaje,njyeho sinabona uko mbivuga byandenze,ndumirwa,ubu mfite agahinda  gakomeye." Umunyamakuru yamubajije indirimbo yibukira kuri Kizito Mihigo maze atajijinganya amubwira ko ari nyinshi ariko ko akunda indirimbo yitwa  "INUMA" Kayirebwa yasoje agira inama urubyiruko n’abantu muri rusange avuga  ko guhura n’ibibazo bidasobanura kwiyahura ahubwo ko wasanga abagize umuryango maze ukabaganirira ikibazo ufite cg ugashaka inshuti zawe aho kwiyambura ubuzima kandi ukanareba imbaga y’abantu agiye gusigira agahinda n’amaganya atagira urugero. 
 Denis Fabrice Nsengumuremyi \MUHABURA.RW

title: Abanyarwanda bo mu bihugu bya Scandinavie bagiye guhurira muri Danemark bizihiza Umuganura
content: Iki gikorwa umwaka ushize cyabere Oslo muri Norvège, kandi mu mujyi kibereyemo hahita hatangarizwa aho kizabera umwaka ukurikiyeho. Umunyamabanga wa mbere wa muri Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Suède, Umulisa Elise, mu kiganiro kigufi na IGIHE yahamije ko uyu uzaba ari umunsi ukomeye ku banyarwanda bo muri biriya bihugu. Yagize ati "Iki ni igikorwa kimwe mu binini bihuriza hamwe Abanyarwanda batuye muri aka karere ka Scandinavie mu Majyaruguru y’u Burayi, kigenda gikura buri mwaka, kugira ngo kigende kigera ku ntego baba biyemeje, mu kumenya no kuganira ku bibera mu gihugu no kureba uko babigiramo uruhare.” Yavuze ko Umuganura ari umwanya wo kwishimira ibyiza igihugu cyagezeho. Ati "Turisuzuma tukareba aho tugeze twiyubaka nk’umuryango Nyarwanda muri ibi bihugu by’Amajyaruguru y’u Burayi, uko dutoza abato, uko twakwiteza imbere muri ibi bihugu n’ uruhare twese twakomeza kugira mu iterambere ry’u Rwanda.’’ Umwe mu Banyarwanda batuye muri aka karere, Dr Ngoga Innocent, yavuze ko ari iby’agaciro kugira umwanya bakaganirira hamwe. Ati "Ni iby’agaciro kugira umwanya nk’uyu abana bacu, inshuti zacu, tukabaganiriza aho dukomoka, kuko utagira iyo ava ntamenya iyo ajya, ntanamenya kubana neza n’abamwakiriye. Ikindi kandi bituma duhora turi hafi mu bikorwa no mu bitekerezo n’igihugu cyacu u Rwanda.” Abanyarwanda batuye muri Danemark bakereye kwakira iki gikorwa cy’Umuganura. Umuyobozi w’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba Copenhagen, Misago Teajeni, yavuze ko “Bidufasha kurushaho kumenyana uko dutuye muri ibi bihugu, gukorera hamwe no kwigira ku byiza bamwe muri twe baba bamaze kugeraho, tugakomeza imihigo.’’ Ukuriye Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda muri Jylland and Fyn, muri Danmark, Jackline Hansen yashimiye ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda buha agaciro Abanyarwanda batuye hanze. Yakomeje avuga ko “Turashimira na Ambasade itekereza ku gikorwa kiduhuriza hamwe tukareba aho twavuye, tukishimira aho tugeze n’aho tujya nk’Abanyarwanda.’’ Umuganwa Marie Christine utuye muri Jylland and Fyn yavuze ko iki gikorwa ngarukamwaka kibongera imbaraga zo gusigasira umuco nyarwanda, ururimi rw’Ikinyarwanda, igitaramo Nyarwanda ati kidukumbuza iwacu. Ati ni igikorwa kandi dutumiramo n’abo muri ibi bihugu dutuyemo, tubaganirira ku gihugu cyacu, bakamenya amakuru y’ukuri ku gihugu cyacu. Uyu munsi uhuza Abanyarwanda bavuye hirya no hino muri ibi bihugu bya Scandinavie uko ari bitanu, uberamo ibiganiro byimbitse hagati y’Abanyarwanda n’inzego bishyiriyeho zibayobora bafatanyije na Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri ibyo bihugu. Ni umunsi w’ubusabane kandi w’umuco wo guhana hana amakuru, no kumenyana birushijeho. Bimaze kumenyerwa ko uyu muhango ngarukamwaka ukorwa buri cyumweru cya nyuma cya Kanama, kugirango Abanyarwanda bahure ari benshi kandi bawitegure neza, kuko usanga ibirometero baturukamo muri ibyo bihugu bigari n’ubwo ari ibituranyi, biba bitoroshye guhuza abantu bangana batyo. Ni umunsi uhuza abakuru n’abato n’inshuti z’Abanyarwanda, utumirwamo abahanzi batandukanye bavuye mu Rwanda cyangwa mu bindi bihugu birimo Diaspora nyarwanda. Uyu mwaka batumiye DJ Nyirimbabazi Flora uturutse mu Bubiligi na Jules Sentore uzaturuka mu Rwanda. Amafoto y’uko byari bimeze umwaka ushize [email protected]

title: Icyamamare mu muziki Akon asanga Afurika mu myaka 25 izaba imeze nk’Ubushinwa
content: Umuhanzi Aliaume Damala Badara Akon Thiam uzwi cyane nka Akon yagereranyije afurika n’igihugu cy’Ubushinwa avuga ko Ubushinwa mu myaka 25 ishize bwari bumeze nka Afurika,bityo birashoboka cyane ko Abanyafurika bahera kuri ibyo bagahindura umugabane wabo. Uyu mugabo yavukiye muri Amerika,ariko agakurira mu mujyi wa Dakar muri Senegal yongeye kandi agereranya Afurika nk’ibihugu byo mu burasirazuba bwo hagiti bw’isi birimo Israel,Arabia soudite n’ibindi ndetse na Dubai avuga ko Afurika ishobora kugera aho ibyo bihugu bigeze mu iterambere. Yagize ati”Afurika niho hantu mw’isi aho abirabura bashobora kujya bakubaka amakompanyi menshi mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu”. Kuri ubu Akon yashoye imari mu gihugu cye cya Senegal aho yubatse umujyi ku butaka bwa Wakanda bwahoze ari ubwa Black Panther,none yasezeranyije ko umujyi we uzaba ahantu heza hagatangaza mu minsi izaza. Akon yahawe na perezida wa Senegal Macky Sall hegitare 8 z’ubutaka bwo kubakaho umujyi witiriwe izina rye. Uyu muhanzi w’umunyasenegal yavuze ko kompanyi ye igeze kuri miliyoni 400 z’amadorari,harimo iyo yamaze gushyira ahagaragara muri Gashyantare 2014 yitwa Akon Lighting Africa ifite intego yo kumuriki Afurika hifashishijwe imirasire y’izuba mu bihugu by’Afurika.Iyi kompanyi ifite imishinga mito ibihumbi 200 ndetse ikazatanga urumuri mu bihugu 14 byo muri Afurika. Akon yashishikarije Abanyafurika bari kwisi hose kugaruka iwabo muri Afurika bakanahashora imari zabo.Yongeraho ko Abanyafurika bagomba kuzana impano zabo z’ubumenyi muri Afurika zirimo imyidagaduro,uburezi ndetse n’indi mishinga mito cyangwa iminini ibyara inyungu ngo bubake uyu mugabane. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Alex iwobi na Kelechi Iheanacho, icyizere cya Nigeria (Supper Eagles)
content:
Ibi byaje ahanini nyuma y’umukino wahuzaga Nigeria na Zambia kuri iki cyumweru mu mikino yo gushaka itike y’igikombe cy’isi, Nigeria yatsinze Zambia 2-1. Ibitego byatsinzwe n’abasore bato bakina muri shampiyona ya Premier league. Si ubwa mbere Nigeria izamura abakinnyi b’ibihangange bakina ku mugabane w’ubulayi, gusa kugeza ubu aba basore uko ari babiri bivugwa ko bashobora kuzakora ibitangaza kurusha abababanjirije kuko bo bakiri bato cyane ugereranije n’abo hambere. Nwanko Kanu, Jay-jay Okocha na Celestine Bakayoko ni bo bafatwa nk’intwari za Nigeria mu mupira w’amaguru kubera ibitangaza bagiye bayikorera mu gikombe cy’isi.
Gusa mu myaka yakurikiyeho nyuma yuko Nigeria itwaye igikombe cy’africa muri 2013, habonetse abasore bazabakorera mu ngata. Ibi byatumye Super Eagles itangira neza amajonjora y’igikombe cy’isi nyuma yuko Algeria na Cameroon zinganyije mu mukino wazihije muri group D.

Alex iwobi(photo internet)

Kelechi Iheanacho(photo internet) Yanditswe Ndacyayisaba Hubert/Muhabura.rw

title: Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko Umuryango w’ingagi zo mu Birunga uri kwaguka
content: Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekana ko ingagi zo mu ishyamba rya Bwindi muri Uganda na Sarambwe muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) zavuye kuri 400 zikagera kuri 459. Mu Rwanda, imibare y’ingagi  yariyongereye zigera kuri 604 zivuye kuri 480 zabarurwaga umwaka ushize. Ibyo byatumye ingagi zibarurwa mu gice cy’imisozi y’Ibirunga zigera ku 1,063. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe bigizwemo uruhare n’Ikigega cyita ku ngagi muri Pariki y’Ibirunga (Dian Fossey Gorillas Fund) bushyirwa ahagaragara ku wa mbere tariki 16 Ukuboza 2019. Umuyobozi wa Dian Fossey, Dr Tara Stoinski,  yagize ati “ Ibyavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi ni gihamya y’imbaraga zo kwita ku bidukikije, hagati ya Guverinoma zirimo iy’u Rwanda, RDC na Uganda.” Yongeyeho, ati “Ingagi zo mu misozi ni zimwe mu nyamaswa zirinzwe cyane kuri uyu mugabane, kandi uyu munsi turabona icyo imbaraga z’abafatanyabikorwa mu kuzitaho zishobora gukora. Ni akazi gakomeye ku baturage, abayobozi ba za Guverinoma n’ababungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, ariko bishobora gukorwa.” Mu bushakashatsi bwabanje, ku ngagi zo mu misozi, ababukoze bageze mu bice byose by’ishyamba bashaka ibyafasha kubona amakuru ku ngagi n’izindi z’inyamabere n’ibimenyetso by’ibikorwa bya muntu. Mu bikorwa byabo bakusanyije umwanda wazo kugira ngo harebwe inkomoko yazo, ibyo byakozwe inshuro ebyiri kuva muri Werurwe kugeza Gicurasi 2018 no kuva mu Kwakira kugeza Ukuboza 2018 kugira ngo bimenyekane neza ko buri ngagi yagezweho. Mu mwaka ushize, Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere (RDB) cyongeye ubuso bwa Pariki y’igihugu y’Ibirunga iherereye mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda buva kuri Hegitari 16,000 bugera ku 16,027 hagamije kwita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima biyirimo.

title: Impamvu y’imiziro imwe n’imwe yari yihariye ku bagore bo mu Rwanda rwo hambere
content: Abenshi bagaragaza ko imyumvire y’Abanyarwanda bo ha mbere yakandamizaga umugore hashingiwe ku miziro bamushyiragaho. Muri iyi nkuru, twabakusanyirije amateka y’imwe mu miziro yashyirwaga ku mugore n’impamvu yayo, ikamutoza kudakora iki cyangwa se kiriya, kugira ngo urujijo rw’iyo miziro rushire. Nk’uko tubikesha igitabo “Umuco mu Buvanganzo’’ cyanditswe n’Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, inzobere ku muco, amateka n’ubuvanganzo, mu muco n’amateka y’u Rwanda hagabamo imibereho ishigiye ku miziro, imigenzo n’imihango, yose igendanye no kunoza imibereho yabo ya buri munsi. Imiziro ni ibintu byaziraga mu muco nyarwanda cyangwa byagombaga kubahwa, gufatwa neza no gutinywa, kurinda ibyiza byagezweho ngo hatagira ikibyangiza cyangwa se ubyangiza. Kenshi na kenshi yanatozaga kwirinda ingeso mbi, kugira ibyo wubaha n’ibyo utinya, kwirinda kwandavura, kwiyandarika n’ibindi. Imiziro ni imyemerere-hame idutoza kudakora iki cyangwa se kiriya. Za kirazira zose zigendana n’intera iyi n’iyi igihugu kigezeho, niyo mpamvu usanga za kirazira izi n’izi zaracyuye igihe, ugasanga izindi ziganje, hakavuka n’izindi nshya. Zimwe muri za kirazira zagengaga ubuzima bw’umugore benshi bakunze kwikoma kubera kutazisobakukirwa, ni izi zikurikira: Nta mugore wurira inzu: Mu Rwanda rwo ha mbere cyaraziraga ko umugore yuyira inzu. Byaterwaga nuko nta makabutura cyangwa se amakariso yabagaho, byatumye bashyiraho uyu muziririzo ngo hatazagira umugore wurira inzu maze abari hasi ye bakamurunguruka bakabona ubwambure bwe bakamwubahuka. Bityo agata agaciro mu muryango kandi ari nyina w’umuntu. Nta mugore ujya aho abagabo bicaye: Mu Rwanda rwo hambere cyaraziraga ko umugore ataramira aho abagabo bicaye. Byaterwaga nuko kera nta bibindo (Cotex) byabagaho. Iyo abagore bajyaga mu mihango, biberaga iyo mu mbere no mu bikari kugeza igihe imihango ishiriye, umugore akabona kujya ahabona. Niyo mpamvu hashyizweho uyu muzizirizo ku bagore, kugira ngo atazajya ajya aho abantu bateraniye ari mu mihango bityo bakamwubahuka bakanamusuzugura. Ariko nubwo aticaraga hagati muri bo, yicaraga hafi yabo nk’uri kumwe nabo, ariko ku buryo ntawe umukenguza ngo amenye uko amerewe muri ibyo bihe. N’iyo yabaga atari mu mihango, cyaraziraga kwicara mu bagabo kubera ko bashoboraga kumureba ikimero, bagatangira kumuzeyuka, bamukorakora uko biboneye. Yicaraga kure aho adashobora kwegerana n’abagabo. Biba intandaro yo kumurinda ahantu hose hateraniye abagabo. Nta mugore ukama inka: Uyu muziro ujya gusa n’uwo kurira inzu, kuko byose bisangiye impamvu. Nta myambarire yikwije abagore bagiraga mu bihe byo hambere yabafashaga guhisha ubwambure bwabo, ku buryo ubegereye cyangwa se ubari imbere atabasha kubarunguruka. Niyo mpamvu bashyizeho umuziro wo kudakama inka kw’abagore, kugira ngo batazatera iry’abakamyi imbere y’abashumba n’abarenzamase, bakabona icyo bambariyeho. Iyi miziro imwe n’imwe twagaragaje, yari iyo guhesha umugore agaciro no kumurinda igisuzuguriro, nta mpamvu yo kuyigaya tuyigira icyasha ko yakandamizaga abagore, nyamara bwari uburyo bwo kubarinda no kubungabunga ubusugire n’icyubahiro cyabo mu muryango nyarwanda.

title: Perezida wa CAF Yambuwe ubuyobozi  n’amatora
content:
Issa Hayatou  , Umukambwe   ukomoka mu gihugu cya Cameroon  wayoboraga  CAF  byari  byarananiranye   ko   avaho   harinze  kwitabazwa   amatora   ngo  arekure  ubuyobozi yaramaranye   imyaka  29, aharire   abakiri bato. Uyu Issa Hayatou wari umaze imyaka 29 ayobora iri shyirahamwe ry’umupra w’amaguru yasimbuwe kuri  uyu  wa  16   werurwe  umunyamadagaskari  niwe wa  musimbuye ku mwanya   w’umuperezida wa  CAF  Ahmed   Ahmed   w’imyaka  57 akazayiyobora   mugihe   kingana  na   manda  y’imyaka   ine. Ese   Issa   Hayatou  yari   muntu   ki ? Issa  Hayatou umukambwe  w’imyaka  70  y’amavuko yavukiye I Garoua    muri Kamerone.   Afite  umugore   n’abana   bane .akaba   yari umukinyi   wo  gusiganwa   ku  maguru  yegukanye  ibihembo  bitari  bicye  mu   ntera ya metero 400 ndetse na 800 hagati   yi 1964 na 1971. Aza  no kuba  umwe   mubanyamuryango   bagize  itsinda  ry’umukino   w’amaboko  (basketball) ndetse   n’umikino  ngororangingo.   Yagize  uruhare  mugutuma    amakipe  nyafurika  yitabira  igikombe  cy’isi   yiyongera   akava   ku  makipe  2 akagera kuri   5.
Mubijyanye n’ubuyobozi. 1973-1974 yabaye  umwarimu  muri  Lyce leclerc  I yaounde. 1974-1983 yabaye  umunyamabanga mukuru   w’ishyirahamwe  ry’umupira    w’amaguru  muri  Kamerone.  1982-1986 yari umuyobozi   w’imikino   muri   Kamerone(ministri  w’urubyiruko n’imikino),  ndetse  akaba   yaranari  mukanama    gafata  ibyemezo   mw’ishyiramwe   ry’umupira   w’amaguru.  

1988-2017  yari perezida  wa CAF.  Ariko  By’umwihariko Hagati   aho, 1990 akaba  yarari mu kanama   gafata ibyemezo  muri   FIFA.   1992 yari  visi prezida  wa FIFA  (hano niwe  yarakuriye  komite  ishinzwe  gutegura  imikino ngororangingo  kugeza 2006), akaba  na   visi  perezi   muri comite  ishinzwe  umutekano   n’ubwumvikane    muri   FIFA, yarari   umwe   mubari bashinzwe  gutegura igikombe  cy’isi.       1997 yabaye  umwe  mubagize akanama   mpuzamahanga   k’abagore   mumikino   ngororangingo.  2001  yatowe  kuba   umwe   mubagize   komite mpuzamahanga   y’imikino  ngororangingo  yabereye   mubu Rusiya   I  Moscow .   2015-2016  yabaye  prezida   w’inzibacyuho   wa  FIFA. Reba   urutonde   rw’abayoboye   CAF. 1.Abdel aziz  addallah   salem(1957-1958)
2.Abdel    aziz   moustafa   (1958-1968)
3.Abdel halim   muhammad(1968-1972)
4.Yidnekatchew   tessema  (1972-1987)
5.Abdel   halim   muhammad  (1987-1988)  incuro   ya  kabiri Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali/MUHABURA.rw

title: Iggy Azaelea yatandukanye bidasubirwaho n’umukunzi we
content:
Umuhanzikazi Iggy Azaelea yashyize ahagaragara itandukana rye na Nick Young bari basanzwe bafitanye imishinga y’ubukwe minsi iri mbere cyane ko barimo bitegura kwambikana impeta yo kubana ubuziraherezo. Ibi bibaye nyuma y’amakimbirane no kutavuga rumwe hagati y’aba bombi ubwo mu minsi ishize hari videwo yigeze gusohoka igaragaza uyu Nick ko IGGY yamuciye inyuma akaba yari ari kumwe n’uwitwa D’Angelo Russell bakina mu ikipe imwe na Nick Young akaba yari n’inshuti ya hafi y’aba bombi nk’uko ikinayamakuru Tmz.com dukesha iyi nkuru kibitangaza.
 IGGY Azaelea n’umukuzi we Nick Young bari bamaze igihe kinini bakundana  

Azaelea abinyujije ku rubuga rwe rwa Twitter yavuze ati: “ Ntago bijya byoroha ko utandukana n’umuntu wateganyaga kuzabana nawe ubuzima bwawe bwose bw’ahazaza ariko nanone ahazaza hashobora guhindurwa cyane iyo ntagihe kirarenga ni muri urwo rwego nange bitewe no kwihangana nkarambirwa ubu Igitabo cyanjye mu rukundo nta rupapuro na rumwe rwanditseho byose nabitsibye.” Iggy akomeza avuga kandi ko yagerageje gushyira ikizere muri uyu wahoze ari umukunzi we ariko biranga biba iby’ubusa

 Yanditswe na Snappy Akayezu Jean de Dieu/Muhabura.rw

title: Kigali: Abakinnyi ba biri ba Rayons Sports barafunzwe
content:
Yannick Mukunzi na Rutanga Eric bari mu maboko ya Polisi kuva kuri iki Cyumweru.
Aba bakinnyi bafashwe nyuma y’iminsi ine umutoza mukuru w’iyi kipe Karekezi Olivier na we atawe muri yombi akurikiranyweho ibyaha Polisi yavuze ko byakozwe hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga. Yannick na Rutanga ubusanzwe babanaga mu nzu imwe iherereye mu murenge wa Niboye mu Karere ka Kicukiro, bivugwa ko bafashwe bakurikiranyweho ubufatanyacyaha n’umutoza wabo Karekezi Olivier.  Bivungwa  ko Yannick Mukunzi na Rutanga Eric  ngo ubwo bari bagiye gukina umukino wahuje u Rwanda na Ethiopia  ndetse n’uwabereye  i Kigali ngo bari basabwe na Karekezi Olivier  gutsindisha ikipe y’u Rwanda. Umuvugizi mukuru wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, ACP Theos Badege, yatangaje  ko ari bwo akimenya iby’aya makuru, ko ibindi aza kubitangariza mu gihe cya vuba amaze kubimenya neza byose. Yanditswe na Chief editor/Muhabura.rw

title: Afurika y’Epfo: COVID-19 yatumye intare zibona ubwisanzure , ziri kugaragara ziryamye mu mihanda (amafoto)
content: Amafoto yakwirakwijwe kuri internet agaragaza intare zo muri iyo pariki ziryamye mu mutuzo, mu mihanda ya kaburimbo inyuramo imodoka zitwaye ba mukerarugendo basura iyo pariki. Ubuyobozi bwa pariki ya Kruger buherutse gushyira hanze amafoto y’izo ntare ziryamye mu mihanda , buvuga ko ubusanzwe zitajyaga zihagera kubera ko hanyuraga ba mukerarugendo benshi. Guhera tariki 25 Werurwe uyu mwaka, ibikorwa byo gusura pariki muri Afurika y’Epfo byarahagaritswe, bituma abakerarugendo bakundaga kuza muri iyo pariki babihagarika. Umuvugizi w’iyo pariki, Isaac Phaahla yabwiye CNN ati “Ubusanzwe kuzibona ziryamye mu muhanda ku manywa ntibyakundaga kubaho kuko hahoraga urujya n’uruza bigatuma zihungira mu bihuru.” Icyakora, Isaac Phaahla yavuze ko kuba abakerarugendo batakiza kureba inyamaswa, nta byinshi byahinduye ku myitwarire yazo kuko nubundi aho zari zisanzwe ziba ari ho zikiba. Perezida wa Afurika y’Epfo Cyril Ramaphosa yatangaje ko kuguma mu rugo hirindwa coronavirus bizakomeza kugeza mu mpera za Mata uyu mwaka.

title: ’Ko umuhungu nikururiye ansenyeye urugo kandi nkunda umugabo wanjye’  Mbigenze nte ?
content: Umugore ufite umugabo n’abana babiri avuga ko yakoze ikosa ryo guca inyuma umugabo we aryamana n’umuhungu uzi icyo gukora none kumwikuramo byaramunaniye bityo akaba asaba inama abasomyi ba Muhabura.rw. Mu kiganiro kirambuye yagiranye na Muhabura.rw,umugore uri mu kigero cy’imyaka 30 utifuje ko amazina ye atangazwa aragisha inama kubyo yakora,ku kibazo afite cyo kuba yaraciye inyuma umugabo we akaryamana n’umusore we ashimangira ko ashoboye akazi ko mu gitanda none akaba agiye kumwibagiza umugabo we bidasubirwaho. Uyu mugore twise Annet (izina twamuhimbiye) yavuze uko byagenze ayu mugore yagize ati “ Ubundi ubusanzwe umugabo wanjye tumaze kubyarana abana 3 afite imyaka 42 ariko kuva twatangira kubana sindabona na rimwe aha agaciro cyane igikorwa cyo gutera akabariro, afite akazi akora ku buryo ataha nka saa tatu z’ijoro yananiwe agatinzwa no gufata amafunguro ubundi agahita yiryamira. Umugabo wanjye nta munsi n’umwe ajya yiha wo kuruhuka ahora mu kazi, n’iyo duteye akabariro ni nko kubipa( agahe gato) ubundi agahita agwa agacuho kubera umunaniro avana mu kazi, Mpora nifuza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ngashira ipfa ariko narabibuze kandi mfite umugabo. Gusa urukundo rwo rurahari kandi nta kintu adakora ngo yite ku muryango. Nyirabayazana rero ni umusore duheruka kuryamana kubera numvaga nifuza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina nkayihaga, Uwo musore yabinkoreye neza ku buryo byanteye ibyishimo bidasanzwe kuri uwo munsi, naratashye mu rugo nkajya nisekesha ubusa ku buryo abo tubana bambazaga icyo ndi guseka nkakibura nyamara ibitekerezo byanjye byari byibereye ku bihe byiza nagiranye n’uwo musore. Uwo musore tujya kuryamana natekerezaga ko ari rimwe risa bitazongera kubaho, nyamara kugeza ubu tumaze kuryamana inshuro 4, kandi rwose ampora mu ntekerezo ku buryo kumwibagirwa byananiye,buri gihe nsigaye numva najya kumwirebera akandyohereza, umugabo wanjye nawe akomeje kumbaza impamvu asigaye abona mfite akanyamuneza nkabura icyo musubiza. Ndi kwibaza uko bizagenda umugabo wanjye nabimenya, nonese nemere ngume hamwe njye nkomeza nifuze gutera akabariro mfite umugabo ? uwo musore nerure muhakanire kandi ankemurira ikibazo umugabo atankemurira? Nayobewe icyo nakora mungire inama”

title: Imikino ikorwa abantu bategeranye yemerewe gusubukurwa mu Rwanda
content: Kuva tariki ya 15 Werurwe 2020 nta gikorwa cya siporo cyari cyemewe mu Rwanda nyuma y’uko hari hashize umunsi umwe Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itangaje ko mu Rwanda habonetse umurwayi wa mbere wa COVID-19. Mu kwezi gushize, tariki ya 5 Gicurasi, Minisiteri ya Siporo yagiranye inama na Komite Olempike n’abahagarariye amashyirahamwe y’imikino n’ingaga za Siporo, hemezwa ko kare imikino ishobora gusubukurwa mu Rwanda ari muri Nzeri haba amarushanwa mu gihe muri Kanama hashobora gutangira imyitozo. Nk’uko bigaragaragara mu itangazo iyi Minisiteri yashyize ahagaragara ku wa Kane tariki ya 4 Kamena, imikino ikorwa abantu bategeranye irimo uwo kunyoga igare, gutwara imodoka, Tennis, Golf, kugenda n’amagare (Hiking) n’imikino ngororamubiri ishobora gusubukurwa ariko hakurikizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda. Yagize iti “Hashingiwe ku myanzuro y’Inama y’Abaminisitiri yo ku wa 2 Kanama 2020 ku ngamba zafashwe zo gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19, Minisiteri ya Siporo mu bufatanye na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima, iratangaza ingamba zikurikira zo kubahiriza hasubukurwa ibikorwa bya siporo y’umuntu umwe cyangwa izindi zikorwa bategeranye.” “Ibikorwa bya siporo n’imikino byemerewe gusubukurwa ni: kwiruka (jogging), imikino ngororamubiri, kunyonga igare, imyitozo yo kugenda n’amaguru (hiking), Golf, Tennis, Umukino wo gutwara imodoka na Fencing (barwanisha inkota).” "Isubukurwa ry’ibikorwa bya siporo zavuzwe bitangirana na tariki ya 8 Kamena. Aya mabwiriza azavugurwa nyuma y’iminsi 15 hashingiwe ku isesengura ry’inzego z’ubuzima." Amabwiriza azubahirizwa ubwo iyi mikino izaba isubukuwe harimo kwambara agapfukamunwa mbere na nyuma y’imyitozo, kubahiriza intera ya metero imwe n’igice hagati y’abakorera siporo n’imyitozo hanze, kwitwaza imiti yo gusukura intoki mu gihe ukorera siporo no kuyikoresha igihe cyose bibaye ngombwa. Hari kandi kwitwararira ku isuku y’ahakorerwa siporo n’imikino hakoreshejwe imiti yemewe yica udukoko, gusukura ibikoresho byifashishwa no kwita by’umwihariko ahakorwa kenshi nko ku nzugi. Buri mukinnyi azajya ashyira ibikoresho bye ukwe, imikino yasubukuwe ntiyemewe gukoresha Stade Amahoro uretse hanze yayo (umuzenguruko wayo) mu gihe abagaragaje ibimenyetso birimo inkorora, kuribwa umutwe, ibicurane no kwitsamura, batemerewe gukorera imyitozo ngororamubiri mu ruhame ahubwo bagomba kwegera inzego z’ubuzima zikabakurikirana.

title: Munyakazi Sadate watorewe kuyobora Rayon Sports, yijeje kuyigeza muri 1/2 cya ’Champion League’
content:
Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki ya 14 Nyakanga 2019 ni bwo habaye inama y’Inteko rusange y’ikipe ya Rayon Sports yabereye ’Tuza Inn’ mu karere ka Bugesera, ahatowe komite nshya maze Perezida aba Munyakazi Sadate wasimbuye Paul Muvunyi wagizwe Perezida w’icyubahiro. Ni mu gihe Visi Perezida yabaye Twagirayezu Thadee wari usanzwe ashinzwe imyitwarire (discipline), akaba yasimbuye Muhirwa Frederic. Uyu Munyakazi Sadate wagizwe Perezida ni umugabo w’imyaka 38 ufite umugore n’abana batanu. Muri iyi minsi yagaragaraga cyane mu bikorwa bya Rayon Sports dore ko ari we usanzwe akuriye MK SKy Vision iherutse gutangiza umushinga wo gufasha iyi kipe kubaka Stade wiswe ’Gikundiro Stadium’. Uyu mugabo kandi yari umwe mu bajyanama ba komite icyuye igihe mu myaka ibiri ishize, akaba yari anakuriye Fan Club yitwa Trust Supporters, imwe mu zikomeye zishyigikira Rayon Sports. Itangishaka King Bernard wari usanzwe ari Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Rayon Sports, ubu yagizwe CEO naho Muhire Jean Paul wahoze ari umubitsi wa Rayon Sports, agirwa umunyamabanga, asimburwa na Cyiza Richard ku mwanya w’Umubitsi mu gihe Zitoni Pierre Claver yakomeje kuba umunyamategeko. Mu ijambo rye, Munyakazi Sadate yashimiye Komite icyuye igihe ibyo yagezeho harimo kwegukana igikombe cya shampiyona no kugera muri 1/4 cya Total CAF Confederation Cup, aboneraho kubasezeranya ko azakomereza aho bari bagejeje. Ati "Igikombe cyo sinavuga ngo nzacyegukana ahubwo nzakirinda, mu marushanwa nyafurika ngere muri 1/2." Abayobozi batorewe kuyobora Rayon Sports mu myaka ibiri 2019-2021 Perezida w’icyubahiro : Paul Muvunyi

Visi perezida wa mbere : Thadee Twagirayezu

title: Miss Rwanda 2018: Amajonjora yatangiriye mu karere ka Musanze(AMAFOTO)
content:
Amajonjora yo gutora Nyampinga w’u Rwanda w’umwaka wa 2018 yamaze gutangira, aho yahereye mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru akaba yakorewe mu karere ka Musanze. Muri aka karere hari iyandikisije abakobwa 19, hitabira 13 ariko 10 bonyine nibo bari bujuje ibisabwa maze batangira guhatana imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka kari kagizwe na Dr. Higiro Jean Pierre, Isheja Sandrine ndetse na Rwabigwi.

 Rwabigwi Glbert

 Abagize akanama nkemurampaka  Sandrije Isheja wari uhagarariye akanama nkemurampaka yavuze ko ibyashingiweho mu gutanga amanota harimo "uburanga, ubwenge n’umuco". Uburanga bwari bufite amanota 25%, ubwenge bwahawe amanota 45% hanyuma uburyo umukobwa yatondekaga ibyo avuga bihabwa amanota 30%. Dore amafoto y’uko iri jonjora ryagenze

title: Kim Kardashian yakuriye inzira ku murima abifuza ko atandukana na Yeezy
content:
Umunyamidelikazi ukomeye kuri iyi si dutuyeho ndetse byumwihariko muri Leta zunze ubumwe za America, Kim Kardashian yanyomoje amakuru amaze iminsi ahwihwisa ajyanye no  ugutandukana kweruye hagati ye n’umugabo we  Kanye West usigaye afite izina rya Yeezy Abinyujije ku rubuga rwe rwa kimkardashianwest.com, uyu mu nyamidelikazi yavuze ko nta mbabazi na nkeya ashobora kugirira abantu birirwa bavuga ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ko we ubwe ateganya kuzatandukana n’umugabo we Kanye West. Kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 26 Gashyantare nibwo uyu Kardashian yanditse kuri uru rubuga rwe ati: “Ngewe mu buzima bwange nkunda umugabo wange ariko nanone nkanga mbikuye ku mutima umuntu wese utemerako Kanye na Kim bazabana kugeza ku iherezo” aha kandi ngo ubwo yandikaga ibi yari arimo kureba amashusho azaba agize indirimbo nshyashya y’uyu muhanzi Kanye West izasohoka mu minsi mike iri imbere.
 Kim kardashian na Kanye west bafitanye abana babiri  Ibi kandi bibaye nyuma y’iminsi mikeya ishize uyu muryango wa Kim na Kanye ushize hanze ifoto yambere y’umwana aba bombi babyaranye ndetse ibi bakaba barabikoze mu rwego rwo kwereka isi yose ko bashimishijwe n’umubano wabo ndetse n’umwana wabo babyaranye. Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Imikino y’ibihugu by’I Burayi isize amakipe yo mu Bwongereza mu ihurizo rikomeye
content:
N’ubwo Shampiyona y’umupira w’amaguru mu Bwongereza igiye gukomeza mu mpera z’iki cyumweru, amwe mu makipe yo muri iki Gihugu  ari mu ihurizo rikomeye nyuma y’uko benshi mu bakinnyi bakomeye bavuye gukinira ibihugu bakomokamo bari mu mvune. Mu mpera z’iki Cyumweru Shampiyona yo mu gihugu cy’u Bwongereza irakomeza nyuma y’agahe gato idakinwa kubera imikino y’amakipe y’ibihugu. Amwe mu makipe akomeye yari yarohereje abakinnyi bayo gukinira ibihugu byabo ariko harimo abatarahiriwe n’urugendo bakavanayo imvune. Ikipe ya Liverpool ni imwe mu makipe afite abakinnyi bari mu mvune n’ubwo Iyi kipe iyoboye urutonde rwa shampiyona kugeza ubu ikomeje kugira amahirwe kuko idafite imvune nyinshi, kugeza ubu ni Danny Ings wavunitse mu ivi ndetse na Ojo utarava mu mvune amaranye iminsi. Ikipe ya Leincester ari nayo  ifite igikombe cya shampiyona giheruka ntabwo imerewe neza muri iyi minsi ari mu kibuga ndetse no hanze y’ikibuga, none hiyongereyeho n’imvune z’abakinnyi bagera kuri bane barimo Gray, Drinkwater, Kasper Schmeichel hamwe na Mendy. Ku ruhande rw’ikipe ya Manchester United, Mourinho aritegura guhura n’umukeba Arsenal, mu mpera z’iki cyumweru  ariko imvune zimaze kuba nyinshi mu ikipe ye, harimo Fellaini, Antonio Valencia, Eric Bailly, Chris Smalling na rutahizamu James Wilson. Tugarutse ku ikipe ya Arsenal, Arsene Wenger ntiyifuzaga kumva ko hari umukinnyi we wagakwiye kuba afite imvune cyane ko yitegura umukino na Manchester United muri iyi mpera x’iki Cyumeru. Muri aba harimo Alexis Sanchez, Hector Bellerin, Perez, Santi Carzola, Chuba Akpon, Per Mertesacker na Danny Welbeck. Amakipe atandukanye muri iki gihugu cy’u Bwongereza nka Chelsea, Manchester City n’andi makipe uri gusanga afite abakinnyi benshi bafite imvune ibi bikaba bishobora kuzatuma amwe mu makipe atungurwa cyane n’aya makipe mato adafite abakinnyi bitabiriye iyi mikino y’amakipe y’ibihugu by’I Burayi. Yanditswe na Uwimana Abraham/MUHABURA.RW
