Umwaka ushize Robert yansabye ko namufasha kumenya ibintu ndangamurage by’u Rwanda biri mu Burayi, none intambwe ya mbere ni uko nishimiye kumuhereza urutonde rwa 2069 rw’ibintu ndangamurage biri mu nzu ndangamurage zacu, hariho amafoto y’igihe byajyaniwe, uko byajyanywe, icyo byakoreshwaga.” Guido yavuze ko hari n’imyiteguro igeze kure yo gushyikiriza u Rwanda inyandiko n’amakarita byafashwe mu gihe cy’ubukoloni, bigaragaza ibiri munsi y’ubutaka bw’u Rwanda nk’umutungo kamere, amabuye y’agaciro n’ibindi. Yavuze ko bigenze neza, muri Mutarama cyangwa Gashyantare umwaka utaha ibyo bimenyetso ndangamurage bigaragaza munsi y’ubutaka byaba byashyikirijwe u Rwanda. Ati “Hari na gahunda yo gushyira mu ikoranabuhanga ishyinguranyandiko zose z’u Rwanda ziri mu Bubiligi. Ni intambwe ikomeye, ntekereza ko turi igihugu cya mbere mu Burayi mu kubikorera gutyo igihugu cya Afurika kandi ndabizeza umucyo mu gusangira ibimenyetso ndangamurage, inyandiko, amafoto, amajwi n’amashusho dufite.” Amb Masozera yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye kwakira urwo rutonde kuko bizagaragaza neza umutungo gakondo w’abanyarwanda uri mu Bubiligi kugira ngo u Rwanda rubone uko rutangira ibiganiro ngo ugarurwe. Yavuze ko mu Ngoro ibitse amateka ya Afurika iherereye i Tervuren mu  Bubiligi, hari ibikoresho byinshi by’umurage w’abanyarwanda birimo ibikoresho byakoreshwaga kera, ingoma zirimo n’iz’ibwami, inyamaswa zabaga mu Rwanda nk’inyambo yumishijwe, igisingo cy’umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili, indirimbo, amashusho n’amafoto bigaragaza abanyarwanda bo hambere n’ibindi. Bivugwa ko mu Bubiligi ari naho hari umugogo w’umwami Yuhi V Musinga, icyakora Masozera yavuze ko byo bitarasobanuka neza kuko nta gihamya ko wajyanyweyo. Yavuze ko kuba u Rwanda ruhawe urwo rutonde, ari intangiriro y’ibiganiro biganisha ku kugarura uwo murage w’amateka mu Rwanda. Yagize ati “Bafite inyandiko nyinshi ku buryo bazibara mu burebure zikaba zishobora kurenga ikirometero. Ni inyandiko zaba izakoreshwaga mu butegetsi, izo mu bucukuzi… Bazaduha ibijyanye n’ibiri munsi y’ubutaka bw’u Rwanda, ubukungu buri mu butaka bw’u Rwanda barabuzi. Bafite amakarita ku buryo abantu bashobora kumenya ahari zahabu, diyama n’ibindi”. Byinshi mu bihugu bya Afurika byakolonijwe kuri ubu biri mu rugamba rwo kugarurirwa umurage w’amateka yabyo watwawe n’abanyaburayi mu gihe cy’ubukoloni. Mu minsi ishize u Bufaransa bwasubije Sénégal inkota yibwe indwanyi yayo Omar Saidou Tall mu kinyejana cya 19. Uretse u Bubiligi, u Rwanda runafite ibindi bikoresho, inyandiko n’ibirango ndangamurage byajyanywe mu Budage kuko nacyo ari igihugu cyarukolonije. 
Masozera yavuze ko naho ibiganiro byatangiye ngo ibyo icyo gihugu kibitse kibigarure. Igihugu cy’u Butaliyani nubwo kitakolonije u Rwanda ariko kibitse inyandiko zarwo kubera Kiliziya Gatolika yarugezemo kera. U Bubiligi bwakolonije u Rwanda nk’indagizo rwahawe na Loni nyuma y’Intambara ya Mbere y’Isi yose mu 1919, rwambuwe u Budage.

title: COVID-19:Uganda yataye muri yombi umupasiteri imushinja gukwirakwiza ibihuha kuri coronavirus
content: Umupasiteri witwa Augustine Lga wo mu itorero Revival Restoration church ikorera ahitwa Kawala mu gihugu cya Uganda yatawe muri yombi azira gukwiza ibihuha ku cyorezo cya Coronavirus  ubwo yabitangarizaga kuri Tereviziyo yaho muri Uganda. Mu kiganiro yatangiye kuri iyo tereviziyo yavuze ko icyorezo cya coronavirus kitari muri Afurika ko ibyo ari ibinyoma niko rero guhita atabwa muri yombi nyuma yuko icyo kiganiro gikwiriye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Ubuyobozi bwa Uganda ndetse n’abandi bababajwe nayo magambo yakwirakwijwe n’uwo mupastori bavuga ko umuvugabutumwa ataberanye no gukwiza ibinyoma muri rubanda anareba uburyo iki cyorezo gihangayikishije afurika  n’isi yose muri rusange. Indwara ya coronavirus yakwiriye ku isi iturutse mu gihugu cy"ubushinwa aho yahitanye abashinwa batagira ingano ubu ikaba imaze gukwirakwira mu isi yose ndetse ikaba yarageze no muri Afurika.Mu Rwanda imibare dukesha  ministeri y’ubuzima ivuga ko hamaze kugaragara abarwayi 60 ba Coronavirus ariko bakaba barikwitabwaho n’abaganga ahabugenewe ndetse akaba nta n’urupfu na rumwe rurahagaragara. Denis Fabrice Nsengumuremyi/MUHABURA.RW

title: ‘Gatsibo Rice Company’ yatangiye gukora ibicanwa mu bishishwa by’umuceri byashoboraga kwangiza ibidukikije
content: Ubusanzwe ibishishwa byarundwaga hanze y’uruganda aho byari bimaze gukora ikimeze nk’umusozi bigatwara ubutaka bunini ndetse bikaba byazamo udukoko dushobora kubangamira abaturiye uruganda. Mu rwego rwo gukemura iki kibazo no gushaka amafaranga yunganira uruganda, ubuyobozi bwashoye imari mu gukora ibicanwa hubakwa uruganda rutunganya briquette mu mpera z’umwaka ushize. Umucungamutungo wa Gatsibo Rice Company, Mugisha Delphin, yagize ati “Dufite imisozi y’ibishishwa by’umuceri bidafite icyo byakoraga kandi hari uburyo bwo kubibyaza umusaruro. Ubuyobozi bw’uruganda bwatekereje kubaka uruganda mu mpera z’umwaka ushize, briquette za mbere zatangiye gukorwa muri Mutarama 2018.” Yakomeje agira ati “ Uko ibisigazwa by’umuceri bitinda bishobora kubora bikanuka hakaba hazamo udusimba tubangamiye abaruturiye, iyo bivuyeho bikajya gukoreshwa nk’ibicanwa, ibiti byatemwaga n’amakara byose bikagabanuka. Bifite umumaro ku ruganda no ku bidukikije muri rusange.” Mugisha yavuze ko hari inyigo yakozwe kugira ngo uruganda rwubakwe bikagaragara neza ko briquette zizacuruzwa bikinjiriza uruganda amafaranga. Kugeza ubu uruganda ntiruratangira kugurisha briquette n’abaturage kuko ruziranguza n’ibigo bifite ubushobozi burenze ubwabo icyakora mu minsi iri imbere na bo bazajya bazibona aho ngo ibiciro bizaba biciriritse ugereranyije n’uko amakara agura. Ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y’ingo bwakozwe ku nshuro ya kane mu Rwanda, bwagaragaje ko Abanyarwanda bagera kuri 83.3% bakoresha ibikomoka ku biti, ni ukuvuga inkwi n’amakara, nk’uburyo bw’ibanze bwo kubona ibicanwa; ibifatwa nk’icyonnyi gihangayikishije urwego rw’ibidukikije mu gihugu. Intara iza ku isonga ni iy’Amajyaruguru ifite abakoresha inkwi bagera kuri 94.4%, igakurikirwa n’iy’Amajyepfo ifite 92.6%, Intara y’Uburasirazuba ifite 89.9%, Intara y’Uburengerazuba ifite 88.3% naho Umujyi wa Kigali ukagira 25.6%. Abanyarwanda bakangurirwa gukoresha imbabura zirondereza ibicanwa, gas, biogas n’ibindi mu rwego rwo kurengera amashyamba kugeza ubu ari ku buso bugera kuri 29.6% mu gihugu hose. Uruganda ‘Gatsibo Rice Company’ rwakira hafi toni 4000 z’umuceri udatonoye mu gihe cy’umwero zivuye muri koperative ebyiri zikorana na rwo. Umuceri rwakira ni muke ugereranyije n’ubushobozi bwarwo kuko rimwe na rimwe ruhagarika ibikorwa iyo washize mu bubiko. Mu rwego rwo kongera ubuso buhingwaho umuceri ibishanga bitahingwaga bigenda bitunganywa dore ko hataraboneka ubushobozi bwo kuwuhinga imusozi.

title: Polisi y’u Rwanda igiye gutera ibiti ku buso burenga hegitari 50
content: Ibi bikaba biri no muri gahunda yo gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano y’ubufatanye Polisi y’u Rwanda yasinyanye na Minisiteri y’Ubutaka n’Amashyamba mu Ugushyingo umwaka ushize, agamije kwita no kubungabunga ibidukikije n’amashyamba. Umuyobozi w’Ishami rishinzwe guhuza ibikorwa bya Polisi n’iby’abaturage hagamijwe gukumira no kwirinda ibyaha (Community Policing department) muri Polisi y’u Rwanda Assistant Commissioner of Police (ACP) Damas Gatare yavuze ko muri rusange bateganya kuzatera amashyamba mashya no gusimbuza ashaje kuri hegitari 4960 naho ibiti bivangwa n’imyaka bakazabitera kuri hegitari 45803. Yagize ati”Gutera amashyamba no gusimbuza ashaje ni igikorwa cyo kurengera ubuzima bw’abaturage kandi Polisi y’u Rwanda igomba kubigiramo uruhare rugaragara kugira ngo irinde abanyarwanda ibiza birimo amapfa, inkangu isuri n’imyuzure kuko ibi byose bigira ingaruka ku buzima bw’abaturage zirimo urupfu mu gihe cy’amapfa cyangwa cy’inkangu n’imyuzure.” ACP Gatare yavuze ko umwaka ushize mu gihugu hose amashyamba yatewe kuri hegitari 704 997, zingana na 29.6% za hegitari zose zigomba kuba ziteweho amashyamba. Yakomeje agira ati ”Muri iyi myaka ibiri buri Ntara ifite ubuso izateraho ibiti aho Intara y’Iburasirazuba izatera hegitari 14744, Intara y’Amajyaruguru itere kuri hegitari 8415, Iburengerazuba batere hegitari 9484, Intara y’Amajyepfo izatera hegitari 26035, na ho mu Mujyi wa Kigali bazatera hegitari 2085.” Mu gutera aya mashyamba Polisi izafatanya na Minisiteri y’Ubutaka n’Amashyamba, Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe kurengera ibidukikije (REMA), uturere, urubyiruko rw’abakorerabushake mu gukumira ibyaha, (Rwanda youth Volunteers in Community Policing -RYVCP) n’abaturage muri rusange. Mu mwaka wa 2015, Polisi y’u Rwanda yasinyanye amasezerano n’uturere twose tw’u Rwanda uko ari 30, akaba agamije ubufatanye mu kubungabunga ibidukikije harimo no gutera amashyamba mashya no gufata neza asanzwe. Kuva Polisi y’u Rwanda yasinyana amasezerano y’ubufatanye na Minisiteri y’Ubutaka n’Amashyamba mu Ugushyingo umwaka ushize, Polisi ifatanyije n’urubyiruko rw’abakorerabushake mu gukumira ibyaha bamaze gutera ibiti birenga 125, 500 mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu. Ibi byatewe bikaba byiyongera ku bindi byatewe na Polisi y’u Rwanda mu gihugu hose kuri hegitari zirenga 300 mu myaka ishize. Mu rwego rwo kurengera ibidukikije no gutera ibiti, urubyiruko rw’abakorerabushake mu gukumira ibyaha rurenga 230 000, buri wa Gatandatu wa kabiri w’ukwezi rwihaye gahunda yo gukora umuganda mu bikorwa byinshi bakora kuri uwo munsi hakaba hanarimo gutera ibiti.

title: MTN yashyizeho uburyo bworoshye bwo kwishyura abamotari n’ibihembo ku bazabukoresha cyane
content: Ubu buryo kandi MTN Rwanda ibutangije nyuma y’amabwiriza yatanzwe n’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere, RURA rusaba abamotari bose kwishyurwa hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga. Binyuze muri MoMoPay, abagenzi bazajya babasha kwishyura abamotari amafaranga y’urugendo mu buryo bworoshye kandi bwizewe. Gukoresha ubwo buryo birasaba gukanda *182*8*1#, ugashyiramo kode umumotari akoresha kuri MoMoPay ubundi ushyiremo amafaranga y’urugendo ugiye kumwishyura wemeze. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi muri MTN Rwanda, Chantal Kagame yavuze ko MTN Rwanda yiyemeje kuba ku isonga mu guteza imbere ihererekanya ry’amafaranga ryifashishije ikoranabuhanga no gukumira icyorezo cya coronavirus. Yagize ati “Twishimiye gufasha abamotari kwakira amafaranga yabo bifashishije MoMoPay. Mu gihe twubahiriza ingamba zashyizweho na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, twiyemeje kugendana na gahunda y’igihugu yo kudahererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki.” MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko mu gukomeza gushishikariza abamotari gukoresha ubwo buryo bishyurwa, hagiye kujya hatangwa ibihembo kabiri mu cyumweru ku bahiga abandi mu kubukoresha. Ibihembo bazahabwa bizaba birimo moto nshyashya, casques, kugabanyirizwa ibiciro ku bikomoka kuri peteroli moto zabo zikoresha kuri sitasiyo za lisansi n’ibindi. MTN Rwanda kandi yiyemeje gufasha abamotari kubona udupfukamunwa tuzajya dutangirwa kuri sitasiyo za lisansi zitandukanye zikorana na MTN mu mujyi wa Kigali. MTN Rwanda kandi mu bufatanya na banki ya NCBA, yiyemeje gutanga inguzanyo ku bakiliya bayo muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda icyorezo hifashishijwe MoKash, mu bo iyo nguzanyo igenewe harimo n’abamotari. Ku bari barafashe inguzanyo bakananirwa kuyishyura mu gihe cy’iminsi 30 yagenwe, MTN Rwanda na NCBA babakuriyeho amande y’ubukererwe ndetse bongererwa indi minsi 30 yo kuba bishyuye. Umukiliya utabashije kwishyura ideni rye mu minsi 60 cyangwa 90, ntabwo azajya agabanyirizwa ingano y’amafaranga yemerewe kuguza nkuko byari bisanzwe. Mu gihe kandi inguzanyo ntarengwa igiye kugabanywa, umukiliya azajya ahabwa iminsi 30 yo kwitegura. MoKash ni uburyo bwo kubitsa, kubikuza no kugurizwa buboneka kuri MTN Rwanda ukanze *182*5#). Inguzanyo yo kuri MoKash yishyurwa mu gihe cy’iminsi 30, hiyongereyeho inyungu ya 9 %, naho uwabikijeho amafaranga yungukirwa 7 % ku mwaka.

title: Bagore, mwubahe cyane abagabo banyu!
content:
“ Bagore, mugandukire abagabo banyu.”—ABEFESO 5:22. 1. Kuki kumvira umugabo akenshi bigorana?
 MU BIHUGU byinshi, iyo umugabo n’umugore bashyingiranywe, umugeni ahiga umuhigo avuga ko azubaha cyane umugabo we
. 
Icyakora, uburyo abagabo benshi bafata abagore babo butuma guhigura uwo muhigo byoroha cyangwa bikagorana. Ariko rero, umuryango wari watangiye neza. Imana yakuye urubavu mu muntu wa mbere, ari we Adamu, iruhinduramo umugore. Adamu yavuganye ibyishimo ati “uyu ni igufwa ryo mu magufwa yanjye, ni akara ko mu mara yanjye.”—Itangiriro 2:19-23. 2. Ni gute mu bihe bya vuba aha inshingano z’abagore mu muryango ndetse n’uko babona ishyingiranwa byahindutse? 2 Nubwo umuryango wari waragize iyo ntangiriro nziza, mu ntangiriro y’imyaka ya za 60 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika hatangiye poropagande yiswe kwibohoza kw’abagore, ni ukuvuga ko abagore baharaniraga kwibohoza ku butegetsi bw’abagabo. 
Icyo gihe, ugereranyije abagabo 300 ku mugore 1 bataga imiryango yabo. Mu mpera y’imyaka ya za 60, uwo mubare wari warahindutse, abagabo bata imiryango yabo baba 100 ku mugore 1. Muri iki gihe usanga abagore bavuga amagambo y’urukozasoni, bagasinda, bakanywa itabi kandi bakiyandarika kimwe n’abagabo. None se ubu ni bwo abagore barushijeho kugira ibyishimo? Ashwi da! Mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe, hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’abantu bashyingiranwa, amaherezo baratana. Ese imihati abagore bamwe bashyizeho kugira ngo bakemure ibibazo byo mu miryango yabo, yaba yaratumye ibintu birushaho kuba byiza cyangwa byarushijeho kuzamba?—2 Timoteyo 3:1-5. 3. Ni ikihe kibazo cy’ibanze kigira ingaruka mbi ku bashakanye?
 3 Ikibazo cy’ibanze ni ikihe? Mu rugero runaka, ni ikibazo cyavutse igihe Eva yashukwaga na marayika wigometse, ari we “ya nzoka ya kera yitwa Umwanzi na Satani” (Ibyahishuwe 12:9; 1 Timoteyo 2:13, 14). Satani yagoretse ibyo Imana yigisha. Urugero, Satani yatumye abantu babona ko umuryango ubabuza kwisanzura kandi ko ugoranye. Imitekerereze akwirakwiza mu binyamakuru byo muri iyi si ategeka, igamije kwereka abantu ko inama Imana itanga atari iz’ukuri kandi ko zidahuje n’igihe (2 Abakorinto 4:3, 4).  Ariko rero, nidusuzuma icyo Imana ivuga ku birebana n’inshingano z’umugore mu muryango nta ho tubogamiye, turasanga inama zo mu Ijambo ry’Imana zihuje n’ubwenge kandi ari ingirakamaro.
Inama ku bantu bashinga imiryango 4, 5. (a) Kuki umuntu w’igitsina gore yagombye kwitonda mu gihe ateganya gushaka? (b) Ni iki umuntu w’igitsina gore yagombye gukora mbere y’uko yemerera umugabo kuzashakana na we?
 4 Hari umuburo Bibiliya itanga. Ivuga ko muri iyi si iyoborwa na Satani, n’abafite ishyingiranwa ryiza bazagira “imibabaro.” Bityo rero, nubwo ishyingiranwa ryatangijwe n’Imana, Bibiliya iburira abashyingiranwa. Umwanditsi umwe wahumekewe yavuze ibyo umugore wapfushije umugabo, bityo akaba afite uburenganzira bwo kongera gushaka ati “naguma uko ari ni ho azarushaho guhirwa.” Nanone, Yesu yatanze inama yo kudashyingiranwa ku ‘babasha kubyemera.’ Icyakora, niba umuntu ahisemo gushaka, yagombye gushaka “uri mu Mwami,” ni ukuvuga umuntu usenga Imana, wayiyeguriye kandi wabatijwe.—1 Abakorinto 7:28, 36-40; Matayo 19:10-12. 5 Impamvu umuntu w’igitsina gore by’umwihariko yagombye kwitonda mu gihe ashaka uwo babana, ni umuburo watanzwe na Bibiliya ugira uti “amategeko ahambira umugore ku mugabo we. ” Iyo umugabo apfuye cyangwa agasambana maze agatandukana n’umugore we, umugore “ntaba agitegekwa n’ayo mategeko” (Abaroma 7:2, 3).  Kubona umuntu ugahita umukunda bishobora gutuma abantu bagirana ubucuti bw’agahararo, ariko si rwo rufatiro rukwiriye rwo kugira umuryango wishimye. Ku bw’ibyo rero, umuntu w’igitsina gore utarashaka agomba kwibaza ati ‘ese niteguye gusezerana n’uyu mugabo ko nzumvira amategeko ye?’ Umuntu asuzuma icyo kibazo mbere yo gushyingiranwa, ntabwo ari nyuma yaho. 6. Ni uwuhe mwanzuro abantu b’igitsina gore benshi bashobora gufata muri iki gihe, kandi se kuki ari uw’ingenzi cyane?
 6 Muri iki gihe, ahantu henshi umuntu w’igitsina gore ashobora kwemerera umuntu umusaba ko babana cyangwa akamuhakanira. 
Ariko kandi, guhitamo neza bishobora kuba ari cyo kintu gikomeye kurusha ibindi umuntu w’igitsina gore ashobora gukora. Ibyo biterwa n’uko ashobora kuba yifuza cyane kubona umugabo umuba hafi kandi umukunda, ibyo bikaba bishoboka mu ishyingiranwa. Hari umwanditsi wagize ati “uko turushaho kumva dushaka gukora ikintu, cyaba gushaka cyangwa kuzamuka umusozi runaka, ni ko turushaho kwibwira ko ari nta kibazo gihari maze tukita gusa ku makuru atubwira ibyo twifuza kumva. ” Umuntu uzamuka umusozi aramutse afashe umwanzuro udahuje n’ubwenge, bishobora gutuma atakaza ubuzima bwe; umuntu ahisemo nabi uwo bazabana, na byo bishobora kumuteza akaga. 7. Ni iyihe nama ihuje n’ubwenge yatanzwe ku birebana no gushaka umugabo?
 7 Umuntu w’igitsina gore yagombye gutekereza cyane ku bintu bikubiye mu kugandukira itegeko ry’umugabo umusaba gushyingiranwa na we.
 Mu myaka ishize, hari umukobwa w’Umuhinde wemeye yicishije bugufi ati “ababyeyi bacu barakuze kandi baturusha ubwenge, kandi ntibashobora gushukwa mu buryo bworoshye nkatwe. . . . Jye nshobora gukora ikosa mu buryo bworoshye. ” Ubufasha ababyeyi hamwe n’abandi bashobora gutanga ni ingenzi. Hari umusaza w’Umukristo w’inararibonye umaze igihe kirekire atera abakiri bato inkunga yo kumenya ababyeyi b’umuntu bifuza kuzashyingiranwa na we no kwitegereza bitonze imishyikirano uwo muntu agirana n’ababyeyi be hamwe n’abandi bagize umuryango we. Yanditswe na Sarongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: U Bwongereza: Abarokotse Jenoside bagaragaje imyirondoro y’abajenosideri bacyidegembya
content: Mu itangazo rigaragaza ibyishimo batewe n’ifatwa rya Kabuga Félicien, abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi baba mu Bwongereza bahuriye mu muryango witwa ‘Ishami Foundation’ bagaragaje urutonde n’aho abajenosideri batanu baherereye mu Bwongereza basaba ko bafatwa bakagezwa imbere y’ubutabera. Ku wa 16 Gicurasi 2020 nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko nyuma y’imyaka 26 ashakishwa ngo aryozwe ibyaha ashinjwa bifitanye isano na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, Kabuga Félicien ufatwa nk’umuterankunga wa Jenoside, yafatiwe mu Bufaransa ku myaka 84. Ni inkuru abarokotse Jenoside bari mu Rwanda no mu mahanga, bakiriye neza. Umuryango ‘Ishami Foundation’ na wo wagaragaje ko wishimiye ifatwa rye, uhamagarira u Bwongereza kubikuraho isomo bukagira icyo bukora ku bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside babubamo. Itangazo uwo muryango washyize hanze ku wa mbere tariki 18 Gicurasi 2020 rivuga ko ‘kimwe n’abandi Banyarwanda b’imbere mu gihugu n’ahandi ku Isi, abarokotse n’abanyeshuri baba mu Bwongerereza, bishimiye ifatwa rya Félicien Kabuga wafatiwe i Paris ku wa Gatandatu mu gitondo’. Ryibutsa u Bwongereza ko bugicumbikiye abajenosideri kandi ko abarokotse bakeneye ubutabera. Rigira riti “Ariko tuributsa Guverinoma y’u Bwongereza ko hakiri Abanyarwanda bashinjwa uruhare muri Jenoside bakiba hano mu Bwongereza.” Nyuma ya Jenoside abayigizemo uruhare bahungiye mu bihugu bitandukanye ndetse benshi bahindura imyirondoro batangira ubuzima bushya. Ishami Foundation yagaragaje urutonde rwa batanu baba mu Bwongereza, barimo abahinduye amazina, abandi biyitiriye ibindi bihugu. Urwo rutonde ruriho Vincent Bajinya, bahimba Brown. Uyu yari umwe mu bari bagize ‘Akazu’ ka Perezida Habyarimana kateguye Jenoside. Afatanyije n’Interahamwe ni umwe mu bapangaga za bariyeri muri Kigali. Ubu ngo aba mu gace ka Islington. Hari Mutabaruka Célestin wari Pasiteri mu Itorero ry’Abapantekote wagize uruhare mu iyicwa ry’Abatutsi barenga ibihumbi 20 bishwe urubozo. Hari n’abo abatangabuhamya bavuga ko babanje gukurwamo amaso. Ubu aba i Kent, agace karangwamo inyubako zidasanzwe kandi gafatwa nk’agakuze cyane mu Bwongereza. Kuri urwo rutonde hariho kandi Charles Munyaneza wari Burugumesitiri wa Komini Kinyamakara muri Perefegitura ya Gikongoro, ushinjwa kuyobora ibitero ku bihumbi by’Abatutsi bishwe bakajugunywa muri Mwogo. Ubu aba mu Mujyi wa Bedford. Uwari Burugumesitiri wa Komini ya Kigoma, mu yari perefegitura ya Gitarama, Ugirashebuja Célestin, wategetse Interahamwe kwica Abatutsi yari yategetswe ko babeshywa ko baje kurindirwa kuri komini na we ngo aba aho mu Bwongereza mu Mujyi muto wa Walton-on-the-Naze. Hari kandi Nteziryayo Emmanuel wari Burugumesitiri wa Komini, Mudasomwa muri Perefegitura ya Gikongoro. Uyu akaba we ubwe yarayoboye ibitero byishe Abatutsi muri komini ye. Nyuma yo kugera mu Bwongereza yahinduye amazina yiyita Emmanuel Ndikumana aho aba mu gace ka Wythenshawe mu Mujyi wa Manchester, nk’impunzi y’Umurundi. Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Ishami Foundation, Eric Murangwa Eugène, avuga ko u Bwongereza butaraha abarokotse Jenoside ubutabera, mu gihe cyose abo bajenosideri batarafatwa ngo baryozwe ibyo bakoze. Ati “Guverinoma y’u Bwongereza yahakanye ubutabera ku barokotse, yanga kohereza cyangwa kuburanisha abajenosideri batanu b’Abanyarwanda. Kunanirwa gutanga ubutabera kw’inzego z’ubutabera z’u Bwongereza, byongera guhakana Jenoside kandi bigira ingaruka ku gukira ibikomere kw’abarokotse. ” Yavuze ko bahamagarira Leta y’u Bwongereza na Guverinoma z’ibihugu n’umuryango mpuzamahanga muri rusange guhagarara ku ruhande rw’abarokotse, bagafatanya gukura abajenosideri mu mihanda yo mu Bwongereza n’ahandi ku Isi yose bakagezwa imbere y’ubutabera byashoboka bakajyanwa ahakorewe icyaha. Ku ifatwa rya Kabuga, Murangwa n’abandi bagize Ishami Foundation bavuze ko bizeye ko ubutabera buzatangwa vuba, kuko bwatinze bihagije, ariko bose bagahiriza ku kuba u Bwongereza bukwiye gufatira urugero ku Bufaransa bugatanga abajenosideri baburimo. Bagaragaza ko n’ibindi bihugu bikwiye kubifatiraho isomo. Ishami Foundation ni umuryango w’abagiraneza uhuza Abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi hakoreshejwe umupira w’amaguru mu rwego rwo kubaka ubumwe n’amahoro. Ni umuryango urimo abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga.

title: CECAFA Kagame Cup: Rayon Sports yatsinze Atlabala isanga APR FC muri 1/4
content: Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki ya 09 Nyakanga 2019 irushanwa rya Cecafa Kagame Cup ryakomezaga  aho hakinwe imikino ya kabiri mu itsinda A ryakiniye kuri stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo n’itsinda B rikinira i Huye. Duhereye mu itsinda A, ikipe ya TP Mazembe nyuma yo gutsindwa umukino wayo wa mbere na Rayon Sports 1-0, yagarutse mu kibuga ishaka amanota yayo ya mbere imbere ya KMC yo muri Tanzania, ndetse byayikundiye ibona igitego kimwe rukumbi cyabonetse muri uyu mukino gitsinzwe na Mondeko Zatu ku munota wa 61. Nyuma y’uyu mukino hari hategerejwe umukino wa Rayon Sports na Atlabala FC yo muri Sudani y’Amajyepfo yari yabashije kunganya umukino wayo wa mbere na KMC (1-1). Gikundiro yasabwaga gutsinda uyu mukino igahita igira amanota atandatu ayerekeza muri 1/4 mbere y’uko ikina umukino wa nyuma. Jules Ulimwengu yongeye kwigaragaza kuko ari we wayitsindiye ibitego 2 byabonetse muri uyu mukino. Uyu rutahizamu mpuzamahanga w’Umurundi yafunguye amazamu ku munota wa 12 nyuma yo guhererekanya neza hagati ya Nshimiyimana Imran na Iranzi Jean Claude wahise asunikira uyu Jules Ulimwengu. Rayon Sports yakomeje guhererekanya neza isatira bikomeye izamu rya Atlabala ndetse iza kubona penaliti ku munota wa nyuma w’igice cya mbere nyuma yaho Ciza Hussein agushirijwe mu rubuga rw’amahina. Iranzi Jean Claude ni we wahawe amahirwe yo kuyitera ariko ayikubita ku giti cyo hasi cy’izamu. Mu gice cya kabiri Rayon Sports yakomeje gusatira kugeza ubwo Jules Ulimwengu ku munota wa 79 yatsindaga igitego cya kabiri ku mupira mwiza cyane wari uhinduwe na Mugheni Fabrice nawe wari uwuhawe na Bizimana Yannick wari ukinjira mu kibuga mu mukino we wa mbere muri Rayon nyuma yo kuva muri Muhanga FC. Amanota 3 Rayon Sports ibonye aje yiyongea ku yo yabonye mu mukino ubanza ubwo yatsinda TP Mazembe ibi biyihesha kuyobora itsinda A n’amanota atandatu, igakurikirwa na TP Mazembe ifite atatu mu gihe KMC ifite inota 1 n’umwenda w’igitego kimwe ku mwanya wa gatatu naho Atlabara ikaba ifite inota n’umwenda w’ibitego 2. Rayon Sports ibaye ikipe ya kabiri ikatishije itike nyuma ya APR FC yabigezeho ku wa Mbere nyuma yo gutsinda umukino wayo wa kabiri wayihuje na Green Eagles igitego 1-0. Umutoza Mathurin Ovambe Olivier watozaga umukino we wa kabiri muri Rayon Sports yari yongeye kugirira icyizere abakinnyi 11 bari babanje mu kibuga bahura na TP Mazembe ari bo: Kimenyi Yves, Iragire Saidi, Rugwiro Herve, Iradukunda Eric Radu, Rutanga Eric (c), Nshimiyimana Amran, Mugheni Kakule Fabrice, Comodore Olokwei (yasimbuwe na Nizeyimana Mirafa ku munota wa 66), Ciza Hussein (Bizimana Yannick 78’), Iranzi Jean Claude (yasimbuwe na Irakoze Saidi ku munota wa 48) na Ulimwengu Jules. Iri tsinda rizasubira mu kibuga rikina imikino ya nyuma mu itsinda ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 13 Nyakanga 2019 aho TP Mazembe izaba icakirana na Atlabala naho Rayon Sports igahura na KMC. Indi mikino yabaye kuri uyu wa Kabiri mu itsinda B ikipe ya Mukura VS yanganyije na Bandari FC ibitego 2-2 naho KCCA FC yo muri Uganda itsinda igitego 1-0 Azam FC yo muri Tanzaniya inafite iki gikombe.

title: Firdaus, izina ry’umukobwa wigengesera mbere yo gukora
content: Ni izina rikunze gukoreshwa mu bihugu bitandukanye ku Isi ariko cyane ibivuga ururimi rw’Icyarabu n’Igihinde.  	Ibiranga ba Firdaus Ba Firdaus ntibakunda guhita bemera impinduka zibayeho ahubwo barabanza bakagenzura icyaziteye bakagenzura niba ari na ngombwa ko zibaho. Ibi bijyanirana n’uko muri kamere yabo iyo hari ikintu runaka bashaka gukora babanza gufata umwanya munini bagitegura. Ni abantu bakunda kubahiriza inshingano zabo cyane ku buryo usanga akenshi  bahangayika iyo zitarashyirwa mu bikorwa bitewe n’agaciro baba bazihaye. Ni abanyempano cyane cyane ku bintu bijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga rigezweho. Mu rukundo usanga ba Firdaus ari abantu bakunze kuzana ibitekerezo by’inyamibwa cyane ariko ntibakunze kugaragaza amarangamutima yabo bihambaye ku buryo bisaba abo bakundana kubanza kwakira uko bateye hato bataba babakeka ibindi. Ba Firdaus bakunda kubaho mu buzima busazwe butuma babana n’abandi amahoro kandi bakemera ibintu bifite uburanga. Kuri bo ibikorwa bihabwa agaciro kanini kuruta amagambo.

title: Nishimwe  wari wambaye nomero 31  ni we wambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020
content:
Nishimwe Naomie wari wambaye nomero 31 muri iri rushanwa, ni we wambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 atsinze bagenzi be bari bahatanye, asimbura Nimwiza Meghan wari uryambaye mu mwaka wa 2019 Nishimwe wambitswe iri kamba aserukiye Umujyi wa Kigali, agomba gushyira mu bikorwa umushinga ujyanye no kurwanya kanseri y’ibere mu Rwanda, ari na wo wamuhesheje amanota yo kwegukana ikamba nyuma yo gutoranywa mu bakobwa 10 bajya mu cyiciro cya nyuma. Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda nyuma y’inkuru zamuvuzweho ko ashobora kuba yaraje mu irushanwa ashyigikiwe n’umwe mu baterankunga bakomeye b’irushanwa, ndetse bishyira igitutu kuri iki kigo hamwe n’abategura irushanwa. 
 Mbere yo guhitamo utoranywamo Miss Rwanda ndetse n’ibisonga bye, habanje gutoranywa abakobwa 10 bahatana mu cyiciro cya nyuma, hagendewe ku bunararibonye bw’akanama nkemurampaka, nyuma yo kumva ibisubizo byatanzwe n’aba bakobwa ku bibazo bitandukanye babazwaga. Buri mukobwa yabazwaga ikibazo kimwe gusa, akagisubiza mu minota hagati y’ibiri n’itatu. Nishimwe Naomie (No 31), Umutesi Denise (No 43), Ingabire Gaudence (No 8), Umwiza Phionah (No 47), Mutegwantebe Chanice (No 27), Irasubiza Alliance (No 11), Teta Ndenga Nicole (No ,35) Musana Teta Hense (No 26), Umuratwa Anitha (No 42) na Akaliza Hope (No 1). 
 Ni bo batowemo nyampinga hamwe n’ibisonga bye, bitabujije ko mu bandi icyenda bari basigaye bashoboraga gutoranywamo nka Miss Popularity, cyangwa umukobwa uzi kwifotoza kimwe na nyampinga w’umurage. Aba 10 batoranyijwe, babazwaga ku bijyanye n’imishinga yabo, n’uburyo bazayishyira mu bikorwa. Nishimwe agiye kumara umwaka ahembwa ibihumbi 800 by’amanyarwanda buri kwezi, ahabwe imodoka nshya yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Suift n’amavuta yayo. Azahabwa umwaka wose akoresha imisatsi n’inzara, anambikwa imyenda y’ibirori ku buntu mu gihe akeneye amakanzu. Azahabwa serivisi za banki umwaka wose ahabwe ubwishingizi bwo kwivuza umwaka wose, gusohokera muri resitora umwaka wose kimwe no kuryama mu cyumba cya hoteli yabakiriye mu mwiherero. Azarihirwa ikiruhuko mu Mujyi wa Dubai n’itike y’indege anishyurirwe ibijyanye n’urwo rugendo byose n’ibindi byinshi bitandukanye birimo no guhabwa imyenda ya Siporo igihe ayikeneye mu gihe cy’umwaka wose. Igisonga cya mbere ni Umwiza Phiona wahembwe 1,200,000Frw, mu gihe Umutesi Denise yagizwe igisonga cya kabiri yahembwe 1,200,000Frw, bombi bakazahabwa icyumba cya hoteli umunsi umwe buri kwezi mu gihe cy’amezi atandatu bari kumwe n’umuryango wabo.

 Irasubiza Alliance yahawe ikamba ry’uwakunzwe na benshi (Miss Popularity) anahembwa 1,500,000FRW, iPhone 8Plus ya 64 GB ndetse anahabwe guhamagara no gukoresha interineti ku buntu mu gihe cy’umwaka azamarana iri kamba. Nishimwe Naomi kandi yahawe ikamba ry’umukobwa uzi kwifotoza (Miss Photogenic) umukobwa wifotoza akaberwa n’amafoto, yagenewe igihembo cya 1,200,000Frw. Teta Ndenga Nicole, yambitswe ikamba rya Nyampinga w’umurage (Miss Heritage), Umwiza Phiona yagizwe nyampinga wabanye neza na bagenzi be (Miss Congeniality). Nishimwe Naomie abaye Miss Rwanda wa karindwi wambitswe ikamba mu marushanwa yateguwe na Rwanda Inspiration Back Up, akaba na Miss wa 10 muri ba Miss bose babayeho biswe izina rya “Miss Rwanda” 
 
 
 
 
 Chief editor/ Muhabura.rw

title: Umuhanzikazi Asinah yibasiye abamaze iminsi bamutuka   kubera  amafoto agaragaza amabere ye
content:
Asinah ni umwe mu bahanzi badasiba mu itangazamakuru, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga akoresha by’umwihariko Instagram na Snapchat akunze gushyiraho amashusho yigaragaza  nk’umuntu uhora yishmye  Mukasine Asinah yibasiye umwe mu gatsiko k’abamaze iminsi bamwoherereza ibitutsi bamuryoza amafoto yashyize hanze agaragaza amabere ye. Asinah Erra amaze imyaka igera kuri ibiri yinjiye mu muziki, aririmba mu njyana ya Dancehall na Afrobeat. Mu gihe gito amaze aririmba yagiye asohora indirimbo zacuranzwe ku maradiyo harimo ‘Izubu’, ‘Game Is Over’ afatanyije na Neg G The General, ‘Happy’, ‘Mapenzi’ n’izindi. Yari amaze iminsi yifotoza mu buryo busa n’ubushotora abagabo yarangiza akayasakaza ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Ubwo aheruka gutukwa mu ntangiriro za Nyakanga 2017 nabwo yazize ifoto yerekana amabere yashyize ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bihurirana na video yari imaze iminsi ikwirakwizwa imugaragaza atigisa ikibuno mu mazi. Asinah u amaze hafi icyumweru asohora amafoto y’uruhererekane yiganjemo ayerekana amatako n’andi yafotowe igice cyo hejuru ariko amabere agaragara. Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 25 Ukwakira 2017, Asinah yashyize hanze indi foto mu zigaragaza amabere abiganjemo abamukurikira kuri Instagram baramwibasira abandi barimo abasore bakamushimagiza bamubwira ko ‘abanezeza’. Umwe mu bafana yeruriye Asinah ko ‘ibyo akora abiterwa n’ihungabana yatewe no gutandukana na Riderman’, ibi byakuruye umujinya kuri uyu muhanzi maze asubiza uyu muntu ko ibyo ari gukora “bisa no kwibariza ubuhiri warangiza ukabwikubita” Kuri iyi foto Asinah yambaye ikanzu yera, idoze ku buryo mu gituza hafunguye ku buryo igice cy’amabere kigaragara ari nabyo byatumye bamwe bamwadukira bakamutuka bamushinja kwiyandarika.

 Kuri iyo foto Asinah yambaye ikanzu yera, idoze ku buryo mu gituza hafunguye ku buryo igice cy’amabere kigaragara ari nabyo byatumye bamwe bamwadukira bakamutuka bamushinja kwiyandarika.

title: Radio K FM yari imenyereweho Abanyamakuru nka MC Tino na Ginty yamaze gufunga imiryango
content:
Ikigo cy’itangazamakuru cyo mu gihugu cya Kenya NMG (Nation Media Group), cyatangaje ko kigiye gufunga zimwe muri radiyo zacyo zirimo na KFM ikorera mu Rwanda bijyanye na gahunda yacyo y’ivugurura. Itangazo NMG yashyize ahagaragara kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 30 Kamena 2016, rivuga ko bahisemo gufata uyu mwanzuro mu rwego rwo kuvugurura imikorere y’iki kigo bagamije kubaka imbere hacyo heza mu gutangaza amakuru agezweho kandi yizewe. Bavuga kandi ko bakoze ibi mu rwego rwo gutuma iki kigo kijyana n’ikinyejana cya 21 mu kugeza ku babakurikira amakuru agezweho. Iki kigo cy’itangazamakuru kivuga kandi ko cyafashe uyu mwanzuro mu rwego rwo guteza imbere televiziyo ya NTV ikazajya itangaza amakuru n’ibiganiro mu ndimi zinyuranye. Amaradiyo y’iki kigo agiye gufungwa, arimo Nation FM na QFM zombi zo mu gihugu cya Kenya ndetse na KFM yari isanzwe ikorera mu Rwanda. Gusa ngo nubwo ibi bitangazamakuru bifunze imiryango, ngo bizajya bikomeza gutangaza amakuru hifashishijwe interineti (online). Iri tangazo rivuga ko guhera kuri uyu 30 Kamena 2016, iki kigo kiri bugabanye abakozi bacyo ariko kikazakomeza kubaha ubufasha mu gihe bazaba batereje akandi kazi. NMG kandi ivuga ko izakomeza guha agaciro ababakurikira bijyanye n’ibyifuzo byabo. Radiyo KFM mu Rwanda yafunguwe ku mugaragaro tariki 06 Gashyantare 2012. Uretse KFM, Nation Media Group kandi yatangije ibitangazamakuru bimaze kuba ubukombe nka The Daily Nation, The East African, The Daily Monitor, Easy Fm, NTV, NTV Uganda, The Citizen n’ibindi.
 Mc Tino na Axelle muri Studio za K FM 
 Yanditswe na  Snappy Akayezu Jean de Dieu/Muhabura.rw

title: Abahoze bayobora ADEPR bihannye umucamanza kubera gusubika urubanza kenshi
content: Abaregwa ni Sibomana Jean, Tom Rwagasana, Mutuyemariya Christine, Sebagabo Leonard, Sindayigaya Theophile, Gasana Valens, Niyitanga Straton, Beninka Bertin, Mukabera Lynea, Twizerimana Emmanuel, Nzabarinda Tharcisse na Mukakamari Mediatrice. Ubushinjacyaba bubarega kunyereza 2 366 708 946Frw nk’uko byagaragajwe muri raporo y’umugenzuzi yakozwe nyuma y’ifatwa ry’abo bayobozi mu 2017. Ku wa 14 Ukuboza 2018 nibwo Urukiko Rwisumbuye rwa Gasabo, Urugereko ruburanisha ibyaha bimunga ubukungu bw’igihugu, rwagize abere Bishop Sibomana Jean na Bishop Tom Rwagasana bari abayobozi ba ADEPR n’abandi 10 kuko batahamwe n’ibyaha bari bakurikiranyweho. Ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR n’ubushinjacyaha bwajuririye iki cyemezo mu Urukiko Rukuru, ari naho urubanza rugeze kuri ubu. Urubanza rukimara kujuririrwa abaregwa bagiye bitaba urukiko urubanza rugasubikwa kugeza ubwo rwongeye gusubukurwa  tariki ya 21/2/201/20 saa mbili za mugitondo ku Rukiko Rukuru, aho ababurana bose bari bitabiriye ndetse bafite n’ababunganira mu mategeko. Ubushinjacyaha bwabwiye urukiko ko bwasabye Urwego rw’Imiyoborere (RGB) gukora ubugenzuzi (Audit) kandi ko irimo kubikora nk’uko biri mu ibaruwa umushinjacyaha yasomeye urukiko yanditswe na RGB, akomeza asaba ko urubanza rwashyirwa tariki ya 8/7/2020. Uku kongera gusubika urubanza byatumye uwari umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Bishop Sibomana Jean, avuga ko urubanza rumaze gusubikwa inshuro zirindwi zose  hashakwa ibimenyetso, agaragaza ko izo nshuro nta na rimwe atitabye urukiko bityo ko atumva impamvu akomeza kubura ubutabera. Yakomeje avuga ko imitungo ye yose kimwe n’iy’abandi batandatu [Tom Rwagasana, Sebagabo Leonard, Mutuyemariya Christine, Niyitanga Salton, Sindayigaya Theophile na Gasana Valens] yafatiriwe bikabagiraho ingaruka zikomeye mu gihe ku bandi batanu bareganwa itafatiriwe ndetse bari mu kazi ka ADEPR. Bishop Sibomana yavuze ko urubanza rumaze gusubikwa kuva tariki ya 10/6/2019, 18/6/2019, 17/7/2019, 6/9/2019, 13/9/2019, 03/10/2019, 8/11/2019, 21/2/2020; atigeze abura mu rukiko, akabishingiraho asaba ko umucamanza uyoboye iburanisha witwa Nzabonimana Cassien ava mu rubanza kuko uko gutinda akubona nko kubogama ku ruhande rumwe rurega kuko ari rwo ruhora rusaba ko urubanza rusubikwa hagishakishwa ibimenyetso. Abaregwa bavuga ko ubugenzuzi bwasabwe n’ubucamanza batemeranya na bwo kuko mu 2017 hari ubwakoreshejwe n’ubushinjacyaha bukaburanirwaho mu rukiko rwisumbuye rwa Gasabo.  Kuba rero harasabwe ubundi bugenzuzi nyuma y’imyaka itatu batari mu kazi babibona nko kubaheza mu gihirahiro. Ubwihane bw’umucamanza bukaba bwaratanzwe kuri uyu wa Mbere kugira ngo busuzumwe n’urukiko. Urubanza rukaba ruzasubukurwa nyuma yuko urukiko rufashe icyemezo kuri ubwo bwihane. Ni ryari umuburanyi yihana umucamanza? Kwihana umucamanza ni igihe umuburanyi yanze ko amuburanisha iyo; Ubwe cyangwa uwo bashakanye n’abana babo, bafite inyungu bwite mu rubanza; Ubwe, cyangwa uwo bashakanye afitanye isano y’amaraso cyangwa yo gushyingiranwa ku buryo butaziguye cyangwa afitanye isano ku buryo buziguye kugeza ku gisanira cya kane n’umwe mu bagize inteko y’urukiko, n’umwe mu baburanyi, n’umwunganira cyangwa umuhagarariye; Umwe mu baburanyi agaragaje ishingiro ry’urwango afitanye n’umucamanza; Umwe mu baburanyi agaragaje ko umucamanza afitanye ubucuti bwihariye n’undi mu baburanyi cyangwa kuva aho urubanza rutangiriye, yarigeze kwakirwa mu buryo bwihariye n’umwe mu baburanyi ku mafaranga ye, cyangwa yaremeye impano ahawe n’umuburanyi; Iyo yigeze kugira icyo avuga cyangwa agatanga inama kuri urwo rubanza mbere y’uko ruburanishwa; Iyo yigeze kuba mu rubanza ari umucamanza, umwunzi, umushinjacyaha, umugenzacyaha, umuburanyi, umutangabuhamya, , umusemuzi, inzobere cyangwa umukozi wo mu butegetsi bwa Leta; Yiyamwa kandi iyo habayeho urubanza rw’ishinjabyaha cyangwa rw’imbonezamubano, hagati y’umucamanza cyangwa uwo bashakanye, abafitanye n’umucamanza isano ishingiye ku maraso cyangwa ku gushyingirwa ku buryo butaziguye cyangwa ku buryo buziguye kugeza ku gisanira cya kane n’umwe mu baburana, uwo bashakanye cyangwa abo bafitanye isano ishingiye ku maraso cyangwa ku gushyingirwa ku buryo butaziguye cyangwa ku buryo buziguye kugeza ku gisanira cya kane.

title: AMAFOTO:Abatoza  5 beza ku isi,wenger k’umwanya  wa 4 ,reba abandi imbere n’inyuma ye
content:
Gutoza ikipe y’umupira w’amaguru bisaba impano zitandukanye ndetse n’ubumenyi bw’uwo mukino, gukorana neza n’abakinnyi abaha ingufu ndetse n’ikinyabupfura.ibyo byose bigakurikirwa n’ingufu z’umubiri ndetse n’imitekerereze myiza. gusa ikingezi Ni ukubaha ubwenge bukoreshwa mu kibuga.nubwo ibi bamwe mu batoza baba babifite ariko gutoza birabananira kubera kutagira impano yo kuyobora bityo bigasaba umuntu kugira impano yo kuba umunyabugeni ndetse n’ umuyobozi. Urutonde rwabo hakurikijwe ibikombe batwaye ndetse n’ibindi bigwig bafite muri ruhago. 5. Diego Simeone 
 Argantine niyo nkomoko, atoza Atletico Madrid. Yatwaye ibikombe 2 iwabo muri argentine ageze muri Espanye  yahise azamura atretico ayigeza ku mwanya wa 5 . yayifashije gutwara Europa league 2012,gutwara  igikombe cy’umwami 2013, yatwaye champiyona 2014 kandi yageze inshuro 2 ku mukino wanyuma wa champions league asezererwa na Real Madrid 2014 na 2016 4. Arsene Wenger  
 Umufaransa  utoza Arsenal,mugutoza azamura abana bato agatuma bagira amazina akomeye muri ruhago.Yafashije ikipe ye kuguma mu makipe 4 yambere muri champiyona  imyaka 19.yatwaye ibikombe 3 bya championa , 6 bya  FA Cup anagera no k’umukino wanyuma wa champions league 2016. muri 2003-2004 yasoje championa adatsinzwe na rimwe.kandi yatwaye igikombe cya championa ari muri Monaco ndetse n’igikombe cy’igihugu. 3. Louis Van Gaal  
 Muri  Ajax yatwaye champions league 1995, igikombe gihuza ikipe yatwaye champions league na Europa league 1992, chamiyona inshuro 3 n’igikombe cy’igihugu, muri Brcelona na Buyern yatwaye  championa inshuro 3 ndetse n’igikombe cy’igihugu. 2. Jose Mourinho  
 Portugal niyo kavukire. Icyazwiho cyane ni ukuntu azi gukora ubwugarizi bukomeye ndetse n’imbaraga z’umubiri ku ikipe ye.yari umwarimu  mbere yuko yinjira mu gutoza abikomoye kuri Bobby Robson  na Louis Van Gaal. Yatwaye championa  8 n’ibikombe by’igihugu  4 ari muri Fc Porto, Chelsea, Inter, na Real Madrid. yatwaye  Eufa cup  2003 na  Champions League ari muri Fc Porto na  Inter de milan.Yaje gusubira gutoza Chelsea ahita ayivamo ajya muri Manchester united aho yegukanye Europa league ndetse na EFL Cup. 1.Carlo Ancelotti  
 Uyu mutaliyani niwe mutoza  wenyine umuze gutwara champions league inshuro 3. 2014 atoza  Real Madrid, inshuro  2 atoza AC Milan 2003 na 2007. Kandi yegukanye ibikombe bya  chapiyona y’ Ubutaliyani (AC Milan),ubwongereza (Chelsea)  ndetse n’ubufaransa (Paris Saint-Germain). hakiyongeraho na Real Madrid.amarushanwa yose yegukanye ni 18 bikaba aribyo bimugira uwambere. Yanditswe na HABARUREMA Djamali /MUHABURA.RW

title: Minisitiri Biruta asanga Uganda ifite ubushake, ibibazo byayo n’u Rwanda byakemuka mu cyumweru kimwe
content: Kuwa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Inama yabereye i Gatuna ihuje abayobozi b’u Rwanda, Uganda, Angola na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yahaye Uganda ukwezi kumwe ko kugenzura ibirego bya Repubulika y’u Rwanda ku bikorwa bibera ku butaka bwayo by’imitwe ibangamiye guverinoma y’u Rwanda, byaba ari ukuri, Uganda igafata ingamba zose zo kubihagarika no kwirinda ko byakongera kubaho nyuma hakabaho ibiganiro byo gufungura imipaka. Mu kiganiro Majuscule Propos cya Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, cyavugaga ku bibazo by’u Rwanda na Uganda cyatambutse kuri iki Cyumweru, Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr. Vincent Biruta, yabajijwe ku cyizere cy’uko Uganda yaba izubahiriza ibyo yasabwe mu kwezi kumwe yahawe, asubiza ko ikibazo atari igihe cyo kubikemura ahubwo ikibazo ari ubushake bwa Politiki. Yavuze ko ibyo u Rwanda rusaba byumvikana kandi ko ari ibintu bitatwara icyumweru kimwe kugira ngo bikemuke Uganda iramutse ifite ubushake bwo kubikemura. Ati “Njye ntekereza ko iyo haba ubushake bwa Politiki bitajyaga gusaba iminsi 30 kubera ko ibyo u Rwanda rusaba birumvikana: Dufite abanyarwanda bafashwe bari muri gereza dusaba ko barekurwa. Turasaba ko gufata abanyarwanda no kubatoteza mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bihagarara. Turasaba ko ibikorwa byo gushyigikira imitwe irwanya u Rwanda bihagarara. Ndatekereza ko itari inakenewe, ibyo ni ibintu abantu bakora mu cyumweru kimwe.” Uganda iri mu bibazo by’ubukungu ndetse na Banki nkuru y’icyo gihugu iherutse kwerurira abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ko yaguye mu gihombo cya miliyoni 545 z’amadorali ya Amerika mu myaka 15 ishize. Abasesenguzi basanga Uganda ikeneye cyane ko umupaka ufungurwa nubwo n’abanyarwanda bawukeneye. Ku ruhande rumwe bisa nk’aho Museveni yari yizeye ko inama iheruka isiga iwufunguye nkuko n’ubutumwa yanditse kuri Twitter bibugaragaza. Nyuma gato y’iyo nama yanditse ati “Mfitiye impuhwe abaturage ba Uganda n’ab’u Rwanda bagizweho ingaruka n’ifungwa ry’umupaka wa Gatuna. Ndabasaza kwihangana mu gihe turi gushaka igisubizo kirambye. Nizeye ko ukuri kuzagaragara kubera Guverinoma ya NRM [Ishyaka riri ku butegetsi] ihagaze ku kuri.” My sympathies go out to the citizens of Uganda and Rwanda that have been affected by the closure of the Katuna border. I call upon you to be patient as we pursue a lasting solution. I am very optimistic that the truth will come out because the NRM government stands for the truth. pic.twitter.com/940BtM2kTK — Yoweri K Museveni (@KagutaMuseveni) February 21, 2020 Dr. Vincent Biruta wari mu nama yabereye i Gatuna, yavuze ko abahuza bari bateguye gahunda irimo n’ikimenyetso cyo kwambuka umupaka, ariko abakuru b’ibihugu baza kuyihindura nyuma ari nabwo ikiganiro n’itangazamakuru cyakuwemo, hagasomwa itangazo. Birashoboka ko ariho icyizere Museveni yari afite cyari gishingiye. Ati “Ndakeka iyo nyandiko ya Twitter yaranditswe inama irimo cyangwa itararangira, wenda bikozwe n’ushinzwe konti ye ya Twitter.” Umujyanama wa Perezida Kagame, Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo, yavuze ko Museveni ashobora kuzubahiriza ibyo yasabwe kubera igitutu ariho cyerekeye ubukungu bwa Uganda buri kuzahara. Ati “Turebye uko ibintu bihagaze ubu Perezida Museveni ari ku gitutu gikomeye. Bisa nk’aho Museveni yatekerezaga ko inama yabaye ku wa Gatanu izafungura umupaka ariko si ko byagenze. Kuri we hari igitutu ku ruhande rw’ubukungu nubwo n’abanyarwanda bawukeneye [Umupaka].” Dr. Kimonyo asanga Uganda yaratunguwe n’uburyo u Rwanda rwitwaye ku bijyanye n’ifungwa ry’umupaka, itangira gufata ibyemezo bitandukanye. Ati “Ikibazo gitangira Uganda yaravuze ngo u Rwanda ruze rupfukame ariko ibyo ntibyashobotse. Ntabwo Museveni yakuyeho pasiporo ya Charlotte Mukankusi, [ushinzwe dipolomasi mu mutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC, washinzwe na Kayumba Nyamwasa], ntabwo ari ku busa batangiye kurekura bamwe mu bo bafunze. Ndatekereza ko azakora ibyo asabwa niba bikenewe ko umupaka ufungurwa nkuko yabivuze.” Hashize imyaka itatu hari ubwumvikane buke hagati y’ibihugu byombi, u Rwanda rushinja Uganda gukorana no gukingira ikibaba ibikorwa by’imitwe igamije kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano, birimo iby’imitwe ya RNC, FDLR, RUD Urunana n’indi. Hari gufata no gufunga abanyarwanda mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bagakorerwa iyicarubozo ndetse no kubangamira ubucuruzi bwarwo. Intambwe imaze guterwa mu kuzahura umubano hagati y’ibihugu byombi, irimo kurekura abaturage bari bafunzwe kuri buri ruhande, no gusinya amasezerano yo guhererekanya abanyabyaha. Ibyo u Rwanda rusaba Uganda Kimwe mu byo u Rwanda rwari rwasabye mbere y’inama ya Kane y’i Gatuma cyo gutesha agaciro pasiporo yahawe Charlotte Mukankusi wo muri RNC ari nayo yakoreshaga mu ngendo ze, cyarubahirijwe. U Rwanda kandi rwari rwasabye Uganda kohereza abantu bagize uruhare mu bitero byo mu Kinigi mu mwaka ushize, byahitanye abantu 14 abandi bagakomereka. Ku wa Gatatu hari babiri boherejwe, nubwo hari abandi bataroherezwa. U Rwanda rukomeje gusaba Uganda gukurikirana ibikorwa n’ikusanywa ry’inkunga ihabwa imitwe yo guhungabanya u Rwanda, bikorwa n’abarimo Prossy Bonabaana, Sula Nuwamanya, Dr Rukundo Rugali, Emerithe Gahongayire na Emmanuel Mutarambirwa, byose bigashyigikirwa na RNC, binyuze mu muryango utari uwa leta Self-Worth Initiative. Mu bandi rusaba kohererezwa bari muri RUD Urunana yagabye igitero mu Kinigi, uretse Sous Lieutenant Selemani Kabayija na Private Fidèle Nzabonimpa bagejejwe mu Rwanda, hari Mugwaneza Eric na Capt. Nshimiye uzwi nka Governor ari na we wayoboye igitero cyo mu Kinigi. U Rwanda kandi rusaba Uganda gukurikirana abayobozi bakorana na RNC na RUD Urunana barimo Umunyamabanga wa Leta Philemon Mateke, Brig Gen Abel Kandiho uyobora CMI, Brig Gen Fred Karara, Col Sike Asiimwe, Major Fred Mushambo, Col Kaka Bagyenda n’abandi bayobozi bagira uruhare muri ibyo bikorwa.

title: Ambasaderi Munyabagisha Valens yatorewe kuba Perezida wa Komite Olempike
content:
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu Tariki ya 11 Werurwe muri Lemigo Hotel habereye amatora ya Komite Olempike y’u Rwanda (CNOSR), Ambasaderi Munyabagisha Valens ku mwanya wa Perezida yasimbuye Robert Bayigamba.
 Uko amatora yagenze Perezida: Munyabagisha Valens, amajwi 43 kuri 45 Visi Perezida wa mbere: Rwemarika Felicite amajwi 43 kuri 45 Visi Perezida wa kabiri: Bizimana Festus amajwi 42 kuri 45 Umunyababanga Mukuru:Bizimana Dominique n’amajwi 42 kuri 45 Umubitsi: Ingabire Alice Ku mwanya w’abajyanama: E’gairma Hermine yabonye amajwi 35,Nzabanterura Eugene agira abona amajwi 35. Umugenzuzi w’imanari ari we Umwari Josette yabonye amajwi 45 kuri 45. Yanditswe na Chief Editor/MUHABURA.rw

title: Mu kwezi kumwe RDC ishobora gutangaza intsinzi kuri Ebola
content: Kuwa 3 Werurwe 2020, itsinda ry’abaganga mu kigo gishinzwe kwita ku barwayi ba Ebola, i Beni muri Kivu y’Amajyaruguru, ryishimiye ko umurwayi wa nyuma wa Ebola, Semida Masika, yasohotse mu bitaro yakize. Umuyobozi wa Komite ishinzwe guhangana na Ebola, Dr. Jean-Jacques Muyembe, yavuze ko kuba umurwayi wa nyuma wa Ebola, yarasohotse mu bitaro kuwa 3 Werurwe, bisobanuye ko iki cyorezo kirimo kurwanywa, ariko ari ngombwa gutegereza iminsi 42 kugira ngo nibura hatangazwe ko cyatsinzwe burundu. Avuga ko kubara byatangiye kuwa 2 Werurwe, umunsi umurwayi wa nyuma yasuzumwe ntasanganwe Ebola, aho bivuze ko adashobora kwanduza iyo virusi abandi. Ati “Byose nibiramuka bigenze neza, dushobora kuzatangaza ko icyorezo cya Ebola kitagihari kuwa 12 Mata 2020”. Kuva mu ntangiriro za Kanama 2018, abantu 3444 baketsweho Ebola, abagera ku 3310 basanzwe bayirwaye naho 134 basanga ntayo barwaye. Imibare y’Ishami ry’umuryango w’abibumbye ryita ku buzima (OMS), igaragaza ko kugeza kuwa 2 Werurwe, abagera ku 2264 bishwe na Ebola.

title: Umugore yijugunye muri Nyabarongo ahetse umwana
content:
Umugore utaramenyekana amazina mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa mbere yijugunye muri Nyabarongo ahetse n’umwana muto ariko bombi bavanwamo. Yabikoreye hafi y’ikiraro kigabanya Intara y’Amajyepfo n’Umujyi wa Kigali. (inkuru y’Umuseke). Birakekwa ko uyu mugore yari yiyahuye, umukozi wo ku ruganda rwa Ruriba warebaga yahise yinaga mu mugenzi arabarohora. Abantu benshi bahise batabara batangira kubitaho banahamagara n’imodoka y’imbangukiragutabara bajyanwa kwa muganga. Nta mwirondoro w’uyu mugore urabasha kumenyakana kuko nta byangombwa yari afite nk’uko umwe mu bakozi ku ruganda rwa Ruriba witwa Karake Jean Marie Vianney wari uhari yabibwiye Umuseke. Nta mpamvu iramenyakana yatumye uyu mugore yiyahura nta n’umuntu hafi aha wavuze ko yaba amuzi.

Umugore wiyahuye yahise atabarwa ajyanwa agihumeka

Akana ababyeyi bari hafi bahise batangira kukitaho kari kagihumeka

title: Dr Ngabitsinze, Urujeni na Mukama Abbas mu bahawe imyanya mishya na Perezida Kagame
content: Muri izi mpinduka kandi Mukama Abbas wari umaze igihe asoje manda nka Visi Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga amategeko - Umutwe w’Abadepite - yagizwe Umuvunyi Mukuru Wungirije ushinzwe gukumira no kurwanya ruswa n’ibyaha bisa na yo, asimbuye Musangabatware Clément. Impinduka nshya zatangajwe kuri uyu wa Mbere, zigaragaza ko Dr Ngabitsinze wari Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo ishinzwe gukurikirana imicungire y’umutungo wa leta, PAC, mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, yabaye Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi; umwanya utari usanzwe ufite umuntu muri iyi minisiteri. Dr Ngabitsinze si mushya mu rwego rw’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi, kuko yize ibijyanye n’uru rwego aho afite impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga mu bukungu bushingiye ku buhinzi yakuye muri Kaminuza ya Milan mu Butaliyani. Asanzwe ari n’umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda aho yatangaga n’ubundi amasomo y’ubuhinzi. Yanabaye Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kuzamura ibyoherezwa mu mahanga bikomoka ku buhinzi n’ubworozi, NAEB. Naho Bakuramutsa Feza Urujeni wagizwe Umuyobozi ushinzwe Ibiro bya Perezida wa Repubulika, yabaye Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Imbuto Foundation. Yanabaye Intumwa y’u Rwanda yungirije mu Muryango w’Abibumbye. Undi wahawe umwanya ni Mukama Abbas wari umaze imyaka ibiri nta mwanya afite nyuma y’imyaka 18 mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko nk’Umudepite. Yagizwe Umuvunyi wungirije ushinzwe gukumira no kurwanya ruswa n’ibyaha bisa nayo, asimbuye Musangabatware Clement wari kuri uyu mwanya. Uwingeneye Joyeuse wakoraga mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, mu ishami rishinzwe ibijyanye n’Imenyekanishabikorwa, we yagizwe Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe gutunganya amasoko ya Leta, RPPA. Abandi bahawe imyanya ni abagize Inama y’Ubutegetsi y’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe ibijyanye n’indege, iyobowe na Niyonkuru Zephanie mu gihe abongerewe manda ku mwanya w’abagize Komite itoranya ku mwanya w’ubukomiseri muri Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Uburenganzira bwa muntu aho Umuyobozi wayo Kayijire Agnes.

title: Iby’ingenzi ku rugendo rwo kweguza Perezida Donald Trump rugeze mu mahina
content: Gutora ingingo ya mbere yo gukoresha nabi ububasha Trump ahabwa n’itegeko, byatowe n’abadepite 230 kuri 427 bari bari mu nteko; mu gihe iyo kubangamira imirimo y’inteko ishinga amategeko yatowe n’abadepite 229. Aya matora asobanuye ku buryo butaziguye ko perezida Trump atakarijwe icyizere n’intumwa za rubanda cyo gukomeza kuyobora Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, nubwo urubanza rwa nyuma ruzacibwa na Sena, aho ishyaka ry’aba-Républicains  rifite ubwiganze. Umuyobozi w’aba -Républicains  muri Sena ya Amerika, Mitch McConnell, yavuze ko yifuza ko ibiganiro kuri uyu mwanzuro ukomeye byazaba bigufi. Gusa nta kigaragaza ko Sena izahitamo gukura ku buyobozi Perezida Trump kuko abasenateri benshi ari abo mu ishyaka rye. Gukuraho Perezida Trump bisa n’ibirimo amacenga menshi. Umunsi ku wundi amakuru agenda yisukiranya, agaragaza ko hari abantu benshi babyihishe inyuma, ndetse n’inzira z’ubwiru zinyurwamo ngo iki cyemezo gifatwe. Ese byatangiye bite?  Muri Nzeri uyu mwaka, nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru avuga ko umwe mu bakozi bashinzwe ubutasi, wahoze anakorera ikigo cy’ubutasi cya CIA, yagejeje ikirego ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, arega Perezida Trump gukora ibikorwa atemererwa n’amategeko. Mu kirego cye, avuga ko umwe mu bayobozi bo mu biro bya perezida [White House] wamuhaye amakuru; yari atewe impungenge n’ibyavugiwe mu kiganiro kuri telefone cyo muri Nyakanga 2019, hagati ya Perezida Donald Trump na Perezida wa Ukraine,  Volodymyr Zelensky. Muri iki kiganiro,  Perezida Trump yasabye icyo gihugu cy’amahanga kwivanga mu matora ateganyijwe mu mwaka utaha wa 2020, muri Amerika. Yanashyize igitutu ku gihugu cy’amahanga, agisaba gukora iperereza kuri umwe mu bazahangana nawe mu matora yo muri 2020; byose bigakubirwa mu cyaha cyo gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa n’itegeko nk’umukuru w’igihugu. Umwunganizi mu mategeko wa Trump, Rudolph Giuliani n’intumwa nkuru ya leta, William Barr, bashyirwa mu majwi ko bafite uruhare rutaziguye muri ibi bikorwa; ndetse ko n’abayobozi bakuru mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu bashatse gukingira ikibaba Trump kuko bazi neza uburemere bw’ibyavuzwe na Trump. Inzira iteganywa n’amategeko kugira ngo umukozi wo mu biro bishinzwe iperereza atange ikirego cy’ibikorwa biri gukorwa, kandi bitandukanye n’amategeko yarakurikijwe. Uwatanze iki kirego yakigejeje ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, uyu nawe wagombaga kukigeza ku muyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, nyuma yo gusuzuma uburemere bwacyo. Gusa umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, Joseph Maguire, ntiyigeze ashyikiriza iki kirego inteko ishinga amategeko, nkuko yabisabwaga n’amategeko; ahubwo yahisemo kugisha inama ibiro bishinzwe ubujyanama muri minisiteri y’ubutabera; ibi nabyo byanzura ko icyo atari ikibazo cyihutirwa nyamara izi mpande zombi nta na rumwe rufite ububasha bwo gufata uwo mwanzuro. Kuwa 19 Nzeri, nibwo hamenyekanye ko kudashyirwa ahagaragara kw’iki kirego, byagizwemo uruhare na perezida Trump wifuzaga ko Ukraine itangira iperereza kuri Hunter Biden, umuhungu wa Joe Biden, wo mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, wahoze ari Visi Perezida. Kutavuga rumwe kuri iki kibazo byakomeje kwiyongera, kugera ubwo kuwa 25 Nzeri, 2019, ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byemeye ko raporo ikubiyemo ibiregwa Trump n’amajwi y’ikiganiro kuri telefone hagati ya Trump na Zelensky bishyirwa ahagaragara. Kuva icyo gihe Trump n’abamushyigikiye batangiye kwamagana ibikubiye muri icyo kirego, bavuga ko bidafite agaciro kandi uwabitangaje nta bumenyi buhagije afite kubyo yaregeye. Ni iki mu by’ukuri Trump yaganiriye na Zelensky? Ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White house] byashize hanze ikiganiro Trump yagira na perezida wa Ukraine, byibwira ko bishobora kuzagaragaza neza Trump, ndetse bigahosha umwuka mubi wari utangiye kuzamuka, gusa ibi si ko byagenze. Ibyo biganiro bigaragaza ko Trump yashatse guhuza inkunga Amerika iha Ukraine, no gusaba Ukraine gukora iperereza kuri Hunter Biden; ndetse n’ubugambanyi bwabaye mu matora yo muri 2016. Zelensky wagaraje gushaka kumvikana, ahanini bitewe nuko yifuzaga ko Amerika imugurisha ibisasu bya “Javelin anti-tank missiles”, Trump yamubwiye ko Rudy Giuliani ari we muntu yizeye babiganiraho. Ni iki abagize inteko ishinga amategeko bibanzeho mu gusesengura impamvu batakariza icyizere Trump? Amakuru avuga ko Nancy Pelosi, uyobora inteko ishinga amategeko yifuzaga kumva ibirego byose bishinja Trump gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa nka perezida; gusa abademokarate bibanze ku ngingo yo gutakariza icyizere Trump bareba cyane ku kibazo cya Ukraine, aho kureba ibibazo byose bigaragaza imyitwarire idahwitse ye. Adam Schiff, uyobora akanama karebana n’ubutasi mu nteko ishinga amategeko, yagaragaje ibibazo bine bifuzaga gukoraho iperereza. Icya mbere bifuzaga kumenya niba Trump yarongeye gusaba ubufasha igihugu cy’amahanga mu kwivanga mu matora. Icya kabiri bashakaga kumenya niba ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byaremeye ko bigirana inama na Ukraine, ari uko Ukraine yemeye gutangiza iperereza mu cyimbo cya Trump. Icya gatatu, bifuzaga kumenya niba Ukraine yari ifite impamvu yo kwizera ko itazahabwa inkunga ya gisirikare, kugeza igihe  itangirije iperereza rya Trump. Icya kane, bifuzaga kumenya niba hari impamvu zifatika zateye Trump kwitwara atyo. Trump yisobanura ate? Perezida Trump n’abamushyigikiye bemeza ko nta kidasanzwe yakoze. Bemeza ko nta nta gitutu bashyizeho Ukraine ngo ibakorere ibitemewe n’amategeko. Ni iki Joe Biden ahuriyeho na Ukraine?  Dusubije amaso inyuma ubwo Joe Biden yari  Visi Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwagerageje gutera inkunga Ukraine mu makirimbirane ifitanye n’u Burusiya. Abanyaburayi na Amerika bahisemo gushaka uburyo bakuraho Viktor Shokin, wari umushinjacyaha mukuru wa Ukraine, kuko basangaga ruswa yibasiye abayobozi bakuru muri iki gihugu, ari imbogamizi mu gukomeza imbaraga za Ukraine. Viktor Shokin  yafatwaga nk’ufite uruhare runini muri icyo kibazo; yakuwe ku mwanya we, mu mavugurura yakozwe bitegetswe na Amerika n’abanyaburayi; aho Joe Biden yivugiye ko ariwe wategetse ko hafatirwa inkunga ya miliyari  imwe y’amadorari kugeza igihe Ukraine ishyize mu bikorwa icyifuzo cyabo. Hunter Biden ahurira he n’iki kibazo? Hunter yamaze igihe kinini cy’ubuzima bwe akora ubucuruzi mu izina rya se (Joe Biden). Yagiraga uruhare rutaziguye mu biganiro byari bigamije kwinjiriza inyungu ubucuruzi bwa se, ndetse akaba n’umuyobozi muri banki yaterwaga inkunga na se. Hunter Biden yahawe umwanya mu nama y’ubuyobozi y’ikigo cya Amtrak, mu buryo atari akwiye na gato; ndetse anashyirwa mu nama y’ubuyobozi y’ikigo cy’ingufu cya Ukraine [Burisma]. Ibikorwa bya Hunter byaramenyekanye cyane muri politiki y’abademokarate. Igihe yari mu Bushinwa ari kumwe na se mu ruzinduko rw’akazi; yagiranye ibiganiro n’umuyobozi wa banki ya Private Equity, aho bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru mu biro bya perezida batangiye gukeka ko ari gushaka uburyo bwo kwishakira inyungu ze bwite; ibintu bitari byarigeze bikorwa mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu. Hunter kandi ngo yari azi neza ko imyitwarire ye irebwa nk’ikibazo mu myaka yabanje, mu gihe cy’amatora.  Kwinjirira amatora ya Amerika Trump akeka ko ikigo cyitwa ‘Crowdstrike’ gifitanye umubano na Ukraine kandi ko cyahishe ububiko bw’amabanga ya komite nyobozi mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, bibye hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2016. Trump yifuzaga ko Ukraine iha Amerika ubwo bubiko bw’amabanga. ‘Crowdstrike’ ni ikigo cyo muri Amerika, cyashinzwe ku bufatanye n’umurusiya wahungiye muri Amerika akiri umwana. Iki kigo cyahawe akazi na komite nyobozi y’ishyaka ry’abademokarate kugira ngo kibafashe kumenya uburyo ubutumwa bwa bamwe mu bayobozi b’abademokarate bwinjiwemo mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2016. Trump ahangayikishijwe nuko iki kigo kitigeze giha ububiko bw’amabanga cyasesenguye FBI cyangwa undi uwo ariwe wese, nyamara muri Ukraine nta hantu ho guhisha ubwo bubiko bw’amabanga hahari, kandi nta n’impamvu ifatika yatuma babuhisha. Trump atsimbarara ku ngingo ivuga ko u Burusiya butigeze bwinjira mu mabanga y’abademokarate; ahubwo ari ibinyoma byahimbwe n’ikigo ‘Crowdstrike’ kuko aricyo cyahishe ibimenyetso mu rwego rwo guhimbira ibyaha ubutegetsi bwe n’u Burusiya. Gutakariza icyizere Perezida bikorwa bite? Hifashishijwe ingero kuri Nixon na Clinton baheruka kweguzwa, komite ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko mu nteko nshingamategeko niyo igira uruhare runini muri iki gikorwa. Iyi komite yumva abatangabuhamya, igategura ibirego irega perezida mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko, n’ingingo zijyana nabyo, igakora amatora, byakwemezwa bikoherezwa mu nteko rusange y’abagize inteko nshingamategeko bagakora amatora nabo, ingingo imwe cyangwa zose zatorwa ku bwiganze, Perezida agatakarizwa ikizere. Kuri perezida Trump we, ikibazo cye cyanyuze mu nzira ebyiri mu gihe kimwe, aho urwego rw’ubutasi rwakoze iby’ibanze, rukora raporo ruyoherereza komite ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko, ari nayo yateguye ibirego bishinjwa Trump. Nyuma y’ibyemejwe n’abagize inteko nshingamategeko umutwe w’abadepite, umutwe wa Sena niwo uzaca urubanza rwa nyuma rwemeza niba Trump yeguzwa cyangwa agakomeza kuyobora Amerika. Mu rubanza rwa Sena, uhagarariye perezida mu mategeko niwe uburana kuko perezida ubwe ntagomba kuba ari muri icyo cyumba cy’iburanisha. Perezida w’urukiko rw’ikirenga niwe ugena uburyo icyemezo cya Sena gishyirwa mu bikorwa, ariko Sena nayo ishobora gutora ivuguruza icyemezo cye. Kugira ngo kandi icyemezo cya Sena gitorwe, bisaba ko 2/3 by’abasenateri bacyemeza (aba-senateri 67 ku 100). Sena ya Amerika irimo aba-senateri 53 bo mu ishyaka ry’aba-Repubulikani, bisobanuye ko kugira ngo Trump akurwe ku buyobozi, 20 muri bo basabwa gutora bihuje n’abademokarate. Trump akuwe ku buyobozi byagenda bite? Itegeko rivuga ko perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akuweho, asimburwa na visi perezida; Ubu Mike Pence niwe wasimbura Trump. Igihe baba baviriyeho rimwe, umukuru w’inteko nshingamategeko Nancy Pelosi niwe wayobora; gusa bisa n’ibidashoboka kuko aba-republicains ntibiteguye gukora icyatuma Pelosi ahabwa umwanya wa perezida. Uza ku mwanya wa kane mu rukurikirane rw’abasimbura Trump ni Mike Pompeo, umunyabanga wa leta; gusa uyu nawe afite aho ahuriye n’ibibazo bya Ukraine. Uwa gatanu ni ushinzwe imari ya leta Steven Mnuchin, ari nawe udafite imbogamizi n’imwe yamubuza kuba perezida wa Amerika.

title: Bwa mbere mu mateka uwatorewe kuba Miss America agiye kumarana ikamba imyaka ibiri
content: Mu itangazo ryashyizwe hanze n’abategura iri rushanwa bavuze ko iri iryo mu 2021 ryasubitswe kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19. Uyu mukobwa yabwiye ikinyamakuru People ko gukora muri ibi bihe kuri we bigoye, kuko hari byinshi asabwa gukorera kuri internet. Ati “Iki kintu ntabwo Miss America yari yarigeze ihura nacyo, ni ikigo kimaze imyaka irenga ijana none ninjye wa mbere ibintu nk’ibi bibayeho. Ni gute nabyakira, ni gute nzahangana no gushyira mu bikorwa ibintu nakoreraga ahantu hatandukanye noneho nkabikora nifashishije Internet?” Camille Schrier, usanzwe ari inzobere mu butabire ni we wambitswe ikamba rya 99 rya Miss America 2020 nyuma yo gutungurana akagaragara mu cyumba cyaberagamo irushanwa avangavanga ibinyabutabire bitandukanye muri ‘laboratoire’. Uyu mukobwa w’imyaka 24 y’amavuko muri Miss America 2020 yageze imbere y’Akanama Nkemurampaka yambaye umwambaro w’abakora muri laboratoire avangavanga bimwe mu byo yari yitwaje harimo na ‘Hydrogen peroxide’. Ndetse biza no kuba kimwe mu bintu bikomeye byatumye yambikwa ikamba rya Miss America 2020.

title: Dore ibimenyetso 6 byakwereka ko umukobwa mu kundana bizarangira abaye umugore wawe
content: Igihe bibaye ngombwa ko umuntu ashaka gukora ubukwe agomba guhitamo neza.Ni ingenzi kugira imyanzuro y’ukuri n’ubwo ikintu mubuzima kitamera neza nk’uko umuntu aba abyifuza, ariko hari ibimenyetso bishobora ku kwereka wowe mugabo uko wagerageza guhitamo umugore w’ukuri mushobora kuzarambana. Ni iby’ingenzi ko wamenya umwanzuro wanyuma kugira ngo ushakane n’umukobwa wifuza. Ariko ibyo bimenyetso bishobora gutuma gahunda yo guhitamo ikorohera nk’uko ubyifuza. Ibimenyetso 6 bishobora ku kwereka umukobwa wahitamo gushakana nawe mukazabana ubuzira herezo 1.Umukobwa ukubona akakwishimira Iyo akwishimira bya nyabyo ndetse akakuvugaho ari kumwe n’inshuti ze cyangwa abo bakorana n’abandi,uwo aba ashobora kuba umugore waba wifuza kuba washaka.Iyo atekereza ko uri umugabo w’agatangaza kuburyo abandi bagore bakwifuza, ibyo nawe bituma uhita ufata umwanzuro wo gushakana nawe. 2.Yicisha bugufi imbere y’inshuti zawe Inshuti z’umugabo ni ingenzi mu buzima bwe bwa buri munsi kandi buri mugabo ashaka umugore wumvikana n’inshuti ze kuko nacyo ni ingenzi mu buzima.Iyo yishimira uko ubanye n’inshuti zawe ndetse agakunda ku kwisanzuraho akabikora n’igihe muri kumwe n’inshuti zawe.ibyo nabyo bishobora gutuma ufata umwanzuro. 3.Abaho mu buzima bwe Aha uyu mukobwa yiyumvisha ko buri kintu cyose atagicyenera ngo agutege amaboko ko ukimuha kandi yumva ko mwembi mushobora kubana neza ari uko yifitiye ibintu bye ntacyo agucyeneraho nawe kandi ukaba ufite ibyawe.Ikindi yumva ko ahubwo aho kugirango n’utwo wari ufite aho kugira ngo atukunyage yagufasha kugera ku ndoto zawe ndetse nawe akaba yakwigeza kubyo yiyemeje.Ibyo nabyo bishobora gutuma ufata umwanzuro wokumushaka kandi mukazarambana. 4.Uramukumbura iyo mutari kumwe Iyo umukobwa mutari kumwe,wumva ubuze amahoro ahubwo ukamutekerezaho.Agaragara nk’uwa kwinjiye mu bitekerezo utiriwe unamutekerezaho cyane ukumva uramukumbuye gusa.Iyo utekereza muri ubu buryo biba byoroshye gufata umwanzuro wo kumushaka. 5.Buri muntu yitangira undi Iyo umugore adashobora ku kwitangira,nawe ntabwo wamwitangira.Sinzi niba umugore uteye gutya wamushaka ngo agire icyo yakugezaho.Kugira ngo ubukwe bubeho ni uko hagomba kubaho kwitanga.Bityo iyo umukobwa akwitangira nawe ushobora ku mwitangira,noneho icyo gishobora gutuma ufata umwanzuro wo kumugira umugore wawe w’iteka ryose. 6.Aba ari umufana wawe wambere Aho uri hose aba yifuza kuhaba,akumva yakurwanirira aho bibaye ngombwa ndetse ntabwo atekereza kuba yagusiga wenyine mu bihe bigoye,mbese aguhora hafi no mubihe bigoye akwizirikaho atekereza ko uzabivamo bitewe n’uko akuri hafi.iyo ubonye ko ari umufana wawe w’imena bitewe n’ibyo agukorera byo kukuba hafi bishobora gutuma ufata umwanzuro wo kubana nawe. Ibi bimenyetso byose twavuze haruguru bishobora gutuma ufata umwanzuro wo gutuma ubuzima bwawe bwose ubumarana n’uwo mwari.Ariko icyo ushobora kumenya ni uko uwo mwanzuro Atari buri mugabo wese washobora kuwufata ahubutse. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Mbonyi Islael yerekeje muri Kenya nyuma ya Groove Awards
content:
Islael Mbonyi kuri ubu arimo kubarizwa mu gihugu cya Kenya aho agiye gufatanya n’Abakristo bo mu mu murwa mukuru w’Iki gihugu  I Nairobi kwizihiza Noheli  nziza n’Umwaka mushya muhire bahimbaza Imana mu ndirimbo. Ni mu gitarmo cyateguwe n’Urubyiruko rwo muri uyu mujyi wa Nairobi rwibumbiye mu kitwa “Kefa Generation”, Umuhanzi w’injyana zihimbaza Imana  uherutse gutwara ibihembo bitari bikeya muri Groove Awards ndetse akaba ari nawe wahawe igihembo cy’umuhanzi w’Umwaka mu bagabo ndetse akaba n’Umwanditsi mwiza w’umwaka . muri zimwe mu ndirimbo ze zatumye agera kuri ibi byose nk’iyitwa  “kumigezi, ndanyuzwe, agasambi, ndetse yaje gushyira hanze alubm yitwa Uri Number  One".


 Igitaramo kizagaragaramo Mbonyi Islael umuhanzi umaze kwigaragaza hono mu Rwanda ko ashoboye ibyo akora  Kur’ubu uyu  Mbonyi Islael  akaba yaragiye muri Kenya kwifatanya na Kefa Generation urubyiruko rwashyize imbaraga hamwe mukubaka umurimo w’Imana, aho bagenda bafasha abantu gutegura ibirori byabo" Kefa generation hamwe na israel mbonyi" mu gitaramo  bise Christmas Celebration, ni kucyumweru mu mujyi wa Nairobi ahitwa Kayole Calvale Convenant Center, itegerejwe nabenshi nk’uko tubitangarizwa n’Abanyarwanda batuye muri Kenya.


 Urubyiruko rwo muri Kenya rwibumbiye mu kitwa Kefa Generation  Urubyiruko abahungu n’abakobwa nibo bishyize hamwe bategura iki gikorwa cyiza doreko aribwo bagitangira, ariko bizeye ko bazagera kure nk’uko  Mbana Eugene na Mwungeri Patrice babidutangarije ubwo batugezagaho amakuru y’iki gitaramo , biteganyijweko azahagera kuwa 6, hanyuma concert ibe kucyumweru bitangire saa 3h00 kugeza saa 7h z’umugoroba , Ku itariki 20 Ukuboza.
 Kanda hano wumve indirimbo ya Mbonyi Islael "Kumigezi"  Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: 50Cent yibasiwe n’uwahoze ari umukunzi we ndetse ashyira amabanga ye yose ahagaragara
content:
Tompkins Shaniqua wahoze ari umukunzi wa 50 Cent ndetse bakaba banafitanye n’umwana yakomoje ku makimbirane bafitanye hanyuma nawe agaragaza ukuri ku iraswa rya 50Cent  ndetse amanyomoza  ibyatangajwe n’uyu muhanzi ko yarashwe inshuro 9 zose urufaya rw’amasasu atangaza ko ari inshuro 5 zonyine uyu muhanzi yarashwe.


Umuryango wabo wamaranye igihe kinini none uyu ni umunsi wo gushyira hanze amabanga yabo yose Hashize iminsi umuhanzi 50Cent ashyize ku mbuga nkoranya mbaga ifoto ye n’umuhungu we Marquise agaragaza ko  kuba maman yarataye uyu mwana nawe agomba kumwanga mu magambo yagiraga ati:Uyu muhungu agomba kwanga maman umubyara igihe cyose azajya atekereza kubyo nyina yamukoreye ndetse ibi azabikora ku giti cye nk’uko nange nabikoze (namwanze). Ibi rero byatumye uyuwahoze ari umukunzi wa 50Cent agira icyo atangaza mu rwego rwo gusubiza uyu mugabo we nawe yahise yandika ku nkoranyambaga ye ati:
