title: Ubukwe bwa Mukaperezida n’umusore arusha imyaka 27 bwatashye, ikinege cye kitabishaka -AMAFOTO
content:
Ubukwe bwa Mukaperezida Clotilde w’imyaka 48 na Kwizera Evariste w’imyaka 21 bwavuzweho byinshi bwashyize burataha, kuri uyu wa Kane basezerana imbere y’amategeko mu Murenge wa Musha, mu Karere ka Rwamagana. Ni ubukwe bwatashywe n’imbaga y’abantu barimo abaturutse hirya no hino bagiye kwihera ijisho abageni, bamwe bakajujura ko bagiye kubana ku mpamvu zirenze urukundo rusanzwe. Kwizera yazamuye ukuboko atewe ishema no kuba Mukaperezida amubereye umugore imbere y’amategeko. Mukaperezida nta kuzuyaza yazamuye ukuboko, mu ijwi rituje yemeza ko Kwizera amubera umugabo nk’uko amategeko abiteganya. Uyu mugore utuye mu murenge wa Gishali muri Rwamagana akora akazi ko kuvura yifashishije imiti ya Kinyarwanda. Ni akazi yakuyemo ibipangu bibiri birimo icyo abanamo na Kwizera n’ikindi akoreramo ahazwi nko kwa Karangara. Kwizera Evariste we nibwo akirangiza amashuri yisumbuye, aracyari ku rugerero. Ngo nyuma yo gusezerana, ateganya kwiga Kaminuza akabifatanya no kwita ku mugore we. Ubukwe bwagezwe intorezo n’umwana wa Mukaperezida… Nk’uko bigenda mu gusezerana mu mategeko, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Musha, Muhoza Théogene, mbere yo gusezeranya Kwizera na Mukaperezida yabanje kubaza niba nta muntu ufite impamvu zatuma bombi badashyingiranywa. Umukobwa w’ikinege wa Mukaperezida witwa Uwamariya Francine, washatse ubu ufite abana babiri, yahise azamura ukuboko, ajya imbere avuga ko ku myaka 31 afite atakwemera ko umusore w’umwana ajya kuvimvira mu mitungo se yaruhiye.
Ati "Impamvu ntifuza ko bavanga umutungo ni uko nibawuvanga bizatuma banavanga umutungo wa Data kandi batabyemerewe." Mukaperezida wahise afatwa n’ikiniga, ahawe umwanya yemera ko uwo mwana ari uwe ariko ko atumva impamvu adashaka ko asoza urugendo rw’urukundo yatangiye mu mahoro. Yavuze ko yarihiye umukobwa we amashuri akamuha n’inzu, akamushakira akazi ndetse akamuha inka n’ibibanza bibiri. Ati "Siniyumvisha impamvu umwana wanjye watambamira ko nshakana n’uwo nakunze kuko n’abaturanyi barabizi, umutungo mfite ni uwo nishakiye ntabwo nigeze nsezerana na Se w’uyu mwana.” Hifashishijwe igitabo cy’amategeko, Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa yahise avuga ko ibyatambamira ugushakana ari ibintu bibiri; Icya mbere ni ukubura kwa kimwe mu bisabwa byerekeye ugushyingirwa, icya kabiri ni imiziro yerekeye ugushyingirwa. Yahise atesha agaciro ubusabe bwa Uwamariya kuko bamutumye ibimenyetso byerekana ko koko imitungo yose Mukaperezida afite ari iya Se akabibura. Ibirori bihumuje ubwo Kwizera na Mukaperezida bari imbere y’imbaga, benshi batunguwe no kubona bombi basomana umunwa ku wundi. Mu kiganiro gito na IGIHE, umwe mu babyeyi ba Kwizera bavuze ko ashyigikiye umwana we kuko yujuje imyaka y’ubukure, bityo bagomba kumwubahira icyo yahisemo. Ati "Kuva kera na kare iyo umwana wawe yujuje imyaka y’ubukure, iyo afashe icyemezo ugomba kukimwubahira kuko aba azi impamvu yagifashe, natwe ntabwo twatambamira urukundo rwabo kuko bose barakuze, ikindi kuba barahuje icyemezo cyo kubana ni uko babyumvikanye neza." Umwe mu batashye ubu bukwe yavuze ko yahurujwe n’ikinyuranyo cy’imyaka ya Kwizera na Mukaperezida ndetse yumvaga Leta idashobora kubasezeranya. Amafoto yaranze uyu muhango




Bari bashyigikiwe



Umukobwa w’ikinege wa Mukaperezida yagerageje kudobya ubukwe, ariko abura ingingo yisunga

Basezernye ivangamutungo rusange

Aha basomanaga byimbitse bishimira intambwe bateye

Mukaperezida yari yishimye nubwo umukobwa we yabanje kubizambya

Ubu ni umugabo n’umugore mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko Inkuru ya IGIHE

title: Ancel yasobanuye uko Ingabo z’u Bufaransa zasabwe gusenya ibirindiro bya FPR  mu 1994 ngo idafata Kigali
content: Ancel ni umwe mu basirikare 2500 boherejwe  mu Rwanda tariki 22 Kamena 1994, mu cyiswe Opération Turquoise bafite inshingano zo guhagarika Jenoside no gushyiraho igice kizwi nka Zone Turquoise mu Burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda kitagombaga kurangwamo imirwano. Tariki 29 Gicurasi uyu mwaka, mu Ishuri Rikuru ryo mu Bufaransa ryigisha ubumenyi rusange, EHESS, ishami ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu habereye ibiganiro bigamije kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994. Mu bari batumiwe muri ibyo biganiro, harimo Rtd Lieutenant Colonel Guillaume Ancel, ni umwanditsi w’ibitabo birimo icyitwa, Rwanda, la fin du silence. Yavuze ko ubwo boherezwaga mu Rwanda muri Opération Turquoise, ibyo bari bagiye gukora babisobanuriwe habura amasaha abiri gusa ngo bahaguruke. Mu byo yasobanuriwe, yaje kumenya ko u Bufaransa bufite uruhare mu ntambara yari imaze imyaka ine iri mu Rwanda, hagati y’Ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi n’iza Leta y’u Rwanda. Yavuze ko Ingabo z’u Bufaransa zari mu Rwanda zagiye zigira uruhare mu bitero bigamije gusenya ibirindiro bya FPR Inkotanyi, bukanafasha Leta mu bikorwa yari irimo byo kurimbura abatutsi. Guillaume Ancel w’imyaka 53, avuga ko ubwoko bw’intwaro bahagurukanye mu Bufaransa bazanye mu Rwanda, zabagaragazaga ko baje mu ntambara aho gutabara abaturage nkuko ubutumwa bari bajemo bwavugaga. Nk’Ingabo zirwanira ku butaka zarimo abakomando bo muri (RPIMa) Regiment Parachutistes d’Infanterie de Marine, bafite intwaro zirasa hafi ndetse na kure harimo n’izikoreshwa mu ijoro, abarwanisha ibifaru n’abandi benshi bafite indege z’intambara za kajugujugu 10 bita Gazelle n’izindi eshatu za Super-Puma. Ingabo zirwanira mu kirere zari zifite indege zirenga 30 harimo za C-130 Hercules, Falcon -20, C-160 TRANSALL na CASA-235. Ingabo zo mu kirere kandi zakodesheje indege imwe ya Airbus, Boing 747 imwe, Antonov-124 Condor cumi na ziriindwi (17) zo gutwara ibikoresho bya gisirikare. Yavuze ko ubwo bageraga i Goma muri Zaïre (Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo y’ubu), bari bahawe amabwiriza yo kurinda Umujyi wa Kigali ngo utava mu maboko ya Leta yakoraga Jenoside ukajya mu maboko ya FPR yari mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu. Mu buryo butunguranye, Ancel avuga ko amabwiriza yahindutse ku munota wa nyuma bagasabwa kurasa ku birindiro by’ingabo za FPR kugira ngo bayihagarike idakomeza gufata uduce dutandukanye tw’igihugu. Ubwo bageraga mu Bisesero, kamwe mu duce twari muri Zone Turquoise, Ancel avuga ko batunguwe no kubona Leta bashyigikiriye ariyo iri kwiyicira abaturage, aho ibihumbi bisaga 60 by’abatutsi byari bimaze kwicwa. Ngo aho niho bongeye guhererwa amabwiriza mashya, basabwa guhagarika imirwano ahubwo bakajya mu bikorwa by’ubutabazi. Ikinyamakuru Esprit cyatangaje ko mu buhamya bwe yakomeje avuga ko nubwo kari agace k’ubutabazi, kanabaye aka politiki kuko bahafashirije Ingabo za Leta yari imaze gukora Jenoside zigahunga nta nkomyi zigana muri Zaïre, ndetse bakabaherekeza bakabagezayo amahoro. Guillaume Ancel mu buhamya yatanze, yanavuze ko we ubwe ari umwe mu basirikare b’u Bufaransa batanze intwaro ku Ngabo za Leta yari imaze gukora Jenoside ubwo  yari mu buhungiro muri Zaïre. Ubusanzwe amategeko mpuzamahanga ntabwo yemera ko impunzi zijya mu kindi gihugu zifite intwaro cyangwa se ngo zihabwe intwaro. Iryo tegeko ryo gufasha Leta yakoze Jenoside mu buhungiro ngo ryatanzwe n’Ibiro bya Perezida François Mitterrand, nyuma yo kwemezwa n’ibiro by’umugaba mukuru w’ingabo. Ancel avuga ko ntaho u Bufaransa bushobora guhungira uruhare rwabwo muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, mu gihe bwashyigikiye ku mugaragaro, bugakingira bukanatanga intwaro kuri Leta yakoze Jenoside. Yavuze ko bibabaje kuba Ingabo z’u Bufaransa nta ruhare zihabwa mu biganiro bya politiki, nko kuba zakwemera gukora ikintu cyangwa zikacyanga bitewe n’uko  zisanzwe bimeze, nkuko bigenda ku ngabo zo mu Bwongereza. Yavuze ko kandi impamvu Leta y’u Bufaransa yakoze ibyo ishaka mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ari uko nta batavuga rumwe na Leta bigenga bari bahari icyo gihe ngo babyamagane. Ashimangira ko gukomeza kuzinzika amateka ngo atajya ahagaragara, ari amakosa akomeye u Bufaransa bukora ashobora no gutuma ibyabaye byongera bikaba. Muri Mata  uyu mwaka, Perezida w’u Bufaransa, Emmanuel Macron, yatangaje ishyirwaho rya komisiyo igizwe n’abahanga mu mateka n’abashakashatsi, izasesengura inyandiko icyo gihugu kibitse zigaragaza ibikorwa byacyo mu Rwanda hagati ya 1990-1994, ngo hashyirwe ahabona ukuri ku ruhare rwacyo muri Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi. Guillaume Ancel yagaragaje ko icyo gitekerezo ari cyiza ariko gishobora kubangamirwa n’abahoze mu buyobozi bw’u Bufaransa nka Amiral Jacques  Lanxade wari umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo z’u Bufaransa mu gihe cye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Lanxade aherutse kuvuga ko abashakashatsi mu mateka nta gishya bazabona mu nyandiko z’umubano w’u Bufaransa n’u Rwanda mbere no mu gihe cya Jenoside. Nubwo ingabo za FPR zagiye zitambikwa n’Ingabo z’u Bufaransa zafashaga Leta yakoze Jenoside, ntabwo byabujije ko Umujyi wa Kigali ubohorwa tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 1994. Ingabo za FPR zakomeje urugamba mu tundi duce tutari twagafashwe, zirusoza tariki 18 Nyakanga uduce twose tw’igihugu tumaze kwamburwa Guverinoma yakoze Jenoside.

title: Assiel, izina ry’umuhungu w’umunyamahoro
content: Izina Assiel rigaragara no mu Giheburayo “Asiel” aho risomwa “AH-Z-iy-eh-L” bikaba bisobanura ngo “Icyaremwe n’Imana.” Assiel mu zindi ndimi ryandikwa nka Asiel, Cassiel,  Chasiel, Hasiel, Hassiel, Jaasiel na Jansiel.  	Ibiranga ba Assiel Ba Assiel ni abanyembaraga kandi bakunda gukora ubushakashatsi ku bintu bitandukanye. Bafite  ubuhanga mu gutegura ibintu kandi bikagenda neza. Ni abantu bumva batuzuye iyo nta muntu basangira urukundo, ibyo bungutse n’imikorere. Ni abanyamahoro muri kamere yabo, bakunda ukuri n’ubutabera. Ba Assiel bagaragara nk’abagira isoni mu bandi kandi barihangana. Bita ku kumenya impamvu y’ibyo bashaka n’impamvu ibatera kubirarikira. Bakunda gutembera, ubwisanzure, kwinezeza no gusabana n’abandi. Ni abanyabwenge ndetse bashobora guhanga udushya ariko bagorwa no gukoresha neza amafaranga. Hari ibihangange ku Isi bikoresha izina rya Assiel harimo umukinnyi wa filime Asiel Rodriguez Perez; Asiel Kneeland wamamaye mu kwambika abakinnyi ba filime na Asiel Norton wandika filime akaba yaragiye atsindira n’ibihembo bitandukanye.

title: Kwibuka26: Amb. Yasmin Amri Sued yasabye urubyiruko kurushaho gukurikirana amateka y’u Rwanda
content: Ni ubutumwa, Amb. Yasmin Amri Sued yahaye urubyiruko rwitabiriye umuhango wo Kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi wabereye muri Koreye y’Epfo, ku cyumweru tariki 12 Mata 2020, witabiriwe n’abanyarwanda baba muri icyo gihugu n’abo muri Cambodia bose hamwe bagera kuri 78. Nyuma yo guhurizwa ku ikoranabuhanga kuko guhurira hamwe bitashobokaga kubera COVID-19, ibiganiro byatangijwe n’umunota wo Kwibuka. Umuyobozi w’Umuryango w’Abanyarwanda baba muri Koreya y’Epfo, Abdul Karim Uzabakiriho, yavuze ko hakiri ikibazo cy’abakoze Jenoside bakidegembya kandi bakomeje gukwirakwiza ubutumwa bw’urwango. Yavuze ko Imiryango mpuzamahanga irimo Umuryamgo w’abibumbye, Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi, Umuryango uharanira ubufatanye mu bukungu n’Iterambere (OECD), n’indi ifite inshingano zo gufatanya na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda n’abanyarwanda kurwanya ibyo bikorwa bibi. Mu buhamya Alex Rugamba, wacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside akaba asoje amasomo muri kaminuza ya Konkuk, yavuze ko yari afite imyaka itandatu y’amavuko mu 1994 ubwo Jenoside yakorwaga, aho yabonye Se n’abavandimwe batandatu bicwa n’Interahamwe. Yasangije abandi amateka y’inzira ikomeye yanyuzemo kugeza ubwo ingazo za RPA zihagaritse Jenoside akarokoka. Rugamba yashimiye Guverinoma y’u Rwanda kuri gahunda yashyizeho zo gufasha abarokotse Jenoside, agaruka ku Kigega cya FARG, kinyuzwamo ubufasha burimo; kubakira amacumbi abarokotse, kwishyurira abana amashuri, gutanga ubuvuzi, Girinka ku barokotse n’izindi.  Amb. Yasmin Amri Sued u Rwanda rwafashe igihe cyo kumva imizi y’icyateye Jenoside no gusesengura ibikorwa biganisha kuri Jenoside asaba urubyiruko kwihatira kubimenya. Ati “Rubyiruko rw’u Rwanda ndabasaba ngo mushyireho, mubyumve, munabisangizanye mumenye amateka yacu. Ni mwe musingi wo kugira ngo ibyabaye mu myaka 26 ishize bitazongera kubaho mu Rwanda n’ahandi ku Isi.” Abahagarariye inyungu z’ibuhugu byabo muri Koreya y’Epfo, bifatanyije n’abanyarwanda batanga ubutumwa butandukanye. Ambasaderi Hazem Fahmy uhagarariye Misiri i Seoul, yifurije Abanyarwanda amahoro n’uburumbuke. Ambasaderi Sylvestre Kouassi Bile wa Côte d’Ivoire, ashimangira ko urumuri rw’icyizere rugomba guhora rwaka kugira ngo Jenoside itazongera mu Rwanda n’ahandi ku Isi. Amb. Matilda Masuka wa Tanzania, we yagize ati “Twifatanyije n’abavandimwe b’abanyarwanda kuvuga ngo ‘Ntibizongere kubaho ukundi’. Mu gihe dukomeje kubaka ibihugu byacu, tuzi ko ntacyo twageraho tudafatanyije ibyo Perezida Kagame yabyerekanye mu bikorwa bye.” Hari kandi Ambasaderi Shiferaw Shigute Wolassa wa Ethiopia, washimye ibyo abanyarwanda n’abayobozi barwo bagezeho nyuma y’amateka mabi ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.

title: Bumva ko kugira ngo babemere bavuga nabi u Rwanda – Biruta avuga kuri Muzito
content: Byagarutsweho mu kiganiro cya mbere Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, yagiranye n’itangazamakuru kuva mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo yajyaga kuri uyu mwanya. Ni ikiganiro cyagarutse ku ngingo zitandukanye zigaruka ku mubano w’u Rwanda n’ibihugu byo mu karere ndetse hagaragazwa n’ibyakozwe mu mwaka ushize. Minisitiri Biruta yabajijwe ku mvugo y’abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC ko igihugu cyabo kidashobora kubona amahoro “tudateye u Rwanda, byaba ngombwa tukarufata.” Byavuzwe na Adolphe Muzito wigeze kuba Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) ubu akaba ari Umuhuzabikorwa w’Impuzamashyaka itavuga rumwe na Leta muri icyo gihugu yitwa Lamuka. Ni imvugo yakongeje uburakari mu banyarwanda batandukanye ndetse abandi bayobozi ba Lamuka barimo Jean Pierre Bemba na Moïse Katumbi, bitandukanya na we ku ku ikubitiro, banamusaba kwisubiraho ku ijambo yavuze. Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko imvugo z’abanyapolitiki bamwe bo muri RDC ku Rwanda zibabaje kuko ahanini n’ibyo bavuga ari ibintu biba bidafite inshingiro. Ati “Ni ibintu bibabaje, wakwiteguye ko ibyo bavuga biba bifite icyo bafite gifatika ariko nta gihari. Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere bene ibi bibazo bibaho, hashize igihe hari abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC bumva ko kugira ngo abaturage babo babemere ari uko bavuga nabi u Rwanda.” Biruta yavuze ko ibyavuzwe n’aba banyapolitiki ndetse na bamwe mu bo muri Kiliziya Gatolika  bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda na RDC. Yavuze ko ubu RwandAir yatangiye gukora ingendo muri RDC, ko ndetse ingabo z’iki gihugu ziri mu bikorwa byo guhashya imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda ibarizwa mu Burasirazuba bw’igihugu. Ati “Bavuge ibyo babonye, biriya ntabwo bizabura kandi n’igihe kizerekana ko ntaho byari bishingiye.” Minisitiri Dr Biruta yashimye uruhare rw’ubuyobozi bwa RDC mu guhashya imitwe yitwaje intwaro ibarizwa mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC irimo na bamwe mu bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Yavuze ko u Rwanda rumaze kwakira abantu 1919 bari mu mashyamba ya Congo aho ingabo za RDC zagabye ibitero ku mitwe yitwaje intwaro. Abo batahutse hacumbikiwe mu nkambi ya Nyarushishi. Abarwanyi 562 nabo bagaruwe mu Rwanda, aho ubu bari kwigishwa kugira ngo babe basubira mu buzima busanzwe. Ati  “Ingabo za RDC zakoze ibikorwa byiza, zishe benshi muri abo harimo n’abayobozi b’utwo dutsiko.” U Rwanda na RDC bifitanye umubano mwiza cyane cyane nyuma y’aho Felix Tshisekedi atorewe kuyobora icyo gihugu, akavuga ko arajwe ishinga no kubana neza n’ibihugu by’ibituranyi. Amafoto: Niyonzima Moise

title: Abagana Cogebanque banyuzwe na serivisi z’imari bagezwaho hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga
content: Muri iyi minsi Isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus, buri wese kuva ku boroheje n’abakomeye bifashishije ikoranabuhanga mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ryacyo. Imikoreshereze y’ikoranabuhanga ntiyasize urwego rw’imari kuko serivisi nyinshi zatanzwe ariryo ryifashishijwe. Usibye ubwirinzi bwa Coronavirus, kwifashisha ikoranabuhanga mu guhererekanya amafaranga binagabanya ikiguzi cyo kuyabungabunga, igihe cyatakazwaga mu ngendo no gutonda imirongo kuri banki kigakoreshwa mu bindi bibyara inyungu. Banki Nyarwanda y’Ubucuruzi, Cogebanque Plc, iri mu zatanze umusanzu wazo mu gufasha abayigana kubona serivisi z’imari ku buryo bworoshye kandi mu bihe byose hifashshijwe ikoranabuhanga Mu kwezi gushize mu gihe abaturarwanda batari bemerewe kuva mu rugo, benshi bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga mu gushaka serivisi zitandukanye nko guhaha bifashishije internet, kwishyura, guhererekanya amafaranga n’ibindi. Abakiliya ba Cogebanque Plc babwiye IGIHE ko bayigannye kuko ari banki ibegera, ikanabagira inama, ndetse ikabagezaho serivisi z’imari mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga rigezweho. Nkubana Alphonse umaze imyaka 10 akorana na Cogebanque yashimye uko mu gihe cya Guma mu rugo yafashijwe kubona serivisi nta nkomyi. Yagize ati “Coronavirus ikihagera, twahise twinjira muri Internet Banking aho kwishyura hagati yacu, kugura ibicuruzwa byabaga byoroshye. Serivisi zari nziza, abakozi bakora neza. Twabahamagaraga saa Sita z’ijoro ku buryo hari aho bataryamaga.’’ Nkubana ukorana n’Ishami rya Cogebanque Plc rya CHIC, yavuze ko iryo koranabuhanga ryamunyuze kuko "abenshi twarikoreshaga mu kohererezanya amafaranga kandi aho udasobanukiwe bakagufasha." Avuga ko ikoranabuhanga ryifashishwa ritanga umutekano kuko utaba ufite impungenge zo kugendana amafaranga mu ntoki. Ati “Iyo wishyuriye umuntu mu ikoranabuhanga haba hari gihamya ko wishyuye kandi birihuta.’’  	Barambitse sheki, bayoboka ikoranabuhanga! Butwatwa Paul na we yayobotse ikoranabuhanga muri serivisi z’imari mu gihe mbere yakoreshaga sheki mu kwishyurana. Yagize ati “Nagiye muri serivisi ya ‘Mobile Wallet’ wagereranya no kugira banki mu biganza byawe igihe cyose, kubera ibya COVID-19. Mbere nakoreshaga sheki cyangwa nkagendana amafaranga. Ubu njya Rutsiro cyangwa Nyagatare, nkishyura abakozi nta kibazo nkoresheje Mobile Wallet ya Cogebanque.’’ Usibye kuba ingano y’amafaranga ushobora kubikuza ukoresheje sheki yaragabanyijwe, binatanga umutekano w’amafaranga ahererekanywa. Uyu rwiyemezamirimo ukora mu by’ubwubatsi umaze imyaka umunani akorana na Cogebanque, yashimangiye ko abo bakorana babyumvise kuko ‘ubu biroroshye kwishyura umukozi ukamuha amafaranga kuri Mobile Money.’ Yakomeje ati “Gukorana n’ikoranabuhanga ni byiza, tugomba kubimenyera tukabijyamo. Gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ni ingenzi kuko bikemura ibibazo, bitagusabye kugendagenda.’’ Cogebanque Plc imaze imyaka isaga 20 itanga serivisi z’imari, yifashisha ikoranabuhanga mu zirimo izo kwakira no kohereza amafaranga, kureba amakuru ya konti no kuyabika kubitsa no kubikuza, kureba amafaranga ufite kuri konti, kwishyura imisoro, agaciro k’ifaranga ku isoko ry’ivunjisha, amafaranga yoherezwa hifashishijwe Mobile Money n’izindi. Umuyobozi ushinzwe Serivisi z’Ikoranabuhanga muri Cogebanque Plc, Yvon Gilbert Nishimwe, yavuze ko byagaragaye ko buri wese ashobora gukoresha ikoranabuhanga akabona serivisi za banki aho ari hose ku buryo bwihuse, bworoshye kandi buhendutse. Yagize ati “Twakiriye abantu benshi batugana basaba gukoresha ikoranabuhanga muri serivisi za banki. Byadufashije mu bukangurambaga bwo kubwira abakiliya ibyiza biri mu guhererekanya amafaranga binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga.’’ Yagaragaje ko ari uburyo bwizewe kandi butanga umusaruro ku mutekano w’amafaranga. Ati “Nta mpungenge umucuruzi ashobora kugira kuko umutekano w’amafaranga ye uba wizewe. Bigabanya igihe yamaraga agana kuri banki kuko ashobora kubikorera iwe mu rugo, uwo mwanya akawukoramo ibindi.’’ Cogebanque Plc ifite amashami 28 mu gihugu hose. Ifite ibyuma bya ATM 36, abayihagarariye (agents) barenga 600 bayifasha gutanga serivisi zo gufunguza konti, kubitsa no kubikuza, kohereza amafaranga n’izindi serivisi zirimo n’izifashisha ikoranabuhanga; Internet Banking; Mobile Banking (*505# na Coge mBank); ikarita ya Smart cash ifasha kwishyura no kubikuza mu Rwanda n’amakarita ya MasterCard (Debit, Credit na Prepaid) afasha abayakoresha kwishyura no kubikuza ahantu harenga miliyoni 36 ku Isi. U Rwanda rwihaye intego ko mu 2024, amafaranga abarirwa ku kigero cya 80 % y’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu azahererekanywa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, avuye kuri 34.6% mu 2019. Amafoto: Muhizi Serge

title: Inkuru ndende y’urukundo “Amaherezo” igice 22
content: Akenshi mu rukundo habamo ibyishimo bidasanzwe kimwe n’uko ibigeragezo iyo byageze mu rukundo ahanini usanga bake aribo babasha kubyihanganira no kubyakira ariko ugasanga abandi bikabananira guhagarara ku cyemezo bahisemo cyo kujya mu rukundo Duherukana  Muyomba wa Sifa arimo gutegura uburyo bwo kuvugana na Papa wa Sifa ariko twese twari dufite amatsiko y’uburyo papa wa Sifa ari buze kubyakira. Rero twihuse ka duhite dukomeza ubundi mwiyumvire uko byaje kugenda. ………..Bari bategereje igisubizo kiri buve kuri papa ubyara Sifa gusa nyine baje kuvugana nawe biza kuba ibindi kuko yababwiye ati ni akazi kanyu ngewe ntago nkeneye kuvugana na Sifa ntan’ubwo ari umwana wange ngewe ntago ngira umwana umeze gutyo, ako kanya kuko bavuganaga kuri Telefone ubwo yahise akupa birangira gutyo ubwo nta wundi mwanzuro bafashe uretse uwo kuba Sifa yareka gusubira ku ishuli kuko nyine abayobozi b’ikigo bari bamutegetse kuzana papa we gusa ntawundi mubyeyi bashakaga. Kuva ubwo rero Sifa yahise aguma aho mu rugo kwa Muyomba we ariko ahita abwira Jado uko byaje kugenda hanyuma nyine na Jado abura icyo gukora ubwo bose bemera kwakira icyemezo cyari cyafashwe rero ubwo nyuma gato Sifa yaje kugera aho ava aho ngaho muri urwo rugo rwa Muyomba we ajya kwibanira n’undi mukobwa wari inshuti ye muri iyo minsi nawe wabaga muri iyo Kigali. Aha rero byaje gukurura ibibazo hagati ye na Jado kuko uwo mukobwa yaribanaga kandi nawe yari akiri muto kuburyo atari wa muntu wenda wari wageza igihe cyo kwibana ndetse bigatuma na Jado akeka ko imico bagiyemo atari myiza ubwo nyine ariko Jado yagerageje kwereka Sifa uburyo we abangamiwe gusa kuri Sifa ntiyamuha agaciro kuko nawe urumva yabaga abangamiwe ku rundi ruhande kuko aho kwa Muyomba yabaga mu buzima butandukanye n’ubw’iwabo bityo haramunanira. Ubwo rero kuva icyo gihe bakomeje kugenda batumvikana na Jado ndetse biza kugera n’ubwo rimwe Jado ahamagara Sifa ari mu masaha akuze ya nijoro yumva ntago ari mu rugo ahita amubwira nabi hanyuma Sifa aramukupa kuva icyo gihe Jado ahita amureka ntiyongera kumuvugisha ndetse basa nk’aho banganye ariko nyine ntakintu kigaragara bapfuye. Iyo minsi yose Jado yari asa n’uwishyizemo ko Sifa byanga bikunda atabaye mubuzima bumwemerera kuba yakunda Jado ahubwo wenda yaba afite abandi kuruhande cyane ko kubera uburyo Jado yari asigaye afite ikizere gikeya byanatumaga atanyurwa n’urukundo Sifa yamugaragarizaga, ubwo rero muri iyo minsi bisa nk’aho Jado na Sifa ibyabo bigeze……. Agace gakurikira ntucikwe Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Eddy Kenzo yakiriwe nk’umwami mu gihugu cya Mali-"Reba Amafoto"
content:
Umuhanzi w’icyamamare mu gihugu cya Uganda, wanatwaye igihembo cya BET Awards Edrisah MUSUUZA, uzwi cyane muri muzika nka Eddy Kenzo  yashyize ikimenyetso kitazasibangana mu mitima y’abaturage bo mu gihugu cy Mali.  Ibi byabaye ku Cyumweru tariki ya 8 Gicurasi ubwo yakoraga igitaramo muri icyo gihugu.  Eddy KENZO akigera kuri Sitade ya OMNISPORT Stadium iri mu murwa mukuru wa Malinyari aherekejwe n’imodoka nyinshi cyane ndetse n’abamotari batagira ingano baririmbaga izina rye ndetse haza kuza n’imodoka za gisirikare zamucungiraga umutekano aho byagaragaraga ko bamwakiriye nk’umuntu w’intwari ndetse bishimiye bidasanzwe maze nawe si ukubasusurutsa yimarayo.  Eddy KENZO yaririmbye zimwe mu ndirimbo ze maze ageze kuyitwa "Beyonce Sitya Loss", "Soraye" na "Viva Africa" yabaye nk’ucanye umuriro mu bafana maze barabyina karahava. Twabibutsa ko iyi ndirimbo Sitya Loss iri muri zimwe mu ndirimbo umuntu atashidikanyaho ko ifite umwihariko w’Afurika bitewe n’uburyo amashusho yayo akoze ndetse n’ibigaragaramo akaba ariyo mpamvu yanakunzwe cyane hirya no hino ku isi.




 Yanditswe na Zihirambere Pacifique/Muhabura.rw

title: Uwacu Julienne: Impinduka mu mikino binyuze muri minisiteri y’umuco na siporo
content:
Ibi uyu muyobozi yabitangaje ubwo yakiraga uwahoze ari umukinnyi ukomeye ku rwego mpuzamahanga, Luis García wahoze ari umukinnyi wa Liverpool na FC Barcelone wamaze kugera i Kigali.
 Minisiriti Uwacu avuga ko uyu mugabo yaje mu Rwanda ku butumire bwa leta y’u Rwanda mu rwego rwo gushyigikira impano abana b’u Rwanda bafite mu mupira w’amaguru. Luis García akaba azafasha abanyarwanda gushinga ishuri ry’umupira w’amaguru rizajya rizamurirwamo abo bana bakiri bato. Uwacu yagize ati: “turashaka gufatanya n’abakinnyi b’abastari mu kuzamura abana bakiri bato kandi tuziko bizatanga umusaruro kuko bazakura baharanira kugira aho bagera.” García nawe yatangaje ko hari ibyo aje kureba mu Rwanda by’umwihariko ku mpano ziri mu gihugu kuko ngo hari uko bamubwiye mbere y’uko aza. Aba bakinnyi b’ibyamamare ngo hari ibyo bateganya gukora mu Rwanda ariko na none ngo hari ubufasha bazahabwa. Yagize ati: “abazashinga izo akademi zizaba mu Rwanda bafite ibyo bazakorana na FERWAFA ariko no ku ruhande rwa guverinoma dufite ibyo tuzafatanya nabo kugirango abana bazamuke uko bikwiye.” Luis Garcia uri mu mushina mu Rwanda. Abinyujije mu kigega cye giteza imbere umupira w’amaguru, Rayco Garcia Foundation, nyuma yo kuva i Kigali, azanerekeza muri Uganda, aho azahura na Perezida Museveni, bakaganira ku buryo ubukerarugendo bw’iki gihugu bwatezwa imbere, binyuze muri siporo. Luis García yabwiye Daily Monitor ko yishimiye gusura ibi bihugu, agahura n’abantu baho. Luis García, yakinnye mu makipe nka Atletico Madrid, FC Barcelone, ndetse na Liverpool.Yarahagaritse gukina umupira w’amaguru mu mwaka ushize wa 2014. Si uyu mukinnyi gusa wabaye icyamamare mu mupira w’amaguru, umaze gusura u Rwanda, kuko na Quinton Fortune, umunya Afurika y’Epfo wakinnye muri Manchester United nawe yararusuye. Yanditswe na Shyaka Concorde/Muhabura.rw

title: U Rwanda rwahawe inkunga ya miliyari 3 Frw azifashishwa mu gutera amashyamba
content: Iyi nkunga yatanzwe n’ikigega cyo mu bihugu bya Danemark, Finlande, Islande, Norvège na Suède (NDF), gitera inkunga imishinga igamije guteza imbere ibidukikije, ikazifashishwa mu gushyira mu bikorwa umushinga ugamije guteza imbere ibicanwa bikomoka ku biti. Iyi nkunga ya NDF izahabwa u Rwanda inyuze muri Banki y’Isi, ikaba iziyongera ku bikorwa by’Umushinga ugamije kugarura ishusho kamere y’Amashyamba no kuyabungabunga (LAFREC) usanzwe ushyirwa mu bikorwa n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo kubungabunga ibidukikije (REMA). REMA yatangaje ko bimwe mu bikorwa bizaterwa inkunga binyuze muri uwo mushinga mushya harimo kuvugurura no gutera amashyamba mashya, kongera ubuziranenge bw’imbuto z’amashyamba, guteza imbere imikoreshereze myiza y’ibicanwa bituruka ku biti ndetse no gukwirakwiza uburyo bushya bwo gutanga ingufu zifashishwa mu nganda z’icyayi no mu ngo. Umuyobozi Mukuru wa REMA, Eng.Coletha Ruhamya, yavuze ko uwo mushinga uzanagira uruhare mu guteza imbere ubuhinzi buvuguruye bw’amashyamba bikazibanda mu bice bikikije Pariki y’Igihugu ya Gishwati-Mukura. Yagize ati “Uzateza imbere amashyamba ndetse n’abayafite muri utwo duce bazareba uko bayacunga neza; hakazabamo no kwigisha abakora amakara bakazayakora neza kandi bikazabaha umusaruro uhagije, ukazanunganira ukuntu twakora indi nyigo yatuma tubona ibisimbura ibicanwa bitari ibikomoka ku biti.” Umuyobozi wari uhagarariye NDF, Martina Jagerhorn, yavuze ko bahisemo gutera inkunga u Rwanda mu kurufasha guhangana n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere. Yagize ati “Tumaze iminsi twiga ku mihindagurikire y’ikirere mu Rwanda, ngo turebe icyakorwa kugira ngo rugire ubudahangarwa, dushingiye rero ku bikorwa bya LAFREC tuzakomeza gushyigikira u Rwanda mu guhangana n’ihindagurika ry’ikirere.” Biteganyijwe ko uyu mushinga uzanafasha mu kongerera ubushobozi amakoperative atunganya, akanacuruza amakara mu rwego rwo kuyafasha kurushaho  kuyakora mu buryo burambye, kongera ubuziranenge n’ubwiza bw’amakara ndetse no gushaka amasoko. Ibindi bikorwa birimo kongerera ubushobozi Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Imbuto z’amashyamba   ndetse no gufasha inganda zitunganya icyayi n’abandi baturage kubona ibindi bicanwa bitangiza ibidukikije, bakwifashisha mu mirimo yabo ya buri munsi. Uyu musnhinga utangiye mu 2018 uzasoza ibikorwa byawo mu 2019.

title: Abakinnyi batanu ba FC Barcelone banduye Coronavirus bigirwa ibanga
content: Radiyo RAC1 yo mur Catalonia, yabitangaje binyuze mu kiganiro cyayo “Tu Diras” mu gihe FC Barcelone n’andi makipe asigaye, yitegura gusubukura shampiyona tariki ya 11 Kamena 2020. Abakinnyi batanu banduye Coronavirus ntibatangajwe muri icyo kiganiro ariko hemejwe ko nta bimenyetso bagaragazaga, aho byagaragaye bamaze gufatwa ibizimini by’amaraso. Amakuru ya RAC1 yahurijweho kandi n’aya El Chiringuito de Jugones, avuga ko hari n’abandi babiri mu batoza ba FC Barcelone banduye Coronavirus. Abakinnyi batanu bari barwaye, barakize ndetse ubu ngo byizerwa ko bamaze kugaruka mu myitozo n’abandi mu gihe ngo abayobozi b’ikipe bahangayikishijwe n’uko bashobora kwibasirwa n’imvune. FC Barcelone ifite Igikombe cya Shampiyona ya Espagne giheruka, yirinze kugira icyo ivuga kuri ayo makuru mu gihe ikinyamakuru AS cyatangaje ko iyi kipe yari yizeye ko icyemezo cyo kubitangaza kizafatwa na La Liga. Mu cyumweru gishize, Kapiteni wa FC Barcelone, Lionel Messi, yavuze ko nk’abakinnyi bari bamaze iminsi bafite impungenge z’uko buri kimwe kizaba kimeze bitewe n’ibyabaye mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi kubera Coronavirus. FC Barcelone izasubukura shampiyona tariki ya 13 Kamena, ihura na Mallorca. Espagne iri mu bihugu byugarijwe bikomeye na Coronavirus, aho handuye abantu bagera ku bihumbi 240, abasaga ibihumbi 27 bamaze kwicwa n’icyo cyorezo. Ku wa Mbere, byatangajwe ko abandi bantu bahitanywe na COVID-19 babonetse, bikaba ari ubwa mbere byari bibaye kuva muri Werurwe.

title: Imbwa yari yashimuswe, ikanakomereka yabashije kwijyana kwa muganga nyirayo arongera arayibona -Video
content:
Muri Turikiya, umugabo yasanze imbwa ye ku bitaro yagiye kwivuza igikomere yatewe n’indi mbwa. Ni nyuma yuko ishimuswe nyuma abayishimuse bakaza kuyirekura maze ubwo yari mu nzira igerageza gusubira kwa sebuja igahura n’indi mbwa yo ku gasozi ikayikomeretsa. Iyi mbwa ifite amezi 9 gusa y’amavuko yitwa Silla yari yashimuswe mu gihe uwo basanzwe babana yari yagiye ku kazi, ariko kubera ishyaka ryayo n’ubwenge ifite yabashije kwigobotora mu buryo butangaje ibizazane bikomeye yanyuzemo.

Serdar Keskindir usanzwe ari nyiri iyi mbwa Ibi byabaye hagati mu kwezi gushize, aho nyuma yo gushimutwa, umunya-Turikiya wari usanzwe yibanira n’iri tungo yiyemeje gukora ibishoboka byose ngo aribone ndetse atanga itangazo aho yari yashyizeho amayero 260 (ni ukuvuga asaga ibihumbi 265,000frw) ku muntu wese wamubonera iyi mbwa. Iri tangazo ryaciye intege abari bayishimuse kuko bumvaga ko bitari buborohere kubona umukiliya uyigura nkuko Daily Mail yabitangaje. Ngo ni bwo bahise bigira inama yo kuyijugunya mu muhanda, maze ubwo Silla yari mu nzira igerageza gusubira iwayo nibwo yaje guhura n’imbwa y’agasozi maze irayisagarira iyikomeretsa ukuguru kw’inyuma. Amaherezo, iyi mbwa y’inyabwenge yakomeje urugendo rwayo maze ubwo yanyuraga iruhande rw’ibitaro, umutima nama wayo utuma yinjira imbere muri ibi bitaro aho umuganga yayivuye ndetse ayishyikiriza nyirayo.

Ubwo iyi mbwa yinjiraga kwa muganga

Umuganga wayitayeho Reba mu mashusho hano hasi ubwo yageraga kwa muganga
