title: Bimwe mu bigabanya ubushake bw’umugore mu mibonano mpuzabitsina
content:
Kubura ubushake ku bagore bivuze kutishimira igikorwa icyo ari cyo cyose kiganisha ku gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina birimo n’ ibyo bita imirimo mbanzirizamushinga (caresses).  Iki kibazo rero ahanini ngo kigaragara ku bagore maze gucura ariko ngo hari n’abo bibaho bakiri bato ibi kandi Hari igihe kigera umugore cyangwa umukobwa akabura ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina cyangwa yanabikora ntaryoherwe nk’uko byari bisanzwe. Muri iyi nkuru turabagezaho zimwe mu mpamvu zibitera. Kubura ubushake ku bagore bivuze kutishimira igikorwa icyo ari cyo cyose kiganisha ku gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina birimo n’ ibyo bita imirimo mbanzirizamushinga (caresses). Iki kibazo rero ahanini ngo kigaragara ku bagore maze gucura ariko ngo hari n’abo bibaho bakiri bato. Ibi kandi bishobora kuba ku bashakanye bakora imibonano uko bikwiye ariko bakora ibintu bimwe ku masaha amwe bigatuma ubushake bw’umugore bugenda bugabanuka bukagera kuri zero, agasigara abikoreshwa n’uko afite umugabo, we atakiryoherwa na busa. Ese iki kibazo cyaba giterwa ni iki ? Hari ibintu bitandukanye bituma ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ku mugore bugabanuka cyangwa bushira burundu, bimwe muri byo ni ibi bikurikira :
Guhora mu bintu bimwe Nk’uko nari nabivuze haruguru, hari ukuntu abantu bafata imibonano mpuzabitsina nk’aho ari igikorwa gikorwa mu buryo bumwe ku masaha amwe. Urugero ugasanga umugore n’umugabo batera akabaniro nijoro no mu masaha ya mu gitondo gusa kandi bakabikora mu buryo bumwe. Ibi rero ngo bituma umugore abimenyera ndetse ngo yajya no kubonana n’umugabo we ntagire ikintu yumva kuko ubwonko buba bwamaze kumva ko ari bya bindi bagiye gusubiramo. Uko agenda yumva arambiwe guhora mu bintu bimwe bifite umuvuduko umwe niko uburyohe bugenda bugabanuka agasigara ntabwo yigirira Umunaniro Iyo umugore akora cyane ntabone umwanya wo kuruhuka, buri gihe akabonana n’umugabo we arushye bituma ubushake bugenda bugabanuka. Aha batanga urugero rw’umugore wirirwa ashyashyana mu mirimo itandukanye yo mu rugo yarangiza akita ku bana, mbese agahera mu gitondo akora akageza nimugoroba, bituma agera ku buriri yumva yakwisinzirira. Umugabo yamuzanaho ibyo kubonana akabikora atabishaka, rimwe na rimwe akabikora kugira ngo amushimishe. Guhangayika Iyo umugore ahora ahangayikiye akazi cyangwa urugo rwe bituma ahora yitekerezaho cyane ntabone umwanya wo gutekereza ku buzima bw’imibonano mpuzabitsina yajya kubonana n’uwo bashakanye akaba ari kwitekerereza gahunda ze zimuhangayikishije bityo ntaryoherwe n’igikorwa arimo.

Kwiheba Kwiheba nabyo bituma ubushake bw’umugore bugabanuka, kuko aba yumva nta byiringiro by’ubuzima afite, yaratakaje ibyishimo ku buryo n’iyo akoze imibonano mpuzabitsina yumva atazi icyo akoze kuko we ubwe aba yumva abayeho nabi, yararenzwe n’ibibazo nta kintu na kimwe kikimushimisha. Imiti
 Hari imiti umugore anywa atabizi ikagenda imugabanyiriza ubushake akazashiduka atagishaka gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, yayikora akumva atazi ibyo arimo. Kubyara
Hari abagore batinya kubyara ku buryo iyo babyaye hashira igihe baratinye kubonana n’abagabo, bumva ibinezaneza by’umubiri byaragabanutse batacyifuza abagabo kubera uburibwe n’ububabare baba baragize mu gihe cyo kubyara. Gusa ku bw’amahirwe bo iyo hashize igihe basubira mu buzima busanzwe uburyohe bukagaruka. Ibi rero ngo bigira ingaruka zitandukanye ku buzima bw’abashakanye zirimo no kuba batandukana kuko hari igihe umugabo ageraho akarambirwa gukomeza kubana n’umuntu utakimwishimira cyangwa ngo yishimire ibyo amukorera.
Ikindi ngo iki kibazo gishobora gutera intonganya zihoraho hagati y’abashakanye kuko baba basa n’abatagihuza.
 
Bimwe mu bisubizo kuri iki kibazo  1.Kuganira hagati y’abashakanye Ntimugomba gutuma ikibazo gikura ngo gifate indi sura kibe cyatuma umwe ataryoherwa n’imibonano mpuzabitsina; mugomba kwicara mukakiganiraho ubundi mugafata umwanzuro unogeye impande zombi kuko guceceka nta kintu kizima bishobora kubagezaho uretse kubatanya gusa. 2.Guhindura bimwe mu byo mwagize akamenyero Mugomba guhindura ibyo mwari mwaragize nk’amahame adakuka mu bijyanye n’ubuzima bw’imibonano mpuzabitsina. Niba mwateraga akabariro hijimwe mugerageze mutangire kuyikora habona, niba mwagatereraga ahantu bacecetse muhindure rimwe na rimwe mujye mushyiramo uturirimbo turyoheye amatwi. Ikindi niba mwaramenyereye guterera akabariro mu cyumba kimwe ari cyo cyanyu mutangire muhindure ahantu ari nako musohokera ahantu hatandukanye, yaba mwebwe ubwanyu cyangwa umuryango wose (ni ukuvuga umugore, umugabo n’ abana). 3.Hindura uburyo wateguraga umugore wawe
 Niba wari umunyereye kuza ukamukora ku bice bimwe na bimwe by’umubiri utajya uhindura tangira ukore no ku bindi, niba kandi wakoreshaga intoki zonyine noneho ugerageze utangire ukoreshe amavuta kuko azatuma ubushake bwiyongera biborohereze kuza kugera ku gikorwa nyirizina buri wese afite ibinezaneza. 4.kuzana udushya Niba wazaga ugahita utangira gutera akabariro nta kintu uvugishije uwo mwashakanye nawe agahita yubahiriza inshingano yaba abishaka cyangwa atabishaka, tangira ujye uza umuganirize umenye niba ananiwe cyangwa afite umunabi, ubundi umufashe kuruhuka no kugubwa neza, bityo uzarebe ko mudatera akabariro mufite ubushake bungana. Yandintswe na Salongo Richard/Muhabura.rw

title: Ubwiza bwa One&Only Gorilla’s Nest, hoteli y’i Musanze yishyurwa 3600 $ ku ijoro (Amafoto)
content: Ifite ibyumba 21 biri mu byiciro bine, icyiciro cya mbere gifite ibyumba 10, igikurikiraho gifite ibyumba bine, ikindi bitanu naho icya nyuma kikagira ibyumba bibiri. Uko bikurikirana, ni nako bitandukanye mu biciro, mu bunini no mu bwiza. Zitatse mu buryo bwa Kinyarwanda hakoreshejwe imigongo, hakabamo n’ibindi bikoresho by’ubugeni. Ibyumba icumi biri mu cyiciro cya mbere, byishyurwa 3600 by’amadolari ku ijoro rimwe naho icyumba cya menshi ni ibihumbi 10500 by’amadolari gishobora kwakira nk’abakuru b’ibihugu. Mu mafaranga umuntu yishyura, haba harimo ibyo kurya n’ibyo kunywa. Ibintu byose byubatse ibyumba by’iyi hoteli bikozwe mu mbaho nubwo bifashwe n’ibyumba. Iyi hoteli yubatse ku buso bungana na hegitari 35, aho yubatse hahoze hari hoteli yitwa Gorilla’s Nest. Imirimo yo kuyubaka yamaze imyaka igera kuri ibiri, yuzura itwaye miliyoni 65 z’amadolari ya Amerika. Imaze gutanga akazi ku bantu 120 bahoraho barimo abanyarwanda 100. Mu Ukwakira 2019 nibwo iyi hoteli yatangiye gukora ariko ntabwo yari yagafunguwe ku mugaragaro. Kuva mu kwa gatanu kugera mu kwa cyenda, nibwo iba ifite abashyitsi benshi. Imboga zose zitekerwa abashyitsi muri iyi hoteli, zihinze mu bice byayo. Amoko y’ibyatsi ibihumbi 36 niyo yatewe mu ishyamba ririmo iyi hoteli. One and Only Gorilla’s Nest yiyongereye ku zindi nyubako ebyiri zikomeye zakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu bice by’ibirunga, zirimo Bisate lodge kuri uyu wa Gatanu yahawe inyenyeri eshanu na Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House, yatangije ibikorwa mu Rwanda ku wa 1 Kanama 2019. Ije nyuma ya hoteli igezweho imaze igihe muri Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe, International One & Only Resorts, iyi ikaba ari ishami ryayo. Amafoto agaragaza uko mu byumba hameze Amafoto: Himbaza Pacifique

title: BNR igiye kongera inoti za 500Frw ku isoko
content: Guverineri wa Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko mu ntangiro z’umwaka utaha izongera umubare w’inoti za 500Frw ku isoko, nyuma y’uko abaturage bamaze iminsi bavuga ko izi noti zitakiri ku isoko mu buryo buhagije, n’izihari zikaba zishaje. Yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa kabiri nyuma y’inama y’Akanama gashinzwe politiki y’ifaranga, iba buri gihembwe. Yagize ati “Ikibazo turakizi, twaracyumvise ariko twakoranye n’amabanki kugira ngo, iyo abantu baje kubikuza burya abenshi baba bashaka gutwara inoti nini, noneho dusaba amabanki ko yakongera umubare w’inoti za 500Frw batanga iyo abantu baje kubikuza.” “Ikindi kubera ko ari inoti zimaze igihe zikoreshwa, ubu turi muri gahunda yo kuzisimbura cyangwa kuzongermo izindi nshyashya.” Yavuze ko ubusanzwe iyo inoti zimaze igihe zikoreshwa zigera aho zigasaza, gusa ngo izikenewe zirahari. Yakomeje agira ati “Twavuganye n’amabanki ko yarushaho kuziha abantu bajya kubikuza, ndetse tubongera n’izindi nshyashya twari dufite hano, ariko twatangiye gahunda yo kuzana izindi nshyashya, izo tuzazitanga igihe cyazo kigeze, twumva ko mu ntangiro z’umwaka utaha.” Yavuze ko ari ibisanzwe ko buri gihe inoti nyuma y’imyaka itatu zisimbuzwa, gusa ngo inoti za 500Frw zaherukaga gushyirwa ku isoko mu 2013. Inkuru ya Igihe

title: Ilayidi, umunsi w’amafunguro kuri bamwe!
Kim Kardashian yahinduye izina ry’imideli ye nyuma yo kotswa igitutu n’Abayapani
content: Tariki 2 Kamena 2019 nibwo Kim Karashian yamuritse imyambaro y’imbere igaragaza imiterere y’abagore ayita “Kimono”. Bikimara kumenyekana ko yise iyi myambaro atyo, ntibyishimiwe na benshi biganjemo abo mu Buyapani bifashishije imbuga nkoranyambaga bakamwamaganira kure bavuga ko ari gusuzugura umuco wabo. Ubusanzwe Kimono ni umwambaro wubashywe mu muco w’Abayapani wambarwa mu birori bikomeye nk’ubukwe, gushyingura n’indi minsi mikuru. Nyuma y’iki gitutu, Kim Kardashian, yemeje ko agiye gushaka irindi zina risimbura Kimono yambuwe n’abayapani. Abinyujije kuri Twitter na Instagram, Kim Kardashian yatangaje ko yamaze guhindura izina ry’iyi mideli ayita ‘SKIMS’. Ati “ Abakunzi banjye n’abankurikira mbakuraho ibitekerezo byinshi. Numva ibitekerezo byabo kandi nishimiye ko bampaye ibitekerezo ku mideli yanjye mishya. Nyuma yo kubiha agaciro nishimiye kubatangariza ku mugaragaro SKIMS.” Kardashian yavuze ko umuhango wo kwerekana iyi mideli uzaba tariki 10 Nzeri 2019.

title: EPISODE 3: Fiston yongeye guhura na Angel mu buryo butunguranye ariko bombi Babura uwabanza undi…………………
content:
Duheruka Fiston na Frank batashye muri Ghetto aho Frank yari asanzwe aba wenyine bagiye kubana ndetse na Diregiteri hamwe na Maman wa Fiston yabyemeye nta kibazo gusa ariko nanone Diregiteri yahise abwira Frank ati nubwo mugiye kubana hanze y’ikigo ariko umenye neza……. ….. Fiston yahise abibwira Diregiteri hanyuma nawe arabemerere gusa Diregiteri yabwiye Frank ati umenye neza ko ngomba kujya menya neza ko mwize neza kandi Fiston akajya aza kunyereka amanota agira mu ma quiz agenda akora kugira ngo nze ndeba niba hari ikitagenda nzahita mbatandukanya. Ubwo na Frank yahise amwemerera ko nta kibazo azamwitaho kandi akajya amusobanurira nk’umuntu utari umenyereye kwiga muri Secondary birumvikana yari amenyereye ibya Primary kandi nabwo baba biga bataha bitandukanye no kwiga uba ku kigo cyangwa muri Gettho Aho urya ari uko uvuye kuri boutique kugura ibyo kurya mu gihe iwanyu wavaga ku ishuli ubaza ibyo bahishije utazi n’aho byavuye. Fiston na Frank ubwo bahise bafata ibyo bikapu bya Fiston baragenda bajya muri ako kavumo ka Frank bagiye kujya babanamo ari babiri, Gusa iyo Ghetto yari iri ahantu hari amazu menshi ari mu gipangu asanzwe abamo n’abandi banyeshuli ahanini usanga inzu imwe ibamo babibiri babiri uretse Frank niwe wenyine wabaga mu nzu ari umwe. Ubwo bageze aho ngaho nyine basanga hari n’abandi bana benshi muri icyo gipangu dore ko haba ari mu gihe cy’amasomo cyangwa ikitari icyamasomo hataburagamo abanyeshuli cyane ko kujya kwiga uba muri Ghetto biba ari ubushake ujya mu Ishuli iyo bikujemo kuko ntawe ujya akubaza ngo kuki utagiye kwiga kuko nta Animateur uhaba aho ngaho. Ubwo bakigera mu rugo aho ariko bashatse ibyo guteka kuko bwari bwije barateka hanyuma ari nako baganira mbese nk’abantu bari bamaze n’iminsi batabonana cyane ko banaturuka muri catier imwe kandi baba banafite byinshi baziranyeho by’aho iwabo muri Cartier. Gusa Fiston yaje kugera ku bijyanye n’urugendo rwe hanyuma abwira Frank iby’umukobwa wamwakiriye akigera ku marembo y’ikigo hanyuma amubwira ko yitwa Angel gusa Frank akimara kumva iryo zina yahise asa n’uhindutse mu maso naho Fiston: Bite se Angel uramuzi? Frank: Ubundi se mwahuye gute wamenye gute ko yitwa Angel? Fiston : Hhhh ntubizi se ko ndi umu Nyakigali? Ubwo nawe kweli uririrwa ubaza ubusa Frank: Nonese yakubwiye ko yiga mu wa kangahe? Fiston: Sha reka kumbaza byinshi gusa wumve ngo nange umukobwa yantunguye cyane kuburyo utabyumva mbese ndumva n’ubu nta mahorro mfite kubera Malayika (Angel ) wange nahuye nawe uyu munsi Frank: Hhhhh (aseka cyane) bivuze ngo rero umugore wanjye wamukunze? Fiston: Reka reka, Uriya mwana usa kuriya urakeka wamwiharira wenyine se? kbsa nureba nabi ndamugutwara kandi ntago ari blague man ubyumve kbsa Frank: Ariko man jya ureka Blague ngewe sinkina ku mwana wange, ahubwo ka mpite muhamagara aze hano kundeba
Ubwo ako kanya Frank yahise ajya munzu afata telephone ahamagara Angel amusaba kuza ku musura ngo basangire ibya nimugoroba Frank: Hello chch Angel: Ndakumva mukunzi mwiz Frank: Chr none ko nshaka ko uyu mugoroba uza tugasangira ibya nimugoroba? Angel: Urumva ari iki wansaba nkakikwima ngifite mukunzi wange? Ahubwo mukanya ndaba nkugezeho

title: USA: Shizzo wujuje Album ye ya kane “My trap life” akomeje gusohora indirimbo ziyigize
content: Uyu muhanzi muri iyi minsi ugaragaza gushyira imbaraga nyinshi mu gukora umuziki yamaze kurangiza Album ye ya kane ndetse umunsi ku wundi ari gusohora indirimbo ziyigize kugeza igihe zose azaba amaze kuzishyirira hanze. Ati “Ni uburyo bugezweho bwo kumurika Album, usohora indirimbo imwe imwe ku buryo uha umwanya abakunzi b’umuziki wawe bakazumva kandi ukizera ko zose zibagezeho noneho ukabona gutangira kuzamamaza.” Iyi Album igizwe n’indirimbo 15, harimo izo yagiye akorana n’abandi bahanzi nka Young Grace, Queen Cha, B Threy, Bull Dogg, Yvanny Mpano n’abandi batandukanye. Shizzo aganira na IGIHE yavuze ko muri iyi minsi ahugiye ku gusohora indirimbo ze ziri kuri Album, nyuma azatangira imirimo yo kuzimenyekanisha ndetse ibintu nibiba byasubiye mu buryo abe yanakora ibitaramo. Ati ”Imipango myinshi nari mfite yarapfuye kubera Covid-19, nk’ubu sinakora ibitaramo, ubu ni uguha abantu album yanjye nshya nkasohora indirimbo ziyigize, ndi gushaka uko nakomeza gukora amashusho yazo kuko hari zimwe zitayafite ndetse hari n’ayo namaze gukora ariko atarasohoka mu minsi mike mwitege byinshi kurushaho.” Mu mpera za 2018 nibwo Shizzo yamuritse Album ye ya gatatu “The home coming” mu gitaramo cyabereye i Rubavu ku ivuko rye n’ubundi aho yakuriye. Icyo gihe Ishimwe Agape wamamaye nka Shizzo yongeye kugaruka mu Rwanda nyuma y’imyaka 10 yari amaze muri Amerika. Zimwe mu ndirimbo nshya ziri kuri iyi Album ya Shizzo

title: Yabuze mu 1999 ari umwana ufite imyaka 14, yongeye kuboneka ari muzima mu 2019
content:
Nyuma y’imyaka 20 ishize, Simon Lembi wari waraburiwe irengero mu 1999 ubwo yari afite imyaka 14 gusa y’amavuko, kuri ubu yangeye kuboneka ari muzima. Ni inkuru yatunguranye cyane mu  Bubiligi aho uyu yari yaraburiye, ndetse ubwo yongeraga kuboneka, parike ya Bruxelles kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 06 Gashyantare 2019 yavuze ko mu by’ukuri yari yarahunze ubuzima bugoye bwo mu muryango we gusa ubu ntihatanzwe amakuru ku buzima bwe bushya mu rwego rwo kubahiriza ubuzima bwe bwite. Yahinduye imyirondoro Simon Lembi yageze mu Bubiligi avuye muri Angola aho akomoka. Yahageze ari kumwe n’umuryango we iminsi ibarirwa mu icumi n’imisango mbere y’uko abura mu 1999. Nyina n’abana be batatu barimo uyu Simon wari imfura ye, bakigera mu Bubiligi batuye mu macumbi y’abatishoboye mu gace ka Barrière de Saint-Gilles. Hari ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 12 Ugushingo 2019 ahagana saa kumi n’imwe z’umugoroba (17h00), ubwo uyu mwana yasabaga yinginga nyina ko yajya kureba televiziyo hafi yaho bari batuye, maze agiye ntiyagaruka.

Hatanzwe amatangazo yo kumushakisha Simon Lembi yarashakishijwe arabura burundu, kugeza ubwo yongeye kuboneka ubu afite imyaka 33 y’amavuko, yaranahinduye imyirondoro ye, ndetse aba hanze y’Ububiligi. Amakuru yatanzwe n’umuntu umuzi magingo aya wakekaga ko yaba ari we Lembi wabuze Simon Lembi ngo yaje kuboneka hashingiwe ku buhamya bw’umwe mu bantu bamuzi, aho iperereza ryari rimaze igihe kinini ricecetse ryongeye gufungurwa mu Ugushyingo 2018.

Simon Lembi yabonetse nyuma y’imyaka 20 abuze Uyu muntu ngo usanzwe aba hafi ye, bivugwa ko yagerageje guhuza uwo azi ubu (wahinduye imyirondoro) n’umuhungu w’imyaka 14 y’amavuko wabuze mu 1999 witwaga Simon Lembi, maze nyuma y’uko ifoto ye nshya igaragaye babasha kumenya aho aherereye. "Mu kwezi ku Ugushyingo 2018, nibwo ishami rya polisi y’Ububiligi rishinzwe ibijyanye n’ababuriwe irengero ryahamagawe n’umuntu wavugaga ko aba hafi ya Simon Lembi, ko uyu yahinduye imyirondoro akaba asigaye aba mu kindi gihugu cy’amahanga.", Denis Goeman na Ine Van Wymeersch, abavugizi ba parike ya Bruxelles. Bakomeje bagira bati "Iri shami rya polisi rikurikirana iperereza ry’ababuriwe irengero, ryahise ritangiza ibikorwa bitandukanye by’iperereza ndetse bakorana n’abapolisi bo mu gace ka Bruxelles-Midi kugira ngo bakusanye ibimenyetso by’ingenzi (hagereranywa amafoto ye y’ubu n’aya kera, itariki naho yavukiye,...). Muri iryo perereza ni nabwo nyiri ubwite ubwo yabazwaga yaje kwiyemerera ko koko ari we Simon Lembi." Haribazwa ibibazo byinshi ariko ikizwi cyo ni uko yatorongeye kubushake, ubu akaba ameze neza Ni gute umwana w’imyaka 14 gusa y’amavuko yabashije gusohoka mu Bubiligi? Ese ni he yahise ajya gutangirira ubuzima bushya? Ibi bibazo byose kugeza ubu nta gisubizo bifite. Parike ya Bruxelles nta kintu yabivuzeho mu rwego rwo kubahiriza ubuzima bwite bw’uyu mugabo wabonetse. "Asobanura ko yiburishije abigendereye mu mpera z’umwaka w’1999, akaba yarafashe uyu mwanzuro nyuma yo kubona ko atari anyuzwe n’umwuka uri mu muryango we. Nyuma y’imyaka 20 ishize, ubu yifuza ko yaba imyirondoro ye mishya (identité actuelle) akoresha ubu, yaba aho atuye ubu, byose bitajya hanze. Ni ku bw’impamvu zo kubaha ubuzima bwe bwite. Icyo cyakoze twaba dutangaje ni uko ubu ameze neza kandi umuryango we wo mu Bubiligi wamenyeshejwe gukemura mu buryo bwiza iyi dosiye.", Umuvugizi wa parike. Uyu muvugizi wa parike, Denis Goeman yaboneyeho gutangaza ko ibi byibutsa ko dosiye z’ijyanye n’iburirwa irengero ry’abantu ari yo mpamvu zitajya zifungwa burundu kuko ’buri gihe hahora hari icyizere cy’uko uwabuze yaboneka’, ndetse ubu ngo bafite izindi dosiye esheshatu z’abana baburiwe irengero mbere y’umwaka 2000, bagikurikirana. Nubwo parike yirinze gutangaza igihugu uyu Simon Lembi yaba aherereyemo, hari bimwe mu binyamakuru byatangaje ko yaba ari mu Buholande, kimwe mu bihugu bihana imbibe n’Ububiligi, ndetse ngo ubu ari mu buzima yishimiye. Bavuga ko yakuze ari umusore witonda kandi w’imico myiza. Src:7sur7

title: Abahoze ari abakozi ba Jumia bashinze sosiyete igeza  amafunguro ku bayifuza
content:
Mu Ukuboza umwaka ushize nibwo Jumia Food  yatangaje ko ko izahagarika ibikorwa byayo mu Rwanda ku wa 09 Mutarama 2020. Yari amakuru mabi ku bari abakozi bayo mu Rwanda ariko akaba amahirwe akomeye ku bazi kubyaza umusaruro amahirwe. Bamwe mu bahoze ari abakozi b’iyo sosiyete  ubu bashinze iyitwa Vuba Vuba Africa izakomeza ibikorwa byo kugeza ku baturarwanda amafunguro aho bari mu gihe  bayasabye bifashishije ikoranabuhanga. Iyo sosiyete nshya iyobowe na Albert Munyabugingo wahoze ari Umuyobozi Mukuru muri Jumia Food , akaba afatanyije n’abandi bari bamaranye imyaka igera kuri itanu bakora muri Jumia Food. Munyabugingo yatangaje ko mu bakozi bagiye gukoresha harimo 80 % bakoranaga na Jumia Food.
Mu gihe sosiyete zikomeye nka Jumia ziri gufunga imiryango, Munyabugingo  yatangaje ko bo bizeye kunguka kuko bazakoresha porogaramu ya telefone yoroshye gukoresha izajya isabirwaho amafunguro n’abayakeneye. Avuga ko ibyo abishingira ku kuba iyo porogaramu yarakorewe mu Rwanda kandi ikaba ikoze ku buryo bubereye abanyarwanda. Mu byo bazajya bakora harimo  gukwirakwiza amafunguro aturutse muri resitora zitandukanye mu mujyi wa Kigali bakayageza ku bakiliya aho babyifuza, kugeza ku bakiliya ibicuruzwa byo mu maguriro manini (supermarkets) n’ibinyobwa ku babyifuza. Iyi sosiyete yatangije ko Porogaramu yayo, Vuba Vuba iboneka kuri Google Play store  no kuri Apple App Store. Munyabugingo yabwiye itangazamakuru ko bakurikije ubunararibonye bafite mu by’ubucuruzi bw’amafunguro hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, bibaha icyizere. Ati “Twashatse ibintu bibereye u Rwanda. Mu myaka itandatu ishize twagerageje ibintu byinshi, twagiye tubona impinduka ku bantu bakoresha Internet kandi byaduhaye ubundi buryo bwo kurushaho gufasha abakiliya bacu.” Vuba Vuba Africa yatangiye ibikorwa byayo  guhera tariki ya 1 Mutarama  2020. Jumia yafunze ishami ryayo mu Rwanda nyuma y’imyaka itandatu yinjiye ku isoko ry’imbere mu gihugu. U Rwanda ni igihugu cya 11 Jumia ihagaritsemo ibikorwa byayo, nyuma y’aho itangiranye imbaraga nyinshi ndetse abantu bayigereranya na Amazon ya Afurika. Muri Kanama uyu mwaka, Jumia yahuye n’ibibazo bitandukanye ku Isi hose aho yakoreraga ndetse iregwa no mu nkiko ku buryo ibihombo byayo byageze kuri miliyoni 70 z’amadolari ndetse n’imigabane yayo ku isoko ikagabanukaho 14%.

title: Abashakanye n’abitegura kurushinga bateguriwe igiterane kiziga ku kibazo cy’ingo zisenyuka
content: Iki giterane gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti ‘‘Ukuri n’amahoro mu bashakanye’’ cyateguwe n’Umuyobozi wa River Ministry, Mukabaramba Jacky afatanyije n’umugabo we. Giteganyijwe kubera kuri Kigali Convention Centre ku wa 14 Gashyantare 2020, aho kizatangira saa kumi n’imwe n’igice z’umugoroba. Abazacyitabira bazaganirizwa n’Umuyobozi wa Evangelical Restoration Church ku Isi, Apôtre Joshua Ndagijimana Masasu n’umufasha we Pasiteri Lydia Masasu. Aba bombi baheruka kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 30 bamaze babana nk’umugabo n’umugore mu birori byabaye mu Ukuboza 2019. Iki giterane cyahuriranye n’Umunsi w’Abakundana, cyanatumiwemo abahanzi bagezweho barimo James na Daniella bakunzwe cyane mu ndirimbo “Mpa  amavuta”, “Nkoresha” n’izindi n’abandi barimo Arsene Tuyi waririmbye “Naranyuzwe”, “Icyaremwe gishya” ndetse na Irimbere Christian ugezweho mu yitwa “Obligado” na “Ndi hano”. Umuyobozi wa The River Ministry, Mukabaramba akaba n’umwanditsi w’ibitabo yabwiye IGIHE ko yahisemo gutegura iki gikorwa bitewe n’izamuka ry’ingo zisenyuka. Uyu mubyeyi wanditse igitabo “Izahabu ihishe mu muryango” ni na we uyobora  abagore kuri Restoration Church Masoro. Yagize iyerekwa ashaka kongera guhuriza hamwe abashakanye n’abandi bari mu nzira yo kurwubaka kugira ngo baganire uko bakubaka ingo zihamye zubakiye ku rufatiro rutanyeganyezwa. Imibare y’inkiko igaragaza ko gatanya zizamuka ubutitsa kuko kugeza mu Ugushyingo 2018, hari hamaze gucibwa imanza za gatanya 1311, ni ubwikubwe bw’inshuro 19 ugereranyije n’umwaka wa 2017. Imibare igaragaza ko mu 2016 ingo zatandukanye zari 21, mu 2017 ziba 69; yerekana ko gatanya zikubye inshuro 62 bingana na 6,200% mu myaka itatu ishize. ERC ni itorero rishingiye ku musingi wo kubaka umuryango uhamye, aho imfubyi ibonera umubyeyi, umupfakazi akagira umwitaho. Ihishurirwa ryo kuritangiza Apôtre Masasu yarihawe mu 1984, aza kurishinga mu 1994. Amafaranga yo kwinjira muri iki giterane ku bashakanye ni 30 000 Frw ku bagura amatike mbere naho abazayagura uwo munsi ni 35 000 Frw; itike ku muntu umwe ni 15 000 Frw ariko izazamurwa ku 20 000 Frw.

title: Inyubako za mbere mu Rwanda zakira ba mukerarugendo zihenze kurusha izindi (Amafoto)
content: Ubwo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yarangiraga, u Rwanda rwari igihugu cyangiritse, abanyamahanga baragitereranye ndetse nta bikorwa bifatika rufite, kugeza ubwo filime yiswe Hotel Rwanda yajyaga gukinwa, hagafatwa icyemezo ko ikinirwa muri Afurika y’Epfo ku mpamvu zirimo ko mu Rwanda hatari hari hoteli zakwakira ibyamamare nka Don Cheadle uyigaragaramo. Burya si buno! Ibintu byarahindutse, ubu muri hoteli eshanu z’inyenyeri eshanu zibarirwa mu rwa Gasabo, ebyiri ziri hanze y’Umurwa Mukuru Kigali. Izo ni One & Only Nyungwe House yo muri Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe na Bisate Eco Lodge yo mu Karere ka Musanze yashyizwe kuri urwo rwego ku wa 1 Ugushyingo 2019. Kugeza ubu hoteli z’inyenyereri eshanu ziyongera kuri izo ni Radisson Blu Hotel & Convention Centre, Kigali Serena Hotel na Kigali Marriott Hotel. Ni intambwe zikomeye zizatuma u Rwanda rubasha kugera ku rwego rwo kwinjiza nibura miliyoni 800 z’amadolari ya Amerika mu 2024, ahwanye na miliyari 760 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda. Twagerageje kwegeranya hoteli za mbere mu Rwanda zihenze, nubwo ibiciro byazo bihindagurika bitewe n’ibihe, ni ukuvuga niba ari mu mezi ajyanye n’ubukeraryugendo cyangwa mu gihe abasura igihugu baba ari bake. Haniyongeraho ko mu kugena igiciro hitabwa ku gihe umuntu azamara muri hoteli runaka. Ntabwo bivuze ko uburyo zikurikirana hano ari bwo buryo ntakuka. Kugira ngo wumve neza iyi nkuru, birasaba ko wifashisha Calculatrice, hanyuma idolari rimwe riri kuri 925 Frw ugendeye ku ivunjisha rya Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu. 1. Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House Singita yatashywe ku wa 1 Kanama 2019 na Perezida Paul Kagame aherekejwe na Madamu Jeannette Kagame. Ni inyubako yo ku rwego rwo hejuru yakira ba mukerarugendo nabo bo ku rwego nk’urwo, yubatswe mu Karere ka Musanze ku birenge by’Ikirunga cya Sabyinyo, aho uba unitegeye ibirunga bya Gahinga na Muhabura. Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House yubatswe mu gishanga cyari urwuri, ariko ubu hashibutse umushinga ukomeye w’ubukerarugendo ugizwe n’inzu umunani zubatswe mu buryo zirengera ibidukikije. Zirimo zirindwi zagenewe umuntu umwe cyangwa uherekejwe kuko buri imwe ifite uburiri bumwe, uruganiriro rwagutse n’ibindi byangombwa nkenerwa, hakaba indi imwe yiswe Kataza House yo igizwe n’ibyumba bine byo kuraramo. Yubatswe n’ibikoresho byinshi byakorewe mu Rwanda, ibyinshi ni ibiboneka i Musanze birimo amakoro n’imigano, itwara miliyoni $25. Ibiciro byaho byihagazeho nubwo bihindagurika bitewe n’ibihe by’ubukerarugendo nk’uko twabivuze. Nk’ubu kuva ku wa 1 Ugushyingo kugeza ku wa 19 Ukuboza, icyumba gishobora kuraramo abantu babiri cyishyurwa $1495 ku muntu ku ijoro, mu gihe mu mpeshyi aba ari $1750. Muri iyi minsi kandi icyumba kibamo ibitanda bibiri kirimo kwishyurwa $4 485, mu gihe ubusanzwe aba ari $5250 hagati y’umuntu umwe na batatu, hakwiyongeraho undi umwe bikajyana n’inyongera ya $1495 mu minsi nk’iyi cyangwa $1750 mu bihe by’ubukerarugendo. Kurara muri Kataza House yo ishobora kwakira abantu umunani ubu ni $6877 mu gihe ubusanzwe aba ari $8050 ku ijoro rimwe ku bantu hagati y’umwe na bane, hagira uwiyongeraho bikajyana n’izamuka rya $1495 cyangwa $1750 bitewe n’ibihe. Muri icyo giciro haba hakubiyemo n’ibintu byose umuntu akenera mu ijoro, birimo ibyo kurya no kunywa byose bihaboneka. 2.	One&Only Gorilla’s Nest Mu kwezi gushize nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko nyuma ya hoteli igezweho imaze igihe muri Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe, One & Only Resorts yibarutse irindi shami mu karere ka Musanze, ryitezweho kuzajya ryakira ba mukerarugendo basura ingagi. One&Only Gorilla’s Nest yubatswe mu Kinigi mu ishyamba ry’inturusu, ahantu hitegeye ibyiza by’ibirunga by’u Rwanda. Yubatswe mu biti mo hagati ku buryo buri nzu iteretse ku byuma bishinze, aho nibura bibarwa ko inzu imwe yagiye itwara miliyoni imwe y’amadolari ngo yubakwe. Kugeza ubu kuharara byihagazeho kuko nka Forest lodge irimo ibitanda bibiri, kuyiraramo ijoro rimwe ari $3,825 ni ukuvuga nibura miliyoni 3.5 Frw; Forest Lodge King ni $3,060 ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 2,8 Frw; Virunga Suite ni $4,760 ni ukuvuga miliyoni 4,3 Frw naho Ingagi suite ni $5,900, nibura ni miliyoni 5,4 Frw. 3.	Radisson Blu Hotel Muri Nyakanga 2016 nibwo Perezida Paul Kagame yafunguye ku mugaragaro inyubako ya Radisson Blu and Kigali Convention Centre, ahamya ko ari intsinzi y’Abanyarwanda kuko bananiwe kenshi kuyuzuza kubera ubushobozi buke, ariko ntibacike intege bikarangira bayujuje. Iyi nyubako yubatse mu birometero bitanu uvuye ku kibuga cy’indege mpuzamahanga cya Kigali, mu Murenge wa Kimihurura ku buso bungana na hegitari 12,6. Kigali Convention Centre igizwe na Hotel y’inyenyeri eshanu ifite ibyumba 292, icyumba cy’inama cyakira abantu basaga 2500, ibiro byo gukoreramo n’ibindi. Inyubako zirimo zifite agaciro ka miliyoni 300 z’amadolari abarirwa muri miliyari 223 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda. Iyo ukigera ku rubuga rwayo wakirizwa ubutumwa ko ushobora kurara muri iyi nyubako itagira uko isa guhera ku $265.50 Ayo madolari agenda azamuka ukagera kuri Junior Suite ifite ibaraza, ikakwemera kugira aho wakirira abashyitsi ugahabwa n’ifunguro rya mu gitondo ku madolari $690.00 kugeza kuri Suite yo iguha ibyo ukeneye byose (Terrace & Lounge Access-Breakfast) yishyurwa $ 3,540. 4.	Kigali Marriott Hotel Mu 2016 nibwo u Rwanda rwahaye ikaze Marriott Hotel, hoteli y’inyenyeri eshanu igizwe n’ibyumba 254 birimo n’icyo ku rwego rw’abaperezida. Niyo hoteli yayo ya kabiri yari ifunguwe ku mugabane wa Afurika nyuma y’iri mu Misiri. Kuharara byihagazeho, kuko uwagiyemo nko ku wa Mbere agasohokamo kuri uyu wa Kabiri ku mafaranga make byamusabye kwishyura $210, yakenera kujya mu cyumba cyo ku rwego rwo hejuru akishyura $3,500 kandi ku ijoro rimwe gusa. Muri rusange iyi hoteli igizwe n’inyubako umunani zigerekeranye, ikagira ibyumba  229 n’icyo twagereranya n’inzu mu yindi cyangwa suite 25, ziri mu rwego rwo hejuru ku buryo umuntu aba yisanzuye, afite ibyangombwa nkenerwa byose imbere ye. Ifite kandi ahantu 14 hatandukanye hashobora kubera inama. 5.	Bisate Lodge Iyi ni indi nyubako ya Wilderness Safari yubatswe muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga. Bisate ifite ibyumba bitandatu buri kimwe kiri ukwacyo, bishobora kwakira abantu byaba mu buryo bw’umuntu ukeneye kurara wenyine, kurarana n’undi cyangwa guhabwa ibitanda bibiri. Kuharara umuntu yishyura bitewe n’ibihe ndetse no kuba aherekejwe cyangwa ari wenyine. Nk’urugero uwajya kurara muri Bisate Logde muri aya mezi hagati ya tariki 16 Ukuboza 2019 na tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020, byamusaba kwitwaza US$1654. Gusa ashobora no kugabanuka ku mpamvu zitandukanye. 6.	Kigali Serena Hotel Kigali Serena Hotel ni imwe muri hotel zigezweho kandi zifite amazina amaze igihe mu Rwanda, ndetse ho ibiciro byayo iyo ufunguye urubuga rwayo ubisoma mu mafaranga y’u Rwanda. Nibura icyumba gihera ku 215 855 Frw ; hakwiyongeramo ifunguro rya mu gitondo bikaba 246 784 Frw. Ni amadolari ya Amerika asaga $230. Bigenda bizamuka mu biciro bitewe n’imiterere y’icyumba n’ibijyana nacyo, wagera ku byumba byo mu rwego rw hejuru (Junior suite & Suite) ukishyura hagati ya 895 891 Frw na 1.087.018 Frw, ni ukuvuga agera mu madolari ya Amerika $1170. 7.	One and Only Nyungwe House  One & Only Nyungwe House ni hotel iteye amabengeza yubatswe mu nkengero za Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe. Iyi hoteli iri rwagati mu mirima y’icyayi ya Gisakura yongeye gufungurira bose amarembo tariki ya 1 Ukwakira 2018, nyuma yo kuvugururwa no kwagurwa. Yubatswe mu 2010 ku bufatanye na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ihabwa izina rya Nyungwe Forest Lodge, rihinduka mu 2017 nyuma y’uko yeguriwe One & Only Nature Resorts. Hotel za One & Only Nature Resorts zifite umwihariko wo kuba mu gihe zubakwa, hazirikanwa ku kurengera ibidukikije n’urundi rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Ibyumba byayo uko ari 22 bigaragaza ubwiza bw’imitako igaragaza umuco nyarwanda, bituma uwabirayemo abasha kwisobanurira no kurushaho kwegerana n’u Rwanda atabanje kugira uwo asobanuza. Serivisi zo ku rwego rwo hejuru One&Only itanga kandi zinihagazeho kuko ibyumba byabo byishyurwa guhera ku madolari 595 mu ijoro rimwe. Hari kandi n’ikindi cyumba cyagutse (Two-Bedroom Forest Suite), gifite uruganiriro n’aho gufatira amafunguro, kandi kiri ahantu uba witegeye ibyiza bitatse ishyamba rya Nyungwe. Iki cyumba gishobora kwakira abantu bane, kiri mu byumba by’amahoteli bihenze cyane mu Rwanda, kuko cyishyurwa 2 288$. 8.	Amakoro Songa Lodge Amakoro Songa Lodge ni indi nyubako yiyubashye yakira ba mukerarugendo, iherereye mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze. Ni inyubako ziri ahantu hatuje, ku buryo igihe wasuye ingagi mu birunga cyangwa wagiyeyo kuruhuka, hagufasha gusubiza ubwenge ku gihe ukunga ubumwe n’ibvidukikije. Kurara muri izi nyubako nabyo byihagazeho, kuko bisaba kwishyura nibura $1200 ku ijoro rimwe, ndetse hari n’aho wishyura $1500 ku ijoro. Ni inyubako y’akataraboneka ibereye buri wese uri mu kwezi kwa buki. Amakoro Songa Lodge kandi yahawe ubushobozi butuma nk’ababyeyi bafite abana, babona ikibuga gihagije cyo kwidagaduriraho. 9.	The Bishop’s House  The Bishop’s House ni inyubako itazwi na benshi ariko yihagazeho, yubatswe mu Karere ka Musanze gafatwa nk’irembo ry’ubukeraugendo bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu Rwanda, kuko ari iwabo w’Ingagi ziba mu birunga. Uyirebeye inyuma si inyubako y’igitangaza kuko yubatswe mu buryo bwakoreshwaga mu gihe cy’ubukoloni, ariko itanga serivisi zikomeye ndetse n’ibikorwa biyigize birihariye. Ifite ibyumba icyenda byakira ba mukerarugendo. Ibyo bituma nk’icyumba cyayo kinini kuruta ibindi  (executive suite), kukiraramo bisaba umuntu kwishyura $1200 ku ijoro, Deluxe room ikishyurwa $800 ku ijoro naho ibyumba binini bishobora no kujyamo ibitanda bibiri bikishyurwa $700. 10.	Magashi Camp  Iyi ni indi nyubako igezweho yubatswe mu Majyaruguru ya Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, aho uba witegeye ikiyaga cya Rwanyakazinga. Ni hamwe mu hakundwa na ba mukerarugendo banyuranye, baba bajyanwe no gusura inyamaswa ziboneka muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera cyangwa kureba inyoni z’amoko arenga 520. Magashi yifashishije amahema atandatu, yubatswe n’ikigo Wilderness Safaris itahwa muri Gicurasi 2019. Ibiciro byayo byihagazeho kuko kuharara ijoro rimwe, nko mu ihema abantu bashobora gusangira, muri aya mezi akunze gukorerwamo ubukerarugendo kuva ku wa 16 Ukuboza 2019 kugeza ku wa 29 Gashyantare, ni amadolari US$650 ku ijoro. 11. Ruzizi Tented Lodge Ni inyubo igezweho ikoreshwa cyane n’abashaka gukambika muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, aho umuntu aba yitegeye neza ikiyaga cya Ihema. Igizwe n’amahema icyenda ateye neza mu biti bituma hahora umuyaga utagira uko usa. Ishobora kwakira abashyitsi 20 kandi buri hema rikagira ubushobozi bwo gutanga amazi ashyushye n’akonje ku muntu uyakeneye, ikagira umwihariko wo kuba ikoresha ingufu zikomoka ku mirasire y’izuba. Mu mezi atarimo ubukerarugendo ku rwego rwo hejuru nko kuva ku wa 1 Werurwe kugeza ku wa 30 Gicurasi ndetse no kuva ku wa 1 Ukwakira kugeza ku wa 14 Ugushyingo, umunyamahanga ushaka kuharara, ku ihema rigari abantu bashobora kuraranamo bishyura $195 ku ijoro, umuntu umwe akishyura $265, ihema abana bashobora kuraranamo bakishyura $95 mu gihe ihema ryiyubashye ryishyurwa $280. Naho mu bihe bibereye ubukerarugendo, umunyamahanga muri Ruzizi yishyura $235 ku ihema ryagutse (Double tent) abantu bashobora kuraranamo, umuntu umwe akishyura $325, aho abana bashobora kurarana bakishyura $115 naho icyumba cyisumbuyeho kikishyurwa $335. Ibi biciro biragabanuka iyo ari ku banyarwanda cyangwa abanyamahanga bafite ibyemezo byo gutura no gukorera mu Rwanda. Amafoto Songa Amakoro Lodge Bisate Lodge One & Only Nyungwe House Magashi Camp Kigali Marriott Hotel Kigali Serena Hotel Radisson Blu Hotel and Convention Centre Ruzizi Tented Logde Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House The Bishop’s House One & Only Gorilla Nest

title: Inkuru ndende y’urukundo “Amaherezo” igice 2
content: Akenshi mu rukundo habamo ibyishimo bidasanzwe kimwe n’uko ibigeragezo iyo byageze mu rukundo ahanini usanga bake aribo babasha kubyihanganira no kubyakira ariko ugasanga abandi bikabananira guhagarara ku cyemezo bahisemo cyo kujya mu rukundo. Amaherezo Igice cya 2 Ubwo duherukana  Sifa na Jado bari bamaze iminsibadaheruka kuganira ku rubuga rwa Facebook gusa nyine muri icyo gihe umwe iyo yajyaga kuri Facebook ntago yavagaho atagaragarije undi ko yahageze cyane ko ngo Jado yajyaga akunda kugira icyo avuga ku mafoto Sifa yabaga yashyize kurubuga rwe rwa Facebook ibyo rero byagaragazaga ko buri umwe agaragariza undi ko ahari. Rero mu gice gikurikiraho urumva uko byakomeje kugenda. Umunsi umwe Sifa yaje gukora nk’icyo nakwita ishotorana hanyuma yoherereza Jado ifoto ye ariko ayimwoherereza aciye aho bandikira ubutumwa bugufi(Message) rero ako kanyana Jado yahise amwoherereza ifoto ye ari kumwe n’undi mukobwa nuko abwira Sifa ati uwo ni ngewe n’umukunzi wange gusa Sifa ntago yahise amusubiza ariko nyine bakajya bakomeza kuganira umunsi ku munsi  gusa ariko aba bombi  ntago bari barahanye numero za telephone gusa kuko nyine Jado yari umunyeshuli muri kaminuza naho Sifa yigaga mu mashuli yisumbuye ubwo Jado yiganaga n’umuhungu uziranye na Sifa Rero umunsi umwe ngo Jado yari mu nzira atembera hamwe n’uwo mu hungu witwa Gerrard nibwo Jado yamubwiye ati shahu mfite umukobwa tumeranye neza muri iyi minsi kuri facebook ariko nyine ntago nari namwaka aka numero ka telephone ngo nze muvugisha kuri  fone sasa nyine Gerrard ahita amubaza ati wanyeretse amafoto nkareba niba koko aza avuna?, nuko Gerrard akibona ayo mafoto ya Sifa  ahita amubwira ati uyu nguyu wangu ni umuntu nziranye nawe cyane ahubwo mbwira mpite nguha na numero ye niba uyishaka kbsa ndayiguha kuko nge uriya ndamuzi kwishuli n’umu tipe bakundana ni ishumi yange. Ubwo nyine ariko Jado aba afashe numero ya Sifa gusa yirinze ku muhamagara muri iyo minsi sasa rero nyuma nibwo Jado na Sifa bongeye guhurira kuri Facebook baraganira nibwo Jado yahise amusaba numero gusa agiye kuzimuha amuha numero……. Agace gakurikira ntucikwe Yanditswe na Akayezu Snappy/Muhabura.rw

title: Nyamagabe: Polisi yafatiye mu cyuho abangizaga ishyamba rya Leta
content: Umuvugizi wa Polisi  mu ntara y’Amajyepfo, Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Sylvestre Twajamahoro yavuze ko Polisi yahawe amakuru n’abaturage baturiye iryo shyamba bavuga ko hari abantu bigabiza iryo shyamba bakajya kuritemamo ibiti. Yagize ati "Tukimara kumenya ayo makuru twarakurikiranye dufata bariya bagabo bombi barimo kubaza ibiti muri ririya shyamba riri ahitwa Gasasa. Twasanze babanje kubikatamo ingeri zimwe barimo kuzibazamo imbaho izindi barimo kuzitwikamo  amakara." Aba bagabo bombi bahise bashyikirizwa urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe ubugenzacyaha rukorera muri Sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Kitabi kugira ngo hatangire iperereza  ku cyaha bakoze. CIP Twajamahoro yashimiye abaturage bakomeje gufatanya na Polisi mu bikorwa byo kurwanya no gukumira ibyaha batangira amakuru ku gihe. Yagize ati ’’Turashimira abaturage bakomeje gufatanya na Polisi mu kurwanya ibyaha. Ndagira ngo nibutse abangiza ibidukikije cyane cyane amashyamba ko baba bihemukira kandi bahemukira ibinyabuzima byose kuko ariya mashyamba bangiza niyo atanga umwuka mwiza duhumeka ndetse akagira uruhare runini mu gutuma tubona imvura akanafata ubutaka bw’igihugu cyacu ntibutwarwe n’isuri." Itegeko N°48/2018 ryo ku wa 13/08/2018, mu ngingo yaryo ya 44 rivuga ko hagamijwe kurengera ibinyabuzima, ibikorwa bikurikira birabujijwe: gutwika amashyamba, pariki z’Igihugu n’ibyanya; gutwika ibishanga, inzuri, ibihuru, ibyatsi hagamijwe ubuhinzi cyangwa gutunganya inzuri z’amatungo ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa ibyo aribyo byose byangiza ibidukikije birabujijwe. Ingingo ya 59 y’iri tegeko ivuga ko umuntu wese utuma ibimera bikomye bipfa, ubisenya, ubisarura cyangwa ubyangiza, aba akoze icyaha. Iyo abihamijwe n’urukiko, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’imyaka itatu ariko kitarenze imyaka itanu n’ihazabu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda atari munsi ya miliyoni imwe  ariko atarenze miliyoni eshatu.

title: Umugore yafashwe n’indwara idasanzwe yo kutumva ijwi ry’abagabo
content: Mu gihugu cy’Ubushinwa haravugwa umugore wafashwe n’indwara idasanzwe imubuza kumva ijwi riremereye ry’abagabo. Mu ijoro rimwe ni bwo uyu mugore yumvise ibintu muri we bihindutse mu buryo budasanzwe. Byose byatangiye yumva isesemi n’urusaku mu matwi, maze mu gitondo cyaho yisanga atakibasha kumva ijwi ry’umugabo we. Nyuma y’uko izi mpinduka zari zimubayeho mu gihe gito zimuhangayikishije, yahise yihutira kujya kwa muganga aho yahise yitabwaho na Lin Xiaoqing, impuguke ku ndwara zo mu gutwi. "Yaranyumvaga ubwo namuvugishaga. Ariko ubwo undi musore yahageraga ntabwo yamwumvaga na gato avuga.", uyu mugangakazi aganira na Dail Mail aho yayihamirije ko uyu murwayi atabasha kumva na gato amajwi y’abagabo mu gihe abagore abumva neza. Nkuko muganga akomeza abisobanura ngo uyu mugore yaba yarahuye n’uburwayi bwihariye bwo bwo mu gutwi mu rurimi rw’igifaransa bwitwa "surdité en pente inversée" cyangwa "perte auditive en pente de ski inverse". Ibi bikaba biterwa no kugabanuka gukabije ko kubasha kumva amajwi aremereye akunze kumvikana mu miterere y’abagabo, mu gihe ijwi ryoroshye ryo rikomeza kumvikana neza, iri rika rikunze kurangwa n’abagore.

title: Dortmund itsinze Buyern Munich urugamba rwasubira  ibubisi
content:
Germany Bundes Liga Shampiyona y’ubudage yasaga nk’iyihariwe n’ikipe imwe ariyo Buyern Munich. Gusa nyuma yuko iyi Buyern itsindiwe mu rugo na Mainz byongereaye Borussia Dortmund kabiri icyizere cyo guhatana Aya makipe uko ari abiri niya amaze iminsi yihariye iyi shampiyona. Gusa Borussia Dortmund nay ni nko guherekeza kuko ibikombe bitatu biheruka byatwawe na Buyern Munich. Kuri uyu wa 5 Werurwe Dortmund iraza kwakirira Buyern ku kibuga Signal Iduna Park. Uyu mukino wakaniwe cyane na Dortmund kuko nyuma yuko Buyern Munich itsindiwe mu rugo na Mainz, ikinyuranyo cyari hagati yoyo na Dortmund cyahise kiva ku manota 8 hagasigaramo 5. Mu gihe Buyern yatsindwaga ku nshuro yayo ya kabiri kuva shampiyona yatangira, Dortmund yo yari yagiye gutsindira Darmstadt iwayo 2-0.Byongereye imbaraga ku ruhande rwa Dortmund kuko nibatsinda Buyern ikinyuranyo kirasigara ari amanita abiri gusa. Mu mukino uheruka I Munich, Dortmund yahatsindiwe 5-1. Buyern kandi imaze gutsinda imikino 4 muri 5 baherutse gukina harimo n’ibiri bahurira I Signal Iduna Park kwa Dortmund.  Dortmund iheruka gutsinda Buyern muri iyi mikino muri 2014 ubwo batsindaga Buyern 3-0 bikaba ariko byarabaye mu gihe Buyern yari yamaze guhabwa igikombe hasigaye iminsi 7.. Muri iyi myaka itatu ishize nibwo Guardiola na Buyern bagiye ku gitutu nk’iki. Nyuma y’umukino batsindiwemo na Mainz murugo, yagize ati “iyi Dortmund iotandukanye cyane n’iyo twahatanaga mu myaka itatu ishize. Tuzakomeza guhatana kugera ku isagonda rya nyuma.” Kapiteni wa Dortmund Mats Hummels we avugako kuri uyu wagatandatu ngo araba ari indya nkurye ariko ngo barabyiteguye. Guardiola afite imvune nyinshi kurusha mugenzi we wa  Dortmund  Thomas Tuchel, uyu we abura  Sokratis gusa. Buyern yo ibura Jerome Boateng, Javi Martinez na Holger Badstuber. Ibi bituma    Guardiola t agomba guhengeka David Alaba wacaga ibumoso maze agafatanya na   a   Mehdi Benatia hagati mu binyuma.
Lewandowskiayoboye abandi mu bitego n’ibitego 23  mu mikino 23 games  naho  Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang wa Dortmund amukurikiye na  22. Lewondowski yavuze ko nubwo ibyababayeho ubwo bakinaga na Mainz ari ibisanzwe, ngo kuri Dortmund bizahinduka. 

Yanditswe na Rukundo Xaver/Muhabura.rw

title: Joeboy watumiwe muri Kigali Jazz Junction yageze mu Rwanda
content: Mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 26 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Joe Boy yageze ku Kibuga Mpuzamahanga cy’Indege cya Kigali i Kanombe. Igitaramo cya Kigali Jazz Junction giteganyijwe ku wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020. Cyatumiwemo Joeboy uzafatanya na Davis D ugezweho muri iyi minsi kubera indirimbo ye “Dede” na Niyo Bosco wagaragaje ko nubwo afite ubumuga bwo kutabona impano ye y’umuziki ari ikirenga. Niyo Bosco agezweho mu ndirimbo ye ya mbere yasohoye mu minsi ishize akayita “Ubigenza ute?” na "Ibanga" aherutse gushyira hanze. Joeboy ni umwe mu bahanzi bagezweho cyane muri Afurika muri iki gihe ndetse mu banyabirori bo muri Kigali baramuzi cyane kuko indirimbo ze zidasiba gucurangwa mu tubyiniro dutandukanye yaba muri Kigali no hanze yayo. Indirimbo ze zamamaye cyane mu 2019. Aririmba cyane Afro Pop na R&B. Uyu musore w’imyaka 22, yavukiye mu Mujyi wa Lagos muri Nigeria ku wa 21 Gicurasi 1997, akaba ari umwanditsi n’umuririmbyi. Abarizwa mu nzu ifasha abahanzi ya Gorilla Sauce Ent. Banku Music. Yize muri Kaminuza ya Lagos izwi nka UNILAG aho yakuye impamyabumenyi mu bijyanye n’imicungire y’abakozi. Joeboy yatangiye kuririmba ubwo yari afite imyaka 16. Ku myaka 17 akora indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘Gbeseyin’. Yasubiyemo ‘Shape of You’ ya Ed Sheeran yakirwa neza ndetse inatumbagiza izina rye ku rwego ruhambaye. Uyu muhanzi akimara kuririmba iyi ndirimbo ya Sheeran yahise yemererwa na Mr Eazi ubufasha ndetse anamusinyisha mu nzu ye ifasha abahanzi ya Eazi’s "Banku" Music. Mu ndirimbo yakoze zamenyekanye harimo ‘Baby’, ‘Beginning’, ‘All of You’ n’izindi nyinshi zatumye muri iki gihe abarirwa mu bahanzi bahagaze neza muri Nigeria. Amaze gukora album imwe yise ‘Love & Light’. Joeboy aherutse gusohoka ku rutonde rwa BBC rw’abahanzi bo kwitega mu 2020. Amaze gukora album imwe yise ‘Love & Light’. Joeboy aherutse gusohoka ku rutonde rwa BBC rw’abahanzi bo kwitega mu 2020. Joeboy yageze mu Rwanda abisikana n’Umuraperi Jidenna Theodore Mobisson [Jidenna] na we wo muri Nigeria uheruka kuhataramira tariki 29 Ugushyingo 2019 mu gitaramo cyitabiriwe mu buryo bukomeye cyabereye muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village hazwi nka Camp Kigali. Amafoto: Umurerwa Delphin

title: Abanyarwanda bacanye umucyo muri Tokyo Africa Collections (Amafoto)
content:
Ni igikorwa cyabaye ku nshuro ya mbere cyitabiriwe n’Abanyarwanda nyuma y’ubufatanye n’abategura Kigali International Fashion Week. Mbere y’igikorwa aba Banyarwanda bitabiriye Tokyo Fashion Week basuye ibigo bikomeye nka AOKI iri mu bigo bikora amakositimu akomeye mu Buyapani, kompanyi itegura icyayi cy’u Rwanda n’ibindi. Aba Banyarwanda bageze mu Buyapani ku wa 27 Kanama 2019 bazagaruka i Kigali ku wa 5 Nzeri 2019. Abahanga imideli bo mu Rwanda bitabiriye Tokyo Africa Collections barimo Murorunkwere Sandrine ufite inzu ihanga imideli ya Sahorn Fashion House na Karen Uwera ufite inzu y’imideli ya KARSSH Collection. Mu berekana imideli bitabiriye baturutse mu Rwanda barimo Bella Christa Kanyange na Kaneza Lynka Amanda. Kuva mu 2017, ibirori ngarukamwaka bya Kigali Fashion Week byagejejwe ku yindi ntera n’ababitegura bitangira kubera i Burayi nyuma y’imyaka irindwi bibera mu Rwanda gusa. Icyo gihe ku ikubitiro byatangiriye i Berlin mu Budage, bikomereza i Amsterdam mu Buholandi, hanyuma bisorezwa i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi.
Ku wa Gatandatu tariki 6 Nyakanga 2019 habayeho igikorwa cya Kigali Fashion Week ku nshuro yacyo ya cumi kuva gitangijwe mu Rwanda, cyabereye muri Kigali Serena Hotel. Cyahurije hamwe abamurika imideli batandukanye bo mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo ndetse n’abayihanga, biyerekanye mu buryo bwanyuze abacyitabiriye. Herekanwe imyambaro itandukanye irimo iy’inzu zihanga imideli nka Ucoco na The 5 Mith yo mu Burundi, By The Way Clothes yo mu Bubiligi na Gissa Fashion Design yo muri Suède. Abahanga imideli bo mu Rwanda biyerekanye barimo Aqua, Ihogoza Design, Dk Textiles, Iby’iwacu Summer Collection, Mundi Design na Karen Karsh wa Karsh Collections. Sayaka Akimoto ushinzwe kumenyekanisha Tokyo Africa Collection 2019 na Leo Sugo utegura iki gikorwa bari mu bacyitabiriye. Kigali Fashion Week yatangiye mu 2012, itangirana n’ibindi birori birimo icya Kampala, Bujumbura na Nairobi Fashion week. Inategura ibitaramo muri Ghana n’ibindi bihugu bikomeye ndetse yanatangiye ibirori birimo Kigali International Fashion Week ibera mu Buholandi, u Bubiligi, u Budage n’u Bwongereza. Uyu mwaka bazatangira ibindi birori birimo ibizabera i New York, Thailand na Singapore.

title: Umutoza  wavugwaga ko abashobora kuzatoza Rayon Sports yagizwe umutoza wa Yanga
content: Luc Eymael ukomoka ukomoka mu Bubiligi akaba yarigeze gutoza ikipe ya Rayon Sports mu Rwanda muri 2014 ni we wagizwe umutoza mukuru w’ikipe ya  Young African SC yo muri Tanzania. Uyu mutoza  ufite imyaka 60 y’amavuko yahawe aka  kazi asimbuye Boniface Mkwasa wari umutoza w’agateganyo nyuma y’uko iyi kipe yari itandukanye na  Mwinyi Zahera ukomoka muri RDC. Luc Eymael wavuye muri Rayon Sports kubera  ibihaho yari yahawe na FERWAFA nyuma y’imvururu zabaye ku mukino wa Rayon Sports na AS Kigali  byakomeje kuvugwa ko ashobora kugaruka muri iyi  kipe dore ko ubwo Rayon Sports yatandukanaga na Roberto Oliveira Gonçalves do Carmo “Robertinho”  yavuzwe mu bashobora kumusimbura ubwo umwaka  w’imikino wa 2019-2020 watangiraga nyuma haza Espinoza ukomoka muri Mexique. Nyuma y’imikino ibanza, Rayon Sports yatandukanye na Espinoza nabwo hongera kumvikana amakuru y’uko uyu mutoza Luc Eymael yaza muri Rayon Sports kuko  na we yari amaze gutandukana n’ikipe ya Black Leopards muri Afurika y’Epfo. Uyu mutoza yakinnye umupira w’amaguru ari umunyezamu kuva mu 1975 kugeza  muri 2000. Kuva mu 1999, Luc Eymael yatangiye akazi ko gutoza aho yaciye mu makipe atandukanye. Muri 2010 ni bwo yinjiye muri Afurika ariko kugeza ubu amaze guca mu makipe 13 mu myaka 10. Niyomugabo Albert \Muhabura.rw

title: Gabon: Ali Bongo yerekeje mu Bwongereza ariko "ntagiye mu bitaro"
content: Umukuru w’igihugu cya Gabon, Perezida Ali Bongo Ondimba umaze iminsi agarukwaho cyane kubera uburwayi bwamuzahaje, kuri ubu yerekeje i London mu biruhuko aho azakomeza no kwisuzumishiriza akurikirana ubuzima bwe. Amakuru yatangajwe n’Ibiro by’Umukuru w’igihugu wa Gabon, yanyomozaga ibyavugwaga ko ubuzima bwa Bongo bukomeje kujya aharindumuka nyuma y’umwaka umwe ahuye n’ikibazo cyo gucika udutsi two mu bwonko. Nyuma yaho Ali Bongo agiriye iki kibazo hakomejekumvikana ibihuha byinshi bigaruka kuri uyu mukuru w’igihugu aho kugeza ubu amaze kugaragara ndetse akanavu inshuro nke zishoboka mu ruhame kuva yagaruka mu gihugu muri Werurwe uyu mwaka avuye kwivuriza hanze y’igihugu. Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 60 y’amavuko yafashwe n’ubu burwayo mu Ukwakira 2018 ubwo yari mu ruzinduko rw’akazi muri Arabiya Sawudite aho yahise yivuriza nyuma  yerekeza no muri Maroc. Itangazo rya Perezidanse rivuga ko "Nta na rimwe ubuzima bwa perezida bwigeze busubira inyuma(…) Ali Bongo Ondimba arimo kugarura ubushobozi bwose bw’umubiri we." Iri tangazo ry’ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu cya Gabon rikomeza rivuga ko Ali Bongo aguma kuyobora igihugu kandi azagaruka vuba. Source:BBC Afrique

title: Umunyamakuru w’icyamamare mu Buholandi yaryohewe n’ibyiza by’u Rwanda
content: Humberto ni umunyamakuru w’icyamamare kuri Televiziyo ya RTL mu Buholandi, ayobora ibiganiro kuri iyi televiziyo ya mbere mu gutambutsa ibiganiro by’ubucuruzi. Uretse kuba umunyamakuru w’umwuga, Humberto ni umufotozi utarabigize umwuga, akurikirwa n’abasaga 378,000 kuri Instagram. Ishingiye ku kuba ari umunyamakuru w’icyamamare kandi akurikirwa n’abantu benshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi ifatanyije n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB), yamutumiye ngo asure u Rwanda mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha ibyiza by’igihugu, muri gahunda ya Visit Rwanda. Humberto Tan yakiriye ubwo butumire neza, asura u Rwanda tariki 15 uku kwezi, yishimira uburyo Abanyarwanda bamwakiriye, umuco n’ahantu nyaburanga yasuye harimo Pariki z’Akagera n’Ibirunga, ikiyaga cya Kivu n’Umujyi wa Kigali. Urugendo rwo gusura Ingagi ni rumwe mu byo avuga yabonye mu Rwanda atazibagirwa. Yagize ati “Icyantangaje cyane ni ukuntu Ingagi zicisha bugufi kandi bigaragara ko zifite imbaraga, Ingagi y’ingabo ya Silverback ifite ubudahangarwa, iguma yitegereza buri kimwe cyose kandi ihora yiteguye kuba yatabara hagize icyinjirira umuryango wayo. Twakoze urugendo rw’amasaha abiri n’igice yo kujya guhura n’Ingagi kandi guhura nazo ni iby’agaciro cyane”. Abamukurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nabo batangariye urugendo rwe mu Rwanda. Umwe yagize ati “Byiza cyane, uri umunyamahirwe kuba warabashije gukora uru rugendo, ubu noneho warukura ku rutonde rw’ibyo wari wariyemeje kuzageraho mu buzima bwawe”. Undi nawe ati “Nibyo se koko warazibonye amaso ku maso ku manywa y’ihangu? Amafoto wahafatiye ni meza cyane”. Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Jean Pierre Karabaranga, mu gusobanura iby’uru rugendo yagize ati  “Gahunda ya Visit Rwanda imaze kwamamara mu gihugu cy’u Buholandi, kuva aho itangiriye twahafunguje ibiro bishinzwe kuyamamaza ndetse mu mwaka wa 2019, twatunganije ingendo zitandukanye z’abanyamakuru na ba rwiyemezamirimo mu by’ubukerarugendo bw’Abaholandi batandukanye baje gusura u Rwanda.” Yakomeje agira ati “Uretse ibyo Humberto Tan yatangaje ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, hari n’indi nkuru yasohotse ku wa Gatandatu w’icyumweru gishize ku rupapuro rwa mbere rw’ikinyamakuru cya mbere mu binyamakuru bisohora inkuru zanditse cyitwa, TELEGRAAF.” Yavuze ko “Kuva tariki ya 15 kugera 19 Mutarama uyu mwaka, gahunda ya  Visit Rwanda irimo  kwitabira imurikabikorwa ry’ubukererarugendo rya mbere mu Buholandi, ryitwa ‘Vakantiebeurs’, riri kubera mu mujyi wa Utrecht.” Yavuze ko bakiriye  intumwa z’u Rwanda zirimo abahagarariye RDB ndetse na ba rwiyemezamirimo batandukanye barimo abavuye muri Sosiyete y’ubwokerezi bwo mu kirere, RwandAir, Amahoro Tours, Heritage Travel, Palast Tours & Travel na Wildlife Tours Rwanda. Yagaragaje ko mu gutangiza iri murikabikorwa ku munsi wa mbere, bafatanyije n’ikigo cyitwa Untamed Travellers mu kwakira kuri stand yabo ya Visit Rwanda,  ba rwiyemezamirimo n’abanyamakuru mu bukerarugendo basaga 200.  Thank you Hambara!! #silverback #visitrwanda🇷🇼 #liveforthestory #canonnederland #Gorilla #gorillas #Rwanda #Africa #Afrika A post shared by  Humberto Tan (@humbertotan) on Jan 15, 2020 at 9:09pm PST  Wat. Een. Ervaring!!! Deze machtige berggorilla's laten je gewoon toe in hun wereld. Wat mij vooral opviel? Hun zachte energie! Het dominante mannetje, de Silverback, houdt alles goed in de gaten en grijpt in waar het nodig is. Normaal moeten mensen minimaal 7 meter afstand houden tenzij de gorilla's de mens opzoeken of zij aangeven dat het oké is. Dat doen ze met een diepe brom. We hebben ruim 2.5 uur gelopen om ze te vinden masr het is het meer en meer dan waard!!!! #Rwanda #Gorilla's A post shared by  Humberto Tan (@humbertotan) on Jan 15, 2020 at 4:42am PST

title: Hamisa Mobeto yagize icyo avuga ku mihini aherutse guhondagurwa na nyina wa Diamond
content:
Umwiryane ukomeye hagati ya nyina wa Diamond ariwe Sanura Kassim n’umukazana we Hamisa Mobeto byakajije umurego, byarenze guterana amagambo bihinduka imirwano umwe akubita undi amurema ibiguma yafatanye mu mashingu na Hamisa Mobeto mu cyumweru gishize.Aho uyu mukecuru w’intarumikwa yiyemereye ko ari we washoje iyi mirwano ubwo yasangaga uyu mukobwa yari yararanye n’umwana we Diamond Platnumz mu gitanda. Yabyemeye avuga ko yamukubise nyuma y’uko yamusanze yari yararanye na Diamond mu rugo rwe ruri ahitwa Madale kandi ngo yari yaramwihanije kenshi ko atamwifuza mu muryango we na gato. Mu kiganiro Hamisa Mobeto yagiriye kuri Wasafi TV, yavuze ko ibyabaye hagati ye na nyina wa Diamond atari intambara ahubwo ari ubushyamirane busanzwe mu bantu. Asubiza ku byerekeranye n’imirwano yabaye hagati ye na nyina wa Diamond, Hamisa Mobeto yavuze ko ‘n‘Ibikombe mu kabati biragongana’ bityo ko nta kidasanzwe cyabaye hagati ye na Sanura Kassim. Yabanje gukikira iby’iki kibazo avuga ko ari ubuzima bwe bwite adashaka kuvugaho mu itangazamakuru. Hamisa Mobeto yagize ati “Ibyo sinshaka kubivugaho, Yego! Ni ibindeba cyane, ni ubuzima bwite, ni ibireba umuryango.” Abanyamakuru bakomeje kumwotsa igitutu ngo asobanure niba koko yarakubiswe na nyina wa Diamond yahise asubiza ati “N’ibikombe bibitse mu kabati hari igihe kigera bikagongana, rero natwe abantu bishobora kutubaho.” Uyu mukobwa yavuze mu buryo buca hejuru ko yagiranye ubushyamirane na nyina wa Diamond gusa yongeraho ati “Nta muntu mfitanye na we ikibazo, nta mujinya mfitiye umuntu, njyewe ndatuje keretse we ku ruhande rwe, ku bwanjye sinjye wabisobanura.” Diamond uherutse gutangaza ko yifuza kurushinga bitarenze uyu mwaka, yubuye umubano na Hamisa Mobeto babyaranye ndetse bivugwa ko ari we mukobwa bazasezerana nubwo mu muryango nta n’umwe umwifuza habe na gato. Uyu mucyecuru Nyina wa Diamond avuga ko atifuza na gato kubona mu maso ye Hamisa Mobeto ndetse ngo umutima we warazinutswe. Queen Darleen mushiki wa Diamond yiyumvamo cyane Zari cyo kimwe na nyina Sandra, mu gihe Esma Platnumz we yikundira Wema Sepetu ndetse ngo ahora asaba musaza we kongera kuvugurura ubumwe n’uyu mukinnyi wa film. Hamisa Mobetto na Diamond Platnumz bafitanye umwana w’umuhungu witwa Prince Dylan witegura kuzuza umwaka umwe muri Kanama 2018 naho undi mwana w’imfura Mabeto afite ni uwo yabyaranye na Dj Majay .




Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Fc Barcelona yaraye yikuye mukimwaro yagiriye ku kibuga cya Ath Bilbao
content:
Championa y’igihugu cya Espagne La Liga yaraye ifunguwe ku mugaragaro gusa ikipe ya Fc Barcelona yatangiranye imbaraga zidasanzwe n’ubwo umukinnyi Lionel Messie yatangiye ahusha penality mu gihe mugenzi we Luis Swarez yatangiranye igitego ku mukino wa mbere. 

Messsie yahushishe penality Ikipe ya Fc Barcelone benshi bahamyaga ko ishobora kuba igiye gutangira Championa nabi cyane ko imwe mu mikino bamaze iminsi bitabira yagendaga itabyitwara mo neza cyane ko iherutse gutsindwa ibitego bigera kuri 04 byose mu gihe bitari bimenyerewe ko ikipe ya Fc Barcelona itsindwa ibitego byinshi bene ako kageni. 

Ibyishimo byinshi kuri Swarez N’ubwo ikipe ya Barcelone itangiye Championa neza ariko mucyeba wayo Real Madrid yo nti nta mahirwe yatangiranye cyane ko yatangiye inganya na ubusa ku busa na Sporting de Gijon. Urutonde rw’uko amakipe ahagaze nyuma y’umunsi wambere wa Championa
