title: Rusizi:Abakinnyi b’ikipe y’abagore batewe mpaga bicara mu kibuga amasaha 4 bahakurwa na Guverineri
content:
Mu irushanwa ry’igikombe cyitiriwe imiyoborere myiza Kagame cup, ikipe y’abagore y’umurenge wa Rwimbogo ihagarariye akarere ka Rusizi yatewe mpaga n’ikipe y’akarere ka Ngorerero kuri stade ya Rusizi izira gukererwa yangak kuva mu kibuga kuva 10h30 kugeza 14h, ivuga ko ugukererwa kutabaturutseho. N’ibintu bitakiriwe neza n’ikipe y’abagore ba Rusizi kugeza ubwo banze kuva mu kibuga hakiyambazwa inzego z’ubuyobozi bw’akarere ndetse n’izumutekano bikananirana kugeza ubwo guverineri w’intara y’uburengerazuba yaje kwiyizira muri stade aba bagore bakabona kuva mu kibuga cyagombaga gukinirwamo na basaza babo. Mu bigaragarira amaso aba bagore bari barakaye cyane, aho batatinyaga n’inzego z’umutekano nyuma yo guterwa mpaga batumva impamvu yayo kuko basobanuraga ko bakererewe ku mpamvu zitabaturutseho cyane ko ngo bohererejwe imodoka yo kubatwara amasaha yamaze kurenga, kandi n’abasifuzi bagombaga gusifura uyu mukino ngo nabo bakerewe. Impungenge bagize n’iz’uko iri terwa mpanga rishobora kuba ryihishe inyuma ya ruswa kuko ntibiyumvisha uburyo baterwa mpaga bahari ari nayo mpamvu yatumye bicara mu kibuga bakanga kukivamo. Umwe muri bo yagize ati ”Turasaba uduhagarariye mu karere abasabe baze batwereke igihe batereye mpaga kuko nzi ko umukino nkuyu iyo wateguwe haba hari abayobozi hakagaragara gihamya z’ibyabaye kuko baduteye mpaga duhari.” Umwe mu ba motari witwa Hategekimana Calliope ntiyagiye ukubiri n’uyu mukinnyi aho yemeza ko ari mubazanye abasifuzi ku kibuga bakahagera saa yine aribwo bahahuriye n’abakinnyi. Ati ”Abasifuzi tubavanye mu mujyi tubazana hano kuri stade baje gusifura. twageze hano nka saa yine. ikipe ya Rwimbogo nayo ihita yinjira.” Guverineri w’intara y’uburengerazuba,Munyentwari Alphonse Guverineri, akihagera abakinnyi bahise bemera kuva mu kibuga ahita avuga ko bagiye gukurikirana mu maguru mashya iby’iki kibazo kugira ngo niba hari ababirenganiyemo barenganurwe. Ati “Twabyumvise mwabonye ko twaje ikibazo kigakemuka kubera ko no gukina byasaga n’ibyananiranye ndetse no kuva mu kibuga". Akomeza agira ati"Iyi ni imikino y’imiyoborere myiza kandi ifite amategeko, nkurikije uko twabajije mpaga yatewe ikurikije amategeko kubera ko ikipe yakerereweho isaha ariko twakomeza gushaka amakuru ariko kandi hari n’amategeko ateganya ko iyo wumva warenganye ushobora kwandika bikigwa ukaba warenganurwa.” Naho komiseri muri iri rushanwa ku rwego rw’intara, Nepomuscene Harerimana, we yizeza abo bakinnyi ko abayobozi b’uturere ku mpande zombi nibumvikana iyo mpaga yavanwaho. Harerimana ati “Twarindiriye igihe kirekire kugira ngo turebe ko bakumvikana hanyuma bananiwe kumvikana icyagombaga gukorwa ntakindi ni Mpaga, ariko abayobozi b’uturere twombi nibo bafite gukemura iki kibazo mu biganza byabo baramutse babyumvikanyeho mpaga yavanwaho.” Bakimara kuva mu kibuga hahise hakurikiraho umukino w’ikipe y’abagabo y’umurenge wa Muganza uhagarariye akarere ka Rusizi muri iri rushanwa yahuye n’ihagarariye akarere ka Ngororero birangira ikipe ihagarariye akarere ka Rusizi itsinze ibitego bitatu kuri kimwe.

Abo mu nzego z’umutekno bakoze uko bashoboye ngo abakinnyi bave mu kibuga ariko bababera ibamba
Guverineri Munyentwari yavuze ko bagiye gukurikirana mu maguru mashya iki kibazo abarenganye bakarenganurwa
Niyomugabo Albert/MUHABURA.RW

title: Turahirwa azahagararira u Rwanda mu iserukiramuco ry’imideli muri Ghana
content: Ku myaka 24 y’amavuko, Turahirwa Moise [uyobora Moshions House] ni umwe mu bahanzi b’imideli bakomeye mu Karere bazitabira iserukiramuco ry’imideli rya Mercedes Benz African Fashion Festival rizamara iminsi itatu kuva ku itariki ya 1 Nyakanga kugeza kuwa 3 Nyakanga 2016. Azahura n’abanyamideli baturutse mu bihugu birenga mirongo itanu birimo ibyo muri Afurika, Amerika n’u Burayi. Ati “Ni hafi ibihugu byose bya Afurika, mu bo nabashije kumenyamo nabonye abazaturua muri Amerika, u Bwongereza, Ghana, abo muri Kenya, Afurika y’Epfo n’abandi.” Turahirwa yabwiye IGIHE ko ari gutegura imbumbe y’imideli [collection] azerekana mu Mujyi wa Accra ndetse ngo ari kubyitegura neza kugira ngo azaheshe ishema igihugu. Ati “Mfite collection nshyashya nzerekana, ntabwo nzongera gusubiramo ibyo nerekanye muri Tanzania mu minsi ishize. Ndi kubyitegura neza, batoranyije abanyamideli b’abahanga mu bihugu byose, urumva rero biransaba kubyitondera.” Mercedes Benz African Fashion Festival 2016, yihaye intego yo kwifashisha abanyamideli bakumvikanisha akamaro ko kwiga mu bakiri bato no kurandura burundu indwara ya Glaucoma muri Afurika. Muri Mutarama 2016, Turahirwa yagiye muri Nigeria mu irushanwa rya Mister Africa International, icyo gihe yabaye igisonga cya Gatatu mu gihe umusore wo muri Uganda witwa Keith Karuhuura yaje ku mwanya wa mbere agirwa Rudasumbwa w’Umugabane wa Afurika.

title: Amafoto mpangano y’abami batwaye u Rwanda imyaka 870 n’abagabekazi babo
content: Hifashishijwe ibisigo by’Abasizi bisingiza Abami n’ingoma zabo ndetse n’Abacurabwenge bari abarinzi b’amateka n’intekerezo z’igihugu, hiyongereyeho n’Abiru bari abanyamabanga n’abagaragu b’ingoma, hakusanyijwe amateka y’u Rwanda kuva mu ntango yarwo ubwo Gihanga I Ngomijana yashyiragaho imfatiro z’igihugu kugera ubwo Ingoma cya cyami yasimburwaga na Repubulika. Mu bakoreye mu ngata Gihanga I Ngomijana harimo ubuvivi bwe Ndoba watwaye u Rwanda ahasaga mu wa 1213 kugera 1246 arangwa n’ibitekerezo bihanitse mu bumenyi mu by’ibidukikije, inyamaswa n’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima. Muri make Ndoba yari afite ubuhanga karemano muri siyansi, dore ko ari nawe dukesha ibirangamuryango nko kuba Abasinga barangwa na Sakabaka, Abashambo bakarangwa n’Intare, Abenengwe bakarangwa n’Ingwe mu gihe Abega barangwa n’Ibikeri, byose ni we tubikesha. Hari kandi na Ruganzu Bwimba watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1312 kugera mu 1345 wabaye imbimbuzi mu ndwanyi zaranze amateka y’u Rwanda mu guhirimbanira ubuhangange bw’igihugu. Niwe wagabye igitero cya mbere atera Gisaka yashakaga gusibanganya u Rwanda we arayitanga arayitera. Ni we dukesha kurwanira ishyaka igihugu, cyane cyane mu guhangana n’abagomera umurage wa Gihanga w’igihugu gisangiwe. Nta n’uwarenza ingohe Cyilima Rugwe, watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1345 kugera mu 1378, umutekerereza w’ubutabera bwunga mu mateka y’u Rwanda. Ni we washyizeho Inkiko z’Umuryango, iz’Abunzi n’iza Gacaca agena n’uko ibihano bizajya bitangwa ku bagomye. Yashakaga ko u Rwanda ruba igihugu kizira icyaha, abyubakira ku guhana igihango nk’uburyo bwo gukumira icyaha kitaraba. Nta n’uwakwibagirwa Ruganzu II Ndoli, watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu 1510 kugera mu 1543 wari indwanyi karundura, wadukanye amatwara yo guhangana n’amahanga adakunda u Rwanda akayagusha ruhabo, akarwagura kurusha abandi bami bose dore ko yarwometseho ibihugu icyenda. Hari inzobere kandi muri dipolomasi Mutara Semugeshi, watwaye u Rwanda mu 1543 kugera mu 1576, ni we mwami dukesha politiki ya mbere y’ububanyi n’amahanga, yubatse kandi imiyoborere ihamye mu kwegereza ubuyobozi abaturage aho yashyizeho inzego zisaga 75 nk’Intebe y’Abasizi, Abatware b’Ubutaka, Abatware b’Inyambo, Intebe y’Abahaditsi (abavuzi b’amatungo - vétérinaire), Intebe y’Abahoryo (Agronome), Intebe y’Abamotsi (abari bashinzwe itangazamakuru ry’ibwami) n’izindi. Ni we washyizeho uburyo bw’imisimburanire y’Abami ku ngoma bijyanye n’inshingano zabo nk’aho Umwami Mutara yabaga ashinzwe kwagura ubworozi bw’inka yakurikirwaga na Kigeli wari umwami w’intambara, Mibambwe wari ushinzwe uburumbuke, Yuhi wari umwami usigasira amahoro bityo bityo. Ntitwakwibagirwa n’abandi nka Cyilima Rujugira (1675 – 1708), wadukanye intero y’u Rwanda rutera rudaterwa, Yuhi Gahindiro (1746-1802) wazanye gahunda z’ubugiraneza nka Girinka na Kigeli Rwabugili (1859-1895) wacecekesheje ibihugu byashakaga kwiyomora ku Rwanda. Mu mateka y’Isi n’ibihangange byayibayemo nk’Abami b’u Rwanda, benshi baburiwe irengero, amasura yabo aribagirana kuko nta buryo bwariho bwo gufata amafoto no kuyashyingura ariko ibikorwa byabo bikaba bikibukwa kuko basize imusozi amavugwa y’ibikorwa bihanitse. Umushakashatsi ku mateka y’u Rwanda, Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, yahereye aho maze akusanya ibitekerezo by’ubuzima bwaranze aba bakurambere, yifashisha abahanga mu gushushanya bahanga amafoto y’abami b’u Rwanda, cyane umwami wa mbere wafotowe yari Kigeli Rwabugili mu 1894, abandi bamubanjirije ntawe uzi neza uko basaga. Aya mafoto mpangano y’Abami b’u Rwanda n’Abagabekazi babo, yakozwe n’umunyabugeni Mugisha Paul wize ku Nyundo, yashyizwe hanze bwa mbere mu gitabo ‘‘Intwari z’Imbanza, zubatse u Rwanda rugahamya igitinyiro” cyasohotse muri Gicurasi 2018. Uko ubumenyi n’ikoranabuhanga bigenda bikwira ku Isi yose rero, abahanga bagiye bitabaza inyurabwenge maze bakazimbura amasura y’abo bantu babayeho mu myaka ibihumbi kugira ngo bajye bayifashisha mu kubavuga ibigwi no kubagiraho icyitegererezo, ariko batari za baringa cyangwa umuntu udashobora kubonwa. Ni muri urwo rwego hariho amafoto ya Yesu, Mariya, Yozefu, intumwa za Yesu 12, Musa wavanye Abayisiraheli mu Misiri n’abandi. Nsanzabera avuga ko ‘‘Abo bagize ibikorwa bakora ku Isi n’ubu bikiri intangarirwa, kandi amafoto yabo mpangano akaba yaramamaye mu buryo buhanitse ndetse ntashidikanyweho ko aribo koko.’’ Nk’abakoze ishusho ya Yezu, icyo bakoze ni ukureba ku bikorwa bye, amateka yamuranze n’imyitwarire ye ku Isi, barema amafoto mpangano ye kugira ngo buri wese ajye abasha kumubona mu buryo bugenekereje. Mu gushushanya amafoto mpangano agenekereje y’abami b’u Rwanda, hagendewe ku bushakashatsi bushingiye ku bikorwa byabaranze, uruhererekane-mvugo rw’ibyabaye ku ngoma zabo, imishyingiranire y’umuryango w’abami b’u Rwanda n’indi miryango migari y’Abanyarwanda, igenantekerezo (Philosophie) n’imyitwarire yaranze Abami b’u Rwanda ndetse n’ikigero cy’imyaka y’ubukure mu iyimikwa ryabo. Nsanzabera ati “Ese niba umwami runaka yarakoze ibikorwa bikomeye mu kubaka u Rwanda, aho ntiyasaga atya? Iyo ni imwe mu ngingo yitaweho cyane mu kugenekereza amafoto y’abami b’u Rwanda. Kuko kenshi imirimo y’umuntu isa n’isura ye, ikanahamya umutima wamuranze mu bihe byose.’’ Aya mafoto mpangano yanashingiye ku kigero cy’ubukure cy’abami n’abagabekazi. Hari aho atandukanye mu kigero cy’ubukure bitewe n’uko hari abagiye bimikwa bafite imyaka ibiri, abari abasore b’ibihame, abahawe ingoma bakiri ingimbi n’abayihawe bakuze cyane. Ni nako byagenze ku Bagabekazi kuko hari abagiye bapfakara bakiri bato, umwami agatanga, bakiri ibirongore, abandi ugasanga bari bakiri abagore b’amariza n’ibindi. Intego ya Nsanzabera ni uko ababyifuza bakoresha amafoto mpangano mu nyandiko na filime zirebana n’amateka y’u Rwanda mu kwerekana amashusho y’abami n’abagabekazi. Aya mafoto ni uburiza bw’andi yaranze u Rwanda mu bihe bitandukanye, azasohoka mu bindi bitabo.

title: Ngomba kwemera kuzaryamana nawe kugira ngo atazabivuga?- Mungire inama
content:
Umugabo wanjye tumaze imyaka irindwi tubana, natangiye kumuca inyuma mu myaka ibiri ishize bitewe n’impamvu nyinshi, zirimo kutabasha kunshimisha no kwiruka mu bakobwa bakiri bato.
 Kubera ukuntu nari maze kumufata inshuro zirenga eshatu yasohokanye n’udukobwa  byatumye nanjye mfata icyemezo cyo gukundana n’umusore wari umaze iminsi anyirukaho ansaba urukundo. Mu by’ukuri sindi indaya ariko uwo musore twarakundanye cyane urukundo rwacu rusa nk’aho nta cyerekezo rufite ari urwo kwishimisha gusa. Twari tumaze igihe dukunda gusohokana tukagenda mu gitondo tukitemberera tukarya ubuzima, nimugoroba tugataha ku buryo umugabo wanjye atarabukwa. Mu cyumweru gishize nibwo twasohokanye ahantu, turagenda turarya, turanywa, turangije dufata icyumba turaryama turaruhuka, nimugoroba mbere yo gutaha mbanza kujya kwiyuhagira. Nkisohoka nibwo nakubitanye n’umuturanyi nkenyereye igitenge mu mabere bigaragara ko mbyutse ambonye akubitwa n’inkuba ambaza icyo ndi gukora aho, mu gihe ngishaka ibyo mubeshya wa musore dukundana aba arasohotse nawe yiyambariye agakabutura gato. Nahise mpagarara mera nk’ipoto. Uwo muturanyi yahise yumirwa arigendera, ariko ngize amahirwe ntiyabibwira umugabo kandi ni inshuti ye bajya basangira agacupa. Ariko nyuma yaho uwo muturanyi yaje mu rugo asanga arinjye uhari njyenyine arambwira ngo ngomba kwemera kuzaryamana nawe kugira ngo atazabivuga. Ubu yampaye umunsi tugomba kuzahurira aho hantu yatubonye, ngo azahansange niteguye ko turyamana ngo naho ubundi ninanga azahita abivuga. Ubu ndi kwibaza niba nzamwemerera tukaryamana kugira ngo atamvamo, cyangwa niba nzemera gusenya kuko amvuyemo urugo rwanjye rwahita rusenyuka. Yanditswe na Bakunzi Emile Muhabura.rw

title: RICTA n’abafatanyabikorwa basuzumye uko Internet n’ikoranabuhanga rigezweho byitabirwa mu Rwanda
content: Iyi nama ngarukamwaka itegurwa na RICTA, n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa bafite aho bahuriye n’ikwirakwizwa rya internet. Ibiganiro by’uyu mwaka bikaba byibanze ahanini ku kwimakazwa ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu guhindura ubuzima bw’abanyarwanda bukaba bwiza kurushaho. Ikindi ni uko barebeye hamwe uko abanyarwanda bumva ibijyanye na internet, uko bayikoresha n’uko bayigeraho. Umunyamabanga uhoraho muri Minisiteri y’Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho na Inovasiyo, Irere Claudette, yasabye abitabiriye iyi nama kuzajya babanza kureba niba ingamba zifatwa mu ikoranabuhanga ziri mu nyungu z’abaturage. Ati “Dukwiriye kureba neza niba ingamba, amahame n’amabwiriza dushyiraho biba birengera kandi byungura abaturage. Abaturage bacu nibashyirwa imbere, bazagira uruhare mu ikorwa ry’ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bityo babe abaturage bakungahaye mu ikoranabuhanga rigezweho.” Ku bijjyanye n’uko umubare munini w’abanyarwanda badafite ubumenyi ku ikoranabuhanga rigezweho, Umuyobozi wa RICTA, Ingabire Grace, yavuze ko umwaka utaha bafite gahunda yo kwigisha ubumenyi bw’ibanze kuri internet mu bigo by’amashuri na za kaminuza. Yagize ati “Umwaka utaha dufite ibikorwa bitandukanye, aho tuzajya muri za kaminuza, mu mashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye, tukazatangira kwigisha ubumenyi bw’ibanze kuri murandasi ku buryo abantu bose guhera ku rwego rwo hasi baziyumvamo murandasi icyo ari cyo.” Ingabire yongeyeho ko kwegereza abaturage ikoranabuhanga rigezweho bitari ukubakwirakwizamo imashini gusa cyangwa kubigisha uko bazifungura, ahubwo ari ukubigisha uburyo bazikoresha mu guhindura ubukungu n’iterambere ry’ubuzima bwabo. Kugeza ubu abanyarwanda bafite ubumenyi ku ikoranabuhanga rigezweho bari munsi 10%, mu gihe imibare igaragazwa n’Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe Ikoranabuhanga mu Itumanaho n’Isakazabumenyi (RISA) ivuga ko 52% aribo bakoresha Internet mu Rwanda.

title: Huye: Hari abagabo bumva ko uburinganire bwaje kubangamira ubutware bwabo mu ngo
content:
Nyuma y’uko u Rwanda rutangije gahunda yo gushishikariza abaturage kumva no kubahiriza ihame ry’uburinganire, hari bamwe mu bagabo batuye mu Karere Huye mu murenge wa Karama bavuga ko basanga iri hame ryaratumye abagore babo babasuzugara ndetse bamwe barifashe nk’uburyo bwo kubaka ubutware. Bruno Keretsimana we yemeza ko ririya hame rishyira imbere abagore kurusha abagabo. Ngo nubwo we bitaramubaho uyu mugabo ugeze mu zabukuru ahamya ko abibona cyane mu baturanyi. Yemeza ko abagabo barenganywa n’abagore babo ariko bakirinda kujyana ibibazo byabo imbere y’ubuyobozi ngo bubarenganure bagahitamo kwicecekera.

Bruno Keretsimana avuga ko ihame ry’uburinganire ryambuye abagabo ubutware "Nta nyundo iremera ngo irute uwayicuze! Nonese ubu ko abagore basigaye bashaka kuremera ngo bikuze barute abagabo kandi Imana yaradushyizeho (abagabo)? Imana yagugaye umufasha wawe ngo mwumvikane mufashanye ariko wowe ugashaka kwikuza ukajya hejuru ngo ni uburinganire. Iyo byanze rero wowe udafite intege urabyihorera, umugore akakwigiraho ibyo ashaka.", Keretsimana asobanura uburyo uburringanire bwambuye abagabo ubutware Bavuga ko basigaye barenganywa n’abagore babo bishingikirije ’Uburinganire’ Mu gusobanura uburyo abagabo basigaye bahohoterwa n’abagore babo, umuturage witwa Ntaribi Venanti aganira na KIGALI POST yagize ati “Biriho rwose, usanga hari abagore bishyira imbere, ugasanga bararenganya abagabo. Njyewe hari abo nzi benshi bakubita abagabo babo. Umugore agakubita umugabo cyangwa ugasanga afashe nk’itungo ararigurishije atamugishije inama.”
 Undi musaza nawe avuga ko uburenganzira bw’abagore ari bwo asanga buvugwa cyane mu bayobozi no mu itangazamakuru, yewe bukanitabwaho cyane kurusha ubw’abagabo, bigatuma abagabo batinya kugaragaza ihohoterwa bakorerwa. Ati:“Ukuntu biteye rero hari abagore barengana hari n’abagabo barengana, ariko uburenganzira bw’abagore bukaba aribwo bwitabwaho. Iyo wenda habaye amakimbirane usanga umugore yumvwa cyane." Ubuyobozi bw’uyu murenge wa Karama nabwo bwemeza ko kiriya kibazo gihari ariko giterwa ahanini n’imyumvire ya bamwe mu bagore n’abagabo itari yo kuri iri hame. Arsène Kabalisa uyobora Umurenge wa Karama avuga ko bo bakira abagabo n’abagore baje kubagezaho ihohotera bakorerwa, gusa agahamya ko benshi mu bamugezaho ihohoterwa ari abagore. Ibi ngo biterwa n’uko abagabo bamaze kwishyiramo imyumvire y’uko badashobora kurenganurwa, abandi bakagira ipfunwe ryo kwerura ngo bavuge ihohoterwa bakorerwa n’abagore babo.

Arsène Kabalisa, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Karama Mu magambo ye, Arsène Kabalisa yagize ati: “Ntekereza ko nk’abayobozi dufite inshingano zo kumva buri wese yaba umwana, umugore, umugabo n’ugeze mu zabukuru. Ahubwo hari imbogamizi kuri bamwe mu bagabo kuko baterura ngo bavuge ko bahohoterwa n’abagore babo, ntibarabyumva cyane.” Avuga ko kimwe mu bibabuza kubivuga ariko niyo hagize ubivugira mu ruhame bagenzi be bamuha urw’amenyo, bakamwita inganzwa. Kabalisa avuga ko bakomeza gushishikariza abagabo kumva ko kuvuga ko bahohoterwa ari uburenganzira bwabo kandi ngo n’abaturage muri rusange bakumvishwa ko n’abagabo bashobora guhohoterwa mu buryo runaka. Ihame ry’uburinganire ni gahunda ya Leta y’u Rwanda  igamije kunoza uburenganzira n’inshingano bingana hagati y’igitsina gore n’igitsina gabo nk’uko biteganywa n’itegeko no 51/2007 ryo ku wa 20/09/2007 rigena inshingano, imiterere n’imikorere by’urwego rushinzwe kugenzura iyubahirizwa ry’uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye bw’abagabo n’abagore mu iterambere ry’igihugu.

title: Ibendera ry’Umuryango wa Commonwealth ryazamuwe i Kigali (Amafoto)
content: Kuri uyu wa Mbere, tariki ya 9 Werurwe 2020 nibwo ibihugu 54 bihuriye muri Commonwealth byizihije uwo munsi ngarukamwaka. U Rwanda rwinjiye muri Commonwealth mu 2009, ruba igihugu cya kabiri cyawinjiyemo kidafitanye isano no kuba cyarakolonijwe n’u Bwongereza nk’uko bimeze ku bindi bigize uyu muryango, nyuma ya Mozambique. Commonwealth Day yasimbuye umunsi witwaga Empire Day, ni umunsi ukunda kwizihizwa ku wa mbere wa kabiri wa Werurwe buri mwaka. Mu rwego rwo kwizihiza uyu munsi, mu gitondo cyo ku wa Mbere ibendera rya Commonwealth ryazamuwe kuri Kigali Convention Centre, inyubako biteganyijwe ko ari nayo izaberamo inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu na za guverinoma bihuriye muri uyu muryango, izwi nka CHOGM iteganyijwe kubera mu Rwanda muri Kamena uyu mwaka. Ibirori byo kwizihiza uyu munsi ku rwego rwa Commonwealth byabereye i London mu birori byitabiriwe n’Umuyobozi w’uyu muryango akaba n’Umwamikazi w’u Bwongereza Elizabeth II. Commonwealth Day yizihizwa ku Isi hose; ni umunsi wizihizwa binyuze mu myiyereko ya gisirikare, amasengesho, imbyino n’ibindi. Insanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka ivuga ku ‘guharanira kugera ku ntego rusange’. Tariki 20 Mata 2018 ni bwo byemejwe ko u Rwanda ruzakira inama ya CHOGM, iba buri myaka ibiri igahuza abakuru b’Ibihugu byo muri Commonwealth. Inama ya CHOGM biteganyijwe ko izaba ku wa ‎22–27 Kamena 2020, izitabirwa n’abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinoma 53 bikoresha ururimi rw’Icyongereza. Iyi nama ya CHOGM 2020 izareba ku nsanganyamatsiko yo kurebera hamwe ahazaza hasangiwe, hakazaganirwa ku ngingo zirimo imiyoborere, kubahiriza amategeko, ikoranabuhanga, guhanga ibishya guteza imbere urubyiruko, ibidukikihe n’ubucuruzi. Muri Nzeri 2019 nibwo Perezida Paul Kagame ari kumwe n’Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Commonwealth, Patricia Scotland, batangaje ko inama ya CHOGM izahuza abakuru b’ibihugu na za guverinoma izaba tariki 22 Kamena 2020, abazayizamo bizezwa kuzafatwa neza. Abaturage miliyari 2.4 nibo bagize ibihugu byo muri Commonwealth, 60% muri bo bari munsi y’imyaka 30.

title: Nta murwayi mushya wa Coronavirus wabonetse mu cyiciro cya gatandatu cy’ibipimo byafashwe muri Premier League
content: Icyiciro cya gatandatu cy’ibipimo bimaze gufatwa mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bitatu, cyakozwe ku wa Kane no ku wa Gatanu nyuma y’uko amakipe amaze icyumweru akora imyitozo abakinnyi bakoranaho ndetse amwe akaba yaratangiye gukina imikino ya gicuti. Itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara ku wa Gatandatu, rigira riti “Premier League uyu munsi iremeza ko ku wa Kane tariki ya 4 Kamena no ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 5 Kamena, abakinnyi n’abandi bo mu makipe 1195 bapimwe COVID-19. Muri abo, nta wasanganywe icyo cyorezo.” Iyi ni inkuru nziza kuri Shampiyona y’Icyiciro cya Mbere mu Bwongereza iteganya gusubukurwa mu minsi 10 iri imbere. Ni ku nshuro ya kabiri hatabonetse umurwayi mu bipimo byafashwe amakipe yose 20 mu byiciro bitandatu by’ibipimo bimaze gufatwa mu gihe umuntu umwe ari we byagaragaye ko yanduye Coronavirus mu byiciro bitatu biheruka. Kuva iyi gahunda itangiye, Premier League imaze gufata ibipimo 6274. Abanduye icyorezo cya COVID-19 ni 13 gusa. Umukinnyi uzongera kugaragaraho iki cyorezo azajya yishyira mu kato mu gihe cy’iminsi 14. Premier League izongera gusubukurwa nyuma y’iminsi 100 ihagaritswe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi. Uko amakipe azahura mu mikino 32 y’iminsi itatu ibanza byatangajwe ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 5 Kamena, hamwe n’iya ¼ y’Igikombe cy’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Bwongereza (FA Cup) kizakinwa hagati ya tariki ya 27 n’iya 28 Kamena. Imikino 92 isigaye muri Premier League, izaba mu muhezo, yerekanwe na Sky Sports, BT Sport, BBC Sport cyangwa Amazon Prime. Premier League izasubukurwa Aston Villa ihura na Sheffield United tariki ya 17 Kamena mbere y’uko Manchester City yakira Arsenal kuri uwo mugoroba.

title: Umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports Bakame arahakana amakuru avuga ko yaba ari mu biganiro na APR FC
content:
Umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports FC, akaba na Kapiteni wayo Ndayishimiye Eric ‘Bakame’ arahakana amakuru avuga ko yaba ari mu biganiro na APR FC yigeze gukinira, kandi agifite amasezerano muri Rayon. Hari amakuru avuga ko umunyezamu wa mbere wa APR FC, Olivier Kwizera yamaze kumvikana na Maritzburg United yo muri Africa y’Epfo, ndetse biteganyijwe ko azayerekezamo umwaka w’imikino mu Rwanda nurangira. Bikomeje kuvugwa ko APR FC ishobora kumusimbuza Ndayishimiye Eric Bakame Kapiteni wa Rayon Sports, gusa Bakame we akabihakana. Bakame avuga ko hari abantu benshi bakomeje kumubaza niba koko azajya muri APR FC, ariko ngo nta makuru abifiteho, ndetse ntazi n’aho ayo makuru ari kuva.
Yagize ati “Nta muyobozi wo muri APR FC uranyegera ngo ambwire ko banshaka. Kandi nsigaje umwaka ku masezerano yanjye na Rayon Sports. Nkeka ko nibanyifuza bazabinyuza ku buyobozi bw’ikipe yanjye. Ubu sinabona icyo mbitangazaho. Ubu ibitekerezo byanjye biri ku mikino Rayon Sports isigaje muri Shampiyona no mu gikombe cy’Amahoro. Ibya ‘transfer’ byazaza nyuma ya season.” Amakuru avuga ko Bakame ashobora gusubira muri APR FC yakomeje kuvugwa, nyuma yo kunengwa n’ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports ko abwira itangazamakuru ibibazo biri mu ikipe. Nyuma yo kunengwa amaze imikino ibiri adakoreshwa, bigakekwa ko ashobora kuba ari mu bihano, nubwo umutoza we Masudi Djuma we avuga ko ari ukumuruhutsa.
 Yanditswe na Ubwanditsi/Muhabura.rw

title: Ibihe isi irimo si ibyo gukuka umutima
content:
Agiye kuva kuri iyi si ngo asange Se, Yezu yabwiye abigishwa be ati “Ntimugakuke umutima”. Iryo humure natwe niryo dukeneye by’umwihariko muri iki gihe twabaye ingaruzwamuheto z’ubwoba twatewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus ndetse n’imvura idasanzwe. Ubwo Yezu yasangiraga n’Intumwa ze bwa nyuma, nta washidikanya ko icyo gihe abigishwa bari barimo cyari giteye ubwoba. Aha turumva neza ukuntu inyanja y’ububabare yari yatashye imitima yabo ndetse n’ibitekerezo byabo. Ariko Yezu arabwira ati “ntimugakuke umutima nimwemere Imana nanjye munyemere”. Yezu arashaka kuturemamo icyizere, arashaka ko tudakuka umutima ngo duhahamuke bitewe n’ibyo tubona ndetse n’ibyo tubamo. Yezu yatanze iryo humure igihe haburaga amasaha make ngo atangire inzira y’Umusaraba. Nimwemere Imana, nanjye munyemere Yezu yagiriye inama inshuti ze zari zagashwe n’agahinda, azisaba kureba mu cyerekezo kimwe rukumbi zirangwa n’ukwemera. Amahoro arambye Yezu atanga, atsinda ubwoba, ntabwo ashingiye ku muntu, ahubwo ashingiye ku Mana. Urupfu ubwarwo ntirushobora kutwambura amahoro ye , kuko atava ku muntu cyangwa kubya muntu, ahubwo amahoro ye ava ku Mana. Mu nzu ya Data hari ibyicaro byinshi Yezu ntabwo yigeze ahindura amaso y’abantu ngo amurangamire we wenyine, ahubwo icyo yari agamije ni ugukiza muntu. Yezu ati “Namanutse mu ijuru ntazanywe no gukora ibyo nshaka. Icyo uwantumye ashaka ni ukutagira n’umwe nzimiza mu bo yampaye, ahubwo nkazamuzura ku munsi w’imperuka. icyo Data ashaka, ni uko ubona mwana akamwemera yagira ubugingo bw’iteka, maze nkazamuzura ku munsi w’imperuka”(Yh6,39-40). Yezu ashikajwe no kutugeza kuri Data abantu batigeze babona na rimwe. Ariko natwe tukazabanza guca mu rupfu nk’uko na we yarunyuzemo. Kuva kuri iyi si, Yezu arabibonamo nko “gusubira mu rugo” ; gusubira kwa Data aho yahoze. Ubwo Yezu yiteguraga gusanga Se, yakoresheje amagambo atambutse kure ubwenge bwa muntu kandi yuzuyemo icyizere; inzu, ubuturo, gutegura imyanya [...] Ni amagambo atanga ihumure kandi akatwereka ko turi mu rugendo ruzasohozwa igihe azagaruka kujyana abazaba barabaye ubwoko bwatoranyijwe, imbaga y’abaherezabitambo ba cyami, ihanga ritagatifu n’ umuryango Imana yironkeye.(1Pet 2,9) . Imana ituri hafi kandi idutuyemo. Ntabwo Imana yacu itwirengagiza cyangwa ngo yibere aho, ntabwo yihunza ibibazo byacu ahubwo ni Data udukunda. Urukundo rwayo rwigaragariza mu muvandimwe wacu wemera gushavuzwa n’imibabaro y’abandi, kandi akababwira amagambo y’ihumure n’ubucuti.  Burya nta byera ngo de! N’ubwo umubare w’ abigishwa ba Yezu wakomeje kwiyongera hari ubwo hajemo akantu ko kwikanyiza bagendeye ku nkomoko (Intu 6,1). Uwacengewe n’inyigisho za Yezu nta tonesha, nta kimenyane, nta gukundwakaza agira mubyo ashizwe, ahubwo aharanira ko ubutabera n’Ijambo ry’Imana bijyana bikaba mahwi. Ibi nibyo byatumye intumwa zitora abagabo barindwi b’inyangamugayo kandi buzuye Roho Mutagatifu n’ubuhanga maze babashinga umurimo wo gutanga amafunguro. Iyo urebye umubare munini w’abatuye isi usanga ari abamenye Inkuru Nziza. Bari mu madini n’amatorero yemera Imana ndetse n’ugushaka kwayo; ariko se kuki hariho ubwikunde butuma bamwe bahinduka abacakara b’abandi? Muri iki gihe isi yose yugarijwe na coronavirus kuki usanga bamwe barabaye ba rusahuriramunduru? Dusabe Imana ikongeze mu mutima wa muntu umutima wo gusangira no kumva ibyo twigishwa mu madini n’amatorero tubarizwamo. Aho ngiye murahazi, kuva ubu muzi Data kandi mwaramubonye  Urugendo turimo rugana mu ijuru kwa Data. Yezu aratubwira ati “Ni jye Nzira, n’Ukuri, n’Ubugingo. Ntawe ugera kuri Data atanyuzeho”. Abamenyereye kugendera mu ndege, mu modoka, kuri moto , mu bwato... muzi ko haba hari abantu cyangwa se ibyuma birangira abagenzi inzira, utabyumvise cyangwa se agakererwa arasigara. Muri urwo rugendo kandi habamo amabwiriza; bamwe bambara imikandara, abandi bakambara casque n’ibindi.  Natwe mu rugendo rwacu rugana mu ijuru hari imyitwarire igomba kuturanga. Iyo irimo kwirinda itonesha maze tukarangwa n’ubunyangamugayo bwuje ubuhanga (Intu 6,3). Hari kandi kwegamira ibuye nyabuzima ryajugunywe n’abantu ariryo NyagasaniYezu Kristu (1Pet 2,4), kwamamaza ibigwi by’uwaduhamagaye atuvana mu mwijima maze akatwinjiza mu rumuri rwe rw’agatangaza ( 1Pet 2,9). Mu bindi dukwiriye gukora ni ukudakuka umutima kandi tukemera n’uwo yatumye Yezu Kristu (Yh 14,1), kudacika intege muri uru rugendo rwacu ahubwo tugaharanira kuzaba hamwe na Yezu (Yh14,4) no kumenya neza inzira Yezu aturangira mu mvugo ye ati “Ni njye Nzira, n’Ukuri, n’Ubugingo. Nta wugera kuri Data atanyuzeho”. Muri iyi nzira turabonamo Tomasi. Araduhagarariye twese mu ngorane z’ubuzima no mu bibazo byinshi bidutera gushidikanya. Tomasi ati “Nyagasani, tube tutazi aho ugiye, ukabona ko twamenya inzira dute?” (Yh14,5) Ngicyo ikibazo cy’ingenzi natwe abantu duhora twibaza. Ese turajya he? Ese turagana he ? Ni ikihe cyanga cyangwa se intego nyamukuru y’ubuzima ? Ese ni izihe nkurikizi z’urupfu ? Yezu abona neza ko ntaho twagera tudafite icyizere. Yezu ni we uducira inzira kandi ni we udukingurira amarembo yo hirya yo gupfa kwa muntu. Umuntu udafite Yezu ahora afungiye mu buroko bw’ivanguramoko, ikimenyane, urwango. “Nimuhumure Kristu aradukunda kandi urukundo rushyitse rwirukana ubwoba, kuko ubwoba buterwa n’igihano maze ufite ubwoba ntagire urukundo rushyitse” (1Yh14,18). Dusabe: Nyagasani Mana yacu, ingabire zose waduhaye, uzidukomereze maze tube ibuye nyabuzima, ubwo twemera kandi ko twacunguwe n’ububabare bw’Umwana wawe Yezu Kristu ku bwa Roho Mutagatifu, uduhe no kuzasangira na We mu ngoma y’ijuru. Amena. Padiri Sylvain SEBACUMI Padiri mukuru wa Paruwasi yisunze Mutagatifu Tereza w’Umwana Yezu KABUGA, 
Diyosezi KABGAYI

title: Depite Bobi Wine na mugenzi we bafatiwe ku kibuga cy’indege
content: Umuhanzi akaba n’umunyapolitike, Robert Kyagulanyi uzwi nka Bobi Wine ndetse na mugenzi we depite Francis Zaake bafashwe n’inzego z’umutekano ubwo bari ku kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe bajya mu mahanga kwivuza nk’uko bari babyemerewe n’ibitaro byabanje kubavura. Bobi Wine yafashwe kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 30 Kanama 2018, yari atwawe n’ikipe y’abaganga be ndetse n’abamwitaga mu bitaro bya Lubaga aho amaze igihe arwariye nyuma yo kuva mu munyururu na bagenzi be bareganwa barekuwe by’agateganyo n’Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gulu kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 27 Kanama 2018. Chimpreports itangaza ko Bobi Wine yari agiye kuvurizwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Yagaruwe ahagana saa 7:30 z’ijoro, yaherekejwe n’abamwunganira mu mategeko, umuryango we n’igihiriri cy’abafana. Yabanje kwemererwa kwinjira mu kibuga nk’abandi bagenzi gusa indege yagombaga kumutwara ihageze yangiwe kwinjira ahubwo inzego z’umutekano zihita zimufata zimujyana muri Kiruddu Hospital. Mu masaha ya mugitondo, undi mudepite witwa Francis Zaake uhagarariye agace ka Mityana, na we yangiwe gusohoka mu gihugu ubwo yari agiye kwivuriza mu Buhinde nk’uko yari yoherejwe n’ibitaro bya Lubaga. Depite Zaake yafungiwe ku kibuga i Entebbe umunsi wose kugeza ubwo na Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) yahageze na we bahita bamufunga. Aba bombi basubijwe i Kampala mu modoka imwe bajyanwa mu bindi bitaro. Daily Monitor yatangaje ko umuyobozi w’ibitaro bya Lubaga Dr Peter Kibuuka ntiyahakanye cyangwa ngo yemere niba koko babohereje mu bindi bitaro ariko yaravuze ngo ntibari bakwiriye kubuzwa kujya kwivuza. Uko ari babiri bavuga ko basigiwe ubumuga n’inkoni ndetse n’iyicarubozo bakorewe ubwo bari bafunzwe. Bangiwe gusohoka igihugu mu gihe barekuwe by’agateganyo n’Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gulu kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki ya 27 Kanama 2018. Umuvugizi wa Leta ya Uganda, Ofwono Opondo yavuze ko Bobi Wine na Zaake bazemererwa kujya kwivuza hanze abaganga b’inzobere ba guverinoma bamaze kubasuzuma bakemeza niba uburwayi bwabo bukeneye ubuvuzi bwisumbuye. Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali
